Idañca yathāvuttaṃ abhisekavidhānaṃ majjhimanikāye ^b^cūḷasīhanādasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyampi ‘‘paṭhamaṃ tāva abhisekaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ rājūnaṃ suvaṇṇamayādīni tīṇi saṅkhāni ca gaṅgodakañca khattiyakaññañca laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī’’tiādinā vuttanti vadanti.

[03]^b^Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathayamāno^eb^ti pītipāmojjasaṅkhātasammodajananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca sammodanīyaṃ ‘‘kacci bhante khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci vo appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro’’ti evamādikathaṃ kathayamāno. ^b^Cha jane dassesī^eb^ti raññā saddhiṃ āgatānaṃ ‘‘na ime yakkhā, manussā ime’’ti sañjānanatthaṃ bhaṇḍukassa ^a^V1.0148^ea^ upāsakassa ānītattā tena saddhiṃ cha jane dassesi. ^b^Tevijjā^eb^ti pubbenivāsadibbacakkhuāsavakkhayasaṅkhātāhi tīhi vijjāhi samannāgatā. ^b^Iddhippattā^eb^ti iddhividhañāṇaṃ pattā. ^b^Cetopariyakovidā^eb^ti paresaṃ cittācāre kusalā. Evamettha pañca abhiññā sarūpena vuttā, dibbasotaṃ pana tāsaṃ vasena āgatameva hoti. ^b^Bahū^eb^ti evarūpā chaḷabhiññā buddhasāvakā bahū gaṇanapathaṃ atikkantā sakalajambudīpaṃ kāsāvapajjotaṃ katvā vicarantīti. Keci pana ‘‘tevijjā iddhippattā ca khīṇāsavā cetopariyakovidā keci khīṇāsavāti visuṃ yojetvā ‘arahanto’ti iminā sukkhavipassakā vuttā’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^Paññāveyyattiya^eb^nti paññāpāṭavaṃ, paññāya tikkhavisadabhāvanti attho. ^b^Āsanna^eb^nti āsanne ṭhitaṃ. ^b^Sādhu mahārāja paṇḍitosī^eb^ti rājānaṃ pasaṃsati. Puna vīmaṃsanto ^b^‘‘atthi pana te mahārājā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Cūḷahatthipadopamasuttantaṃ kathesī^eb^ti ‘‘ayaṃ rājā ‘ime samaṇā nāma īdisā, sīlādipaṭipatti ca tesaṃ īdisī’ti ca na jānāti, handa naṃ imāya cūḷahatthipadopamasuttantadesanāya samaṇabhāvūpagamanaṃ samaṇapaṭipattiñca viññāpessāmī’’ti cintetvā paṭhamaṃ ^b^cūḷahatthipadopamasuttantaṃ^eb^ kathesi. Tattha hi –

[08]‘‘Evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, idha tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno…pe… sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti, taṃ dhammaṃ suṇāti gahapati ^a^M1.0167^ea^ vā gahapatiputto vā aññatarasmiṃ vā kule paccājāto, so taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhati, so tena saddhāpaṭilābhena samannāgato iti paṭisañcikkhati ‘sambādho gharāvāso rajopatho, abbhokāso pabbajjā, nayidaṃ sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ ekantaparisuddhaṃ saṅkhalikhitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ, yannūnāhaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyya’nti. So aparena samayena appaṃ vā bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya appaṃ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya mahantaṃ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajati.
[08]‘‘So evaṃ pabbajito samāno bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho, lajjī dayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati.
[08]‘‘Adinnādānaṃ ^a^V1.0149^ea^ pahāya adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti dinnādāyī dinnapāṭikaṅkhī, athenena sucibhūtena attanā viharatī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.291-292) –
[07]Evamādinā sāsane saddhāpaṭilābhaṃ paṭiladdhasaddhehi ca pabbajjupagamanaṃ pabbajitehi ca paṭipajjitabbā sīlakkhandhādayo dhammā pakāsitā.

[03]^b^Rājā suttantaṃ suṇantoyeva aññāsī^eb^ti ‘‘so bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato hoti, ekabhattiko hoti rattuparato virato vikālabhojanā’’ti evaṃ tasmiṃ suttante (ma. ni. 1.293) āgatattā taṃ suṇantoyeva aññāsi. ^b^Idheva vasissāmā^eb^ti na tāva rattiyā upaṭṭhitattā anāgatavacanamakāsi. ^b^Āgataphalo^eb^ti anāgāmiphalaṃ sandhāyāha, sampattaanāgāmiphaloti attho. Tatoyeva ca visesato aviparītaviditasatthusāsanattā ^b^viññātasāsano. Idāni pabbajissatī^eb^ti gihiliṅgena ānītakiccassa niṭṭhitattā evamāha. ^b^Acirapakkantassa rañño^eb^ti raññe ^a^M1.0168^ea^ acirapakkanteti attho. ^b^Adhiṭṭhahitvā^eb^ti antotambapaṇṇidīpe samāgatā suṇantūti adhiṭṭhahitvā.

[03]^b^Bhūmattharaṇasaṅkhepenā^eb^ti bhūmattharaṇākārena. ^b^Uppātapāṭhakā^eb^ti nimittapāṭhakā, nemittakāti attho. ^b^Gahitā dāni imehi pathavī^eb^ti āsanānaṃ pathaviyaṃ atthatattā evamāhaṃsu. ^b^Patiṭṭhahissatīti cintento^eb^ti ettha tena kāraṇena sāsanapatiṭṭhānassa abhāvato avassaṃ patiṭṭhahantassa sāsanassa pubbanimittamidanti evaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena sallakkhesīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Paṇītenā^eb^ti uttamena. ^b^Sahatthā^eb^ti sahatthena ^b^santappetvā^eb^ti suṭṭhu tappetvā, paripuṇṇaṃ suhitaṃ yāvadatthaṃ katvāti attho. ^b^Petavatthuṃ vimānavatthuṃ saccasaṃyuttañca kathesī^eb^ti desanāvidhikusalo thero janassa saṃvegaṃ janetuṃ paṭhamaṃ petavatthuṃ kathetvā tadanantaraṃ saṃvegajātaṃ janaṃ assāsetuṃ saggakathāvasena vimānavatthuñca kathetvā tadanantaraṃ paṭiladdhassāsānaṃ ‘‘mā ettha assādaṃ karotha nibbānaṃ vinā na aññaṃ kiñci saṅkhāragataṃ dhuvaṃ nāma atthi, tasmā paramassāsakaṃ nibbānamadhigantuṃ vāyamathā’’ti saccapaṭivedhatthāya ussāhaṃ janento ante saccasaṃyuttaṃ kathesīti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Tesaṃ sutvā^eb^ti tesaṃ santikā therānaṃ guṇakathaṃ sutvā. ^b^Rañño saṃviditaṃ katvā^eb^ti rañño nivedanaṃ katvā, rājānaṃ paṭivedayitvāti attho. ^b^Alaṃ gacchāmā^eb^ti purassa accāsannattā sāruppaṃ na hotīti paṭipakkhipanto āha. ^b^Meghavanaṃ nāma uyyāna^eb^nti mahāmeghavanuyyānaṃ. Tassa kira ^a^V1.0150^ea^ uyyānassa bhūmiggahaṇadivase akālamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā sabbataḷākapokkharaṇiyo pūrento gimhābhihatarukkhalatādīnaṃ anuggaṇhantova pāvassi, tena kāraṇena taṃ mahāmeghavanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ jātaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^mahāvaṃse^eb^ –
[21]‘‘Uyyānaṭṭhānaggahaṇe, mahāmegho akālajo;
[22]Pāvassi tena uyyānaṃ, mahāmeghavanaṃ ahū’’ti.

[03]^b^Sukhasayitabhāvaṃ pucchitvā^eb^ti ‘‘kacci, bhante, idha sukhaṃ sayittha, tumhākaṃ idha nivāso sukha’’nti evaṃ sukhasayitabhāvaṃ pucchitvā tato therena ‘‘sukhasayitamhi, mahārāja, bhikkhūnaṃ phāsukamidaṃ uyyāna’’nti vutte ‘‘evaṃ sati ^a^M1.0169^ea^ idaṃ no uyyānaṃ dassāmī’’ti cintetvā ^b^‘‘kappati, bhante, bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmo’’^eb^ti pucchi. ^b^Imaṃ sutta^eb^nti veḷuvanārāmapaṭiggahaṇe vuttamimaṃ suttaṃ. ^b^Udaka^eb^nti dakkhiṇodakaṃ. ^b^Mahāmeghavanuyyānaṃ adāsī^eb^ti ‘‘imaṃ mahāmeghavanuyyānaṃ saṅghassa dammī’’ti vatvā jeṭṭhamāsassa kāḷapakkhe dutiyadivase adāsi. Mahāvihārassa dakkhiṇodakapāteneva saddhiṃ patiṭṭhitabhāvepi na tāva tattha vihārakammaṃ niṭṭhitanti āha ^b^‘‘idañca paṭhamaṃ vihāraṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Punadivasepī^eb^ti kāḷapakkhassa dutiyadivaseyeva. ^b^Aḍḍhanavamānaṃ pāṇasahassāna^eb^nti aḍḍhena navamānaṃ pāṇasahassānaṃ, pañcasatādhikānaṃ aṭṭhasahassānanti attho. ^b^Jotipātubhāvaṭṭhāna^eb^nti ñāṇālokassa pātubhāvaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Appamādasutta^eb^nti aṅguttaranikāye ^b^mahāappamādasuttaṃ,^eb^ rājovādasuttanti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Mahacca^eb^nti karaṇatthe paccattavacanaṃ, mahatā rājānubhāvenāti attho. Tumhe jānanatthanti sambandho. ^b^Ariṭṭho nāma amacco^eb^ti rañño bhāgineyyo ariṭṭho nāma amacco. ^b^Pañcapaṇṇāsāyā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘catupaṇṇāsāyā’’ti vattabbaṃ. Evañhi sati upari vuccamānaṃ ‘‘dvāsaṭṭhi arahanto’’ti vacanaṃ sameti. Teneva ca sīhaḷabhāsāya likhite ^b^mahāvaṃse^eb^ ‘‘catupaṇṇāsāya saddhi’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Dasabhātikasamākulaṃ rājakula^eb^nti muṭasivassa puttehi abhayo devānaṃpiyatisso mahānāgo uttiyo mattābhayo sūratissoti evamādīhi dasahi bhātikehi samākiṇṇaṃ rājakulaṃ. ^b^Cetiyagirimhi vassaṃ vasiṃsū^eb^ti āsāḷhīpuṇṇamadivase raññā dinnavihāreyeva paṭiggahetvā pāṭipadadivase vassaṃ vasiṃsu. ^b^Pavāretvā^eb^ti mahāpavāraṇāya pavāretvā. ^b^Kattikapuṇṇamāya^eb^nti aparakattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ. Mahāmahindatthero hi purimikāyaṃ upagantvā vutthavasso mahāpavāraṇāya pavāretvā tato ekamāsaṃ atikkamma cātumāsiniyaṃ puṇṇamadivase ariyagaṇaparivuto rājakulaṃ gantvā bhojanāvasāne ‘‘mahārāja, amhehi ciradiṭṭho ^a^V1.0151^ea^ sammāsambuddho’’tiādivacanamabrvi. Evañca katvā vakkhati ‘‘puṇṇamāyaṃ mahāvīro, cātumāsiniyā idhā’’ti. Yaṃ panettha ^b^kenaci^eb^ vuttaṃ ‘‘vutthavasso pavāretvāti cātumāsiniyā pavāraṇāyāti attho, paṭhamapavāraṇāya vā pavāretvā ekamāsaṃ tattheva vasitvā kattikapuṇṇamiyaṃ avoca, aññathā ‘puṇṇamāyaṃ ^a^M1.0170^ea^ mahāvīro’ti vuttattā na sakkā gahetu’’nti, tattha cātumāsiniyā pavāraṇāyāti ayamatthavikappo na yujjati. Na hi purimikāya vassūpagatā cātumāsiniyaṃ pavārenti. ^b^Ciradiṭṭho sammāsambuddho^eb^ti satthussa sarīrāvayavo ca sammāsambuddhoyevāti katvā avayave samudāyavohāravasena evamāhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ yathā ‘‘samuddo diṭṭho’’ti.

[03]Therena vuttampi gamanakāraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā idha vāse payojanameva dassetvā gamanaṃ paṭisedhetukāmo āha ^b^‘‘ahaṃ bhante tumhe’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Abhivādanā^eb^dīsu ācariyaṃ disvā abhivādanakaraṇaṃ ^b^abhivādanaṃ^eb^ nāma. Yasmiṃ vā disābhāge ācariyo vasati iriyāpathe kappento, tato abhimukhova vanditvā gacchati, vanditvā tiṭṭhati, vanditvā nisīdati, vanditvā nipajjati, idaṃ abhivādanaṃ nāma. Ācariyaṃ pana dūratova disvā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanakaraṇaṃ ^b^paccuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ nāma. Ācariyaṃ pana disvā añjaliṃ paggayha sīse ṭhapetvā ācariyaṃ namassati, yasmiṃ disābhāge so vasati, tadabhimukhopi tatheva namassati, gacchantopi ṭhitopi nisinnopi añjaliṃ paggayha namassatiyevāti idaṃ ^b^añjalikammaṃ^eb^ nāma. Anucchavikakammassa pana karaṇaṃ ^b^sāmīcikaraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma. Cīvarādīsu hi cīvaraṃ dento na yaṃ vā taṃ vā deti, mahagghaṃ satamūlagghampi pañcasatamūlagghampi satasahassamūlagghampi detiyeva. Piṇḍapātādīsupi eseva nayo. Idaṃ sāmīcikaraṇaṃ nāma. ^b^Sarīradhātuyo^eb^ti sarīrāvayavā. ^b^Aññāta^eb^nti aññātaṃ, viditaṃ mayāti attho. ^b^Kuto lacchāmā^eb^ti kuto labhissāma. ^b^Sumanena saddhiṃ mantehī^eb^ti paṭhamameva sāmaṇerassa kathitattā vā ‘‘jānāti esa amhākamadhippāya’’nti ñatvā vā evamāhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Appossukko tvaṃ mahārājā^eb^ti mahārāja tvaṃ dhātūnaṃ paṭilābhe mā ussukkaṃ karohi, mā tvaṃ tattha vāvaṭo bhava, aññaṃ tayā kattabbaṃ karohīti adhippāyo. Idāni tadeva raññā kattabbakiccaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘vīthiyo sodhāpetvā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Sabbatāḷāvacare upaṭṭhāpetvā^eb^ti kaṃsatāḷāditāḷaṃ avacarati etthāti tāḷāvacaraṃ vuccati ātatavitatādi ^a^M1.0171^ea^ sabbaṃ tūriyabhaṇḍaṃ. Teneva ^b^parinibbānasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘sabbañca tāḷāvacaraṃ sannipātethāti ettha sabbañca tāḷāvacaranti sabbaṃ tūriyabhaṇḍa’’nti vuttaṃ. Ettha pana sahacaraṇanayena sabbatūriyabhaṇḍānaṃ vādakāpi ^a^V1.0152^ea^ gahetuṃ vaṭṭantīti te sabbe upaṭṭhāpetvā sannipātetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Lacchasī^eb^ti labhissasi. ^b^Therā cetiyagirimeva agamaṃsū^eb^ti rājanivesanato nikkhamitvā puna cetiyagirimeva agamaṃsu.

[03]^b^Tāvadevā^eb^ti taṃ khaṇaṃyeva. ^b^Pāṭaliputtadvāre^eb^ti pāṭaliputtanagaradvāre. ^b^Kiṃ bhante sumana āhiṇḍasī^eb^ti sumana tvaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ akatvā kasmā vicarasīti pucchati. ^b^Cetiyagirimhiyeva patiṭṭhāpetvā^eb^ti pacchā tattha vihāratthāya ākaṅkhitabbabhāvato cetiyagirimhiyeva patiṭṭhāpetvā. ^b^Vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāyā^eb^ti pacchābhattanti attho. Pacchābhattameva hi chāyā vaḍḍhati. ^b^Athassa etadahosī^eb^ti dhātucaṅkoṭakaṃ disvā evaṃ cintesi. ^b^Chattaṃ apanamatū^eb^ti idaṃ setacchattaṃ sayameva me sīsoparito dhātucaṅkoṭakābhimukhaṃ hutvā namatūti attho. ^b^Mayhaṃ matthake patiṭṭhātū^eb^ti idaṃ dhātucaṅkoṭakaṃ therassa hatthato dhātuyā saha āgantvā sirasmiṃ me patiṭṭhātūti attho. ^b^Pokkharavassaṃ^eb^ nāma pokkharapattappamāṇaṃ valāhakamajjhe uṭṭhahitvā kamena pharitvā temetukāmeyeva temayamānaṃ mahantaṃ hutvā vassati. ^b^Mahāvīro^eb^ti mahāparakkamo. Mahāvīrāvayavattā cettha satthuvohārena dhātuyo eva niddiṭṭhā. Dhātusarīrenāgamanañhi sandhāya ayaṃ gāthā vuttā.

[03]^b^Pacchimadisābhimukhova hutvā apasakkanto^eb^ti piṭṭhito piṭṭhitoyeva pacchimadisābhimukho hutvā osakkanto, gacchantoti attho. Kiñcāpi esa pacchimadisaṃ na oloketi, tathāpi pacchimadisaṃ sandhāya gacchatīti ‘‘pacchimadisābhimukho’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Puratthimena dvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā^eb^ti ettha piṭṭhito piṭṭhitoyeva āgantvā dvāre sampatte parivattetvā ujukeneva nagaraṃ pāvisīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Mahejavatthu nāmā^eb^ti mahejanāmakena yakkhena pariggahitaṃ ekaṃ devaṭṭhānanti veditabbaṃ ^a^M1.0172^ea^. ^b^Paribhogacetiyaṭṭhāna^eb^nti ettha paribhuttūpakaraṇāni nidahitvā kataṃ cetiyaṃ paribhogacetiyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tividhañhi cetiyaṃ vadanti paribhogacetiyaṃ dhātucetiyaṃ dhammacetiyanti. Tattha ^b^paribhogacetiyaṃ^eb^ vuttanayameva. ^b^Dhātucetiyaṃ^eb^ pana dhātuyo nidahitvā kataṃ. Paṭiccasamuppādādilikhitapotthakaṃ nidahitvā kataṃ pana ^b^dhammacetiyaṃ^eb^ nāma. Sārīrikaṃ paribhogikaṃ uddissakanti evampi tippabhedaṃ cetiyaṃ vadanti. Ayaṃ pana pabhedo paṭimārūpassapi uddissakacetiyeneva saṅgahitattā suṭṭhutaraṃ yujjati.

[03]Kathaṃ pana idaṃ ṭhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ paribhogacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ ahosīti āha ^b^‘‘atīte kirā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pajjarakenā^eb^ti ettha pajjarako nāma rogo vuccati. So ca yakkhānubhāvena samuppannoti ^a^V1.0153^ea^ veditabbo. Tadā kira puṇṇakāḷo nāma yakkho attano ānubhāvena manussānampi sarīre pajjarakaṃ nāma rogaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^mahāvaṃse^eb^ –
[22]‘‘Rakkhasehi janassettha, rogo pajjarako ahū’’ti;
[07]^b^Dīpavaṃse^eb^pi cetaṃ vuttaṃ –
[21]‘‘Rakkhasā ca bahū tattha, pajjarā ca samuṭṭhitā;
[22]Pajjarena bahū sattā, nassanti dīpamuttame’’ti.

[03]^b^Anayabyasana^eb^nti ettha ^b^anayo^eb^ti avaḍḍhi. Kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ byasati vikkhipati vināsetīti ^b^byasana^eb^nti dukkhaṃ vuccati. Kiñcāpi ‘‘buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento’’ti vuttaṃ, tathāpi ‘‘te satte anayabyasanamāpajjante disvā’’ti vacanato paṭhamaṃ buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ oloketvā pacchā sabbaññutaññāṇena lokaṃ olokento te satte anayabyasanamāpajjante disvāti gahetabbaṃ. Na hi āsayānusayādibuddhacakkhussa te sattā anayabyasanaṃ āpajjantā dissanti. ^b^Dubbuṭṭhikā^eb^ti visamavassādivasena duṭṭhā asobhanā vuṭṭhiyeva dubbuṭṭhikā, sassuppattihetubhūtā kāyasukhuppattisappāyā sattupakārā sammā vuṭṭhi tattha na hotīti adhippāyo. Tatoyeva ca ^b^‘‘dubbhikkhaṃ dussassa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Bhikkhāya abhāvo ^a^M1.0173^ea^, dullabhabhāvo vā ^b^dubbhikkhaṃ,^eb^ sulabhā tattha bhikkhā na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sassānaṃ abhāvo, asampannatā vā ^b^dussassaṃ. Devo^eb^ti meghassetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^Sammādhāramanupavecchī^eb^ti udakadhāraṃ sammā vimuñci, sammā anupavassīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Mahāvivādo hotī^eb^ti tasmiṃ kira kāle jayantamahārājena ca tassa rañño kaniṭṭhabhātukena samiddhakumāranāmakena uparājena ca saddhiṃ imasmiṃ dīpe mahāyuddhaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘tena kho pana samayena maṇḍadīpe mahāvivādo hotī’’ti. ^b^Hotī^eb^ti kiriyā kālamapekkhitvā vattamānapayogo, vivādassa pana atītakālikattaṃ ‘‘tena kho pana samayenā’’ti imināva viññāyati. Saddantarasannidhānena hettha atītakālāvagamo yathā ‘‘bhāsate vaḍḍhate tadā’’ti. Evaṃ sabbattha īdisesu ṭhānesu vattamānapayogo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Kalahaviggahajātā^eb^ti ettha kalaho nāma matthakappatto kāyakalahopi vācākalahopi. Tattha hatthaparāmāsādivasena kāyena kātabbo kalaho ^b^kāyakalaho^eb^. Mammaghaṭṭanādivasena vācāya kātabbo kalaho ^b^vācākalaho^eb^^a^V1.0154^ea^. Vipaccanīkagahaṇaṃ ^b^viggaho^eb^. Kalahassa pubbabhāge uppanno aññamaññaviruddhagāho. Atha vā kalaho nāma ^b^vācākalaho^eb^. Aññamaññaṃ hatthaparāmāsādivasena virūpaṃ viruddhaṃ vā gahaṇaṃ viggaho ^b^kāyakalaho^eb^. Yathāvutto kalaho ca viggaho ca jāto sañjāto etesanti kalahaviggahajātā, sañjātakalahaviggahāti attho.

[03]^b^Tāni sāsanantaradhānena nassantī^eb^ti pariyattipaṭivedhapaṭipattisaṅkhātassa tividhassapi sāsanassa antaradhānena dhātuparinibbāne sati tāni cetiyāni vinassanti. Tīṇi (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.161; vibha. aṭṭha. 809) hi parinibbānāni kilesaparinibbānaṃ khandhaparinibbānaṃ dhātuparinibbānanti, tāni pana amhākaṃ bhagavato vasena evaṃ veditabbāni. Tassa hi ^b^kilesaparinibbānaṃ^eb^ bodhipallaṅke ahosi, ^b^khandhaparinibbānaṃ^eb^ kusinārāyaṃ. ^b^Dhātuparinibbānaṃ^eb^ anāgate bhavissati. Sāsanassa kira osakkanakāle imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe dhātuyo sannipatitvā ^a^M1.0174^ea^ mahācetiyaṃ gamissanti, mahācetiyato nāgadīpe rājāyatanacetiyaṃ, tato mahābodhipallaṅkaṃ gamissanti, nāgabhavanatopi devalokatopi brahmalokatopi dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅkameva gamissanti, sāsapamattāpi dhātu na antarā nassissati. Sabbā dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅke rāsibhūtā suvaṇṇakkhandho viya ekagghanā hutvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjessanti, tā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharissanti. Tato dasasahassacakkavāḷe devatā sannipatitvā ‘‘ajja satthā parinibbāti, ajja sāsanaṃ osakkati, pacchimadassanaṃ dāni idaṃ amhāka’’nti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato mahantataraṃ kāruññaṃ karissanti, ṭhapetvā anāgāmikhīṇāsave avasesā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkhissanti. Dhātūsu tejodhātu uṭṭhahitvā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati, sāsapamattiyāpi dhātuyā sati ekajālāva bhavissati, dhātūsu pariyādānaṃ gatāsu paricchijjissati. Evaṃ mahantaṃ ānubhāvaṃ dassetvā dhātūsu antarahitāsu sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti.

[03]^b^Divā bodhirukkhaṭṭhāne hatthisālāyaṃ tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti divā vatthuvicinanāya okāsaṃ kurumāno tato dhātuṃ gahetvā kumbhe ṭhapetvā sadhātukova hutvā tiṭṭhatīti vadanti. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^mahāvaṃse^eb^ –
[21]‘‘Rattiṃ nāgonupariyāti, taṃ ṭhānaṃ so sadhātukaṃ;
[22]Bodhiṭṭhānamhi sālāyaṃ, divā ṭhāti sadhātuko’’ti.

[03]^b^Thūpapatiṭṭhānabhūmiṃ pariyāyatī^eb^ti matthakato dhātuṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpetvā sadhātukaṃ thūpapatiṭṭhānabhūmiṃ rattibhāge ^a^V1.0155^ea^ pariyāyati, samantato vicaratīti attho. ^b^Jaṅghappamāṇa^eb^nti pupphaṭṭhānappamāṇaṃ. Thūpakucchito heṭṭhābhāgañhi thūpassa jaṅghāti vadanti. ^b^Dhātuoropanatthāyā^eb^ti hatthikumbhato dhātukaraṇḍakassa oropanatthāya. ^b^Sakalanagarañca janapado cā^eb^ti nagaravāsino janapadavāsino ca abhedato nagarajanapadasaddehi vuttā ‘‘sabbo gāmo āgato, mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī’’tiādīsu viya. ^b^Mahājanakāye^eb^ti mahājanasamūhe. Samūhapariyāyo hettha kāyasaddo. Ekekadhātuppadesato tejodakanikkhamanādivasena yamakayamakaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ ^b^yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0175^ea^. Channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ rasmiyo cāti sambandho kātabbo. Channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ udakadhārā cāti evampettha sambandhaṃ vadanti. Parinibbutepi bhagavati tassānubhāvena evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyamahosiyevāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ acintiyā’’^eb^tiādigāthamāha. ^b^Buddhadhammā^eb^ti ettha buddhaguṇā.

[03]^b^Dharamānakālepi tikkhattuṃ āgamāsī^eb^ti bhagavā kira abhisambodhito navame māse phussapuṇṇamadivase yakkhādhivāsaṃ laṅkādīpamupagantvā laṅkāmajjhe tiyojanāyate yojanavitthate mahānāgavanuyyāne mahāyakkhasamāgame upariākāse ṭhatvā kappuṭṭhānasamaye samuṭṭhitavuṭṭhivātanibbisesavassavāyunā ca lokantarikanirayandhakārasadisaghorandhakāranikāyena ca sītanarakanibbisesabahalasītena ca saṃvaṭṭakālasañjātavātasaṅkhubhitehi meghanabhagajjitasadisena gaganamedanīninnādena ca yakkhānaṃ bhayaṃ santāsaṃ janetvā tehi yācitābhayo ‘‘detha me samaggā nisīdanaṭṭhāna’’nti vatvā ‘‘dema te sakaladīpaṃ, dehi no, mārisa, abhaya’’nti vutte sabbaṃ taṃ upaddavaṃ antaradhāpetvā yakkhadattabhūmiyā cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā tattha nisinno samantato jalamānaṃ cammakhaṇḍaṃ pasāretvā kappuṭṭhānaggisadisadahanābhibhūtānaṃ jaladhisalilabhītānaṃ samantā velante bhamantānaṃ yakkhānaṃ giridīpaṃ dassetvā tesu tattha patiṭṭhitesu taṃ yathāṭhāne patiṭṭhāpetvā cammakhaṇḍaṃ saṅkhipitvā nisinno tadā samāgate anekadevatāsannipāte dhammaṃ desetvā anekapāṇakoṭīnaṃ dhammābhisamayaṃ katvā sumanakūṭavāsinā mahāsumanadevarājena samadhigatasotāpattiphalena yācitapūjanīyo sīsaṃ parāmasitvā muṭṭhimattā nīlāmalakesadhātuyo tassa datvā jambudīpamagamāsi.

[03]Dutiyaṃ abhisambodhito pañcame saṃvacchare cūḷodaramahodarānaṃ jalathalanivāsīnaṃ mātulabhāgineyyānaṃ nāgarājūnaṃ maṇipallaṅkaṃ nissāya upaṭṭhitamahāsaṅgāme nāgānaṃ mahāvināsaṃ disvā cittamāsakāḷapakkhassa uposathadivase pātova samiddhasumanena nāma rukkhadevaputtena chattaṃ katvā dhāritarājāyatano nāgadīpaṃ samāgantvā saṅgāmamajjhe ākāse pallaṅkena nisinno ghorandhakārena ^a^V1.0156^ea^ nāge santāsetvā assāsento ālokaṃ dassetvā sañjātapītisomanassānaṃ upagatanāgānaṃ sāmaggikaraṇīyaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā mātulabhāgineyyehi dvīhi nāgarājūhi ^a^M1.0176^ea^ pūjite pathavītalagate maṇipallaṅke nisinno nāgehi dibbannapānehi santappito jalathalanivāsino asītikoṭināge saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā tehi namassituṃ pallaṅkañca rājāyatanapādapañca tattha patiṭṭhāpetvā jambudīpamagamāsi.

[03]Tatiyampi abhisambodhito aṭṭhame saṃvacchare mahodaramātulena maṇiakkhikanāgarājenābhiyācito visākhapuṇṇamadivase pañcabhikkhusataparivuto kalyāṇīpadese maṇiakkhikassa bhavanamupagantvā tattha māpitaruciraratanamaṇḍape manoharavarapallaṅke nisinno nāgarājena dibbannapānehi santappetvā nāgamāṇavikagaṇaparivutena dibbamālāgandhādīhi pūjito tattha dhammaṃ desetvā vuṭṭhāyāsanā sumanakūṭe padaṃ dassetvā pabbatapāde divāvihāraṃ katvā dīghavāpicetiyaṭṭhāne ca mubhiyaṅgaṇacetiyaṭṭhāne ca kalyāṇīcetiyaṭṭhāne ca mahābodhiṭṭhāne ca thūpārāmaṭṭhāne ca mahācetiyaṭṭhāne ca sasāvako nisīditvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā silācetiyaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhatvā devanāge samanusāsitvā jambudīpamagamāsi. Evaṃ bhagavā dharamānakālepi imaṃ dīpaṃ tikkhattuṃ āgamāsīti veditabbaṃ.

[03]Idāni tadeva tikkhattumāgamanaṃ saṅkhepato vibhāvento āha ^b^‘‘paṭhamaṃ yakkhadamanattha’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Rakkhaṃ karonto^eb^ti yakkhānaṃ puna apavisanatthāya rakkhaṃ karonto. ^b^Āvijjī^eb^ti samantato vicari. ^b^Mātulabhāgineyyāna^eb^nti cūḷodaramahodarānaṃ. Ettha pana kiñcāpi bhagavā samiddhasumanena nāma devaputtena saddhiṃ āgato, tathāpi pacchāsamaṇena ekenapi bhikkhunā saddhiṃ anāgatattā ^b^‘‘ekakova āgantvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tadanurūpassa paripanthassa vihatattā ^b^‘‘pariḷāhaṃ vūpasametvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Rañño bhātā^eb^ti rañño kaniṭṭhabhātā. ^b^Abhayo^eb^ti mattābhayo.

[03]^b^Anuḷā devī^eb^ti rañño jeṭṭhabhātujāyā anuḷā devī. ^b^Purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ bodhi patiṭṭhāsī^eb^ti yadā hi so ^b^kakusandho^eb^ nāma bhagavā imasmiṃ dīpe manusse pajjarakābhibhūte anayabyasanamāpajjante disvā karuṇāya sañcoditahadayo imaṃ dīpamāgato, tadā ^a^M1.0177^ea^ taṃ rogabhayaṃ vūpasametvā sannipatitānaṃ dhammaṃ desento caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayaṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye bodhipatiṭṭhānārahaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tattha samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya ‘‘mama sirīsamahābodhito dakkhiṇamahāsākhamādāya rucanandā bhikkhunī idhāgacchatū’’ti adhiṭṭhāsi ^a^V1.0157^ea^. Sā satthu cittaṃ ñatvā taṅkhaṇaññeva khemavatīrājadhāniyā khemarājānamādāya mahābodhimupagantvā dakkhiṇamahāsākhāya manosilālekhaṃ khemarājena dāpetvā taṃ sayaṃ chijjitvā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe ṭhitaṃ bodhisākhamādāya pañcasatabhikkhunīhi ceva devatāhi ca parivāritā iddhiyā idhānetvā tathāgatena pasārite dakkhiṇahatthe sasuvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ mahābodhiṃ ṭhapesi. Taṃ tathāgato abhayassa nāma rañño datvā tena tasmiṃ samaye ‘‘mahātitthavana’’nti paññāte mahāmeghavanuyyāne patiṭṭhāpesi.

[03]^b^Koṇāgamano^eb^ ca bhagavā dubbuṭṭhipīḷite dīpavāsino disvā imaṃ dīpamāgato taṃ bhayaṃ vūpasametvā dhammaṃ desento caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni maggaphalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā pubbabodhiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā samāpattipariyosāne ‘‘mama udumbaramahābodhito dakkhiṇamahāsākhamādāya karakanattā bhikkhunī idhāgacchatū’’ti cintesi. Sā bhagavato adhippāyaṃ viditvā taṅkhaṇaññeva sobharājadhāniyā sobharājānamādāya mahābodhimupagantvā dakkhiṇamahāsākhāya manosilālekhaṃ sobharājena dāpetvā taṃ sayaṃ chijjitvā hemakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitaṃ bodhisākhamādāya pañcasatabhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ suragaṇaparivutā iddhiyā idhāharitvā satthārā pasāritadakkhiṇapāṇitale sahemakaṭāhaṃ mahābodhiṃ ṭhapesi. Taṃ tathāgato samiddhassa rañño datvā tena tasmiṃ samaye ‘‘mahānāgavana’’nti saṅkhyaṃ gate mahāmeghavanuyyāne mahābodhiṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.

[03]^b^Kassapo^eb^pi ca bhagavā upaṭṭhitarājūparājayuddhena pāṇino vināsaṃ disvā karuṇāya codito imaṃ dīpamāgantvā taṃ kalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhammaṃ desento caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni maggaphalaṃ pāpetvā mahābodhiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tattha samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya ‘‘mama nigrodhamahābodhito dakkhiṇamahāsākhamādāya sudhammā bhikkhunī idhāgacchatū’’ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Sā bhagavato cittaṃ viditvā taṅkhaṇaññeva bārāṇasīrājadhāniyā ^a^M1.0178^ea^ brahmadattarājānamādāya mahābodhimupagantvā dakkhiṇamahāsākhāya manosilālekhaṃ brahmadattena dāpetvā taṃ sayaṃ chijjitvā kanakakaṭāhe ṭhitaṃ bodhisākhamādāya pañcasatabhikkhunīparivārā devagaṇaparivutā iddhiyā ettha ānetvā munindena pasārite dakkhiṇakaratale sasuvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ mahābodhiṃ ṭhapesi. Taṃ bhagavā jayantarañño datvā tena tasmiṃ samaye ‘‘mahāsālavana’’nti saṅkhyaṃ gate mahāmeghavanuyyāne mahābodhiṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Evaṃ imasmiṃ dīpe purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ bodhiṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Taṃ sandhāya evamāha ‘‘imasmiñca mahārāja dīpe purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ bodhi patiṭṭhāsī’’ti.

[03]^b^Sarasaraṃsijālavissajjanakenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0158^ea^ siniddhatāya rasavantaṃ ojavantaṃ abhinavaraṃsijālaṃ vissajjentena. Atha vā ito cito ca saṃsaraṇato sarasaṃ sajīvaṃ jīvamānaṃ viya raṃsijālaṃ vissajjentena. Atha vā sarasakāle dharamānakāle buddhena viya raṃsijālaṃ muñcantenāti evamettha atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti. Ekadivaseneva agamāsīti sambandho. ^b^Pañcahi kaññāsatehī^eb^ti attano paricārikehi pañcahi kaññāsatehi. ^b^Upassayaṃ kārāpetvā^eb^ti bhikkhunupassayaṃ kārāpetvā. ^b^Appesī^eb^ti lekhasāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. ^b^Evañca avocā^eb^ti rājasandesaṃ appetvā therassa mukhasāsanaṃ viññāpento evaṃ avoca. ^b^Udikkhatī^eb^ti apekkhati pattheti.

[03]^b^Chinnahatthaṃ viyā^eb^ti chinnahatthavantaṃ viya. Chinnā hatthā etassāti chinnahatthoti aññapadatthasamāso daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Pabbajjāpurekkhārā^eb^ti pabbajjābhimukhā, pabbajjāya sañjātābhilāsā ‘‘kadā nu kho pabbajissāmī’’ti tattha ussukkamāpannāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Maṃ paṭimānetī^eb^ti maṃ udikkhati. Satthena ghātaṃ na arahatīti ^b^asatthaghātārahaṃ. Himavalāhakagabbha^eb^nti himapuṇṇavalāhakagabbhaṃ. Pāṭihāriyavasena jātaṃ himameva ‘‘valāhakagabbha’’ntipi vadanti. ^b^Doṇamattā^eb^ti magadhanāḷiyā soḷasanāḷippamāṇā.

[03]^b^Magga^eb^nti sattayojanikaṃ maggaṃ. ^b^Paṭijaggāpetvā^eb^ti sodhāpetvā, khāṇukaṇṭakādīni harāpetvā tattha bahalavipulavālukaṃ okirāpetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Kammāravaṇṇa^eb^nti rañño pakatisuvaṇṇakāravaṇṇaṃ. ^b^Navahatthaparikkhepa^eb^nti navahatthappamāṇo parikkhepo assāti navahatthaparikkhepaṃ, parikkhepato ^a^M1.0179^ea^ navahatthappamāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^‘‘Pañcahatthubbedha’’^eb^ntiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. ^b^Tihatthavikkhambha^eb^nti tihatthappamāṇavitthāraṃ. ^b^Samussitadhajapaṭāka^eb^nti ussāpitanīlapītādivividhadhajapaṭākaṃ. ^b^Nānāratanavicitta^eb^nti tattha tattha racitanānāratanehi suvicittaṃ. ^b^Anekālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍita^eb^nti pasannajanapūjitehi hatthūpagādīhi nānālaṅkārehi sajjitaṃ. ^b^Nānāvidhakusumasamākiṇṇa^eb^nti upahāravasena upanītehi nānappakārehi vaṇṇagandhasampannehi jalathalapupphehi ākiṇṇaṃ. ^b^Anekatūriyasaṅghuṭṭha^eb^nti ātabhavitatādipañcaṅgikatūriyasaṅghositaṃ. ^b^Avasesaṃ adassanaṃ agamāsī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘handa, mahārāja, tayā gahetabbā ayaṃ sākhā, tassa upanissayabhūto ayaṃ khandho, na mayaṃ tayā gahetabbā’’ti vadantā viya avasesā sākhā satthu tejasā adassanamagamaṃsūti vadanti. ^b^Gavakkhajālasadisa^eb^nti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ, jālakavāṭasadisaṃ katvāti attho. ^b^Celukkhepasatasahassāni pavattiṃsū^eb^ti tesaṃ tesaṃ janānaṃ sīsopari bhamantānaṃ uttarāsaṅgacelānaṃ ukkhepasatasahassāni pavattiṃsūti ^a^V1.0159^ea^ attho. ^b^Mūlasatenā^eb^ti dasasu lekhāsu ekekāya dasa dasa hutvā nikkhantamūlasatena. ^b^Dasa mahāmūlā^eb^ti paṭhamalekhāya nikkhantadasamahāmūlāni.

[03]^b^Devadundubhiyo phaliṃsū^eb^ti devadundubhiyo thaniṃsu. ^b^Devadundubhī^eb^ti ca na ettha kāci bherī adhippetā, atha kho uppātabhāvena ākāsagato nigghosasaddo. ^b^Devo^eb^ti hi megho. Tassa hi acchabhāvena ākāsavaṇṇassa devassābhāvena sukkhagajjitasaññite sadde niccharante devadundubhīti samaññā, tasmā devadundubhiyo phaliṃsūti devo sukkhagajjitaṃ gajjīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Pabbatānaṃ naccehī^eb^ti pathavīkampena ito cito ca bhamantānaṃ pabbatānaṃ naccehi. ^b^Yakkhānaṃ hiṅkārehī^eb^ti vimhayajātānaṃ yakkhānaṃ vimhayappakāsanavasena pavattehi hiṅkārasaddehi. Yakkhā hi vimhayajātā ‘‘hiṃ hi’’nti saddaṃ nicchārenti. ^b^Thutijappehī^eb^ti pasaṃsāvacanehi. ^b^Brahmānaṃ apphoṭanehī^eb^ti pītisomanassajātānaṃ brahmānaṃ bāhāyaṃ paharaṇasaṅkhātehi apphoṭanehi. Pītisomanassajātā hi brahmāno vāmahatthaṃ samiñjitvā dakkhiṇena hatthena bāhāyaṃ pahāraṃ denti. ^b^Ekakolāhala^eb^nti ekato pavattakolāhalaṃ ^a^M1.0180^ea^. ^b^Ekaninnāda^eb^nti ekato pavattanigghosaṃ. Phalato nikkhantā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo ujukaṃ uggantvā onamitvā cakkavāḷapabbatamukhavaṭṭiṃ āhacca tiṭṭhantīti āha ^b^‘‘sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ratanagopānasīvinaddhaṃ viya kurumānā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Taṅkhaṇato ca pana pabhutī^eb^ti vuttanayena suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitassa mahābodhissa chabbaṇṇarasmīnaṃ vissajjitakālato pabhuti. ^b^Himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsī^eb^ti suvaṇṇakaṭāheneva saddhiṃ uggantvā himodakapuṇṇaṃ valāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi. Paṭhamaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitoyeva hi bodhi pacchā vuttappakāraacchariyapaṭimaṇḍito hutvā himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi. Teneva vakkhati ‘‘paṭhamaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahi, tato himagabbhasattāhaṃ abhisekasattāhañca vītināmetvā’’tiādi. Tatoyeva ca ^b^mahāvaṃse^eb^pi vuttaṃ –
[21]‘‘Evaṃ satena mūlānaṃ, tatthesā gandhakaddame;
[22]Patiṭṭhāsi mahābodhi, pasādentī mahājanaṃ.
[21]‘‘Tassā khandho dasahattho, pañca sākhā manoramā;
[22]Catuhatthā catuhatthā, dasaḍḍhaphalamaṇḍitā.
[21]‘‘Sahassantu pasākhānaṃ, sākhānaṃ tāsamāsi ca;
[22]Evaṃ āsi mahābodhi, manoharasirindharā.
[21]‘‘Kaṭāhamhi ^a^V1.0160^ea^ mahābodhi, patiṭṭhitakkhaṇe mahī;
[22]Akampi pāṭihīrāni, ahesuṃ vividhāni ca.
[21]‘‘Sayaṃ nādehi tūriyānaṃ, devesu mānusesu ca;
[22]Sādhukāraninnādehi, devabrahmagaṇassa ca.
[21]‘‘Meghānaṃ migapakkhīnaṃ, yakkhādīnaṃ ravehi ca;
[22]Ravehi ca mahīkampe, ekakolāhalaṃ ahu.
[21]‘‘Bodhiyā phalapattehi, chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo subhā;
[22]Nikkhamitvā cakkavāḷaṃ, sakalaṃ sobhayiṃsu ca.
[21]‘‘Sakaṭāhā mahābodhi, uggantvāna tato nabhaṃ;
[22]Aṭṭhāsi himagabbhamhi, sattāhāni adassanā’’ti.
[07]Tasmā ^a^M1.0181^ea^ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitoyeva bodhi kaṭāheneva saddhi uggantvā himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsīti veditabbaṃ.
[03]Heṭṭhā pana bhagavato adhiṭṭhānakkamaṃ dassentena yaṃ vuttaṃ –

[08]‘‘Bhagavā kira mahāparinibbānamañce nipanno laṅkādīpe mahābodhipatiṭṭhāpanatthāya asokamahārājā mahābodhiggahaṇatthaṃ gamissati, tadā mahābodhissa dakkhiṇasākhā sayameva chijjitvā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhātūti adhiṭṭhāsi, idamekamadhiṭṭhānaṃ.
[08]‘‘Tattha patiṭṭhānakāle ca ‘mahābodhi himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā tiṭṭhatū’ti adhiṭṭhāsi, idaṃ dutiyamadhiṭṭhānaṃ.
[08]‘‘Sattame divase himavalāhakagabbhato oruyha suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahanto pattehi ca phalehi ca chabbaṇṇarasmiyo muñcatūti adhiṭṭhāsi, idaṃ tatiyamadhiṭṭhāna’’nti.

[07]Taṃ ^a^V1.0161^ea^ iminā na sameti. Tattha hi paṭhamaṃ himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā pacchā sattame divase himavalāhakagabbhato oruyha chabbaṇṇaraṃsivissajjanaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahanañca vuttaṃ, tasmā aṭṭhakathāya pubbenāparaṃ na sameti. ^b^Mahāvaṃse^eb^ pana adhiṭṭhānepi paṭhamaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahanaṃ pacchāyeva chabbaṇṇaraṃsivissajjanaṃ himavalāhakagabbhapavisanañca. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Parinibbānamañcamhi, nipannena jinena hi;
[22]Kataṃ mahāadhiṭṭhānaṃ, pañcakaṃ pañcacakkhunā.
[21]‘‘Gayhamānā mahābodhi-sākhāsokena dakkhiṇā;
[22]Chijjitvāna sayaṃyeva, patiṭṭhātu kaṭāhake.
[21]‘‘Patiṭṭhahitvā sā sākhā, chabbaṇṇarasmiyo subhā;
[22]Rājayantī disā sabbā, phalapattehi muñcatu.
[21]‘‘Sasuvaṇṇakaṭāhā sā, uggantvāna manoramā;
[22]Adissamānā sattāhaṃ, himagabbhamhi tiṭṭhatū’’ti.
[07]^b^Bodhivaṃse^eb^pi ^a^M1.0182^ea^ ca ayameva adhiṭṭhānakkamo vutto, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto adhiṭṭhānakkamo yathā pubbenāparaṃ na virujjhati, tathā vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbo.

[03]^b^Himañca chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo ca āvattitvā mahābodhimeva pavisiṃsū^eb^ti mahābodhiṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ himañca bodhito nikkhantachabbaṇṇarasmiyo ca āvattitvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bodhimeva pavisiṃsu, bodhipaviṭṭhā viya hutvā antarahitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha pana ‘‘himañca raṃsiyo cā’’ti ayameva pāṭho satasodhitasammate porāṇapotthake sesesu ca sabbapotthakesu dissati. ^b^Mahāvaṃse^eb^pi cetaṃ vuttaṃ –
[21]‘‘Atīte tamhi sattāhe, sabbe himavalāhakā;
[22]Pavisiṃsu mahābodhiṃ, sabbā tā raṃsiyopi cā’’ti.

[07]^b^Kenaci^eb^ pana ‘‘pañca raṃsiyo’’ti pāṭhaṃ parikappetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘sabbadisāhi pañca rasmiyo āvattitvāti ^a^V1.0162^ea^ pañcahi phalehi nikkhantattā pañca, tā pana chabbaṇṇāvā’’ti, taṃ tassa sammohavijambhitamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Paripuṇṇakhandhasākhāpasākhapañcaphalapaṭimaṇḍito^eb^ti paripuṇṇakhandhasākhāpasākhāhi ceva pañcahi ca phalehi paṭimaṇḍito, samantato vibhūsitoti attho. ^b^Abhisekaṃ datvā^eb^ti anotattodakena abhisekaṃ datvā. ^b^Mahābodhiṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsī^eb^ti bodhisamīpeyeva vasi.

[03]^b^Pubbakattikapavāraṇādivase^eb^ti assayujamāsassa juṇhapakkhapuṇṇamiyaṃ. Cātuddasīuposathattā dvisattāhe jāte uposatho sampattoti āha ^b^‘‘kāḷapakkhassa uposathadivase’’^eb^ti, assayujamāsakāḷapakkhassa cātuddasīuposatheti attho. ^b^Pācīnamahāsālamūle ṭhapesī^eb^ti nagarassa pācīnadisābhāge jātassa mahāsālarukkhassa heṭṭhā maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā tattha ṭhapesi. ^b^Sattarasame divase^eb^ti pāṭipadadivasato dutiyadivase. ^b^Kattikachaṇapūjaṃ addasā^eb^ti kattikachaṇavasena bodhissa kariyamānaṃ pūjaṃ sumanasāmaṇero addasa, disvā ca āgato sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Taṃ sandhāyeva ca thero bodhiāharaṇatthaṃ pesesi.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhārasa devatākulānī^eb^ti mahābodhiṃ parivāretvā ṭhitanāgayakkhādidevatākulāni datvāti sambandho. Amaccakulāni bodhissa kattabbavicāraṇatthāya ^a^M1.0183^ea^ adāsi, brāhmaṇakulāni lokasammatattā udakāsiñcanatthāya adāsi, kuṭumbiyakulāni bodhissa kattabbapūjopakaraṇagopanatthāya adāsi. ‘‘Gopakā rājakammino tathā taracchā’’ti ^b^mahāgaṇṭhipade^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Gaṇṭhipade^eb^ pana ‘‘gopakakulāni bodhisiñcanatthaṃ khīradhenupālanatthāya taracchakulāni kāliṅgakulāni vissāsikāni padhānamanussakulānī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Kāliṅgakulānī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘udakādigāhakā kāliṅgā’’ti ^b^mahāgaṇṭhipade^eb^ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Kaliṅgesu janapade jātisampannakulaṃ kāliṅgakula’’nti keci. ^b^Iminā parivārenā^eb^ti sahatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, iminā vuttappakāraparivārena saddhinti attho. ^b^Viñjhāṭaviṃ samatikkammā^eb^ti rājā sayampi mahābodhissa paccuggamanaṃ karonto senaṅgaparivuto thalapathena gacchanto viñjhāṭaviṃ nāma aṭaviṃ atikkamitvā. ^b^Tāmalittiṃ anuppatto^eb^ti tāmalittiṃ nāma titthaṃ sampatto. ^b^Idamassa tatiya^eb^nti suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitamahābodhissa rajjasampadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tato pubbe panesa ekavāraṃ saddhāya sakalajambudīparajjena mahābodhiṃ pūjesiyeva, tasmā tena saddhiṃ catutthamidaṃ rajjasampadānaṃ. Mahābodhiṃ pana yasmiṃ yasmiṃ divase rajjena pūjesi, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ divase sakalajambudīparajjato uppannaṃ āyaṃ gahetvā mahābodhipūjaṃ kāresi.

[03]^b^Māgasiramāsassā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0163^ea^ migasiramāsassa. ^b^Paṭhamapāṭipadadivase^eb^ti sukkapakkhapāṭipadadivase. Tañhi kaṇhapakkhapāṭipadadivasaṃ apekkhitvā ‘‘paṭhamapāṭipadadivasa’’nti vuccati. Idañca imasmiṃ dīpe pavattamānavohāraṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Tattha pana puṇṇamito paṭṭhāya yāva aparā puṇṇamī, tāva eko māsoti vohārassa pavattattā tena vohārena ‘‘dutiyapāṭipadadivase’’ti vattabbaṃ siyā. Tattha hi kaṇhapakkhapāṭipadadivasaṃ ‘‘paṭhamapāṭipada’’nti vuccati. ^b^Ukkhipitvā^eb^ti mahāsālamūle dinnehi soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi saddhiṃ ukkhipitvāti vadanti. ^b^Gacchati vatare^eb^ti ettha ^b^are^eb^ti khede. Tenevāha ‘‘kanditvā’’ti, bodhiyā adassanaṃ asahamāno roditvā paridevitvāti attho. ^b^Sarasaraṃsijāla^eb^nti ettha pana heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. ^b^Mahābodhisamāruḷhā^eb^ti mahābodhinā samāruḷhā. ^b^Passato passato^eb^ti anādare sāmivacanaṃ, passantassevāti attho ^a^M1.0184^ea^. ^b^Mahāsamuddatalaṃ pakkhantā^eb^ti mahāsamuddassa udakatalaṃ pakkhandi. ^b^Samantā yojana^eb^nti samantato ekekena passena yojanappamāṇe padese. Accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^Vīciyo vūpasantā^eb^ti vīciyo na uṭṭhahiṃsu, nāhesunti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Pavajjiṃsū^eb^ti viraviṃsu, nādaṃ pavattayiṃsūti attho. ^b^Rukkhādisannissitāhī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena pabbatādisannissitā devatā saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Supaṇṇarūpenā^eb^ti supaṇṇasadisena rūpena. ^b^Nāgakulāni santāsesī^eb^ti mahābodhiggahaṇatthaṃ āgatāni nāgakulāni santāsesi, tesaṃ bhayaṃ uppādetvā palāpesīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tadā hi samuddavāsino nāgā mahābodhiṃ gahetuṃ vātavassandhakārādīhi mahantaṃ vikubbanaṃ akaṃsu. Tato saṅghamittattherī garuḷavaṇṇaṃ māpetvā tena garuḷarūpena ākāsaṃ pūrayamānā sikhāmarīcijālena gaganaṃ ekandhakāraṃ katvā pakkhappahāravātena mahāsamuddaṃ āloḷetvā saṃvaṭṭajaladhinādasadisena ravena nāgānaṃ hadayāni bhindantī viya tāsetvā nāge palāpesi. ^b^Te ca utrastarūpā nāgā āgantvā^eb^ti te ca vuttanayena uttāsitā nāgā puna āgantvā. ^b^Taṃ vibhūti^eb^nti taṃ iddhipāṭihāriyasaṅkhātaṃ vibhūtiṃ, taṃ acchariyanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Therī yācitvā^eb^ti ‘‘ayye, amhākaṃ bhagavā mucalindanāgarājassa bhogāvaliṃ attano gandhakuṭiṃ katvā sattāhaṃ tassa saṅgahaṃ akāsi. Abhisambujjhanadivase nerañjarānadītīre attano ucchiṭṭhapattaṃ mahākāḷanāgassa vissajjesi. Uruvelanāgena māpitaṃ visadhūmadahanaṃ agaṇetvā tassa saraṇasīlābharaṇamadāsi. Mahāmoggallānattheraṃ pesetvā nandopanandanāgarājānaṃ dametvā nibbisaṃ akāsi. Evaṃ so lokanāyako amhākaṃ upakārako, tvampi no dosamassaritvā muhuttaṃ mahābodhiṃ vissajjetvā nāgalokassa saggamokkhamaggaṃ sampādehī’’ti evaṃ yācitvā. ^b^Mahābodhiviyogadukkhito^eb^ti mahābodhiviyogena ^a^V1.0164^ea^ dukkhito sañjātamānasikadukkho. ^b^Kanditvā^eb^ti imassa pariyāyavacanamattaṃ ^b^roditvā^eb^ti, guṇakittanavasena vā punappunaṃ roditvā, vilāpaṃ katvāti attho.

[03]^b^Uttaradvārato^eb^ti anurādhapurassa uttaradvārato. ^b^Maggaṃ sodhāpetvā^eb^ti khāṇukaṇṭakādīnaṃ uddharāpanavasena maggaṃ sodhāpetvā. ^b^Alaṅkārāpetvā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0185^ea^ vālukādīnaṃ okirāpanādivasena sajjetvā. ^b^Samuddasālavatthusmi^eb^nti samuddāsannasālāya vatthubhūte padese. Tasmiṃ kira padese ṭhitehi samuddassa diṭṭhattā taṃ acchariyaṃ pakāsetuṃ tattha ekā sālā katā. Sā nāmena ‘‘samuddāsannasālā’’ti pākaṭā jātā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Samuddāsannasālāya, ṭhāne ṭhatvā mahaṇṇave;
[22]Āgacchantaṃ mahābodhiṃ, mahātheriddhiyāddasa.
[21]‘‘Tasmiṃ ṭhāne katā sālā, pakāsetuṃ tamabbhutaṃ;
[22]‘Samuddāsannasālā’ti, nāmenāsidha pākaṭā’’ti.

[03]^b^Tāya vibhūtiyā^eb^ti tāya vuttappakārāya pūjāsakkārādisampattiyā. ^b^Therassā^eb^ti mahāmahindattherassa. Maggassa kira ubhosu passesu antarantarā pupphehi kūṭāgārasadisasaṇṭhānāni pupphacetiyāni kārāpesi. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘antarantare pupphaagghiyāni ṭhapento’’^eb^ti. ^b^Āgato vatare^eb^ti ettha ^b^are^eb^ti pasaṃsāyaṃ, sādhu vatāti attho. ^b^Soḷasahi jātisampannakulehī^eb^ti aṭṭhahi amaccakulehi aṭṭhahi ca brāhmaṇakulehīti evaṃ soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi. ^b^Samuddatīre mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvā^eb^ti samuddavelātale alaṅkatappaṭiyatte ramaṇīye maṇḍape mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvā. Evaṃ pana katvā sakalatambapaṇṇirajjena mahābodhiṃ pūjetvā soḷasannaṃ kulānaṃ rajjaṃ niyyātetvā sayaṃ dovārikaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā tayo divase anekappakāraṃ pūjaṃ kārāpesi. Taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tīṇi divasānī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Rajjaṃ vicāresī^eb^ti rajjaṃ vicāretuṃ vissajjesi, soḷasahi vā jātisampannakulehi rajjaṃ vicārāpesīti attho. ^b^Catutthe divase^eb^ti migasiramāsassa sukkapakkhadasamiyaṃ. ^b^Anupubbena anurādhapuraṃ sampatto^eb^ti dasamiyaṃ alaṅkatappaṭiyattarathe mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvā uḷārapūjaṃ kurumāno pācīnapassavihārassa patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhānamānetvā tattha saṅghassa pātarāsaṃ pavattetvā mahindattherena bhāsitaṃ nāgadīpe dasabalena kataṃ nāgadamanaṃ sutvā ‘‘sammāsambuddhena nisajjādinā paribhuttaṭṭhānesu thūpādīhi sakkāraṃ karissāmī’’ti saññāṇaṃ kāretvā tato āharitvā tavakkabrāhmaṇassa ^a^V1.0165^ea^ gāmadvāre ṭhapetvā pūjetvā evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne pūjaṃ katvā iminā anukkamena anurādhapuraṃ ^a^M1.0186^ea^ sampatto. ^b^Cātuddasīdivase^eb^ti migasiramāsasseva sukkapakkhacātuddase. ^b^Vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāyā^eb^ti chāyāya vaḍḍhamānasamaye, sāyanhasamayeti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Samāpatti^eb^nti phalasamāpattiṃ. ^b^Tilakabhūte^eb^ti alaṅkārabhūte. ^b^Rājavatthudvārakoṭṭhakaṭṭhāne^eb^ti rājuyyānassa dvārakoṭṭhakaṭṭhāne. ‘‘Sakalarajjaṃ mahābodhissa dinnapubbattā upacāratthaṃ rājā dovārikavesaṃ gaṇhī’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^Anupubbavipassana^eb^nti udayabbayādianupubbavipassanaṃ. ^b^Paṭṭhapetvā^eb^ti ārabhitvā. ^b^Atthaṅgamite^eb^ti atthaṅgate. ‘‘Saha bodhipatiṭṭhānenā’’ti vattabbe vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘saha bodhipatiṭṭhānā’’^eb^ti nissakkavacanaṃ kataṃ. Sati hi sahayoge karaṇavacanena bhavitabbaṃ. ^b^Mahāpathavī akampī^eb^ti ca idaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ, aññānipi anekāni acchariyāni ahesuṃyeva. Tathā hi saha bodhipatiṭṭhānena udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī akampi, tāni mūlāni kaṭāhamukhavaṭṭito uggantvā taṃ kaṭāhaṃ vinandhantā pathavītalamotariṃsu, samantato dibbakusumāni vassiṃsu, ākāse dibbatūriyāni vajjiṃsu, mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā vuṭṭhidhāramakāsi, ākāsapadesā viraviṃsu, vijjulatā nicchariṃsu. Devatā sādhukāramadaṃsu, samāgatā sakaladīpavāsino gandhamālādīhi pūjayiṃsu, gahitamakarandā mandamārutā vāyiṃsu, samantato ghanasītalahimavalāhakā mahābodhiṃ chādayiṃsu. Evaṃ bodhi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā himagabbhe sannisīditvā sattāhaṃ lokassa adassanaṃ agamāsi. ^b^Himagabbhe sannisīdī^eb^ti himagabbhassa anto aṭṭhāsi. ^b^Vipphurantā^eb^ti vipphurantā ito cito ca saṃsarantā. ^b^Nicchariṃsū^eb^ti nikkhamiṃsu. ^b^Dassiṃsū^eb^ti paññāyiṃsu. ^b^Sabbe dīpavāsino^eb^ti sabbe tambapaṇṇidīpavāsino. ^b^Uttarasākhato ekaṃ phala^eb^nti uttarasākhāya ṭhitaṃ ekaṃ phalaṃ. ‘‘Pācīnasākhāya ekaṃ phala’’ntipi keci. ^b^Mahāāsanaṭṭhāne^eb^ti pubbapasse mahāsilāsanena patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāne. ^b^Issaranimmānavihāre^eb^ti issaranimmānasaṅkhāte kassapagirivihāre. ‘‘Issaranimmānavihāre’’ti hi pubbasaṅketavasena vuttaṃ, idāni pana so vihāro ‘‘kassapagirī’’ti paññāto. ‘‘Issarasamaṇārāme’’tipi keci paṭhanti. Tathā ca vuttaṃ –
[21]‘‘Tavakkabrāhmaṇagāme ^a^M1.0187^ea^, thūpārāme tatheva ca;
[22]Issarasamaṇārāme, paṭhame cetiyaṅgaṇe’’ti.

[03]^b^Yojaniyaārāmesū^eb^ti anurādhapurassa samantā yojanassa anto kataārāmesu. Samantā patiṭṭhite ^a^V1.0166^ea^ mahābodhimhīti sambandho. Anurādhapurassa samantā evaṃ puttanattuparamparāya mahābodhimhi patiṭṭhiteti attho. ^b^Lohapāsādaṭṭhānaṃ pūjesī^eb^ti lohapāsādassa kattabbaṭṭhānaṃ pūjesi. ‘‘Kiñcāpi lohapāsādaṃ devānaṃpiyatissoyeva mahārājā kāressati, tathāpi tasmiṃ samaye abhāvato ‘anāgate’ti vutta’’nti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayeneva kārito lohapāsādo’’ti vadanti. ^b^Mūlāni panassa na tāva otarantī^eb^ti iminā, mahārāja, imasmiṃ dīpe satthusāsanaṃ patiṭṭhitamattameva ahosi, na tāva supatiṭṭhitanti dasseti, assa satthusāsanassa mūlāni pana na tāva otiṇṇānīti evamettha attho veditabbo. ^b^Otarantī^eb^ti hi atītatthe vattamānavacanaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘kadā pana bhante mūlāni otiṇṇāni nāma bhavissantī’’^eb^ti. Yo amacco catupaṇṇāsāya jeṭṭhakakaniṭṭhabhātukehi saddhiṃ cetiyagirimhi pabbajito, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mahāariṭṭho bhikkhū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Meghavaṇṇābhayassa amaccassa pariveṇaṭṭhāne^eb^ti meghavaṇṇābhayassa rañño amaccena kattabbassa pariveṇassa vatthubhūte ṭhāne. ^b^Maṇḍapappakāra^eb^nti maṇḍapasadisaṃ. Sadisatthampi hi pakārasaddaṃ vaṇṇayanti. ^b^Sāsanassa mūlāni otarantāni passissāmī^eb^ti iminā sāsanassa suṭṭhu patiṭṭhānākāraṃ passissāmīti dīpeti.

[03]Meghavirahitassa nimmalasseva ākāsassa viravitattā ^b^‘‘ākāsaṃ mahāviravaṃ ravī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Paccekagaṇīhī^eb^ti visuṃ visuṃ gaṇācariyehi. Paccekaṃ gaṇaṃ etesaṃ atthīti paccekagaṇino. Yathā vejjo gilānesu karuṇāya tikicchanameva purakkhatvā vigatacchandadoso jigucchanīyesu vaṇesu guyhaṭṭhānesu ca bhesajjalepanādinā tikicchanameva karoti, evaṃ bhagavāpi kilesabyādhipīḷitesu sattesu karuṇāya te satte kilesabyādhidukkhato mocetukāmo avattabbārahāni guyhaṭṭhānanissitānipi asappāyāni vadanto vinayapaññattiyā sattānaṃ kilesabyādhiṃ ^a^M1.0188^ea^ tikicchati. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘satthu karuṇāguṇaparidīpaka’’^eb^nti. ^b^Anusiṭṭhikarāna^eb^nti anusāsanīkarānaṃ, ye bhagavato anusāsaniṃ sammā paṭipajjanti, tesanti attho. ^b^Kāyakammavacīkammavipphanditavinayana^eb^nti kāyavacīdvāresu ajjhācāravasena pavattassa kilesavipphanditassa vinayanakaraṃ.

[03]^b^Rājino^eb^ti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ, rājānamanusāsiṃsūti attho. ^b^Āloka^eb^nti ñāṇālokaṃ. ^b^Nibbāyiṃsu mahesayo^eb^ti ettha mahāmahindatthero dvādasavassiko hutvā tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ sampatto, tattha dve vassāni vasitvā vinayaṃ patiṭṭhapesi. Dvāsaṭṭhivassiko hutvā parinibbutoti vadanti.

[03]^b^Tesaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0167^ea^^b^therānaṃ antevāsikā^eb^ti tesaṃ mahāmahindattherappamukhānaṃ therānaṃ antevāsikā. Tissadattādayo pana mahāariṭṭhattherassa antevāsikā, tasmā tissadattakāḷasumanadīghasumanādayo mahāariṭṭhattherassa antevāsikā cāti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Antevāsikānaṃ antevāsikā^eb^ti ubhayathā vuttaantevāsikānaṃ antevāsikā. ^b^Pubbe vuttappakārā^eb^ti –
[21]‘‘Tato mahindo iṭṭiyo, uttiyo sambalo tathā;
[22]Bhaddanāmo ca paṇḍito.
[21]‘‘Ete nāgā mahāpaññā, jambudīpā idhāgatā;
[22]Vinayaṃ te vācayiṃsu, piṭakaṃ tambapaṇṇiyā.
[21]‘‘Nikāye pañca vācesuṃ, satta ceva pakaraṇe;
[22]Tato ariṭṭho medhāvī, tissadatto ca paṇḍito.
[22]‘‘Visārado kāḷasumano, thero ca dīghanāmako’’ti. –
[07]Evamādinā pubbe vuttappakārā ācariyaparamparā.
[06]Ācariyaparamparakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Ettāvatā ^a^M1.0189^ea^ ca ‘‘kenābhata’’nti imaṃ pañhaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā idāni ‘‘kattha patiṭṭhita’’nti imaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento āha ^b^‘‘kattha patiṭṭhita’’^eb^ntiādi. Tattha ^b^telamivā^eb^ti sīhatelamiva. ^b^Adhimattasatigatidhītimantesū^eb^ti ettha ^b^satī^eb^ti buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā dhāraṇakasati. ^b^Gatī^eb^ti uggaṇhanakagati. ^b^Dhītī^eb^ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā gaṇhanakañāṇaṃ. ^b^Gatī^eb^ti vā paññāgati. ^b^Dhītī^eb^ti buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhanavīriyaṃ sajjhāyanavīriyaṃ dhāraṇavīriyañca. ^b^Lajjīsū^eb^ti pāpajigucchanakalakkhaṇāya lajjāya samannāgatesu. ^b^Kukkuccakesū^eb^ti aṇumattesupi vajjesu dosadassāvitāya ^a^V1.0168^ea^ kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkuccakārīsu. ^b^Sikkhākāmesū^eb^ti adhisīlaaacittaadhipaññāvasena tisso sikkhā kāmayamānesu sampiyāyitvā sikkhantesu.

[03]Akattabbato nivāretvā kattabbesu patiṭṭhāpanato ^b^mātāpituṭṭhāniyo^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ācāragocarakusalatā^eb^ti veḷudānādimicchājīvassa kāyapāgabbhiyādīnañca akaraṇena sabbaso anācāraṃ vajjetvā ‘‘kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo’’ti (vibha. 511) evaṃ vuttabhikkhusāruppaācārasampattiyā vesiyādiagocaraṃ vajjetvā piṇḍapātādiatthaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhānasaṅkhātagocarena ca sampannattā samaṇācāresu ceva samaṇagocaresu ca kusalatā. Apica yo bhikkhu satthari sagāravo sappatisso sabrahmacārīsu sagāravo sappatisso hirottappasampanno sunivattho supāruto pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyamanuyutto satisampajaññena samannāgato appiccho santuṭṭho āraddhavīriyo pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo viharati, ayaṃ vuccati ^b^ācāro^eb^.

[03]^b^Gocaro^eb^ pana upanissayagocaro ārakkhagocaro upanibandhagocaroti tividho. Tattha dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato kalyāṇamitto, yaṃ nissāya assutaṃ suṇāti, sutaṃ pariyodāpeti, kaṅkhaṃ vitarati ^a^M1.0190^ea^, diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karoti, cittaṃ pasādeti, yassa vā pana anusikkhamāno saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena, sutena, cāgena, paññāya vaḍḍhati, ayaṃ ^b^upanissayagocaro^eb^. Yo pana bhikkhu antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho vīthipaṭipanno okkhittacakkhu yugamattadassāvī saṃvuto gacchati, na hatthiṃ olokento, na assaṃ, na rathaṃ, na pattiṃ, na itthiṃ, na purisaṃ olokento, na uddhaṃ olokento, na adho olokento, na disāvidisampi pekkhamāno gacchati, ayaṃ ^b^ārakkhagocaro^eb^. Upanibandhagocaro pana cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, yattha bhikkhu attano cittaṃ upanibandhati. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – ‘‘ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo, yadidaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’ti. Ayaṃ ^b^upanibandhagocaro^eb^. Iti iminā ca ācārena iminā ca gocarena samannāgatattā ācāragocarakusalatā. Evaṃ anācāraṃ agocarañca vajjetvā saddhāpabbajitānaṃ yathāvuttaācāragocaresu kusalabhāvo vinayadharāyattoti ayamānisaṃso vinayapariyattiyā dassitoti veditabbo.

[03]^b^Vinayapariyattiṃ nissāyā^eb^ti vinayapariyāpuṇanaṃ nissāya. ^b^Attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti^eb^^a^V1.0169^ea^^b^surakkhito^eb^ti kathamassa attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito? Āpattiñhi āpajjanto chahākārehi āpajjati alajjitā, aññāṇatā, kukkuccapakatatā, akappiye kappiyasaññitā, kappiye akappiyasaññitā, satisammosāti. Vinayadharo pana imehi chahākārehi āpattiṃ nāpajjati.

[03]Kathaṃ ^b^alajjitāya^eb^ nāpajjati? So hi ‘‘passatha bho, ayaṃ kappiyākappiyaṃ jānantoyeva paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ karotī’’ti imaṃ parūpavādaṃ rakkhantopi akappiyabhāvaṃ jānantoyeva madditvā vītikkamaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ alajjitāya nāpajjati. Sahasā āpannampi desanāgāminiṃ desetvā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vuṭṭhahitvā suddhante patiṭṭhāti, tato –
[21]‘‘Sañcicca āpattiṃ nāpajjati, āpattiṃ na parigūhati;
[22]Agatigamanañca na gacchati, ediso vuccati lajjipuggalo’’ti. (pari. 359) –
[07]Imasmiṃ lajjibhāve patiṭṭhitova hoti.
[03]Kathaṃ ^a^M1.0191^ea^^b^aññāṇatāya^eb^ nāpajjati? So hi kappiyākappiyaṃ jānāti, tasmā kappiyaṃyeva karoti, akappiyaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ aññāṇatāya nāpajjati.

[03]Kathaṃ ^b^kukkuccapakatatāya^eb^ nāpajjati? Kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkucce uppanne vatthuṃ oloketvā mātikaṃ padabhājanaṃ antarāpattiṃ anāpattiṃ oloketvā kappiyaṃ ce hoti, karoti, akappiyaṃ ce, na karoti. Uppannaṃ pana kukkuccaṃ avinicchinitvāva ‘‘vaṭṭatī’’ti madditvā na vītikkamati. Evaṃ kukkuccapakatatāya nāpajjati.

[03]Kathaṃ ^b^akappiye kappiyasaññitā^eb^dīhi nāpajjati? So hi kappiyākappiyaṃ jānāti, tasmā akappiye kappiyasaññī na hoti, kappiye akappiyasaññī na hoti, supatiṭṭhitā cassa sati hoti, adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vikappetabbaṃ vikappeti. Iti imehi chahākārehi āpattiṃ nāpajjati, āpattiṃ anāpajjanto akhaṇḍasīlo hoti parisuddhasīlo. Evamassa attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito.

[03]^b^Kukkuccapakatāna^eb^nti ^a^V1.0170^ea^ kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya uppannena kukkuccena abhibhūtānaṃ. Kathaṃ pana kukkuccapakatānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti? Tiroraṭṭhesu tirojanapadesu ca uppannakukkuccā bhikkhū ‘‘asukasmiṃ kira vihāre vinayadharo vasatī’’ti dūratopi tassa santikaṃ āgantvā kukkuccaṃ pucchanti. So tehi katakammassa vatthuṃ oloketvā āpattānāpattiṃ garukalahukādibhedaṃ sallakkhetvā desanāgāminiṃ desāpetvā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vuṭṭhāpetvā suddhante patiṭṭhāpeti. Evaṃ kukkuccapakatānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Visārado saṅghamajjhe voharatī^eb^ti vigato sārado bhayaṃ etassāti visārado, abhītoti attho. Avinayadharassa hi saṅghamajjhe kathentassa bhayaṃ sārajjaṃ okkamati, vinayadharassa taṃ na hoti. Kasmā? ‘‘Evaṃ kathentassa doso hoti, evaṃ na doso’’ti ñatvā kathanato.

[03]^b^Paccatthike^eb^^a^M1.0192^ea^^b^sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhātī^eb^ti ettha dvidhā paccatthikā nāma attapaccatthikā ca sāsanapaccatthikā ca. Tattha mettiyabhummajakā ca bhikkhū vaḍḍho ca licchavī amūlakena antimavatthunā codesuṃ, ime ^b^attapaccatthikā^eb^ nāma. Ye vā panaññepi dussīlā pāpadhammā, sabbe te attapaccatthikā. Viparītadassanā pana ariṭṭhabhikkhukaṇṭakasāmaṇeravesālikavajjiputtakā mahāsaṅghikādayo ca abuddhasāsanaṃ ‘‘buddhasāsana’’nti vatvā katapaggahā ^b^sāsanapaccatthikā^eb^ nāma. Te sabbepi sahadhammena sahakāraṇena vacanena yathā taṃ asaddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkonti, evaṃ suniggahitaṃ katvā niggaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotī^eb^ti ettha pana tividho saddhammo pariyattipaṭipattiadhigamavasena. Tattha tipiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ ^b^pariyattisaddhammo^eb^ nāma. Terasa dhutaṅgaguṇā cuddasa khandhakavattāni dveasīti mahāvattānīti ayaṃ ^b^paṭipattisaddhammo^eb^ nāma. Cattāro maggā ca cattāri phalāni ca, ayaṃ ^b^adhigamasaddhammo^eb^ nāma. Tattha keci therā ‘‘yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā’’ti (dī. ni. 2.216) iminā suttena ‘‘sāsanassa pariyatti mūla’’nti vadanti. Keci therā ‘‘ime ca, subhadda, bhikkhū sammā vihareyyuṃ, asuñño loko arahantehi assā’’ti iminā suttena (dī. ni. 2.214) ‘‘sāsanassa paṭipatti mūla’’nti vatvā ‘‘yāva pañca bhikkhū sammā paṭipannā saṃvijjanti, tāva sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hotī’’ti āhaṃsu. Itare pana therā ‘‘pariyattiyā antarahitāya suppaṭipannassapi dhammābhisamayo natthī’’ti vatvā āhaṃsu. Sacepi pañca bhikkhū cattāri pārājikāni rakkhaṇakā honti, te saddhe kulaputte pabbājetvā paccantime janapade upasampādetvā ^a^V1.0171^ea^ dasavaggagaṇaṃ pūretvā majjhimajanapadepi upasampadaṃ karissanti. Etenupāyena vīsativaggasaṅghaṃ pūretvā attanopi abbhānakammaṃ katvā sāsanaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ viruḷhiṃ gamayissanti. Evamayaṃ vinayadharo tividhassapi saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotīti. Evamayaṃ vinayadharo ime pañcānisaṃse paṭilabhatīti veditabbo.

[03]^b^Vinayo saṃvaratthāyā^eb^tiādīsu (pari. aṭṭha. 366) ^b^vinayo^eb^ti vinayassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ, ^b^vinayo^eb^ti vā vinayapaññatti vuttā, tasmā sakalāpi vinayapaññatti vinayapariyāpuṇanaṃ ^a^M1.0193^ea^ vā kāyavacīdvārasaṃvaratthāyāti attho, ājīvapārisuddhipariyosānassa sīlassa upanissayapaccayo hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Avippaṭisāro^eb^ti pāpapuññānaṃ katākatānusocanavasena pavattacittavippaṭisārābhāvo. ^b^Pāmojja^eb^nti dubbalā taruṇapīti. ^b^Pītī^eb^ti balavapīti. ^b^Passaddhī^eb^ti kāyacittadarathapaṭippassaddhi. ^b^Sukha^eb^nti kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ. Tañhi duvidhampi samādhissa upanissayapaccayo hoti. ^b^Samādhī^eb^ti cittekaggatā. ^b^Yathābhūtañāṇadassana^eb^nti sappaccayanāmarūpapariggaho. ^b^Nibbidā^eb^ti vipassanā. Atha vā yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ taruṇavipassanā, udayabbayañāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Cittekaggatā hi taruṇavipassanāya upanissayapaccayo hoti. ^b^Nibbidā^eb^ti sikhāppattā vuṭṭhānagāminibalavavipassanā. ^b^Virāgo^eb^ti ariyamaggo. ^b^Vimuttī^eb^ti arahattaphalaṃ. Catubbidhopi hi ariyamaggo arahattassa upanissayapaccayo hoti. ^b^Vimuttiñāṇadassana^eb^nti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. ^b^Anupādāparinibbānatthāyā^eb^ti kañci dhammaṃ aggahetvā anavasesetvā parinibbānatthāya, appaccayaparinibbānatthāyāti attho. Appaccayaparinibbānassa hi vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ paccayo hoti tasmiṃ anuppatte avassaṃ parinibbāyitabbato, na ca paccavekkhaṇañāṇe anuppanne antarā parinibbānaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Etadatthā kathā^eb^ti ayaṃ vinayakathā nāma etadatthāya, anupādāparinibbānatthāyāti attho. Evaṃ sabbatthapi. ^b^Mantanā^eb^pi vinayamantanāeva, ‘‘evaṃ karissāma, na karissāmā’’ti vinayapaṭibaddhasaṃsandanā. ^b^Etadatthā upanisā^eb^ti upanisīdati ettha phalaṃ tappaṭibaddhavuttitāyāti upanisā vuccati kāraṇaṃ paccayoti. ‘‘Vinayo saṃvaratthāyā’’tiādikā kāraṇaparamparā etadatthāti attho. ^b^Etadatthaṃ sotāvadhāna^eb^nti imissā paramparapaccayakathāya sotāvadhānaṃ imaṃ kathaṃ sutvā yaṃ uppajjati ñāṇaṃ, tampi etadatthaṃ. ^b^Yadidaṃ anupādācittassa vimokkho^eb^ti ^b^yadida^eb^nti nipāto. Sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanesu tādisova tattha tattha atthato pariṇāmetabbo, tasmā evamettha attho veditabbo – yo ayaṃ catūhi upādānehi anupādiyitvā cittassa arahattaphalasaṅkhāto vimokkho, sopi etadatthāya anupādāparinibbānatthāyāti evamettha sambandho veditabbo. Yo ayaṃ ^a^V1.0172^ea^ anupādācittassa vimokkhasaṅkhāto maggo, heṭṭhā vuttaṃ sabbampi etadatthamevāti. Evañca sati iminā mahussāhato sādhitabbaṃ ^a^M1.0194^ea^ niyatappayojanaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. Heṭṭhā ‘‘virāgo…pe… nibbānatthāyā’’ti iminā pana labbhamānānisaṃsaphalaṃ dassitanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Āyogo^eb^ti uggahaṇacintanādivasena punappunaṃ abhiyogo.
[06]Vinayānisaṃsakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Iti samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
[06]Bāhiranidānavaṇṇanā samattā.

[03]^b^.^eb^^b^Seyyathida^eb^nti ^a^M1.0195^ea^^a^V1.0173^ea^ taṃ katamaṃ, taṃ kathanti vā attho. ^b^Aniyamaniddesavacana^eb^nti natthi etassa niyamoti aniyamo, niddisīyati attho etenāti niddeso, vuccati etenāti vacanaṃ, niddesoyeva vacanaṃ niddesavacanaṃ, aniyamassa niddesavacanaṃ aniyamaniddesavacanaṃ, paṭhamaṃ aniyamitassa samayassa niddesavacananti attho. ‘‘Yenāti avatvā tenāti vuttattā aniyamaṃ katvā niddiṭṭhavacanaṃ aniyamaniddesavacana’’ntipi vadanti. Yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ niccasambandhabhāvato āha ^b^‘‘tassa sarūpena avuttenapī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^tassā^eb^ti ‘‘tenā’’ti etassa. ^b^Sarūpena avuttenapī^eb^ti ‘‘yenā’’ti evaṃ sarūpato pāḷiyaṃ avuttenapi. ^b^Atthato siddhenā^eb^ti parabhāge sāriputtattherassa uppajjanakaparivitakkasaṅkhātaatthato siddhena. Parivitakke hi siddhe yena samayena parivitakko udapādīti idaṃ atthato siddhameva hoti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘aparabhāge hi vinayapaññattiyācanahetubhūto āyasmato sāriputtassa parivitakko siddho’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Tenā’’ti vatvā tato tadatthameva ‘‘yenā’’ti atthato vuccamānattā ‘‘yenā’’ti ayaṃ ‘‘tenā’’ti etassa paṭiniddeso nāma jāto. ^b^Paṭiniddeso^eb^ti ca vitthāraniddesoti attho.

[03]^b^Aparabhāge hī^eb^ti ettha ^b^hi^eb^-saddo hetumhi, yasmāti attho. ^b^Vinayapaññattiyācanahetubhūto^eb^ti ‘‘etassa bhagavā kālo, etassa sugata kālo, yaṃ bhagavā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyya, uddiseyya pātimokkhaṃ. Yathayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitika’’nti evaṃ pavattassa vinayapaññattiyācanassa kāraṇabhūtoti attho. ^b^Parivitakko^eb^ti ‘‘katamesānaṃ kho buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosi, katamesānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī’’ti evaṃ pavatto parivitakko. Yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ niccasambandhoti āha ^b^‘‘tasmā yena samayenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pubbe vā pacchā vā atthato siddhenā^eb^ti pubbe vā pacchā vā uppannaatthato siddhena. ^b^Paṭiniddeso kattabbo^eb^ti etassa ‘‘yadida’’nti iminā sambandho. ‘‘Paṭiniddeso kattabbo’’ti yadidaṃ yaṃ idaṃ vidhānaṃ, ayaṃ sabbasmiṃ vinaye yuttīti attho. Atha ^a^V1.0174^ea^ vā ‘‘paṭiniddeso kattabbo’’ti yadidaṃ yā ayaṃ yutti, ayaṃ sabbasmiṃ vinaye yuttīti attho.

[03]^b^Tatridaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0196^ea^^b^mukhamattanidassana^eb^nti tassā yathāvuttayuttiyā paridīpane idaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ, upāyamattanidassananti attho. Mukhaṃ dvāraṃ upāyoti hi atthato ekaṃ. ^b^‘‘Tena hi bhikkhave bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmī’’^eb^ti pāḷiṃ dassetvā tattha paṭiniddesamāha ^b^‘‘yena sudinno’’^eb^tiādinā. Tenāti hetuatthe karaṇavacanattā tassa paṭiniddesopi tādisoyevāti āha ^b^‘‘yasmā paṭisevī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pubbe atthato siddhenā^eb^ti pubbe uppannamethunadhammapaṭisevanasaṅkhātaatthato siddhena. ^b^Pacchā atthato siddhenā^eb^ti raññā adinnaṃ dārūnaṃ ādiyanasaṅkhātapacchāuppannaatthato siddhena. ^b^Samayasaddo^eb^ti etassa ‘‘dissatī’’ti iminā sambandho.

[03]^b^Samavāye^eb^ti paccayasāmaggiyaṃ, kāraṇasamavāyeti attho. ^b^Khaṇe^eb^ti okāse. ^b^Assā^eb^ti assa samayasaddassa samavāyo atthoti sambandho. ^b^Appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā^eb^ti ettha ^b^kālo^eb^ nāma upasaṅkamanassa yuttapayuttakālo. ^b^Samayo^eb^ nāma tasseva paccayasāmaggī, atthato tadanurūpaṃ sarīrabalañceva tappaccayaparissayābhāvo ca. ^b^Upādānaṃ^eb^ nāma ñāṇena tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ sallakkhaṇaṃ, tasmā kālañca samayañca paññāya gahetvā upadhāretvāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sace amhākaṃ sve gamanassa yuttakālo bhavissati, kāye balamattā ceva pharissati, gamanapaccayā ca añño aphāsuvihāro na bhavissati, athetaṃ kālañca gamanakāraṇasamavāyasaṅkhātaṃ samayañca upadhāretvā api eva nāma sve āgaccheyyāmāti.

[03]^b^Khaṇo^eb^ti okāso. Tathāgatuppādādiko hi maggabrahmacariyassa okāso tappaccayapaṭilābhahetuttā, khaṇo eva ca samayo. Yo khaṇoti ca samayoti ca vuccati, so ekovāti hi attho. ^b^Mahāsamayo^eb^ti mahāsamūho. Pavuddhaṃ vanaṃ ^b^pavanaṃ,^eb^ tasmiṃ pavanasmiṃ, vanasaṇḍeti attho. ^b^Samayopi kho te bhaddāli appaṭividdho ahosī^eb^ti ettha ^b^samayo^eb^ti sikkhāpadapūraṇassa hetu. ^b^Bhaddālī^eb^ti tassa bhikkhuno nāmaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – bhaddāli tayā paṭivijjhitabbayuttakaṃ etaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthi, tampi te na paṭividdhaṃ na sallakkhitanti. Kiṃ taṃ kāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘bhagavā kho’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Uggāhamāno^eb^^a^M1.0197^ea^ tiādīsu ^b^māno^eb^ti tassa paribbājakassa pakatināmaṃ, kiñci kiñci pana uggahetuṃ samatthatāya ‘‘uggāhamāno’’ti naṃ sañjānanti, tasmā ‘‘uggāhamāno’’ti vuccati ^a^V1.0175^ea^. Samaṇamuṇḍikāya putto ^b^samaṇamuṇḍikāputto^eb^. So kira devadattassa upaṭṭhāko. Samayaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pavadanti etthāti ^b^samayappavādako,^eb^ tasmiṃ samayappavādake, diṭṭhippavādaketi attho. Tasmiṃ kira ṭhāne caṅkītārukkhapokkharasātipabhutayo brāhmaṇā nigaṇṭhācelakaparibbājakādayo ca paribbājakā sannipatitvā attano attano samayaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pavadanti kathenti dīpenti, tasmā so ārāmo ‘‘samayappavādako’’ti vuccati, sveva tindukācīrasaṅkhātāya timbarurukkhapantiyā parikkhittattā ^b^‘‘tindukācīra’’^eb^nti vuccati. Ekā sālā etthāti ^b^ekasālako^eb^. Yasmā panettha paṭhamaṃ ekā sālā katā ahosi, pacchā mahāpuññaṃ poṭṭhapādaparibbājakaṃ nissāya bahū sālā katā, tasmā tameva ekaṃ sālamupādāya laddhanāmavasena ‘‘ekasālako’’ti vuccati. Mallikāya pana pasenadirañño deviyā uyyānabhūto so pupphaphalasañchanno ārāmoti katvā ^b^‘‘mallikāya ārāmo’’^eb^ti saṅkhyaṃ gato. Tasmiṃ samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme. ^b^Paṭivasatī^eb^ti tasmiṃ vāsaphāsutāya vasati.

[03]^b^Diṭṭhe dhamme^eb^ti paccakkhe attabhāve. ^b^Attho^eb^ti vuḍḍhi. ^b^Samparāyiko^eb^ti kammakilesavasena samparetabbato sampāpuṇitabbato samparāyo, paraloko. Tattha niyutto samparāyiko, paralokattho. ^b^Atthābhisamayā^eb^ti yathāvuttaubhayatthasaṅkhātahitapaṭilābhā. Samparāyikopi hi attho kāraṇassa nipphannattā paṭiladdho nāma hotīti tamatthadvayaṃ ekato katvā ‘‘atthābhisamayā’’ti vuttaṃ. Dhiyā paññāya rāti gaṇhātīti ^b^dhīro^eb^. Atha vā dhī paññā etassa atthīti ^b^dhīro^eb^.

[03]^b^Sammā mānābhisamayā^eb^ti mānassa sammā pahānena. Sammāti iminā mānassa aggamaggañāṇena samucchedappahānaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho^eb^tiādīsu dukkhasaccassa pīḷanaṃ taṃsamaṅgino hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ, pīḷanameva attho pīḷanaṭṭho, tthakārassa ṭṭhakāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi. Samecca paccayehi katabhāvo ^b^saṅkhataṭṭho. Santāpo^eb^ dukkhadukkhatādivasena santāpanaṃ paridahanaṃ. ^b^Vipariṇāmo^eb^ jarāya maraṇena ^a^M1.0198^ea^ cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatā. Abhisametabbo paṭivijjhitabboti abhisamayo, abhisamayova attho ^b^abhisamayaṭṭho,^eb^ pīḷanādīni. Tāni hi abhisametabbabhāvena ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā ‘‘abhisamayaṭṭho’’ti vuttāni, abhisamayassa vā paṭivedhassa visayabhūto attho abhisamayaṭṭhoti tāneva pīḷanādīni abhisamayassa visayabhāvūpagamanasāmaññato ekattena vuttāni.

[03]Ettha ca upasaggānaṃ jotakamattattā tassa tassa atthassa vācako samayasaddo evāti samayasaddassa atthuddhārepi saupasaggo abhisamayasaddo vutto. Tattha sahakārīkāraṇasannijjhaṃ sameti ^a^V1.0176^ea^ samavetīti ^b^samayo,^eb^ samavāyo. Sameti samāgacchati maggabrahmacariyaṃ ettha tadādhārapuggalehīti ^b^samayo,^eb^ khaṇo. Samenti ettha, etena vā saṃgacchanti dhammā sahajātadhammehi uppādādīhi vāti ^b^samayo,^eb^ kālo. Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ viya ca parikappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyati. Samaṃ, saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti ^b^samayo,^eb^ samūho yathā ‘‘samudāyo’’ti. Avayavena sahāvaṭṭhānameva hi samūho. Paccayantarasamāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti ^b^samayo,^eb^ hetu yathā ‘‘samudayo’’ti. Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambandho eti attano visaye pavattati, daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā taṃsaṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti ^b^samayo,^eb^ diṭṭhi. Diṭṭhisaṃyojanena hi sattā ativiya bajjhanti. Samiti saṅgati samodhānanti ^b^samayo,^eb^ paṭilābho. Samassa nirodhassa yānaṃ, sammā vā yānaṃ apagamo appavattīti ^b^samayo,^eb^ pahānaṃ. Ñāṇena abhimukhaṃ sammā etabbo adhigantabboti ^b^abhisamayo,^eb^ dhammānaṃ aviparīto sabhāvo. Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti ^b^abhisamayo,^eb^ dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodho. Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.

[03]Nanu ca atthamattaṃ paṭicca saddā abhinivisanti, na ekena saddena aneke atthā abhidhīyantīti? Saccametaṃ saddavisese apekkhite. Saddavisese hi apekkhiyamāne ekena saddena anekatthābhidhānaṃ na sambhavati. Na hi yo kālattho samayasaddo, soyeva samūhādiatthaṃ vadati. Ettha pana tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ samayasaddavacanīyatāsāmaññamupādāya anekatthatā ^a^M1.0199^ea^ samayasaddassa vuttā. Evaṃ sabbattha atthuddhāre adhippāyo veditabbo. ^b^Idha panassa kālo attho^eb^ti assa samayasaddassa idha kālo attho samavāyādīnaṃ atthānaṃ idha asambhavato desadesakādīnaṃ viya nidānabhāvena kālassa apadisitabbato ca.

[03]Upayogavacanena bhummavacanena ca niddesamakatvā idha karaṇavacanena niddese payojanaṃ niddhāretukāmo parammukhena codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti ^b^‘‘etthāhā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ettha^eb^ ‘‘tena samayenā’’ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne vitaṇḍavādī āhāti attho. ^b^Athā^eb^ti codanāya kattukāmataṃ dīpeti, nanūti iminā samānattho. Kasmā karaṇavacanena niddeso katoti sambandho. Bhummavacanena niddeso katoti yojetabbaṃ. Etthāpi ‘‘yathā’’ti idaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tesu suttābhidhammesu. ^b^Tathā^eb^ti upayogabhummavacanehi. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ vinaye. ^b^Aññathā^eb^ti karaṇavacanena. ^b^Accantamevā^eb^ti ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva desanāniṭṭhānaṃ, tāva accantameva, nirantaramevāti ^a^V1.0177^ea^ attho. ^b^Karuṇāvihārenā^eb^ti parahitapaṭipattisaṅkhātena karuṇāvihārena. Tathā hi karuṇānidānattā desanāya idha parahitapaṭipatti ‘‘karuṇāvihāro’’ti vuttā, na pana karuṇāsamaāpattivihāro. Na hi desanākāle desetabbadhammavisayassa desanāñāṇassa sattavisayāya mahākaruṇāya sahuppatti sambhavati bhinnavisayattā, tasmā karuṇāvasena pavatto parahitapaapattisaṅkhāto vihāro idha karuṇāvihāroti veditabbo. ^b^Tadatthajotanattha^eb^nti accantasaṃyogatthadīpanatthaṃ upayoganiddeso kato yathā ‘‘māsaṃ ajjhetī’’ti.

[03]^b^Adhikaraṇattho^eb^ti ādhārattho. Bhāvo nāma kiriyā, kiriyāya kiriyantaralakkhaṇaṃ bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ, soyevattho ^b^bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho^eb^. Kathaṃ pana abhidhamme yathāvuttaatthadvayasambhavoti āha ^b^‘‘adhikaraṇañhī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha kālasaṅkhāto attho ^b^kālattho,^eb^ samūhasaṅkhāto attho ^b^samūhattho^eb^. Atha vā kālasaddassa attho ^b^kālattho,^eb^ samūhasaddassa attho samūhattho. Ko so? Samayo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kālattho samūhattho ca samayo tattha abhidhamme vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ādhāroti yasmiṃ kāle dhammapuñje vā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva kāle puñje ca phassādayopi hontīti ayañhi tattha attho.

[03]Nanu ^a^M1.0200^ea^ cāyaṃ upādāya paññatto kālo samūho ca vohāramattako, so kathaṃ ādhāro tattha vuttadhammānanti? Nāyaṃ doso. Yathā hi kālo sabhāvadhammaparicchinno sayaṃ paramatthato avijjamānopi ādhārabhāvena paññatto taṅkhaṇappavattānaṃ tato pubbe parato ca abhāvato ‘‘pubbaṇhe jāto sāyanhe gacchatī’’tiādīsu, samūho ca avayavavinimutto avijjamānopi kappanāmattasiddho avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena paññapīyati ‘‘rukkhe sākhā, yavarāsimhi sambhūto’’tiādīsu, evamidhāpīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Abhidhamme ādhāratthasambhavaṃ dassetvā idāni bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇatthasambhavaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^khaṇo^eb^ nāma aṭṭhakkhaṇavinimutto navamo buddhuppādasaṅkhāto khaṇo, yāni vā panetāni ‘‘cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ pavattatī’’ti (a. ni. 4.31) ettha patirūpadesavāso, sappurisūpanissayo, attasammāpaṇidhi, pubbe ca katapuññatāti cattāri cakkāni vuttāni, tāni ekajjhaṃ katvā okāsaṭṭhena khaṇoti veditabbo. Tāni hi kusaluppattiyā okāsabhūtāni. ^b^Samavāyo^eb^ nāma ‘‘cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa’’nti ^a^V1.0178^ea^ (ma. ni. 1.204; 3.421; saṃ. ni. 4.60) evamādinā niddiṭṭhā cakkhuviññāṇādisaṅkhātasādhāraṇaphalanipphādakattena saṇṭhitā cakkhurūpādipaccayasāmaggī. Cakkhurūpādīnañhi cakkhuviññāṇādisādhāraṇaphalaṃ. ^b^Hetū^eb^ti janakahetu. Yathāvuttakhaṇasaṅkhaātassa samavāyasaṅkhātassa hetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena sattāya tesaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ bhāvo sattā lakkhīyati viññāyatīti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā ‘‘gāvīsu duyhamānāsu gato, duddhāsu āgato’’ti dohanakiriyāya gamanakiriyā lakkhīyati, evamidhāpi ‘‘yasmiṃ samaye, tasmiṃ samaye’’ti ca vutte ‘‘satī’’ti ayamattho viññāyamāno eva hoti aññakiriyāya sambandhābhāve padatthassa sattāvirahābhāvatoti samayassa sattākiriyāya cittassa uppādakiriyā phassādibhavanakiriyā ca lakkhīyatīti. Ayañhi tattha attho yasmiṃ yathāvutte khaṇe paccayasamavāye hetumhi ca sati kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe paccayasamavāye hetumhi ca sati phassādayopi hontīti ^a^M1.0201^ea^. ^b^Tadatthajotanattha^eb^nti adhikaraṇatthassa bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇatthassa ca dīpanatthaṃ.

[03]^b^Idha panā^eb^ti imasmiṃ vinaye. ^b^Hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavatī^eb^ti ‘‘annena vasati, vijjāya vasatī’’tiādīsu viya hetuattho ‘‘pharasunā chindati, kudālena khaṇatī’’tiādīsu viya karaṇattho ca sambhavati. Kathaṃ sambhavatīti āha ^b^‘‘yo hi so’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtenā^eb^ti ettha pana taṃtaṃvatthuvītikkamova sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hetu ceva karaṇañca. Tathā hi yadā bhagavā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā paṭhamameva tesaṃ tesaṃ tattha tattha taṃtaṃsikkhāpadapaññattihetubhūtaṃ vītikkamaṃ apekkhamāno viharati, tadā taṃ taṃ vītikkamaṃ apekkhitvā tadatthaṃ vasatīti siddho vatthuvītikkamassa hetubhāvo ‘‘annena vasati, annaṃ apekkhitvā tadatthāya vasatī’’tiādīsu viya. Sikkhāpadapaññattikāle pana teneva pubbasiddhena vītikkamena sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sādhakatamattā karaṇabhāvopi vītikkamasseva siddho ‘‘asinā chindatī’’tiādīsu viya. Vītikkamaṃ pana apekkhamāno teneva saddhiṃ tannissayakālampi apekkhitvā viharatīti kālassapi idha hetubhāvo vutto, sikkhāpadaṃ paññapento ca taṃ taṃ vītikkamakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva kālena sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti vītikkamanissayassa kālassapi karaṇabhāvo vutto, tasmā iminā pariyāyena kālassapi hetubhāvo karaṇabhāvo ca labbhatīti vuttaṃ ‘‘tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtenā’’ti. Nippariyāyato pana vītikkamoyeva hetubhūto karaṇabhūto ca. So hi vītikkamakkhaṇe hetu hutvā pacchā sikkhāpadapaññāpane karaṇampi hotīti.

[03]^b^Sikkhāpadāni^eb^^a^V1.0179^ea^^b^paññāpayanto^eb^ti vītikkamaṃ pucchitvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇavatthukaṃ puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā vigarahitvā ca taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ otiṇṇakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva kālena karaṇabhūtena sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto. ^b^Sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno^eb^ti tatiyapārājikādīsu viya sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hetubhūtaṃ taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ vītikkamasamayaṃ apekkhamāno tena samayena hetubhūtena bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsīti attho. ‘‘Sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca ^a^M1.0202^ea^ apekkhamāno’’ti vacanato ‘‘tena samayena karaṇabhūtena hetubhūtenā’’ti evaṃ vattabbepi paṭhamaṃ ‘‘hetubhūtenā’’ti vacanaṃ idha hetuatthassa adhippetattā vuttaṃ. Bhagavā hi verañjāyaṃ viharanto therassa sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanahetubhūtaṃ parivitakkasamayaṃ apekkhamāno tena samayena hetubhūtena vihāsīti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Kiṃ panettha yutticintāya, ācariyassa idha kamavacanicchā natthīti evametaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Teneva ^b^dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya^eb^mpi (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.paribbājakakathāvaṇṇanā) ‘‘tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtenā’’tiādinā ayameva anukkamo vutto. Na hi tattha paṭhamaṃ ‘‘hetubhūtenā’’ti vacanaṃ idha ‘‘tena samayena verañjāyaṃ viharatī’’ti ettha hetuatthassa adhippetabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena samayena vihāsi, sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno hetubhūtena samayena vihāsīti evamettha sambandho kātabbo’’tipi vadanti. ^b^Tadatthajotanattha^eb^nti hetuatthassa karaṇatthassa vā dīpanatthaṃ. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ vinaye. ^b^Hoti cetthā^eb^ti ettha imasmiṃ padese yathāvuttatthasaṅgahavasena ayaṃ gāthā hoti. ^b^Aññatrā^eb^ti suttābhidhammesu.

[03]^b^Porāṇā^eb^ti aṭṭhakathācariyā. ^b^Abhilāpamattabhedo^eb^ti vacanamattena viseso. Tena suttavinayesu vibhattivipariṇāmo katoti dasseti. ^b^Parato atthaṃ vaṇṇayissāmā^eb^ti parato ‘‘itipi so bhagavā’’tiādinā āgataṭṭhāne vaṇṇayissāma. ^b^Verañjāya^eb^nti ettha ‘‘balikaraggahaṇena janassa pīḷābhāvato niddosattā vigato rajo assāti ^b^verañjā,^eb^ serivāṇijajātake devadattassa veruppannapadese katattā veraṃ ettha jātanti verañjā, paviṭṭhapaviṭṭhe naṭasamajjādīhi khādanīyabhojanīyālaṅkārādīhi ca vividhehi upakaraṇehi rañjanato vividhehi rañjayatīti verañjā, paṭipakkhe abhibhavitvā katabhāvato veraṃ abhibhavitvā jātāti verañjā, verañjassa nāma isino assamaṭṭhāne katattā verañjā’’ti evamādinā keci vaṇṇayanti. Kiṃ iminā, nāmamattametaṃ tassa nagarassāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘verañjāti aññatarassa nagarassetaṃ adhivacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Samīpatthe bhummavacana^eb^nti ‘‘gaṅgāyaṃ gāvo caranti, kūpe gaggakula’’ntiādīsu viya. ^b^Avisesenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0203^ea^^a^V1.0180^ea^ ‘‘pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati. Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati. Sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā animittaṃ cetosamādhiṃ samāpajjitvā viharatī’’tiādīsu viya saddantarasannidhānasiddhena visesaparāmasanena vinā. Atha vā ^b^avisesenā^eb^ti na visesena, vihārabhāvasāmaññenāti attho.

[03]^b^Iriyāpatha…pe… vihāresū^eb^ti iriyāpathavihāro dibbavihāro brahmavihāro ariyavihāroti etesu catūsu vihāresu. Tattha iriyanaṃ pavattanaṃ iriyā, kāyappayogo kāyikakiriyā. Tassā pavattanupāyabhāvato iriyāya pathoti iriyāpatho, ṭhānanisajjādi. Na hi ṭhānanisajjādīhi avatthāhi vinā kañci kāyikakiriyaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkā. Ṭhānasamaṅgī vā hi kāyena kiñci kareyya gamanādīsu aññatarasamaṅgī vāti. Viharaṇaṃ, viharati etenāti vā vihāro, iriyāpathova vihāro ^b^iriyāpathavihāro,^eb^ so ca atthato ṭhānanisajjādiākārappavatto catusantatirūpappabandhova. Divi bhavo dibbo, tattha bahulappavattiyā brahmapārisajjādidevalokabhavoti attho. Tattha yo dibbānubhāvo tadatthāya saṃvattatīti vā dibbo, abhiññābhinīhāravasena mahāgatikattā vā dibbo, dibbo ca so vihāro cāti ^b^dibbavihāro,^eb^ dibbabhāvāvaho vā vihāro dibbavihāro, mahaggatajjhānāni. Āruppasamāpattiyopi hi ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. ^b^Nettiyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘catasso āruppasamāpattiyo āneñjavihāro’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ mettājhānādīnaṃ brahmavihāratā viya tāsaṃ bhāvanāvisesabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana dibbabhāvāvahasāmaññato tāpi ‘‘dibbavihārā’’tveva vuttā. Brahmānaṃ vihārā ^b^brahmavihārā,^eb^ brahmāno vā vihārā brahmavihārā, hitūpasaṃharādivasena pavattiyā brahmabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtā vihārāti attho, mettājhānādikā catasso appamaññāyo. Ariyā uttamā vihārāti ^b^ariyavihārā,^eb^ anaññasādhāraṇattā ariyānaṃ vā vihārā ariyavihārā, catasso phalasamāpattiyo. Visesato pana rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ catasso appamaññāyo catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpatti ca bhagavato dibbabrahmaariyavihārā.

[03]^b^Aññataravihārasamaṅgīparidīpana^eb^nti ^a^M1.0204^ea^ yathāvuttavihāresu aññataravihārasamaṅgībhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Bhagavā hi lobhadosamohussannakāle loke tassa sakāya paṭipattiyā vinayanatthaṃ dibbabrahmaaayavihāre upasampajja viharati. Tathā hi yadā sattā kāmesu vippaṭipajjanti, tadā kira bhagavā dibbena vihārena viharati tesaṃ alobhakusalamūluppādanatthaṃ ‘‘appeva ^a^V1.0181^ea^ nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā ettha ruciṃ uppādentā kāmesu virajjeyyu’’nti. Yadā pana issariyatthaṃ sattesu vippaṭipajjanti, tadā pana brahmavihārena viharati tesaṃ adosakusalamūluppādanatthaṃ ‘‘appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā ettha ruciṃ uppādetvā adosena dosaṃ vūpasameyyu’’nti. Yadā pana pabbajitā dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vivadanti, tadā ariyavihārena viharati tesaṃ amohakusalamūluppādanatthaṃ ‘‘appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā tattha ruciṃ uppādetvā amohena mohaṃ vūpasameyyu’’nti. Evañca katvā imehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi sattānaṃ vividhaṃ hitasukhaṃ harati upaharati upaneti janeti uppādetīti ‘‘viharatī’’ti vuccati.

[03]Iriyāpathavihārena pana na kadāci na viharati taṃ vinā attabhāvapariharaṇābhāvato, tatoyeva ca dibbavihārādīnampi sādhāraṇo iriyāpathavihāroti āha ^b^‘‘idha panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Iriyāpathasamāyogaparidīpana^eb^nti itaravihārasamāyogaparidīpanassa visesavacanassa abhāvato iriyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanassa ca atthasiddhattā vuttaṃ. Asmiṃ pana pakkhe ^b^viharatī^eb^ti ettha ^b^vi^eb^-saddo vicchedatthajotano, ^b^haratī^eb^ti neti pavattetīti attho, vicchinditvā haratīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha kassa kena vicchindanaṃ, kathaṃ kassa pavattananti antolīnacodanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘so hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^So^eb^ti bhagavā. Yadipi bhagavā ekenapi iriyāpathena cirataraṃ kālaṃ attabhāvaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti, tathāpi upādinnakasarīrassa nāma ayaṃ sabhāvoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhana’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Aparipatanta^eb^nti apatantaṃ. Yasmā pana bhagavā yattha katthaci vasanto vineyyānaṃ dhammaṃ desento nānāsamāpattīhi ca kālaṃ vītināmento vasatīti sattānaṃ attano ca vividhaṃ hitasukhaṃ harati upaneti, tasmā vividhaṃ haratīti viharatīti evampettha attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Naḷerupucimandamūle^eb^ti ^a^M1.0205^ea^ ettha vaṇṇayanti – ^b^naḷerū^eb^ti tasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthayakkhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tasmā tena adhivattho pucimando ‘‘naḷerussa pucimando naḷerupucimando’’ti vuccati. Atha vā naḷe ruhattā jātattā naḷeru. Susiramettha naḷasaddena vuccati, tasmā rukkhasusire jātattā naḷeru ca so pucimando cāti naḷerupucimandoti vuccati. Naḷavane ruhattā jātattā vā naḷeru. Naḷavane kira so pucimandarukkho jāto. Urunaḷo pucimando naḷerupucimando. Urusaddo cettha mahantapariyāyo, naḷasaddo susirapariyāyo, tasmā mahantena susirena samannāgato pucimando naḷerupucimandoti vuccatīti. Ācariyo pana kimettha bahubhāsitenāti ekamevatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘naḷeru nāma yakkho’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Mūla-saddo ettha samīpavacano adhippeto, na mūlamūlādīsu vattamānoti dassento āha ^b^‘‘mūlanti samīpa’’^eb^ntiādi. Nippariyāyena sākhādimato saṅghātassa suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhane avayavavisese ^a^V1.0182^ea^ pavattamāno mūlasaddo yasmā taṃsadisesu tannissaye padese ca ruḷhīvasena pariyāyato pavattati, tasmā ‘‘mūlāni uddhareyyā’’ti ettha nippariyāyato mūlaṃ adhippetanti ekena mūlasaddena visesetvā āha ^b^‘‘mūlamūle dissatī’’^eb^ti yathā ‘‘dukkhadukkhaṃ, rūparūpa’’nti ca. ^b^Asādhāraṇahetumhī^eb^ti asādhāraṇakāraṇe. Lobho hi lobhasahagataakusalacittuppādasseva hetuttā asādhāraṇo, tasmā lobhasahagatacittuppādānameva āveṇike nesaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanato mūlaṭṭhena upakārake paccayadhammaviseseti attho. Atha vā yathā alobhādayo kusalābyākatasādhāraṇā, lobhādayo pana tathā na honti akusalasseva sādhāraṇattāti asādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ. Atha vā ^b^ādīsū^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena alobhādīnampi kusalābyākatamūlānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tesupi hi alobhādikusalamūlaṃ akusalābyākatehi asādhāraṇattā asādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ, tathā alobhādiabyākatamūlampi itaradvayehi asādhāraṇattāti. ^b^Nivāte^eb^ti vātarahite padese, vātassa abhāve vā. ^b^Patantī^eb^ti nipatanti, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^Ramaṇīyo^eb^ti manuñño. ^b^Pāsādiko^eb^ti pasādāvaho, pasādajanakoti attho. Ādhipaccaṃ kurumāno viyāti sambandho.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0206^ea^ ‘‘tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle’’ti yaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha. ^b^Siyā^eb^ti kassaci evaṃ parivitakko siyā, vakkhamānākārena kadāci codeyya vāti attho. ^b^Yadi tāva bhagavā^eb^tiādīsu codakassāyamadhippāyo – ‘‘pāṭaliputte pāsāde vasatī’’tiādīsu viya adhikaraṇādhikaraṇaṃ yadi bhaveyya, tadā ‘‘verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle’’ti adhikaraṇadvayaniddeso yutto siyā, imesaṃ pana bhinnadesattā na yutto ubhayaniddesoti. ^b^Atha tattha viharatī^eb^ti yadi naḷerupucimandamūle viharati. ^b^Na vattabba^eb^nti nānāṭhānabhūtattā verañjānaḷerupucimandamūlānaṃ ‘‘tena samayenā’’ti ca vuttattāti adhippāyo. Idāni codako tameva attano adhippāyaṃ ^b^‘‘na hi sakkā’’^eb^tiādinā vivarati. Verañjānaḷerupucimandamūlānaṃ bhūmibhāgavasena bhinnattāyeva hi na sakkā ubhayattha teneva samayena viharituṃ, ‘‘ubhayattha teneva samayenā’’ti ca vuttattā nānāsamaye vihāro avāritoti veditabbo.

[03]Itaro sabbametaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ ajānantena tayā vuttanti dassento ^b^‘‘na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabba’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^eta^eb^nti ‘‘verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle’’ti etaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Eva^eb^nti ‘‘yadi tāva bhagavā’’tiādinā yaṃ taṃ bhavatā coditaṃ, taṃ atthato evaṃ na kho pana daṭṭhabbaṃ, na ubhayattha apubbaṃ acarimaṃ vihāradassanatthanti attho. Idāni attanā yathādhippetaṃ ^a^V1.0183^ea^ aviparītamatthaṃ tassa ca paṭikacceva vuttabhāvaṃ tena ca appaṭividdhataṃ pakāsento ^b^‘‘nanu avocumha samīpatthe bhummavacana’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Goyūthānī^eb^ti gomaṇḍalāni. Evampi naḷerupucimandamūle viharaticceva vattabbaṃ, na verañjāyanti, tasmā samīpādhikaraṇatthavasena ubhayathā nidānakittane kiṃ payojananti codanaṃ manasi nidhāyāha ^b^‘‘gocaragāmanidassanattha’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Assā^eb^ti bhagavato.

[03]Avassañcettha gocaragāmakittanaṃ kattabbaṃ. Yathā hi naḷerupucimandamūlakittanaṃ pabbajitānuggahakaraṇādianekappayojanaṃ, evaṃ gocaragāmakittanampi gahaṭṭhānuggahakaraṇādivividhappayojananti dassento ^b^‘‘verañjākittanenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^gahaṭṭhānuggahakaraṇa^eb^nti tesaṃ tattha paccayaggahaṇena upasaṅkamanapayirupāsanādīnaṃ okāsadānena dhammadesanāya saraṇesu ^a^M1.0207^ea^ sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpanena yathūpanissayaṃ uparivisesādhigamāvahanena ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ anuggahakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Pabbajitānuggahakaraṇa^eb^nti uggahaparipucchānaṃ kammaṭṭhānānuyogassa ca anurūpavasanaṭṭhānapariggahenettha pabbajitānaṃ anuggahakaraṇaṃ.

[03]Paccayaggahaṇeneva paccayaparibhogasiddhito āha ^b^‘‘tathā purimena…pe… vivajjana^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^purimenā^eb^ti verañjāvacanena. Āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti attā, attabhāvo. Tassa kilamatho kilantabhāvo attakilamatho, attapīḷā attadukkhanti vuttaṃ hoti, tassa anuyogo karaṇaṃ attakilamathānuyogo, upavāsakaṇṭakāpassayaseyyādinā attano dukkhuppādananti vuttaṃ hoti. Tassa vivajjanaṃ ^b^attakilamathānuyogavivajjanaṃ^eb^. Antogāme vasantānaṃ anicchantānampi visabhāgarūpādiārammaṇadassanādisambhavato bahigāme patirūpaṭṭhāne vasantānaṃ tadabhāvato āha ^b^‘‘pacchimena vatthukāmappahānato’’^eb^tiādi.
