Ākārābhihitaṃ nibbacanaṃ ^b^nirutti^eb^. ‘‘Phasso vedanā’’ti evamādīsu ākārena kathitaṃ ‘‘phusatīti phasso, vedayatīti vedanā’’ti nīharitvā vitthāravacanaṃ nirutti nāma. ‘‘Nibbānaṃ maggati, nibbānatthikehi vā maggīyati, kilese vā mārento gacchatīti maggo’’tiādinā nibbacanavitthāro niravasesadesanattā ^b^niddeso^eb^. Atha vā vedayatīti vedanāti nibbacanaladdhapadesu sukhadukkhaadukkhamasukhāsu sukhayatīti sukhā, dukkhayatīti dukkhā, neva dukkhayati na sukhayatīti adukkhamasukhāti atthavitthāro niravasesena kathitattā ^b^niddeso^eb^ nāma. Etesaṃ akkharādīnaṃ byañjanapadānaṃ sampattiyā sampannatāya ^b^sabyañjanaṃ^eb^.

[03]Evaṃ ^a^V1.0290^ea^ panassa atthapadasamāyogo byañjanapadasampatti ca veditabbā. Tattha bhagavā akkharehi saṅkāseti, padehi pakāseti, byañjanehi vivarati, ākārehi vibhajati, niruttīhi uttāniṃ karoti, niddesehi paññapeti. Tathā hi padāvayavaggahaṇamukhena padaggahaṇaṃ, gahitena ca padena padatthāvabodho gahitapubbasaṅketassa hotīti bhagavā akkharehi saṅkāseti. Yasmā pana akkharehi saṃkhittena dīpiyamāno attho padapariyosāne vākyassa apariyositattā padena paṭhamaṃ pakāsito dīpito hoti, tasmā padehi pakāseti. Vākyapariyosāne pana so attho vivarito vivaṭo kato hotīti byañjanehi vivarati. Yasmā ca pakārehi vākyabhede kate tadattho vibhatto nāma hoti, tasmā ākārehi vibhajati. Tathā vākyāvayavānaṃ paccekaṃ nibbacanavibhāge kate so attho pākaṭo hotīti niruttīhi uttāniṃ karoti. Katanibbacanehi pana vākyāvayavehi vitthāravasena niravasesato desitehi veneyyānaṃ cittaparitosanaṃ buddhinisānañca kataṃ hotīti niddesehi paññapeti. Apica bhagavā akkharehi ugghaṭetvā padehi vineti ugghaṭitaññuṃ, byañjanehi vipañcetvā ākārehi vineti vipañcitaññuṃ, niruttīhi netvā niddesehi vineti neyyaṃ. Evañcāyaṃ dhammo ugghaṭiyamāno ugghaṭitaññuṃ vineti, vipañciyamāno vipañcitaññuṃ, nīyamāno neyyaṃ. Tattha ugghaṭanā ādi, vipañcanā majjhe, nayanaṃ ante. Evaṃ tīsu kālesu tidhā desito dosattayavidhamano guṇattayāvaho tividhavineyyavinayanoti evampi tividhakalyāṇoyaṃ ^a^M1.0331^ea^ dhammo atthabyañjanapāripūriyā sāttho sabyañjanoti veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^nettipakaraṇe^eb^ (netti. 9) –

[08]‘‘Tattha bhagavā akkharehi saṅkāseti, padehi pakāseti, byañjanehi vivarati, ākārehi vibhajati, niruttīhi uttāniṃ karoti, niddesehi paññapeti. Tattha bhagavā akkharehi ca padehi ca ugghaṭeti, byañjanehi ca ākārehi ca vipañceti, niruttīhi ca niddesehi ca vitthāreti. Tattha ugghaṭanā ādi, vipañcanā majjhe, vitthāranā pariyosānaṃ. Soyaṃ dhammavinayo ugghaṭiyanto ugghaṭitaññuṃ puggalaṃ vineti, tena naṃ āhu ādikalyāṇoti. Vipañciyanto vipañcitaññuṃ puggalaṃ vineti, tena naṃ āhu majjhekalyāṇoti. Vitthāriyanto neyyaṃ puggalaṃ vineti, tena naṃ āhu pariyosānakalyāṇotī’’ti.

[03]^b^Atthagambhīratā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^attho^eb^ nāma tantiattho. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ tanti. ^b^Paṭivedho^eb^ tantiyā tantiatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodho. ^b^Desanā^eb^ nāma manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā. Te panete atthādayo yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ^a^V1.0291^ea^ ca, tasmā ^b^gambhīrā^eb^. Atha vā ^b^attho^eb^ nāma hetuphalaṃ. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ hetu. ^b^Desanā^eb^ paññatti, yathādhammaṃ dhammābhilāpo. Anulomapaṭilomasaṅkhepavitthārādivasena vā kathanaṃ. ^b^Paṭivedho^eb^ abhisamayo, atthānurūpaṃ dhammesu, dhammānurūpaṃ atthesu, paññattipathānurūpaṃ paññattīsu avabodho. Tesaṃ tesaṃ vā dhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo lakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo. Tepi cete atthādayo yasmā anupacitakusalasambhārehi duppaññehi sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo dukkhogāhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā ^b^gambhīrā^eb^. Tesu paṭivedhassapi atthasannissitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘atthagambhīratāpaṭivedhagambhīratāhi sāttha’’^eb^nti atthaguṇadīpanato. Tāsaṃ dhammadesanānaṃ byañjanasannissitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dhammagambhīratādesanāgambhīratāhi sabyañjana’’^eb^nti tāsaṃ byañjanasampattidīpanato. Atthesu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, atthadhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti imissāpi paṭisambhidāya atthavisayattā āha ^b^‘‘atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāvisayato sāttha’’^eb^nti atthasampattiyā ^a^M1.0332^ea^ asati tadabhāvato. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ti tanti. ^b^Niruttī^eb^ti tantipadānaṃ niddhāretvā vacanaṃ. Tattha pabhedagatāni ñāṇāni dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāti āha ^b^‘‘dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāvisayato sabyañjana’’^eb^nti asati byañjanasampattiyā tadabhāvato.

[03]^b^Parikkhakajanappasādakantī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā parikkhakajanānaṃ kiṃkusalagavesīnaṃ pasādāvahaṃ, tasmā ^b^sātthaṃ^eb^. Atthasampannanti phalena hetuno anumānaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhipavattiyā. Sātthakatā panassa ^b^paṇḍitavedanīyatāya,^eb^ sā paramagambhīrasaṇhasukhumabhāvato veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘gambhīro duddaso’’tiādi. ^b^Lokiyajanappasādakanti sabyañjana^eb^nti yasmā lokiyajanassa pasādāvahaṃ, tasmā ^b^sabyañjanaṃ^eb^. Lokiyajano hi byañjanasampattiyā tussati. Idhāpi phalena hetuno anumānaṃ. Sabyañjanatā panassa ^b^saddheyyatāya,^eb^ sā ādikalyāṇādibhāvato veditabbā. Atha vā ^b^paṇḍitavedanīyato sāttha^eb^nti paññāpadaṭṭhānatāya atthasampannataṃ āha, tato ^b^parikkhakajanappasādakaṃ saddheyyato sabyañjana^eb^nti saddhāpadaṭṭhānatāya byañjanasampannataṃ, tato lokiyajanappasādatanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Gambhīrādhippāyato sāttha^eb^nti adhippāyato agādhāpāratāya atthasampannaṃ aññathā tadabhāvato. ^b^Uttānapadato sabyañjana^eb^nti subodhasaddakatāya byañjanasampannaṃ paramagambhīrassapi atthassa vineyyānaṃ suviññeyyabhāvāpādanato. Sabbopesa atthasampattiyā sātthaṃ, byañjanasampattiyā sabyañjananti sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttasseva atthadvayassa papañcoti daṭṭhabbo. Tathā ceva tattha tattha saṃvaṇṇitaṃ. Tathā hettha vikappassa samuccayassa vā aggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Upanetabbassa abhāvato^eb^ti pakkhipitabbassa vodānatthassa avuttassa abhāvato. ^b^Kevala^eb^saddo sakalādhivacananti āha ^b^‘‘sakalaparipuṇṇabhāvenā’’^eb^ti ^a^V1.0292^ea^, sabbabhāgehi paripuṇṇatāyāti attho. ^b^Apanetabbassā^eb^ti saṃkilesadhammassa.

[03]^b^Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī^eb^ti ettha pana ayaṃ ^b^brahmacariya^eb^-saddo dāne veyyāvacce pañcasikkhāpadasīle appamaññāsu methunaviratiyaṃ sadārasantose vīriye uposathaṅgesu ariyamagge sāsaneti imesu atthesu dissati.
[21]‘‘Kiṃ ^a^M1.0333^ea^ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
[27]Kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
[26]Iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti,
[22]Idañca te nāgamahāvimānaṃ.
[21]‘‘Ahañca bhariyā ca manussaloke,
[27]Saddhā ubho dānapatī ahumhā;
[26]Opānabhūtaṃ me gharaṃ tadāsi,
[22]Santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca.
[21]‘‘Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
[27]Tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
[26]Iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti,
[22]Idañca me dhīra mahāvimāna’’nti. –
[07]Imasmiñhi ^b^puṇṇakajātake^eb^ (jā. 2.22.1592-1593, 1595) dānaṃ ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vuttaṃ.
[21]‘‘Kena pāṇi kāmadado, kena pāṇi madhussavo;
[22]Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
[21]‘‘Tena pāṇi kāmadado, tena pāṇi madhussavo;
[22]Tena me brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī’’ti. –

[07]Imasmiṃ ^a^V1.0293^ea^^b^aṅkurapetavatthumhi^eb^ (pe. va. 275, 277) veyyāvaccaṃ ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Evaṃ kho taṃ bhikkhave tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosī’’ti (cūḷava. 311) imasmiṃ ^b^tittirajātake^eb^ pañcasikkhāpadasīlaṃ ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Taṃ kho pana me pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā’’ti imasmiṃ ^b^mahāgovindasutte^eb^ (dī. ni. 2.329) catasso appamaññāyo ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vuttā. ‘‘Pare abrahmacārī bhavissanti, mayamettha brahmacārī bhavissāmā’’ti imasmiṃ ^b^sallekhasutte^eb^ (ma. ni. 1.83) methunavirati ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vuttā.
[21]‘‘Mayañca ^a^M1.0334^ea^ bhariyā nātikkamāma,
[27]Amhe ca bhariyā nātikkamanti;
[26]Aññatra tāhi brahmacariyaṃ carāma,
[22]Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare’’ti. –

[07]^b^Mahādhammapālajātake^eb^ (jā. 1.10.97) sadārasantoso ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vutto. ‘‘Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritā, tapassī sudaṃ homī’’ti ^b^lomahaṃsanasutte^eb^ (ma. ni. 1.155) vīriyaṃ ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vuttaṃ.
[21]‘‘Hīnena brahmacariyena, khattiye upapajjati;
[22]Majjhimena ca devattaṃ, uttamena visujjhatī’’ti. –

[07]Evaṃ (jā. 2.22.429) ^b^nimijātake^eb^ attadamanavasena kato aṭṭhaṅgiko uposatho ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vutto. ‘‘Idaṃ kho pana me, pañcasikha, brahmacariyaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya…pe… ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo’’ti ^b^mahāgovindasuttasmiṃ^eb^yeva (dī. ni. 2.329) ariyamaggo ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vutto. ‘‘Tayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāvadeva manussehi suppakāsita’’nti ^b^pāsādikasutte^eb^ (dī. ni. 3.174) sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti vuttaṃ. Imasmimpi ṭhāne idameva ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘sikkhattayapariggahitattā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Seṭṭhehī^eb^ti buddhādīhi seṭṭhehi. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūtaṃ vā cariyaṃ ^b^brahmacariyaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Sanidāna^eb^nti heṭṭhā vuttalakkhaṇena nidānena sanidānaṃ. ^b^Sauppattika^eb^nti saaṭṭhuppattikaṃ. ^b^Veneyyānaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0294^ea^^b^anurūpato^eb^ti veneyyānaṃ cariyādianurūpato. ^b^Atthassā^eb^ti desiyamānassa sīlādiatthassa. ^b^Hetudāharaṇayuttato^eb^ti ‘‘taṃ kissa hetu seyyathāpi, bhikkhave’’ti ca ādinā tattha tattha hetupamaggahaṇena hetudāharaṇehi yuttato. ^b^Saddhāpaṭilābhenā^eb^ti ‘‘te taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhantī’’tiādinā vuttasaddhāpaṭilābhena. ^b^Paṭipattiyā^eb^ti sīlavisuddhiyādisammāpaṭipattiyā, paṭipattinimittanti attho. ^b^Adhigamabyattito^eb^ti saccappaṭivedhena adhigamaveyyattiyasabbhāvato sātthaṃ kapilamatādi viya tucchaṃ niratthakaṃ ahutvā ^a^M1.0335^ea^ atthasampannanti katvā. ^b^Pariyattiyā^eb^ti pariyattidhammaparicayena. ^b^Āgamabyattito^eb^ti durakkhātadhammesu paricayaṃ karontassa viya sammohaṃ ajanetvā bāhusaccaveyyattiyasabbhāvato ^b^sabyañjanaṃ^eb^. Byañjanasampattiyā hi sati āgamabyattīti. ^b^Sīlādipañcadhammakkhandhayuttato^eb^ti sīlādīhi pañcahi dhammakoṭṭhāsehi avirahitattā. ^b^Kevalaparipuṇṇa^eb^nti anavasesena samantato puṇṇaṃ pūritaṃ. ^b^Nirupakkilesato^eb^ti diṭṭhimānādiupakkilesābhāvato. ^b^Nittharaṇatthāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇāya. ^b^Lokāmisanirapekkhato^eb^ti kathañcipi taṇhāsannissayassa anissayato ^b^parisuddhaṃ^eb^. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo ‘‘imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ nissāya lābhaṃ vā sakkāraṃ vā labhissāmī’’ti deseti, tassa aparisuddhā desanā hoti. Bhagavā pana lokāmisanirapekkho hitapharaṇena mettābhāvanāya muduhadayo ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitena cittena deseti, tasmā tassa desanā parisuddhāti.

[03]^b^Sādhū^eb^ti ayaṃ saddo ‘‘sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 4.95) āyācane dissati. ‘‘Sādhu bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 3.86) sampaṭicchane. ‘‘Sādhu sādhu sāriputtā’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 3.349) sampahaṃsane. ‘‘Tena hi brāhmaṇa sādhukaṃ suṇohī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 5.192) daḷhīkamme āṇattiyañca dissati.
[21]‘‘Sādhu dhammaruci rājā, sādhu paññāṇavā naro;
[22]Sādhu mittānamaddubbho, pāpassākaraṇaṃ sukha’’nti. –

[07]Ādīsu (jā. 2.18.101) sundare. Idhāpi sundareyeva daṭṭhabboti āha ^b^‘‘sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho panā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^sundara^eb^nti bhaddakaṃ. Bhaddakatā ca passantassa hitasukhāvahabhāvenāti āha ^b^‘‘atthāvahaṃ sukhāvaha’’^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^atthāvaha^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthasaññitahitāvahaṃ. ^b^Sukhāvaha^eb^nti yathāvuttatividhasukhāvahaṃ. ^b^Tathārūpāna^eb^nti tādisānaṃ ^a^V1.0295^ea^. Yādisehi pana guṇehi bhagavā samannāgato, tehi catuppamāṇikassa lokassa sabbakālepi accantāya pasādanīyo tesaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvattāti dassento ^b^‘‘yathārūpo’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^yathābhucca…pe… arahata^eb^nti iminā dhammappamāṇānaṃ lūkhappamāṇānañca sattānaṃ bhagavato ^a^M1.0336^ea^ pasādāvahataṃ dasseti, taṃdassanena ca itaresampi rūpappamāṇaghosappamāṇānaṃ pasādāvahatā dassitā hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ tadavinābhāvato. Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti kittisaddo abbhuggatoti evamettha sambandhoti āha ^b^‘‘dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti evamajjhāsayaṃ katvā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^dassanamattampi sādhu hotī^eb^ti ettha ^b^kosiyasakuṇavatthu^eb^ kathetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^2^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yena vā kāraṇenā^eb^ti hetumhi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Hetuattho hi kiriyākāraṇaṃ, na karaṇaṃ viya kiriyattho, tasmā nānappakāraguṇavisesādhigamatthā idha upasaṅkamanakiriyāti ‘‘annena vasatī’’tiādīsu viya hetuatthamevetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ yuttaṃ, na karaṇatthaṃ tassa ayujjamānattāti vuttaṃ ‘‘yena vā kāraṇenā’’ti. Avibhāgato hi satatappavattaniratisayasāduvipulāmatarasasaddhammaphalatāyassa sāduphalaniccaphalitamahārukkhena bhagavā upamito. Sāduphalūpabhogādhippāyaggahaṇeneva hi mahārukkhassa sāduphalatā gahitāti. ^b^Upasaṅkamī^eb^ti upasaṅkamanto. Sampattakāmatāya hi kiñci ṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃtaṃpadesātikkamanena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamantoti vattabbataṃ labhati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gatoti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti, upagatoti attho. ^b^Upasaṅkamitvā^eb^ti pubbakālakiriyāniddesoti āha ^b^‘‘upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tato^eb^ti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patto upasaṅkamīti vutto, tato upagataṭṭhānato. ^b^Āsannataraṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti pañhaṃ vā pucchituṃ dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03]^b^Yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto^eb^ti yathā bhagavā ‘‘kacci te brāhmaṇa khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīya’’ntiādinā khamanīyādīni pucchanto tena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi. Pubbabhāsitāya tadanukaraṇena evaṃ sopi brāhmaṇo bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosīti yojanā. Taṃ pana samappavattamodataṃ upamāya dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sītodakaṃ viyā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sammodita^eb^nti saṃsanditaṃ. ^b^Ekībhāva^eb^nti sammodanakiriyāya samānataṃ ekarūpataṃ. ^b^Khamanīya^eb^nti ‘‘idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ dukkhabahulatāya ^a^M1.0337^ea^ sabhāvato dussahaṃ, kacci khamituṃ sakkuṇeyyanti pucchati. ^b^Yāpanīya^eb^nti paccayāyattavuttikaṃ cirappabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Sīsarogādiābādhābhāvena ^b^kacci appābādhaṃ^eb^. Dukkhajīvikābhāvena ^b^kacci appātaṅkaṃ^eb^. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe uṭṭhānasukhatāya ^b^kacci lahuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Tadanurūpabalayogato ^b^kacci balaṃ^eb^. Sukhavihārasambhavena ^b^kacci phāsuvihāro^eb^ atthīti tattha tattha kaccisaddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo ^a^V1.0296^ea^. Balappattā pīti ^b^pīti^eb^yeva. Taruṇapīti ^b^pāmojjaṃ^eb^. Sammodaṃ janeti karotīti sammodanikaṃ, tadeva sammodanīyanti āha ^b^‘‘sammodajananato’’^eb^ti. Sammoditabbato sammodanīyanti idaṃ pana atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Saritabbabhāvato^eb^ti anussaritabbabhāvato. ‘‘Saraṇīya’’nti vattabbe dīghaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘sāraṇīya’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Suyyamānasukhato^eb^ti āpāthamadhuratamāha. ^b^Anussariyamānasukhato^eb^ti vimaddaramaṇīyataṃ. ^b^Byañjanaparisuddhatāyā^eb^ti sabhāvaniruttibhāvena tassā kathāya vacanacāturiyamāha. ^b^Atthaparisuddhatāyā^eb^ti atthassa nirupakkilesataṃ. ^b^Anekehi pariyāyehī^eb^ti anekehi kāraṇehi.

[03]Atidūraaccāsannapaṭikkhepena nātidūranāccāsannaṃ nāma gahitaṃ, taṃ pana avakaṃsato ubhinnaṃ pasāritahatthāsaṅghaṭṭanena daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Gīvaṃ pasāretvā^eb^ti gīvaṃ parivattanavasena pasāretvā. ^b^Me^eb^ti kattuatthe sāmivacananti āha ^b^‘‘mayā suta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Jātibrāhmaṇe^eb^ti jātiyā brāhmaṇe, na bāhitapāpatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Khaṇḍiccādibhāvaṃ āpādite^eb^ti khaṇḍitadantapalitakesādibhāvaṃ sampāpite. ^b^Vuḍḍhimariyādappatte^eb^ti vuḍḍhiparicchedaṃ sampatte, vuḍḍhipariyantappatteti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Jātimahallakatāyā^eb^ti uppattiyā mahallakabhāvena. Mahattaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti mahallako, jātiyā mahallako, na vibhavādināti jātimahallako. ^b^Addhāna^eb^nti dīghakālaṃ. Kittako pana soti āha ^b^‘‘dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe’’^eb^ti, dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ rājūnaṃ rajjapasāsanapaṭipāṭiyoti attho. ‘‘Addhagate’’ti vatvā kathaṃ vayogahaṇaṃ osānavayāpekkhanti āha ^b^‘‘pacchimavayaṃ anuppatte’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pacchimo tatiyabhāgo^eb^ti sattasaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pacchimavayo koṭṭhāso.

[03]Dutiye ^a^M1.0338^ea^ atthavikappe ^b^jiṇṇe^eb^ti nāyaṃ jiṇṇatā vayomattena, atha kho kulaparivaṭṭena purāṇatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘jiṇṇeti porāṇe’’^eb^tiādi. Tena tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ kulavasena uditoditabhāvamāha. ‘‘Vayoanuppatte’’ti iminā jātivuḍḍhiyā vakkhamānattā guṇavuḍḍhiyā tato sātisayattā ca ^b^‘‘vuḍḍheti sīlācārādiguṇavuḍḍhiyutte’’^eb^ti āha. Tathā jātimahallakatāyapi teneva vakkhamānattā ^b^mahallake^eb^ti padena vibhavamahattatā yojitā. ^b^Maggapaṭipanne^eb^ti brāhmaṇānaṃ paṭipattividhiṃ upagate taṃ avokkamma caraṇato. ^b^Antimavaya^eb^nti pacchimavayaṃ.

[03]Paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāma āsanā vuṭṭhānanti āha ^b^‘‘nāsanā vuṭṭhahatī’’^eb^ti, nisinnāsanato na vuṭṭhātīti attho. Ettha ca jiṇṇe…pe… vayoanuppatteti upayogavacanaṃ āsanā vuṭṭhānakiriyāpekkhaṃ na hoti, tasmā jiṇṇe…pe… vayoanuppatte disvāti ajjhāhāraṃ katvā attho veditabbo. Atha vā paccuggamanakiriyāpekkhaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, tasmā ^b^na paccuṭṭhetī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0297^ea^ uṭṭhāya paccuggamanaṃ na karotīti attho veditabbo. Paccuggamanampi hi paccuṭṭhānanti vuccati. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘ācariyaṃ pana dūratova disvā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanakaraṇaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāmā’’ti. Nāsanā vuṭṭhātīti iminā pana paccuggamanābhāvassa upalakkhaṇamattaṃ dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Vibhāvane nāma atthe^eb^ti pakativibhāvanasaṅkhāte atthe, ^b^na abhivādeti vā^eb^ti na abhivādetabbanti sallakkhetīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Taṃ aññāṇa^eb^nti ‘‘ayaṃ mama abhivādanādīni kātuṃ araharūpo na hotī’’ti ajānanavasena pavattaṃ aññāṇaṃ. ^b^Olokento^eb^ti ‘‘dukkhaṃ kho agāravo viharati appatisso, kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā sakkareyyaṃ, garuṃ kareyya’’ntiādisuttavasena (a. ni. 4.21) ñāṇacakkhunā olokento. ^b^Nipaccakārāraha^eb^nti paṇipātārahaṃ. ^b^Sampatijāto^eb^ti muhuttajāto, jātasamanantaramevāti vuttaṃ hoti. Uttarena mukhoti ^b^uttarābhimukho,^eb^ uttaradisābhimukhoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Sattapadavītihārena gantvā sakalaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokesi^eb^nti idaṃ ‘‘dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, sampatijāto bodhisatto samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati, setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne ^a^M1.0339^ea^ sabbā disā viloketi, āsabhiñca vācaṃ bhāsatī’’ti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ (dī. ni. 2.31) sattapadavītihārūpariṭṭhitassa viya sabbadisānuvilokanassa kathitattā vuttaṃ, na panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, sattapadavītihārato pageva disāvilokanassa katattā. Mahāsatto hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā puratthimadisaṃ olokesi, anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṃ. Tattha devamanussā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamānā ‘‘mahāpurisa idha tumhehi sadisopi natthi, kuto uttaritaro’’ti āhaṃsu. Evaṃ catasso disā catasso anudisā heṭṭhā uparīti dasapi disā anuviloketvā attano sadisaṃ adisvā ‘‘ayaṃ uttarā disā’’ti sattapadavītihārena agamāsīti veditabbo. ^b^Olokesi^eb^nti mama puññānubhāvena lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriye jāte paññāyamānaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ maṃsacakkhunāva olokesinti attho.

[03]^b^Mahāpuriso^eb^ti jātigottakulappadesādivasena mahantapuriso. ^b^Aggo^eb^ti guṇehi sabbapadhāno. ^b^Jeṭṭho^eb^ti guṇavaseneva sabbesaṃ vuḍḍhatamo, guṇehi mahallakatamoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Seṭṭho^eb^ti guṇavaseneva sabbesaṃ pasatthatamo. Atthato pana pacchimāni dve purimasseva vevacanānīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Tayā^eb^ti nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Uttaritaro^eb^ti adhikataro. ^b^Patimānesī^eb^ti pūjesi. ^b^Āsabhi^eb^nti uttamaṃ. ^b^Mayhaṃ abhivādanādiraho puggalo^eb^ti mayhaṃ abhivādanādikiriyāya araho anucchaviko puggalo. Niccasāpekkhatāya panettha samāso daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Tathāgatā^eb^ti tathāgatato, tathāgatassa ^a^V1.0298^ea^ santikāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Evarūpa^eb^nti abhivādanādisabhāvaṃ. ^b^Paripākasithilabandhana^eb^nti paripākena sithilabandhanaṃ.

[03]^b^3^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Taṃ vacana^eb^nti ‘‘nāhaṃ taṃ brāhmaṇā’’tiādivacanaṃ. ‘‘Nāhaṃ arasarūpo, mādisā vā arasarūpā’’ti vutte brāhmaṇo thaddho bhaveyya. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cittamudubhāvajananattha’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ayañhi pariyāyasaddo desanāvārakāraṇesu vattatī^eb^ti ettha pariyāyeti desetabbamatthaṃ avagameti bodhetīti ^b^pariyāyo,^eb^ desanā. Pariyāyati aparāparaṃ parivattetīti ^b^pariyāyo^eb^^a^M1.0340^ea^, vāro. Pariyāyati attano phalaṃ pariggahetvā vattati, tassa vā kāraṇabhāvaṃ gacchatīti ^b^pariyāyo,^eb^ kāraṇanti evaṃ pariyāyasaddassa desanāvārakāraṇesu pavatti veditabbā. ^b^Aññāya saṇṭhaheyyā^eb^ti arahatte patiṭṭhaheyya. ^b^Katamo pana so^eb^ti pariyāyāpekkho pulliṅganiddeso, katamo so pariyāyoti attho. ^b^Jātivasenā^eb^ti khattiyādijātivasena. ^b^Upapattivasenā^eb^ti devesu upapattivasena. ^b^Seṭṭhasammatānampī^eb^ti ^b^api^eb^-saddena pageva aseṭṭhasammatānanti dasseti. ^b^Abhinandantāna^eb^nti sappītikataṇhāvasena pamodamānānaṃ. ^b^Rajjantāna^eb^nti balavarāgavasena rajjantānaṃ. Rūpādiparibhogena uppannataṇhāyuttasomanassavedanā rūpato nibbattitvā hadayatappanato ambarasādayo viya ^b^‘‘rūparasā’’^eb^ti vuccanti. ^b^Āviñchantī^eb^ti ākaḍḍhanti. ^b^Vatthārammaṇādisāmaggiya^eb^nti vatthuārammaṇādikāraṇasāmaggiyaṃ. ^b^Anukkhipanto^eb^ti attukkaṃsanavasena kathite brāhmaṇassa asappāyabhāvato attānaṃ anukkhipanto anukkaṃsento.

[03]^b^Etasmiṃ panatthe karaṇe sāmivacana^eb^nti ‘‘jahitā’’ti etasmiṃ atthe. ^b^Tathāgatassā^eb^ti karaṇe sāmivacanaṃ, tathāgatena jahitāti attho. ^b^Mūla^eb^nti bhavamūlaṃ. ‘‘Tālavatthuvatthukatā’’ti vattabbe ‘‘oṭṭhamukho’’tiādīsu viya majjhepadalopaṃ katvā akārañca dīghaṃ katvā ‘‘tālāvatthukatā’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā’’^eb^ti. Tattha tālassa vatthu tālavatthu. Yathā ārāmassa vatthubhūtapubbo padeso ārāmassa abhāve ‘‘ārāmavatthū’’ti vuccati, evaṃ tālassa patiṭṭhitokāso samūlaṃ uddharite tāle padesamatte ṭhite tālassa vatthubhūtapubbattā ‘‘tālavatthū’’ti vuccati. ^b^Nesa^eb^nti rūparasādīnaṃ. Kathaṃ pana tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti āha ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi. Rūpādiparibhogena uppannataṇhāyuttasomanassavedanāsaṅkhātarūparasādīnaṃ cittasantānassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena vatthumatte cittasantāne kate’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^pubbe^eb^ti pure, sarāgakāleti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Tālāvatthukatāti vuccantī^eb^ti tālavatthu viya attano vatthussa katattā rūparasādayo ‘‘tālāvatthukatā’’ti vuccanti. Etena pahīnakilesānaṃ puna uppattiyā abhāvo dassito.

[03]^b^Aviruḷhidhammattā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0341^ea^^a^V1.0299^ea^ aviruḷhisabhāvatāya. Matthakacchinno tālo pattaphalādīnaṃ avatthubhūto tālāvatthūti āha ^b^‘‘matthakacchinnatālo viya katā’’^eb^ti. Etena ‘‘tālāvatthu viya katāti tālāvatthukatā’’ti ayaṃ viggaho dassito. Ettha pana avatthubhūto tālo viya katāti avatthutālākatāti vattabbe visesanassa padassa paranipātaṃ katvā ‘‘tālāvatthukatā’’ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iminā panatthena idaṃ dasseti – rūparasādivacanena vipākadhammadhammā hutvā pubbe uppannā kusalākusaladhammā gahitā, te uppannāpi matthakasadisānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ maggasatthena chinnattā āyatiṃ tālapattasadise vipākakkhandhe nibbattetuṃ asamatthā jātā, tasmā tālāvatthu viya katāti tālāvatthukatā rūparasādayoti. Imasmiñhi atthe ‘‘abhinandantāna’’nti iminā padena kusalasomanassampi saṅgahitanti vadanti.

[03]^b^Anabhāvaṃkatā^eb^ti ettha ^b^anu^eb^-saddo pacchā-saddena samānatthoti āha ^b^‘‘yathā nesaṃ pacchābhāvo na hotī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Anuabhāvaṃ gatā^eb^ti pacchā anuppattidhammatāvasena abhāvaṃ gatā vināsamupagatā, pahīnāti attho. ‘‘Imā anacchariyā gāthāyo paṭibhaṃsū’’ti (mahāva. 7, 8) ettha anacchariyasaddaṃ udāharaṇavasena dassento āha ^b^‘‘yathā anuacchariyā anacchariyā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^anuacchariyā^eb^ti savanakāle uparūpari vimhayakarāti attho.

[03]^b^Yañca kho tvaṃ vadesi, so pariyāyo na hotī^eb^ti yaṃ vandanādisāmaggirasābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ arasarūpatāya vadesi, taṃ kāraṇaṃ na hoti, na vijjatīti attho. Nanu ca brāhmaṇo yaṃ vandanādisāmaggirasābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ pariyāyaṃ sandhāya ‘‘arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo’’ti āha, so pariyāyo natthīti vutte vandanādīni bhagavā karotīti āpajjatīti imaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘kasmā pana bhagavā evamāhā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^4^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabbapariyāyesū^eb^ti sabbavāresu. ^b^Sandhāya bhāsitamatta^eb^nti yaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇo ‘‘nibbhogo bhavaṃ gotamo’’tiādimāha, bhagavā ca yaṃ sandhāya nibbhogatādiṃ attani anujānāti, taṃ sandhāya bhāsitamattaṃ ^a^M1.0342^ea^. ^b^Chandarāgaparibhogo^eb^ti chandarāgavasena paribhogo. ^b^Aparaṃ pariyāya^eb^nti aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ.

[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kulasamudācārakamma^eb^nti kulācārasaṅkhātaṃ kammaṃ, kulacārittanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Akiriya^eb^nti akaraṇabhāvaṃ. Duṭṭhu caritaṃ duccaritaṃ, kāyadvāre bāhullavuttito kāyato pavattaṃ duccaritanti ^b^kāyaduccaritaṃ^eb^. Taṃ sarūpato dassento ^b^‘‘tattha cā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Pāṇātipātaadinnādānamicchācāracetanā^eb^^a^V1.0300^ea^^b^veditabbā^eb^ti ettha (itivu. aṭṭha. 74) ^b^pāṇo^eb^ti paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ, vohārato satto. Jīvitindriyañcettha rūpārūpavasena veditabbaṃ. Rūpajīvitindriye hi vikopite itarampi taṃsambandhatāya vinassati. ^b^Satto^eb^ti ca khandhasantāno gahetabbo. Tattha hi sattapaññatti. Saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antarā eva atīva pātanaṃ atipāto, saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ pātananti attho. Atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ atipāto, pāṇassa atipāto ^b^pāṇātipāto,^eb^ pāṇavadho pāṇaghātoti vuttaṃ hoti. Atthato pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino parassa jīvitindriyupacchedakapayogasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānamaññatarappavattā vadhakacetanā. Yāya hi cetanāya vattamānassa jīvitindriyassa nissayabhūtesu mahābhūtesu upakkamakaraṇahetukamahābhūtapaccayā uppajjanakamahābhūtā nuppajjissanti, sā tādisappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pāṇātipāto. Laddhupakkamāni hi bhūtāni itarabhūtāni viya na visadānīti samānajātiyānaṃ kāraṇāni na honti.

[03]Etthāha – khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu ko hantā, ko vā haññati, yadi cittacetasikasantāno, so arūpatāya na chedanabhedanādivasena vikopanasamattho, napi vikopanīyo. Atha rūpasantāno, so acetanatāya kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamoti na tattha chedanādinā pāṇātipāto labbhati yathā matasarīre. Payogopi pāṇātipātassa paharaṇappahārādi atītesu vā saṅkhāresu bhaveyya anāgatesu vā paccuppannesu vā, tattha na tāva atītānāgatesu sambhavati tesaṃ abhāvato, paccuppannesu ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikattā saraseneva ^a^M1.0343^ea^ nirujjhanasabhāvatāya vināsābhimukhesu nippayojano payogo siyā, vināsassa ca kāraṇarahitattā na paharaṇappahārādippayogahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ, nirīhakatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ kassa so payogo, khaṇikattā vadhādhippāyasamakālabhijjanato kassa kiriyā, pariyosānakālānavaṭṭhānato kassa vā pāṇātipātakammabaddhoti?

[03]Vuccate – yathāvuttavadhakacetanāsahito saṅkhārānaṃ puñjo sattasaṅkhāto hantā. Tena pavattitavadhappayoganimittaṃ apagatusmāviññāṇajīvitindriyo matavohārappavattinibandhano yathāvuttavadhappayogakaraṇe uppajjanāraho rūpārūpadhammasamūho haññati, kevalo vā cittacetasikasantāno. Vadhappayogāvisayabhāvepi tassa pañcavokārabhave rūpasantānādhīnavuttitāya rūpasantāne parena payojitajīvitindriyupacchedakapayogavasena tannibbattivinibandhakavisadisarūpuppattiyā vihate vicchedo hotīti na pāṇātipātassa asambhavo, napi ahetuko pāṇātipāto, na ca payogo nippayojano. Paccuppannesu saṅkhāresu katapayogavasena tadanantaraṃ uppajjanārahassa saṅkhārakalāpassa ^a^V1.0301^ea^ tathā anuppattito khaṇikānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikamaraṇassa idha maraṇabhāvena anadhippetattā santatimaraṇassa ca yathāvuttanayena sahetukabhāvato na ahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ, na ca katturahito pāṇātipātapayogo nirīhakesupi saṅkhāresu sannihitatāmattena upakārakesu attano attano anurūpaphaluppādaniyatesu kāraṇesu kattuvohārasiddhito yathā ‘‘padīpo pakāseti, nisākarova candimā’’ti. Na ca kevalassa vadhādhippāyasahabhuno cittacetasikakalāpassa pāṇātipāto icchitabbo santānavasena avaṭṭhitasseva paṭijānanato. Santānavasena vattamānānañca padīpādīnaṃ atthakiriyā dissatīti attheva pāṇātipātena kammabaddho. Ayañca vicāro adinnādānādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ vibhāvetabbo.

[03]So (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.89; dha. sa. aṭṭha. akusalakammapathakathā) ca pāṇātipāto guṇavirahitesu tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo, mahante mahāsāvajjo. Kasmā? Payogamahantatāya, payogasamattepi vatthumahantatāya. Guṇavantesu manussādīsu ^a^M1.0344^ea^ appaguṇe pāṇe appasāvajjo, mahāguṇe mahāsāvajjo. Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve satipi kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo, tibbatāya mahāsāvajjoti veditabbo.

[03]Kāyavācāhi na dinnanti adinnaṃ, parasantakaṃ, tassa ādānaṃ ^b^adinnādānaṃ^eb^. Parassaharaṇaṃ theyyaṃ, corikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Atthato pana parapariggahe parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānamaññataradvārappavattā theyyacetanā. Taṃ hīne parasantake appasāvajjaṃ, paṇīte mahāsāvajjaṃ. Kasmā? Vatthupaṇītatāya. Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ, taṃtaṃguṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.

[03]Micchā caraṇaṃ ^b^micchācāro,^eb^ methunasamācāresu ekantanindito lāmakācāro. So pana lakkhaṇato asaddhammādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā. So panesa micchācāro sīlādiguṇavirahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo, sīlādiguṇasampanne mahāsāvajjo. Tassa cattāro sambhārā – agamanīyavatthu, tasmiṃ sevanacittaṃ, sevanapayogo, maggenamaggappaṭipattiadhivāsananti. Eko payogo sāhatthiko eva.

[03]Vacīdvāre bāhullavuttito vācato pavattaṃ duccaritanti ^b^vacīduccaritaṃ^eb^. Taṃ sarūpato dassento ^a^V1.0302^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘musāvādapisuṇavācāpharusavācāsamphappalāpacetanā veditabbā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^musā^eb^ti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu. Musā vadīyati vuccati etāyāti ^b^musāvādo,^eb^ atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā. So yamatthaṃ bhañjati, tassa appatāya appasāvajjo, mahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. Apica gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya natthīti ādinayappavatto appasāvajjo, sakkhinā hutvā atthabhañjanatthaṃ vutto mahāsāvajjo. Pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena ‘‘ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī’’ti pūraṇakathānayena pavatto appasāvajjo, adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana diṭṭhantiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo. Tassa cattāro sambhārā honti – atathaṃ vatthu, visaṃvādanacittaṃ, tajjo vāyāmo, parassa tadatthaviññāpananti. Eko payogo sāhatthikova. So kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā vācāya vā paravisaṃvādakakiriyākaraṇe ^a^M1.0345^ea^ daṭṭhabbo. Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ jānāti, ayaṃ kiriyāsamuṭṭhāpikacetanākkhaṇeyeva musāvādakammunā bajjhati. Yasmā pana yathā kāyakāyapaṭibaddhavācāhi paraṃ visaṃvādeti, tathā ‘‘idamassa bhaṇāhī’’ti āṇāpentopi, paṇṇaṃ likhitvā purato nissajjantopi, ‘‘ayaṃ attho evaṃ veditabbo’’ti kuṭṭādīsu likhitvā ṭhapentopi, tasmā ettha āṇattikanissaggiyathāvarāpi payogā yujjanti. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana anāgatattā vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbā.

[03]Pisatīti ^b^pisuṇā,^eb^ samagge satte avayavabhūte vagge bhinne karotīti attho. Niruttinayena vā piyasuññakaraṇato ^b^pisuṇā^eb^. Yāya hi vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, tassa hadaye attano piyabhāvaṃ, parassa ca piyasuññabhāvaṃ karoti, sā ^b^pisuṇavācā^eb^. Lakkhaṇato pana saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa paresaṃ vā bhedāya attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pisuṇavācā pisuṇaṃ vadati etāyāti katvā. Sā yassa bhedaṃ karoti, tassa appaguṇatāya appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjā. Tassā cattāro sambhārā – bhinditabbo paro, ‘‘iti ime nānā bhavissanti vinā bhavissantī’’ti bhedapurekkhāratā vā ‘‘iti ahaṃ piyo bhavissāmi vissāsiko’’ti piyakamyatā vā, tajjo vāyāmo, tassa tadatthavijānananti. Pare pana abhinne kammapathabhedo natthi, bhinne eva hoti.

[03]Pharusayatīti ^b^pharusā,^eb^ vācā. Yāya hi vācāya attānampi parampi pharusaṃ sinehābhāvena lūkhaṃ karoti, sā ^b^pharusavācā^eb^. Atha vā sayampi pharusā domanassasamuṭṭhitattā sabhāvenapi kakkasā neva kaṇṇasukhā na hadayasukhāti ^b^pharusavācā^eb^. Ettha pana paresaṃ mammacchedanavasena pavattiyā ekantaniṭṭhuratāya sabhāvena kāraṇavohārena ca vācāya pharusasaddappavatti ^a^V1.0303^ea^ daṭṭhabbā. Taṃ pharusaṃ vadati etāyāti pharusavācā, parassa mammacchedakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā ekantapharusā cetanā. Tassā āvibhāvatthamidaṃ vatthu – eko kira dārako mātu vacanaṃ anādiyitvā araññaṃ gacchati, taṃ mātā nivattetuṃ asakkontī ‘‘caṇḍā taṃ mahiṃsī anubandhatū’’ti akkosi. Athassa tatheva araññe mahiṃsī uṭṭhāsi. Dārako ‘‘yaṃ mama mātā mukhena kathesi, taṃ mā hotu. Yaṃ cittena cintesi, taṃ hotū’’ti saccakiriyamakāsi. Mahiṃsī tattheva baddhā viya aṭṭhāsi ^a^M1.0346^ea^. Evaṃ mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti. Mātāpitaro hi kadāci puttake evampi vadanti ‘‘corā vo khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ karontū’’ti, uppalapattampi ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti. Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti ‘‘kiṃ ime ahirikā anottappino caranti, niddhamatha ne’’ti. Atha ca nesaṃ āgamādhigamasampattiṃ icchanti, yathā cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti, evaṃ vacanasaṇhatāya apharusavācāpi na hoti. Na hi mārāpetukāmassa ‘‘imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā’’ti vacanaṃ apharusavācā hoti, cittapharusatāya pana esā pharusavācāva. Sā yaṃ sandhāya pavattitā, tassa appaguṇatāya appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjā. Tassā tayo sambhārā – akkositabbo paro, kupitacittaṃ, akkosanāti.

[03]Saṃ sukhaṃ hitañca phalati visarati vināsetīti samphaṃ, attano paresañca anupakārakaṃ yaṃ kiñci, samphaṃ palapati etāyāti ^b^samphappalāpo,^eb^ anatthaviññāpikakāyavacīpayogasamauṭṭhāpikā akusalacetanā. So āsevanamandatāya appasāvajjo, āsevanamahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. Tassa dve sambhārā – bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādiniratthakakathāpurekkhāratā, tathārūpīkathākathanañca. Pare pana taṃ kathaṃ agaṇhante kammapathabhedo natthi, parena pana samphappalāpe gahiteyeva hoti.

[03]^b^Abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiyo^eb^ti ettha parasampattiṃ abhimukhaṃ jhāyatīti ^b^abhijjhā,^eb^ parasampattīsu lobho. Sā pana ‘‘aho vata idaṃ mamassā’’ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā. Adinnādānaṃ viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca. Tassā dve sambhārā – parabhaṇḍaṃ, attano pariṇāmanañca. Parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti, yāva ‘‘aho vata idaṃ mamassā’’ti attano na pariṇāmeti.

[03]Hitasukhaṃ byāpādeti vināsetīti ^b^byāpādo,^eb^ paṭigho. So paravināsāya manopadosalakkhaṇo ^a^V1.0304^ea^. So pharusavācā viya appasāvajjo mahāsāvajjo ca. Tassa dve sambhārā – parasatto, tassa ca vināsanacintā. Parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti, yāva ‘‘aho vatāyaṃ ucchijjeyya vinasseyyā’’ti tassa vināsanaṃ na cinteti.

[03]Yathābhuccagahaṇābhāvena ^a^M1.0347^ea^ micchā passatīti ^b^micchādiṭṭhi^eb^. Sā ‘‘natthi dinna’’ntiādinā nayena viparītadassanalakkhaṇā. Samphappalāpo viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca. Apica aniyatā appasāvajjā, niyatā mahāsāvajjā. Tassa dve sambhārā – vatthuno gahitākāraviparītatā, yathā ca taṃ gaṇhāti, tathābhāvena tassupaṭṭhānanti. Tattha natthikāhetukaaariyadiṭṭhīhi eva kammapathabhedo hoti.

[03]‘‘Anekavihitānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammāna’’nti sāmaññavacanepi pārisesañāyato vuttāvasesā akusalā dhammā gahetabbāti āha ^b^‘‘ṭhapetvā te dhamme’’^eb^tiādi. Te yathāvuttakāyaduccaritādike akusaladhamme ṭhapetvāti attho. ^b^Anekavihitā^eb^ti anekappakārā.

[03]^b^6^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ayaṃ lokatantī^eb^ti ayaṃ vuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanādikiriyālakkhaṇā lokappaveṇī. Anāgāmibrahmānaṃ alaṅkārādīsu anāgāmibhikkhūnañca cīvarādīsu nikantivasena rāguppatti hotīti anāgāmimaggena pañcakāmaguṇikarāgasseva pahānaṃ veditabbanti āha ^b^‘‘pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassā’’^eb^ti. Rūpādīsu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu vatthukāmakoṭṭhāsesu uppajjamāno rāgo ‘‘pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo’’ti veditabbo. Koṭṭhāsavacano hettha guṇasaddo ‘‘vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 1.4) viya. ^b^Dvīsu akusalacittesū^eb^ti domanassasahagatesu dvīsu akusalacittesu. Mohassa sabbākusalasādhāraṇattā āha ^b^‘‘sabbākusalasambhavassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Avasesāna^eb^nti sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ.

[03]^b^7^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jigucchati maññe^eb^ti ‘‘ahamabhijāto rūpavā paññavā, kathaṃ nāma aññesaṃ abhivādanādiṃ kareyya’’nti jigucchati viya jigucchatīti vā sallakkhemi. ^b^Akosallasambhūtaṭṭhenā^eb^ti aññāṇasambhūtaṭṭhena. Akusale dhamme jigucchamāno tesaṃ samaṅgībhāvampi jigucchatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samāpattī^eb^ti etasseva vevacanaṃ ^b^samāpajjanā samaṅgibhāvo^eb^ti. ^b^Maṇḍanakajātiyo^eb^ti maṇḍanasabhāvo, maṇḍanasīloti attho. ^b^Jegucchita^eb^nti jigucchanasīlataṃ.

[03]^b^8^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Lokajeṭṭhakakamma^eb^nti ^a^V1.0305^ea^ loke jeṭṭhakānaṃ kattabbakammaṃ, loke vā seṭṭhasammataṃ kammaṃ. ^b^Tatrā^eb^ti yathāvuttesu dvīsupi atthavikappesu. Padābhihito ^a^M1.0348^ea^ attho ^b^padattho,^eb^ byañjanatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Vinayaṃ vā arahatī^eb^ti ettha vinayanaṃ vinayo, niggaṇhananti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘niggahaṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. Nanu ca paṭhamaṃ vuttesu dvīsupi atthavikappesu sakatthe arahatthe ca bhaddhitapaccayo saddalakkhaṇato dissati, na pana ‘‘vinayāya dhammaṃ desetī’’ti imasmiṃ atthe, tasmā kathamettha taddhitapaccayoti āha ^b^‘‘vicitrā hi taddhitavuttī’’^eb^ti. Vicitratā cettha lokappamāṇato veditabbā. Tathā hi yasmiṃ yasmiṃ atthe taddhitappayogo lokassa, tattha tattha taddhitavutti lokato siddhāti vicitrā taddhitavutti. Tasmā yathā ‘‘mā saddamakāsī’’ti vadanto ‘‘māsaddiko’’ti vuccati, evaṃ vinayāya dhammaṃ desetīti venayikoti vuccatīti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^9^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kapaṇapuriso^eb^ti guṇavirahitatāya dīnamanusso. ^b^Byañjanāni avicāretvā^eb^ti tissadattādisaddesu viya ‘‘imasmiṃ atthe ayaṃ nāma paccayo’’ti evaṃ byañjanaṃ vicāraṃ akatvā, anipphannapāṭipadikavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^10^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Devalokagabbhasampattiyā^eb^ti vatvā ṭhapetvā bhummadeve sesesu devesu gabbhaggahaṇassa abhāvato paṭisandhiyevettha gabbhasampattīti veditabbāti vuttamevatthaṃ vivaritvā dassento āha ^b^‘‘devalokapaṭisandhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Assā^eb^ti abhivādanādisāmīcikammassa. ^b^Mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassento^eb^ti mātito aparisuddhabhāvaṃ dassento, akkositukāmassa dāsiyā puttoti dāsikucchismiṃ nibbattabhāve dosaṃ dassetvā akkosanaṃ viya bhagavato mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassetvā akkosantopi evamāhāti adhippāyo. ^b^Gabbhato^eb^ti devalokapaṭisandhito. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘abhabbo devalokūpapattiṃ pāpuṇitunti adhippāyo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbho^eb^ti imassa viggahassa ekena pariyāyena adhippāyaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘devalokagabbhaparibāhirattā āyatiṃ hīnagabbhapaṭilābhabhāgītī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Iti-saddā^eb^^a^M1.0349^ea^e hetuattho, yasmā āyatimpi hīnagabbhapaṭilābhabhāgī, tasmā hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbhoti adhippāyo.

[03]Puna tasseva viggahassa ^b^kodhavasena…pe… dassento^eb^ti heṭṭhā vuttanayassa anurūpaṃ katvā adhippāyaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘hīno vāssa mātukucchismiṃ gabbhavāso ahosīti adhippāyo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gabbha^eb^-saddo atthi mātukucchipariyāyo ‘‘gabbhe vasati māṇavo’’tiādīsu (jā. 1.15.363) viya ^a^V1.0306^ea^. Atthi mātukucchismiṃ nibbattasattapariyāyo ‘‘antamaso gabbhapātanaṃ upādāyā’’tiādīsu (mahāva. 129) viya. Tattha mātukucchipariyāyaṃ gahetvā atthaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘anāgate gabbhaseyyā’’^eb^ti. Gabbhe seyyā ^b^gabbhaseyyā. Anuttarena maggenā^eb^ti aggamaggena. Kammakilesānaṃ maggena vihatattā āha ^b^‘‘vihatakāraṇattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itarā tissopī^eb^ti aṇḍajasaṃsedajaopapātikā. Ettha ca yadipi ‘‘apagabbho’’ti imassa anurūpato gabbhaseyyā eva vattabbā, pasaṅgato pana labbhamānaṃ sabbampi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti punabbhavābhinibbattipi vuttāti veditabbā.

[03]Idāni sattapariyāyassa gabbhasaddassa vasena viggahanānattaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi. Imasmiṃ pana vikappe ^b^gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbattī^eb^ti ubhayampi gabbhaseyyavaseneva vuttantipi vadanti. Nanu ca ‘‘āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā pahīnā’’ti (pārā. 10) vuttattā gabbhassa seyyā eva pahīnā, na pana gabbhoti āpajjatīti āha ^b^‘‘yathā cā’’^eb^tiādi. Atha ‘‘abhinibbattī’’ti ettakameva avatvā punabbhavaggahaṇaṃ kimatthanti āha ^b^‘‘abhinibbatti ca nāmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Apunabbhavabhūtā^eb^ti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbatti.

[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhammadhātu^eb^nti ettha dhamme anavasese dhāreti yāthāvato upadhāretīti dhammadhātu, dhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvato avabujjhanasabhāvo, sabbaññutaññāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^Paṭivijjhitvā^eb^ti sacchikatvā, paṭilabhitvāti attho, paṭilābhahetūti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Desanāvilāsappatto hotī^eb^ti rucivasena parivattetvā desetuṃ samatthatā desanāvilāso, taṃ patto adhigatoti attho. ^b^Karuṇāvipphāra^eb^nti sabbasattesu mahākaruṇāya pharaṇaṃ. Tādiguṇalakkhaṇameva puna upamāya vibhāvetvā ^a^M1.0350^ea^ dassento āha ^b^‘‘pathavīsamacittata’’^eb^nti. Yathā pathavī suciasucinikkhepachedanabhedanādīsu na vikampati, anurodhavirodhaṃ na pāpuṇāti, evaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu lābhālābhādīsu anurodhavirodhappahānato avikampitacittatāya pathavīsamacittatanti attho. ^b^Akuppadhammata^eb^nti ettha ‘‘akuppadhammo nāma phalasamāpattī’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Paresu pana akkosantesupi attano pathavīsamacittatālakkhaṇaṃ akujjhanasabhāvatanti evamettha attho gahetabbo’’ti amhākaṃ khanti. ^b^Jarāya anusaṭa^eb^nti jarāya paliveṭhitaṃ. ^b^Vaṭṭakhāṇubhūta^eb^nti anekesaṃ anayabyasanānaṃ nipātalakkhaṇatthambhabhūtatāya saṃsārakhāṇubhūtaṃ. Brāhmaṇassa vuḍḍhatāya āsannavuttimaraṇanti sambhāvanavasena ^b^‘‘ajja maritvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Mahantena kho pana ussāhenā^eb^ti ‘‘sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī’’ti evaṃ sañjātamahussāhena. ^b^Appaṭisamaṃ purejātabhāva^eb^nti ^a^V1.0307^ea^ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ purejātabhāvaṃ. Natthi etassa paṭisamoti ^b^appaṭisamo,^eb^ purejātabhāvo.

[03]‘‘Apī’’ti avatvā ‘‘pī’’ti vadanto pi-saddopi visuṃ atthi nipātoti dasseti. ^b^Sambhāvanatthe^eb^ti ‘‘api nāmevaṃ siyā’’ti vikappanattho sambhāvanattho, tasmiṃ jotakatāya pisaddo vattati. ^b^Vacanasiliṭṭhatāyā^eb^ti vacanassa madhurabhāvatthaṃ, mudubhāvatthanti attho. ^b^Evañhi loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hotī^eb^ti evaṃ ekameva gaṇanaṃ avatvā aparāya gaṇanāya saddhiṃ vacanaṃ loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hoti yathā ‘‘dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitānī’’ti. ^b^Sammā adhisayitānī^eb^ti pādādīhi attanā nesaṃ kiñci upaghātaṃ akarontiyā bahivātādiparissayaparihāratthaṃ sammadeva upari sayitāni. Upariattho hettha ^b^adhi^eb^-saddo. ^b^Utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā^eb^ti tesaṃ allasinehapariyādānatthaṃ attano kāyusmāvasena utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘usmīkatānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sammā paribhāvitānī^eb^ti sammadeva sabbaso kukkuṭavāsanāya vāsitāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kukkuṭagandhaṃ gāhāpitānī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Ettha ca sammā parisedanaṃ kukkuṭagandhaparibhāvanañca sammā adhisayananipphattiyā ānubhāvanipphāditanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sammā adhisayaneneva hi itaradvayaṃ ijjhati ^a^M1.0351^ea^. Na hi sammā adhisayanato visuṃ sammā parisedanassa sammā paribhāvanassa ca karaṇaṃ atthi, tena pana saddhiṃyeva itaresaṃ dvinnampi ijjhanato vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ tīhi pakārehi tāni aṇḍāni paripāliyamānānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nakhasikhā^eb^ti nakhaggāni. ^b^Mukhatuṇḍaka^eb^nti mukhaggaṃ. ^b^Kapālassa tanukattā^eb^ti ettha yathā kapālassa tanutā ālokassa anto paññāyamānassa kāraṇaṃ, tathā kapālassa tanutāya nakhasikhāmukhatuṇḍakānaṃ kharatāya ca allasinehapariyādānaṃ kāraṇavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Saṅkuṭitahatthapādā^eb^ti ettha ^b^hatthā^eb^ti pakkhā. Na hi kukkuṭānaṃ pakkhato añño hattho nāma atthi. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ālokaṭṭhāne. ^b^Pakkhe vidhunantā^eb^ti pakkhe cālentā. ^b^Nikkhamantāna^eb^nti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ, nikkhamantesūti attho.

[03]^b^So jeṭṭho iti assa vacanīyo^eb^ti yo paṭhamataraṃ aṇḍakosato nikkhanto kukkuṭapotako, soyeva jeṭṭhoti vacanīyo assa, bhaveyyāti attho. ^b^Sampaṭipādento^eb^ti saṃsandento. Tibhūmakapariyāpannāpi sattā avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhā tattha tattha appahīnāya avijjāya veṭhitattāti āha ^b^‘‘avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhesu sattesū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aṇḍakosa^eb^nti bījakapālaṃ. ^b^Lokasannivāse^eb^ti loko eva lokasannivāso. ^b^Sammāsambodhi^eb^nti ettha ^a^V1.0308^ea^^b^sammā^eb^ti aviparītattho, ^b^saṃ^eb^-saddo sāmanti imamatthaṃ dīpeti, tasmā sammā aviparītenākārena sayameva cattāri saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhatīti sammāsambodhīti maggo vuccati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sammā sāmañca bodhi’’^eb^nti, sammā sayameva ca bujjhanakanti attho. ^b^Sammā^eb^ti vā pasatthavacano, ^b^saṃ^eb^-saddo sundaravacanoti āha ^b^‘‘atha vā pasatthaṃ sundarañca bodhi’’^eb^nti. Bodhisaddassa anekatthataṃ dassetvā idhādhippetamatthaṃ niddhāretvā dassetukāmo āha ^b^‘‘bodhīti rukkhopi maggopī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha abujjhi etthāti ^b^rukkho^eb^ bodhi. Sayaṃ bujjhati, bujjhanti vā tena ariyāti ^b^maggo^eb^ bodhi. Sabbadhamme sabbākārato bujjhati paṭivijjhatīti ^b^sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ^eb^ bodhi. Bujjhīyati sacchikarīyatīti ^b^nibbānaṃ^eb^ bodhi. ^b^Antarā ca bodhi^eb^nti dutiyamudāharaṇaṃ vināpi rukkhasaddena bodhisaddassa rukkhe pavattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Varabhūrimedhaso^eb^ti mahāpathavī viya patthaṭavarapaññoti attho. ^b^Asabbaguṇadāyakattā^eb^ti sabbaguṇānaṃ adāyakattā. Sabbaguṇe na dadātīti hi ^a^M1.0352^ea^ asabbaguṇadāyako, ayuttasamāsoyaṃ gamakattā yathā ‘‘asūriyaṃpassāni mukhānī’’ti.

[03]^b^Tisso vijjā^eb^ti upanissayavato saheva arahattaphalena tisso vijjā deti. Nanu cettha tīsu vijjāsu āsavakkhayañāṇassa maggapariyāpannattā kathametaṃ yujjati ‘‘maggo tisso vijjā detī’’ti? Nāyaṃ doso. Satipi āsavakkhayañāṇassa maggapariyāpannabhāve aṭṭhaṅgike magge sati maggañāṇena saddhiṃ tisso vijjā paripuṇṇā hontīti ‘‘maggo tisso vijjā detī’’ti vuccati. ^b^Cha abhiññā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Sāvakapāramiñāṇa^eb^nti aggasāvakehi paṭilabhitabbaṃ sabbameva lokiyalokuttarañāṇaṃ. ^b^Paccekabodhiñāṇa^eb^nti etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. ^b^Abbhaññāsi^eb^nti jāniṃ. Jānanañca na anussavādivasenāti āha ^b^‘‘paṭivijjhi’’^eb^nti, paccakkhamakāsinti attho. Paṭivedhopi na dūre ṭhitassa lakkhaṇappaṭivedho viyāti āha ^b^‘‘pattomhī’’^eb^ti, pāpuṇinti attho. Pāpuṇanañca na sayaṃ gantvāti āha ^b^‘‘adhigatomhī’’^eb^ti, sakasantāne uppādanavasena paṭilabhinti attho.

[03]^b^Opammasampaṭipādana^eb^nti opammatthassa upameyyena sammadeva paṭipādanaṃ. ^b^Atthenā^eb^ti upameyyatthena. Yathā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ kukkuṭacchāpakānaṃ aṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇaṃ, evaṃ bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanākaraṇaṃ avijjaṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘yathā hi tassā kukkuṭiyā…pe… tividhānupassanākaraṇa’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Santāne’’ti vuttattā aṇḍasadisatā santānassa bahi nikkhantakukkuṭacchāpakasadisatā buddhaguṇānaṃ, buddhaguṇāti ca atthato buddhoyeva ‘‘tathāgatassa kho ^a^V1.0309^ea^ etaṃ, vāseṭṭha, adhivacanaṃ dhammakāyo itipī’’ti vacanato. ^b^Avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo^eb^ti balavavipassanāvasena avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo, paṭicchādanasāmaññena ca avijjāya aṇḍakosasadisatā. Mudubhūtassapi kharabhāvāpatti hotīti tannivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘thaddhakharabhāvo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tikkhakharavippasannasūrabhāvo^eb^ti ettha pariggayhamānesu saṅkhāresu vipassanāñāṇassa samādhindriyavasena sukhānuppaveso ^b^tikkhatā,^eb^ anupavisitvāpi satindriyavasena anatikkamanato akuṇṭhatā ^b^kharabhāvo^eb^. Tikkhopi hi ekacco saro lakkhaṃ patvā kuṇṭho hoti, na tathā idaṃ. Satipi kharabhāve sukhumappavattivasena ^a^M1.0353^ea^ kilesasamudācārasaṅkhobharahitatāya saddhindriyavasena ^b^pasannabhāvo,^eb^ satipi ca pasannabhāve antarā anosakkitvā kilesapaccatthikānaṃ suṭṭhu abhibhavanato vīriyindriyavasena ^b^sūrabhāvo^eb^ veditabbo. Evamimehi pakārehi saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇameva gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Vipassanāñāṇassa pariṇāmakālo^eb^ti vipassanāya vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvappatti, tadā ca sā maggañāṇagabbhaṃ dhārentī viya hotīti āha ^b^‘‘gabbhaggahaṇakālo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā^eb^ti saṅkhārupekkhāya anantaraṃ sikhāppattaanulomavipassanāvasena maggavijāyanatthaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā. ^b^Anupubbādhigatenā^eb^ti paṭhamamaggapaṭipāṭiyā adhigatena. ^b^Abhiññāpakkhe^eb^ti lokiyābhiññāpakkhe. Lokuttarābhiññā hi avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padālitā. Potthakesu pana katthaci ‘‘chaabhiññāpakkhe’’ti likhanti, so apāṭhoti veditabbo. ^b^Jeṭṭho seṭṭho^eb^ti vuddhatamattā ^b^jeṭṭho,^eb^ sabbaguṇehi uttamattā pasatthatamoti ^b^seṭṭho^eb^.

[03]Idāni ‘‘āraddhaṃ kho pana me brāhmaṇa vīriya’’ntiādikāya desanāya anusandhiṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ bhagavā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^pubbabhāgato pabhutī^eb^ti bhāvanāya pubbabhāgiyavīriyārambhādito paṭṭhāya. ^b^Cittamevamuppanna^eb^nti evaṃ upari vakkhamānaparivitakkavasena cittamuppannanti attho. ‘‘Cittameva uppanna’’ntipi pāṭho, tattha cittameva uppannaṃ, na tāva bhagavati pasādoti attho. ^b^Muṭṭhassatinā^eb^ti vinaṭṭhassatinā, sativirahitenāti attho. ^b^Sāraddhakāyenā^eb^ti sadarathakāyena. ^b^Bodhimaṇḍe^eb^ti bodhisaṅkhātassa ñāṇassa maṇḍabhāvappatte ṭhāne. Bodhīti hi paññā vuccati, sā ettha maṇḍā pasannā jātāti so padeso ‘‘bodhimaṇḍo’’ti paññāto. ^b^Caturaṅgasamannāgata^eb^nti ‘‘kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu, sarīre upasussatu maṃsalohita’’nti (ma. ni. 2.184; saṃ. ni. 2.22; a. ni. 2.5; mahāni. 196) evaṃ vuttacaturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ. Tattha tacoti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ nhāru ekaṃ aṅgaṃ aṭṭhi ekaṃ aṅgaṃ maṃsalohitaṃ ekaṃ aṅganti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Taco ekaṃ aṅga^eb^nti ca tace nirapekkhabhāvo ekaṃ aṅganti gahetabbaṃ. Padhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa hi tace palujjamānepi taṃnimittaṃ avosānāpajjanaṃ tassa vīriyassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi ^a^V1.0310^ea^ attho veditabbo. ^b^Paggahita^eb^nti ārambhaṃ sithilaṃ ^a^M1.0354^ea^ akatvā daḷhaparakkamasaṅkhātussāhanabhāvena gahitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘asithilappavattitanti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Asallīna^eb^nti asaṅkucitaṃ kosajjavasena saṅkocaṃ anāpannaṃ. ^b^Upaṭṭhitā^eb^ti ogāhanasaṅkhātena apilāpabhāvena ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhitā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ārammaṇābhimukhībhāvenā’’^eb^ti. Sammosassa viddhaṃsanavasena pavattiyā na sammuṭṭhāti ^b^asammuṭṭhā^eb^. Kiñcāpi cittapassaddhivaseneva cittameva passaddhaṃ, kāyapassaddhivaseneva ca kāyo passaddho hoti, tathāpi yasmā kāyapassaddhi uppajjamānā cittapassaddhiyā saheva uppajjati, na vinā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kāyacittapassaddhivasenā’’^eb^ti. Kāyapassaddhiyā ubhayesampi kāyānaṃ passambhanāvahattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^So ca kho^eb^ti so ca kho kāyo. ^b^Vigatadaratho^eb^ti vigatakilesadaratho. Nāmakāye hi vigatadarathe rūpakāyopi vūpasantadarathapariḷāho hoti. ^b^Sammā āhita^eb^nti nānārammaṇesu vidhāvanasaṅkhātaṃ vikkhepaṃ vicchinditvā ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe avikkhittabhāvāpādanena sammadeva āhitaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘suṭṭhu ṭhapita’’^eb^ntiādi. Cittassa anekaggabhāvo vikkhepavasena cañcalatā, sā sati ekaggatāya na hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti ‘‘āraddhaṃ kho panā’’tiādinā vīriyasatipassaddhisamādhīnaṃ kiccasiddhidassanena.

[03]Nanu ca saddhāpaññānampi kiccasiddhi jhānassa pubbapaṭipadāya icchitabbāti? Saccaṃ icchitabbā, sā pana nānantarikabhāvena avuttasiddhāti na gahitā. Asati hi saddhāya vīriyārambhādīnaṃ asambhavoyeva, paññāpariggahe ca nesaṃ asati ñāyārambhādibhāvo na siyā, tathā asallīnāsammosatādayo vīriyādīnanti asallīnatādiggahaṇenevettha paññākiccasiddhi gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Jhānabhāvanāyaṃ vā samādhikiccaṃ adhikaṃ icchitabbanti dassetuṃ samādhipariyosānāva jhānassa pubbapaṭipadā kathitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Idāni ‘‘vivicceva kāmehī’’tiādinayappavattāya pāḷiyā jhānavibhaṅge (vibha. 508) vuttampi atthaṃ aṭṭhakathānayeneva saṃvaṇṇetukāmo vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ vuttanayena avacane kāraṇaṃ ^a^V1.0311^ea^ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kiñcāpi tattha katame kāmā’’^eb^tiādimāha ^a^M1.0355^ea^. Tattha patthanākārena pavatto dubbalo lobho chandanaṭṭhena ^b^chando,^eb^ tato balavā rañjanaṭṭhena ^b^rāgo,^eb^ tatopi balavataro bahalarāgo ^b^chandarāgo^eb^. Nimittānubyañjanāni saṅkappeti etenāti ^b^saṅkappo,^eb^ tathāpavatto lobho. Tattha ^b^nimittasaṅkappanā^eb^ nāma avayave samodhānetvā ‘‘itthī puriso’’tiādinā ekajjhaṃ katvā uparūpari kilesuppattiyā nimittassa kappanā. ^b^Anubyañjanasaṅkappanā^eb^ pana ‘‘hatthā sobhanā, pādā sobhanā’’ti evaṃ anubyañjanavasena vibhajitvā kappanāti. Kilesānañhi anu anu byañjanato paribyañjanato paribyattivasena uppattiyā paccayabhāvato anubyañjanaṃ hatthapādādiavayavā vuccanti. Tato balavā rañjanaṭṭhena ^b^rāgo,^eb^ saṅkappavaseneva pavatto tatopi balavataro ^b^saṅkapparāgo^eb^. Svāyaṃ pabhedo ekasseva lobhassa pavattiākāravasena avatthābhedavasena ca veditabbo yathā ‘‘vaccho dammo balībaddo’’ti. ^b^Kāmā^eb^ti kilesakāmā, kāmentīti kāmā, kāmenti etehīti vā.

[03]^b^Seyyathida^eb^nti imassa taṃ katamaṃ, taṃ kathanti vā attho. ^b^Viviccitvā^eb^ti visuṃ hutvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vinā hutvā apasakkitvā’’^eb^ti, pajahanavasena apakkamitvāti attho. ^b^Vivicceva kāmehī^eb^ti ettha ^b^viviccā^eb^ti iminā vivecanaṃ jhānakkhaṇe kāmānaṃ abhāvamattaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Viviccevā^eb^ti pana iminā ekaṃsato kāmānaṃ vivecetabbatādīpanena tappaṭipakkhatā jhānassa kāmavivekappahānassa ca jhānādhigamūpāyatā dassitā hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘paṭhamajjhāna’’^eb^ntiādiṃ vatvā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘katha’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Andhakāre sati padīpo viyā^eb^ti etena yathā padīpābhāvena rattiyaṃ andhakārābhibhavo, evaṃ jhānābhāvena cittasantatiyaṃ kāmābhibhavoti dasseti.

[03]^b^Eta^eb^nti pubbapadeyeva avadhāraṇavacanaṃ, na kho pana evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ‘‘kāmehi evā’’ti avadhāraṇassa akatattā. ^b^Tannissaraṇato^eb^ti nissaranti niggacchanti etena, ettha vāti nissaraṇaṃ. Ke niggacchanti? Kāmā. Tesaṃ kāmānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ pahānaṃ ^b^tannissaraṇaṃ,^eb^ tato kāmanissaraṇatoti attho. Kathaṃ pana samāne vikkhambhane kāmānamevetaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, na byāpādādīnanti codanaṃ yuttito āgamato ca sādhetuṃ ^b^‘‘kāmadhātū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^kāmadhātusamatikkamanato^eb^ti sakalassapi kāmabhavassa samatikkamapaṭipadābhāvato. Tena imassa jhānassa kāmapariññābhāvamāha ^a^M1.0356^ea^. ^b^Kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato^eb^ti ‘‘chando kāmo’’tiādinā (mahāni. 1) vuttavibhāgassa kilesakāmassa paccatthikabhāvato. Tena yathā mettā byāpādassa, karuṇā vihiṃsāya, evamidaṃ jhānaṃ kāmarāgassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtanti dasseti. Vipākena cettha kāmadhātusamatikkamo ^a^V1.0312^ea^ attano pavattikkhaṇe kāmarāgapaṭipakkhatā ca veditabbā. Evamattano pavattiyā vipākappavattiyā ca kāmarāgato kāmadhātuto ca vinivattasabhāvattā idaṃ jhānaṃ visesato kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ, svāyamattho pāṭhāgato evāti āha ^b^‘‘yathāhā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Nekkhamma^eb^nti paṭhamajjhānaṃ.

[03]Kāmañcettha tamatthaṃ dīpetuṃ purimapadeyeva avadhāraṇaṃ gahitaṃ, uttarapadepi pana taṃ gahetabbameva tathā atthasambhavatoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘uttarapadepī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ito^eb^ti kāmacchandato. ^b^Esa daṭṭhabbo^eb^ti esa niyamo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Sādhāraṇavacanenā^eb^ti sabbavivekasādhāraṇavacanena. Tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedapaṭippassaddhinissaraṇavivekā ^b^tadaṅgavivekādayo^eb^. Kāyacittaupadhivivekā ^b^kāyavivekādayo. Tayo eva idha daṭṭhabbā^eb^ti tayo eva idha jhānakathāyaṃ daṭṭhabbā samucchedavivekādīnaṃ asambhavato. ^b^Niddese^eb^ti mahāniddese (mahāni. 1). Tattha hi ‘‘uddānato dve kāmā vatthukāmā kilesakāmā cā’’ti uddisitvā tattha ‘‘katame vatthukāmā manāpiyā rūpā…pe… manāpiyā phoṭṭhabbā’’tiādinā vatthukāmā niddiṭṭhā. Te pana kāmīyantīti kāmāti veditabbā. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti niddeseyeva. ^b^Vibhaṅge^eb^ti jhānavibhaṅge. ^b^Evañhi satī^eb^ti evaṃ ubhayesampi kāmānaṃ saṅgahe sati. ^b^Vatthukāmehipī^eb^ti vatthukāmehi viviccevātipi attho yujjatīti evaṃ yujjamānatthantarasamuccayattho ^b^pi^eb^-saddo, na kilesakāmasamuccayattho. Kasmā? Imasmiṃ atthe kilesakāmehi vivekassa dutiyapadena vuttattā. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti vatthukāmavivekena. ^b^Kāyaviveko vutto hotī^eb^ti puttadārādipariggahavivekadīpanato kāyaviveko vutto hoti.

[03]^b^Purimenā^eb^ti kāyavivekena. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ‘‘vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī’’ti etasmiṃ padadvaye. Ito vā niddhārite vivekadvaye, akusalasaddena yadi kilesakāmā, sabbākusalāpi vā ^a^M1.0357^ea^ gahitā, sabbathā kilesakāmehi viveko vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘dutiyena kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dutiyenā^eb^ti ca cittavivekenāti attho. ^b^Etesa^eb^nti yathāvuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ. Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Taṇhādisaṃkilesānaṃ vatthuno pahānaṃ ^b^saṃkilesavatthuppahānaṃ^eb^. ^b^Lolabhāvo^eb^ nāma tattha tattha rūpādīsu taṇhuppādo, tassa hetū vatthukāmā eva veditabbā. Bālabhāvassa hetupariccāgoti sambandho. ^b^Bālabhāvo^eb^ nāma avijjā, ducintitacintitādi vā, tassa ayonisomanasikāro, sabbepi vā akusalā dhammā hetū. Kāmaguṇādhigamahetu pāṇātipātādiasuddhappayogo hotīti tabbivekena ^b^payogasuddhi^eb^ vibhāvitā. Taṇhāsaṃkilesasodhanena vivaṭṭūpanissayasaṃvaḍḍhanena ca ajjhāsayavisodhanaṃ ^b^āsayaposanaṃ. Āsayaposana^eb^nti ca jhānabhāvanāya paccayabhūtā pubbayogādivasena siddhā ajjhāsayasampadā ^a^V1.0313^ea^, sā pana taṇhupatāpavigamena hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘taṇhāsaṃkilesavisodhanenā’’ti. ^b^Kāmesū^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ.

[03]^b^Anekabhedo^eb^ti kāmāsavakāmarāgasaṃyojanādivasena rūpataṇhādivasena ca anekappabhedo. ^b^Kāmacchandoyevā^eb^ti kāmasabhāvoyeva chando, na kattukamyatāchando napi kusalacchandoti adhippāyo. ^b^Akusalapariyāpannopī^eb^ti ‘‘vivicca akusalehī’’ti ettha vuttaakusalesu antogadhopi. ^b^Jhānapaṭipakkhato^eb^ti jhānassa paṭipakkhabhāvato taṃhetu taṃnimittaṃ visuṃ vutto, akusalabhāvasāmaññena aggahetvā visuṃ sarūpena gahito. Yadi kilesakāmova purimapade vutto, taṃ kathaṃ bahuvacananti āha ^b^‘‘anekabhedato’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Aññesampī^eb^ti diṭṭhimānaahirikānottappādīnaṃ taṃsahitaphassādīnañca. ^b^Uparijhānaṅgapaccanīkapaṭipakkhabhāvadassanato^eb^ti ‘‘savitakkaṃ savicāra’’ntiādinā upari vuccamānāni jhānaṅgāni uparijhānaṅgāni, tesaṃ attano paccanīkānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvadassanato tappaccanīkanīvaraṇavacanaṃ. ‘‘Uparijhānaṅgānaṃ paccanīkapaṭipakkhabhāvadassanato’’tipi pāṭho. Tattha ^b^paccanīkapaṭipakkhabhāvadassanato^eb^ti upari vuccamānajhānaṅgānaṃ ujuvipaccanīkavasena paṭipakkhabhāvadassanatoti atthaṃ vadanti. ^b^Jhānaṅgapaccanīkānī^eb^ti jhānaṅgānaṃ pavattinivāraṇato jhānaṅgapaccanīkāni. ^b^Viddhaṃsakānī^eb^ti vighātakāni. ^b^Samādhi kāmacchandassa^eb^^a^M1.0358^ea^^b^paṭipakkho^eb^ti rāgapaṇidhiyā ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato nānārammaṇehi palobhitassa paribbhamantassa cittassa samādhānato kāmacchandassa samādhi paṭipakkho. ^b^Pīti byāpādassā^eb^ti pāmojjena samānayogakkhemattā byāpādassa pīti paṭipakkhā. ^b^Vitakko thinamiddhassā^eb^ti yoniso saṅkappanavasena savipphārappavattito vitakko thinamiddhassa paṭipakkho. ^b^Sukhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccassā^eb^ti sukhaṃ vūpasantasītalasabhāvattā avūpasamānutāpasabhāvassa uddhaccakukkuccassa paṭipakkhaṃ. ^b^Vicāro vicikicchāyā^eb^ti vicāro ārammaṇe anumajjanavasena paññāpatirūpasabhāvattā vicikicchāya paṭipakkho. Mahākaccānattherena desitā piṭakānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā peṭakaṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^peṭake^eb^.

[03]^b^Pañcakāmaguṇabhedavisayassā^eb^ti rūpādipañcakāmaguṇavisesavisayassa. ^b^Āghātavatthubhedādivisayāna^eb^nti byāpādavivekavacanena ‘‘anatthaṃ me acarī’’tiādiāghātavatthubhedavisayassa dosassa, mohādhikehi thinamiddhādīhi vivekavacanena paṭicchādanavasena dukkhādipubbantādibhedavisayassa mohassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto. Kāmarāgabyāpādatadekaṭṭhathinamiddhādivikkhambhakañcetaṃ sabbākusalapaṭipakkhasabhāvattā sabbakusalānaṃ, tena sabhāvena sabbākusalappahāyakaṃ ^a^V1.0314^ea^ hontampi kāmarāgādivikkhambhanasabhāvameva hoti taṃsabhāvattāti avisesetvā nīvaraṇākusalamūlādīnaṃ vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotīti āha.

[03]Yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ natthi kāci vasavattitāti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ ^b^‘‘vitakkanaṃ vitakko’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Vitakkana^eb^nti hi vitakkanakiriyā, sā ca vitakkassa attano paccayehi pavattimattamevāti bhāvaniddeso vasavattibhāvanivāraṇāya hoti. Tayidaṃ vitakkanaṃ ‘‘īdisamida’’nti ārammaṇaparikappananti āha ^b^‘‘ūhananti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā cittaṃ vitakkabalena ārammaṇaṃ abhiniruḷhaṃ viya hoti, tasmā so ārammaṇābhiniropanalakkhaṇo vutto. Yathā hi koci rājavallabhaṃ ñātiṃ vā mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati anupavisati, evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti? Vitakkabaleneva. Yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko rājagehaṃ pavisati, evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati. ^b^Paricayenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0359^ea^ ca santāne pavattavitakkabhāvanāsaṅkhātena paricayena. Vitakkassa hi santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇābhiruhanaṃ ciraparicitaṃ, tena taṃ kadāci vitakkena vināpi tattha pavattateva. Yathā taṃ ñāṇasahitaṃ hutvā sammasanavasena ciraparicitaṃ kadāci ñāṇarahitampi sammasanavasena pavattati, yathā vā kilesasahitaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ sabbaso kilesarahitampi paricayena kilesavāsanāvasena pavattati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Āhananapariyāhananaraso^eb^ti ādito, abhimukhaṃ vā hananaṃ ^b^āhananaṃ^eb^. Parito, parivattitvā vā āhananaṃ ^b^pariyāhananaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Rūpaṃ rūpaṃ, pathavī pathavī’’ti ākoṭentassa viya pavatti āhananaṃ pariyāhanananti ca veditabbaṃ. Yasmiñhi ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti, taṃ tassa gahaṇayogyaṃ karonto vitakko ākoṭento viya hoti. Yadi evaṃ nāgasenattherena ‘‘ākoṭanalakkhaṇo vitakko. Yathā, mahārāja, bherī ākoṭitā atha pacchā anuravati anusaddāyati, evameva kho, mahārāja, yathā ākoṭanā, evaṃ vitakko daṭṭhabbo. Atha pacchā anuravanā anusaddanā, evaṃ vicāro daṭṭhabbo’’ti ākoṭanalakkhaṇatā vitakkassa kasmā vuttā? Nāyaṃ virodho. Therena hi kiccasannissitaṃ katvā lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Dhammānañhi sabhāvavinimuttā kāci kiriyā nāma natthi tathā gahetabbākāro ca. Bodhaneyyajanānurodhena pana paramatthato ekībhāvopi sabhāvadhammo pariyāyavacanehi viya samāropitarūpehi bahūhi pakārehi ^a^V1.0315^ea^ pakāsīyati. Evañhi so suṭṭhu pakāsito hoti. ^b^Ānayanapaccupaṭṭhāno^eb^ti ettha ^b^ānayanaṃ^eb^ citte ārammaṇassa upanayanaṃ, ākaḍḍhanaṃ vā.

[03]^b^Anusañcaraṇaṃ^eb^ anuparibbhamanaṃ. Svāyaṃ viseso santānamhi labbhamāno eva santāne pākaṭo hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Anumajjana^eb^nti ārammaṇe cittassa anumasanaṃ, parimajjananti attho. Tathā hi ‘‘vicāro parimajjanahattho viya sañcaraṇahattho viyā’’ti ca vutto. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ārammaṇe. Sahajātānaṃ anuyojanaṃ ārammaṇe anuvicaraṇasaṅkhātaanumajjanavaseneva veditabbaṃ. Anuppabandhanaṃ ārammaṇe cittassa avicchinnassa viya pavatti. Tathā hi so ‘‘anuppabandhanatā’’ti niddiṭṭho. Teneva ca ‘‘ghaṇṭānuravo viya, paribbhamanaṃ viyā’’ti ca vutto. ^b^Katthacī^eb^ti paṭhamajjhāne ^a^M1.0360^ea^ parittacittuppādesu ca. ^b^Oḷārikaṭṭhenā^eb^ti vicārato oḷārikaṭṭhena. Yathā ghaṇṭābhighātasaddo paṭhamābhinipāto hoti, evaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhaniropanaṭṭhena vitakko cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto viya hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ghaṇṭābhighātasaddo viyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vipphāravā^eb^ti ettha ^b^vipphāro^eb^ nāma vitakkassa thinamiddhapaṭipakkho ārammaṇe anolīnatā asaṅkoco, so pana abhiniropanabhāvena calanaṃ viya hotīti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘paripphandanabhāvo cittassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paribbhamanaṃ viyā^eb^ti ettha parissayābhāvavīmaṃsanatthaṃ paribbhamananti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Dukanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana –

[08]‘‘Ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā pakkhe sannisīdāpetvā gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko, vātaggahaṇatthaṃ pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ viya anumajjanabhāvena pavatto vicāro’’ti –

[07]Vuttaṃ, taṃ anuppabandhanena pavattiyaṃ yujjati. Tathā hi upacāre vā appanāyaṃ vā santānena pavattiyaṃ vitakko niccalo hutvā ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya pavattati, na paṭhamābhinipāte pākaṭo hoti. Yathā hi apubbārammaṇe paṭhamābhinipātabhūto vitakko vipphāravā hoti, na tathā ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe nirantaraṃ anuppabandhavasena pavattiyaṃ, nātivipphāravā pana tattha hoti sannisinnabhāvato. ^b^Paṭhamadutiyajjhānesu pākaṭo hotī^eb^ti vitakkassa viseso abhiniropanākāro oḷārikattā paṭhamajjhāne pākaṭo hoti, tadabhāvato pañcakanaye dutiyajjhāne vicārassa viseso anumajjanākāro pākaṭo hoti.

[03]Ayaṃ ^a^V1.0316^ea^ panettha aparo nayo – malaggahitaṃ kaṃsabhājanaṃ ekena hatthena daḷhaṃ gahetvā itarena hatthena cuṇṇatelaeḷakalomādikatacumbaṭakena parimajjantassa daḷhaṃ gahaṇahattho viya vitakko, parimajjanahattho viya vicāro. Tathā kumbhakārassa daṇḍappahārena cakkaṃ bhamayitvā bhājanaṃ karontassa piṇḍassa uppīḷanahattho viya vitakko, tasseva ito cito ca sañcaraṇahattho viya vicāro. Tathā kaṃsabhājanādīsu kiñci maṇḍalaṃ vaṭṭalekhaṃ karontassa majjhe sannirumbhitvā ṭhitakaṇṭako viya ^a^M1.0361^ea^ abhiniropano vitakko, bahi paribbhamanakaṇṭako viya anumajjano vicāroti veditabbaṃ.

[03]Yathā pupphaphalasākhādiavayavavinimutto avijjamānopi rukkho ‘‘sapuppho saphalo’’ti voharīyati, evaṃ vitakkādiaṅgavinimuttaṃ avijjamānampi jhānaṃ ‘‘savitakkaṃ savicāra’’nti voharīyatīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘rukkho viyā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Vibhaṅge panā^eb^tiādīsu jhānabhāvanāya puggalavasena desetabbattā ‘‘idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī’’tiādinā (vibha. 508) puggalādhiṭṭhānena jhānāni uddiṭṭhānīti. Yadipi vibhaṅge puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā, attho pana tatrāpi vibhaṅgepi yathā idha ‘‘iminā ca vitakkenā’’tiādinā dhammavasena vutto, evameva daṭṭhabbo, paramatthato puggalasseva abhāvatoti adhippāyo. Atha vā jhānasamaṅgino vitakkavicārasamaṅgitādassanena jhānasseva savitakkasavicāratā vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘attho pana tatrāpi evameva daṭṭhabbo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Viveka^eb^saddassa bhāvasādhanataṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tasmā vivekā’’^eb^ti. Hetuatthe cetaṃ nissakkavacanaṃ, tasmā vivekā hetubhūtāti attho. ^b^Viveka^eb^saddassa kattusādhanataṃ kammasādhanataṃ vā sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tasmiṃ vā viveke’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Vivitto’’ti hi iminā nīvaraṇehi vinābhūto tehi vivecitoti ca sādhanadvayampi saṅgahitamevāti. ^b^Pinayatī^eb^ti tappeti vaḍḍheti vā. ^b^Sampiyāyanalakkhaṇā^eb^ti paritussanalakkhaṇā. ^b^Pīnanarasā^eb^ti paribrūhanarasā. ^b^Pharaṇarasā^eb^ti paṇītarūpehi kāyassa byāpanarasā. Udaggabhāvo ^b^odagyaṃ^eb^. Sukhayatīti ^b^sukhaṃ,^eb^ attanā sampayuttadhamme laddhassāde karotīti attho. Svāyaṃ kattuniddeso pariyāyaladdho dhammato aññassa kattunivattanattho, nippariyāyena pana bhāvasādhanameva labbhatīti ^b^‘‘sukhanaṃ sukha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sātalakkhaṇa^eb^nti iṭṭhasabhāvattā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ, sampayuttadhamme vā attani sādayatīti sātaṃ da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā. Sātaṃ madhuranti vadanti, sātaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sātalakkhaṇaṃ. ^b^Upabrūhanarasa^eb^ntiādīsu ^b^upabrūhanaṃ^eb^ sampayuttadhammānaṃ saṃvaddhanaṃ, dukkhaṃ viya avissajjetvā adukkhamasukhā viya anajjhupekkhitvā anu anu gaṇhanaṃ upakāritā vā anuggaho. ^b^Katthacī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0317^ea^ paṭhamajjhānādike. ^b^Paṭilābhatuṭṭhī^eb^ti paṭilābhavasena uppajjanakatuṭṭhi. ^b^Paṭiladdharasānubhavana^eb^nti ^a^M1.0362^ea^ paṭiladdhassa ārammaṇarasassa anubhavanaṃ. Etena pītisukhāni sabhāvato vibhajitvā dassitāni. ^b^Yattha pīti, tattha sukha^eb^nti vitakkassa viya vicārena pītiyā sukhena accantasaṃyogamāha. ^b^Yattha sukhaṃ, tattha na niyamato pītī^eb^ti vicārassa viya vitakkena, sukhassa pītiyā anaccantasaṃyogaṃ. Tena accantānaccantasaṃyogitāya pītisukhānaṃ visesaṃ dasseti.

[03]Kaṃ udakaṃ tārenti etthāti ^b^kantāraṃ,^eb^ nirudakamaruṭṭhānaṃ. Vanameva ^b^vanantaṃ^eb^. ^b^Vanacchāyappavesanaudakaparibhogesu viya sukha^eb^nti yathā hi puriso mahākantāramaggaṃ paṭipanno ghammapareto tasito pipāsito paṭipathe purisaṃ disvā ‘‘kattha pānīyaṃ atthī’’ti puccheyya, so ‘‘aṭaviṃ uttaritvāva jātassaravanasaṇḍo atthi, tattha gantvā labhissasī’’ti vadeyya, so tassa kathaṃ sutvāva haṭṭhapahaṭṭho bhaveyya, tato gacchanto bhūmiyaṃ patitāni uppaladalanāḷapattādīni disvā suṭṭhutaraṃ haṭṭhapahaṭṭho hutvā gacchanto allavatthe allakese purise passeyya, vanakukkuṭavanamorādīnaṃ saddaṃ suṇeyya, jātassarapariyante jātamaṇijālasadisaṃ nīlavanasaṇḍaṃ passeyya, sare jātāni uppalapadumakumudāni passeyya, acchaṃ vippasannaṃ udakampi passeyya, so bhiyyo bhiyyo haṭṭhapahaṭṭho hutvā jātassaraṃ otaritvā yathāruci nhatvā ca pivitvā ca passaddhadaratho bhisamuḷālapokkharādīni khāditvā nīluppalādīni piḷandhitvā mandālavamūlāni khandhe khipitvā uttaritvā sāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā udakasāṭakaṃ ātape katvā sītacchāyāya mandamande vāte paharante nipannova ‘‘aho sukhaṃ aho sukha’’nti vadeyya, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tassa hi purisassa jātassaravanasaṇḍasavanato paṭṭhāya yāva udakadassanā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhakālo viya pubbabhāgārammaṇe haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākārā pīti, nhāyitvā ca pivitvā ca sītacchāyāya mandamande vāte paharante ‘‘aho sukhaṃ aho sukha’’nti vadanto nipannakālo viya balappattaṃ ārammaṇarasānubhavanākārasaṇṭhitaṃ sukhaṃ.

[03]^b^Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye^eb^ti iṭṭhārammaṇassa paṭilābhasamaye paṭiladdhassa rasānubhavanasamaye vanacchāyādīnaṃ savanadassanasamaye paribhogasamaye ca. ^b^Pākaṭabhāvato^eb^ti yathākkamaṃ pītisukhānaṃ vibhūtabhāvato. ^b^Vivekajaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0363^ea^^b^pītisukha^eb^nti ettha purimasmiṃ atthe vivekajanti jhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Pītisukhasaddato ca atthiatthavisesavato ^b^assa jhānassa, asmiṃ vā jhāne^eb^ti ettha akāro daṭṭhabbo yathā arisasoti. Dutiye pītisukhameva vivekajaṃ, vivekajaṃpītisukhanti ca aññapadatthasamāso ^a^V1.0318^ea^ paccattaniddesassa ca alopo kato, lope vā sati ‘‘vivekajapītisukha’’nti pāṭhoti ayaṃ viseso.

[03]^b^Gaṇanānupubbato paṭhama^eb^nti iminā desanākkamaṃ ulliṅgeti. ‘‘Gaṇanānupubbatā paṭhama’’ntipi pāṭho, tatthāpi gaṇanānupubbatāyāti attho, gaṇanānupubbatāmattaṃ vā paṭhamanti idaṃ vacananti attho. ^b^Paṭhamaṃ samāpajjatīti paṭhama^eb^nti idaṃ pana na ekantalakkhaṇaṃ. Ciṇṇavasībhāvo hi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ sakkoti, matthakato paṭṭhāya ādiṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ sakkoti, antarantarā okkamantopi sakkoti. Evaṃ pubbuppattiyaṭṭhena pana paṭhamaṃ uppannantipi paṭhamaṃ. Teneva ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.75) ‘‘gaṇanānupubbatā paṭhamaṃ, paṭhamaṃ uppannantipi paṭhama’’nti ettakameva vuttaṃ. ^b^Paccanīkadhamme jhāpetī^eb^ti nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhamme dahati, vikkhambhanavasena pajahatīti attho. ^b^Gocara^eb^nti kasiṇādiālambanaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti taṃ gocaraṃ. ^b^Upanijjhāyatī^eb^ti passati. ^b^Saha upacārenā^eb^ti saddhiṃ upacārajjhānena. ^b^Kasiṇārammaṇūpanijjhāyanato^eb^ti pathavīkasiṇādino attano ārammaṇassa rūpaṃ viya cakkhunā upanijjhāyanato. ^b^Lakkhaṇūpanijjhāyanato^eb^ti yathāsambhavaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇattayassa nibbānadhātuyā tathalakkhaṇassa ca upanijjhāyanato. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘ettha hī’’^eb^tiādi. Niccādivipallāsappahānena maggo asammohato aniccādilakkhaṇāni upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānanti āha ^b^‘‘vipassanāya upanijjhāyanakicca’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Tathalakkhaṇa^eb^nti avināsadhammassa nibbānassa anaññathābhāvato aviparītasabhāvo tathalakkhaṇaṃ, maggassapi vā nibbānārammaṇato tathalakkhaṇūpanijjhānatā yojetabbā.

[03]Visadisodāharaṇaṃ tāva dassento āha ^b^‘‘yathā sadhano’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Añño apadesāraho hotī^eb^ti dhanato parijanato ca añño dhanavā parijanavā ca puriso saha dhanena vattati parijanena cāti sadhano saparijanoti apadesaṃ arahatīti apadesāraho hoti ^a^M1.0364^ea^, apadisitabbo hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Senaṅgesu eva senāsammutī^eb^ti rathādisenaṅgavinimuttāya senāya abhāvepi rathehi pattīhi ca saha vattanato sarathā sapatti senāti rathādisenaṅgesuyeva senāvohāroti attho. Kasmā panettha jhānapāṭhe aggahitā cittekaggatā gahitāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘avuttattā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Evaṃ vuttāyevā^eb^ti evaṃ sarūpato vibhaṅge vuttāyeva. ^b^Sacittekaggatanti idha avuttepī^eb^ti ‘‘sacittekaggata’’nti evaṃ sarūpato imasmiṃ jhānapāṭhe avuttepīti attho, sāmaññato pana jhānaggahaṇena gahitā eva. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘yena hī’’^eb^tiādi ^a^V1.0319^ea^. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yena vitakkādīhi saha vattabbaṃ, taṃ dhammaṃ dīpetuṃ tassa pakāsanādhippāyena ‘‘savitakkaṃ savicāra’’ntiādinā uddeso kato, so eva adhippāyo tena bhagavatā vibhaṅge (vibha. 569) ‘‘cittassekaggatā’’ti niddisantena pakāsito, tasmā sā jhānapāṭhe aggahitāti na cintetabbanti.

[03]^b^Upasampajjā^eb^ti ettha ^b^upa-saṃ^eb^saddā ‘‘upalabbhatī’’tiādīsu viya niratthakāti dassetuṃ ‘‘upagantvā’’tiādiṃ vatvā puna tesaṃ sātthakabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘upasampādayitvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, tasmā ^b^upasampajjā^eb^ti ettha patvā sādhetvāti vā attho. ^b^Iriya^eb^nti kiriyaṃ. ^b^Vutti^eb^ntiādīni tasseva vevacanāni. Ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ iriyāpathantarehi rakkhaṇaṃ ^b^pālanaṃ^eb^. Sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇattā ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānameva vuttaṃ. Tañhi sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇanti vadanti.
[06]Paṭhamajjhānakathā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Vūpasamā^eb^ti vūpasamahetu. Vūpasamoti cettha pahānaṃ adhippetaṃ, tañca vitakkavicārānaṃ atikkamo atthato dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe anuppādoti āha ^b^‘‘samatikkamā’’^eb^tiādi. Katamesaṃ panettha vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo adhippeto, kiṃ paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ, udāhu dutiyajjhānikānanti, kiñcettha – yadi paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ, natthi tesaṃ vūpasamo. Na hi kadāci paṭhamajjhānaṃ ^a^M1.0365^ea^ vitakkavicārarahitaṃ atthi. Atha dutiyajjhānikānaṃ, evampi nattheva vūpasamo sabbena sabbaṃ tesaṃ tattha abhāvatoti imaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tattha kiñcāpī’’^eb^tiādi. Yasmā diṭṭhādīnavassa taṃtaṃjhānakkhaṇe anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ vūpasamanaṃ adhippetaṃ, vitakkādayo eva ca jhānaṅgabhūtā tathā karīyanti, na taṃsampayuttā phassādayo, tasmā vitakkādīnaṃyeva vūpasamādhivacanaṃ jhāne āgataṃ. Yasmā pana vitakkādīnaṃ viya taṃsampayuttadhammānampi ‘‘etena etaṃ oḷārika’’nti ādīnavadassanaṃ sutte āgataṃ, tasmā avisesena vitakkādīnaṃ taṃsahagatānañca vūpasamādike vattabbe vitakkādīnaṃyeva vūpasamo vuccamāno adhikavacanaṃ aññamatthaṃ bodhetīti katvā kañci visesaṃ dīpetīti dassento ^b^‘‘oḷārikassa panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – yehi vitakkavicārehi paṭhamajjhānassa oḷārikatā, tesaṃ samatikkamā dutiyajjhānassa samadhigamo, na sabhāvato anoḷārikānaṃ phassādīnaṃ samatikkamāti ayamattho ‘‘vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā’’ti etena dīpito ^a^V1.0320^ea^, tasmā ‘‘kiṃ paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo idhādhippeto, udāhu dutiyajjhānikāna’’nti edisī codanā anokāsāva. ‘‘Pītiyā ca virāgā’’tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Tasmā vitakkavicārapītisukhasamatikkamavacanāni oḷārikoḷārikaṅgasamatikkamā dutiyādiadhigamadīpakānīti tesaṃ ekadesabhūtaṃ vitakkavicārasamatikkamavacanaṃ avayavena samudāyopalakkhaṇanayena taṃ dīpakaṃ vuttaṃ. Visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitepi hi vitakkavicārasamatikkamavacanādike paheyyaṅganiddesatāsāmaññena cittena samūhato gahite vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanassa tadekadesatā hotīti. Atha vā vitakkavicāravūpasamavacaneneva taṃsamatikkamā dutiyādiadhigamadīpakena pītivirāgādivacanānaṃ pītiādisamatikkamā tatiyādiadhigamadīpakatā dīpitā hotīti tassa taṃdīpakatā vuttā. Evañhi avayavena samudāyopalakkhaṇaṃ vinā vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanena pītivirāgādivacanānaṃ savisaye samānabyāpāratā dassitā hoti.

[03]Ajjhattanti niyakajjhattaṃ adhippetaṃ, na ajjhattajjhattādīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘ajjhattanti niyakajjhattaṃ adhippeta’’^eb^nti. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘vibhaṅge^eb^^a^M1.0366^ea^^b^panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pana^eb^-saddopi apisaddattho, vibhaṅgepīti attho. Ayameva vā pāṭho.

[03]^b^Nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viyā^eb^ti nīlayogato vatthaṃ nīlaṃ viyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Imasmiñca atthavikappe^eb^ti ‘‘ceto sampasādayatī’’ti etasmiṃ pakkhe. ^b^Cetaso^eb^ti ca upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Purimasmi^eb^nti ‘‘sampasādanayogato jhānampi sampasādana’’nti vuttapakkhe. ^b^Cetaso^eb^ti sambandhe sāmivacanaṃ. ‘‘Yāva na pare ekagate karomī’’tiādīsu seṭṭhavacanopi ekasaddo loke dissatīti āha ^b^‘‘seṭṭhopi hi loke ekoti vuccatī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Ekākīhi khuddakehi jita’’ntiādīsu asahāyatthopi ekasaddo diṭṭhoti āha ^b^‘‘eko asahāyo hutvā’’^eb^ti. Saddhādayopi kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ sādhāraṇato ca asādhāraṇato ca paccayā hontiyeva, samādhi pana jhānakkhaṇe sampayuttadhammānaṃ avikkhepalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhakaraṇena sātisayaṃ paccayo hotīti dassento ^b^‘‘sampayuttadhamme…pe… adhivacana’’^eb^nti āha.

[03]‘‘Sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāva’’nti visesanadvayaṃ jhānassa atisayavacanicchāvasena gahitaṃ. Svāyamatisayo yathā imasmiṃ jhāne labbhati, na tathā paṭhamajjhāneti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘nanu cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Ārammaṇe āhananapariyāhananavasena anumajjanaanuyujjanavasena ca pavattamānā dhammā satipi nīvaraṇappahānena kilesakālussiyāpagame sampayuttānaṃ ^a^V1.0321^ea^ kiñci khobhaṃ karontā viya tehi ca te na sannisinnā hontīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vitakkavicārakkhobhena…pe… na suppasanna’’^eb^nti. Tattha khuddikā ūmiyo ^b^vīciyo,^eb^ mahatiyo ^b^taraṅgā. Samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo^eb^ti satipi indriyasamatte vīriyasamatāya ca teneva khotena sampasādābhāvena ca bahale viya jale maccho samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo. ^b^Vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvenā^eb^ti ettha yathāvuttakhobho eva palibodho. ^b^Evaṃ vuttenā^eb^ti yassā saddhāya vasena sampasādanaṃ, yassā ca cittekaggatāya vasena ekodibhāvanti ca jhānaṃ vuttaṃ, tāsaṃ eva ‘‘saddahanā’’tiādinā (vibha. 574) pavattiākāravisesavibhāvanavasena vuttena tena vibhaṅgapāṭhena. ^b^Ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā^eb^ti ‘‘sampasādanayogato, sampasādanato ^a^M1.0367^ea^ vā sampasādanaṃ. Ekodiṃ bhāvetīti ekodibhāvanti jhānaṃ vutta’’nti evaṃ pavattā ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā. ^b^Aññadatthu saṃsandati ceva sameti ca, evaṃ veditabbā^eb^ti kathaṃ panāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā tena vibhaṅgapāṭhena saddhiṃ saṃsandati sameti, nanu jhānavibhaṅge ‘‘sampasādana’’nti padaṃ uddharitvā ‘‘yā saddhā saddahanā’’tiādinā (vibha. 574) saddhāyeva vuttā, ‘‘cetaso ekodibhāva’’nti ca padaṃ uddharitvā ‘‘yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitī’’tiādinā samādhisseva niddeso kato, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘sampasādanaṃ ekodibhāva’’nti jhānameva vuttanti aṭṭhakathāya vibhaṅgapāṭhena saddhiṃ virodho āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati vibhaṅgepi imināva adhippāyena niddesassa katattā. Tathā hi yena sampasādanena yogā jhānaṃ ‘‘sampasādana’’nti vuccati, tasmiṃ ‘‘yā saddhā saddahanā’’tiādinā dassite sampasādanaṃ jhānanti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva taṃyogā jhāne taṃsaddappavatti dassitā hoti. ‘‘Ekodibhāva’’nti ca padaṃ uddharitvā ekodimhi dassite ekodibhāvaṃ jhānanti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva jhānassa ekodivaḍḍhanatā vuttāva hotīti iminā adhippāyena byañjanavicāraṃ akatvā dhammamattameva niddiṭṭhanti avirodho yutto.

[03]Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ṭīkākārehi ācariyadhammapālattherādīhi ‘‘yadi ekodīti samādhissa gahaṇaṃ adhippetaṃ, tadā ‘ekodibhāva’nti padaṃ uddharitvā samādhissa niddeso na kattabbo siyā. Tasmā ekodibhāvasaddo eva samādhimhi pavatto sampasādanasaddo viya jhāne pavattatīti yutta’’nti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya virujjhati. Tasmā so aṭṭhakathānirapekkho visuṃyeveko atthavikappoti gahetabbaṃ. Ayañhi nesaṃ adhippāyo – vitakkavicārehi anajjhāruḷhattā ekaṃ udetīti ekodīti tathāvidhasamādhiyuttaṃ jhānacittameva gahetvā ekodissa bhāvo ekodibhāvoti samādhissa gahaṇaṃ sakkā vattunti. Yo panāyaṃ tesamabhiniveso ‘‘ekodīti samādhissa gahaṇe sati ‘ekodibhāva’nti padaṃ uddharitvā samādhissa niddeso na kattabbo siyā’’ti ^a^V1.0322^ea^, so anekantikattā ayutto. Aññatthapi hi byañjanavicāraṃ akatvā atthamattasseva bāhullena vibhaṅge niddeso dissati.

[03]^b^Santā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0368^ea^ samaṃ nirodhaṃ gatā. ^b^Samitā^eb^ti bhāvanāya samaṃ gamitā nirodhitā. ^b^Vūpasantā^eb^ti tato eva suṭṭhu upasantā. ^b^Atthaṅgatā^eb^ti atthaṃ vināsaṃ gatā. ^b^Abbhatthaṅgatā^eb^ti upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Appitā^eb^ti gamitā vināsaṃ gatā. ^b^Sositā^eb^ti pavattisaṅkhātassa santānassa abhāvena sosaṃ sukkhabhāvaṃ gatā. ^b^Byantīkatā^eb^ti vigatantā katā.

[03]^b^Ayamattho^eb^ti bhāvanāya pahīnattā vitakkavicārānaṃ abhāvasaṅkhāto attho. Codakena vuttamatthaṃ sampaṭicchitvā pariharituṃ ^b^‘‘evametaṃ siddhovāyamattho’’^eb^ti vatvā ^b^‘‘na paneta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^eta^eb^nti ‘‘vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā’’ti etaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Tadatthadīpaka^eb^nti tassa vitakkavicārābhāvamattasaṅkhātassa atthassa dīpakaṃ. ^b^Na kilesakālussiyassā^eb^ti upacārakkhaṇe viya nīvaraṇasaṅkhātassa kilesasaṅkhobhassa vūpasamā na sampasādananti attho. Nanu ca ^b^‘‘purimaṃ vatvāpi vattabbamevā’’^eb^ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ. Tathā hi dutiyajjhānādiadhigamūpāyadīpakena ajjhattaṃ sampasādanatāya cetaso ekodibhāvatāya ca hetudīpakena avitakkaavicārabhāvahetudīpakena ca vitakkavicāravūpasamavacaneneva vitakkavicārābhāvo dīpitoti, kiṃ puna avitakkaavicāravacanena katenāti? Na, adīpitattā. Na hi vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanena vitakkavicārānaṃ appavatti vuttā hoti. Vitakkavicāresu hi taṇhāppahānaṃ etesaṃ vūpasamanaṃ. Oḷārikaṅgamukhena hi taṃtaṃjhānanikantiyā vikkhambhanaṃ vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanādīhi pakāsitaṃ. Yato vitakkavicāresu virattabhāvadīpakaṃ vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanaṃ, ye ca saṅkhāresu taṇhāppahānaṃ karonti, tesu maggesu pahīnataṇhesu ca phalesu saṅkhārappavatti hoti, evamidhāpi vikkhambhitavitakkavicārataṇhassa dutiyajjhānassa vitakkavicārasampayogo purimena na nivārito siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ āvajjitukāmatādiatikkamo ca tesaṃ vūpasamoti dassanatthañca ^b^‘‘avitakkaṃ avicāra’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Paṭhamajjhānaṃ dutiyajjhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo hotīti āha ^b^‘‘paṭhamajjhānasamādhito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭhamampī^eb^ti paṭhamajjhānampi.

[03]^b^Gaṇanānupubbato^eb^tiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Etthāpi ‘‘dutiyaṃ uppannantipi dutiya’’nti vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Vuttamevatthaṃ vibhaṅgapāṭhena sādhento āha ^b^‘‘yathāhā’’^eb^tiādi. Yaṃ pana ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ (vibha. 580) ‘‘jhānanti sampasādo ^a^M1.0369^ea^ pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ ^a^V1.0323^ea^ saparikkhāraṃ jhānaṃ dassetuṃ pariyāyena vuttaṃ. Rathassa paṇḍukambalaṃ viya hi sampasādo jhānassa parikkhāro, na jhānaṅganti āha ^b^‘‘pariyāyoyeva ceso’’^eb^ti. Nippariyāyato pana upanijjhānalakkhaṇappattānaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena tivaṅgikamevetaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sampasādanaṃ pana ṭhapetvā’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Dutiyajjhānakathā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Virajjanaṃ virāgo. Taṃ pana virajjanaṃ nibbindanamukhena hīḷanaṃ vā tappaṭibaddharāgappahānaṃ vāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tassā pītiyā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ubhinnamantarā^eb^ti pītiyā virāgāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ antarā, majjheti attho. ^b^Sampiṇḍanaṃ^eb^ samuccayo. ^b^Maggo^eb^ti upāyo. Dutiyajjhānassa hi paṭilābhaṃ vinā tatiyajjhānassa adhigamo na hotīti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo tatiyajjhānādhigamassa upāyo. ^b^Tadadhigamāyā^eb^ti tatiyamaggādhigamāya.
