[03]^b^Kilesavasenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0357^ea^ āsavasaṅkhātakilesavasena. Yasmā āsavānaṃ dukkhasaccapariyāyo, tappariyāpannattā, sesasaccānañca taṃsamudayādipariyāyo atthi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pariyāyato’’^eb^ti. Dassento saccānīti yojanā. Āsavānaṃyeva cettha gahaṇaṃ ‘‘āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyā’’ti āraddhattā. Tathā hi āsavavimuttisīseneva sabbasaṃkilesavimutti vuttā. ^b^Idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsi^eb^ntiādinā missakamaggo idha kathitoti ^b^‘‘saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ kathetī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca saccappaṭivedhassa tadā atītakālikattā ‘‘yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsi’’nti vatvāpi abhisamayakāle tassa paccuppannataṃ upādāya ‘‘evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato’’ti vattamānakālena niddeso kato. So ca kāmaṃ maggakkhaṇato paraṃ yāvajjatanā atītakāliko eva, sabbapaṭhamaṃ panassa atītakālikattaṃ phalakkhaṇeneva veditabbanti ^a^M1.0409^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘vimuccitthāti iminā phalakkhaṇaṃ dassetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jānato passato^eb^ti vā hetuniddesoyaṃ. Jānanahetu dassanahetu kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccitthāti yojanā. Bhavāsavaggahaṇeneva cettha bhavarāgassa viya bhavadiṭṭhiyāpi samavarodhoti diṭṭhāsavassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]Yasmā pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇena vijjamānassapi kammassa āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikabhāvato ‘‘khīṇā jātī’’ti jānāti, yasmā ca maggapaccavekkhaṇādīhi vusitaṃ brahmacariyantiādiṃ pajānāti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘khīṇā jātīti ādīhi tassa bhūmi’’^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^tassā^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa. ^b^Bhūmi^eb^nti pavattiṭṭhānaṃ. Yenādhippāyena ^b^‘‘katamā panā’’^eb^tiādinā codanā katā, taṃ pakāsetvā parihāraṃ vattukāmo āha ^b^‘‘na tāvassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā^eb^ti maggabhāvanāya na khīṇāti adhippāyo. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘pubbeva khīṇattā’’^eb^ti. Na anāgatā assa jāti khīṇāti yojanā. ^b^Na anāgatā^eb^ti ca anāgatattasāmaññaṃ gahetvā lesena vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anāgate vāyāmābhāvato’’^eb^ti. Vijjamāneyeva hi payogo sambhavati, nāvijjamāneti adhippāyo. Anāgataviseso panettha adhippeto, tassa ca khepane vāyāmopi labbhateva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yā pana maggassā’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Yā panā’’ti hi ādinā maggabhāvanāya anāgatajātiyā eva hetuvināsanadvārena khīṇabhāvo pakāsīyati. ^b^Ekacatupañcavokārabhavesū^eb^ti bhavattayaggahaṇaṃ vuttanayena anavasesato jātiyā khīṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ. ^b^Ta^eb^nti yathāvuttajātiṃ. ^b^So^eb^ti bhagavā.

[03]Brahmacariyavāso nāma idha maggabrahmacariyassa nibbattanamevāti āha ^b^‘‘niṭṭhita’’^eb^nti. Sammādiṭṭhiyā catūsu saccesu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena pavattamānāya sammāsaṅkappādīnampi dukkhasacce pariññābhisamayānuguṇā pavatti, itarasaccesu ca nesaṃ pahānābhisamayādivasena pavatti ^a^V1.0358^ea^ pākaṭā eva. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayavasenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nāparaṃ itthattāyā^eb^ti ime pakārā itthaṃ, tabbhāvo itthattaṃ, tadatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. Te pana pakārā ariyamaggabyāpārabhūtā pariññādayo idhādhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃsoḷasakiccabhāvāyā’’^eb^ti. Te hi maggaṃ paccavekkhato maggānubhāvena pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti ^a^M1.0410^ea^, pariññādīsu ca pahānameva padhānaṃ, tadatthattāya itaresanti āha ^b^‘‘kilesakkhayāya vā’’^eb^ti. Pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇavasena vā etaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti abbhaññāsi’’nti etthāyamaparo nayo – ^b^itthattāyā^eb^ti nissakke sampadānavacanaṃ. Tenāyamattho – itthattāya itthambhāvato imasmā evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ anāgatakkhandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi, ime pana carimattabhāvasaṅkhātā pañcakkhandhā pariññātā appatiṭṭhā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya. Apariññātamūlakā hi patiṭṭhā. Yathāha ‘‘kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ viruḷha’’ntiādi (saṃ. ni. 2.64; kathā. 296; mahāni. 7). Te pana pañcakkhandhā carimakaviññāṇanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissantīti abbhaññāsinti.

[03]^b^Paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahita^eb^nti na paṭhamadutiyañāṇadvayādhigamaṃ viya kevalanti adhippāyo. ^b^Dassento^eb^ti nigamanavasena dassento. Sarūpato hi pubbe dassitamevāti. Sesamettha vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.

[03]^b^Tikkhattuṃ jāto^eb^ti iminā pana idaṃ dasseti ‘‘ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, paṭhamavijjāya jātoyeva purejātassa sahajātassa vā abhāvato sabbesaṃ vuḍḍho mahallako, kimaṅgaṃ pana tīhi vijjāhi tikkhattuṃ jātoti. ^b^Pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇa^eb^nti atītārammaṇasabhāgatāya tabbhāvībhāvato ca pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇaṃ pakāsetvāti yojetabbaṃ. Tattha ^b^atītaṃsañāṇa^eb^nti atītakkhandhāyatanadhātusaṅkhāte atītakoṭṭhāse appaṭihatañāṇaṃ. Dibbacakkhuñāṇassa paccuppannārammaṇattā yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa ca dibbacakkhuvaseneva ijjhanato dibbacakkhuno paribhaṇḍañāṇattā dibbacakkhumhiyeva ca ṭhitassa cetopariyañāṇasiddhito vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dibbacakkhunā paccuppannānāgataṃsañāṇa’’^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^dibbacakkhunā^eb^ti saparibhaṇḍena dibbacakkhuñāṇena. Paccuppannaṃso ca anāgataṃso ca paccuppannānāgataṃsaṃ, tattha ñāṇaṃ ^b^paccuppannānāgataṃsañāṇaṃ^eb^. Āsavakkhayañāṇādhigameneva sabbaññutaññāṇassa viya sesāsādhāraṇañāṇadasabalañāṇaāveṇikabuddhadhammādīnampi anaññasādhāraṇānaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ ijjhanato ^a^M1.0411^ea^^a^V1.0359^ea^ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘āsavakkhayena sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇa’’^eb^nti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbepi sabbaññuguṇe pakāsetvā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Āsavakkhayañāṇakathā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^15^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pītivipphāraparipuṇṇagattacitto^eb^ti pītipharaṇena paripuṇṇakāyacitto. ^b^Aññāṇa^eb^nti aññāṇassāti attho. ^b^Dhī^eb^saddassa yogato hi sāmiatthe etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^Abhikkantā^eb^ti ettha atikkantā, vigatāti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘khaye dissatī’’^eb^ti. Teneva hi ^b^‘‘nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Abhikkantataro cā^eb^ti ativiya kantataro manoramo, tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sundare dissatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ko^eb^ti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu ko katamo. ^b^Me^eb^ti mama. ^b^Pādānī^eb^ti pāde. ^b^Iddhiyā^eb^ti imāya evarūpāya deviddhiyā. ^b^Yasasā^eb^ti iminā edisena parivārena paricchedena. ^b^Jala^eb^nti vijjotamāno. ^b^Abhikkantenā^eb^ti ativiya kantena kamanīyena abhirūpena. ^b^Vaṇṇenā^eb^ti chavivaṇṇena sarīravaṇṇanibhāya. ^b^Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disā^eb^ti dasapi disā pabhāsento cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti gāthāya attho. ^b^Abhirūpe^eb^ti uḷārarūpe sampannarūpe.

[03]^b^Abhikkantaṃ bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ bho gotamā^eb^ti vacanadvayassa ^b^‘‘sādhu sādhu bho gotamā’’^eb^ti āmeḍitavasena atthaṃ dassetvā tassa visayaṃ niddhārento āha ^b^‘‘bhaye kodhe’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ‘‘coro coro, sappo sappo’’tiādīsu ^b^bhaye^eb^ āmeḍitaṃ. ‘‘Vijjha vijjha, pahara paharā’’tiādīsu ^b^kodhe^eb^. ‘‘Sādhu sādhū’’tiādīsu ^b^pasaṃsāyaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Gaccha gaccha, lunāhi lunāhī’’tiādīsu ^b^turite^eb^. ‘‘Āgaccha āgacchā’’tiādīsu ^b^kotūhale^eb^. ‘‘Buddho buddhoti cintento’’tiādīsu (bu. vaṃ. 2.44) ^b^acchare^eb^. ‘‘Abhikkamathāyasmanto, abhikkamathāyasmanto’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 3.20; a. ni. 9.11) ^b^hāse^eb^. ‘‘Kahaṃ ekaputtaka, kahaṃ ekaputtakā’’tiādīsu ^b^soke^eb^. ‘‘Aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha’’ntiādīsu (udā. 20; cūḷava. 332) ^b^pasāde^eb^. ^b^Ca^eb^-saddo avuttasamuccayattho ^a^M1.0412^ea^. Tena garahaasammānādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tattha ‘‘pāpo pāpo’’tiādīsu ^b^garahāyaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Abhirūpaka abhirūpakā’’tiādīsu ^b^asammāne^eb^ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Nayidaṃ ^a^V1.0360^ea^ āmeḍitavasena dvikkhattuṃ vuttaṃ, atha kho atthadvayavasenāti dassento ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Abhikkanta^eb^nti vacanaṃ apekkhitvā napuṃsakaliṅgavasena vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana bhagavato vacanaṃ dhammassa desanāti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanā’’^eb^ti. Atthamattadassanaṃ vā etaṃ, tasmā atthavasena liṅgavibhattivipariṇāmo veditabbo. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. ^b^Dosanāsanato^eb^ti rāgādikilesaviddhaṃsanato. ^b^Guṇādhigamanato^eb^ti sīlādiguṇānaṃ sampāpanato. Ye guṇe desanā adhigameti, tesu padhānabhūtā guṇā dassetabbāti te padhānabhūte guṇe tāva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘saddhājananato paññājananato’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Saddhāpamukhā hi lokiyā guṇā, paññāpamukhā lokuttarā. ^b^Sātthato^eb^tiādīsu sīlādiatthasampattiyā ^b^sātthato,^eb^ sabhāvaniruttisampattiyā ^b^sabyañjanato^eb^. Suviññeyyasaddappayogatāya ^b^uttānapadato,^eb^ saṇhasukhumabhāvena duviññeyyatthatāya ^b^gambhīratthato^eb^. Siniddhamudumadhurasaddappayogatāya ^b^kaṇṇasukhato,^eb^ vipulavisuddhapemanīyatthatāya ^b^hadayaṅgamato^eb^. Mānātimānavidhamanena ^b^anattukkaṃsanato,^eb^ thambhasārambhanimmaddanena ^b^aparavambhanato^eb^. Hitādhippāyappavattiyā paresaṃ rāgapariḷāhādivūpasamanena ^b^karuṇāsītalato,^eb^ kilesandhakāravidhamanena ^b^paññāvadātato^eb^. Karavīkarutamañjutāya ^b^āpātharamaṇīyato,^eb^ pubbāparāviruddhasuvisuddhatthatāya ^b^vimaddakkhamato^eb^. Āpātharamaṇīyatāya eva ^b^suyyamānasukhato,^eb^ vimaddakkhamatāya hitajjhāsayappavattitāya ca ^b^vīmaṃsiyamānahitato^eb^ti evamattho veditabbo. ^b^Evamādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena saṃsāracakkanivattanato, saddhammacakkappavattanato, micchāvādavidhamanato, sammāvādapatiṭṭhāpanato, akusalamūlasamuddharaṇato, kusalamūlasaṃropanato, apāyadvārapidhānato, saggamaggadvāravivaraṇato, pariyuṭṭhānavūpasamanato, anusayasamugghātanatoti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Adhomukhaṭhapita^eb^nti kenaci adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^Heṭṭhāmukhajāta^eb^nti sabhāveneva heṭṭhāmukhaṃ jātaṃ. ^b^Ugghāṭeyyā^eb^ti vivaṭaṃ kareyya. ^b^Hatthe^eb^^a^M1.0413^ea^^b^gahetvā^eb^ti ‘‘puratthābhimukho uttarābhimukho vā gacchā’’tiādīni avatvā hatthe gahetvā ‘‘nissandehaṃ esa maggo, evaṃ gacchā’’ti dasseyya. ^b^Kāḷapakkhacātuddasī^eb^ti kāḷapakkhe cātuddasī kāḷapakkhacātuddasī. ^b^Nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyyā^eb^ti ādheyyassa anādhārabhūtaṃ bhājanaṃ ādhārabhāvāpādanavasena ukkujjeyya. Heṭṭhāmukhajātatāya ^b^saddhammavimukhaṃ^eb^ adhomukhaṭhapitatāya ^b^asaddhamme patiṭṭhita^eb^nti evaṃ padadvayaṃ yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ, na yathāsaṅkhyaṃ. Kāmaṃ kāmacchandādayopi paṭicchādakā nīvaraṇabhāvato, micchādiṭṭhi pana savisesaṃ paṭicchādikā satte micchābhinivesanenāti āha ^b^‘‘micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchanna’’^eb^nti. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘micchādiṭṭhiparamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, vajjaṃ vadāmī’’ti. Sabbo apāyagāmimaggo ^b^kummaggo^eb^ kucchito maggoti katvā, sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhatāya micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha ^a^V1.0361^ea^ micchattadhammā ^b^micchāmaggo^eb^. Teneva hi tadubhayapaṭipakkhataṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘saggamokkhamaggaṃ ācikkhantenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sappiādisannissayo padīpo na tathā, ujjalo yathā telasannissayoti telapajjotaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Etehi pariyāyehī^eb^ti etehi nikkujjitukkujjanapaṭicchannavivaraṇādiupamopamitabbappakārehi, etehi vā yathāvuttehi arasarūpatādīnaṃ attani aññathā paṭipādanapariyāyehi attano dibbavihāravibhāvanapariyāyehi vijjattayavibhāvanāpadesena attano sabbaññuguṇavibhāvanapariyāyehi ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito’’^eb^ti.
[06]Desanānumodanakathā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Pasannākāra^eb^nti pasannehi kātabbaṃ sakkāraṃ. ^b^Saraṇaṃ gacchāmī^eb^ti ettha iti-saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti āha ^b^‘‘saraṇanti gacchāmī’’^eb^ti. Ettha hi nāyaṃ gamisaddo nīsaddādayo viya dvikammako, tasmā yathā ajaṃ gāmaṃ netīti vuccati, evaṃ ‘‘gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī’’ti vattuṃ na sakkā, ‘‘saraṇanti gacchāmī’’ti pana vattabbaṃ, tasmā ettha iti-saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Saraṇa^eb^nti paṭisaraṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘parāyaṇa’’^eb^nti. Parāyaṇabhāvo ^a^M1.0414^ea^ ca anatthanisedhanena atthasampaṭipādanena ca hotīti āha ^b^‘‘aghassa tātā hitassa ca vidhātā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aghassā^eb^ti dukkhatoti vadanti, pāpatoti pana attho yutto, nissakke cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Saraṇanti gamanañcettha tadadhippāyena bhajanaṃ tathā jānanaṃ vāti dassento ^b^‘‘iti iminā adhippāyenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^gacchāmī^eb^tiādīsu purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ atthavacanaṃ. ^b^Bhajanaṃ^eb^ vā saraṇādhippāyena upasaṅkamanaṃ, ^b^sevanā^eb^ santikāvacaratā, ^b^payirupāsanaṃ^eb^ vattappaṭivattakaraṇena upaṭṭhānanti evaṃ sabbathāpi anaññasaraṇataṃyeva dīpeti. ^b^Gacchāmī^eb^ti padassa kathaṃ bujjhāmīti ayamattho labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘yesaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe^eb^ti padadvayenapi phalaṭṭhā eva dassitā, na maggaṭṭhāti te dassento ^b^‘‘yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne cā’’^eb^ti āha. Nanu ca kalyāṇaputhujjanopi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjatīti vuccatīti? Kiñcāpi vuccati, nippariyāyena pana maggaṭṭhā eva tathā vattabbā, na itare niyāmokkamanābhāvato. Tathā hi te eva ^b^‘‘apāyesu apatamāne dhāretī’’^eb^ti vuttā. Sammattaniyāmokkamanena hi apāyavinimuttasambhavo. ^b^Akkhāyatīti^eb^ ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ^a^V1.0362^ea^ ādiattho, pakārattho vā. Tena ‘‘yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī’’ti (itivu. 90; a. ni. 4.34) ^b^suttapadaṃ^eb^ saṅgaṇhāti, ^b^‘‘vitthāro’’^eb^ti vā iminā. Ettha ca ariyamaggo niyyānikatāya, nibbānaṃ tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyāti ubhayameva nippariyāyena dhammoti vutto. Nibbānañhi ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ labhitvā ariyamaggassa tadatthasiddhi, tathāpi ariyaphalānaṃ ‘‘yasmā tāya saddhāya avūpasantāyā’’tiādivacanato maggena samucchinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānakiccatāya niyyānānuguṇatāya niyyānapariyosānatāya ca. Pariyattidhammassa pana niyyānadhammasamadhigamahetutāyāti iminā pariyāyena vuttanayena dhammabhāvo labbhati eva, svāyamattho pāṭhāruḷho evāti dassento ^b^‘‘na kevala’’^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03]^b^Rāgavirāgoti maggo kathito^eb^ti kāmarāgo bhavarāgoti evamādibhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati pahīyati etenāti rāgavirāgoti maggo kathito. ^b^Anejamasokanti phala^eb^nti ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya ^a^M1.0415^ea^ antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa sokassa ca taduppattiyaṃ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā anejamasokanti phalaṃ kathitaṃ. ^b^Appaṭikūla^eb^nti avirodhadīpanato kenaci aviruddhaṃ, iṭṭhaṃ paṇītanti vā attho. Paguṇarūpena pavattitattā, pakaṭṭhaguṇavibhāvanato vā ^b^paguṇaṃ^eb^. Yathāha ‘‘vihiṃsasaññī paguṇaṃ nabhāsiṃ, dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ manujesu brahme’’ti (ma. ni. 1.283; mahāva. 9). Sabbadhammakkhandhā kathitāti yojanā. ^b^Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātenā^eb^ti ‘‘yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya, tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.324, 356; ma. ni. 1.492; 3.54) evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā ‘‘yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni, tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.324, 356; ma. ni. 1.492; 3.54; a. ni. 6.12) evaṃ vuttānaṃ sīlānañca saṃhatabhāvena, diṭṭhisīlasāmaññenāti attho. ^b^Saṃhato^eb^ti ghaṭito, sametoti attho. Ariyapuggalā hi yattha katthaci dūre ṭhitāpi attano guṇasāmaggiyā saṃhatā eva. ^b^Aṭṭha ca puggalā dhammadasā te^eb^ti purisayugaḷavasena cattāropi puggalavasena aṭṭheva ariyadhammassa paccakkhadassāvitāya dhammadasā. Tīṇi vatthūni saraṇanti gamanena tikkhattuṃ gamanena ca ^b^tīṇi saraṇagamanāni. Paṭivedesī^eb^ti attano hadayaṅgataṃ vācāya pavedesi.
[06]Pasannākārakathā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Saraṇagamanassa ^a^V1.0363^ea^ visayappabhedaphalasaṃkilesabhedānaṃ viya kattu ca vibhāvanā tattha kosallāya hotīti ^b^‘‘saraṇagamanesu kosallatthaṃ saraṇaṃ…pe… veditabbo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ tena vinā saraṇagamanasseva asambhavato. Tattha ^b^saraṇa^eb^nti padatthato tāva hiṃsatīti saraṇaṃ. Hiṃsatthassa hi sarasaddassa vasenetaṃ padaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tasmā saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena vaṭṭabhayaṃ cittutrāsaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatipariyāpannaṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ hanati, vināsetīti attho. Ratanattayassevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ ^a^M1.0416^ea^. Atha vā hite pavattanena ‘‘sampannasīlā, bhikkhave, viharathā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.64) atthe niyojanena ahitā ca nivattanena ‘‘pāṇātipātassa kho pana pāpako vipāko, pāpakaṃ abhisamparāya’’ntiādinā ādīnavadassanādimukhena anatthato nivattanena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati, hitāhitesu appavattipavattihetukaṃ byasanaṃ apavattikaraṇena vināseti buddho. Bhavakantārauttaraṇena maggasaṅkhāto dhammo sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati, itaro assāsadānena. Appakānampi dānavasena pūjāvasena ca upanītānaṃ sakkārānaṃ vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati saṅgho anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvato, tasmā imināpi vibhajitvā vuttapariyāyena ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ. ‘‘Sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’’ti evaṃ pavattaratanattayapasaādataggarukatāhi vidhutadiṭṭhivicikicchāsammohaassaddhiyāditāya vihatakileso tadeva ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ gati tāṇaṃ leṇanti evaṃ pavattiyā tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto cittuppādo ^b^saraṇagamanaṃ^eb^ saraṇanti gacchati etenāti katvā. Tena yathāvuttacittuppādena samannāgato satto saraṇanti gacchati, vuttappakārena cittuppādena ‘‘etāni me tīṇi ratanāni saraṇaṃ, etāni parāyaṇa’’nti evaṃ upeti bhajati sevati payirupāsati, evaṃ vā jānāti, bujjhatīti attho. Evaṃ tāva saraṇaṃ, saraṇagamanaṃ, yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchati, idaṃ tayaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Saraṇagamanappabhede^eb^ pana duvidhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ lokuttaraṃ lokiyañca. Tattha lokuttaraṃ diṭṭhasaccānaṃ maggakkhaṇe saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedanena ārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhati. Atthato catusaccādhigamo eva hi lokuttarasaraṇagamanaṃ. Tattha hi nibbānadhammo sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena, maggadhammo bhāvanābhisamayavasena paṭivijjhiyamānoyeva saraṇagamanatthaṃ sādheti, buddhaguṇā pana sāvakagocarabhūtā pariññābhisamayavasena, tathā ariyasaṅghaguṇā. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘kiccato sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhatī’’ti ^a^V1.0364^ea^. Ijjhantañca saheva ijjhati, na lokiyaṃ viya paṭipāṭiyā asammohapaṭivedhena paṭividdhattā. Ye pana vadanti ‘‘na saraṇagamanaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā pavattati, maggassa adhigatattā pana adhigatameva hoti ekaccānaṃ tevijjādīnaṃ ^a^M1.0417^ea^ lokiyavijjādayo viyā’’ti, tesaṃ lokiyameva saraṇagamanaṃ siyā, na lokuttaraṃ. Tañca ayuttaṃ duvidhassapi icchitabbattā. Lokiyaṃ pana saraṇagamanaṃ puthujjanānaṃ saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanena ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā ijjhati. Taṃ atthato buddhādīsu vatthūsu ‘‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā’’tiādinā saddhāpaṭilābho yathāvuttasaddhāpubbaṅgamā ca sammādiṭṭhi, dasasu puññakiriyavatthūsu diṭṭhijukammanti vuccati. Ettha ca ‘‘saddhāpaṭilābho’’ti iminā mātādīhi ussāhitadārakādīnaṃ viya ñāṇavippayuttasaraṇagamanaṃ dassitanti veditabbaṃ. ‘‘Sammādiṭṭhī’’ti iminā pana ñāṇasampayuttaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ dassitaṃ buddhasubuddhataṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca lokiyāvabodhavaseneva sammā ñāyena dassanato.

[03]Tayidaṃ lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ catudhā pavattati attasanniyyātanena tapparāyaṇatāya sissabhāvūpagamanena paṇipātenāti. Tattha ^b^attasanniyyātanaṃ^eb^ nāma ‘‘ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ attānaṃ buddhassa niyyātemi, dhammassa, saṅghassā’’ti evaṃ buddhādīnaṃyeva saṃsāradukkhanittharaṇatthaṃ attano attabhāvassa pariccajanaṃ. ^b^Tapparāyaṇatā^eb^ nāma ‘‘ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ buddhaparāyaṇo dhammaparāyaṇo saṅghaparāyaṇoti maṃ dhārethā’’ti evaṃ tapparāyaṇabhāvo. ^b^Sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ^eb^ nāma ‘‘ajja ādiṃ katvā ‘ahaṃ buddhassa antevāsiko, dhammassa, saṅghassā’ti maṃ dhārethā’’ti evaṃ sissabhāvūpagamo. ^b^Paṇipāto^eb^ nāma ‘‘ajja ādiṃ katvā ‘ahaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ buddhādīnaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ karomī’ti maṃ dhārethā’’ti evaṃ buddhādīsu paramanipaccakāro. Imesañhi catunnaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarampi karontena gahitaṃyeva hoti saraṇagamanaṃ.

[03]Apica ‘‘bhagavato attānaṃ pariccajāmi, dhammassa saṅghassa attānaṃ pariccajāmi, jīvitaṃ pariccajāmi, pariccattoyeva me attā, pariccattaṃyeva me jīvitaṃ, jīvitapariyantikaṃ buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, buddho me saraṇaṃ leṇaṃ tāṇa’’nti evampi ^b^attasanniyyātanaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ. ‘‘Satthārañca vatāhaṃ passāmi, bhagavantameva passāmi, sugatañca vatāhaṃ passāmi, bhagavantameva passāmi, sammāsambuddhañca vatāhaṃ passāmi, bhagavantameva passāmī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 2.154) evaṃ mahākassapattherassa saraṇagamanaṃ viya ^b^sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ^eb^ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[21]‘‘So ^a^M1.0418^ea^^a^V1.0365^ea^ ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
[22]Namassamāno sambuddhaṃ, dhammassa ca sudhammataṃ. (saṃ. ni. 1.246; su. ni. 194);
[22]‘‘Te mayaṃ vicarissāma, gāmā gāmaṃ nagā nagaṃ…pe… sudhammata’’nti. (su. ni. 182) –

[07]Evampi āḷavakasātāgirahemavatādīnaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ viya ^b^tapparāyaṇatā^eb^ veditabbā. Nanu cete āḷavakādayo maggeneva āgatasaraṇagamanā, kathaṃ tesaṃ tapparāyaṇatāsaraṇagamanaṃ vuttanti? Maggenāgatasaraṇagamanehipi ‘‘sohaṃ vicarissāmi gāmā gāma’’ntiādinā (saṃ. ni. 1.246; su. ni. 194) tehi tapparāyaṇatākārassa paveditattā tathā vuttaṃ. Atha kho brahmāyu brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati, pāṇīhi ca parisambāhati, nāmañca sāveti ‘‘brahmāyu ahaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo, brahmāyu ahaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo’’ti (ma. ni. 2.394) evampi ^b^paṇipāto^eb^ daṭṭhabbo.

[03]So panesa ñātibhayācariyadakkhiṇeyyatāvasena catubbidho hoti. Tattha dakkhiṇeyyatāhetukena paṇipātena saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, na itarehi ñātibhayādivasappavattehi tīhi paṇipātehi. Seṭṭhavaseneva hi saraṇaṃ gayhati, seṭṭhavasena bhijjati, tasmā yo sākiyo vā koliyo vā ‘‘buddho amhākaṃ ñātako’’ti vandati, aggahitameva hoti saraṇaṃ. Yo vā ‘‘samaṇo gotamo rājapūjito mahānubhāvo avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyā’’ti bhayena vandati, aggahitameva hoti saraṇaṃ. Yopi bodhisattakāle bhagavato santike kiñci uggahitaṃ saramāno buddhakāle vā –
[21]‘‘Ekena bhogaṃ bhuñjeyya, dvīhi kammaṃ payojaye;
[22]Catutthañca nidhāpeyya, āpadāsu bhavissatī’’ti. (dī. ni. 3.265) –

[07]Evarūpiṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ anusāsaniṃ uggahetvā ‘‘ācariyo me’’ti vandati, aggahitameva hoti saraṇaṃ, samparāyikaṃ pana niyyānikaṃ vā anusāsaniṃ paccāsīsanto dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātameva karoti. Yo pana ‘‘ayaṃ loke aggadakkhiṇeyyo’’ti vandati, teneva gahitaṃ hoti saraṇaṃ.

[03]Evaṃ ^a^M1.0419^ea^^a^V1.0366^ea^ gahitasaraṇassa ca upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā aññatitthiyesu pabbajitampi ñātiṃ ‘‘ñātako me aya’’nti vandatopi saraṇagamanaṃ na bhijjati, pageva apabbajitaṃ. Tathā rājānaṃ bhayavasena vandato. So hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti. Tathā yaṃ kiñci sippasikkhāpakaṃ titthiyampi ‘‘ācariyo me aya’’nti vandatopi na bhijjati. Evaṃ ^b^saraṇagamanassa pabhedo^eb^ veditabbo.
[06]Saraṇagamanakathā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Ettha ca lokuttarassa saraṇagamanassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṃ ariyamaggasseva lokuttarasaraṇagamananti adhippetattā. Sakalassa pana vaṭṭadukkhassa anuppādanirodho ānisaṃsaphalaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
[22]Cattāri ariyasaccāni, sammappaññāya passati.
[21]‘‘Dukkhaṃ dukkhasamuppādaṃ, dukkhassa ca atikkamaṃ;
[22]Ariyañcaṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ, dukkhūpasamagāminaṃ.
[21]‘‘Etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, etaṃ saraṇamuttamaṃ;
[22]Etaṃ saraṇamāgamma, sabbadukkhā pamuccatī’’ti. (dha. pa. 190-192);
[03]Apica niccato anupagamanādivasena petassa ānisaṃsaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –

[08]‘‘Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya, sukhato upagaccheyya, kañci dhammaṃ attato upagaccheyya, mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya, pitaraṃ jīvitā voropeyya, arahantaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, paduṭṭhacitto tathāgatassa lohitaṃ uppādeyya, saṅghaṃ bhindeyya, aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.128; a. ni. 1.276).
[03]Lokiyassa ^a^M1.0420^ea^^a^V1.0367^ea^ pana saraṇagamanassa bhavasampadāpi bhogasampadāpi phalameva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse,
[27]Na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
[26]Pahāya mānusaṃ dehaṃ,
[22]Devakāyaṃ paripūressantī’’ti.(dī. ni. 2.332; saṃ. ni. 1.37);
[03]Aparampi vuttaṃ –

[08]‘‘Atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami…pe… ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca ‘sādhu kho, devānaminda, buddhasaraṇagamanaṃ hoti, buddhasaraṇagamanahetu kho, devānaminda, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti. Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena āyunā dibbena vaṇṇena sukhena yasena ādhipateyyena dibbehi rūpehi saddehi gandhehi rasehi phoṭṭhabbehī’’’ti (saṃ. ni. 4.341).
[07]Esa nayo dhamme saṅghe ca.

[03]Apica velāmasuttādivasenapi saraṇagamanassa phalaviseso veditabbo. Tathā hi ^b^velāmasutte^eb^ (a. ni. 9.20) ‘‘karīsassa catutthabhāgappamāṇānaṃ caturāsītisahassasaṅkhyānaṃ suvaṇṇapātirūpiyapātikaṃsapātīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ rūpiyasuvaṇṇahiraññapūrānaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitānaṃ caturāsītiyā hatthisahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā assasahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā rathasahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā dhenusahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā kaññāsahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā pallaṅkasahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā vatthakoṭisahassānaṃ aparimāṇassa ca khajjabhojjādibhedassa āhārassa pariccajanavasena sattamāsādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni nirantaraṃ pavattavelāmamahādānato ekassa sotāpannassa dinnaṃ mahapphalataraṃ, tato sataṃ sotāpannānaṃ dinnadānato ekassa sakadāgāmino, tato ^a^M1.0421^ea^ ekassa anāgāmino, tato ekassa arahato, tato ekassa paccekasambuddhassa, tato sammāsambuddhassa, tato buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dinnadānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ, tato ^a^V1.0368^ea^ cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa vihārakaraṇaṃ, tato saraṇagamanaṃ mahapphalatara’’nti pakāsitaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[08]‘‘Yaṃ, gahapati, velāmo brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ, yo cekaṃ diṭṭhisampannaṃ bhojeyya, idaṃ tato mahapphalatara’’nti (a. ni. 9.20) –
[03]Ādi. Evaṃ ^b^saraṇagamanaphalaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ.
[06]Saraṇagamanaphalakathā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Tattha ca lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṃsayamicchāñāṇādīhi saṃkilissati, na mahājutikaṃ, na ujjalaṃ aparisuddhaṃ apariyodātaṃ hoti, na mahāvipphāraṃ anuḷāraṃ. Ettha ca ^b^aññāṇaṃ^eb^ nāma vatthuttayassa guṇānaṃ ajānanaṃ tattha sammoho. ‘‘Buddho nu kho, na nu kho’’tiādinā vicikicchā ^b^saṃsayo. Micchāñāṇaṃ^eb^ nāma tassa guṇānaṃ aguṇabhāvaparikappanena viparītaggāhoti veditabbaṃ. Lokuttarassa pana saraṇagamanassa natthi saṃkileso. Lokiyassa ca saraṇagamanassa duvidho bhedo sāvajjo anavajjo ca. Tattha ^b^sāvajjo^eb^ aññasatthārādīsu attaniyyātanādīhi hoti, so aniṭṭhaphalo. ^b^Anavajjo^eb^ pana kālakiriyāya hoti. Lokiyañhi saraṇagamanaṃ sikkhāpadasamādānaṃ viya aggahitakālaparicchedakaṃ jīvitapariyantameva hoti, tasmā tassa khandhabhedena bhedo, so avipākattā aphalo. Lokuttarassa pana nevatthi bhedo. Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisatīti. Evaṃ saraṇagamanassa ^b^saṃkileso^eb^ ca ^b^bhedo^eb^ ca veditabbo.

[03]Kasmā panettha vodānaṃ na gahitaṃ, nanu vodānavibhāvanāpi tattha kosallāya hotīti? Saccametaṃ, taṃ pana saṃkilesaggahaṇena atthato dīpitaṃ hotīti na gahitaṃ. Yāni hi tesaṃ saṃkilesakāraṇāni aññāṇādīni ^a^M1.0422^ea^, tesaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ anuppādanena uppannānañca pahānena vodānaṃ hotīti. Evamettha ‘‘saraṇaṃ saraṇagamana’’ntiādīnaṃ papañco veditabbo. Imassa pana yathāvuttapapañcassa idha avacane kāraṇaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘so pana idha vuccamāno’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^saraṇavaṇṇanato^eb^ti sāmaññaphalasutte vuttasaraṇavaṇṇanato.
[06]Saraṇagamanasaṃkilesabhedakathā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Evaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0369^ea^^b^dhāretū^eb^ti evaṃ jānātūti attho. Ettha ^b^ko upāsako^eb^ti sarūpapucchā, tasmā kiṃlakkhaṇo upāsakoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Kasmā^eb^ti hetupucchā. Tena kena pavattinimittena upāsakasaddo tasmiṃ puggale niruḷhoti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kasmā upāsakoti vuccatī’’^eb^ti. Saddassa hi abhidheyyapavattinimittaṃ tadatthassa tabbhāvakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Kimassa sīla^eb^nti kīdisaṃ assa upāsakassa sīlaṃ, kittakena sīlenāyaṃ sīlasampanno nāma hotīti attho. ^b^Ko ājīvo^eb^ti ko assa sammāājīvo. So pana micchājīvassa parivajjanena hotīti sopi vibhajīyati. ^b^Kā vipattī^eb^ti kassa sīlassa ājīvassa vā vipatti. Anantarassa hi vidhi vā paṭisedho vā. ^b^Sampattī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabba^eb^nti kathaṃ veditabbaṃ? Vuccate – ^b^ko upāsako^eb^ti khattiyādīsu yo koci tisaraṇaṃ gato gahaṭṭho. Saraṇagamanameva hettha kāraṇaṃ, na jātiādiviseso. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘yato kho, mahānāma, buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti. Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako hotī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.1033).

[03]^b^Kasmā upāsako^eb^ti ratanattayaupāsanato. Teneva saraṇagamanena tattha ca sakkaccakiriyāya ādaragāravabahumānādiyogena payirupāsanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. So hi buddhaṃ upāsatīti upāsako. Dhammaṃ, saṅghaṃ upāsatīti upāsako.

[03]^b^Kimassa^eb^^a^M1.0423^ea^^b^sīla^eb^nti pañca veramaṇiyo. ^b^Veramaṇiyo^eb^ti cettha veraṃ vuccati pāṇātipātādīsu dussīlyaṃ, tassa mananato hananato vināsanato veramaṇiyo pañca viratiyo viratippadhānattā tassa sīlassa. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā, kāmesumicchācārā, musāvādā, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti. Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako sīlavā hotī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.1033).

[03]^b^Ko ājīvo^eb^ti pañca micchāvaṇijjā pahāya dhammena samena jīvitakappanaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – ‘‘pañcimā, bhikkhave, vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā. Katamā pañca? Satthavaṇijjā sattavaṇijjā ^a^V1.0370^ea^ maṃsavaṇijjā majjavaṇijjā visavaṇijjā. Imā kho, bhikkhave, pañca vaṇijjā upāsakena akaraṇīyā’’ti (a. ni. 5.177).

[03]Ettha ca ^b^satthavaṇijjā^eb^ti āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ katvā vā kāretvā vā yathākataṃ vā paṭilabhitvā tassa vikkayo. ^b^Sattavaṇijjā^eb^ti manussavikkayo. ^b^Maṃsavaṇijjā^eb^ti sūnakārādayo viya migasūkarādike posetvā maṃsaṃ sampādetvā vikkayo. ^b^Majjavaṇijjā^eb^ti yaṃ kiñci majjaṃ yojetvā tassa vikkayo. ^b^Visavaṇijjā^eb^ti visaṃ yojetvā saṅgahetvā vā tassa vikkayo. Tattha satthavaṇijjā paroparodhanimittatāya akaraṇīyā vuttā, sattavaṇijjā abhujissabhāvakaraṇato, maṃsavisavaṇijjā vadhahetuto, majjavaṇijjā pamādaṭṭhānatoti veditabbā.

[03]^b^Kā vipattī^eb^ti yā tasseva sīlassa ca ājīvassa ca vipatti bhedo kopo pakopo ca, ayamassa vipatti. Apica yāya esa caṇḍālo ceva hoti malañca paṭikuṭṭho ca, sāpissa vipattīti veditabbā. Te ca atthato assaddhiyādayo pañca dhammā honti. Yathāha –

[08]‘‘Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapaṭikuṭṭho ca. Katamehi pañcahi? Assaddho hoti, dussīlo hoti, kotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, maṅgalaṃ pacceti, no kammaṃ ^a^M1.0424^ea^, ito ca bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesati, tattha ca pubbakāraṃ karotī’’ti (a. ni. 5.175).

[03]Ettha ca ^b^upāsakapaṭikuṭṭho^eb^ti upāsakanihīno. Buddhādīsu kammakammaphalesu ca saddhāvipariyāyo assaddhiyaṃ micchādhimokkho, yathāvuttena assaddhiyena samannāgato ^b^assaddho^eb^. Yathāvuttasīlavipattiājīvavipattivasena ^b^dussīlo^eb^. ‘‘Iminā diṭṭhādinā idaṃ nāma maṅgalaṃ hotī’’ti evaṃ bālajanaparikappitakotūhalasaṅkhātena diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena samannāgato ^b^kotūhalamaṅgaliko. Maṅgalaṃ paccetī^eb^ti diṭṭhamaṅgalādibhedaṃ maṅgalameva pattiyāyati. ^b^No kamma^eb^nti kammassakataṃ no pattiyāyati. ^b^Itobahiddhā^eb^ti ito sabbaññubuddhasāsanato bahiddhā bāhirakasamaye. ^b^Dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesatī^eb^ti duppaṭipannaṃ dakkhiṇārahasaññī gavesati. ^b^Pubbakāraṃ karotī^eb^ti dānamānanādikaṃ kusalakiriyaṃ paṭhamataraṃ karoti. Ettha ca dakkhiṇeyyapaayesanapubbakāre ekaṃ katvā pañca dhammā veditabbā.
[03]^b^Kā^eb^^a^V1.0371^ea^^b^sampattī^eb^ti sāva tassa sīlasampadā ca ājīvasampadā ca sampatti, ye cassa ratanabhāvādikarā saddhādayo pañca dhammā. Yathāha –

[08]‘‘Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīko ca. Katamehi pañcahi? Saddho hoti, sīlavā hoti, na kotūhalamaṅgaliko hoti, kammaṃ pacceti, no maṅgalaṃ, na ito bahiddhā dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesati, idha ca pubbakāraṃ karotī’’ti.

[03]Ettha ca catunnampi parisānaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena upāsakova ratanaṃ ^b^upāsakaratanaṃ,^eb^ guṇasobhākittisaddasugandhatāhi upāsakova padumaṃ ^b^upāsakapadumaṃ,^eb^ tathā ^b^upāsakapuṇḍarīko^eb^ ca veditabbo. Sesamettha vipattiyaṃ vuttavipariyāyena viññeyyaṃ. Evamidaṃ ‘‘ko upāsako’’tiādikaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ vitthārato veditabbaṃ. Imassa pana pakiṇṇakassa idha vitthāretvā avacane kāraṇaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘taṃ atibhāriyakaraṇato’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Ādimhī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0425^ea^ ādiatthe. ^b^Koṭiya^eb^nti pariyantakoṭiyaṃ. ^b^Vihāraggenā^eb^ti ovarakakoṭṭhāsena, ‘‘imasmiṃ gabbhe vasantānaṃ idaṃ panasaphalaṃ pāpuṇātī’’tiādinā taṃtaṃvasanaṭṭhānakoṭṭhāsenāti attho. ^b^Ajjata^eb^nti ajja icceva attho. ^b^Pāṇehi upeta^eb^nti iminā tassa saraṇagamanassa āpāṇakoṭikataṃ dassento ^b^‘‘yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattatī’’^eb^tiādīni vatvā puna jīvitenapahaṃ vatthuttayaṃ paṭipūjento saraṇagamanañca rakkhāmīti uppannaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa adhippāyaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘ahañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Pāṇehi upeta^eb^nti hi yāva me pāṇā dharanti, tāva saraṇaṃ upetaṃ, upento na vācāmattena na ekavāraṃ cittuppādanamattena, atha kho pāṇānaṃ pariccajanavasena yāvajīvaṃ upetanti evamettha attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Adhivāsetū^eb^ti sādiyatu, taṃ pana sādiyanaṃ manasā sampaṭiggaho hotīti āha ^b^‘‘sampaṭicchatū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kāyaṅga^eb^nti kāyameva aṅganti vadanti, kāyassa vā aṅgaṃ sīsādi kāyaṅgaṃ, sīsādi sarīrāvayavanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Vācaṅga^eb^nti ‘‘hotu sādhū’’ti evamādivācāya aṅgaṃ avayavaṃ. Vācaṅgassa copanaṃ vācāya pavattanamevāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Abbhantareyevā^eb^ti attano cittasantāneyeva. ^b^Khantiṃ cāretvā^eb^ti khantiṃ pavattetvā, ruciṃ uppādetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. ‘‘Khantiṃ dhāretvā’’tipi pāṭho, uppannaṃ ruciṃ abbhantareyeva dhāretvā vacībhedena apakāsetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]Kathaṃ ^a^V1.0372^ea^ pana verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ aññāsi. Na hi tena sakkā bhagavato cittappavatti paccakkhato viññātuṃ, tasmā ‘‘bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā’’ti kasmā vuttanti ce? Kiñcāpi tena na sakkā cittappavatti paccakkhato viññātuṃ, tathāpi ākārasallakkhaṇakusalatāya anvayabyatirekavasena anumānato aññāsīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘sace me samaṇo gotamo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ākārasallakkhaṇakusalatāyā^eb^ti cittappavattiākāravijānane chekatāya, adhippāyavijānane kusalatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Dasanakhasamodhānasamujjala^eb^nti dvīsu hatthesu dasannaṃ nakhānaṃ samodhānena ekībhāvena samujjalantaṃ. ^b^Añjali^eb^nti hatthapuṭaṃ. ^b^Paṭimukhoyevā^eb^ti abhimukhoyeva, na bhagavato piṭṭhiṃ dassetvāti attho. ^b^Vanditvā^eb^ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā.
[06]Upāsakattapaṭivedanākathā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^16^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Susassakālepī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0426^ea^ sampannasassakālepi. ^b^Atisamagghepī^eb^ti atisayena appagghepi, yadā kiñcideva datvā bahuṃ pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇaṃ gaṇhanti, tādise kālepīti attho. Sāliādi dhaññaṃ ^b^pubbaṇṇaṃ,^eb^ muggamāsādi ^b^aparaṇṇaṃ^eb^. Dvidhā pavattaṃ īhitaṃ etthāti dvīhitikāti majjhapadalopībāhiratthasamāsoyamīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘dvidhā pavattaīhitikā’’^eb^ti. Īhanaṃ īhitanti īhitasaddoyaṃ bhāvasādhanoti āha ^b^‘‘īhitaṃ nāma iriyā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^iriyā^eb^ti kiriyā. Kassa panesā kiriyāti āha ^b^‘‘cittairiyā’’^eb^ti, cittakiriyā cittappayogoti attho. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘cittaīhā’’^eb^ti. Kathaṃ panettha īhitassa dvidhā pavattīti āha ^b^‘‘lacchāma nu kho’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^lacchāma nu kho^eb^ti idaṃ duggatānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Jīvituṃ vā sakkhissāma nu kho, no^eb^ti idaṃ pana issarānaṃ vasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Bhikkhamānā^eb^ti yācamānā. ‘‘Duhitikā’’tipi pāṭho. Tatthāpi vuttanayenevattho veditabbo. Dvi-saddassa hi du-saddādesenāyaṃ niddeso hoti. Dukkhaṃ vā īhitaṃ ettha na sakkā koci payogo sukhena kātunti ^b^duhitikā,^eb^ dukkarajīvitappayogāti attho.

[03]Du-sadde vā ukārassa vakāraṃ katvā dvīhitikāti ayaṃ niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Byādhi rogo^eb^ti etāni ‘‘āturatā’’ti imassa vevacanāni. Tena setaṭṭikā nāma ekā rogajātīti dasseti. So pana rogo pāṇakadosena sambhavati. Eko kira pāṇako ^a^V1.0373^ea^ nāḷamajjhagataṃ gaṇṭhiṃ vijjhati, yena viddhattā nikkhantampi sālisīsaṃ khīraṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pacchinnakhīra’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^Vuttasassa^eb^nti vapitasassaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti verañjāyaṃ. Salākāmattaṃ vuttaṃ etthāti ^b^salākāvuttā,^eb^ purimapade uttarapadalopenāyaṃ niddeso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘salākā eva sampajjatī’’^eb^ti. Yaṃ tattha vuttaṃ vāpitaṃ, taṃ salākāmattameva ahosi, phalaṃ na jāyatīti attho. ^b^Sampajjatī^eb^ti ca iminā ‘‘salākāvuttā’’ti etthāyaṃ vuttasaddo nipphattiatthoti dasseti. ^b^Salākāyā^eb^ti veḷuvilīvatālapaṇṇādīhi katasalākāya. ^b^Dhaññavikkayakānaṃ santika^eb^nti dhaññaṃ vikkiṇantīti dhaññavikkayakā, tesaṃ samīpanti attho. ^b^Kayakesū^eb^ti dhaññagaṇhanakesu. ^b^Kiṇitvā^eb^ti gahetvā. ^b^Dhaññakaraṇaṭṭhāne^eb^ti koṭṭhāgārassa samīpaṭṭhāne, dhaññaminanaṭṭhāneti vuttaṃ hoti ^a^M1.0427^ea^. ^b^Vaṇṇajjhakkha^eb^nti kahāpaṇaparikkhakaṃ. ^b^Nasukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetu^eb^nti paggayhatīti paggaho, patto. Tena paggahena pattenāti attho, pattaṃ gahetvā bhikkhācariyāya yāpetuṃ na sakkāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘paggahena yo uñcho’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Nasukarā^eb^ti sukarabhāvo ettha natthīti nasukarā. ^b^Piṇḍāya caritvā^eb^ti piṇḍāya caraṇahetu. Hetuatthepi hi tvāsaddameke icchanti.

[03]Uttarāpathato āgatā, uttarāpatho vā nivāso etesanti uttarāpathakāti vattabbe niruttinayena ‘‘uttarāhakā’’ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uttarāpathavāsikā’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Uttarāpathakā’’icceva vā pāḷipāṭho veditabbo. Keci pana ‘‘uttaraṃ visiṭṭhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ āharantīti uttarāhakā, uttaraṃ vā adhikaṃ agghaṃ nentīti uttarāhakā’’tiādinā aññena pakārena atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti. ^b^Assānaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhāne^eb^ti assānaṃ ākaraṭṭhāne. ^b^Verañja^eb^nti verañjāyaṃ. Bhummatthe hetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^Mandira^eb^nti assasālaṃ. ^b^Assamaṇḍalikāyoti paññāyiṃsū^eb^ti parimaṇḍalākārena katattā assamaṇḍalikāyoti pākaṭā ahesuṃ. Evaṃ katānañca assasālānaṃ bahuttā bahuvacananiddeso kato. Dasannaṃ dasannaṃ assānaṃ vasanokāso ekekā assamaṇḍalikātipi vadanti. ^b^Addhānakkhamā na hontī^eb^ti dīghakālaṃ pavattetuṃ khamā na honti, na cirakālappavattinoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]Gaṅgāya dakkhiṇā disā appatirūpadeso, uttarā disā patirūpadesoti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘na hi te’’^eb^tiādi. Gaṅgāya dakkhiṇatīrajātā ^b^dakkhiṇāpathamanussā^eb^. ‘‘Amhākaṃ buddho’’ti evaṃ buddhaṃ mamāyantīti ^b^buddhamāmakā^eb^. Evaṃ sesesupi. ^b^Paṭiyādetu^eb^nti sampādetuṃ. ^b^Niccabhattasaṅkhepenā^eb^ti niccabhattākārena. ^b^Pubbaṇhasamaya^eb^nti idaṃ bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘pubbaṇhasamayeti^eb^^a^V1.0374^ea^^b^attho’’^eb^ti. Accantasaṃyoge vā idaṃ upayogavacananti dassetuṃ yathā accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati, tathā atthaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘pubbaṇhe vā samaya’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Eva^eb^nti evaṃ pacchā vuttanayena atthe vuccamāne. Nanu ca vihāre nisīdantāpi antaravāsakaṃ nivāsetvāva nisīdanti, tasmā ‘‘nivāsetvā’’ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘vihāranivāsanaparivattanavasenā’’^eb^tiādi. Vihāranivāsanaparivattanañca vihāre nisinnakāle nivatthampi puna gāmappavesanasamaye cāletvā ^a^M1.0428^ea^ ito cito ca saṇṭhapetvā sakkaccaṃ nivāsanamevāti veditabbaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘na hi te tato pubbe anivatthā ahesu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pattacīvaramādāyā^eb^ti pattañca cīvarañca gahetvā. Gahaṇañcettha na kevalaṃ hattheneva, atha kho yena kenaci ākārena dhāraṇamevāti dassento yathāsambhavamatthayojanaṃ karoti ^b^‘‘pattaṃ hatthehī’’^eb^tiādinā.

[03]^b^Gatagataṭṭhāne^eb^ti assamaṇḍalikāsu sampattasampattaṭṭhāne. ^b^Udukkhale koṭṭetvā koṭṭetvā paribhuñjantī^eb^ti ettha kasmā pana te bhikkhū sayameva evaṃ katvā paribhuñjanti, kimevaṃ laddhaṃ kappiyakārakehi yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā pacāpetvā sayaṃ vā pacitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti āha ^b^‘‘therānaṃ koci kappiyakārako natthī’’^eb^tiādi. Kappiyākappiyabhāvaṃ anapekkhitvā bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ kātuṃ sāruppaṃ na hotīti vatvā puna akappiyabhāvampi dassento āha ^b^‘‘na ca vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. Bhājanādipariharaṇavasena bahubhaṇḍikatāya abhāvato vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sallahukavuttitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sakaṃ sakaṃ paṭivīsa^eb^nti attano attano koṭṭhāsaṃ. ^b^Appossukkā^eb^ti samaṇadhammato aññattha nirussāhā. ^b^Tadupiya^eb^nti tadanurūpaṃ. ^b^Pisatī^eb^ti cuṇṇeti. Puññañāṇavisesehi kattabbakammassa manāpatā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘puññavatā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Na^eb^nti naṃ patthapulakaṃ. ‘‘Na tato paṭṭhāyā’’ti vacanato tato pubbe bhagavato piṇḍāya caraṇampi dassitanti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Laddhā^eb^ti labhitvā. ‘‘Laddho’’ti vā pāṭho, upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ neva laddhoti attho. Kadā pana thero upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhoti? Vuccate (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.11; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.219-223) – ekadā kira bhagavā nāgasamālattherena saddhiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno dvedhāpathaṃ patto. Thero maggā ukkamma ‘‘bhagavā ahaṃ iminā maggena gacchāmī’’ti āha. Atha naṃ bhagavā ‘‘ehi bhikkhu, iminā gacchāmā’’ti āha. So ‘‘handa bhagavā tumhākaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhatha, ahaṃ iminā gacchāmī’’ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ chamāyaṃ ṭhapetuṃ āraddho. Atha bhagavā ‘‘āhara bhikkhū’’ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gato. Tassapi bhikkhuno itarena maggena ^a^V1.0375^ea^ gacchato corā pattacīvarañceva hariṃsu, sīsañca bhindiṃsu. So ‘‘bhagavā dāni me paṭisaraṇaṃ, na añño’’ti cintetvā lohitena gaḷantena bhagavato santikaṃ āgami. ‘‘Kimidaṃ bhikkhū’’ti ca vutte taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Atha ^a^M1.0429^ea^ naṃ bhagavā ‘‘mā cintayi bhikkhu, etaṃ kāraṇaṃyeva te nivārayimhā’’ti vatvā samassāsesi.

[03]Ekadā pana bhagavā meghiyattherena saddhiṃ pācīnavaṃsamigadāye jantugāmaṃ agamāsi. Tatrāpi meghiyo jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā nadītīre pāsādikaṃ ambavanaṃ disvā ‘‘bhagavā tumhākaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhatha, ahaṃ etasmiṃ ambavane samaṇadhammaṃ karomī’’ti vatvā bhagavatā tikkhattuṃ nivāriyamānopi gantvā akusalavitakkehi anvāsatto paccāgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Tampi bhagavā ‘‘idameva te kāraṇaṃ sallakkhayitvā nivārayimhā’’ti vatvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. Tattha gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto bhikkhū āmantesi – ‘‘bhikkhave, idānimhi mahallako, ekacce bhikkhū ‘iminā maggena gacchāmā’ti vutte aññena gacchanti, ekacce mayhaṃ pattacīvaraṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipanti, mayhaṃ nibaddhupaṭṭhākaṃ bhikkhuṃ jānāthā’’ti. Bhikkhūnaṃ dhammasaṃvego udapādi. Athāyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ‘‘ahaṃ, bhante, tumheyeva patthayamāno satasahassakappādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūresiṃ, nanu mādiso mahāpañño upaṭṭhāko nāma vaṭṭati, ahaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī’’ti āha. Taṃ bhagavā ‘‘alaṃ, sāriputta, yassaṃ disāyaṃ tvaṃ viharasi, asuññāyeva sā disā, tava ovādo buddhānaṃ ovādasadiso, na me tayā upaṭṭhākakiccaṃ atthī’’ti paṭikkhipi. Etenevupāyena mahāmoggallānaṃ ādiṃ katvā asītimahāsāvakā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Sabbe bhagavā paṭikkhipi.

[03]Ānandatthero pana tuṇhīyeva nisīdi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū āhaṃsu ‘‘āvuso, bhikkhusaṅgho upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ yācati, tvampi yācāhī’’ti. Yācitvā laddhaṭṭhānaṃ nāma āvuso kīdisaṃ hoti, kiṃ maṃ satthā na passati, sace rocessati, ‘‘ānando maṃ upaṭṭhātū’’ti vakkhatīti. Atha bhagavā ‘‘na, bhikkhave, ānando aññena ussāhetabbo, sayameva jānitvā maṃ upaṭṭhahissatī’’ti āha. Tato bhikkhū ‘‘uṭṭhehi āvuso ānanda, uṭṭhehi, āvuso ānanda, dasabalaṃ upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ yācāhī’’ti āhaṃsu. Thero uṭṭhahitvā cattāro paṭikkhepe ca catasso ca āyācanāti aṭṭha vare yāci.

[03]^b^Cattāro^eb^^a^M1.0430^ea^^b^paṭikkhepā^eb^ nāma ‘‘sace me, bhante bhagavā, attanā laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ na dassati ^a^V1.0376^ea^, piṇḍapātaṃ na dassati, ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasituṃ na dassati, nimantanaṃ gahetvā na gamissati, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī’’ti vatvā ‘‘kaṃ panettha, ānanda, ādīnavaṃ addasā’’ti vutte āha ‘‘sacāhaṃ, bhante, imāni vatthūni labhissāmi, bhavissanti vattāro ‘ānando dasabalena laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjati, piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjati, ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasati, ekanimantanaṃ gacchati, etaṃ lābhaṃ labhanto tathāgataṃ upaṭṭhāti, ko evaṃ upaṭṭhahato bhāro’’’ti. Ime cattāro paṭikkhepe yāci.

[03]^b^Catasso āyācanā^eb^ nāma ‘‘sace, bhante bhagavā, mayā gahitaṃ nimantanaṃ gamissati, sacāhaṃ tiroraṭṭhā tirojanapadā bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgataparisaṃ āgatakkhaṇe eva bhagavantaṃ dassetuṃ lacchāmi, yadā me kaṅkhā uppajjati, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ lacchāmi, tathā yaṃ bhagavā mayhaṃ parammukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, taṃ āgantvā mayhaṃ kathessati, evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī’’ti vatvā ‘‘kaṃ panettha, ānanda, ānisaṃsaṃ passasī’’ti vutte āha ‘‘idha, bhante, saddhā kulaputtā bhagavato okāsaṃ alabhantā maṃ evaṃ vadanti ‘sveva, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā saddhiṃ amhākaṃ ghare bhikkhaṃ gaṇheyyāthā’ti. Sace bhagavā tattha na gamissati, icchitakkhaṇeyeva parisaṃ dassetuṃ kaṅkhañca vinodetuṃ okāsaṃ na lacchāmi, bhavissanti vattāro ‘kiṃ ānando dasabalaṃ upaṭṭhāti, ettakampissa anuggahaṃ bhagavā na karotī’ti. Bhagavato ca parammukhā maṃ pucchissanti ‘ayaṃ, āvuso ānanda, gāthā idaṃ suttaṃ idaṃ jātakaṃ kattha desita’nti. Sacāhaṃ taṃ na sampāyissāmi, bhavissanti vattāro ‘ettakampi, āvuso, na jānāsi, kasmā tvaṃ chāyā viya bhagavantaṃ na vijahanto dīgharattaṃ ciraṃ vicarī’ti. Tenāhaṃ parammukhā desitassapi dhammassa puna kathanaṃ icchāmī’’ti. Imā catasso āyācanā yāci. Bhagavāpissa adāsi. Evaṃ ime aṭṭha vare gahetvā nibaddhupaṭṭhāko ahosi.

[03]Tasseva ṭhānantarassa atthāya kappasatasahassaṃ pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalaṃ pāpuṇi, pāpuṇitvā ca upaṭṭhākānaṃ aggo hutvā bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahi. Thero hi upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhakālato paṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ duvidhena udakena tividhena dantakaṭṭhena pādaparikammena piṭṭhiparikammena gandhakuṭipariveṇasammajjanenāti evamādīhi kiccehi upaṭṭhahanto ‘‘imāya nāma velāya satthu idaṃ ^a^M1.0431^ea^ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti cintetvā taṃ taṃ nipphādento mahatiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā ekarattiṃ gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ nava vāre anupariyāyati. Evañhissa ahosi ‘‘sace me thinamiddhaṃ okkameyya, bhagavati pakkosante paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ nāhaṃ sakkuṇeyya’’nti. Tasmā sabbarattiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ hatthena na muñcati, evametassa nibaddhupaṭṭhākaṭṭhānassa ^a^V1.0377^ea^ aladdhabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘no ca kho upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nibaddhupaṭṭhāko nāma natthī^eb^ti niyatupaṭṭhāko nāma natthi. Aniyatupaṭṭhākā pana bhagavato paṭhamabodhiyaṃ bahū ahesuṃ, te dassento āha ^b^‘‘kadāci nāgasamālatthero’’^eb^tiādi. Ñāti ca so pasatthatamaguṇayogato seṭṭho cāti ^b^ñātiseṭṭho^eb^. ^b^Evarūpesu ṭhānesu ayameva patirūpo^eb^ti āpadāsu āmisassa abhisaṅkharitvā dānaṃ nāma ñātakeneva kātuṃ yuttataranti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Mārāvaṭṭanāyā^eb^ti mārena katacittāvaṭṭanāya, mārānubhāvena sañjātacittasammohenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘āvaṭṭetvā mohetvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tiṭṭhantu…pe… tampi māro āvaṭṭeyyā^eb^ti phussassa bhagavato kāle katupacitassa akusalakammassa tadā laddhokāsavasena upaṭṭhitattā. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ –
[21]‘‘Phussassāhaṃ pāvacane, sāvake paribhāsayiṃ;
[22]Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, mā ca bhuñjatha sālayo.
[21]‘‘Tena kammavipākena, temāsaṃ khāditaṃ yavaṃ;
[22]Nimantito brāhmaṇena, verañjāyaṃ vasiṃ tadā’’ti. (apa. thera 1.39.88-89);

[03]^b^Pariyuṭṭhitacitto^eb^ti pariyonaddhacitto, abhibhūtacittoti attho. ^b^Āvaṭṭitapariyosāne āgamiṃsū^eb^ti mārena āvaṭṭetvā gate pacchā āgamiṃsu. ^b^Avisahatāyā^eb^ti asakkuṇeyyatāya. ^b^Abhihaṭabhikkhāyā^eb^ti pacitvā abhihariyamānabhikkhāya. ^b^Nibaddhadānassā^eb^ti ‘‘ettakaṃ kālaṃ bhagavato dassāmā’’ti niccabhattavasena paricchinditvā ṭhapitadānassa. ^b^Appitavatthassā^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ buddhassa catupaccayaparibhogattha’’nti vihāraṃ netvā dinnavatthuno. ^b^Na visahatī^eb^ti na sakkoti. ^b^Abhihaṭabhikkhāsaṅkhepenā^eb^ti abhihaṭabhikkhānīhārena ^a^M1.0432^ea^. ^b^Byāmappabhāyā^eb^ti samantato byāmamattāya pabhāya. Ettha ca anubyañjanānaṃ byāmappabhāya ca nippabhākaraṇaṃ antarāyoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘candimasūriyadevabrahmānampi hī’’^eb^tiādi. Anubyañjanānaṃ byāmappabhāya ekābaddhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘anubyañjanabyāmappabhāppadesaṃ patvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbaññutaññāṇassa antarāyo^eb^ nāma ñeyyadhammesu āvaraṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Assosi kho bhagavā udukkhalasadda^eb^nti kiṃ sayameva uppannaṃ udukkhalasaddaṃ assosīti ^a^V1.0378^ea^ ceti āha ^b^‘‘patthapatthapulakaṃ koṭṭentāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Atthasañhita^eb^nti payojanasādhakaṃ. ^b^Anatthasañhite^eb^ti anatthanissite vacane. Ghātāpekkhaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Yasmiñca yena ghāto nipphādīyati, tasseva tena ghāto kato nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘maggeneva tādisassa vacanassa ghāto samucchedoti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. Sāmiatthe vā bhummavacananti maññamāno evamāhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vacanassa ca samugghāto tammūlakilesānaṃ samugghātenāti veditabbaṃ.

[03]Ākaroti attano anurūpatāya samariyādaṃ saparicchedaṃ phalaṃ nipphattetīti ākāro kāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘ākārehīti kāraṇehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aṭṭhuppattiyutta^eb^nti paccuppannavatthuṃ nissāya pavattaṃ. ^b^Tāya pucchāya vītikkamaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā^eb^ti ‘‘saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhū’’tiādipucchāya tena bhikkhunā katavītikkamaṃ pakāsetvā, vītikkamappakāsanañca kimatthamidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti anujānanatthaṃ.

[03]^b^Natthi kiñci vattabba^eb^nti pubbe vuttanayattā na kiñci ettha apubbaṃ vattabbamatthīti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pubbe vuttameva hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sādhu sādhū^eb^ti idaṃ pasaṃsāyaṃ āmeḍitavacananti āha ^b^‘‘āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sampahaṃsento’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dvīsu ākāresū^eb^ti dhammadesanasikkhāpadapaññattisaṅkhātesu dvīsu kāraṇesu. ^b^Ekaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti dhammaṃ vā desessāmāti evaṃ vuttakāraṇaṃ gahetvā. ^b^Evaṃdubbhikkhe^eb^ti evaṃ dukkhena labhitabbā bhikkhā etthāti evaṃdubbhikkhe kāle, dese vā. ^b^Dullabhapiṇḍe^eb^ti etasseva atthadīpanaṃ. Bhājanādipariharaṇavasena bahubhaṇḍikatāya abhāvato vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘imāya sallahukavuttitāyā’’^eb^ti. Ettakameva alaṃ yāpetunti uttari patthanābhāvato pana ^b^‘‘iminā ca sallekhenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Dubbhikkhaṃ vijita^eb^nti ettha hi bhikkhānaṃ abhāvo ^b^dubbhikkhaṃ^eb^ ‘‘nimmakkhika’’ntiādīsu viya. Bhikkhābhāvoyeva hi taṃnimittacittavighātānaṃ abhāvato bhikkhūhi ^a^M1.0433^ea^ vijito vase vattito. ^b^Lobho vijito^eb^ti āmisahetu ratticchedavassacchedasamuṭṭhāpako loluppādopi tesaṃ nāhosīti āmisalolatāsaṅkhāto lobho vijito. ^b^Icchācāro vijito^eb^ti ‘‘āmisahetu aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammappakāsanavasena guṇavaṇijjaṃ katvā jīvikaṃ kappessāmā’’ti evaṃ pavattaicchācārassa abhāvato yathāvutto icchācāro vijito. Cittuppādamattassapi anuppannabhāvaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘cintā vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Punappunānusocanavasena pana cittapīḷāpi nāhosīti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘vighāto vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Ratticchedo vā^eb^ti sattāhakaraṇīyavasena gantvā bahi aruṇuṭṭhāpanavasena ratticchedo vā na kato sattāhakiccavasenapi katthaci agatattā. Sattāhakiccavasena vippavāsañhi sandhāya ratticchedoti ^a^V1.0379^ea^ aṭṭhakathāvohāro, tatoyeva ca ^b^vassūpanāyikakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (mahāva. aṭṭha. 199) ‘‘ayaṃ panettha pāḷimuttakaratticchedavinicchayo’’ti vatvā ‘‘dhammassavanatthāya animantitena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatī’’tiādinā sattāhakaraṇīyameva vibhattaṃ. ^b^Mahāaṭṭhakathāyampi^eb^ vuttaṃ ‘‘sattāhakiccena gantvā ekabhikkhunāpi ratticchedo vā na kato’’ti. Evañca katvā ratticchedo nāma sattāhakaraṇīyavasena hoti, na aññathāti ratticchedalakkhaṇañca kathitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca paccayavekallasaṅkhāte vassacchedakāraṇe sati ratticchedassapi vuttattā yattha vassacchedakāraṇaṃ labbhati, tattha sattāhakiccena gantumpi vaṭṭatīti siddhanti ^b^cūḷagaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade^eb^ ca vuttaṃ, taṃ suvuttaṃ vassūpanāyikakkhandhake vassacchedādhikāre –
[08]‘‘Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse vassūpagatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gāmo corehi vuṭṭhāsi. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yena gāmo tena gantu’’nti (mahāva. 201) –

[07]Ettha ‘‘sace gāmo avidūragato hoti, tattha piṇḍāya caritvā vihārameva āgantvā vasitabbaṃ. Sace dūragato, sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo. Na sakkā ce hoti, tattheva sabhāgaṭṭhāne vasitabba’’nti (mahāva. aṭṭha. 201) iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanenapi saṃsandanato. Tathā hi gāme vuṭṭhite ^a^M1.0434^ea^ bhikkhāya abhāvato vassacchedepi anāpattiṃ vadantena bhagavatā ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yena gāmo tena gantu’’nti (mahāva. 201) vuttattā bhikkhāya abhāvo vassacchedakāraṇaṃ. Tattha ‘‘sace dūragato, sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo’’ti (mahāva. aṭṭha. 201) idaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ vassacchedakāraṇe sati sattāhakiccena gantumpi vaṭṭatīti imamatthaṃ sādheti.
[03]Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ^b^kenaci^eb^ –

[08]^b^‘‘Ratticchedo^eb^ti sattāhakiccaṃ sandhāya vutto, sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā ratticchedo vā vassacchedo vā ekabhikkhunāpi na katoti vuttaṃ kira mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, tasmā vassacchedassa kāraṇe sati sattāhakiccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti eke. Vinayadharā pana na icchanti, tasmā aṭṭhakathādhippāyo vīmaṃsitabbo’’ti.

[07]Taṃ pana sayaṃ sammūḷhassa paresaṃ mohuppādanamattaṃ. Na hi vinayadharānaṃ anicchāya kāraṇaṃ dissati ^a^V1.0380^ea^ aṭṭhakathāya virujjhanato yuttiabhāvato ca. Yañhi kāraṇaṃ vassacchedepi anāpattiṃ sādheti, tasmiṃ sati vinā vassacchedaṃ sattāhakiccena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti kā nāma yutti. ‘‘Pacchimikāya tattha vassaṃ upagacchāmā’’ti idaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anurūpaparivitakkanapaadīpanaṃ, na pana visesatthaparidīpanaṃ. Tathā hi dubbhikkhatāya vassacchedakaraṇasabbhāvato purimikāya tāva vassacchedepi anāpatti. Pacchimikāyaṃ anupagantukāmatāya gamanepi natthi doso pacchimikāya vassūpanāyikadivasassa asampattabhāvato.

[03]^b^Na kismiñci maññantī^eb^ti kismiñci guṇe sambhāvanavasena na maññanti. ^b^Pakāsetvā^eb^ti paṭiladdhajjhānādiguṇavasena pakāsetvā. ‘‘Pacchā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhaheyyāmā’’ti vuttanayena kucchipaṭijaggane sati tathāpavattaicchācārassa aparisuddhabhāvato ājīvasuddhiyā ca abhāvato puna vāyamitvā saṃvare patiṭṭhātabbanti āha ^b^‘‘pacchā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhaheyyāmā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Kiṃ ida^eb^nti garahaṇavasena vuttaṃ. Sālitaṇḍulehi sampāditaṃ maṃsena upasittaṃ odanaṃ ^b^sālimaṃsodanaṃ^eb^. ^b^Atimaññissatī^eb^ti avaññātakaraṇavasena atikkamitvā maññissati, lāmakaṃ nihīnaṃ katvā maññissatīti vuttaṃ hoti ^a^M1.0435^ea^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ karissatī’’^eb^ti. Heṭṭhā katvā nihīnaṃ katvā ñātaṃ ^b^oññātaṃ^eb^. ^b^Avaññāta^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Svāya^eb^nti so ayaṃ janapado. ^b^Imāya paṭipattiyā^eb^ti verañjāyaṃ pūritāya sudukkarāya paṭipattiyā. ^b^Tumhe nissāyā^eb^ti tumhākaṃ imaṃ appicchapaṭipadaṃ nissāya. ^b^Sabrahmacārīsaṅkhātā^eb^ti chabbaggiyādayo vuttā. ^b^Tumhākaṃ antare nisīditvā^eb^ti tumhākaṃ majjhe nisīditvā, tumhehi saddhiṃ nisīditvāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Omāna^eb^nti atimānaṃ. Atimānoyeva hettha nihīnatāya ‘‘omāna’’nti vutto, na pana hīḷetvā maññanaṃ. Tumhehi, ānanda, sappurisehi vijitaṃ sālimaṃsodanaṃ pacchimā janatā atimaññissatīti evamettha pāḷiṃ yojetvā atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ laddhaṃ, teneva tussitvā sālimaṃsodanapatthanāya chinnattā ca tumhehi vijitaṃ abhibhūtaṃ sālimaṃsodanaṃ pacchimā janatā tattha patthanaṃ chindituṃ asamatthatāya atimaññissatīti.
[06]Dubbhikkhakathā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^17^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āyasmāti vā devānaṃpiyāti vā bhadrabhavanti vā piyasamudācāro esoti āha ^b^‘‘āyasmāti^eb^^a^V1.0381^ea^^b^piyavacanameta’’^eb^nti. Viññujātikā hi paraṃ piyena samudācarantā ‘‘bhava’’nti vā ‘‘devānaṃpiyā’’ti vā ‘‘āyasmā’’ti vā samudācaranti, tasmā sammukhā sambodhanavasena āvusoti, tirokkhaṃ āyasmāti ayampi samudācāro. Tayidaṃ piyavacanaṃ garugāravasappatissavasena vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘garugāravasappatissādhivacanameta’’^eb^nti. Guṇamahattatāya mahāmoggallāno, na cūḷamoggallānassa atthitāyāti āha ^b^‘‘mahā ca so guṇamahantatāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pappaṭakoja^eb^nti pathavīsandhārakaṃ udakaṃ āhacca ṭhite mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhimatale samuṭṭhitaṃ udakoghena ajjhotthaṭe bhūmippadese sañjātakaddamapaṭalasadisaṃ atimadhurapathavīmaṇḍaṃ. ^b^Na me taṃ assa patirūpa^eb^nti taṃ anāpucchā karaṇaṃ na me anucchavikaṃ bhaveyyāti attho. Anāpucchā karontena ca yathā bhagavā icchiticchitaṃ kiñci anāpucchā karoti, evamahampīti bhagavatā samānaṃ katvā attānaṃ mānena kataṃ viya bhavissatīti ^a^M1.0436^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘yugaggāho viya bhagavatā saddhiṃ kato bhaveyyā’’^eb^ti. Parena hi saddhiṃ attānaṃ yugaṃ yugaḷaṃ samānaṃ katvā gāho, tassa mama vā ko visesoti gahaṇaṃ ^b^yugaggāho^eb^.

[03]^b^Sampanna^eb^nti sampattiyuttaṃ. Sā panettha rasasampatti adhippetā sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sampannanti madhuraṃ sādurasanti attho’’^eb^ti. Tividhañhi sampannaṃ paripuṇṇasamaṅgīmadhuravasena. Tattha –
[21]‘‘Sampannaṃ sālikedāraṃ, suvā bhuñjanti kosiya;
[22]Paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe’’ti. (jā. 1.14.1) –

[07]Idaṃ ^b^paripuṇṇasampannaṃ^eb^ nāma. Paripuṇṇampi hi samantato pannaṃ pattanti sampannanti vuccati. ‘‘Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato sampanno samannāgato’’ti (vibha. 511) idaṃ ^b^samaṅgīsampannaṃ^eb^ nāma. Samaṅgīpi hi sammadeva panno gato upagatoti sampannoti vuccati. ‘‘Tatrassa rukkho sampannaphalo ca upapannaphalo cā’’ti (ma. ni. 2.48) idaṃ ^b^madhurasampannaṃ^eb^ nāma. Tattha madhurasampannaṃ idhādhippetanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Upapannaphalo^eb^ti bahuphalo. ^b^Assā^eb^ti pathaviyā heṭṭhimatalassa. ^b^Opammanidassanattha^eb^nti upamāya nidassanatthaṃ. ^b^Anīḷaka^eb^nti niddosaṃ. Niddosatā cettha makkhikādirahitatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘nimmakkhika’’^eb^ntiādi. Natthi ettha makkhikāti nimmakkhikaṃ. Makkhikāsaddena cettha makkhikaṇḍakampi sāmaññato gahitanti vadanti. Teneva ^b^tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ ‘‘nimmakkhikanti imassevatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ nimmakkhikaṇḍakanti vuttaṃ, makkhikāhi tāsaṃ aṇḍakehi ^a^V1.0382^ea^ ca virahitanti attho’’ti. Ayaṃ panettha amhākaṃ khanti ‘‘makkhikānaṃ aṇḍāni makkhikaṇḍāni, natthi ettha makkhikaṇḍānīti nimmakkhikaṇḍanti. Iminā makkhikānaṃ aṇḍehi rahitatā vuttā, ‘nimmakkhika’nti iminā pana makkhikānaṃyeva abhāvo vutto’’ti. ^b^Etaṃ kira madhū^eb^ti khuddakamakkhikāhi katamadhu. ^b^Sabbamadhūhī^eb^ti mahāmakkhikabhamaramakkhikādikatehi. ^b^Agga^eb^nti uttamaṃ. ^b^Seṭṭha^eb^nti pasatthatamaṃ. ^b^Surasa^eb^nti sobhanarasaṃ. ^b^Ojavanta^eb^nti accantamojasampannaṃ.

[03]^b^Āyācanavacanameta^eb^nti iminā sampaṭicchanasampahaṃsanādiatthaṃ nivatteti. ^b^Ekaṃ hattha^eb^nti ekaṃ pāṇitalaṃ. ^b^‘‘Abhinimminissāmī’’^eb^ti vuttamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ ^b^‘‘pathavīsadisaṃ karissāmī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ayaṃ nu kho pathavī, udāhu na aya^eb^nti iminā ^a^M1.0437^ea^ nimmitapathaviyā pakatipathaviyā ca sandissamānattā ‘‘esā nu kho amhākaṃ pathavī, udāhu aññā’’ti uppajjamānakukkuccaṃ dasseti. Nibaddhavipulāgamo gāmo ^b^nigamo,^eb^ pavattitamahāāyo mahāgāmoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Na vā esa vipallāso^eb^ti pubbapakkhaṃ nidasseti. Kasmā panesa vipallāso na hotīti āha ^b^‘‘acinteyyo hi iddhimato iddhivisayo’’^eb^ti. Iddhibaleneva tesaṃ sattānaṃ tādiso vipallāso na bhavissatīti adhippāyo. Idāni aññathā vipallāsappaṭilābhaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Garahantā^eb^ti sammukhā garahantā. ^b^Upavadantā^eb^ti parammukhā akkosantā.

[03]Nanu ca uttarakuruṃ piṇḍāya gamanaṃ paṭisedhetvā vipallāsampi sattā paṭilabheyyunti kāraṇaṃ na vuttaṃ, tasmā kimettha kāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘tattha kiñcāpī’’^eb^tiādi. Yadipi na vuttaṃ, tathāpi ‘‘vipallāsampi sattā paṭilabheyyu’’nti pubbe adhikatattā teneva kāraṇena piṇḍāya uttarakurugamanampi bhagavatā paṭisiddhanti viññāyati, tasmā tadeva kāraṇaṃ idhāpi gahetabbanti dassento āha ^b^‘‘pubbe vuttanayeneva gahetabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vipallāsampi sattā paṭilabheyyu^eb^nti idaṃ idha avuttampi ānetvā sambandhitabbanti adhippāyo. Atthopi cassa vuttasadisameva veditabboti. ‘‘Evaṃ pana vipallāsaṃ paṭilabheyyu’’ntiādinā pacchā vuttameva atthavikappaṃ sandhāya vadati. Yaṃ pana tattha vuttaṃ ‘‘te guṇe nibbattetvā dubbhikkhakāle pathaviṃ parivattetvā pappaṭakojaṃ paribhuñjiṃsū’’ti, taṃ apanetvā te guṇe nibbattetvā dubbhikkhakāle uttarakuruṃ gantvā piṇḍāya caritvā paribhuñjiṃsūti evamettha yojanā kātabbā. ^b^Ekena padavītihārenā^eb^ti ettha padassa vītiharaṇaṃ nikkhipanaṃ padavītihāro, padanikkhepo, tasmā ekena padanikkhepenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ekena padavītihārena atikkamitabbaṭṭhānañca samagamanena ^a^V1.0383^ea^ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ antare muṭṭhiratanamattaṃ, tasmā. ^b^Mātikāmattaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā^eb^ti muṭṭhiratanappamāṇaṃ mātikāmattaṃ adhiṭṭhāyāti attho.
[06]Niṭṭhitā mahāmoggallānassa sīhanādakathā.

[03]^b^18^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vinayapaññattiyā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0438^ea^ pubbe apaññattasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Thero hi paññattasikkhāpadāni ṭhapetvā idāni paññapetabbasikkhāpadāni pātimokkhuddesañca sandhāya ‘‘etassa bhagavā kālo, etassa sugata kālo, yaṃ bhagavā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyya, uddiseyya pātimokkha’’nti (pārā. 21) āha. Bhagavatāpi –

[08]‘‘Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena pubbe appatarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni ahesuṃ, bahutarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahiṃsu. Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena etarahi bahutarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni honti, appatarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantīti. Evametaṃ, bhaddāli, hoti, sattesu hāyamānesu saddhamme antaradhāyamāne bahutarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni honti, appatarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantīti. Na tāva, bhaddāli, satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeti, yāva na idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṅghe pātubhavantī’’ti –

[07]Imasmiṃ ^b^bhaddālisutte^eb^ (ma. ni. 2.145) viya ekaccesu paññattesupi tato paraṃ paññapetabbāni sandhāya ‘‘na tāva, sāriputta, satthā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetī’’ti vuttaṃ. Idheva ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘sāmampi pacanaṃ samaṇasāruppaṃ na hoti, na ca vaṭṭatī’’ti vacanaṃ ‘‘ratticchedo vā vassacchedo vā na kato’’ti vacanañca pubbe paññattasikkhāpadānaṃ sabbhāve pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesasikkhāpadānañceva pātimokkhuddesassa ca therassa āyācanena paññattattā ^b^‘‘mūlato pabhuti nidānaṃ dassetu’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Rahogatassā^eb^ti raho janavivittaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatassa. Tena gaṇasaṅgaṇikābhāvena therassa kāyavivekamāha. ^b^Paṭisallīnassā^eb^ti nānārammaṇacārato cittassa nivattiyā paṭi sammadeva nilīnassa tattha avisaṭacittassa. Tena cittasaṅgaṇikābhāvenassa pubbabhāgiyaṃ cittavivekamāha. ^b^Cira^eb^nti kālāpekkhaṃ accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^Cirā^eb^ti cirakālayuttā ṭhiti abhedena vuttā.

[03]^b^Etaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0439^ea^^a^V1.0384^ea^^b^na sakkotī^eb^ti etaṃ vinicchinituṃ na sakkoti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayaṃ dassetvā idāni theravādaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘mahāpadumatthero panā’’^eb^tiādi. Aṭṭhakathāyampi ‘‘na sakkotī’’ti idaṃ yasmā jānamānopi sammadeva paricchindituṃ na sakkoti, tasmā vuttanti vadanti. ^b^Soḷasavidhāya paññāya matthakaṃ pattassā^eb^ti ^b^majjhimanikāye anupadasuttantadesanāya^eb^ (ma. ni. 3.93) –

[08]‘‘Mahāpañño bhikkhave sāriputto, puthupañño bhikkhave sāriputto, hāsapañño bhikkhave sāriputto, javanapañño bhikkhave sāriputto, tikkhapañño bhikkhave sāriputto, nibbedhikapañño bhikkhave sāriputto’’ti –
[07]Evamāgatā mahāpaññādikā cha, tasmiṃyeva sutte āgatā navānupubbavihārasamāpattipaññā, arahattamaggapaññāti imāsaṃ soḷasappabhedānaṃ paññānaṃ sāvakavisaye ukkaṭṭhakoṭippattassa.

[03]Kasmā panettha bhagavā vipassīādīnaṃ sattannaṃyeva buddhānaṃ brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitikāciraṭṭhitikabhāvaṃ kathesi, na buddhavaṃsadesanāyaṃ viya pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṃ, tato vā pana bhiyyoti? Yesaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ paṭivedhasāsanaṃ ekaṃsato nicchayena ajjāpi dharati, na antarahitaṃ, te eva kittento vipassīādīnaṃyeva bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitikāciraṭṭhitikabhāvaṃ idha kathesi. Tesaṃyeva hi sāvakā tadā ceva etarahi ca suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā, na aññesaṃ parinibbutattā. Siddhatthatissaphussānaṃ kira buddhānaṃ sāvakā suddhāvāsesu uppannā uppattisamanantarameva imasmiṃ sāsane upakādayo viya arahattaṃ adhigantvā na cirasseva parinibbāyiṃsu, na tattha tattha sāvakā yāvatāyukaṃ aṭṭhaṃsūti vadanti. Apubbācarimaniyamo pana aparāparaṃ saṃsaraṇakasattāvāsavasena ekissā lokadhātuyā icchitoti na tenetaṃ virujjhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^19^eb^^b^.^eb^ Asādhāraṇo hetu, sādhāraṇo paccayoti evamādivibhāgena idha payojanaṃ natthi, vipassīādīnaṃ pana brahmacariyassa aciraṭṭhitikatāya ciraṭṭhitikatāya ca kāraṇapucchāparattā codanāyāti āha ^b^‘‘hetu paccayoti ubhayametaṃ kāraṇādhivacana’’^eb^nti. Hinoti tena ^a^M1.0440^ea^ phalanti hetūti karaṇasādhanoyaṃ hetusaddoti āha ^b^‘‘tena tassa phala’’^eb^ntiādi. Kattusādhanopi hetusaddo no na yujjati hinoti phalassa hetubhāvaṃ upagacchatīti hetūti. Taṃ paṭicca eti pavattatīti taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca tassa phalaṃ eti pavattati nibbattatīti attho.

[03]^b^Kilāsuno^eb^^a^V1.0385^ea^^b^ahesu^eb^nti appossukkā ahesuṃ, nirussāhā ahesunti attho. Sā pana nirussāhatā na ālasiyavasenāti āha ^b^‘‘na ālasiyakilāsuno’’^eb^ti, ālasiyavasena kilāsuno nāhesunti attho. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ālasiyaṃ vā^eb^ti iminā thinamiddhavasappavattānaṃ akusalānaṃ abhāvamāha. ^b^Osannavīriyatā vā^eb^ti iminā pana ‘‘ālasiyābhāvepi antamaso annabhāranesādānampi sakkaccaṃyeva dhammaṃ desetī’’ti vacanato yassa kassacipi dhammadesanāya nirussāhatā natthīti dīpeti sabbesaṃ samakeneva ussāhena dhammadesanāya pavattanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘buddhā hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Osannavīriyā^eb^ti ohīnavīriyā, appossukkāti attho. ^b^Ussannavīriyā^eb^ti adhikavīriyā, mahussāhāti attho. ^b^Vegenā^eb^ti javena. Dhamme garu etesanti ^b^dhammagaruno^eb^. Dhamme gāravametesanti ^b^dhammagāravā^eb^. Vipassissa bhagavato kāle asīti vassasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ sikhissa sattati vassasahassāni, vessabhussa saṭṭhivassasahassāni āyuppamāṇanti āha ^b^‘‘tesaṃ kira kāle dīghāyukā sattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Abhisamentī^eb^ti paṭivijjhanti.

[03]^b^Niddosatāyā^eb^ti vītikkamadosassa abhāvato. ‘‘Imasmiṃ vītikkame ayaṃ nāma āpattī’’ti evaṃ āpattivasena apaññapetvā ‘‘pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hotī’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 1.8, 194) dhammadesanāvasena ovādasikkhāpadānaṃyeva paññattattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sattāpattikkhandhavasena āṇāsikkhāpadaṃ apaññatta’’^eb^nti. Channaṃ channaṃ vassānaṃ accayenāti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo. Atha vā channaṃ channaṃ vassānaṃ osānadivasaṃ apekkhitvā ^b^‘‘sakiṃ saki’’^eb^nti vuttattā tadapekkhamidaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Sakalajambudīpe sabbopi bhikkhusaṅgho ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne uposathaṃ akāsīti sambandho. Katamaṃ taṃ ṭhānanti āha ^b^‘‘bandhumatiyā rājadhāniyā’’^eb^tiādi. Isipatanaṃ ^a^M1.0441^ea^ tena samayena khemaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ hoti, migānaṃ pana abhayavāsatthāya dinnattā migadāyoti vuccati. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kheme migadāye’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Abbokiṇṇāni dasapi vīsatipi bhikkhusahassāni vasantī^eb^ti visabhāgapuggalehi asaṃsaṭṭhāni dasapi vīsatipi bhikkhūnaṃ sahassāni vasanti. ^b^Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘te sabbepi dvādasasahassabhikkhugaṇhanakā mahāvihārā abhayagiricetiyapabbatacittalapabbatavihārasadisā ca ahesu’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Uposathārocikā^eb^ti uposathārocanakā. Tā kira devatā ekamhi vasse nikkhante tattha tattha gantvā ārocenti ‘‘nikkhantaṃ kho, mārisā, ekaṃ vassaṃ, pañca dāni vassāni sesāni, pañcannaṃ vassānaṃ accayena bandhumatī rājadhānī upasaṅkamitabbā pātimokkhuddesāyā’’ti. Tathā dvīsu vassesu nikkhantesu ‘‘nikkhantāni kho, mārisā, dve vassāni ^a^V1.0386^ea^, cattāri vassāni sesāni, catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena bandhumatī rājadhānī upasaṅkamitabbā pātimokkhuddesāyā’’ti ārocenti. Imināva nayena tīsu catūsu pañcasu vassesu atikkantesu ārocenti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mārisā ekaṃ vassaṃ atikkanta’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Sānubhāvā^eb^ti iddhānubhāvena sānubhāvā. ^b^Te kira bhikkhū^eb^ti ye devatānubhāvena gacchanti, te sandhāya vadati. ^b^Pācīnasamuddante^eb^ti pācīnasamuddassa samīpadese. ^b^Gamiyavatta^eb^nti gamikehi kātabbaṃ senāsanapaṭijagganādivattaṃ. ^b^Uposathagga^eb^nti uposathakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Gatāva hontī^eb^ti devatānubhāvena gatā eva honti. ^b^Te^eb^ti attano attano ānubhāvena devatānubhāvena ca gatā sabbepi.

[03]^b^Khantī parama^eb^ntiādīsu (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.90; dha. pa. aṭṭha. 2.185) parūpavādaṃ parāpakāraṃ sītuṇhādibhedañca guṇoparodhaṃ khamati sahati adhivāsetīti ^b^khanti^eb^. Sā pana sīlādīnaṃ paṭipakkhadhamme savisesaṃ tapati santapati vidhamatīti ^b^paramaṃ^eb^ uttamaṃ ^b^tapo^eb^. Titikkhanaṃ khamanaṃ ^b^titikkhā^eb^. Khantiyāyevetaṃ vevacanaṃ. Akkharacintakā hi khamāyaṃ titikkhāsaddaṃ vaṇṇenti, tasmā evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo ‘‘titikkhāsaṅkhātā adhivāsanakhanti nāma uttamaṃ tapo’’ti. ^b^Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhā^eb^ti bhavena bhavantaraṃ vināti bhavanikantibhāvena saṃsibbati, sataṇhasseva vā āyatiṃ punabbhavabhāvato phalena saddhiṃ kammaṃ vināti saṃsibbatīti ^a^M1.0442^ea^ vānanti saṅkhyaṃ gatāya taṇhāya nikkhantaṃ nibbānaṃ tattha tassā sabbaso abhāvato. Taṃ nibbānaṃ pana santapaṇītanipuṇasivakhemādinā sabbākārena paramanti vadanti buddhā.

[03]^b^Na hi pabbajito parūpaghātī^eb^ti yo adhivāsanakhantirahitattā paraṃ upaghāteti bādhati vihiṃsati, so pabbajito nāma na hoti pabbājetabbadhammassa apabbājanato. Catutthapādo pana tatiyapādasseva vevacanaṃ anatthantarattā. ‘‘Na hi pabbajito’’ti etassa hi ‘‘na samaṇo hotī’’ti vevacanaṃ. ‘‘Parūpaghātī’’ti etassa ‘‘paraṃ viheṭhayanto’’ti vevacanaṃ. Atha vā ^b^parūpaghātī^eb^ti sīlūpaghātī. Sīlañhi uttamaṭṭhena ‘‘para’’nti vuccati parasaddassa seṭṭhavācakattā ‘‘puggalaparoparaññū’’tiādīsu viya. Yo ca samaṇo paraṃ yaṃ kañci sattaṃ viheṭhayanto parūpaghātī hoti attano sīlavināsako, so pabbajito nāma na hotīti attho. Atha vā yo adhivāsanakhantiyā abhāvā parūpaghātī hoti, paraṃ antamaso ḍaṃsamakasampi jīvitā voropeti, so na hi pabbajito. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Pāpamalassa apabbājitattā anīhaṭattā. ‘‘Pabbājayamattano malaṃ, tasmā pabbajitoti vuccatī’’ti (dha. pa. 388) idañhi pabbajitalakkhaṇaṃ ^a^V1.0387^ea^. Yopi naheva kho upaghāteti na māreti, apica daṇḍādīhi viheṭheti, sopi paraṃ viheṭhayanto samaṇo na hoti. Kiṃkāraṇā? Vihesāya asamitattā. Samitattā samaṇoti vuccatīti idañhi samaṇalakkhaṇaṃ. ‘‘Samitattā hi pāpānaṃ, samaṇoti pavuccatī’’ti (dha. pa. 265) hi vuttaṃ.

[03]Apica bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisanto pātimokkhakathāya ca sīlappadhānattā sīlassa ca visesato doso paṭipakkhoti tassa niggaṇhanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ādito ^b^‘‘khantī paramaṃ tapo’’^eb^ti āha. Tena aniṭṭhassa paṭihananūpāyo vutto, titikkhāggahaṇena pana iṭṭhassa, tadubhayenapi uppannaṃ aratiṃ uppannaṃ ratiṃ abhibhuyya viharatīti ayamattho dassito. Taṇhāvānassa vūpasamanato nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhā. Tattha khantiggahaṇena payogavipattiyā abhāvo dassito, titikkhāggahaṇena āsayavipattiyā abhāvo. Tathā khantiggahaṇena parāparādhasahatā, titikkhāggahaṇena paresu anaparajjhanā dassitā. Evaṃ kāraṇamukhena anvayato pātimokkhaṃ dassetvā idāni byatirekato ^a^M1.0443^ea^ taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena yathā sattānaṃ jīvitā voropanaṃ paraṃ pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhi viheṭhanañca ‘‘parūpaghāto paraṃ viheṭhana’’nti vuccati, evaṃ tesaṃ sāpateyyāvaharaṇaṃ parāmasanaṃ visaṃvādanaṃ aññamaññabhedanaṃ pharusavacanena mammaghaṭṭanaṃ niratthakavippalāpo parasantakābhijjhānaṃ ucchedacintanaṃ micchābhinivesanañca upaghāto paraviheṭhanañca hotīti yassa kassaci akusalassa kammapathassa kammassa ca karaṇena pabbajito samaṇo ca na hotīti dasseti.

[03]Dutiyagāthāya ^b^sabbapāpassā^eb^ti sabbākusalassa sabbassapi dvādasākusalassa sabbacittuppādasaṅgahitassa sāvajjadhammassa. ^b^Akaraṇa^eb^nti anuppādanaṃ. Karaṇañhi nāma tassa attano santāne uppādananti tappaṭikkhepato akaraṇaṃ anuppādanaṃ. ^b^Kusalassā^eb^ti catubhūmikakusalassa. ‘‘Kusalassā’’ti hi idaṃ ‘‘etaṃ buddhāna sāsana’’nti vakkhamānattā ariyamaggadhamme tesañca sambhārabhūte tebhūmikakusale dhamme bodheti. ^b^Upasampadā^eb^ti upasampādanaṃ. Taṃ pana atthato tassa kusalassa samadhigamo paṭilābho. ^b^Sacittapariyodapana^eb^nti attano cittassa jotanaṃ cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇaṃ sabbaso parisodhanaṃ. Taṃ pana arahattena hoti. Ettha ca yasmā aggamaggasamaṅgino cittaṃ sabbaso pariyodapīyati nāma, aggaphalakkhaṇe pana pariyodapitaṃ hoti puna pariyodapetabbatāya abhāvato, tasmā pariniṭṭhitapariyodapanataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘taṃ pana arahattena hotī’’ti. Iti sīlasaṃvarena sabbapāpaṃ pahāya lokiyalokuttarāhi samathavipassanāhi ^a^V1.0388^ea^ kusalaṃ sampādetvā arahattaphalena cittaṃ pariyodapetabbanti etaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhi.

[03]Tatiyagāthāya ^b^anupavādo^eb^ti vācāya kassaci anupavadanaṃ. ^b^Anupaghāto^eb^ti kāyena manasā ca kassaci upaghātākaraṇaṃ manasāpi paresaṃ anatthacintanādivasena upaghātakaraṇassa vajjetabbattā. ^b^Pātimokkhe^eb^ti yaṃ taṃ paatimokkhaṃ atipamokkhaṃ uttamaṃ sīlaṃ, pāti vā sugatibhayehi mokkheti duggatibhayehi, yo vā naṃ pāti, taṃ mokkhetīti pātimokkhanti vuccati, tasmiṃ pātimokkhe ca. ^b^Saṃvaro^eb^ti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ avītikkamalakkhaṇo saṃvaro. ^b^Mattaññutā^eb^ti bhojane mattaññutā paṭiggahaṇaparibhogavasena pamāṇaññutā. ^b^Pantañca sayanāsana^eb^nti janasaṅghaṭṭavirahitaṃ nijjanasambādhaṃ vivittaṃ senāsanañca. Ettha dvīhiyeva ^a^M1.0444^ea^ paccayehi catupaccayasantoso dīpitoti veditabbo paccayasantosasāmaññena itaradvayassapi lakkhaṇahāranayena jotitabhāvato. ^b^Adhicitte ca āyogo^eb^ti vipassanāpādakaṃ aṭṭhasamāpatticittaṃ adhicittaṃ, tatopi ca maggaphalacittameva adhicittaṃ, tasmiṃ yathāvutte adhicitte āyogo ca, anuyogoti attho. ^b^Etaṃ buddhāna sāsana^eb^nti etaṃ parassa anupavadanaṃ anupaghātanaṃ pātimokkhe saṃvaro paṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu mattaññutā vivittasenāsanasevanaṃ adhicittānuyogo ca buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhi.

[03]Imā pana sabbabuddhānaṃ pātimokkhuddesagāthā hontīti veditabbā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘eteneva upāyenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yāva sāsanapariyantā^eb^ti dharamānakabuddhānaṃ anusāsanapariyantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, yāva buddhā dharanti, tāva uddisitabbataṃ āgacchantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ovādapātimokkhañhi buddhāyeva uddisanti, na sāvakā. Paṭhamabodhiyaṃyeva uddesamāgacchantīti sambandho. Paṭhamabodhi cettha vīsativassaparicchinnāti ^b^mahāgaṇṭhipade^eb^ vuttaṃ. Tañca heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathāyameva ‘‘bhagavato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassantare nibaddhupaṭṭhāko nāma natthī’’ti kathitattā ‘‘paṭhamabodhi nāma vīsativassānī’’ti gahetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Ācariyadhammapālattherena^eb^ pana ‘‘pañcacattālīsāya vassesu ādito pannarasa vassāni paṭhamabodhī’’ti vuttaṃ. Evañca sati majjhe pannarasa vassāni majjhimabodhi, ante pannarasa vassāni pacchimabodhīti tiṇṇaṃ bodhīnaṃ samappamāṇatā siyāti tampi yuttaṃ. Pannarasattikena hi pañcacattālīsa vassāni pūrenti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana pannarasavassappamāṇāya paṭhamabodhiyā vīsativassesuyeva antogadhattā ‘‘paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassantare’’ti vuttanti evampi sakkā viññātuṃ.

[03]Nanu ^a^V1.0389^ea^ ca kānici sikkhāpadāni paññapetvāpi na tāva āṇāpātimokkhaṃ anuññātaṃ pacchā therassa āyācanena anuññātattā, tasmā kathametaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘sikkhāpadapaññattikālato pana pabhuti āṇāpātimokkhameva uddisīyatī’’ti, yadipi kānici sikkhāpadāni paññapetvāva āṇāpātimokkhaṃ na anuññātaṃ, tathāpi apaññatte sikkhāpade āṇāpātimokkhaṃ natthi, kintu paññatteyevāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sikkhāpadapaññattikālato pana pabhutī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pubbārāme^eb^ti sāvatthiyā ^a^M1.0445^ea^ pācīnadisābhāge katattā evaṃladdhavohāre mahāvihāre. ^b^Migāramātupāsāde^eb^ti migāraseṭṭhino mātuṭṭhāniyattā migāramātāti saṅkhyaṃ gatāya visākhāmahāupāsikāya kārite pāsāde. ^b^Aṭṭhāna^eb^nti hetupaṭikkhepo. ^b^Anavakāso^eb^ti paccayapaṭikkhepo. Ubhayenapi kāraṇameva paṭikkhipati. ^b^Ya^eb^nti yena kāraṇena.

[03]^b^Tesa^eb^nti bhikkhūnaṃ. ^b^Sammukhasāvakānaṃ santike pabbajitā^eb^ti sabbantimānaṃ subhaddasadisānaṃ sammukhasāvakānaṃ santike pabbajite sandhāya vadati. Khattiyakulādivaseneva vividhā kulāti sambandho. ^b^Uccanīcauḷāruḷārabhogādikulavasena vā^eb^ti uccanīcakulavasena uḷāruḷārabhogādikulavasena vāti yojetabbaṃ. Tattha khattiyabrāhmaṇavasena vā khattiyabrāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ vasena vā ^b^uccakulatā^eb^ veditabbā, sesānaṃ vasena ^b^nīcakulatā^eb^. ^b^Uḷāruḷārabhogādikulavasena vā^eb^ti uḷārataratamaupabhogavantādikulavasena. Uḷārātisayajotanatthañhi puna uḷāraggahaṇaṃ ‘‘dukkhadukkha’’ntiādīsu viya. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena uḷārānuḷārānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Brahmacariyaṃ rakkhantī^eb^ti vuttamevatthaṃ pakāsetvā dassento āha ^b^‘‘ciraṃ pariyattidhammaṃ pariharantī’’^eb^ti. Apaññattepi sikkhāpade yadi samānajātiādikā siyuṃ, attano attano kulānugataganthaṃ viya na nāseyyuṃ. Yasmā pana sikkhāpadampi apaññattaṃ, ime ca bhikkhū na samānajātiādikā, tasmā vināsesunti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yasmā ekanāmā…pe… tasmā aññamaññaṃ viheṭhentā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā ciraṭṭhitikavārepi ‘‘nānānāmā’’tiādi vuttanti? Satipi tesaṃ nānājaccādibhāve sikkhāpadapaññattiyā eva sāsanassa cirappavattīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sikkhāpadapaññattivaseneva sāsanassa cirappavatti. Yasmā buddhā attano parinibbānato uddhampi vinetabbasattasambhave sati sikkhāpadaṃ paññapenti, asati na paññapenti, tasmāti veditabbo. Yathā kāyavacīdvārasaṅkhātaṃ viññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pavattamānampi cittaṃ tassāyeva viññattiyā vasena pavattanato ‘‘kāyavacīdvārehi pavatta’’nti vuccati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Yathā ta^eb^nti ettha ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^Vaggasaṅgahapaṇṇāsasaṅgahādīhī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0390^ea^ sīlakkhandhavaggamahāvaggādivaggasaṅgahavasena mūlapaṇṇāsamaajhamapaṇṇāsādipaṇṇāsasaṅgahavasena. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena saṃyuttādisaṅgaho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Evaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0446^ea^^b^vitakketha, mā evaṃ vitakkayitthā^eb^ti ettha ^b^eva^eb^nti yathānusiṭṭhāya anusāsaniyā vidhivasena paṭisedhanavasena ca pavattitākāraparāmasanaṃ, sā ca sammāvitakkānaṃ micchāvitakkānañca pavattiākāradassanavasena pavattati atthaānisaṃsassa ādīnavassa ca vibhāvanatthaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nekkhammavitakkādayo tayo vitakke vitakkethā’’^eb^tiādi. Ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena abyāpādavitakkaavihiṃsāvitakkānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha nekkhammaṃ vuccati lobhato nikkhantattā alobho, nīvaraṇehi nikkhantattā paṭhamajjhānaṃ, sabbākusalehi nikkhantattā sabbo kusalo dhammo, sabbasaṅkhatehi nikkhantattā nibbānaṃ, upanissayato sampayogato ārammaṇakaraṇato ca nekkhammena paṭisaṃyutto vitakko ^b^nekkhammavitakko,^eb^ sammāsaṅkappo. So asubhajjhānassa pubbabhāge kāmāvacaro hoti, asubhajjhāne rūpāvacaro, taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro. Byāpādassa paṭipakkho abyāpādo, kañcipi na byāpādenti etenāti vā abyāpādo, mettā. Yathāvuttena abyāpādena paṭisaṃyutto vitakko ^b^abyāpādavitakko^eb^. So mettājhānassa pubbabhāge kāmāvacaro hoti, mettābhāvanāvasena adhigate paṭhamajjhāne rūpāvacaro, taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro. Vihiṃsāya paṭipakkhā, na vihiṃsanti vā etāya satteti avihiṃsā, karuṇā. Tāya paṭisaṃyutto vitakko ^b^avihiṃsāvitakko^eb^. So karuṇājhānassa pubbabhāge kāmāvacaro, karuṇābhāvanāvasena adhigate paṭhamajjhāne rūpāvacaro, taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro.

[03]Nanu ca alobhādosāmohānaṃ aññamaññāvirahato nesaṃ vasena uppajjanakānaṃ imesaṃ nekkhammavitakkādīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato vavatthānaṃ na hotīti? No na hoti. Yadā hi alobho padhāno hoti niyamitapariṇatasamudācārādivasena, tadā itare dve tadanvāyikā bhavanti. Tathā hi yadā alobhappadhāno nekkhammagaruko cittuppādo hoti, tadā laddhāvasaro nekkhammavitakko patiṭṭhahati. Taṃsampayuttassa pana adosalakkhaṇassa abyāpādassa vasena yo tasseva abyāpādavitakkabhāvo sambhaveyya, sati ca abyāpādavitakkabhāve kassacipi aviheṭhanajātikatāya avihiṃsāvitakkabhāvo ca sambhaveyya. Te itare ^a^M1.0447^ea^ dve tasseva nekkhammavitakkassa anugāmino sarūpato adissanato tasmiṃ sati honti, asati na hontīti anumāneyyā bhavanti. Evameva yadā mettāpadhāno cittuppādo hoti, tadā itare dve tadanvāyikā ^a^V1.0391^ea^ bhavanti. Yadā karuṇāpadhāno cittuppādo hoti, tadā itare dve tadanvāyikā bhavanti.

[03]^b^Kāmavitakkādayo^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena byāpādavitakkavihiṃsāvitakkānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha kāmapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko ^b^kāmavitakko^eb^. Ettha hi dve kāmā vatthukāmo ca kilesakāmo ca. Tattha vatthukāmapakkhe ārammaṇavasena kāmehi paṭisaṃyutto vitakko kāmavitakko, kilesakāmapakkhe pana sampayogavasena kāmena paṭisaṃyuttoti yojetabbaṃ. Byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko ^b^byāpādavitakko^eb^. Vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko ^b^vihiṃsāvitakko^eb^. Tesu dve sattesupi saṅkhāresupi uppajjanti. Kāmavitakko hi piye manāpe satte vā saṅkhāre vā vitakkentassa uppajjati, byāpādavitakko appiye amanāpe satte vā saṅkhāre vā kujjhitvā olokanakālato paṭṭhāya yāva vināsanā uppajjati, vihiṃsāvitakko saṅkhāresu nuppajjati. Saṅkhāro hi dukkhāpetabbo nāma natthi, ‘‘ime sattā haññantu vā ucchijjantu vā vinassantu vā mā vā ahesu’’nti cintanakāle pana sattesu uppajjati. Atha kasmā vuttaṃ ‘‘saṅkhāro dukkhāpetabbo nāma natthī’’ti, nanu ye dukkhāpetabbāti icchitā sattasaññitā, tepi atthato saṅkhārā evāti? Saccametaṃ, te pana indriyabaddhā saviññāṇakatāya dukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedenti, tasmā te vihiṃsāvitakkassa visayā icchitā sattasaññitā. Ye pana na dukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedenti vuttalakkhaṇāyogato, te sandhāya ‘‘vihiṃsāvitakko saṅkhāresu nuppajjatī’’ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsū^eb^ti ettha ^b^āsavehī^eb^ti katthuatthe karaṇaniddeso, ^b^cittānī^eb^ti paccattabahuvacanaṃ, ^b^vimucciṃsū^eb^ti kammasādhanaṃ, tasmā āsavehi kattubhūtehi anupādāya ārammaṇavasena aggahetvā cittāni vimuccitānīti evamettha attho gahetabboti āha ^b^‘‘tesañhi cittānī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yehi āsavehī^eb^ti etthāpi kattuatthe eva karaṇaniddeso. ^b^Vimucciṃsū^eb^ti kammasādhanaṃ. ^b^Na te^eb^^a^M1.0448^ea^^b^tāni gahetvā vimucciṃsū^eb^ti te āsavā tāni cittāni ārammaṇavasena na gahetvā vimucciṃsu vimocesuṃ. Ettha hi ^b^cittānī^eb^ti upayogabahuvacanaṃ, ^b^vimucciṃsū^eb^ti kattusādhanaṃ. ^b^Anuppādanirodhena nirujjhamānā^eb^ti āyatiṃ anuppattisaṅkhātena nirodhena nirujjhamānā āsavā. ^b^Aggahetvā vimucciṃsū^eb^ti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena aggahetvā cittāni vimocesuṃ. ^b^Vikasitacittā ahesu^eb^nti sātisayañāṇarasmisamphassena samphullacittā ahesuṃ. ^b^Purimavacanāpekkha^eb^nti ‘‘aññatarasmiṃ bhiṃsanake vanasaṇḍe’’ti vuttavacanāpekkhaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yaṃ vuttaṃ aññatarasmiṃ bhiṃsanake vanasaṇḍeti, tatrā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kata^eb^nti bhāvasādhanavāci idaṃ padanti āha ^b^‘‘bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ^eb^^a^V1.0392^ea^^b^hoti, bhiṃsanakakiriyāyā’’^eb^ti. Bhiṃsanassa karaṇaṃ kiriyā bhiṃsanakataṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ^eb^.

[03]Idāni aññathāpi atthayojanaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādi. Imasmiṃ atthavikappe bhiṃsayatīti bhiṃsano, bhiṃsano eva bhiṃsanako, tassa bhāvo bhiṃsanakattanti vattabbe ta-kārassa lopaṃ katvā ‘‘bhiṃsanakata’’nti vuttanti dassento āha ^b^‘‘bhiṃsanakatasminti bhiṃsanakabhāveti attho’’^eb^tiādi. Yebhuyyaggahaṇaṃ lomavantavasenapi yojetabbaṃ, na lomavasenevāti āha ^b^‘‘bahutarānaṃ vā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Purisayugavasenā^eb^ti purisakālavasena, purisānaṃ āyuppamāṇavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti. ‘‘Sabbapacchimako subhaddasadiso’’ti ^b^tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ.
