Tasmiṃ kāle vijjamānānaṃ dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ āyuparicchedaṃ sakalameva gahetvā ^b^‘‘satasahassaṃ…pe… aṭṭhāsī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Dveyeva purisayugānī^eb^ti ettha purisānaṃ yugappavattikālo purisayugaṃ. Abhilāpamattameva cetaṃ, atthato pana purisova purisayugaṃ. Dharamāne bhagavati ekaṃ purisayugaṃ, parinibbute ekanti katvā ‘‘dveyeva purisayugānī’’ti vuttaṃ. Parinibbute pana bhagavati ekameva purisayugaṃ asītiyeva vassasahassāni brahmacariyaṃ aṭṭhāsīti veditabbaṃ.
[03]^b^20^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sāvakayugānī^eb^ti sāvakā eva sāvakayugāni. ^b^Asambhuṇantenā^eb^ti apāpuṇantena. ^b^Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentassā^eb^ti sabbaññutaññāṇassa vijāyanatthaṃ ñāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentassa.

[03]^b^21^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ko^eb^^a^M1.0449^ea^^b^anusandhī^eb^ti pubbāparakathānaṃ kiṃ anusandhānaṃ, ko sambandhoti attho. ^b^Sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanāpekkha^eb^nti yācīyatīti yācanā, sikkhāpadapaññattiyeva yācanā sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanā, taṃ apekkhatīti sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanāpekkhaṃ bhummavacanaṃ, yāciyamānasikkhāpadapaññattiapekkhaṃ bhummavacananti vuttaṃ hoti. Yācanavisiṭṭhā sikkhāpadapaññattiyeva hi ‘‘tatthā’’ti iminā parāmaṭṭhā, teneva vakkhati ‘‘tattha tassā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā’’ti. ^b^Yaṃ vutta^eb^nti ‘‘sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyyā’’ti iminā yaṃ sikkhāpadapaññapanaṃ vuttaṃ, yācitanti attho. ^b^Tattha tassā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā^eb^ti tassaṃ yāciyamānasikkhāpadapaññattiyanti attho. ^b^Akāla^eb^nti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā akālaṃ.

[03]^b^Āsavaṭṭhānīyā^eb^ti ettha adhikaraṇe anīyasaddoti āha ^b^‘‘āsavā tiṭṭhanti etesū’’^eb^tiādi ^a^V1.0393^ea^. Ke pana te āsavā, ke ca dhammā tadadhikaraṇabhūtāti āha ^b^‘‘yesu diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Diṭṭhadhammikā^eb^ parūpavādādayo, ^b^samparāyikā^eb^ āpāyikā apāyadukkhavisesā. Te āsavanti tena tena paccayavasena pavattantīti ^b^āsavā. Nesa^eb^nti parūpavādādiāsavānaṃ. ^b^Te^eb^ti vītikkamadhammā. Asati āsavaṭṭhānīye dhamme sikkhāpadapaññattiyaṃ ko doso, yenevaṃ vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘yadi hi paññapeyyā’’^eb^tiādi, vītikkamadosaṃ adisvā yadi paññapeyyāti adhippāyo. Parammukhā akkosanaṃ ^b^parūpavādo,^eb^ parehi vacanesu dosāropanaṃ ^b^parūpārambho,^eb^ sammukhā garahanaṃ ^b^garahadoso^eb^.

[03]Kathañhi nāma paliveṭhessatīti sambandho, kathaṃ-saddayoge anāgatappayogo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Anvāyiko^eb^ti anuvattako. ^b^Bhogakkhandha^eb^nti bhogarāsiṃ. ‘‘Amhākamete’’ti ñāyantīti ñātī, pitāmahapituputtādivasena parivaṭṭanaṭṭhena parivaṭṭo, ñātīyeva parivaṭṭo ^b^ñātiparivaṭṭo. Ghāsacchādanaparamatāya santuṭṭhā^eb^ti ghāsacchādane paramatāya uttamatāya santuṭṭhā, ghāsacchādanapariyesane sallekhavasena paramatāya ukkaṭṭhabhāve saṇṭhitāti attho. Ghāsacchādanameva vā paramaṃ paramā koṭi etesaṃ na tato paraṃ kiñci asāmisajātaṃ pariyesanti paccāsīsanti cāti ghāsacchādanaparamā, tesaṃ bhāvo ghāsacchādanaparamatā, tassaṃ ^b^ghāsacchādanaparamatāya santuṭṭhā. Tesu nāma ko^eb^ti yathāvuttaguṇavisiṭṭhesu ^a^M1.0450^ea^ tesu bhikkhūsu ko nāma. ^b^Lokāmisabhūta^eb^nti lokapariyāpannaṃ hutvā kilesehi āmasitabbattā lokāmisabhūtaṃ. ^b^Pabbajjāsaṅkhepenevā^eb^ti ‘‘pāṇātipātā veramaṇī’’tiādinā pabbajjāmukheneva. ^b^Eta^eb^nti methunādīnaṃ akaraṇaṃ. ^b^Thāma^eb^nti sikkhāpadānaṃ paññāpanakiriyāya sāmatthiyaṃ. ^b^Bala^eb^nti yāthāvato sabbadhammānaṃ paṭivedhasamatthaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ. ^b^Kuppeyyā^eb^ti kuppaṃ bhaveyya. Etassevatthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ ^b^na yathāṭhāne tiṭṭheyyā^eb^ti, paññattiṭṭhāne na tiṭṭheyyāti attho. ^b^Akusalo^eb^ti tikicchituṃ yuttakālassa aparijānanato akusalo acheko. Avuddhi ^b^anayo, byasanaṃ^eb^ dukkhaṃ. ^b^Paṭikaccevā^eb^ti gaṇḍuppādanato paṭhamameva. ^b^Sañchaviṃ katvā^eb^ti sobhanacchaviṃ katvā. ^b^Bālavejjo^eb^ti apaṇḍitavejjo. ^b^Lohitakkhayañca maṃ pāpetī^eb^ti vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā yojetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Akālaṃ dassetvā^eb^ti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā akālaṃ dassetvā. ^b^Rogaṃ vūpasametvā^eb^ti phāsuṃ katvā. ^b^Sake ācariyake^eb^ti ācariyassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā ācariyakaṃ, tasmiṃ attano ācariyabhāve, ācariyakamme vā. Nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. ^b^Viditānubhāvo^eb^ti pākaṭānubhāvo.

[03]^b^Vipulabhāvenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0394^ea^ pabbajitānaṃ bahubhāvena. ^b^Sāsane ekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā na uppajjantī^eb^ti yasmā senāsanāni pahonti, tasmā āvāsamacchariyādihetukā sāsane ekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā na uppajjanti. ^b^Iminā nayenā^eb^ti etena padasodhammasikkhāpadādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Lābhaggamahatta^eb^nti cīvarādilabhitabbapaccayo lābho, tassa aggaṃ mahattaṃ paṇītatā bahubhāvo vā. Bahussutassa bhāvo ^b^bāhusaccaṃ. Ayoniso ummujjamānā^eb^ti anupāyena abhinivisamānā, viparītato jānamānāti attho. ^b^Rasena rasaṃ saṃsanditvā^eb^ti sabhāvena sabhāvaṃ saṃsanditvā, anuññātapaccattharaṇādīsu sukhasamphassasāmaññato upādinnaphassarasepi anavajjasaññitāya anupādinnaphassarasena upādinnaphassarasaṃ saṃsanditvā, samānabhāvaṃ upanetvāti attho. ^b^Uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ^eb^^a^M1.0451^ea^^b^satthusāsanaṃ dīpentī^eb^ti ‘‘tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī’’tiādinā (pāci. 418) satthusāsanaṃ uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ katvā dīpenti.

[03]^b^Imasmiṃ atthe^eb^ti ‘‘nirabbudo hi, sāriputta, bhikkhusaṅgho’’ti (pārā. 21) evaṃ vuttabhikkhusaṅghasaññite atthe. Kathaṃ pana dussīlānaṃ corabhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘te hi assamaṇāva hutvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kāḷakadhammayogā^eb^ti dussīlatāsaṅkhātapāpadhammayogato. ^b^Pabhassaro^eb^ti pabhassarasīlo. ^b^Sāroti vuccantī^eb^ti sāsanabrahmacariyassa sārabhūtattā sīlādayo guṇā ‘‘sāro’’ti vuccanti.

[03]^b^Sabbaparittaguṇo^eb^ti sabbehi nihīnaguṇo, appaguṇo vā. ^b^So sotāpanno^eb^ti ānandattheraṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Sotaṃ āpanno^eb^ti maggasotaṃ āpanno. Paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ anavasesato savanato pellanato soto ariyamaggoti āha ^b^‘‘sototi ca maggassetaṃ adhivacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sotāpannoti tena samannāgatassa puggalassā^eb^ti iminā maggasamaṅgī sotāpannoti vatvā tamevatthaṃ udāharaṇena sādhetvā idāni idhādhippetapuggalaṃ niddhāretvā dassento āha ^b^‘‘idha panā’’^eb^tiādi. Idha āpannasaddo ‘‘phalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 5.488) viya vattamānakālikoti āha ^b^‘‘maggena phalassa nāmaṃ dinna’’^eb^nti. Maggena hi attanā sadisassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa vā sattaṅgikassa vā phalassa sototi nāmaṃ dinnaṃ, atītakālikatte pana sarasatova nāmalābho siyā. Maggakkhaṇe hi maggasotaṃ āpajjati nāma, phalakkhaṇe āpanno.

[03]Virūpaṃ ^a^V1.0395^ea^ sadukkhaṃ saupāyāsaṃ nipātetīti ^b^vinipāto,^eb^ apāyadukkhe khipanako. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ti sabhāvo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na attānaṃ apāyesu vinipātanasabhāvo’’^eb^ti. Atha vā ^b^dhammo^eb^ti apāyesu khipanako sakkāyadiṭṭhiādiko akusaladhammo. Yassa pana so akusaladhammo natthi sabbaso pahīnattā, so yasmā apāyesu attānaṃ vinipātanasabhāvo na hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘na attānaṃ apāyesu vinipātanasabhāvoti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kasmā^eb^ti avinipātanadhammatāya kāraṇaṃ pucchati. Apāyaṃ gamentīti ^b^apāyagamanīyā. Vinipātanasabhāvo^eb^ti uppajjanasabhāvo. ^b^Sammattaniyāmena maggenā^eb^ti sammā ^a^M1.0452^ea^ bhavaniyāmakena paṭiladdhamaggena. ^b^Niyato^eb^ti vā heṭṭhimantato sattamabhavato upari anuppajjanadhammatāya niyato. ^b^Sambodhī^eb^ti uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā sambodhi. Sambujjhatīti hi sambodhi, ariyamaggo. So ca idha paṭhamamaggassa adhigatattā avasiṭṭho eva adhigantabbabhāvena icchitabboti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uparimaggattayaṃ avassaṃ sampāpako’’^eb^ti. Uparimaggattayaṃ avassaṃ sampāpuṇātīti ^b^sampāpako,^eb^ sotāpanno.
[06]Vinayapaññattiyācanakathā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^22^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anudhammatā^eb^ti lokuttaradhammānugato dhammo. ^b^Anapaloketvā^eb^ti padassa vivaraṇaṃ ^b^‘‘anāpucchitvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Janapadacārikaṃ pakkamantī^eb^ti ettha iti-saddo gamyamānatāya na vutto, evaṃ aññatthāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu. Tattha ^b^janapadacārika^eb^nti janapadesu caraṇaṃ, caraṇaṃ vā cāro, so eva cārikā, janapadesu cārikā janapadacārikā. Taṃ pakkamanti, janapadagamanaṃ gacchantīti attho. ^b^Pakkamantiyevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇena no na pakkamantīti dasseti. ‘‘Janapadacārikaṃ pakkamantī’’ti ettha ṭhatvā bhagavato cārikāpakkamanavidhiṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘janapadacārikaṃ carantā cā’’^eb^tiādi. Cārikā ca nāmesā (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.254; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.254) duvidhā turitacārikā ceva aturitacārikā ca. Tattha dūrepi bodhaneyyapuggalaṃ disvā tassa bodhanatthāya sahasā gamanaṃ ^b^turitacārikā^eb^ nāma, sā mahākassapattherapaccuggamanādīsu daṭṭhabbā. Bhagavā hi mahākassapattheraṃ paccuggacchanto muhuttena tigāvutamagamāsi, āḷavakassatthāya tiṃsayojanaṃ, tathā aṅgulimālassa, pukkusātissa pana pañcacattālīsayojanaṃ, mahākappinassa vīsayojanasataṃ, dhaniyassatthāya sattayojanasatāni agamāsi, dhammasenāpatino saddhivihārikassa vanavāsītissasāmaṇerassa tigāvutādhikaṃ vīsayojanasataṃ agamāsi, ayaṃ turitacārikā. Yaṃ pana gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭiyā devasikaṃ yojanaaḍḍhayojanavasena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi ^a^V1.0396^ea^ lokaṃ anuggaṇhantassa gamanaṃ, ayaṃ ^b^aturitacārikā^eb^ nāma. Imaṃ pana cārikaṃ caranto bhagavā mahāmaṇḍalaṃ majjhimamaṇḍalaṃ antimamaṇḍalanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maṇḍalānaṃ ^a^M1.0453^ea^ aññatarasmiṃ carati. Tattha ‘‘janapadacārika’’nti vuttattā aturitacārikāva idhādhippetā. Tameva vibhajitvā dassento āha ^b^‘‘mahāmaṇḍalaṃ majjhimamaṇḍala’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]Tattha ^b^antimamaṇḍala^eb^nti khuddakamaṇḍalaṃ, itaresaṃ vā maṇḍalānaṃ antogadhattā antimamaṇḍalaṃ, abbhantarimamaṇḍalanti vuttaṃ hoti. Imesaṃ pana maṇḍalānaṃ kiṃ pamāṇanti āha ^b^‘‘tattha mahāmaṇḍalaṃ navayojanasatika’’^eb^ntiādi. Navayojanasatikampi ṭhānaṃ majjhimadesapariyāpannameva, tato paraṃ nādhippetaṃ turitacārikāvasena agamanato. Yasmā nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya gatagataṭṭhānassa catūsu passesu samantato yojanasataṃ ekakolāhalaṃ hoti, purimaṃ purimaṃ āgatā nimantetuṃ labhanti, itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro mahāmaṇḍalaṃ osarati, tattha buddhā bhagavanto tesu tesu gāmanigamesu ekāhaṃ dvīhaṃ vasantā mahājanaṃ āmisapaṭiggahena anuggaṇhanti, dhammadānena ca vivaṭṭūpanissitaṃ kusalaṃ vaḍḍhenti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘gāmanigamādīsu mahājanaṃ āmisapaṭiggahena anuggaṇhantā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Samathavipassanā taruṇā hontī^eb^ti ettha taruṇā vipassanāti saṅkhāraparicchedane ñāṇaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇe ñāṇaṃ sammasane ñāṇaṃ maggāmagge ñāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Samathassa taruṇabhāvo pana upacārasamādhivasena veditabbo. ‘‘Sace pana antovasse bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanā taruṇā hontī’’ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññenapi majjhimamaṇḍale veneyyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākādikāraṇena majjhimamaṇḍale cārikaṃ caritukāmā cātumāsaṃ vasitvāva nikkhamanti.

[03]^b^Pavāraṇāsaṅgahaṃ datvā^eb^ti anumatidānavasena datvā. ^b^Māgasirassa paṭhamadivase^eb^ti māgasiramāsassa paṭhamadivase. Idañcetarahi pavattavohāravasena kattikamāsassa aparapakkhapāṭipadadivasaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti tesaṃ buddhānaṃ. Tehi vinetabbattā ‘‘tesaṃ vineyyasattā’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Vineyyasattā^eb^ti ca cārikāya vinetabbasattā. ^b^Māgasiramāsampi tattheva vasitvā phussamāsassa paṭhamadivase^eb^ti idampi nidassanamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catumāsavutthānampi buddhānaṃ vineyyasattā aparipakkindriyā honti, tesaṃ indriyaparipākaṃ āgamayamānā aparampi ekamāsaṃ vā dviticatumāsaṃ vā tatthevavasitvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivārā nikkhamitvā purimanayeneva lokaṃ anuggaṇhantā ^a^M1.0454^ea^ sattahi vā chahi vā pañcahi vā catūhi vā māsehi cārikaṃ pariyosāpenti. ^b^Veneyyavasenevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇena na cīvarādihetu carantīti dasseti. Tathā ^a^V1.0397^ea^ hi imesu tīsu maṇḍalesu yattha katthaci cārikaṃ carantā na cīvarādihetu caranti, atha kho ye duggatabālajiṇṇabyādhikā, te ‘‘kadā tathāgataṃ āgantvā passissanti, mayi pana cārikaṃ carante mahājano tathāgatadassanaṃ labhissati, tattha keci cittāni pasādessanti, keci mālādīhi pūjessanti, keci kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ dassanti, keci micchādassanaṃ pahāya sammādiṭṭhikā bhavissanti, taṃ nesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā’’ti evaṃ lokānukampāya cārikaṃ caranti.

[03]Apica catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti jaṅghavihāravasena sarīraphāsukatthāya, aṭṭhuppattikālābhikaṅkhanatthāya, bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanatthāya, tattha tattha paripākagatindriye bodhaneyyasatte bodhanatthāyāti. Aparehipi catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchissantīti vā, dhammaṃ, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchissantīti vā, mahatā dhammavassena catasso parisā santappessāmāti vā. Aparehipi pañcahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti pāṇātipātā viramissantīti vā, adinnādānā, kāmesumicchācārā, musāvādā, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā viramissantīti vā. Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilabhissantīti vā, dutiyaṃ…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilabhissantīti vā. Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti sotāpattimaggaṃ adhigamissantīti vā, sotāpattiphalaṃ…pe… arahattaphalaṃ sacchikarissantīti vāti.

[03]^b^Pupphāni ocinantā viya carantī^eb^ti iminā yathā mālākāro bahuṃ pupphagacchaṃ disvā tattha cirampi ṭhatvā pupphāni ocinitvā pupphasuññaṃ gacchaṃ disvā tattha papañcaṃ akatvā taṃ pahāya aññattha gantvā pupphāni ocinanto vicarati, evameva buddhāpi yattha gāmanigamādīsu vineyyasattā bahū honti, tattha cirampi vasantā te vinetvā vineyyasuññagāmādīsu papañcaṃ akatvā taṃ pahāya aññattha bahuvineyyakesu gāmādīsu vasantā vicarantīti dasseti. Tatoyeva ca atikhuddakepi antimamaṇḍale upanissayavantānaṃ bahubhāvato tāva bahumpi kālaṃ sattamāsapariyantaṃ cārikaṃ caranti.

[03]Santasabhāvattā ^a^M1.0455^ea^ kilesasamaṇahetutāya vā santaṃ nibbānaṃ, sukhakāraṇatāya ca sukhanti āha ^b^‘‘santaṃ sukhaṃ nibbānamārammaṇaṃ katvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dasasahassacakkavāḷe^eb^ti jātikkhettabhūtāya dasasahassilokadhātuyā. Idañca devabrahmānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, manussā pana imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe bodhaneyyā ^a^V1.0398^ea^ honti. ^b^Bodhaneyyasattasamavalokana^eb^nti paṭhamaṃ mahākaruṇāya pharitvā pacchā sabbaññutaññāṇajālaṃ pattharitvā tassa anto paviṭṭhānaṃ bodhaneyyasattānaṃ samolokanaṃ. Buddhā kira mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya ‘‘ye sattā bhabbā paripākañāṇā ajjayeva mayā vinetabbā, te mayhaṃ ñāṇassa upaṭṭhahantū’’ti cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samannāharanti. Tesaṃ saha samannāhārā eko vā dve vā bahū vā tadā vinayūpagā veneyyā sabbaññutaññāṇassa āpāthamāgacchanti, ayamettha buddhānubhāvo. Evaṃ āpāthamāgatānaṃ pana nesaṃ upanissayaṃ pubbacariyaṃ pubbahetuṃ sampativattamānañca paṭipattiṃ olokenti. Veneyyasattapariggaṇhanatthañhi samannāhāre kate paṭhamaṃ nesaṃ veneyyabhāveneva upaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Atha ‘‘kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī’’ti saraṇagamanādivasena kañci nipphattiṃ vīmaṃsamānā pubbupanissayāni olokenti.

[03]^b^Otiṇṇe^eb^ti ārocite, parisamajjhaṃ vā otiṇṇe. ^b^Dvikkhattu^eb^nti ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare dvikkhattuṃ. Buddhakāle kira ekekasmiṃ saṃvacchare dve vāre bhikkhū sannipatanti upakaṭṭhavassūpanāyikakāle ca pavāraṇākāle ca. Upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi bhikkhū vaggavaggā hutvā kammaṭṭhānatthāya āgacchanti. Bhagavā tehi saddhiṃ sammoditvā ‘‘kasmā, bhikkhave, upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya vicarathā’’ti pucchati. Atha te ‘‘bhagavā kammaṭṭhānatthaṃ āgatamha, kammaṭṭhānaṃ no dethā’’ti yācanti. Satthā tesaṃ cariyavasena rāgacaritassa asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ deti, dosacaritassa mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ, mohacaritassa ‘‘uddeso paripucchā kālena dhammassavanaṃ kālena dhammasākacchā idaṃ tuyhaṃ sappāya’’nti ācikkhati. Kiñcāpi hi mohacaritassa ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāyaṃ, kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya pana bhājanabhūtaṃ kātuṃ sammohavigamāya ^a^M1.0456^ea^ paṭhamaṃ uddesaparipucchādhammassavanadhammasākacchāsu niyojeti. Vitakkacaritassa ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ deti. Saddhācaritassa visesato purimā cha anussatiyo sappāyā, tāsaṃ pana anuyuñjane ayaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipattīti dassetuṃ pasādanīyasuttantena buddhasubodhitaṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca pakāseti. Ñāṇacaritassa pana maraṇassati upasamānussati catudhātuvavatthānaṃ āhārepaṭikūlasaññā visesato sappāyā, tesaṃ upakāradhammadassanatthaṃ aniccatādipaṭisaṃyutte gambhīre suttante katheti. Te kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sace sappāyaṃ hoti, satthu santike eva vasanti. No ce hoti, sappāyaṃ senāsanaṃ pucchantā gacchanti. Tepi tattha vasantā temāsikaṃ paṭipadaṃ gahetvā ghaṭentā vāyamantā sotāpannāpi honti sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi arahantopi. Tato vutthavassā pavāretvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā ‘‘bhagavā ahaṃ tumhākaṃ santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^V1.0399^ea^ gahetvā sotāpattiphalaṃ patto…pe… ahaṃ aggaphalaṃ arahatta’’nti paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocenti, upari anadhigatassa adhigamāya kammaṭṭhānañca yācanti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pure vassūpanāyikāya ca kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇatthaṃ…pe… upari kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇatthañcā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Āyāmā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ā^eb^-saddo ‘‘āgacchā’’ti iminā samānatthoti āha ^b^‘‘āyāmāti āgaccha yāmā’’^eb^ti, ehi gacchāmāti attho. ^b^Ānandā^eb^ti bhagavā santikāvacarattā theraṃ ālapati, na pana tadā satthu santike vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāvato. Pañcasataparimāṇo hi tadā bhagavato santike bhikkhusaṅgho. Thero pana ‘‘gaṇhathāvuso pattacīvarāni, bhagavā asukaṭṭhānaṃ gantukāmo’’ti bhikkhūnaṃ āroceti. ‘‘Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesī’’ti vuttattā ^b^‘‘bhagavato paccassosī’’^eb^ti idha ^b^bhagavato^eb^ti sāmivacanaṃ āmantanavacanameva sambandhīantaraṃ apekkhatīti iminā adhippāyena ^b^‘‘bhagavato vacanaṃ paṭiassosī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Bhagavato^eb^ti pana idaṃ patissavasambandhena sampadānavacanaṃ yathā ‘‘devadattassa paṭissuṇotī’’ti. ^b^Paccassosī^eb^ti ettha ^b^paṭi^eb^-saddo abhimukhavacanoti āha ^b^‘‘abhimukho hutvā suṇī’’^eb^ti. Bhagavato mukhābhimukho hutvā adhivāsetvā suṇi, na udāsino hutvāti adhippāyo.

[03]Tassa ^a^M1.0457^ea^ pāṭihāriyassa āgantukavasena katattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nagaradvārato paṭṭhāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Suvaṇṇarasapiñjarāhi rasmīhī^eb^ti ettha ^b^rasa^eb^-saddo udakapariyāyo, ^b^piñjara^eb^-saddo hemavaṇṇapariyāyo, tasmā suvaṇṇajaladhārā viya suvaṇṇavaṇṇāhi rasmīhīti attho. ^b^Samujjotayamāno^eb^ti obhāsayamāno. ^b^Assā^eb^ti verañjassa brāhmaṇassa. ^b^Bhagavantaṃ upanisīditukāmo^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ upagantvā nisīditukāmo, bhagavato samīpe nisīditukāmoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]Brāhmaṇa tayā nimantitā vassaṃvutthā amhāti pāḷiyaṃ sambandho veditabbo. ^b^Dātabbo assā^eb^ti dātabbo bhaveyya. ^b^No asanto^eb^ti neva avijjamāno, kintu vijjamānoyevāti dīpeti. Vinā vā liṅgavipallāsenettha attho daṭṭhabboti āha ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādi. Iminā sāmaññavacanato ettha napuṃsakaliṅganiddesoti dasseti. ^b^No natthī^eb^ti no amhākaṃ natthi. ^b^No^eb^ti vā etassa vivaraṇaṃ ^b^natthī^eb^ti. Kesaṃ adātukāmatā viyāti āha ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pahūtavittūpakaraṇāna^eb^nti ettha ^b^vittī^eb^ti tuṭṭhi, vittiyā upakaraṇaṃ vittūpakaraṇaṃ, tuṭṭhikāraṇanti attho. Pahūtaṃ dhanadhaññajātarūparajatanānāvidhālaṅkārasuvaṇṇabhājanādibhedaṃ vittūpakaraṇametesanti pahūtavittūpakaraṇā, tesaṃ pahūtavittūpakaraṇānaṃ maccharīnaṃ yathā adātukāmatā, evaṃ no adātukāmatāpi ^a^V1.0400^ea^ natthīti sambandho. ^b^Taṃ kutettha labbhā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ kāraṇaṃ, taṃ kiccaṃ vā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti gharāvāse. Dutiye pana atthavikappe ^b^ta^eb^nti deyyadhammassa parāmasanaṃ. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti imasmiṃ temāsabbhantareti attho. ^b^Ya^eb^nti yena kāraṇena, kiriyāparāmasanaṃ vā. Dutiye pana atthavikappe ^b^ya^eb^nti yaṃ deyyadhammanti attho.

[03]^b^Alaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhacintāyāti saññāpetvā^eb^ti brāhmaṇa netaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhena kataṃ, atha kho mārāvaṭṭanenāti brāhmaṇaṃ saññāpetvā. ^b^Taṅkhaṇānurūpāyā^eb^ti yādisī tadā tassa ajjhāsayappavatti, tadanurūpāyāti attho. Tassa tadā tādisassa vivaṭṭasannissitassa ñāṇaparipākassa abhāvato kevalaṃ abbhantarasannissito eva attho dassitoti āha ^b^‘‘diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ sandassetvā’’^eb^ti, paccakkhato vibhāvetvāti attho. ^b^Kusale dhamme^eb^ti tebhūmake kusale ^a^M1.0458^ea^ dhamme. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti kusaladhamme yathāsamādapite. ^b^Na^eb^nti brāhmaṇaṃ. ^b^Samuttejetvā^eb^ti sammadeva uparūpari nivesetvā puññakiriyāya tikkhavisadabhāvaṃ āpādetvā. Taṃ pana atthato tassa ussāhajananaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘saussāhaṃ katvā’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ puññakiriyāya saussāhato evarūpaguṇasamaṅgitā ca niyamato diṭṭhadhammikādiatthasampādananti evaṃ saussāhatāya aññehi ca tasmiṃ vijjamānaguṇehi ^b^sampahaṃsetvā^eb^ sammadeva haṭṭhatuṭṭhabhāvaṃ āpādetvā.

[03]Yadi bhagavā dhammaratanavassaṃ vassi, atha kasmā so visesaṃ nādhigacchi? Upanissayasampattiyā abhāvato. Yadi evaṃ kasmā bhagavā tassa tathā dhammaratanavassaṃ vassīti? Vuccate – yadipi tassa visesādhigamo natthi, āyatiṃ pana nibbānādhigamatthāya vāsanābhāgiyā ca sabbā purimapacchimadhammakathā ahosīti daṭṭhabbā. Na hi bhagavato niratthakā dhammadesanā atthi. ^b^Temāsikopi deyyadhammo^eb^ti temāsaṃ dātabbopi deyyadhammo. ^b^Yaṃ divasa^eb^nti yasmiṃ divase.

[03]^b^23^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Buddhapariṇāyaka^eb^nti buddho pariṇāyako etassāti buddhapariṇāyako, bhikkhusaṅgho. Taṃ buddhapariṇāyakaṃ, buddhajeṭṭhakanti attho. ^b^Yāvadatthaṃ katvā^eb^ti yāva attho, tāva bhojanena tadā katanti adhippāyo. Dātuṃ upanītabhikkhāya paṭikkhepo nāma hatthasaññāya mukhavikārena vacībhedena vā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘hatthasaññāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Onītapattapāṇi^eb^nti ettha onīto pattato pāṇi etassāti onītapattapāṇīti bhinnādhikaraṇavisayoyaṃ saddo bāhiratthasamāsoti āha ^b^‘‘pattato onītapāṇi’’^eb^ntiādi. ‘‘Onittapattapāṇi’’ntipi pāṭho, tassattho onittaṃ nānābhūtaṃ vinābhūtaṃ āmisāpanayanena vā sucikataṃ pattaṃ pāṇito assāti onittapattapāṇi ^a^V1.0401^ea^, taṃ onittapattapāṇiṃ, hatthe ca pattañca dhovitvā ekamante pattaṃ nikkhipitvā nisinnanti attho. ^b^Pattuṇṇapaṭṭapaṭe cā^eb^ti pattuṇṇapaṭe ca paṭṭapaṭe ca. Tattha pattuṇṇapadese bhavā pattuṇṇā, kosiyavisesātipi vadanti. Paṭṭāni pana cīnapaṭāni. ^b^Āyogā^eb^dīsu ^b^āyogo^eb^ti paṭiāyogo, ^b^aṃsabaddhakaṃ^eb^ pattatthavikādīsu. ^b^Bhesajjatelāna^eb^nti bhesajjasampākena sādhitatelānaṃ. ^b^Tumbānī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0459^ea^ cammamayatelabhājanāni. Ekamekassa bhikkhuno sahassagghanakaṃ telamadāsīti sambandho.

[03]^b^Mahāyāgaṃ yajitvā^eb^ti mahādānaṃ datvā. ^b^Saputtadāraṃ vanditvā nisinna^eb^nti puttadārehi saddhiṃ vanditvā nisinnaṃ. ^b^Temāsa^eb^nti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. ‘‘Temāsaṃ sotabbadhammaṃ ajjeva suṇissāmī’’ti nisinnassa taṃ ajjhāsayaṃ pūretvā desitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇasaṅkappaṃ kurumāno’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anubandhitvā^eb^ti anugantvā.

[03]Buddhānaṃ anabhiratiparitassitā nāma natthīti āha ^b^‘‘yathājjhāsayaṃ yathārucitaṃ vāsaṃ vasitvā’’^eb^ti. Abhirantaṃ abhiratīti hi atthato ekaṃ. Abhirantasaddo cāyaṃ abhirucipariyāyo, na assādapariyāyo. Assādavasena ca katthaci vasantassa assādavatthuvigamanena siyā tassa tattha anabhirati, tayidaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ natthi, pageva buddhānaṃ, tasmā abhirativasena katthaci vasitvā tadabhāvato aññattha gamanaṃ nāma buddhānaṃ natthi, vineyyavinayanatthaṃ pana katthaci vasitvā tasmiṃ siddhe vineyyavinayatthameva tato aññattha gacchanti, ayamettha yathāruci. ^b^Soreyyādīni anupagammā^eb^ti mahāmaṇḍalacārikāya vīthibhūtāni soreyyanagarādīni anupagantvā. ^b^Payāgapatiṭṭhāna^eb^nti gāmassapi adhivacanaṃ titthassapi. ^b^Gaṅgaṃ nadi^eb^nti gaṅgaṃ nāma nadiṃ. ^b^Tadavasarī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ta^eb^nti karaṇatthe upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘tena avasari tadavasarī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Buddhāciṇṇakathā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Samantapāsādikāyā^eb^ti samantato sabbaso pasādaṃ janetīti samantapāsādikā, tassā samantapāsādikāya. ^b^Tatridaṃ samantapāsādikāya samantapāsādikattasmi^eb^nti ettha ^b^tatrā^eb^ti purimavacanāpekkhaṃ, ^b^ida^eb^nti vakkhamānakāraṇavacanāpekkhaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ yojanā – yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘samantapāsādikāya vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāyā’’ti, tatra yā sā samantapāsādikāti saṃvaṇṇanā vuttā ^a^V1.0402^ea^, tassā samantapāsādikāya saṃvaṇṇanāya samantapāsādikattasmiṃ samantapāsādikabhāve sabbaso pasādajanakatte idaṃ hoti. Kiṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ācariyaparamparato’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Ācariyaparamparato^eb^ti ^a^M1.0460^ea^ ‘‘upāli dāsako’’tiādinā (pari. 3). Vuttaācariyaparamparato. ^b^Nidānavatthuppabhedadīpanato^eb^ti nidānappabhedadīpanato vatthuppabhedadīpanato ca. Tattha bāhiranidānaabbhantaranidānasikkhāpadanidānadassanavasena ^b^nidāna^eb^ppabhedadīpanaṃ veditabbaṃ, theravādappakāsanaṃ pana ^b^vatthu^eb^ppabhedadīpanaṃ. ^b^Parasamayavivajjanato^eb^ti ‘‘sakāya paṭiññāya mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethā’’tiādīsu (pārā. 384) micchāpaṭipannānaṃ paresaṃ laddhinirākaraṇato, tatoyeva ca attano samayapatiṭṭhāpanena sakasamayavisuddhito.

[03]^b^Byañjanaparisodhanato^eb^ti pāṭhasodhanena byañjanaparisodhanaṃ veditabbaṃ, saddasatthānusārena vā nibbacanaṃ dassetvā padanipphattidassanaṃ byañjanaparisodhanaṃ. ^b^Vibhaṅganayabhedadassanato^eb^ti ‘‘tisso itthiyo’’tiādipadabhājanassa anurūpavasena nayabhedadassanato. ^b^Sampassata^eb^nti ñāṇacakkhunā sammā passantānaṃ, upaparikkhantānanti attho. ^b^Apāsādika^eb^nti appasādāvahaṃ. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti samantapāsādikāya. Sampassataṃ viññūnanti sambandho. Tasmā ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā samantapāsādikātveva pavattāti yojetabbaṃ. Kassa kena desitassa saṃvaṇṇanāti āha ^b^‘‘vinayassā’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Iti samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
[06]Verañjakaṇḍavaṇṇanā samattā.
[06]Paṭhamo bhāgo niṭṭhito.

[03]^b^24^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anupadavaṇṇana^eb^nti ^a^M2.0001^ea^^a^V2.0001^ea^ padaṃ padaṃ paṭivaṇṇanaṃ, padānukkamena vaṇṇanaṃ vā. ^b^Bhaṇḍappayojanauddhārasāraṇādinā kiccenā^eb^ti ettha vikkāyikabhaṇḍassa vikkiṇanaṃ ^b^bhaṇḍappayojanaṃ,^eb^ dātuṃ ^a^V2.0002^ea^ saṅketite divase gantvā gahaṇaṃ ^b^uddhāro,^eb^ ‘‘asukasmiṃ divase dātabba’’nti satuppādanaṃ ^b^sāraṇaṃ^eb^. ^b^Catubbidhāyā^eb^ti khattiyabrāhmaṇagahapatisamaṇānaṃ vasena catubbidhāya, bhikkhubhikkhunīupāsakaupāsikānaṃ vasena vā. ^b^Disvānassa etadahosī^eb^ti hetuattho ayaṃ disvāna-saddo asamānakattuko yathā ‘‘ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ hoti, sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hotī’’ti. Dassanakāraṇā hi evaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi. Kiñcāpi ettha ‘‘bhabbakulaputtassā’’ti vuttaṃ, tathāpi upanissayasampannassapi ajātasattuno viya antarāyo bhavissatīti imassa therassapi katapāpakammamūlavippaṭisāravasena adhigamantarāyo ahosīti vadanti.

[03]Kiṃ pana yesaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo atthi, buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāvepi tesaṃ antarāyo hotīti? Āma hoti, na pana buddhe paṭicca. Buddhā hi paresaṃ ^a^M2.0002^ea^ maggaphalādhigamāya ussāhajātā tattha nirantaraṃ yuttapayuttā eva honti, tasmā te paṭicca tesaṃ antarāyo na hoti, atha kho kiriyāparihāniyā vā pāpamittatāya vā hoti, kiriyāparihāni ca desakassa tasseva vā puggalassa tajjapayogābhāvato veditabbā, desakavasena panettha parihāni sāvakānaṃ vaseneva veditabbā, na buddhānaṃ vasena. Tathā hi sace dhammasenāpati dhanañjāniyassa brāhmaṇassa āsayaṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desayissa, brāhmaṇo sotāpanno abhavissa. Evaṃ tāva desakassa vasena kiriyāparihāniyā antarāyo hoti. Sace pesso hatthārohaputto bhagavato sammukhā dhammaṃ suṇanto muhuttaṃ nisīdeyya, yāva tassa bhagavā attantapādike cattāro puggale vitthārena vibhajitvā deseti, sotāpattiphalena saṃyutto abhavissa. Evaṃ puggalassa vasena kiriyāparihāniyā antarāyo hoti nāma. Imassa hi upāsakassa kiriyāparihāni jātā apariniṭṭhitāya desanāya uṭṭhahitvā pakkantattā. Sace ajātasattu devadattassa vacanaṃ gahetvā pitughātakammaṃ nākarissa, sāmaññaphalasuttakathitadivase sotāpanno abhavissa, tassa vacanaṃ gahetvā pitughātakammassa katattā pana nāhosi. Evaṃ pāpamittatāya antarāyo hoti. Sudinnassapi pāpamittavasena antarāyo ahosīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi hi tena mātāpitūnaṃ vacanaṃ gahetvā purāṇadutiyikāya methunadhammo paṭisevito nābhavissa, na taṃmūlavippaṭisāravasena adhigamantarāyo abhavissa.

[03]^b^Yannūnā^eb^ti parivitakkanatthe nipātoti āha ^b^‘‘parivitakkadassanameta’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Dhammaṃ suṇeyya’’nti kiriyāpadena vuccamāno eva hi attho ‘‘yannūnā’’ti nipātapadena jotīyati. Ahaṃ yannūna dhammaṃ suṇeyyanti yojanā. ^b^Yannūnā^eb^ti ca yadi panāti attho. Yadi panāti idampi hi tena samānatthameva. Yaṃ dhammaṃ suṇātīti sambandho. ^b^Uḷāruḷārajanā^eb^ti khattiyamahāsālādiuḷāruḷārajanākiṇṇā ^a^V2.0003^ea^. Sace ayampi paṭhamaṃ āgaccheyya, bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nisīdituṃ araharūpoti āha ^b^‘‘pacchā āgatenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sikkhattayūpasaṃhita^eb^nti adhisīlaadhicittaadhipaññāsaṅkhātasikkhattayayuttaṃ. Thokaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā ahosīti sambandho. Idhāpi sutvā-saddo hetuatthoti daṭṭhabbo, savanakāraṇā etadahosīti vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0003^ea^ hoti. Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā ‘‘ekamantaṃ nisinnassa…pe… etadahosī’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘taṃ panassa yasmā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^ta^eb^nti parivitakkanaṃ.

[03]^b^Saṅkhepakathā^eb^ti visuṃ visuṃ paduddhāraṃ akatvā samāsato atthavaṇṇanā. ^b^Yena yena ākārenā^eb^ti yena yena pakārena. ^b^Tena tena me upaparikkhato^eb^ti ‘‘kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā’’ti (ma. ni. 1.234; 2.42; pāci. 417; mahāni. 3; cūḷani. khaggavisāṇasuttaniddesa 147) ca ādinā yena yena ākārena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ, tabbipariyāyato nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ guṇaṃ pakāsentaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi avabujjhāmi, tena tena pakārena upaparikkhato vīmaṃsantassa mayhaṃ evaṃ hoti evaṃ upaṭṭhāti. ^b^Sikkhattayabrahmacariya^eb^nti adhisīlasikkhādisikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ seṭṭhacariyaṃ. ^b^Ekampi divasa^eb^nti ekadivasamattampi. ^b^Akhaṇḍaṃ katvā^eb^ti dukkaṭamattassapi anāpajjanena akhaṇḍitaṃ katvā, akhaṇḍaacchiddādibhāvāpādanena vā. Akhaṇḍalakkhaṇavacanañhetaṃ. ^b^Carimakacitta^eb^nti cuticittaṃ. Kiñcipi ekadesaṃ asesetvā ekanteneva paripūretabbatāya ^b^ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ. Kilesamalena amalīnaṃ katvā^eb^ti taṇhāsaṃkilesādinā asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ katvā, cittuppādamattampi saṃkilesamalaṃ anuppādetvā. Accantameva visuddhaṃ katvā pariharitabbatāya ^b^ekantaparisuddhaṃ^eb^. Tato eva saṅkhaṃ viya likhitanti ^b^saṅkhalikhitaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘likhitasaṅkhasadisa’’^eb^nti. Pariyodātaṭṭhena nimmalabhāvena saṅkhaṃ viya likhitaṃ dhotanti saṅkhalikhitanti āha ^b^‘‘dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāga’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Ajjhāvasatā’’ti padappayogena ^b^agāra^eb^nti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘agāramajjhe’’^eb^ti. Dāṭhikāpi massuggahaṇeneva gahetvā ^b^‘‘massu’’^eb^tveva vuttaṃ, uttarādharamassunti attho. Kasāyena rattānīti ^b^kāsāyānī^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘kasāyarasapītatāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paridahitvā^eb^ti nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca. ^b^Agārassa hita^eb^nti agāravāso agāraṃ uttarapadalopena, tassa vaḍḍhiāvahaṃ agārassa hitaṃ.

[03]^b^25^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ñātisālohitā^eb^tiādīsu ‘‘ayaṃ ajjhattiko’’ti jānanti, ñāyanti vāti ^b^ñātī,^eb^ lohitena sambandhāti ^b^sālohitā^eb^. Pitupakkhikā ñātī, mātupakkhikā sālohitā. Mātupakkhikā pitupakkhikā vā ñātī ^a^M2.0004^ea^, sassusasurapakkhikā sālohitā. Mittāyantīti ^b^mittā,^eb^^a^V2.0004^ea^ minanti vā sabbaguyhesu anto pakkhipantīti ^b^mittā^eb^. Kiccakaraṇīyesu sahabhāvaṭṭhena amā hontīti ^b^amaccā^eb^. Mamāyatīti ^b^mātā,^eb^ piyāyatīti ^b^pitā. Sarīrakiccalesenā^eb^ti uccārapassāvādisarīrakiccalesena. ^b^Ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ na pabbājetī^eb^ti ‘‘mātāpitūnaṃ lokiyamahājanassa ca cittaññathattaṃ mā hotū’’ti na pabbājeti. Tatoyeva ca suddhodanamahārājassa tathā varo dinno.

[03]^b^26^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhuranikkhepenā^eb^ti bhaṇḍappayojanādīsu dhuranikkhepena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi. Piyāyitabboti ^b^piyo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘pītijananako’’^eb^ti. Manassa appāyanato ^b^manāpo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘manavaḍḍhanako’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sukhedhito^eb^ taruṇadārakakāle, tato parañca sappikhīrādisādurasamanuññabhojanādiāhārasampattiyā ^b^sukhaparihato^eb^. Atha vā daḷhabhattikadhātijanādiparijanasampattiyā ceva paricchedasampattiyā ca uḷārapaṇītasukhapaccayūpahārehi ca ^b^sukhedhito,^eb^ akiccheneva dukkhapaccayavinodanena ^b^sukhaparihato^eb^. Ajjhattikaṅgasampattiyā vā ^b^sukhedhito,^eb^ bāhiraṅgasampattiyā ^b^sukhaparihato^eb^.

[03]^b^Kiñcī^eb^ti etassa vivaraṇaṃ ^b^‘‘appamattakampi kalabhāga’’^eb^nti. Yadā jānāti-saddo bodhanattho na hoti, tadā tassa payoge ‘‘sappino jānāti, madhuno jānātī’’tiādīsu viya karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ saddatthavidū icchantīti āha ^b^‘‘kiñci dukkhena nānubhosī’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ, anubhavanatthe ca jānanā’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca ^b^kiñci dukkhena nānubhosī^eb^ti kenaci dukkhena karaṇabhūtena visayaṃ nānubhosīti evamattho veditabbo. ‘‘Kiñcī’’ti etthāpi hi karaṇatthe sāmivacanassa lopo kato. Teneva ca vakkhati ‘‘vikappadvayepi purimapadassa uttarapadena samānavibhattilopo daṭṭhabbo’’ti. Yadā pana jānāti-saddo saraṇattho hoti, tadā saraṇatthānaṃ dhātusaddānaṃ payoge ‘‘mātu sarati, pitu sarati, bhātu jānātī’’tiādīsu viya upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ saddasatthavidū vadantīti āha ^b^‘‘atha vā kiñci dukkhaṃ nassarasīti attho’’^eb^ti, kassaci dukkhassa ananubhūtattā attanā anubhūtaṃ appamattakampi dukkhaṃ pariyesamānopi abhāvatoyeva nassarasīti attho ^a^M2.0005^ea^. ^b^Vikappadvayepī^eb^ti anubhavanasaraṇatthavasena vutte dutiyatatiyavikappadvaye. ^b^Purimapadassā^eb^ti ‘‘kiñcī’’ti padassa. ^b^Uttarapadenā^eb^ti ‘‘dukkhassā’’ti padena. ^b^Samānavibhattilopo^eb^ti uttarapadena samānassa sāmivacanassa lopo. ‘‘Kassaci dukkhassā’’ti vattabbe vikappadvayepi purimapade sāmivacanassa lopaṃ katvā ‘‘kiñci dukkhassā’’ti niddeso kato. ^b^Anicchakā^eb^ti anicchantā. ^b^Evaṃ sante^eb^ti nanu mayaṃ sudinna sāmādīsu kenacipi upāyena appaṭisādhanena appaṭikārena maraṇenapi tayā akāmakāpi ^a^V2.0005^ea^ vinā bhavissāma, evaṃ sati. ^b^Yenā^eb^ti yena kāraṇena. ^b^Kiṃ panā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ki^eb^nti karaṇatthe paccattavacananti dassento āha ^b^‘‘kena pana kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Gandhabbanaṭanāṭakādīnī^eb^ti ettha ^b^gandhabbā^eb^ nāma gāyanakā, ^b^naṭā^eb^ nāma raṅganaṭā, ^b^nāṭakā^eb^ laṅghanakādayo. ^b^Paricārehī^eb^ti ettha parito tattha tattha yathāsakaṃ visayesu cārehīti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘indriyāni cārehī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Paricārehī^eb^ti vā sukhūpakaraṇehi attānaṃ paricārehi attano paricaraṇaṃ kārehi. Tathābhūto ca yasmā laḷanto kīḷanto nāma hoti, tasmā ^b^‘‘laḷā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Bhuñjitabbato paribhuñjitabbato visesato pañca kāmaguṇā bhogā nāmāti āha ^b^‘‘bhoge bhuñjanto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dānappadānānī^eb^ti ettha niccadānaṃ ^b^dānaṃ^eb^ nāma, uposathadivasādīsu dātabbaṃ atirekadānaṃ ^b^padānaṃ^eb^ nāma. Paveṇīrakkhaṇavasena vā dīyamānaṃ ^b^dānaṃ^eb^ nāma, attanāva paṭṭhapetvā dīyamānaṃ ^b^padānaṃ^eb^ nāma. Pacurajanasādhāraṇaṃ vā nātiuḷāraṃ ^b^dānaṃ^eb^ nāma, anaññasādhāraṇaṃ atiuḷāraṃ ^b^padānaṃ^eb^ nāma. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena sīlādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Natthi etassa vacanappaṭivacanasaṅkhāto ālāpasallāpoti ^b^nirālāpasallāpo^eb^.

[03]^b^30^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Balaṃ gāhetvā^eb^ti ettha balaggahaṇaṃ nāma kāyabalassa uppādanamevāti āha ^b^‘‘kāyabalaṃ janetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Assumukha^eb^nti assūni mukhe etassāti assumukho, taṃ assumukhaṃ, assukilinnamukhanti attho. Gāmoyeva ^b^gāmantasenāsanaṃ^eb^ gāmapariyāpannattā gāmantasenāsanassa. ^b^Atirekalābhapaṭikkhepenā^eb^ti ‘‘piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāyā’’ti (mahāva. 128) evaṃ vuttabhikkhāhāralābhato adhikalābho saṅghabhattādiatirekalābho, tassa paṭikkhepenāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cuddasa^eb^^a^M2.0006^ea^^b^bhattāni paṭikkhipitvā’’^eb^ti. Saṅghabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ nimantanabhattaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ gamikabhattaṃ gilānabhattaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṃ vihārabhattaṃ dhurabhattaṃ vārabhattanti imāni cuddasa bhattāni. Tattha sakalassa saṅghassa dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ ^b^saṅghabhattaṃ^eb^. Katipaye bhikkhū uddisitvā dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ ^b^uddesabhattaṃ^eb^. Ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekadivasaṃ dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ ^b^pakkhikaṃ^eb^. Uposathe dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ ^b^uposathikaṃ^eb^. Pāṭipadadivase dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ ^b^pāṭipadikaṃ^eb^. Vihāraṃ uddissa dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ ^b^vihārabhattaṃ^eb^. Dhurageheyeva ṭhapetvā dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ ^b^dhurabhattaṃ^eb^. Gāmavāsīādīhi vārena dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ ^b^vārabhattaṃ^eb^.

[03]Atha ^b^‘‘gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhipitvā’’^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ. Gahaṇe hi sati paṭikkhepo yujjeyya, na ca paṭhamabodhiyaṃ gahapaticīvarassa paṭiggahaṇaṃ anuññātaṃ parato ^b^jīvakavatthusmiṃ^eb^ anuññātattā. Teneva vakkhati ^b^jīvakavatthusmiṃ^eb^ (mahāva. aṭṭha. 337) ‘‘bhagavato hi buddhabhāvappattito ^a^V2.0006^ea^ paṭṭhāya yāva idaṃ vatthaṃ, etthantare vīsati vassāni na koci gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyi, sabbe paṃsukūlikāva ahesu’’nti. Sudinno ca paṭhamabodhiyaṃyeva pabbajito. Teneva vakkhati ‘‘sudinno hi bhagavato dvādasame vasse pabbajito, vīsatime vasse ñātikulaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho, sayaṃ pabbajjāya aṭṭhavassiko hutvā’’ti. Tasmā ‘‘gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhipitvā’’ti kasmā vuttanti? Vuccate – ananuññātepi gahapaticīvare paṃsukūlikaṅgasamādānavasena gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhittaṃ nāma hotīti katvā vuttaṃ ‘‘gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhipitvā’’ti.

[03]^b^Loluppacāraṃ paṭikkhipitvā^eb^ti kusalabhaṇḍassa bhusaṃ vilumpanaṭṭhena loluppaṃ vuccati taṇhā, loluppena caraṇaṃ loluppacāro, taṇhāvasena gharapaṭipāṭiṃ atikkamitvā bhikkhāya caraṇaṃ, taṃ paṭikkhipitvāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gharapaṭipāṭiyā bhikkhāya pavisatī’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca āraññikaṅgādipadhānaṅgavasena sesadhutaṅgānipi gahitāneva hontīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Vajjīna^eb^nti rājāno apekkhitvā sāmivacanaṃ kataṃ, vajjīrājūnanti attho. Janapada-saddassa taṃnivāsīsupi pavattanato ^b^‘‘vajjīsū’’^eb^ti janapadāpekkhaṃ bhummavacanaṃ, vajjināmake janapadeti attho.

[03]^b^Upabhogaparibhogūpakaraṇamahantatāyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0007^ea^ pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhātānaṃ upabhogānañceva hatthiassarathaitthiyādiupabhogūpakaraṇānañca mahantatāya. Upabhogūpakaraṇāneva hi idha paribhogūpakaraṇasaddena vuttāni. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘ye hi tesaṃ upabhogā, yāni ca upabhogūpakaraṇāni, tāni mahantānī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Upabhogā hatthiassarathaitthīādayo, upabhogūpakaraṇāni tesameva suvaṇṇādiupakaraṇānī’’tipi vadanti. ^b^Sārakānī^eb^ti sārabhūtāni. ^b^Nidhetvā^eb^ti nidahitvā, nidhānaṃ katvāti attho. ^b^Divasaparibbayasaṅkhātabhogamahantatāyā^eb^ti divase divase paribhuñjitabbasaṅkhātabhogānaṃ mahantatāya. ^b^Jātarūparajatasseva pahūtatāyā^eb^ti piṇḍapiṇḍavasena ceva suvaṇṇamāsakarajatamāsakādivasena ca jātarūparajatasseva pahūtatāya. ^b^Vittī^eb^ti tuṭṭhi, vittiyā upakaraṇaṃ vittūpakaraṇaṃ, pahūtaṃ nānāvidhālaṅkārabhūtaṃ vittūpakaraṇametesanti ^b^pahūtavittūpakaraṇā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘alaṅkārabhūtassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vohāravasenā^eb^ti vaṇijjāvasena vaḍḍhikatādivasena. ^b^Dhanadhaññassa pahūtatāyā^eb^ti sattaratanasaṅkhātassa dhanassa sabbapubbaṇṇāparaṇṇasaṅgahitassa dhaññassa ca pahūtatāyāti attho. Tattha ‘‘suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttāveḷuriyavajirapavāḷāni satta ratanānī’’ti vadanti. Sālivīhiādi ^b^pubbaṇṇaṃ^eb^ purakkhataṃ sassaphalanti katvā, tabbipariyāyato muggamāsādi ^a^V2.0007^ea^^b^aparaṇṇa^eb^nti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātikattā^eb^ti sesadhutaṅgaparivāritena ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātadhutaṅgena samannāgatattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sapadānacāraṃ caritukāmo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^ Antojātatāya vā ñātisadisī dāsīti ^b^ñātidāsī^eb^. Pūtibhāveneva lakkhitabbadoso vā ^b^ābhidosiko,^eb^ abhidosaṃ vā paccūsakālaṃ gato patto atikkantoti ^b^ābhidosiko^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekarattātikkantassa vā’’^eb^tiādi. Pūtibhūtabhāvena paribhogaṃ nārahatīti ^b^aparibhogāraho^eb^. Chaḍḍanīyasabhāve nicchitepi pucchākāle sandehavohāravaseneva pucchituṃ yuttanti āha ^b^‘‘sace’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ariyavohārenā^eb^ti ariyasamudācārena. Ariyā hi mātugāmaṃ bhaginivādena samudācaranti. ^b^Nissaṭṭhapariggaha^eb^nti pariccattālayaṃ.

[03]‘‘Ākirā’’ti vuttattā ^b^‘‘viññatti vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, ‘‘sace taṃ chaḍḍanīyadhamma’’nti pariyāyaṃ amuñcitvā vuttattā ^b^‘‘payuttavācā vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, paccayapaṭisaṃyuttā vācā payuttavācā. ^b^Vattuṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti nirapekkhabhāvato vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0008^ea^, idha pana visesato aparibhogārahattāva vatthuno. ^b^Aggaariyavaṃsiko^eb^ti ariyavaṃsapaṭipattipūrakānaṃ aggo uttamo. Nimīyati saññāyatīti ^b^nimittaṃ,^eb^ yathāsallakkhito ākāroti āha ^b^‘‘gihikāle sallakkhitapubbaṃ ākāra’’^eb^nti. Hatthapiṭṭhiādīni olokayamānā ‘‘sāmiputtassa me sudinnassa viya suvaṇṇakacchapapiṭṭhisadisā imā hatthapādapiṭṭhiyo, haritālavaṭṭiyo viya suvaṭṭitā aṅguliyo, madhuro saro’’ti gihikāle sallakkhitapubbaṃ ākāraṃ aggahesi sañjāni sallakkhesi. Kasmā pana sā ñātidāsī disvāva na sañjānīti āha ^b^‘‘sudinno hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pabbajjupagatenā^eb^ti pabbajjaṃ upagatena, pabbajitenāti attho. ^b^Gharaṃ pavisitvā^eb^ti gehasāminiyā nisīditabbaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ antogehaṃ pavisitvā. ^b^Yagghe^eb^ti imassa ārocayāmīti ayamatthoti āha ^b^‘‘ārocanatthe nipāto’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Yagghe jāneyyāsīti suṭṭhu jāneyyāsī’’tipi atthaṃ vadanti. ^b^Ālapane^eb^ti dāsijanassa ālapane. Tenāha ^b^‘‘evañhī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^32^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Gharesu sālā hontī^eb^ti gharesu ekamante bhojanasālā honti pākāraparikkhittā susaṃvihitadvārabandhā susammaṭṭhavālikaṅgaṇā. ^b^Udakakañjiya^eb^nti udakañca kañjiyañca. Kasmā pana īdisāyameva sālāya aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlanti ayamattho vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘na hi pabbajitā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Asāruppe ṭhāne^eb^ti bhikkhūnaṃ ananucchavike padese. ^b^Atthi nu kho^eb^ti ^b^nu^eb^-saddo pucchanatthe, ^b^kho^eb^-saddo vacanasiliṭṭhatāya vutto. ^b^Nukho^eb^ti vā nipātasamudāyo pucchanattho. Tena nāma-saddassa pucchanatthataṃ dasseti. ^b^Yesaṃ no tva^eb^nti yesaṃ no putto tvaṃ. ^b^Īdise ṭhāne^eb^ti kiñcāpi ^a^V2.0008^ea^ taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ananurūpaṃ na hoti, tathāpi mādisānaṃ mahābhogakulānaṃ puttassa parakule āsanasālāyaṃ nisīditvā bhojanaṃ nāma ayuttarūpanti maññamāno āha. Tenevāha ‘‘nanu nāma, tāta sudinna, sakaṃ gehaṃ gantabba’’nti. Aññenapi pakārena nāmasaddassa pucchanatthatameva dassento āha ^b^‘‘tathā atthi nu kho tātā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tathā^eb^ti samuccayattho. Idāni nāmasaddassa maññanatthataṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘tathā atthi maññe’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Dukkhābhitunnatāyā^eb^ti mānasikena dukkhena abhipīḷitattā. ^b^Etamattha^eb^nti ‘‘atthi nu kho, tāta sudinna, amhākaṃ dhana’’ntiādinā yathāvuttamatthaṃ. ^b^Anokappanāmarisanatthavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0009^ea^ ettha ^b^anokappanaṃ^eb^ asaddahanaṃ. ^b^Amarisanaṃ^eb^ asahanaṃ. ^b^Anāgatavacanaṃ^eb^ anāgatasaddappayogo, attho pana vattamānakālikova. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paccakkhampī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na marisayāmī^eb^ti na visahāmi. ^b^Taṃ na sundara^eb^nti ‘‘tadāya’’nti pāṭhaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Alaṃ, gahapati, kataṃ me ajja bhattakicca^eb^nti thero ukkaṭṭhaekāsanikatāya paṭikkhipanto evamāha. ^b^Ukkaṭṭhaekāsanikatāyā^eb^ti ca idaṃ bhūtakathanavasena vuttaṃ therassa tathābhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Mudukassapi hi ekāsanikassa yāya nisajjāya kiñcimattampi bhojanaṃ bhuttaṃ, vattasīsenapi tato vuṭṭhitassa puna bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Tenāha ^b^tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero^eb^ ‘‘āsanaṃ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṃ vā’’ti. ^b^Ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātikopi samāno^eb^ti nidassanamattamidaṃ, thero sapadānacārikesupi ukkaṭṭhoyeva. Ukkaṭṭhasapadānacārikopi hi purato ca pacchato ca āhaṭabhikkhampi aggahetvāva gharadvāre ṭhatvā pattavissajjanameva karoti, tasmā thero ukkaṭṭhasapadānacārikattāpi svātanāya bhikkhaṃ nādhivāseti. Atha kasmā ‘‘adhivāsesī’’ti āha ^b^‘‘sace ekabhattampi na gahessāmī’’^eb^tiādi. Paṇḍitā hi mātāpitūnaṃ ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vā kātabbaṃ anuggahaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā dhutaṅgavisuddhikā na bhavanti.

[03]^b^33^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Majjhimappamāṇo^eb^ti catuhattho puriso majjhimappamāṇo. ‘‘Chahattho’’tipi keci. Tiro karonti etāyāti tirokaraṇīti sāṇipākāravacano ayaṃ ^b^tirokaraṇī^eb^-saddoti āha ^b^‘‘tirokaraṇiyanti karaṇatthe bhumma’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Tirokaraṇiyā’’ti vattabbe ‘‘tirokaraṇiya’’nti karaṇatthe bhummaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Tirokaraṇīya^eb^-saddo vā ayaṃ sāṇipākārapariyāyoti dassento āha ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Taṃ parikkhipitvā^eb^ti taṃ samantato khipitvā, parito bandhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samantato katvā’’^eb^ti. Vibhattipatirūpakopi nipāto hotīti āha ^b^‘‘tenāti ayampi vā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^34^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Atha ^a^V2.0009^ea^ kho āyasmato sudinnassa pitā sake nivesane paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā āyasmato sudinnassa kālaṃ ārocesi – ‘kālo, tāta sudinna, niṭṭhitaṃ bhatta’nti’’ evaṃ kālārocanassa pāḷiyaṃ anāruḷhattā āha – ^b^‘‘kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ kālārocanaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0010^ea^^b^ na vutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ārociteyeva kāle^eb^ti ‘‘kālo, tāta sudinna, niṭṭhitaṃ bhatta’’nti kāle ārociteyeva. ^b^Dve puñje^eb^ti kahāpaṇapuñjañca suvaṇṇapuñjañca.

[03]^b^Pettika^eb^nti pitito āgataṃ pettikaṃ. ^b^Nihita^eb^nti bhūmigataṃ. ^b^Payutta^eb^nti vaḍḍhivasena payojitaṃ. ^b^Taddhitalopaṃ katvā veditabba^eb^nti yathā aññatthāpi ‘‘pitāmahaṃ dhanaṃ laddhā, sukhaṃ jīvati sañjayo’’ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ taddhitalopaṃ katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pitāmahato āgataṃ, pitāmahassa vā idaṃ ^b^petāmahaṃ^eb^. ^b^Pabbajitaliṅga^eb^nti samaṇavesaṃ. ^b^Na rājabhīto^eb^ti aparādhakāraṇā na rājakulā bhīto. Yesaṃ santakaṃ dhanaṃ gahitaṃ, te ^b^iṇāyikā^eb^. ^b^Palibuddho^eb^ pīḷito.

[03]^b^Vibhattipatirūpako^eb^ti ‘‘tenā’’ti padaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Taṃnidāna^eb^nti taṃ dhanaṃ nidānaṃ kāraṇamassāti taṃnidānaṃ. ^b^Assā^eb^ti paccattavacanassa, padassa vā. ^b^Bhaya^eb^nti cittassa utrastākārena pavattabhayaṃ adhippetaṃ, na ñāṇabhayaṃ, nāpi ‘‘bhāyati etasmā’’ti evaṃ vuttaṃ ārammaṇabhayanti āha ^b^‘‘cittutrāsoti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Chambhitatta^eb^nti teneva cittutrāsabhayena sakalasarīrassa chambhitabhāvo. Visesato pana hadayamaṃsacalananti āha ^b^‘‘kāyakampo hadayamaṃsacalana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Lomahaṃso^eb^ti tena bhayena tena chambhitattena sakalasarīralomānaṃ haṭṭhabhāvo, so pana nesaṃ bhittiyaṃ nāgadantānaṃ viya uddhaṃmukhatāti āha ^b^‘‘lomānaṃ haṃsanaṃ uddhaggabhāvo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^35^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Attanā^eb^ti paccatte karaṇavacanaṃ, sayanti attho. ^b^Devaccharāna^eb^nti anaccantiyo sandhāyāha. ^b^Devanāṭakāna^eb^nti naccantiyo, pariyāyavacanaṃ vā etaṃ devakaññānaṃ. ^b^Samuppannabalavasokā hutvā^eb^ti ayaṃ loko nāma attānaṃva cinteti, tasmā sāpi ‘‘idāni ahaṃ anāthā jātā’’ti attānaṃva cintayamānā ‘‘ayaṃ ajja āgamissati, ajja āgamissatī’’ti aṭṭha vassāni bahi na nikkhantā etaṃ nissāya mayā dārakopi na laddho, yassa ānubhāvena jīveyyāmi, ito cāmhi parihīnā aññato cāti samuppannabalavasokā hutvā. Kularukkhapatiṭṭhāpane bījasadisattā kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpako putto idha bījakoti adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘kulavaṃsabījakaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0011^ea^^b^ekaṃ putta’’^eb^nti. Saṃ nāma dhanaṃ, tassa patīti saṃpati, dhanavā ^a^V2.0010^ea^ vibhavasampanno. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikahitāvahattā tassa hitanti sāpateyyaṃ, tadeva dhanaṃ vibhavoti āha – ^b^‘‘imaṃ sāpateyyaṃ evaṃ mahantaṃ amhākaṃ vibhava’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^36^eb^^b^.^eb^ Itthīnaṃ kumārībhāvappattito paṭṭhāya pacchimavayato oraṃ asati vibandhe aṭṭhame aṭṭhame sattāhe gabbhāsayasaññite tatiye āvatte katipayā lohitapīḷakā saṇṭhahitvā aggahitapubbā eva bhijjanti, tato lohitaṃ paggharati, tattha utusamaññā pupphasamaññā cāti āha – ^b^‘‘pupphanti utukāle uppannalohitassa nāma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Gabbhapatiṭṭhānaṭṭhāne^eb^ti yasmiṃ okāse dārako nibbattati, tasmiṃ padese. ^b^Saṇṭhahitvā^eb^ti nibbattitvā. ^b^Bhijjantī^eb^ti aggahitapubbā eva bhijjanti. Ayañhi tāsaṃ sabhāvo. ^b^Dosenā^eb^ti lohitamalena. ^b^Suddhe vatthumhī^eb^ti paggharitalohitattā anāmayattā ca nahānato paraṃ catutthadivasato paṭṭhāya suddhe gabbhāsaye. Suddhe pana vatthumhi mātāpitūsu ekavāraṃ sannipatitesu yāva satta divasāni khettameva hoti gabbhasaṇṭhahanassa parittassa lohitalepassa vijjamānattā. Keci pana ‘‘aḍḍhamāsamattampi khettamevā’’ti vadanti. ^b^Bāhāya^eb^nti adhikaraṇe bhummanti āha ^b^‘‘purāṇadutiyikāya yā bāhā, tatra naṃ gahetvā’’^eb^ti. Upayogatthe bhummavacanampi yujjatiyeva yathā ‘‘sudinnassa pādesu gahetvā’’ti.

[03]Pubbepi paññattasikkhāpadānaṃ sabbhāvato ^b^apaññatte sikkhāpade^eb^ti pārājikaṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpade aṭṭhapite’’^eb^ti. Vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvento āha – ^b^‘‘bhagavato kira paṭhamabodhiya’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Evarūpa^eb^nti pārājikapaññattiyā anurūpaṃ. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ, saṅghādisesapaññattiyā anurūpampi ajjhācāraṃ nākaṃsuyeva. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘avasese pañca khuddakāpattikkhandhe eva paññapesī’’^eb^ti. Idañca thullaccayādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ lahukāpattikkhandhānaṃ sabbhāvamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pañcāpattikkhandhānaṃ anavasesato paññattattāva. Paṭhamabodhiyaṃ pañcannaṃ lahukāpattīnaṃ sabbhāvavacaneneva dhammasenāpatissa sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanā visesato garukāpattipaññattiyā pātimokkhuddesassa ca hetubhūtāti daṭṭhabbā. Keci ^a^M2.0012^ea^ pana ‘‘tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pana vatthusmiṃ avasesapañcakhuddakāpattikkhandhe eva paññapesīti idaṃ dvādasame vasse verañjāyaṃ vutthavassena bhagavatā tato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhavassabbhantare paññattasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vutta’’nti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ tato pubbepi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sabbhāvato. Teneva verañjakaṇḍe ‘‘ekabhikkhunāpi ratticchedo vā pacchimikāya tattha vassaṃ upagacchāmāti vassacchedo vā na kato’’ti ca ‘‘sāmampi pacanaṃ samaṇasāruppaṃ na hoti, na ca vaṭṭatī’’ti ca vuttaṃ. ^b^Ārādhayiṃsū^eb^ti cittaṃ gaṇhiṃsu, ajjhāsayaṃ ^a^V2.0011^ea^ pūrayiṃsu, hadayagāhiniṃ paṭipattiṃ paṭipajjiṃsūti attho. ^b^Ekaṃ samaya^eb^nti ekasmiṃ samaye, paṭhamabodhiyanti attho.

[03]Yaṃ ādīnavanti sambandho. ^b^Sikkhāpadaṃ paññapento^eb^ti paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadaṃ paññapento. ^b^Ādīnavaṃ dassessatī^eb^ti ‘‘varaṃ te, moghapurisa, āsīvisassa ghoravisassa mukhe aṅgajātaṃ pakkhittaṃ, na tveva mātugāmassa aṅgajāte aṅgajātaṃ pakkhitta’’ntiādinā yaṃ ādīnavaṃ dassessati. ^b^Abhiviññāpesī^eb^ti imassa ‘‘pavattesī’’ti ayamattho kathaṃ laddhoti āha ^b^‘‘pavattanāpi hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kāyaviññatticopanato^eb^ti kāyaviññattivasena pavattacalanato. Kasmā panesa methunadhammena anatthikopi samāno tikkhattuṃ abhiviññāpesīti āha – ^b^‘‘tikkhattuṃ abhiviññāpanañcesā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^tikkhattuṃ abhiviññāpana^eb^nti muttipāpanavasena tīsu vāresu methunadhammassa pavattanaṃ.
[03]Sabbesampi padānaṃ avadhāraṇaphalattā vināpi evakāraṃ avadhāraṇattho viññāyatīti āha ^b^‘‘teneva ajjhācārenā’’^eb^ti. Aṭṭha hi gabbhakāraṇāni. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Methunacoḷaggahaṇaṃ, tanusaṃsaggo ca nābhiāmasanaṃ;
[22]Pānaṃ dassanasavanaṃ, ghāyanamiti gabbhahetavo aṭṭhā’’ti.

[03]Idāni avadhāraṇena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetukāmo āha – ^b^‘‘kiṃ pana aññathāpi gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hotī’’^eb^tiādi. Nanu ca nābhiparāmasanampi kāyasaṃsaggoyeva, kasmā naṃ visuṃ vuttanti? Ubhayesaṃ chandarāgavasena kāyasaṃsaggo vutto, itthiyā chandarāgavasena nābhiparāmasanaṃ, vatthuvasena vā taṃ visuṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kathaṃ pana kāyasaṃsaggena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ hoti, kathañca tattha sukkasoṇitassa sambhavoti āha ^b^‘‘itthiyo hī’’^eb^tiādi ^a^M2.0013^ea^. Chandarāguppattivasena itthiyā sukkakoṭṭhāso calito hoti, sopi gabbhasaṇṭhānassa paccayo hotīti adhippāyo. Itthisantānepi hi rasādisattadhātuyo labbhantiyeva. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘aṅgapaccaṅgaparāmasanaṃ sādiyantiyopi gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ pana ‘‘kāyasaṃsaggādinā sattappakārena gabbhaggahaṇe pitu sukkakoṭṭhāsaṃ vinā chandarāgavasena mātu vikārappattaṃ lohitameva gabbhasaṇṭhānassa paccayo hotī’’ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Yassa aṅgapaccaṅgaparāmasanaṃ sādiyitvā mātā puttaṃ paṭilabhati, sace so aparena samayena paripuṇṇindriyo hutvā tādisaṃ pitaraṃ manussajātikaṃ jīvitā voropeti, pitughātakova hotī’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^Taṃ^eb^^a^V2.0012^ea^^b^asuciṃ ekadesaṃ mukhena aggahesī^eb^ti purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovantī tattha yaṃ asuciṃ addasa, taṃ asuciṃ ekadesaṃ pivi. ‘‘Vaṭṭati tumhākaṃ methunadhammo’’ti puṭṭho ‘‘kappatu vā mā vā kappatu, mayaṃ tena anatthikā’’ti dassento āha ^b^‘‘anatthikā mayaṃ etenā’’^eb^ti. Kiñcāpi nābhiparāmasane methunarāgo natthi, tathāpi nābhiparāmasanakāle phassasādiyanavasena assādamattaṃ tassā ahosīti gahetabbaṃ, aññathā gabbhasaṇṭhahanaṃ na siyā. Diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya nābhiparāmasanena maṇḍabyassa nibbatti ahosi, caṇḍapajjotamātu nābhiyaṃ vicchikā pharitvā gatā, tena caṇḍapajjotassa nibbatti ahosīti āha ^b^‘‘eteneva nayenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Purisaṃ upanijjhāyatī^eb^ti vātapānādinā disvā vā diṭṭhapubbaṃ vā purisaṃ upanijjhāyati. ^b^Rājorodhā viyā^eb^ti sīhaḷadīpe kira ekissā itthiyā tathā ahosi, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ. ^b^Aya^eb^nti sudinnassa purāṇadutiyikā. ^b^Yaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti yaṃ ajjhācāraṃ sandhāya. Sukkaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘mātāpitaro ca sannipatitā hontī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, ^b^mātā ca utunī hotī^eb^ti lohitaṃ sandhāya. Tattha ^b^sannipatitā hontī^eb^ti asaddhammavasena ekasmiṃ ṭhāne samāgatā saṅgatā honti. ^b^Mātā ca utunī hotī^eb^ti idaṃ utusamayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na lokasamaññākarajassa lagganadivasamattaṃ. ^b^Gandhabbo^eb^ti tatrūpagasatto, gantabboti vuttaṃ hoti. Ta-kārassa dha-kāro katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā gandhanato uppajjanagatiyā nimittupaṭṭhānena sūcanato ^a^M2.0014^ea^ dīpanato gandhoti laddhanāmena bhavagāmikammunā abbati pavattatīti gandhabbo, tattha uppajjanakasatto. ^b^Paccupaṭṭhito hotī^eb^ti upagato hoti. Ettha ca na mātāpitūnaṃ sannipātaṃ olokayamāno samīpe ṭhito nāma hoti, kammayantayantito pana eko satto tasmiṃ okāse nibbattanako purimajātiyaṃ ṭhitoyeva gatinimittādiārammaṇakaraṇavasena upapattābhimukho hotīti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Sannipātā^eb^ti samodhānena samāgamena. ^b^Gabbhassā^eb^ti gabbhe nibbattanakasattassa. Gabbhe nibbattanakasattopi hi gabbhoti vuccati. Yathāha – ‘‘yathā kho panānanda, aññā itthikā nava vā dasa vā māse gabbhaṃ kucchinā pariharitvā vijāyantī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.205). Katthaci pana gabbhoti mātukucchi vutto. Yathāha –
[21]‘‘Yamekarattiṃ paṭhamaṃ, gabbhe vasati māṇavo;
[22]Abbhuṭṭhitova so yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī’’ti. (jā. 1.15.363); –

[07]Ettha ^a^V2.0013^ea^ ca gabbhati attabhāvabhāvena pavattatīti gabbho, kalalādiavattho dhammappabandho, taṃnissitattā pana sattasantāno ‘‘gabbho’’ti vutto yathā ‘‘mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī’’ti. Taṃnissayabhāvato mātukucchi ‘‘gabbho’’ti veditabbo. Gabbho viyāti vā. Yathā hi nivāsaṭṭhānatāya sattānaṃ ovarako ‘‘gabbho’’ti vuccati, evaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ yāva abhijāti nivāsaṭṭhānatāya mātukucchi ‘‘gabbho’’ti vuttoti veditabbo. ^b^Avakkanti hotī^eb^ti nibbatti hoti.

[03]^b^Ārakkhadevatā^eb^ti tassa ārakkhatthāya ṭhitā devatā. Assa taṃ ajjhācāranti sambandho. ^b^Tathā nicchāresu^eb^nti tathā mahantaṃ saddaṃ katvā nicchāresuṃ. Kiñcāpi idha pāḷiyaṃ ākāsaṭṭhadevatā visuṃ na āgatā, tathāpi saddassa anussāvane ayamanukkamoti dassetuṃ cātumahārājikadevatāyo dvidhā katvā ākāsaṭṭhadevatā visuṃ vuttā. Tenettha ākāsaṭṭhakānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā cātumahārājikāti paribhaṇḍapabbataṭṭhakā veditabbā. ^b^Itihā^eb^ti nipātasamudāyo evaṃsaddassa atthe daṭṭhabboti āha ^b^‘‘eva’’^eb^nti. ^b^Khaṇena muhuttenā^eb^ti padadvayaṃ vevacanabhāvato samānatthamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ekakolāhalamahosī^eb^ti devabrahmalokesu ^a^M2.0015^ea^ ekakolāhalamahosi. Kiñcāpi hi so saddo yāva brahmalokā abbhuggacchi, tathāpi na so manussānaṃ visayo tesaṃ rūpaṃ viya, teneva bhikkhū pucchiṃsu – ‘‘kacci no tvaṃ, āvuso sudinna, anabhirato’’ti.

[03]^b^37^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Evaṃ mātāputtānaṃ pabbajjā saphalā ahosi, pitā pana vippaṭisārābhibhūto vihāsī’’^eb^ti vacanato sudinnassa tasmiṃ attabhāve arahattādhigamo nāhosīti viññāyati. Keci pana ‘‘pubbekatapuññatāya codiyamānassa bhabbakulaputtassāti vuttattā sudinno taṃ kukkuccaṃ vinodetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi, teneva pabbajjā anuññātā’’ti vadanti. Taṃ pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca na sameti. Pubbekatapuññatā ca appamāṇaṃ tādisassapi antarākatapāpakammassa vasena ajātasattuno viya adhigamantarāyadassanato. Katākatānusocanalakkhaṇaṃ kukkuccaṃ idhādhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘ajjhācārahetuko pacchānutāpo’’^eb^ti. Kataṃ ajjhācāraṃ paṭicca anusocanavasena virūpaṃ saraṇaṃ cintanaṃ ^b^vippaṭisāro^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘vippaṭisārotipi tasseva nāma’’^eb^nti. Kucchitaṃ kataṃ kiriyāti kukataṃ, kukatameva ^b^kukkucca^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘kucchitakiriyābhāvato kukkucca’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pariyādinnamaṃsalohitattā^eb^ti parikkhīṇamaṃsalohitattā. ^b^Avipphāriko^eb^ti uddesādīsu byāpārarahito, abyāvaṭoti attho. ^b^Vahacchinno^eb^ti ^a^V2.0014^ea^ chinnavaho, bhāravahanena chinnakkhandhoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Taṃ taṃ cintayī^eb^ti ‘‘yadi ahaṃ taṃ pāpaṃ na karissaṃ, ime bhikkhū viya paripuṇṇasīlo assa’’ntiādinā taṃ taṃ cintayi.

[03]^b^38^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃbhūta^eb^nti kisalūkhādibhāvappattaṃ. ^b^Gaṇasaṅgaṇikāpapañcenā^eb^ti gaṇe janasamāgame sannipatanaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikā, gaṇasaṅgaṇikāyeva papañco gaṇasaṅgaṇikāpapañco, tena. ^b^Yassā^eb^ti ye assa. ^b^Kathāphāsukā^eb^ti vissāsikabhāveneva kathākaraṇe phāsukā, sukhena vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyā, sukhasambhāsāti attho. Pasādassa pamāṇato ūnādhikattaṃ sabbadā sabbesaṃ natthīti āha ^b^‘‘pasādapatiṭṭhānokāsassa sampuṇṇattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dānī^eb^ti imasmiṃ atthe etarahi-saddo atthīti āha ^b^‘‘dānīti nipāto’’^eb^ti. ^b^No^eb^-saddopi nu-saddo viya pucchanatthoti āha ^b^‘‘kacci^eb^^a^M2.0016^ea^^b^nu tva’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tameva anabhirati^eb^nti tehi bhikkhūhi pucchitaṃ tameva gihibhāvapatthanākāraṃ anabhiratiṃ. ‘‘Tamevā’’ti avadhāraṇena nivattitamatthaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘adhikusalāna’’^eb^ntiādi. Adhikusalā dhammā samathavipassanādayo. ^b^Atthī^eb^ti visayabhāvena citte parivattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pāpassa vattamānataṃ sandhāya, atthi visayabhāvena citte parivattatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘niccakālaṃ abhimukhaṃ viya me tiṭṭhatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Yaṃ tva^eb^nti ettha ^b^ya^eb^nti hetuatthe nipāto, karaṇatthe vā paccattavacananti āha ^b^‘‘yena pāpenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anekapariyāyenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^pariyāya^eb^-saddo kāraṇavacanoti āha ^b^‘‘anekakāraṇenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Virāgatthāyā^eb^ti bhavabhogesu virajjanatthāya. ^b^No rāgena rajjanatthāyā^eb^ti bhavabhogesuyeva rāgena arañjanatthāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhagavatā hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Esa nayo sabbapadesū^eb^ti adhippāyikamattaṃ sabbapadesu atidissati. ^b^Idaṃ panettha pariyāyavacanamatta^eb^nti ‘‘visaṃyogāyā’’tiādīsu sabbapadesu ‘‘kilesehi visaṃyujjanatthāyā’’tiādinā padatthavibhāvanavasena vuttapariyāyavacanaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Na saṃyujjanatthāyā^eb^ti kilesehi na saṃyujjanatthāya. ^b^Aggahaṇatthāyā^eb^ti kilese aggahaṇatthāya, bhavabhoge vā taṇhādiṭṭhivasena aggahaṇatthāya. ^b^Na saṅgahaṇatthāyā^eb^ti etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Nibbattitalokuttaranibbānamevā^eb^ti saṅkhārehi nikkhantaṃ vivittaṃ, tatoyeva lokato uttiṇṇattā lokuttaraṃ nibbānaṃ. ^b^Madanimmadanāyāti vā^eb^ti ettha avuttasamuccayatthena ^b^vā^eb^-saddena ādiatthena ^b^iti^eb^-saddena vā ‘‘pipāsavinayāyā’’tiādi sabbaṃ saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānena ariyamaggena pahīyamānā rāgamānamadādayo taṃ patvā pahīyanti nāmāti āha ^b^‘‘yasmā pana taṃ āgammā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^taṃ āgammā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ āgamma paṭicca ^a^V2.0015^ea^ ariyamaggassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvahetu. ^b^Mānamadapurisamadādayo^eb^ti ettha jātiādiṃ nissāya seyyassa ‘‘seyyohamasmī’’tiādinā uppajjanakamānoyeva madajananaṭṭhena madoti ^b^mānamado. Purisamado^eb^ vuccati purisamāno, ‘‘ahaṃ puriso’’ti uppajjanakamāno. ‘‘Asaddhammasevanasamatthataṃ nissāya pavatto māno, rāgo eva vā purisamado’’ti keci. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena balamadayobbanamadādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti ^a^M2.0017^ea^. ^b^Mahāgaṇṭhipade^eb^ pana ^b^majjhimagaṇṭhipade^eb^ ca ‘‘purisamado nāma sambhavo’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ idha yuttaṃ viya na dissati. Na hi ‘‘bhagavatā sambhavassa vināsāya dhammo desito’’ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Nimmadā^eb^ti vigatamadabhāvā. Imameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘amadā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Madā nimmadīyanti ettha amadabhāvaṃ vināsaṃ gacchantīti ^b^madanimmadano^eb^. Esa nayo sesapadesupi.

[03]^b^Kāmapipāsā^eb^ti kāmānaṃ pātukamyatā, kāmataṇhāti attho. Ālīyanti abhiramitabbaṭṭhena sevīyantīti ālayā, pañca kāmaguṇāti āha ^b^‘‘pañca kāmaguṇālayā’’^eb^ti. Pañcasu hi kāmaguṇesu chandarāgappahāneneva pañca kāmaguṇāpi pahīnā nāma honti, teneva ‘‘yo, bhikkhave, rūpesu chandarāgo’’tiādi (saṃ. ni. 3.323) vuttaṃ. Pañcakāmaguṇesu vā ālayā ^b^pañcakāmaguṇālayā^eb^. Ālīyanti allīyanti abhiramanavasena sevantīti ālayāti hi taṇhāvicaritānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^Tebhūmakavaṭṭa^eb^nti tīsu bhūmīsu kammakilesavipākā vaṭṭanaṭṭhena vaṭṭaṃ. ^b^Virajjatī^eb^ti palujjati. ^b^‘‘Virajjatī^eb^ti kāmavināso vutto, ^b^nirujjhatī^eb^ti ekappahārena vināso’’ti ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Virāgo nirodho^eb^ti sāmaññacodanāyapi ‘‘taṇhākkhayo’’ti adhikatattā taṇhāya eva virajjanaṃ nirujjhanañca vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Catasso yoniyo^eb^ti ettha ^b^yonī^eb^ti khandhakoṭṭhāsassapi kāraṇassapi passāvamaggassapi nāmaṃ. ‘‘Catasso nāgayoniyo (saṃ. ni. 3.342-343) catasso supaṇṇayoniyo’’ti ettha hi khandhakoṭṭhāso yoni nāma. ‘‘Yoni hesā bhūmija phalassa adhigamāyā’’ti (ma. ni. 3.226) ettha kāraṇaṃ. ‘‘Na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūmi, yonijaṃ mattisambhava’’nti (ma. ni. 2.457; dha. pa. 396) ettha passāvamaggo. Idha pana khandhakoṭṭhāso ‘‘yonī’’ti adhippeto. Yavanti tāya sattā amissitāpi samānajātitāya missitā hontīti ^b^yoni^eb^. Sā pana atthato aṇḍādiuppattiṭṭhānavisiṭṭho khandhānaṃ bhāgaso pavattiviseso, sā ca aṇḍajajalābujasaṃsedajaopapātikavasena catubbidhā. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘catasso kho imā, sāriputta, yoniyo. Katamā catasso? Aṇḍajā yoni jalābujā yoni saṃsedajā yoni opapātikā yonī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.152).

[03]Tattha ^a^M2.0018^ea^^a^V2.0016^ea^ aṇḍe jātā ^b^aṇḍajā^eb^. Jalābumhi jātā ^b^jalābujā^eb^. Saṃsede jātā ^b^saṃsedajā^eb^. Vinā etehi kāraṇehi uppatitvā viya nibbattāti ^b^opapātikā^eb^. Ettha ca petaloke tiracchāne manussesu ca aṇḍajādayo catassopi yoniyo sambhavanti, manussesu panettha kecideva opapātikā honti mahāpadumakumārādayo viya. Aṇḍajāpi kontaputtā dvebhātiyatherā viya, saṃsedajāpi padumagabbhe nibbattapokkharasātibrāhmaṇapadumavatīdevīādayo viya kecideva honti, yebhuyyena pana manussā jalābujāva. Petesupi nijjhāmataṇhikapetānaṃ niccadukkhāturatāya kāmasevanā natthi, tasmā te gabbhaseyyakā na honti. Jālāvantatāya na tāsaṃ kucchiyaṃ gabbho saṇṭhāti, tasmā te opapātikāyeva saṃsedajatāyapi asambhavato, avasesapetā pana catuyonikāpi honti. Yathā ca te, evaṃ yakkhāpi sabbacatuppadapakkhijātidīghajātiādayopi sabbe catuyonikāyeva. Sabbe nerayikā ca catumahārājikato paṭṭhāya uparidevā ca opapātikāyeva, bhummadevā pana catuyonikāva honti. Tattha devamanussesu saṃsedajaopapātikānaṃ ayaṃ viseso – saṃsedajā mandā daharā hutvā nibbattanti, opapātikā soḷasavassuddesikā hutvā.

[03]^b^Pañca gatiyo^eb^ti ettha sukatadukkaṭakammavasena gantabbā upapajjitabbāti gatiyo. Yathā hi kammabhavo paramatthato asatipi kārake paccayasāmaggiyā siddho, taṃsamaṅginā santānalakkhaṇena sattena katoti voharīyati, evaṃ upapattibhavalakkhaṇagatiyo paramatthato asatipi gamake taṃtaṃkammavasena yesaṃ tāni kammāni tehi gantabbāti voharīyanti. Apica gatigati nibbattigati ajjhāsayagati vibhavagati nipphattigatīti bahuvidhā gati nāma. Tattha ‘‘taṃ gatiṃ pecca gacchāmī’’ti (a. ni. 4.184) ca ‘‘yassa gatiṃ na jānanti, devā gandhabbamānusā’’ti (dha. pa. 420; su. ni. 649) ca ayaṃ ^b^gatigati^eb^ nāma. ‘‘Imesaṃ kho panāhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlavantānaṃ neva jānāmi āgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vā’’ti (ma. ni. 1.508) ayaṃ ^b^nibbattigati^eb^ nāma. ‘‘Evampi kho te ahaṃ brahme gatiñca pajānāmi cutiñca pajānāmī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.503) ayaṃ ^b^ajjhāsayagati^eb^ nāma. ‘‘Vibhavo gati dhammānaṃ, nibbānaṃ arahato ^a^M2.0019^ea^ gatī’’ti (pari. 339) ayaṃ ^b^vibhavagati^eb^ nāma. ‘‘Dveyeva gatiyo sambhavanti anaññā’’ti (dī. ni. 1.258; 2.34; 3.200) ayaṃ ^b^nipphattigati^eb^ nāma. Tāsu idha gatigati adhippetā, sā pana nirayatiracchānayonipettivisayamanaussadevānaṃ vasena pañcavidhā hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ – ‘‘pañca kho imā, sāriputta, gatiyo. Katamā pañca? Nirayo tiracchānayoni pettivisayo manussā devā’’ti (ma. ni. 1.153).

[03]Tattha ^a^V2.0017^ea^ yassa uppajjati, taṃ brūhentoyeva uppajjatīti ayo, sukhaṃ. Natthi ettha ayoti ^b^nirayo,^eb^ tato eva ramitabbaṃ assādetabbaṃ tattha natthīti niratiatthena nirassādaṭṭhena ca nirayoti vuccati. Tiriyaṃ añcitāti ^b^tiracchānā,^eb^ devamanussādayo viya uddhaṃ dīghā ahutvā tiriyaṃ dīghāti attho. Pakaṭṭhato sukhato ayanaṃ apagamo peccabhāvo, taṃ peccabhāvaṃ pattānaṃ visayoti ^b^pettivisayo,^eb^ petayoni. Manassa ussannatāya ^b^manussā,^eb^ satisūrabhāvabrahmacariyayogyatādiguṇavasena upacitamānasatāya ukkaṭṭhaguṇacittatāya manussāti vuttaṃ hoti, ayaṃ panattho nippariyāyato jambudīpavāsīvasena veditabbo. Yathāha – ‘‘tīhi, bhikkhave, ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse. Katamehi tīhi? Sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso’’ti (a. ni. 9.21). Tathā hi buddhā ca bhagavanto paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā mahāsāvakā cakkavattino aññe ca mahānubhāvā sattā tattheva uppajjanti, tehi samānarūpāditāya pana saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi itaramahādīpavāsinopi manussātveva paññāyiṃsu.

[03]Apare pana bhaṇanti ‘‘lobhādīhi alobhādīhi ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya manussā. Ye hi sattā manussajātikā, tesu visesato lobhādayo alobhādayo ca ussannā. Te lobhādiussannatāya apāyamaggaṃ, alobhādiussannatāya sugatimaggaṃ nibbānagāmimaggañca paripūrenti, tasmā lobhādīhi alobhādīhi ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya parittadīpavāsīhi saddhiṃ catumahādīpavāsino sattavisesā manussāti vuccantī’’ti. Lokiyā pana ‘‘manuno ^a^M2.0020^ea^ apaccabhāvena manussā’’ti vadanti. Manu nāma paṭhamakappiko lokamariyādāya ādibhūto sattānaṃ hitāhitavidhāyako kattabbākattabbatāvasena pituṭṭhāniyo, yo sāsane mahāsammatoti vuccati amhākaṃ bodhisatto, paccakkhato paramparāya ca tassa ovādānusāsaniyaṃ ṭhitā sattā puttasadisatāya ‘‘manussā, mānusā’’ti ca vuccanti. Tato eva hi te ‘‘mānavā manujā’’ti ca voharīyanti.

[03]Pañcahi kāmaguṇehi attano attano devānubhāvasaṅkhātehi iddhivisesehi ca dibbanti kīḷanti laḷanti jotantīti ^b^devā^eb^. Tattha kāmadevā kāmaguṇehi ceva iddhivisesehi ca, itare iddhiviseseheva dibbantīti veditabbā. Saraṇanti vā gamiyanti abhitthavīyantīti vā devā. Ettha ca nirayagatidevagatimanussagatīhi saddhiṃ okāsena khandhā vuttā. Tiracchānayonipettivisayaggahaṇena khandhānaṃ eva gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ tesaṃ tādisassa paricchinnassa okāsassa abhāvato. Yattha yattha vā te araññasamuddapabbatapādādike nibaddhavāsaṃ vasanti, tādisassa ṭhānassa ^a^V2.0018^ea^ vasena okāsopi gahetabbo. ^b^Satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo nava sattāvāsā^eb^ ca heṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇitanayā eva. ^b^Aparāparabhāvāyā^eb^ti aparāparaṃ yoniādito yoniādibhāvāya. ^b^Ābandhanaṃ^eb^ gaṇṭhikaraṇaṃ, ^b^saṃsibbanaṃ^eb^ tunnakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Taṇhāya nikkhantaṃ^eb^ tattha tassā sabbaso abhāvato, nikkhamanañcassa taṇhāya visaṃyogo evāti āha ^b^‘‘visaṃyutta’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Kāmānaṃ pahāna^eb^nti ettha kāmaggahaṇena kāmīyatīti kāmo, kāmetīti kāmoti duvidhassapi kāmassa saṅgaho katoti āha ^b^‘‘vatthukāmānaṃ kilesakāmānañca pahāna’’^eb^nti. Vatthukāmappahānañcettha tesu chandarāgappahānenāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Kāmasaññāna^eb^nti kāmesu, kāmasahagatānaṃ vā saññānaṃ. ^b^Pariññā^eb^ti tividhāpi pariññā idhādhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘ñātatīraṇapahānavasena tividhā pariññā’’^eb^ti. Tattha katamā ñātapariññā? Sabbaṃ tebhūmakaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ‘‘idaṃ rūpaṃ, ettakaṃ rūpaṃ, na ito bhiyyo, idaṃ nāmaṃ, ettakaṃ nāmaṃ, na ito bhiyyo’’ti bhūtupādāyabhedaṃ rūpaṃ phassādibhedaṃ nāmañca lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānato vavatthapeti, kammāvijjādikañcassa paccayaṃ pariggaṇhāti, ayaṃ ^b^ñātapariññā^eb^.

[03]Katamā ^a^M2.0021^ea^ tīraṇapariññā? Evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā taṃ sabbaṃ tīreti aniccato dukkhato rogatoti dvācattālīsāya ākārehi, ayaṃ ^b^tīraṇapariññā^eb^ nāma. Katamā pahānapariññā? Evaṃ tīrayitvā aggamaggena sabbasmiṃ chandarāgaṃ pajahati, ayaṃ ^b^pahānapariññā^eb^. Diṭṭhivisuddhikaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyo vā ñātapariññā, maggāmaggapaṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiādayo, kalāpasammasanādianulomapariyosānā vā paññā tīraṇapariññā, ariyamagge ñāṇaṃ nippariyāyena pahānapariññā. Idha pana kāmasaññānaṃ sabhāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasena aniccādisāmaññalakkhaṇavasena ca pavattamānānaṃ ñātatīraṇapariññānampi kiccanipphattiyā maggeneva ijjhanato maggakkhaṇaṃyeva sandhāya tividhāpi pariññā vuttā. Teneva ‘‘imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu kilesakkhayakaro lokuttaramaggova kathito’’ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Kāmesu, kāme vā pātumicchā kāmapipāsāti āha – ^b^‘‘kāmesu pātabyatānaṃ, kāme vā pātumicchāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Imesu pañcasu ṭhānesū^eb^ti ‘‘kāmānaṃ pahānaṃ akkhāta’’ntiādinā vuttesu pañcasu ṭhānesu. ^b^Tīsu ṭhānesū^eb^ti ‘‘virāgāya dhammo desito, no sarāgāya, visaṃyogāya dhammo desito, no saṃyogāya, anupādānāya dhammo desito, no saupādānāyā’’ti evaṃ vuttesu ṭhānesu. ^b^Vippaṭisāraṃ karotī^eb^ti evaṃ taṃ pāpaṃ vippaṭisāraṃ uppādeti. Kīdisaṃ vippaṭisāraṃ karotīti āha ^b^‘‘īdisepi nāmā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^39^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Neva^eb^^a^V2.0019^ea^^b^piyakamyatāyā^eb^ti attani satthu neva piyabhāvakāmatāya. ^b^Na bhedapurekkhāratāyā^eb^ti na satthu tena bhikkhunā bhedanādhippāyapurekkhāratāya. ^b^Na kalisāsanāropanatthāyā^eb^ti na dosāropanatthāya. ^b^Kalī^eb^ti kodhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tassa sāsanaṃ kalisāsanaṃ, kodhavasena vuccamāno garahadoso. ^b^Vela^eb^nti sikkhāpadavelaṃ. ^b^Mariyāda^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Sikkhāpadañhi anatikkamanīyaṭṭhena ‘‘velā, mariyādā’’ti ca vuccati.

[03]^b^Ajjhācāravītikkamo^eb^ti methunavasena pavattaajjhācārasaṅkhāto vītikkamo. ^b^Pakaraṇe^eb^ti ettha ^b^pa^eb^-saddo ārambhavacanoti āha ^b^‘‘kattuṃ ārabhatī’’^eb^ti. Katthaci upasaggo dhātuatthameva vadati, na visesatthajotakoti āha ^b^‘‘karotiyeva vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jātiyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0022^ea^ khattiyādijātiyā. ^b^Gottenā^eb^ti gotamakassapādigottena. ^b^Kolaputtiyenā^eb^ti khattiyādijātīsuyeva sakkakulasotthiyakulādivisiṭṭhakulānaṃ puttabhāvena. ^b^Yasassī^eb^ti mahāparivāro. ^b^Pesala^eb^nti piyasīlaṃ. ^b^Avikampamānenā^eb^ti paṭighānunayehi akampamānena. Yassa tasmiṃ attabhāve uppajjanārahānaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthi, taṃ buddhā ‘‘moghapurisā’’ti vadanti ariṭṭhalāḷudāyīādike viya. Upanissaye satipi tasmiṃ khaṇe magge vā phale vā asati ‘‘moghapurisā’’ti vadantiyeva dhaniyaupasenattherādike viya. Sudinnassa pana tasmiṃ attabhāve maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo samucchinnoyeva, tena naṃ ‘‘moghapurisā’’ti āha.

[03]^b^Samaṇakaraṇānaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti hirottappādīnaṃ. ^b^Maggaphalanibbāna^eb^ggahaṇena paṭivedhasāsanassa gahitattā ^b^sāsanāna^eb^nti paṭipattipariyattisāsanānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^Chavi^eb^nti tesaṃ pabhassarakaraṇaṃ chaviṃ. Kiṃ tanti āha ^b^‘‘chāya’’^eb^nti, tesaṃ pakāsakaṃ obhāsanti attho. Kiṃ tanti āha ^b^‘‘sundarabhāva’’^eb^nti. Chavimanugataṃ ^b^anucchavikaṃ^eb^. ^b^Patirūpa^eb^ntiādīsupi ‘‘tesa’’nti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Samaṇānaṃ kammaṃ sāmaṇakaṃ, na sāmaṇakaṃ ^b^assāmaṇakaṃ^eb^. Kathaṃ-saddayogena ‘‘na sakkhissasī’’ti anāgatavacanaṃ kataṃ. ‘‘Nāma-saddayogenā’’ti ca vadanti.

[03]^b^Dayālukenā^eb^ti anukampāya sahitena. ^b^Paribhāsanto^eb^ti garahanto. Niruttinayena āsīvisa-saddassa atthaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘āsu sīgha’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Etassā^eb^ti āsīvisassa. ^b^Āgacchatī^eb^ti yo tena daṭṭho, taṃ patiāgacchati. Āsittavisotipi ^b^āsīviso,^eb^ sakalakāye āsiñcitvā viya ṭhapitaviso parassa ca sarīre āsiñcanavisoti attho. Asitavisotipi ^b^āsīviso^eb^. Yaṃ yañhi etena asitaṃ hoti paribhuttaṃ, taṃ visameva sampajjati, tasmā asitaṃ visaṃ etassāti asitavisoti vattabbe ‘‘āsīviso’’ti niruttinayena ^a^V2.0020^ea^ vuttaṃ. Asisadisavisotipi ^b^āsīviso,^eb^ asi viya tikhiṇaṃ parassa mammacchedanasamatthaṃ visaṃ etassāti āsīvisoti vuttaṃ hoti. Āsīti vā dāṭhā vuccati, tattha sannihitavisoti ^b^āsīviso^eb^. Sesasappehi kaṇhasappassa mahāvisattā āsīvisassānantaraṃ kaṇhasappo vutto. Sappamukhampi ^a^M2.0023^ea^ aṅgārakāsu viya bhayāvahattā akusaluppattiyā ṭhānaṃ na hotīti akusalakammato nivāraṇādhippāyena sīlabhedatopi suddhasīle ṭhitassa maraṇameva varataranti dassetuṃ ‘‘āsīvisassa kaṇhasappassa mukhe aṅgajātaṃ pakkhittaṃ vara’’nti vuttaṃ. Pabbajitena hi katapāpakammaṃ bhagavato āṇātikkamanato vatthumahantatāya mahāsāvajjaṃ. ^b^Kāsu^eb^nti āvāṭopi vuccati rāsipi.
[21]‘‘Kinnu santaramānova, kāsuṃ khaṇasi sārathi;
[22]Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kiṃ kāsuyā karissasī’’ti. (jā. 2.22.3) –
[07]Ettha hi āvāṭo kāsu nāma.
[22]‘‘Aṅgārakāsuṃ apare phuṇanti, narā rudantā paridaḍḍhagattā’’ti (jā. 2.22.462) –

[07]Ettha rāsi. Idha pana ubhayampi adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘aṅgārapuṇṇakūpe aṅgārarāsimhi vā’’^eb^ti. Kassati khaṇīyatīti kāsu, āvāṭo. Kasīyati cīyatīti kāsu, rāsi. ^b^Padittāyā^eb^ti dippamānāya. Saṃ-saddo ettha samantapariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘samantato pajjalitāyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Idaṃ mātugāmassa aṅgajāte aṅgajātapakkhipanaṃ nidānaṃ kāraṇamassa nirayupapajjanassāti ^b^itonidānaṃ,^eb^ bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ. Paccattavacanassa to-ādeso kato, tassa ca samāsepi alopo. ^b^Tattha nāma tva^eb^nti ettha ^b^tvaṃ^eb^-saddo ‘‘samāpajjissasī’’ti iminā sambandhamupagacchamāno atthīti āha ^b^‘‘tvanti taṃsaddassa vevacana’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Yaṃ tanti pana pāṭho yuttarūpo’’ti ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Yaṃ tanti nāyaṃ uddesaniddeso, yathā loke yaṃ vā taṃ vāti avaññātavacanaṃ, evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha – ^b^‘‘yaṃ vā taṃ vā hīḷitaṃ avaññātanti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nīcajanāna^eb^nti nihīnaguṇānaṃ sattānaṃ. ^b^Gāmadhamma^eb^nti ettha ^b^gāma^eb^-saddena gāmavāsino vuttā abhedūpacārenāti āha ^b^‘‘gāmavāsikamanussāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kilesapaggharaṇakaṃ dhamma^eb^nti rāgādikilesavissandanakadhammaṃ ^a^V2.0021^ea^. Methunadhammo hi rāgaṃ paggharati. Methunadhammassa mahāsāvajjatāya oḷārikattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘asukhuma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Anipuṇa^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Udake bhavaṃ odakaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Udakakiccanti āha – ^b^‘‘udakakiccaṃ antikaṃ avasānaṃ assā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samāpajjissatī^eb^ti anāgatavacanaṃ nāma-saddayogena katanti āha – ^b^‘‘samāpajjissatīti…pe… nāma-saddena^eb^^a^M2.0024^ea^^b^yojetabba’’^eb^nti. Loke methunadhammassa ādikattā koci paṭhamakappiko, na panāyanti āha – ^b^‘‘sāsanaṃ sandhāya vadatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bahūna^eb^nti puggalāpekkhaṃ, na pana akusalāpekkhanti āha ^b^‘‘bahūnaṃ puggalāna’’^eb^nti.

[03]Yaṃ asaṃvaraṃ paṭicca dubbharatādupposatādi hoti, so asaṃvaro dubbharatādi-saddena vutto kāraṇe phalūpacārenāti āha – ^b^‘‘dubbharatādīnaṃ vatthubhūtassa asaṃvarassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vatthubhūtassā^eb^ti kāraṇabhūtassa. Vasati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti hi kāraṇaṃ vatthu. ^b^Attā^eb^ti cittaṃ sarīrañca, cittameva vā. ^b^Dubbharatañceva dupposatañca āpajjatī^eb^ti attanā paccayadāyakehi ca dukkhena bharitabbataṃ posetabbatañca āpajjati. Asaṃvare ṭhito hi ekacco attanopi dubbharo hoti dupposo, ekacco upaṭṭhākānampi. Kathaṃ? Yo hi ambilādīni laddhā anambilādīni pariyesati, aññassa ghare laddhaṃ aññassa ghare chaḍḍento sabbaṃ gāmaṃ caritvā rittapattova vihāraṃ pavisitvā nipajjati, ayaṃ ^b^attano dubbharo^eb^. Yo pana sālimaṃsodanādīnaṃ patte pūretvā dinnepi dummukhabhāvaṃ anattamanabhāvameva dasseti, tesaṃ vā sammukhāva taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ ‘‘kiṃ tumhehi dinna’’nti apasādento sāmaṇeragahaṭṭhādīnaṃ deti, ayaṃ ^b^upaṭṭhākānaṃ dubbharo^eb^. Etaṃ disvā manussā dūratova parivajjenti ‘‘dubbharo bhikkhu na sakkā posetu’’nti.

[03]^b^Mahicchata^eb^nti ettha mahantāni vatthūni icchati, mahatī vā panassa icchāti mahiccho, tassa bhāvo mahicchatā, santaguṇavibhāvanatā paṭiggahaṇe amattaññutā ca. Mahiccho hi icchācāre ṭhatvā attani vijjamānasīladhutadhammādiguṇe vibhāveti, tādisassa paṭiggahaṇe amattaññutāpi hoti. Yaṃ sandhāya vadanti ‘‘santaguṇasambhāvanatā paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā, etaṃ mahicchatālakkhaṇa’’nti. Sā panesā mahicchatā ‘‘idhekacco saddho samāno ‘saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati, sīlavā samāno ‘sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū’ti’’ iminā nayena āgatāyeva, tāya samannāgato puggalo dussantappiyo hoti, vijātamātāpissa cittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
[21]‘‘Aggikkhandho ^a^V2.0022^ea^ samuddo ca, mahiccho cāpi puggalo;
[22]Sakaṭena paccayaṃ dentu, tayopete atappiyā’’ti. (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.252; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.63; vibha. aṭṭha. 850; udā. aṭṭha. 31; mahāni. aṭṭha. 85);

[03]Sattehi ^a^M2.0025^ea^ kilesehi ca saṅgaṇanaṃ samodhānaṃ ^b^saṅgaṇikā^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ceva kilesasaṅgaṇikāya cā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kosajjānugato ca hotī^eb^ti kusītabhāvena anugato hoti, kusītassa bhāvo kosajjaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhakusītavatthupāripūriyā^eb^ti ettha kucchitaṃ sīdatīti kusīto da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā. Yassa dhammassa vasena puggalo ‘‘kusīto’’ti vuccati, so kusītabhāvo idha kusīta-saddena vutto. Vināpi hi bhāvajotanasaddaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā ‘‘paṭassa sukka’’nti, tasmā kusītabhāvavatthūnīti attho, kosajjakāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi –

[08]‘‘Kammaṃ kho me kattabbaṃ bhavissati, kammaṃ kho pana me karontassa kāyo kilamissati, handāhaṃ nipajjāmīti so nipajjati, na vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya, idaṃ paṭhamaṃ kusītavatthu. Ahaṃ kho kammaṃ akāsiṃ, kammaṃ kho pana me karontassa kāyo kilanto, handāhaṃ nipajjāmi…pe… maggo kho me gantabbo bhavissati, maggaṃ kho pana me gacchantassa kāyo kilamissati, handāhaṃ nipajjāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho maggaṃ agamāsiṃ, maggaṃ kho pana me gacchantassa kāyo kilanto, handāhaṃ nipajjāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto nālatthaṃ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ, tassa me kāyo kilanto akammañño, handāhaṃ nipajjāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto alatthaṃ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ, tassa me kāyo garuko akammañño māsācitaṃ maññe, handāhaṃ nipajjāmi…pe… uppanno kho me ayaṃ appamattako ābādho, atthi kappo nipajjituṃ, handāhaṃ nipajjāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho gilānā vuṭṭhito aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā, tassa me kāyo dubbalo akammañño, handāhaṃ nipajjāmīti so nipajjati, na vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya. Idaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ kusītavatthu’’nti (dī. ni. 3.334; a. ni. 8.80) –
[07]Evamāgatāni ^a^M2.0026^ea^^a^V2.0023^ea^ ‘‘handāhaṃ nipajjāmī’’ti evaṃ pavattaosīdanāni uparūpari kosajjakāraṇattā aṭṭha kusītavatthūni nāma, tesaṃ pāripūriyā saṃvattatīti attho.

[03]^b^Subharo hoti suposo^eb^ti attano upaṭṭhākehi ca sukhena bharitabbo posetabboti attho. Saṃvare ṭhito hi ekacco attanopi subharo hoti suposo, ekacco upaṭṭhākānampi. Kathaṃ? Yo hi yaṃ kiñci lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā laddhā tuṭṭhacittova bhuñjitvā vihāraṃ gantvā attano kammaṃ karoti, ayaṃ ^b^attano subharo^eb^. Yo pana paresampi appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā dānaṃ ahīḷetvā attamano vippasannamukho hutvā etesaṃ sammukhāva paribhuñjitvā yāti, ayaṃ ^b^upaṭṭhākānaṃ subharo^eb^. Etaṃ disvā manussā ativiya vissatthā honti, ‘‘amhākaṃ bhadanto subharo, thokathokenapi tussati, mayameva naṃ posessāmā’’ti paṭiññaṃ katvā posenti. ^b^Appicchata^eb^nti icchāvirahitattaṃ. Ettha hi byañjanaṃ sāvasesaṃ viya, attho pana niravaseso. Appa-saddo hettha abhāvatthoti sakkā viññātuṃ ‘‘appābādhatañca sañjānāmī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.225) viya. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘nittaṇhabhāva’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Tippabhedāya santuṭṭhiyā^eb^ti yathālābhādisantosasāmaññena vuttaṃ, catūsu pana paccayesu tayo tayo santosāti dvādasavidho hoti santoso. Kathaṃ? Cīvare yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantosoti tividho hoti santoso. Evaṃ piṇḍapātādīsu. Tassāyaṃ pabhedasaṃvaṇṇanā (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.252; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 2.2.144; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.65) – idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa ^b^cīvare yathālābhasantoso^eb^. Atha pana pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā, garucīvaraṃ pārupanto kilamati, so sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhoyeva hoti. Ayamassa ^b^cīvare yathābalasantoso^eb^. Pakatidubbalādīnañhi garucīvarāni na phāsubhāvāvahāni sarīrakhedāvahāni ca hontīti payojanavasena anatricchatādivasena tāni parivattetvā lahukacīvaraparibhogo na santosavirodhīti. Aparo ^a^M2.0027^ea^ paṇītapaccayalābhī hoti, so paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā pana cīvarāni labhitvā ‘‘idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ, idaṃ bahussutānaṃ anurūpaṃ, idaṃ gilānānaṃ, idaṃ appalābhānaṃ hotū’’ti datvā tesaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ vā saṅkārakūṭādito vā nantakāni uccinitvā tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa ^b^cīvare yathāsāruppasantoso^eb^. Mahagghañhi cīvaraṃ bahūni vā ^a^V2.0024^ea^ cīvarāni labhitvāpi tāni vissajjetvā tadaññassa gahaṇaṃ yathāsāruppanaye ṭhitattā na santosavirodhīti.

[03]Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa ^b^piṇḍapāte yathālābhasantoso^eb^. Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, yenassa paribhuttena aphāsu hoti, so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa ^b^piṇḍapāte yathābalasantoso^eb^. Aparo bahuṃ paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa ^b^piṇḍapāte yathāsāruppasantoso^eb^.

[03]Idha pana bhikkhu senāsanaṃ labhati manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā, so tena neva somanassaṃ, na paṭighaṃ uppādeti, antamaso tiṇasantharakenapi yathāladdheneva tussati. Ayamassa ^b^senāsane yathālābhasantoso^eb^. Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā senāsanaṃ labhati, yatthassa vasato aphāsu hoti, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa ^b^senāsane yathābalasantoso^eb^. Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati, so tāni cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa ^b^senāsane yathāsāruppasantoso^eb^. Yopi ‘‘uttamasenāsanaṃ nāma pamādaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha nisinnassa thinamiddhaṃ okkamati, niddābhibhūtassa puna paṭibujjhato pāpavitakkā pātubhavantī’’ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ ^a^M2.0028^ea^ pattampi na sampaṭicchati, so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayampissa ^b^senāsane yathāsāruppasantoso^eb^.

[03]Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so yaṃ labhati, teneva tussati aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa ^b^gilānapaccaye yathālābhasantoso^eb^. Yo pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato telaṃ gahetvā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa ^b^gilānapaccaye yathābalasantoso^eb^. Aparo mahāpuñño bahuṃ telamadhuphāṇitādipaṇītabhesajjaṃ ^a^V2.0025^ea^ labhati, so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatena yena kenaci yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
