Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharītakaṃ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ ‘‘gaṇha, bhante, yadicchasī’’ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati, atha ‘‘muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇita’’nti catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakeneva bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa ^b^gilānapaccaye yathāsāruppasantoso^eb^. Evaṃ yathālābhādivasena tippabhedo santoso catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena dvādasavidho hotīti veditabbo.

[03]Kāmavitakkabyāpādavitakkavihiṃsāvitakkānaṃ vasena ^b^akusalavitakkattayaṃ^eb^. Nekkhammavitakkaabyāpādavitakkaavihiṃ sāvitakkānaṃ vasena ^b^kusalavitakkattayaṃ^eb^. ^b^Sabbakilesāpacayabhūtāya vivaṭṭāyā^eb^ti rāgādisabbakilesānaṃ apacayahetubhūtāya nibbānadhātuyā. ^b^Aṭṭhavīriyārambhavatthupāripūriyā^eb^ti aṭṭhannaṃ vīriyārambhakāraṇānaṃ pāripūriyā. Yathā tathā paṭhamaṃ pavattaabbhussahanañhi upari vīriyārambhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti. Anurūpapaccavekkhaṇāsahitāni hi abbhussahanāni tammūlakāni vā paccavekkhaṇāni aṭṭha vīriyārambhavatthūnīti veditabbāni. Tathā hi –

[08]‘‘Kammaṃ kho me kattabbaṃ bhavissati, kammaṃ kho pana me karontena na sukaraṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya. Ahaṃ kho kammaṃ akāsiṃ, kammaṃ kho panāhaṃ karonto ^a^M2.0029^ea^ nāsakkhiṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi…pe… maggo kho me gantabbo bhavissati, maggaṃ kho pana me gacchantena na sukaraṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho maggaṃ agamāsiṃ, maggaṃ kho panāhaṃ gacchanto nāsakkhiṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto nālatthaṃ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ, tassa me kāyo lahuko kammañño, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto alatthaṃ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ, tassa me kāyo balavā kammañño, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi…pe… uppanno kho me ayaṃ appamattako ābādho, ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ me ābādho pavaḍḍheyya, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi…pe… ahaṃ kho gilānā vuṭṭhito aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā, ṭhānaṃ ^a^V2.0026^ea^ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ me ābādho paccudāvatteyya, handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’’ti (dī. ni. 3.335; a. ni. 8.80) –
[07]Evaṃ pavattaanurūpapaccavekkhaṇāsahitāni abbhussahanāni tammūlakāni vā paccavekkhaṇāni aṭṭha vīriyārambhavatthūni nāma.

[03]^b^Tadanucchavikaṃ tadanulomika^eb^nti ettha ^b^ta^eb^-saddo vakkhamānāpekkho ca atītāpekkho ca hotīti āha ^b^‘‘yaṃ idāni sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessatī’’^eb^tiādi. Sabbanāmāni hi vakkhamānavacanānipi honti pakkantavacanānipi. ^b^Saṃvarappahānapaṭisaṃyutta^eb^nti pañcasaṃvarehi ceva pañcapahānehi ca paṭisaṃyuttaṃ. Pañcavidho hi saṃvaro sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti. Pahānampi pañcavidhaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ nissaraṇappahānanti.

[03]Tattha ‘‘iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto’’ti (vibha. 511) evamāgato pātimokkhasaṃvaro ^b^sīlasaṃvaro^eb^ nāma, so ca atthato ^a^M2.0030^ea^ kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo. ‘‘Rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.213; ma. ni. 1.295; saṃ. ni. 4.239; a. ni. 3.16) evamāgatā indriyārakkhā ^b^satisaṃvaro,^eb^ sā ca atthato tathāpavattā sati eva. ‘‘Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi, paññāyete pidhīyare’’ti (su. ni. 1041; netti. 11) evamāgato ^b^ñāṇasaṃvaro^eb^. Ettha hi ‘‘sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmī’’ti vatvā ‘‘paññāyete pidhīyare’’ti vacanato sotasaṅkhātānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiduccaritaavijjādikilesānaṃ samucchedakañāṇaṃ pidahanaṭṭhena saṃvaroti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā’’tievamāgatā (ma. ni. 1.24; ma. ni. 3.159; a. ni. 4.114) adhivāsanā ^b^khantisaṃvaro,^eb^ sā ca atthato tathāpavattā khandhā adoso vā. Paññāti eke, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. ‘‘Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.26) evamāgataṃ kāmavitakkādīnaṃ vinodanavasena pavattaṃ vīriyameva ^b^vīriyasaṃvaro^eb^. Sabbo cāyaṃ saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ dussīlyasaṅkhātānaṃ kāyavacīduccaritānaṃ muṭṭhassaccasaṅkhātassa pamādassa abhijjhādīnaṃ vā akkhanti aññāṇakosajjānañca saṃvaraṇato pidahanato chādanato ‘‘saṃvaro’’ti vuccati. Saṃvaratīti saṃvaro, pidahati nivāreti pavattituṃ na ^a^V2.0027^ea^ detīti attho. Paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahānaṃ kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ tathā tathā anuppādanameva hi idha saṃvaraṇaṃ nāma. Evaṃ tāva pañcavidho saṃvaro veditabbo.

[03]Tena tena guṇaṅgena tassa tassa aguṇaṅgassa pahānaṃ ^b^tadaṅgappahānaṃ^eb^. Nāmarūpaparicchedādīsu hi vipassanāñāṇesu paṭipakkhabhāvato dīpālokeneva tamassa nāmarūpavavatthānena sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā, paccayapariggahena ahetuvisamahetudiṭṭhīnaṃ, tasseva aparabhāge uppannena kaṅkhāvitaraṇena kathaṃkathībhāvassa, kalāpasammasanena ‘‘ahaṃ mamā’’ti gāhassa, maggāmaggavavatthānena amagge maggasaññāya, udayadassanena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā, vayadassanena sassatadiṭṭhiyā, bhayadassanena sabhaye abhayasaññāyātiādinā nayena tena tena vipassanāñāṇena tassa tassa aguṇaṅgassa pahānaṃ ^b^tadaṅgappahāna^eb^nti veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattinivāraṇato ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ pahānaṃ, etaṃ ^b^vikkhambhanappahānaṃ^eb^ nāma. Vikkhambhanameva pahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ. Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato ^a^M2.0031^ea^ attano santāne ‘‘diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā’’tiādinā (dha. sa. 277) nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa accantaṃ appavattibhāvena pahānaṃ, idaṃ ^b^samucchedappahānaṃ^eb^ nāma. Yaṃ pana phalakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhattaṃ vūpasantatā kilesānaṃ, etaṃ ^b^paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ^eb^ nāma. Yaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭattā pahīnasabbasaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ, etaṃ ^b^nissaraṇappahānaṃ^eb^ nāma. Sabbampi cetaṃ cāgaṭṭhena pahānanti vuccati. Evamimehi yathāvuttasaṃvarehi ceva pahānehi ca paṭisaṃyuttā dhammadesanā ‘‘saṃvarappahānapaṭisaṃyuttā’’ti veditabbā.

[03]^b^Asuttantavinibaddha^eb^nti suttantesu anibaddhaṃ, pāḷianāruḷhanti attho. Pakiṇṇakadhammadesanā hi saṅgahaṃ na ārohati. Vuttamevatthaṃ pakāsento āha ^b^‘‘pāḷivinimutta’’^eb^nti. Atha vā ^b^asuttantavinibaddha^eb^nti suttābhidhammapāḷiṃ anāruḷhabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, ^b^pāḷivinimutta^eb^nti vinayapāḷiṃ anāruḷhabhāvaṃ sandhāya. ^b^Okkantikadhammadesanā^eb^ nāma ñāṇena anupavisitvā antarā kathiyamānā dhammadesanā, ^b^paṭikkhipanādhippāyā^eb^ bhaddālittherasadisā. Samparetabbato pecca gantabbato samparāyo, paraloko. Tattha bhavaṃ ^b^samparāyikaṃ^eb^. ^b^Vaṭṭabhayena tajjento^eb^ti ‘‘evaṃ dussīlā nirayādīsu dukkhaṃ pāpuṇantī’’ti tajjento. ^b^Dīghanikāyappamāṇampi majjhimanikāyappamāṇampi dhammadesanaṃ karotī^eb^ti ‘‘tena khaṇena tena muhuttena kathaṃ bhagavā tāvamahantaṃ dhammadesanaṃ karotī’’ti na vattabbaṃ. Yāvatā hi lokiyamahājanā ekaṃ padaṃ kathenti, tāva ānandatthero aṭṭha padāni katheti. Ānandatthere pana ekaṃ ^a^V2.0028^ea^ padaṃ kathenteyeva bhagavā soḷasa padāni katheti. Iminā nayena lokiyajanassa ekapaduccāraṇakkhaṇe bhagavā aṭṭhavīsasataṃ padāni katheti. Kasmā? Bhagavato hi jivhā mudu, dantāvaraṇaṃ suphusitaṃ, vacanaṃ agaḷitaṃ, bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko, tasmā sace eko bhikkhu kāyānupassanaṃ pucchati, añño vedanānupassanaṃ, añño cittānupassanaṃ, añño dhammānupassanaṃ, ‘‘iminā puṭṭhe ahaṃ pucchissāmī’’ti eko ekaṃ na oloketi, evaṃ santepi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ‘‘ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ pucchi, ayaṃ dutiya’’ntiādinā pucchanavāro tādisassa paññavato paññāyati sukhumassa antarassa labbhanato. Buddhānaṃ pana desanāvāro aññesaṃ na paññāyateva ^a^M2.0032^ea^ accharāsaṅghātamatte khaṇe anekakoṭisahassacittappavattisambhavato. Daḷhadhammena dhanuggahena khittasarassa vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ tālacchāyaṃ atikkamanato puretaraṃyeva bhagavā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ, navavidhena vedanānupassanaṃ, soḷasavidhena cittānupassanaṃ, pañcavidhena dhammānupassanaṃ katheti. Tiṭṭhantu vā ete cattāro, sace hi aññe cattāro sammappadhānesu, aññe iddhipādesu, aññe pañcindriyesu, aññe pañcabalesu, aññe sattabojjhaṅgesu, aññe aṭṭhamaggaṅgesu pañhe puccheyyuṃ, tampi bhagavā katheyya. Tiṭṭhantu vā ete aṭṭha, sace aññe sattatiṃsa janā bodhipakkhiyesu pañhe puccheyyuṃ, tampi bhagavā tāvadeva katheyya.

[03]^b^Mūlaṃ nissayo patiṭṭhā^eb^ti pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ paṭhamassa paṭhamassa vevacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha ^b^patiṭṭhā^eb^ti sampayogavasena upanissayavasena ca okāsabhāvo. Sikkhāsaṅkhātānañhi avasesakusaladhammānaṃ methunaviratisampayogavasena vā patiṭṭhā siyā upanissayabhāvena vā. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘methunasaṃvaro hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vuttatthavasenā^eb^ti patiṭṭhāadhigamūpāyavasena. Sikkhāpadavibhaṅge niddiṭṭhaviraticetanā taṃsampayuttadhammā ca sikkhāpadanti dassetukāmo āha – ^b^‘‘ayañca attho sikkhāpadavibhaṅge vuttanayena veditabbo’’^eb^ti. Sikkhāpadavibhaṅge hi viratiādayo dhammā nippariyāyato pariyāyato ca ‘‘sikkhāpada’’nti vuttā. Vuttañhetaṃ –

[08]‘‘Tattha ^a^V2.0029^ea^ katamaṃ kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ kāmesumicchācārā viramantassa, yā tasmiṃ samaye kāmesumicchācārā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velānatikkamo setughāto, idaṃ vuccati kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ. Avasesā dhammā veramaṇiyā sampayuttā.

[08]‘‘Tattha katamaṃ kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ kāmesumicchācārā viramantassa, yā tasmiṃ ^a^M2.0033^ea^ samaye cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṃ, idaṃ vuccati kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ. Avasesā dhammā cetanāya sampayuttā.

[08]‘‘Tattha katamaṃ kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī sikkhāpadaṃ? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ kāmesumicchācārā viramantassa, yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso…pe… paggāho avikkhepo, idaṃ vuccati kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī sikkhāpada’’nti (vibha. 706).

[03]Ettha hi yasmā na kevalaṃ viratiyeva sikkhāpadaṃ, cetanāpi sikkhāpadameva, tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ dutiyanayo vutto. Yasmā ca na kevalaṃ eteyeva dve dhammā sikkhāpadaṃ, cetanāsampayuttā pana paropaṇṇāsa dhammāpi sikkhitabbakoṭṭhāsato sikkhāpadameva, tasmā tatiyanayo dassito. Duvidhañhi sikkhāpadaṃ nippariyāyasikkhāpadaṃ pariyāyasikkhāpadanti. Tattha virati ^b^nippariyāyasikkhāpadaṃ^eb^. Sā hi ‘‘pāṇātipātā veramaṇī’’ti pāḷiyaṃ āgatā, no cetanā. Viramanto ca tāya eva tato tato viramati, na cetanāya, cetanampi pana āharitvā dasseti, tathā sesacetanāsampayuttadhamme. Tasmā cetanā ceva avasesasampayuttadhammā ca ^b^pariyāyasikkhāpada^eb^nti veditabbaṃ.

[03]Idāni na kevalaṃ idha viratiādayo dhammāva sikkhāpadaṃ, atha kho tadatthajotikā paññattipīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^‘‘Yo tattha nāmakāyo padakāyo^eb^ti idaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta’’nti vadanti. ^b^Nāmakāyo^eb^ti nāmasamūho nāmapaṇṇattiyeva. Padaniruttibyañjanāni nāmavevacanāneva ‘‘nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmaniruttī’’tiādīsu (dha. sa. 1313-1315) viya. ^b^Sikkhākoṭṭhāso^eb^ti viratiādayova vuttā, tadatthajotakaṃ vacanampi sikkhāpadanti idampi ettha labbhateva.

[03]^b^Atthavase^eb^ti vuddhivisese ānisaṃsavisese. Tesaṃ pana sikkhāpadapaññattikāraṇattā āha ^b^‘‘dasa kāraṇavase’’^eb^ti, dasa kāraṇaviseseti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘hitavisese’’^eb^ti. Atthoyeva vā ^b^atthavaso,^eb^ dasa atthe dasa kāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā attho ^a^M2.0034^ea^ phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya vaso ^a^V2.0030^ea^ etassāti ^b^atthavaso,^eb^ hetūti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Suṭṭhu devā^eb^ti idaṃ ^b^rājantepurappavesanasikkhāpade^eb^ (pāci. 494 ādayo) vuttaṃ. ‘‘Ye mama sotabbaṃ saddahātabbaṃ maññissanti, tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā’’ti vuttattā ^b^‘‘yo ca tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchati, tassa taṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Asampaṭicchane ādīnava^eb^nti ^b^bhaddālisutte^eb^ (ma. ni. 2.134 ādayo) viya asampaṭicchane ādīnavaṃ dassetvā. Sukhavihārābhāve sahajīvamānassa abhāvato sahajīvitāpi sukhavihārova vutto. Sukhavihāro nāma catunnaṃ iriyāpathavihārānaṃ phāsutā.

[03]^b^Maṅkuta^eb^nti nittejabhāvaṃ. ^b^Dhammenā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^dhammo^eb^ti bhūtaṃ vatthu. ^b^Vinayo^eb^ti codanā ceva sāraṇā ca. ^b^Satthusāsana^eb^nti ñattisampadā ceva anussāvanasampadā ca. ^b^Piyasīlāna^eb^nti sikkhākāmānaṃ. Tesañhi sīlaṃ piyaṃ hoti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘sikkhattayapāripūriyā ghaṭamānā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sandiṭṭhamānā^eb^ti saṃsayaṃ āpajjamānā. ^b^Ubbāḷhā hontī^eb^ti pīḷitā honti. ^b^Saṅghakammānī^eb^ti satipi uposathapavāraṇānaṃ saṅghakammabhāve gobalibaddañāyena uposathaṃ pavāraṇañca ṭhapetvā upasampadādisesasaṅghakammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Samaggānaṃ bhāvo ^b^sāmaggī^eb^.
[03]‘‘Na vo ahaṃ, cunda, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.182) ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
[21]‘‘Yena devūpapatyassa, gandhabbo vā vihaṅgamo;
[27]Yakkhattaṃ yena gaccheyyaṃ, manussattañca abbaje;
[22]Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā’’ti. (a. ni. 4.36) –

[07]Ettha tebhūmakaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā. Idha pana parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā ^b^āsavā^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘asaṃvare ṭhitena tasmiṃyeva attabhāve pattabbā’’^eb^tiādi. Yadi hi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ na paññapeyya, tato asaddhammapaṭisevanaadinnādānapāṇātipātādihetu ye uppajjeyyuṃ parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā, ye ca taṃnimittameva nirayādīsu ^a^M2.0035^ea^ nibbattassa pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇādivasena mahādukkhānubhavananānappakārā anatthā, te sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā’’ti. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvo ^a^V2.0031^ea^, tattha bhavā ^b^diṭṭhadhammikā^eb^. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tasmiṃyeva attabhāve pattabbā’’^eb^ti. Sammukhā garahaṇaṃ ^b^akitti,^eb^ parammukhā garahaṇaṃ ^b^ayaso^eb^. Atha vā sammukhā parammukhā ca garahaṇaṃ ^b^akitti,^eb^ parivārahāni ^b^ayaso^eb^ti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Āgamanamaggathakanāyā^eb^ti āgamanadvārapidahanatthāya. Samparetabbato pecca gantabbato ^b^samparāyo,^eb^ paralokoti āha ^b^‘‘samparāye narakādīsū’’^eb^ti. Methunādīni ^b^rajjanaṭṭhānāni,^eb^ pāṇātipātādīni ^b^dussanaṭṭhānāni^eb^.

[03]^b^Cuddasa khandhakavattāni^eb^ nāma vattakkhandhake vuttāni āgantukavattaṃ āvāsikagamikaanumodanabhattaggapiṇḍacārikaāraññikasenāsanajantāgharavaccakuṭiupajjhāyasaddhivihārikaācariyaantevāsikavattanti imāni cuddasa vattāni. Tato aññāni pana kadāci tajjanīyakammakatādikāleyeva caritabbāni ^b^dveasīti mahāvattāni,^eb^ na sabbāsu avatthāsu caritabbāni, tasmā cuddasakhandhakavattesu agaṇitāni, tāni pana ‘‘pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññapessāmī’’ti (cūḷava. 75 ādayo) ārabhitvā ‘‘na upasampādetabbaṃ…pe… na chamāyaṃ caṅkamante caṅkame caṅkamitabba’’nti (cūḷava. 76) vuttāvasānāni chasaṭṭhi, tato paraṃ ‘‘na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ, mūlāyapaṭikassanārahena, mānattārahena, mānattacārikena, abbhānārahena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabba’’ntiādinā (cūḷava. 82) vuttavattāni pakatattacaritabbehi anaññattā visuṃ agaṇetvā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarādīsu puggalantaresu caritabbattā tesaṃ vasena sampiṇḍetvā ekekaṃ katvā gaṇitāni pañcāti ekasattati vattāni, ukkhepanīyakammakatavattesu vuttaṃ ‘‘na pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ…pe… nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ sāditabba’’nti (cūḷava. 75) idaṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ asādiyanaṃ ekaṃ, ‘‘na pakatatto bhikkhu sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsetabbo’’tiādīni (cūḷava. 51) dasāti evametāni dvāsīti vattāni. Etesveva pana kānici tajjanīyakammādivattāāni, kānici pārivāsikādivattānīti aggahitaggahaṇena dvāsīti eva, aññattha pana aṭṭhakathāpadese appakaṃ ^a^M2.0036^ea^ ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti ‘‘asīti khandhakavattānī’’ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Saṃvaravinayo^eb^ti sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidhopi saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, vinayanato vinayoti vuccati. ^b^Pahānavinayo^eb^ti tadaṅgappahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ nissaraṇappahānanti pañcavidhampi pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ ^a^V2.0032^ea^, vinayanaṭṭhena vinayo, tasmā pahānavinayoti vuccati. ^b^Samathavinayo^eb^ti satta adhikaraṇasamathā. ^b^Paññattivinayo^eb^ti sikkhāpadameva. Sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi vijjamānāya eva sikkhāpadasambhavato paññattivinayopi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā anuggahito hoti.
[03]Idāni –

[08]‘‘Yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsu, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, yaṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, yaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, yaṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, yaṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, taṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya, yaṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya, taṃ pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, yaṃ pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, taṃ saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, yaṃ saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, taṃ vinayānuggahāya.

[08]‘‘Yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsu, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ vinayānuggahāya.

[08]‘‘Yaṃ ^a^M2.0037^ea^ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ vinayānuggahāya, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ saṅghasuṭṭhutāya.

[08]‘‘Yaṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya…pe… yaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya…pe… yaṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya…pe… yaṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya…pe… yaṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya…pe… yaṃ pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya…pe… yaṃ saddhammaṭṭhitiyā…pe… yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ saṅghasuṭṭhutāya ^a^V2.0033^ea^, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ saṅghaphāsutāya, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ appasannānaṃ pasādāya, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ saddhammaṭṭhitiyā (pari. 334).
[21]‘‘Atthasataṃ dhammasataṃ, dve ca niruttisatāni;
[22]Cattāri ñāṇasatāni, atthavase pakaraṇe’’ti (pari. 334) –
[07]Yaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^parivāre,^eb^ taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘apicetthā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Tattha ‘‘yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsu, yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyā’’ti iminā anukkamena yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ sandhāya āsannāsannapadānaṃ uparūparipadehi saddhiṃ yojitattā saṅkhalikabandhanasadisattā ^b^‘‘saṅkhalikanaya’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Saṅkhalikanayaṃ katvāti sambandho. ‘‘Yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsu, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyā’’ti evamādinā dasasu padesu ekamekaṃ padaṃ tadavasesehi navanavapadehi yojetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘ekekapadamūlikaṃ dasakkhattuṃ yojanaṃ katvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Atthasata^eb^ntiādīsu ^a^M2.0038^ea^ saṅkhalikanaye tāva purimapurimapadānaṃ vasena dhammasataṃ veditabbaṃ, pacchimapacchimānaṃ vasena atthasataṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Kiñcāpi ^b^parivāre^eb^ ‘‘yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsū’’tiādinā saṅkhalikanaye khaṇḍacakkameva vuttaṃ, tathāpi teneva nayena baddhacakkassapi nayo dinno, tasmā ‘‘yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsū’’tiādiṃ vatvā ‘‘yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ saṅghasuṭṭhū’’ti yojetvā baddhacakkaṃ kātabbaṃ. Evaṃ ‘‘yaṃ saṅghaphāsu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyā’’tiādiṃ vatvāpi ‘‘yaṃ vinayānuggahāya, taṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsū’’ti yojetvā baddhacakkaṃ kātabbaṃ. Iminā anukkamena sesapadesupi yojitesu saṅkhalikanayena dasa baddhacakkāni honti. Tesu ekekasmiṃ cakke purimapurimapadānaṃ vasena dasa dasa dhammā, pacchimapacchimapadānaṃ vasena dasa dasa atthāti saṅkhalikanaye atthasataṃ dhammasatañca sampajjati. Ekamūlakanaye pana ‘‘yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ saṅghaphāsu, yaṃ saṅghasuṭṭhu, taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyā’’ti evamādinā ekameva padaṃ sesehi navahi padehi yojitanti purimapadassa ^a^V2.0034^ea^ ekattā ekameva dhammapadaṃ naveva atthapadāni honti, tasmā ekamūlakanaye dasasu padesu ekamekaṃ mūlaṃ katvā dasakkhattuṃ yojanāya katāya dhammapadānaṃ vasena dhammapadāni dasa, atthapadāni navutīti atthasataṃ dhammasatañca na sampajjati, tasmā ekamūlakanaye saṅkhalikanaye vuttanayena atthasataṃ dhammasatañca aggahetvā yaṃ tattha dasadhammapadānaṃ navutiatthapadānañca vasena padasataṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ dhammasatanti gahetvā tadatthajotanavasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttāni saṅghasuṭṭhubhāvādīni atthapadāni atthasatanti evaṃ gahite atthasataṃ dhammasatañca sampajjati. Evaṃ tāva atthasataṃ dhammasatañca veditabbaṃ. ^b^Dve ca niruttisatānī^eb^ti ettha pana atthajotikānaṃ niruttīnaṃ vasena niruttisataṃ, dhammabhūtānaṃ niruttīnaṃ vasena niruttisatanti dve niruttisatāni ca veditabbāni. ^b^Cattāri ñāṇasatānī^eb^ti atthasate ñāṇasataṃ, dhammasate ñāṇasataṃ, dvīsu niruttisatesu dve ñāṇasatānīti cattāri ñāṇasatāni.

[03]^b^Evañca pana, bhikkhave^eb^ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo bhinnakkamena yojetabboti āha ^b^‘‘uddiseyyātha cā’’^eb^ti. Kathaṃ panettha ‘‘uddiseyyāthā’’ti vutte pariyāpuṇeyyāthātiādi atthasambhavoti āha ^b^‘‘atirekānayanattho hi ettha ca-saddo’’^eb^ti. Vuttatthato atirekassa atthassa ānayanaṃ atirekānayanaṃ, so attho etassāti ^b^atirekānayanattho,^eb^ avuttasamuccayatthoti ^a^M2.0039^ea^ vuttaṃ hoti. ‘‘Asaṃvāso’’ti vuttattā ^b^‘‘daḷhaṃ katvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[06]Iti samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
[06]Paṭhamapaññattikathā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sudinnabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^40^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anuttānapadavaṇṇanā^eb^ti uttānaṃ vuccati pākaṭaṃ, tappaṭipakkhena anuttānaṃ apākaṭaṃ appacuraṃ duviññeyyañca, anuttānānaṃ padānaṃ vaṇṇanā anuttānapadavaṇṇanā. Uttānapadavaṇṇanāya payojanābhāvato anuttānaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Pacurapaṭisevano hotī^eb^ti bahulapaṭisevano hoti, divase divase nirantaraṃ paṭisevatīti attho. ^b^Pacuratthe hi vattamānavacana^eb^nti sabbadā paṭisevanābhāvepi ‘‘iha ^a^V2.0035^ea^ mallā yujjhantī’’tiādīsu viya bāhullavuttiṃ upādāya vattamānavacanaṃ. ^b^Āhiṇḍantā^eb^ti vicarantā. ^b^Aññesupī^eb^ti aññesupi bhikkhūsu.

[03]^b^41^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sahoḍḍhaggahito^eb^ti saha bhaṇḍena gahito. Attano micchāgāhena lesaoḍḍanena vā paripuṇṇatthampi paṭhamapaññattiṃ aññathā karonto ‘‘tañca kho manussitthiyā, no tiracchānagatāyā’’ti āha. ^b^Dassana^eb^nti sānurāgadassanaṃ. ^b^Gahaṇa^eb^nti anurāgavaseneva hatthena gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Āmasanaṃ^eb^ attano sarīrena tassā sarīrassa upari āmasanamattaṃ, ^b^phusanaṃ^eb^ tato daḷhataraṃ katvā saṃphusanaṃ, ^b^ghaṭṭanaṃ^eb^ tatopi daḷhataraṃ katvā sarīrena sarīrassa ghaṭṭanaṃ. ^b^Taṃ sabbampī^eb^ti dassanādi sabbampi.

[03]^b^42^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Daḷhataraṃ sikkhāpadamakāsī^eb^ti imasmiṃ adhikāre anupaññattiyā sikkhāpadassa daḷhīkaraṇaṃ sithilakaraṇañca pasaṅgato āpannaṃ vibhajitvā dassetukāmo ^b^‘‘duvidhañhi sikkhāpada’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha yassa sacittakassa sikkhāpadassa cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, taṃ lokavajjaṃ. Yassa sacittakācittakapakkhasahitassa acittakassa ca sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva ^a^M2.0040^ea^ hoti, tampi surāpānādi lokavajjanti imamatthaṃ sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, taṃ lokavajjaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Sacittakapakkhe’’ti hi idaṃ vacanaṃ acittakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi ekaṃsato sacittakassa ‘‘sacittakapakkhe’’ti visesane payojanaṃ atthi. Sacittakapakkheti ca vatthuvītikkamavijānanacittena ‘‘sacittakapakkhe’’ti gahetabbaṃ, na paṇṇattivijānanacittena. Yadi hi ‘‘na vaṭṭatī’’ti paṇṇattivijānanacittenapi yassa sikkhāpadassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva, tampi lokavajjanti vadeyya, sabbesaṃ paṇṇattivajjasikkhāpadānampi lokavajjatā āpajjeyya paṇṇattivajjānampi ‘‘na vaṭṭatī’’ti jānitvā vītikkame akusalacittasseva sambhavato. Na hi bhagavato āṇaṃ jānitvā maddantassa kusalacittaṃ uppajjati anādariyavasena paṭighacittasseva uppajjanato.

[03]Apicettha ‘‘sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevā’’ti vacanato acittakassa vatthuajānanavasena acittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevāti ayaṃ niyamo natthīti viññāyati. Yadi hi acittakassa acittakapakkhepi cittaṃ akusalameva siyā, ‘‘sacittakapakkhe’’ti idaṃ visesanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā. ‘‘Yassa cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, taṃ lokavajja’’nti ettake vutte surāti ajānitvā pivantassa gandhavaṇṇakādibhāvaṃ ajānitvā tāni limpantīnaṃ bhikkhunīnañca ^a^V2.0036^ea^ vināpi akusalacittena āpattisambhavato ekantākusalaṃ sacittakasikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapetvā surāpānādiacittakasikkhāpadānaṃ lokavajjatā na siyāti tesampi saṅgaṇhatthaṃ ‘‘yassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, taṃ lokavajja’’nti vuttaṃ. Teneva ^b^cūḷagaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade^eb^ ca vuttaṃ ‘‘etaṃ sattaṃ māressāmīti tasmiṃyeva padese nipannaṃ aññaṃ mārentassa pāṇasāmaññassa atthitāya yathā pāṇātipāto hoti, evaṃ etaṃ majjaṃ pivissāmīti aññaṃ majjaṃ pivantassa majjasāmaññassa atthitāya akusalameva hoti. Yathā pana kaṭṭhasaññāya sappaṃ ghātentassa pāṇātipāto na hoti, evaṃ nāḷikerapānasaññāya majjaṃ pivantassa akusalaṃ na hotī’’ti.

[03]Keci pana vadanti ‘‘sāmaṇerassa surāti ajānitvā pivantassa pārājiko natthi, akusalaṃ pana hotī’’ti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. ‘‘Bhikkhuno ajānitvāpi bījato paṭṭhāya majjaṃ pivantassa pācittiyaṃ, sāmaṇero jānitvā ^a^M2.0041^ea^ pivanto sīlabhedaṃ āpajjati, na ajānitvā’’ti ettakameva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ, ‘‘akusalaṃ pana hotī’’ti na vuttanti. Aparampi vadanti ‘‘ajānitvā pivantassapi sotāpannassa mukhaṃ surā na pavisati kammapathappattaakusalacitteneva pātabbato’’ti, tampi na sundaraṃ. Bodhisatte kucchigate bodhisattamātu sīlaṃ viya hi idampi ariyasāvakānaṃ dhammatāsiddhanti veditabbaṃ. Teneva dīghanikāye ^b^kūṭadantasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.352) vuttaṃ –

[08]‘‘Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako jīvitahetupi neva pāṇaṃ hanati, na suraṃ pivati. Sacepissa surañca khīrañca missetvā mukhe pakkhipanti, khīrameva pavisati, na surā. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā koñcasakuṇānaṃ khīramissake udake khīrameva pavisati, na udakaṃ. Idaṃ yonisiddhanti ce? Idampi dhammatāsiddhanti veditabba’’nti.

[03]Yadi evaṃ ^b^surāpānasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (pāci. aṭṭha. 329) ‘‘vatthuajānanatāya cettha acittakatā veditabbā, akusaleneva pātabbatāya lokavajjatā’’ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nāyaṃ doso. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – sacittakapakkhe akusalacitteneva pātabbatāya lokavajjatāti. Imināyeva hi adhippāyena aññesupi lokavajjesu acittakasikkhāpadesu akusalacittatāyeva vuttā, na pana sacittakatā. Teneva ^b^bhikkhunīvibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (pāci. aṭṭha. 1227) vuttaṃ –

[08]‘‘Giraggasamajjaṃ ^a^V2.0037^ea^ cittāgārasikkhāpadaṃ saṅghāṇi itthālaṅkāro gandhakavaṇṇako vāsitakapiññāko bhikkhunīādīhi ummaddanaparimaddanāti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni acittakāni lokavajjāni akusalacittānī’’ti,

[07]Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – vināpi cittena āpajjitabbattā acittakāni, citte pana sati akusaleneva āpajjitabbattā lokavajjāni ceva akusalacittāni cāti. Tasmā ^b^bhikkhuvibhaṅge^eb^ āgatāni surāpānauyyuttauyyodhikasikkhāpadāni tīṇi, ^b^bhikkhunīvibhaṅge^eb^ āgatāni giraggasamajjādīni dasāti imesaṃ terasannaṃ acittakasikkhāpadānaṃ lokavajjatādassanatthaṃ ‘‘sacittakapakkhe’’ti idaṃ visesanaṃ katanti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ. Yasmā ^a^M2.0042^ea^ pana paṇṇattivajjassa vatthuvītikkamavijānanacittena sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ, tasmā tassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevāti ayaṃ niyamo natthīti sesaṃ paṇṇattivajjanti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Rundhantī^eb^ti vītikkamaṃ rundhantī. ^b^Dvāraṃ pidahantī^eb^ti vītikkamalesassa dvāraṃ pidahantī. ^b^Sotaṃ pacchindamānā^eb^ti uparūpari vītikkamasotaṃ pacchindamānā. Atha vā ^b^rundhantī^eb^ti anāpattilesaṃ rundhantī. ^b^Dvāraṃ pidahantī^eb^ti anāpattilesassa dvāraṃ pidahantī. ^b^Sotaṃ pacchindamānā^eb^ti anāpattisotaṃ pacchindamānā, āpattimeva kurumānāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nanu ca lokavajje kāci anupaññatti uppajjamānā sithilaṃ karontī uppajjati, tasmā ^b^‘‘lokavajje anupaññatti uppajjamānā…pe… gāḷhataraṃ karontī uppajjatī’’^eb^ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘aññatra adhimānā aññatra supinantā’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Aññatra adhimānā’’ti imissā anupaññattiyā ‘‘vītikkamābhāvā’’ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, ‘‘aññatra supinantā’’ti imissā ‘‘abbohārikattā’’ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^vītikkamābhāvā^eb^ti pāpiccho icchāpakatotiādivītikkamābhāvā. Uttarimanussadhamme hi ‘‘pāpiccho icchāpakato uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapatī’’ti (mahāva. 129) vacanato visaṃvādanādhippāyena musā bhaṇanto pārājiko hoti. Ayaṃ pana adhimānena adhigatasaññī hutvā ullapati, na sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamitukāmo, tasmā ‘‘aññatra adhimānā’’ti ayaṃ anupaññatti uppajjamānā vītikkamābhāvā anāpattikarā jātā. ^b^Abbohārikattā^eb^ti supinante vijjamānāyapi cetanāya vītikkamicchāya ca abbohārikattā. Kiñcāpi hi supinante mocanassādacetanā saṃvijjati, kadāci upakkamanampi hoti, tathāpi thinamiddhena abhibhūtattā taṃ cittaṃ abbohārikaṃ, cittassa abbohārikattā upakkamakiriyāsaṃvattanikāpi cetanā abbohārikā. Teneva ^a^V2.0038^ea^ ‘‘atthesā bhikkhave cetanā, sā ca kho abbohārikā’’ti (pārā. 235) bhagavatā vuttā, tasmā ‘‘aññatra supinantā’’ti ayaṃ anupaññatti abbohārikattā anāpattikarā jātā.

[03]^b^Akate vītikkame^eb^ti ‘‘kukkuccāyantā na bhuñjiṃsū’’tiādīsu viya vītikkame akate. ^b^Sithilaṃ karontī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ sāmaññato baddhasikkhāpadaṃ mocetvā ^a^M2.0043^ea^ attano attano visaye anāpattikaraṇavasena sithilaṃ karontī. ^b^Dvāraṃ dadamānā^eb^ti anāpattiyā dvāraṃ dadamānā. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘aparāparampi anāpattiṃ kurumānā’’^eb^ti. Nanu ca sañcarittasikkhāpade ‘‘antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapī’’ti anupaññatti uppajjamānā āpattimeva karontī uppannā, atha kasmā ‘‘anāpattiṃ kurumānā uppajjatī’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapī’’^eb^tiādi. Udāyinā bhikkhunā taṅkhaṇikāya sañcarittaṃ āpannavatthusmiṃ paññattattā ^b^‘‘kate vītikkame’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Paññattigatikāva hotī^eb^ti mūlapaññattiyaṃyeva antogadhā hoti.
[06]Makkaṭivatthukathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^43^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vesālī nivāso etesanti ^b^vesālikā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘vesālivāsino’’^eb^ti. Vajjīsu janapade vasantā vajjino, vajjīnaṃ puttakā ^b^vajjiputtakā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘vajjiraṭṭhe vesāliyaṃ kulānaṃ puttā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ñātīnaṃ byasana^eb^nti ñātīnaṃ vināso. So pana ñātīnaṃ vināso rājadaṇḍādikāraṇena hotīti āha ^b^‘‘rājadaṇḍabyādhimaraṇavippavāsanimittenā’’^eb^ti. Bhogānaṃ byasanaṃ vināso ^b^bhogabyasanaṃ^eb^. Tañca hiraññasuvaṇṇadāsidāsādīnaṃ upabhogaparibhogavatthūnaṃ rājadaṇḍādinā vināsoti āha ^b^‘‘esa nayo dutiyapadepī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na buddhaṃ garahāmā^eb^ti ‘‘asabbaññu buddho’’tiādinā buddhaṃ na garahāma. ^b^Na dhammagarahino^eb^ti ‘‘aniyyāniko dhammo’’tiādinā dhammaṃ na garahāma. ^b^Na saṅghagarahino^eb^ti ‘‘duppaṭipanno saṅgho’’tiādinā saṅghaṃ na garahāma. ^b^Aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesū^eb^ti dasa kasiṇā dasa asubhā dasānussatiyo cattāro brahmavihārā cattāro āruppā catudhātuvavatthānaṃ āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti imesu cattālīsakammaṭṭhānesu pāḷiyaṃ anāgatattā ālokākāsakasiṇadvayaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesāni gahetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Vibhattā kusalā^eb^^a^V2.0039^ea^^b^dhammā^eb^ti ‘‘imasmiṃ ārammaṇe idaṃ hotī’’ti evaṃ vibhattā upacārajjhānena saddhiṃ paṭhamajjhānādayo mahaggatakusalā dhammā ^a^M2.0044^ea^. ^b^Teva dhamme^eb^ti te eva kusale dhamme. Majjhimayāmo bhikkhūnaṃ niddākilamathavinodanokāsattā na gahitoti āha ^b^‘‘paṭhamayāmañca pacchimayāmañcā’’^eb^ti. Saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhatīti bodhi, arahattamaggañāṇaṃ. Upakārakattena tassa pakkhe bhavā ^b^bodhipakkhiyā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘bodhissa pakkhe bhavānaṃ, arahattamaggañāṇassa upakārakāna’’^eb^nti. Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti ime sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā. ^b^‘‘Gihipalibodhaṃ āvāsapalibodhañca pahāyā’’^eb^ti imesaṃyeva dvinnaṃ palibodhānaṃ upacchedassa sudukkarabhāvato vuttaṃ. ^b^Yuttapayuttā^eb^ti sammadeva yuttā.

[03]^b^Āsaya^eb^nti ajjhāsayaṃ. Sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā paṭisevitamethunānaṃ tesaṃ vajjiputtakānaṃ upasampadaṃ anujānanto bhagavā ‘‘pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso’’ti evaṃ paññattasikkhāpadaṃ samūhanati nāmāti āha – ^b^‘‘yadi hi bhagavā…pe… paññattaṃ samūhaneyyā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Yo pana bhikkhū’’ti vuttattā pana sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya paṭisevitamethunassa upasampadaṃ anujānanto na samūhanati nāma. Na hi so bhikkhu hutvā paṭisevati. ‘‘So āgato na upasampādetabbo’’ti vacanato sāmaṇerabhūmi anuññātāti āha ^b^‘‘sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ pana ṭhito’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Uttamattha^eb^nti arahattaṃ nibbānameva vā.
[06]Vajjiputtakavatthuvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^45^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nīharitvā^eb^ti sāsanato nīharitvā. Tathā hi ‘‘pañcahupāli aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nānuyuñjitabbaṃ. Katamehi pañcahi? Suttaṃ na jānāti, suttānulomaṃ na jānātī’’ti (pari. 442) evamādipariyattisāsanato suttaṃ suttānulomañca nīharitvā pakāsesuṃ, ‘‘anāpatti evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho paripucchāti gaṇhātī’’ti evamādipariyattisāsanato ācariyavādaṃ nīharitvā pakāsesuṃ, ^b^bhārukacchakavatthusmiṃ^eb^ (pārā. 78) ‘‘āyasmā ^a^M2.0045^ea^ upāli evamāha anāpatti āvuso supinantenā’’ti evamādipariyattisāsanato eva attanomatiṃ nīharitvā pakāsesuṃ. Tāya hi attanomatiyā thero etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.

[03]^b^Vutta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0040^ea^ nāgasenattherena vuttaṃ. Pajjate anena atthoti padaṃ, bhagavatā kaṇṭhādivaṇṇappavattiṭṭhānaṃ āhacca visesetvā bhāsitaṃ padaṃ ^b^āhaccapadaṃ,^eb^ bhagavatoyeva vacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āhaccapadanti suttaṃ adhippeta’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Idaṃ kappati, idaṃ na kappatī’’ti evaṃ avisesetvā ‘‘yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti appaṭikkhittaṃ, tañce akappiyaṃ anulometi, kappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo na kappatī’’tiādinā (mahāva. 305) vuttaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ idha ‘‘raso’’ti adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘rasoti suttānuloma’’^eb^nti. Dhammasaṅgāhakappabhutiācariyaparamparato ānītā aṭṭhakathātanti idha ‘‘ācariyavaṃso’’ti adhippetāti āha ^b^‘‘ācariyavaṃsoti ācariyavādo’’^eb^ti.

[03]Idha vinayavinicchayassa adhikatattā tadanucchavikameva suttaṃ dassento āha – ^b^‘‘suttaṃ nāma sakale vinayapiṭake pāḷī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mahāpadesā^eb^ti mahāokāsā, mahantāni vinayassa patiṭṭhāpanaṭṭhānāni yesu patiṭṭhāpito vinayo vinicchayati asandehato. Mahantāni vā kāraṇāni ^b^mahāpadesā,^eb^ mahantāni vinayavinicchayakāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti. ‘‘Atthato pana ‘yaṃ, bhikkhave’tiādinā vuttā sādhippāyā pāḷiyeva mahāpadesā’’ti vadanti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘ye bhagavatā evaṃ vuttā’’^eb^tiādi. Ime ca mahāpadesā khandhake āgatā, tasmā tesaṃ vinicchayakathā tattheva āvi bhavissatīti idha na vuccati. Yadipi tattha tattha bhagavatā pavattitā pakiṇṇakadesanāva aṭṭhakathā, sā pana dhammasaṅgāhakehi paṭhamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni saṅgāyitvā tassa atthavaṇṇanānurūpeneva vācanāmaggaṃ āropitattā ‘‘ācariyavādo’’ti vuccati ācariyā vadanti saṃvaṇṇenti pāḷiṃ etenāti katvā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘ācariyavādo nāma…pe… aṭṭhakathātantī’’^eb^ti. Tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhoyeva ca buddhavacanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhūto kathāmaggo mahāmahindattherena tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ ābhato, pacchā tambapaṇṇiyehi mahātherehi sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapito nikāyantaraladdhisaṅkarapariharaṇatthaṃ. Kiñcāpi attanomati suttādīhi saṃsanditvāva parikappīyati, tathāpi sā na suttādīsu visesato ^a^M2.0046^ea^ niddiṭṭhāti āha ^b^‘‘suttasuttānulomaācariyavāde muñcitvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anubuddhiyā^eb^ti suttādīniyeva anugatabuddhiyā. ^b^Nayaggāhenā^eb^ti suttādito labbhamānanayaggahaṇena.

[03]Attanomatiṃ sāmaññato paṭhamaṃ dassetvā idāni tameva visesetvā dassento ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Idāni tattha paṭipajjitabbākāraṃ dassento āha – ^b^‘‘taṃ pana attanomatiṃ gahetvā kathentenā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Atthenā^eb^ti attanā sallakkhitena atthena. ^b^Ācariyavāde otāretabbā^eb^ti ācariyavāde ñāṇena anuppavesetabbā. ^b^Sabbadubbalā^eb^ti puggalassa sayaṃ ^a^V2.0041^ea^ paṭibhānabhāvato. Pamādapāṭhavasena ācariyavādassa kadāci suttānulomena asaṃsandanāpi siyā, so na gahetabboti dassento āha – ^b^‘‘ācariyavādopi…pe… samento eva gahetabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samentameva gahetabba^eb^nti yathā suttena saṃsandati, evaṃ mahāpadesato atthā uddharitabbāti dasseti. Suttānulomassa suttekadesattepi sutte viya ‘‘idaṃ kappati, idaṃ na kappatī’’ti paricchinditvā āhaccabhāsitaṃ kiñci natthīti āha – ^b^‘‘suttānulomato hi suttameva balavatara’’^eb^nti. ^b^Appaṭivattiya^eb^nti appaṭibāhiyaṃ. ^b^Kārakasaṅghasadisa^eb^nti pamāṇattā saṅgītikārakasaṅghasadisaṃ. ^b^Buddhānaṃ ṭhitakālasadisa^eb^nti iminā buddheheva kathitattā dharamānabuddhasadisanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sutte hi paṭibāhite buddhova paṭibāhito hoti. ^b^Sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā kathetī^eb^ti sakavādī attano suttaṃ gahetvā voharati. ^b^Paravādī suttānuloma^eb^nti aññanikāyavādī attano nikāye suttānulomaṃ gahetvā katheti. ^b^Khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā akatvā^eb^ti ‘‘kiṃ iminā’’ti khepaṃ vā ‘‘kimesa bālo vadatī’’ti garahaṃ vā akatvā. ^b^Suttānuloma^eb^nti paravādinā vuttaṃ aññanikāye suttānulomaṃ. ^b^Sutte otāretabba^eb^nti sakavādinā attano sutte otāretabbaṃ. ^b^Suttasmiṃyeva ṭhātabba^eb^nti attano sutteyeva ṭhātabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesavāresupi atthayojanā kātabbā. ^b^Aya^eb^nti sakavādī. ^b^Paro^eb^ti aññanikāyavādī. Evaṃ sesesupi.

[03]Nanu ca ‘‘suttānulomato suttameva balavatara’’nti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ, idha pana ‘‘suttānulome suttaṃ otāretabba’’ntiādi kasmā vuttanti? Nāyaṃ virodho. ‘‘Suttānulomato suttameva balavatara’’nti hi idaṃ ^a^M2.0047^ea^ sakamateyeva suttaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi sakamatipariyāpannameva suttādiṃ sandhāya ‘‘attanomati sabbadubbalā, attanomatito ācariyavādo balavataro, ācariyavādato suttānulomaṃ balavataraṃ, suttānulomato suttameva balavatara’’nti ca vuttaṃ. Idha pana paravādinā ānītaṃ aññanikāye suttaṃ sandhāya ‘‘suttānulome suttaṃ otāretabba’’ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tasmā paravādinā ānītaṃ suttādiṃ attano suttānulomaācariyavādaattanomatīsu otāretvā samentaṃyeva gahetabbaṃ, itaraṃ na gahetabbanti ayaṃ nayo idha vuccatīti na koci pubbāparavirodho.

[03]^b^Bāhirakasutta^eb^nti tisso saṅgītiyo anāruḷhaguḷhavessantarādīni mahāsaṅghikanikāyavāsīnaṃ suttāni. ^b^Vedallādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena guḷhaummaggādiggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, itaraṃ gārayhasuttaṃ na gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Attanomatiyameva ṭhātabba^eb^nti iminā aññanikāyato ānītasuttatopi sakanikāye attanomatiyeva balavatarāti dasseti. Sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā katheti, paravādīpi suttamevātievamādinā ^a^V2.0042^ea^ samānajātikānaṃ vasena vāro na vutto, suttassa sutteyeva otāraṇaṃ bhinnaṃ viya hutvā na paññāyati, vuttanayeneva ca sakkā yojetunti.

[03]Idāni sakavādīparavādīnaṃ kappiyākappiyādibhāvaṃ sandhāya vivāde uppanne tattha paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassento āha – ^b^‘‘atha panāyaṃ kappiyanti gahetvā kathetī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^sutte ca suttānulome ca otāretabba^eb^nti sakavādinā attanoyeva sutte ca suttānulome ca otāretabbaṃ. ^b^Paro kāraṇaṃ na vindatī^eb^ti paravādī kāraṇaṃ na labhati. ^b^Suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dassetī^eb^ti paravādī attano suttato bahuṃ kāraṇaṃ vinicchayañca āharitvā dasseti. ^b^Sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā akappiyeva ṭhātabba^eb^nti iminā attano nikāye suttādīni alabhantena sakavādinā paravādīvacaneyeva ṭhātabbanti vadati. ^b^Dvinnampi kāraṇacchāyā dissatī^eb^ti sakavādīparavādīnaṃ ubhinnampi kappiyākappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ dissati. Yadi dvinnampi kāraṇacchāyā dissati, kasmā ‘‘akappiyeva ṭhātabba’’nti āha ^b^‘‘vinayañhi patvā’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Vinayaṃ patvā’’ti vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassento āha ^b^‘‘kappiyākappiyavicāraṇamāgammā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rundhitabba^eb^ntiādīsu ^a^M2.0048^ea^ dubbiññeyyavinicchaye kappiyākappiyabhāve sati kappiyanti gahaṇaṃ rundhitabbaṃ, akappiyanti gahaṇaṃ ^b^gāḷhaṃ kātabbaṃ^eb^. Aparāparaṃ pavattakappiyagahaṇa^b^sotaṃ pacchinditabbaṃ,^eb^ garukabhāvasaṅkhāte akappiyabhāveyeva ṭhātabbanti attho.

[03]^b^Bahūhi suttavinicchayakāraṇehī^eb^ti bahūhi suttehi ceva tato ānītavinicchayakāraṇehi ca. ^b^Attano gahaṇaṃ na vissajjetabba^eb^nti sakavādinā attano akappiyanti gahaṇaṃ na vissajjetabbaṃ. Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ nigamento ^b^‘‘eva’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^yo^eb^ti sakavādīparavādīsu yo koci. Keci pana ‘‘sakavādīsuyeva yo koci idhādhippeto’’ti vadanti, evaṃ sante ‘‘atha panāyaṃ kappiyanti gahetvā kathetī’’tiādīsu sabbattha ubhopi sakavādinoyeva siyuṃ heṭṭhā vuttasseva nigamanavasena ‘‘eva’’ntiādīnaṃ vuttattā, tasmā taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Atirekakāraṇaṃ labhatī^eb^ti ettha suttādīsu purimaṃ purimaṃ atirekakāraṇaṃ nāma, yo vā suttādīsu catūsu bahutaraṃ kāraṇaṃ labhati, so atirekakāraṇaṃ labhati nāma.

[03]Suṭṭhu pavatti etassāti suppavatti, suṭṭhu pavattati sīlenāti vā suppavatti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘suppavattīti suṭṭhu pavatta’’^eb^nti. Vācāya uggataṃ ^b^vācuggataṃ,^eb^ vacasā suggahitanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Suttato^eb^ti imassa vivaraṇaṃ ^b^‘‘pāḷito’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca ‘‘suttaṃ nāma sakalaṃ vinayapiṭaka’’nti vuttattā ^a^V2.0043^ea^^b^pāḷito^eb^ti tadatthadīpikā aññāyeva pāḷi veditabbā. ^b^Anubyañjanaso^eb^ti imassa vivaraṇaṃ ^b^‘‘paripucchato ca aṭṭhakathāto cā’’^eb^ti. Pāḷiṃ anugantvā atthassa byañjanato pakāsanato ^b^anubyañjana^eb^nti hi paripucchā aṭṭhakathā ca vuccati. Ettha ca aṭṭhakathāya visuṃ gahitattā ^b^paripucchā^eb^ti theravādo vutto. Saṅghabhedassa pubbabhāge pavattakalahassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ ^b^saṅgharājī^eb^ti. ^b^Kukkuccako^eb^ti aṇumattesupi vajjesu bhayadassanavasena kukkuccaṃ uppādento. ^b^Tantiṃ avisaṃvādetvā^eb^ti pāḷiṃ aññathā akatvā. ^b^Avokkamanto^eb^ti anatikkamanto.

[03]^b^Vitthunatī^eb^ti atthaṃ adisvā nitthunati. ^b^Vipphandatī^eb^ti kampati. ^b^Santiṭṭhituṃ na sakkotī^eb^ti ekasmiṃyeva atthe patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0049^ea^^b^yaṃ parena vuccati, taṃ taṃ anujānātī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paravādaṃ gaṇhātī^eb^ti ‘‘ucchumhi kasaṭaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ, raso sattāhakāliko, tadubhayavinimutto ca ucchu nāma visuṃ natthi, tasmā ucchupi vikāle vaṭṭatī’’ti paravādinā vutte tampi gaṇhāti. ^b^Ekekaloma^eb^nti palitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Yamhī^eb^ti yasmiṃ puggale. ^b^Parikkhayaṃ pariyādāna^eb^nti atthato ekaṃ.

[03]^b^Ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hotī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ācariyaparamparā^eb^ti ācariyānaṃ vinicchayaparamparā. Teneva vakkhati ‘‘yathā ācariyo ca ācariyācariyo ca pāḷiñca paripucchañca vadanti, tathā ñātuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti. ^b^Pubbāparānusandhito^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ pubbavacanaṃ, idaṃ paravacanaṃ, ayamanusandhī’’ti evaṃ pubbāparānusandhito. ^b^Ācariyaparampara^eb^nti imasseva vevacanaṃ ^b^theravādaṅga^eb^nti, therapaṭipāṭinti attho. ^b^Dve tayo parivaṭṭā^eb^ti dve tisso paramparā.

[03]^b^Imehi ca pana tīhi lakkhaṇehī^eb^ti ‘‘suttamassa svāgataṃ hotī’’tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttehi tīhi lakkhaṇehi. Ettha ca paṭhamena lakkhaṇena vinayassa suṭṭhu uggahitabhāvo vutto, dutiyena uggahitena acalatā suppatiṭṭhitatā vuttā, tatiyena yaṃ pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca natthi, tampi ācariyavacanena vinicchinituṃ samatthatā vuttā. ^b^Otiṇṇe vatthusmi^eb^nti codanāsaṅkhāte vītikkamasaṅkhāte vā vatthusmiṃ saṅghamajjhe otiṇṇe, osaṭeti attho. Vuttameva vibhāvento ^b^‘‘codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe’’^eb^ti āha. Keci pana ‘‘codakena otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe’’ti evaṃ yojenti. Apare pana ‘‘codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vinayadharena ca vattabbe’’ti evampi yojenti. ‘‘Codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe’’ti ayameva pana yojanā sundaratarāti veditabbā. ^b^Vatthu oloketabba^eb^nti tassa tassa sikkhāpadassa vatthu oloketabbaṃ. ‘‘Tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā…pe… yo āgaccheyya, āpatti ^a^V2.0044^ea^ dukkaṭassā’’ti (pārā. 517) hi idaṃ nissaggiye aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadassa vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, thullaccayadubbhāsitāpattīnaṃ mātikāya anāgatattā ^b^‘‘pañcannaṃ āpattīnaṃ aññatara’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Aññataraṃ vā āpatti^eb^nti ‘‘kāle vikālasaññī āpatti dukkaṭassa, kāle vematiko āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti ^a^M2.0050^ea^ evamādinā (pāci. 250) āgataṃ dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Sikkhāpadantaresū^eb^ti vinītavatthuṃ antokatvā ekekasmiṃ sikkhāpadantare.

[03]^b^Sukhumā^eb^ti attanopi duviññeyyasabhāvassa lahuparivattino cittassa sīghaparivattitāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cittalahukā’’^eb^ti. Cittaṃ lahu sīghaparivatti etesanti ^b^cittalahukā. Te^eb^ti te vītikkame. ^b^Taṃvatthuka^eb^nti te adinnādānamanussaviggahavītikkamā vatthu adhiṭṭhānaṃ kāraṇametassāti taṃvatthukaṃ. ^b^Sīlāni sodhetvā^eb^ti yaṃvatthukaṃ kukkuccaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ amanasikaritvā avasesasīlāni sodhetvā. Pākaṭabhāvato sukhavaḷañjanatāya ca ^b^‘‘dvattiṃsākāraṃ tāva manasi karohī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Aññasmiṃ pana kammaṭṭhāne kataparicayena tadeva manasi kātabbaṃ. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭayatī^eb^ti antarantarā khaṇḍaṃ adassetvā cittena saddhiṃ ālambanabhāvena cirakālaṃ ghaṭayati. ^b^Saṅkhārā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahantī^eb^ti vipassanākammaṭṭhāniko ce, tassa saṅkhārā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Sace katapārājikavītikkamo bhaveyya, tassa satipi asaritukāmatāya vippaṭisāravatthuvasena punappunaṃ taṃ upaṭṭhahatīti cittekaggataṃ na vindati. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ghaṭayatī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Attanā jānātī^eb^ti sayameva jānāti. Paccatte cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, attā jānātīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Aññā ca devatā jānantī^eb^ti ārakkhadevatāhi aññā paracittaviduniyo devatā ca jānanti.
[06]Niṭṭhitā catubbidhavinayakathāvaṇṇanā
[06]Vinayadharassa ca lakkhaṇādikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā pana-saddaṃ apanetvā aniyamena puggaladīpakaṃ yo-saddameva āha, tasmā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti imasmiṃ yo-sadde. Pana-saddassa nipātamattattā yo-saddasseva atthaṃ pakāsento ^b^‘‘yo kocīti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Yo koci nāmā^eb^ti yo vā so vā yo kocīti vutto. ^b^Vāsadhurayutto vā^eb^ti vipassanādhurayutto vā. ^b^Sīlesū^eb^ti pakatīsu.

[03]^b^Bhikkhatī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0051^ea^^a^V2.0045^ea^ yācati. ^b^Labhanto vā alabhanto vā^eb^ti yo koci bhikkhati bhikkhaṃ esati gavesati, so taṃ labhatu vā mā vā, tathāpi bhikkhatīti bhikkhūti ayamettha adhippāyo. ^b^Ariyāya yācanāyā^eb^ti ‘‘uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyāna yācanā’’ti evaṃ vuttāya ariyayācanāya, na kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ viya ‘‘dehi dehī’’ti evaṃ pavattayācanāya. ^b^Bhikkhācariya^eb^nti uñchācariyaṃ. ^b^Ajjhupagatattā^eb^ti anuṭṭhitattā. ^b^Kājabhatta^eb^nti kājehi ānītaṃ bhattaṃ. ^b^Agghaphassavaṇṇabhedenā^eb^ti agghādīnaṃ purimapakativijahena. Purimapakativijahanañhettha bhedoti adhippetaṃ. Dhovitvā apanetuṃ asakkuṇeyyasabhāvaṃ ^b^malaṃ,^eb^ tathā apanetuṃ sakkuṇeyyasabhāvā ^b^jallikā^eb^. ^b^Bhinnapaṭadharo^eb^ti nibbacanaṃ bhinnapaṭadhare bhikkhu-saddassa niruḷhattā kataṃ.

[03]^b^Upanissayasampanna^eb^nti pubbe aṭṭhaparikkhāradānūpanissayasampannaṃ. Yo hi cīvarādike aṭṭha parikkhāre pattacīvarameva vā sotāpannādiariyassa puthujjanasseva vā sīlasampannassa datvā ‘‘idaṃ parikkhāradānaṃ anāgate ehibhikkhubhāvāya paccayo hotū’’ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, tassa taṃ sati adhikārasampattiyaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve iddhimayaparikkhāralābhāya saṃvattatīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Brahmaghosa^eb^nti uttamaghosaṃ, brahmuno ghosasadisaṃ vā ghosaṃ. ^b^Brahmacariya^eb^nti sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca. Dukkhassa sammā antakiriyāyāti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Bhaṇḍū^eb^ti muṇḍo. ^b^Vāsī^eb^ti dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsi. ^b^Bandhana^eb^nti kāyabandhanaṃ. Yutto bhāvanānuyogo assāti ^b^yuttayogo,^eb^ tassa yuttayogassa, bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttassāti vuttaṃ hoti. Iriyāpathasampannatāvibhāvanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘saṭṭhivassikatthero viyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Buddhova pabbajjācariyo upasampadācariyo ca assāti ^b^buddhācariyako^eb^. Paṭhamabodhiyampi paṭhamakāleyeva sesaupasampadānaṃ abhāvoti āha ^b^‘‘paṭhamabodhiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kāle’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pañca pañcavaggiyattherā^eb^ti pañcavaggiyattherā pañca. ^b^Tīṇi sata^eb^nti tīṇi satāni, gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ vacanavipallāso kato. ^b^Eko ca thero^eb^ti aṅgulimālattheraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Na vuttā^eb^ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na vuttā. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti vinayapāḷiyaṃ.

[03]Veḷuvanamahāvihāre ^a^M2.0052^ea^ gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnoyeva bhagavā mahākassapattherassa attānaṃ uddissa pabbajitabhāvaṃ viditvā tassa paccuggamanaṃ karonto tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ ekakova gantvā bahuputtanigrodhamūle pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno attano santikaṃ āgantvā paramanipaccakāraṃ dassetvā ‘‘satthā me bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmi, satthā me bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī’’ti tikkhattuṃ attano sāvakattaṃ sāvetvā ṭhitassa mahākassapattherassa nipaccakāramahattataṃ ^a^V2.0046^ea^ attano ca mahānubhāvataṃ dīpetuṃ yassa aññassa ajānaṃyeva ‘‘jānāmī’’ti paṭiññassa bāhirakassa satthuno evaṃ sabbacetasā samannāgato pasannacitto sāvako evarūpaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ kareyya, tassa vaṇṭacchinnatālapakkaṃ viya gīvato muddhāpi vipateyya, sattadhā vā phaleyyāti dassento ‘‘yo kho, kassapa, evaṃ sabbacetasā samannāgataṃ sāvakaṃ ajānaṃyeva vadeyya ‘jānāmī’ti, apassaṃyeva vadeyya ‘passāmī’ti, muddhāpi tassa vipateyya, sattadhā vā phaleyya, ahaṃ kho, kassapa, jānaṃyeva vadāmi ‘jānāmī’ti, passaṃyeva vadāmi ‘passāmī’’’ (saṃ. ni. 2.154) ti vatvā jātimadamānamadarūpamadappahānatthaṃ tīhi ovādehi mahākassapattheraṃ ovadanto ^b^‘‘tasmātiha te kassapā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Tattha (saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 2.2.154) ^b^tasmātihā^eb^ti tasmā icceva vuttaṃ hoti, yasmā ahaṃ jānantova ‘‘jānāmī’’ti passanto eva ca ‘‘passāmī’’ti vadāmi, tasmāti attho. ^b^Ti^eb^-kāra ^b^ha^eb^-kārā nipātā. ^b^Ihā^eb^ti vā imasmiṃ sāsane, ^b^ta^eb^-kāro padasandhivasena āgato. ^b^Evaṃ sikkhitabba^eb^nti idāni vuccamānākārena sikkhitabbaṃ. ^b^Tibba^eb^nti bahalaṃ mahantaṃ. ^b^Hirottappañcā^eb^ti hirī ca ottappañca. ^b^Paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissatī^eb^ti upasaṅkamanato paṭhamatarameva upaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati. Tathā hi sati tesaṃ purato assa sagāravasappatissavatā saṇṭhāti. Yo ca therādīsu hirottappaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā upasaṅkamati, therādayopi taṃ sahirikā saottappā ca hutvā upasaṅkamantīti ayamettha ānisaṃso. ^b^Kusalūpasaṃhita^eb^nti kusalanissitaṃ, anavajjadhammanissitanti attho. ^b^Aṭṭhiṃ katvā^eb^ti attānaṃ tena dhammena aṭṭhikaṃ katvā, taṃ vā dhammaṃ ‘‘esa mayhaṃ dhammo’’ti aṭṭhiṃ katvā. ^b^Manasi katvā^eb^ti citte ṭhapetvā. ^b^Sabbacetasā samannāharitvā^eb^ti cittassa thokampi bahi gantuṃ adento ^a^M2.0053^ea^ sabbena samannāhāracittena samannāharitvā. ^b^Ohitasoto^eb^ti ṭhapitasoto, dhamme nihitasototi attho. ^b^Evañhi te sikkhitabba^eb^nti ñāṇasotañca pasādasotañca odahitvā ‘‘mayā desitaṃ dhammaṃ sakkaccameva suṇissāmī’’ti evañhi te sikkhitabbaṃ. ^b^Sātasahagatā ca me kāyagatāsatī^eb^ti asubhesu ceva ānāpāne ca paṭhamajjhānavasena sukhasampayuttā kāyagatāsati. Yo ca panāyaṃ tividho ovādo, therassa ayameva pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi.

[03]Kasiṇārammaṇaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ rūpasaññā. Saññāsīsena hettha jhānaṃ vuttaṃ, tadeva ca uddhumātakapaṭibhāgārammaṇattā ^b^‘‘uddhumātakasaññā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sopākasāmaṇero bhagavatā puṭṭho ‘‘ete dve rūpāvacarabhāvena ekatthā, byañjanameva nāna’’nti āha. ^b^Āraddhacitto^eb^ti ārādhitacitto. Garudhammapaṭiggahaṇādiupasampadā upari vitthārato sayameva āvi bhavissati.

[03]^b^Kalyāṇaputhujjanādayo^eb^ti ^a^V2.0047^ea^ ettha bahūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ avihatattā janeti, tāhi vā janitoti puthujjano, kalyāṇo ca so puthujjano cāti kalyāṇaputhujjano, so ādi yesaṃ sotāpannādīnaṃ te kalyāṇaputhujjanādayo. Kalyāṇaggahaṇena cettha andhaputhujjanaṃ nivatteti. Dvidhā hi puthujjanā andhaputhujjano kalyāṇaputhujjanoti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Duve puthujjanā vuttā, buddhenādiccabandhunā;
[22]Andho puthujjano eko, kalyāṇeko puthujjano’’ti. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.7; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.2; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 2.2.61; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.51);

[03]Bhadrāya paññāya bhadrāya vimuttiyāti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Sīlenā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^sīla^eb^nti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. ^b^Samādhī^eb^ti vipassanāpādakā aṭṭha samāpattiyo. ^b^Paññā^eb^ti lokiyalokuttarañāṇaṃ. ^b^Vimuttī^eb^ti ariyaphalavimutti. ^b^Vimuttiñāṇadassana^eb^nti ekūnavīsatividhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Yathāsambhavena cettha yojanā veditabbā. Kalyāṇaputhujjanassa hi sīlādayo tayo eva sambhavanti, ariyānaṃ pana sabbepi sīlādayo. Sāro bhikkhūtipi kalyāṇaputhujjanādayova vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘tehiyeva sīlasārādīhī’’^eb^tiādi. Atha vā nippariyāyato khīṇāsavova sāro ^a^M2.0054^ea^ bhikkhu nāmāti āha ^b^‘‘vigatakilesapheggubhāvato vā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano anulomapaṭipadāya paripūrakārī sīlasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati ‘‘ajja vā sve vā aññataraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ adhigamissāmī’’ti, sopi vuccati sikkhatīti sekhoti āha ^b^‘‘puthujjanakalyāṇakena saddhi’’^eb^nti. ^b^Satta ariyā^eb^ti cattāro maggaṭṭhā, heṭṭhimā ca tayo phalaṭṭhāti ime satta ariyā. ^b^Tisso sikkhā^eb^ti adhisīlādikā tisso sikkhā. Sikkhāsu jātoti vā ^b^sekho^eb^. Ariyapuggalo hi ariyāya jātiyā jāyamāno sikkhāsu jāyati, na yoniyaṃ. Sikkhanasīloti vā ^b^sekho,^eb^ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya vā kathāya sekhassa ayanti anaññasādhāraṇā maggaphalattayadhammā sekhapariyāyena vuttā. ^b^Asekho^eb^ti ca yattha sekhabhāvāsaṅkā atthi, tatthāyaṃ paṭisedhoti lokiyanibbānesu asekhabhāvānāpatti daṭṭhabbā. Sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātā hi sikkhā attano paṭipakkhakilesehi vimuttattā parisuddhā, upakkilesānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvampi anupagamanato ^a^V2.0048^ea^ etā sikkhāti vattuṃ yuttā, aṭṭhasupi maggaphalesu vijjanti, tasmā catumaggaheṭṭhimaphalattayasamaṅgino viya arahattaphalasamaṅgīpi tāsu sikkhāsu jātoti taṃsamaṅgino arahato itaresaṃ viya sekhatte sati sekhassa ayanti, sikkhā sīlaṃ etassāti ca sekhoti vattabbo siyāti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ ‘‘asekho’’ti yathāvuttasekhabhāvapaṭisedho kato. Arahattaphalehi pavattamānā sikkhā pariniṭṭhitasikkhākiccattā na sikkhākiccaṃ karonti, kevalaṃ sikkhāphalabhāveneva pavattanti, tasmā tā na sikkhāvacanaṃ arahanti, nāpi taṃsamaṅgī sekhavacanaṃ, na ca sikkhanasīlo, sikkhāsu jātoti ca vattabbataṃ arahati, heṭṭhimaphalesu pana sikkhā sakadāgāmimaggavipassanādīnaṃ upanissayabhāvato sikkhākiccaṃ karontīti sikkhāvacanaṃ arahanti, taṃsamaṅgino ca sekhavacanaṃ sikkhanasīlā, sikkhāsu jātāti ca vattabbataṃ arahanti ‘‘sikkhantīti sekhā’’ti apariyositasikkhānaṃ dassitattā, ‘‘na sikkhatīti asekho’’ti iminā pariyositasikkho dassito, na sikkhāya rahitoti āha – ^b^‘‘sekkhadhamme atikkamma^eb^^a^M2.0055^ea^^b^…pe… khīṇāsavo asekhoti vuccatī’’^eb^ti. Vuddhippattasikkho vā asekhoti etasmiṃ atthe sekhadhammesu eva ṭhitassa kassaci ariyassa asekhabhāvāpattīti arahattamaggadhammā vuddhippattā ca yathāvuttehi atthehi sekhāti katvā taṃsamaṅgino aggamaggaṭṭhassa asekhabhāvo āpannoti? Na, taṃsadisesu tabbohārato. Arahattamaggato hi ninnānākaraṇaṃ arahattaphalaṃ ṭhapetvā pariññākiccakaraṇaṃ vipākabhāvañca, tasmā te eva sekhā aggaphaladhammabhāvaṃ āpannāti sakkā vattuṃ. Kusalasukhato ca vipākasukhaṃ santataratāya paṇītataranti vuddhippattā ca te dhammā hontīti taṃsamaṅgī asekhoti vuccatīti.

[03]^b^Sabbantimena pariyāyenā^eb^ti sabbantimena paricchedena. Upasampadākammassa adhikārattā ^b^‘‘pañcavaggakaraṇīye’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Pañcannaṃ vaggo samūhoti pañcavaggo, pañcaparimāṇayutto vā vaggo pañcavaggo, tena kattabbaṃ kammaṃ ^b^pañcavaggakaraṇīyaṃ. Yāvatikā bhikkhū^eb^ti yattakā bhikkhū. ^b^Kammappattā^eb^ti kammārahā pārājikaṃ anāpannā anukkhittā ca. Upasampadākammassa pañcavaggakaraṇīyattā pañceva bhikkhū kammappattā ettakehipi kammasiddhito, itare chandārahā. ^b^Ñatticatutthenā^eb^ti ettha kiñcāpi ñatti sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuccati, tissannaṃ pana anussāvanānaṃ atthabyañjanabhedābhāvato atthabyañjanabhinnā ñatti tāsaṃ catutthāti katvā ‘‘ñatticatuttha’’nti vuccati. Byañjanānurūpameva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^b^‘‘tīhi anussāvanāhi ekāya ca ñattiyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, atthappavattikkamena pana ‘‘ekāya ñattiyā tīhi anussāvanāhī’’ti vattabbaṃ. ^b^Vatthuñattianaussāvanasīmāparisasampattisampannattā^eb^ti ettha ^b^vatthū^eb^ti upasampadāpekkho puggalo, so ṭhapetvā ūnavīsativassaṃ ^a^V2.0049^ea^ antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannapubbaṃ paṇḍakādayo ca ekādasa abhabbapuggale veditabbo. Ūnavīsativassādayo hi terasa puggalā upasampadāya avatthu, ime pana ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ upasampadāpekkhe sati upasampadākammaṃ ^b^vatthusampattisampannaṃ^eb^ nāma hoti.

[03]Vatthusaṅghapuggalañattīnaṃ aparāmasanāni pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanañcāti ime tāva pañca ñattidosā. Tattha ‘‘ayaṃ itthannāmo’’ti upasampadāpekkhassa akittanaṃ ^b^vatthuaparāmasanaṃ^eb^ nāma. ‘‘Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho’’ti ettha ‘‘suṇātu me, bhante’’ti vatvā ‘‘saṅgho’’ti abhaṇanaṃ ^b^saṅghaaparāmasanaṃ^eb^ nāma. ‘‘Itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho’’ti upajjhāyassa akittanaṃ ^b^puggalaaparāmasanaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0056^ea^ nāma. Sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiyā anuccāraṇaṃ ^b^ñattiaparāmasanaṃ^eb^ nāma. Paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā ‘‘esā ñattī’’ti vatvā ‘‘khamati saṅghassā’’ti evaṃ ñattikittanaṃ ^b^pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanaṃ^eb^ nāma. Iti imehi dosehi vimuttāya ñattiyā sampannaṃ ^b^ñattisampattisampannaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03]Vatthusaṅghapuggalānaṃ aparāmasanāni sāvanāya hāpanaṃ akāle sāvananti ime pañca anussāvanadosā. Tattha ^b^vatthā^eb^dīnaṃ aparāmasanāni ñattiyaṃ vuttasadisāneva. Tīsu pana anussāvanāsu yattha katthaci etesaṃ aparāmasanaṃ aparāmasanameva, sabbena sabbaṃ pana kammavācaṃ avatvā catukkhattuṃ ñattikittanameva. Atha vā pana kammavācabbhantare akkharassa vā padassa vā anuccāraṇaṃ vā duruccāraṇaṃ vā ^b^sāvanāya hāpanaṃ^eb^ nāma. Sāvanāya anokāse paṭhamaṃ ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā anussāvanakaraṇaṃ ^b^akāle sāvanaṃ^eb^ nāma. Iti imehi dosehi vimuttāya anussāvanāya sampannaṃ ^b^anussāvanasampattisampannaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03]Vipattisīmālakkhaṇaṃ samatikkantāya pana sīmāya kataṃ ^b^sīmāsampattisampannaṃ^eb^ nāma. Yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, tesaṃ anāgamanaṃ, chandārahānaṃ chandassa anāharaṇaṃ, sammukhībhūtānaṃ paṭikkosananti ime pana tayo parisadosā, tehi vimuttāya parisāya kataṃ ^b^parisasampattisampannaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03]Upasampadākammavācāsaṅkhātaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ upasampadākammakaraṇassa kāraṇattā ṭhānaṃ, yathā ca taṃ kattabbanti bhagavatā anusiṭṭhaṃ, tathā katattā tadanucchavikaṃ yathāvuttaṃ anūnaṃ ñattianussāvanaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā ca avuttaṃ ^b^ṭhānārahaṃ^eb^. Yathā kattabbanti hi bhagavatā vuttaṃ, tathā akate upasampadākammassa kāraṇaṃ na hotīti na taṃ ṭhānārahaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāraṇārahena satthusāsanārahenā’’^eb^ti. Iminā ñattianussāvanasampatti kathitāti veditabbā. ‘‘Samaggena saṅghenā’’ti ^a^V2.0050^ea^ iminā pana parisasampatti kathitāva. ‘‘Akuppenā’’ti iminā pārisesato vatthusīmāsampattiyo kathitāti veditabbā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana akuppalakkhaṇaṃ ekattha sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ ^b^akuppenā^eb^ti imassa ‘‘vatthuñattianussāvanasīmāparisasampattisampannattā akopetabbataṃ appaṭikkositabbataṃ upagatenā’’ti attho vutto. Keci pana ‘‘ṭhānārahenātiettha ‘na hatthacchinno pabbājetabbo’tiādi (mahāva. 119) satthusāsanaṃ ṭhāna’’nti vadanti.

[03]‘‘Ñatticatutthena ^a^M2.0057^ea^ kammenā’’ti imasmiṃ adhikāre pasaṅgato āharitvā yaṃ kammalakkhaṇaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu papañcitaṃ, taṃ yathāāgataṭṭhāneyeva dassetukāmo idha tassa avacane tattha vacane ca payojanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Aṭṭhasu upasampadāsu ehibhikkhūpasampadā saraṇagamanūpasampadā ovādapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā pañhabyākaraṇūpasampadāti imāhi upasampadāhi upasampannānaṃ lokavajjasikkhāpadavītikkame abhabbattā garudhammapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā dūtenūpasampadā aṭṭhavācikūpasampadāti imāsañca tissannaṃ upasampadānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃyeva anuññātattā ñatticatuttheneva kammena upasampanno gahitoti veditabbo. Tathā hi ehibhikkhūpasampadā antimabhavikānaṃyeva, saraṇagamanūpasampadā parisuddhānaṃ, ovādapaṭiggahaṇapañhabyākaraṇūpasampadā mahākassapasopākānaṃ, na ca te bhabbā pārājikādilokavajjaṃ āpajjituṃ, garudhammapaṭiggahaṇādayo ca bhikkhunīnaṃyeva anuññātā, ayañca bhikkhu, tasmā ettha ñatticatutthena upasampannova gahitoti veditabbo.

[03]Paṇṇattivajjesu pana sikkhāpadesu aññepi ehibhikkhūpasampadāya upasampannādayo saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Tepi hi sahaseyyādipaṇṇattivajjaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjantiyeva. Yadi evaṃ paṇṇattivajjesupi sikkhāpadesu ‘‘ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhū’’ti ñatticatuttheneva kammena upasampanno kasmā vuttoti? Sabbasikkhāpadavītikkamārahattā sabbakālikattā ca. Ehibhikkhūpasampadādayo hi na sabbasikkhāpadavītikkamārahā asabbakālikā ca. Tathā hi aṭṭhasu upasampadāsu ñatticatutthakammūpasampadā dūtenūpasampadā aṭṭhavācikūpasampadāti imā tissoyeva thāvarā, sesā buddhe dharamāneyeva ahesuṃ. Teneva ca ^b^bhikkhunīvibhaṅge^eb^pi (pāci. 658) ‘‘tatra yāyaṃ bhikkhunī samaggena ubhatosaṅghena ñatticatutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena upasampannā, ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī’’ti dūtenūpasampadāya aṭṭhavācikūpasampadāya ca upasampannaṃ antokatvā ubhatosaṅghena ñatticatuttheneva kammena upasampannā bhikkhunī vuttā, na garudhammapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadāya upasampannā tassā upasampadāya pāṭipuggalikabhāvato ^a^V2.0051^ea^ asabbakālikattā. Garudhammapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā hi mahāpajāpatiyā eva anuññātattā pāṭipuggalikāti, tasmā sabbasikkhāpadavītikkamārahaṃ ^a^M2.0058^ea^ sabbakālikāya ñatticatutthakammūpasampadāya upasampannameva gahetvā sabbasikkhāpadāni paññattānīti gahetabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ paṇṇattivajjesu sikkhāpadesu ca ehibhikkhūpasampannādīnampi saṅgaho kathaṃ viññāyatīti? Atthato āpannattā. Tathā hi ‘‘dve puggalā abhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca, dve puggalā bhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo cā’’ti (pari. 322) sāmaññato vuttattā ehibhikkhūpasampannādayopi asañcicca assatiyā acittakaṃ paṇṇattivajjaṃ sahaseyyādiāpattiṃ āpajjantīti atthato āpannanti ayamettha sāro. Yaṃ panettha ito aññathā ^b^kenaci^eb^ papañcitaṃ, na taṃ sārato paccetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Niruttivasenā^eb^ti nibbacanavasena. ^b^Abhilāpavasenā^eb^ti vohāravasena. ^b^Anuppannāya kammavācāyā^eb^ti anuppannāya ñatticatutthakammavācāya. ^b^Guṇavasenā^eb^ti sīlāditaṃtaṃguṇayogato. Ettha ca bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhūti nibbacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
[06]Bhikkhupadabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Sikkhitabbā^eb^ti āsevitabbā. ^b^Uttama^eb^nti visiṭṭhaṃ. Adhisīlādīsu vijjamānesu sīlādīhipi bhavitabbaṃ. Yathā hi omakatarappamāṇaṃ chattaṃ vā dhajaṃ vā upādāya atirekappamāṇaṃ ‘‘atichattaṃ atidhajo’’ti vuccati, evamihāpi ‘‘anukkaṭṭhasīlaṃ upādāya adhisīlena bhavitabbaṃ, tathā anukkaṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ paññañca upādāya adhicittena adhipaññāya ca bhavitabba’’nti manasi katvā sīlādiṃ sarūpato vibhāvetukāmo ^b^‘‘katamaṃ panettha sīla’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Aṭṭhaṅgasīlaṃ dasaṅgasīlesveva antogadhattā visuṃ aggahetvā ^b^‘‘pañcaṅgadasaṅgasīla’’^eb^nti ettakameva vuttaṃ. ^b^Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīla^eb^nti cārittavārittavasena duvidhaṃ vinayapiṭakapariyāpannaṃ sikkhāpadasīlaṃ. Tañhi yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhanti vuccati. Saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvaro ^a^M2.0059^ea^, kāyavācāhi avītikkamo. Pātimokkhameva saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro. So eva sīlanaṭṭhena sīlanti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ.

[03]Aparo ^a^V2.0052^ea^ nayo (udā. aṭṭha. 31; itivu. aṭṭha. 97) – kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato pāpakiriyāya sukarabhāvato puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī, puthujjano. Aniccatāya vā bhavābhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti pātī, maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa patanasīloti pātī, sattasantāno, cittameva vā. Taṃ pātinaṃ saṃsāradukkhato mokkhetīti pātimokkhaṃ. Cittassa hi vimokkhena satto vimuttoti vuccati. Vuttañhi ‘‘cittavodānā visujjhantī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 3.100), ‘‘anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimutta’’nti (mahāva. 28) ca.

[03]Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti. ‘‘Avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata’’nti (saṃ. ni. 2.124) hi vuttaṃ. Tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkho. ‘‘Kaṇṭhekāḷo’’tiādīnaṃ viyassa samāsasiddhi veditabbā.

[03]Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkhehīti pāti, cittaṃ. Vuttañhi ‘‘cittena nīyati loko, cittena parikassatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 1.62). Tassa pātino mokkho etenāti pātimokkho. Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti, taṇhāsaṃkileso. Vuttañhi ‘‘taṇhā janeti purisaṃ (saṃ. ni. 1.55-57), taṇhādutiyo puriso’’ti (a. ni. 4.9; itivu. 15, 105) ca ādi. Tato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkho.

[03]Atha vā patati etthāti pāti, cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni. Vuttañhi ‘‘chasu loko samuppanno, chasu kubbati santhava’’nti (saṃ. ni. 1.70; su. ni. 171). Tato chaajjhattikabāhirāyatanasaṅkhātato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkho.
[03]Atha ^a^M2.0060^ea^ vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro. Tato mokkhoti pātimokkho.

[03]Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā patīti vuccati, muccati etenāti mokkho, patino mokkho tena paññattattāti patimokkho, patimokkho eva pātimokkho. Sabbaguṇānaṃ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttena atthena mokkho cāti ^a^V2.0053^ea^ patimokkho, patimokkho eva pātimokkho. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘pātimokkhanti mukhametaṃ pamukhameta’’nti (mahāva. 135) vitthāro.

[03]Atha vā pa-iti pakāre, ^b^atī^eb^ti accantatthe nipāto, tasmā pakārehi accantaṃ mokkhetīti pātimokkho. Idañhi sīlaṃ sayaṃ tadaṅgavasena samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkho.

[03]Pati pati mokkhoti vā patimokkho, tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhetīti attho, patimokkho eva pātimokkho. Mokkho vā nibbānaṃ, tassa mokkhassa paṭibimbabhūtoti patimokkho. Sīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo ca yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanato, patimokkhoyeva pātimokkho. Pativattati mokkhābhimukhanti vā patimokkhaṃ, patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evaṃ tāvettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.
[03]Saṃvarati pidahati etenāti saṃvaro, pātimokkhameva saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro. So eva sīlaṃ ^b^pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ,^eb^ atthato pana tato tato vītikkamitabbato viratiyo ceva cetanā ca.

[03]^b^Adhisīlanti vuccatī^eb^ti anavasesato kāyikavācasikasaṃvarabhāvato ca maggasīlassa padaṭṭhānabhāvato ca pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ adhikaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ sīlaṃ adhisīlanti vuccati. ^b^Pajjotāna^eb^nti ālokānaṃ. Nanu ca paccekabuddhāpi dhammatāvasena pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena samannāgatāva honti, evaṃ sati kasmā ‘‘buddhuppādeyeva pavattati, na vinā buddhuppādā’’ti ^a^M2.0061^ea^ niyametvā vuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘na hi taṃ paññattiṃ uddharitvā’’^eb^tiādi. Kiñcāpi paccekabuddhā pātimokkhasaṃvarasampannāgatā honti, na pana tesaṃ vasena vitthāritaṃ hutvā pavattatīti adhippāyo. ‘‘Imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ imasmiṃ vītikkame idaṃ nāma hotī’’ti paññapanaṃ aññesaṃ avisayo, buddhānaṃyeva esa visayo, buddhānaṃ balanti āha – ^b^‘‘buddhāyeva panā’’^eb^tiādi. Lokiyasīlassa adhisīlabhāvo pariyāyenāti nippariyāyameva taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pātimokkhasaṃvaratopi ca maggaphalasampayuttameva sīlaṃ adhisīla’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Na hi taṃ samāpanno bhikkhū^eb^ti gahaṭṭhesu sotāpannānaṃ sadāravītikkamasambhavato vuttaṃ. Tathā hi te saputtadārā agāraṃ ajjhāvasanti.

[03]^b^Samādāpanaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0054^ea^^b^samādānañcā^eb^ti aññesaṃ samādāpanaṃ sayaṃ samādānañca. ^b^Adhicittanti vuccatī^eb^ti maggasamādhissa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato adhicittanti vuccati. ^b^Na vinā buddhuppādā^eb^ti kiñcāpi paccekabuddhānaṃ vipassanāpādakaṃ aṭṭhasamāpatticittaṃ hotiyeva, na pana te tattha aññe samādāpetuṃ sakkontīti na tesaṃ vasena vitthāritaṃ hutvā pavattatīti adhippāyo. Vipassanāpaññāyapi adhipaññatāsādhane ‘‘na vinā buddhuppādā’’ti vacanaṃ imināva adhippāyena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Lokiyacittassa adhicittatā pariyāyenāti nippariyāyameva taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatopi ca maggaphalacittameva adhicitta’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Taṃ pana idha anadhippeta^eb^nti iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena lokiyacittassa vasena adhicittasikkhāpi idha adhippetāti viññāyati. ^b^Na hi taṃ samāpanno bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatī^eb^ti ca iminā lokiyaadhicittaṃ samāpanno methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatīti āpannaṃ. Adhipaññāniddese ca ‘‘tatopi ca maggaphalapaññāva adhipaññā’’ti vatvā ‘‘sā pana idha anadhippetā. Na hi taṃ samāpanno bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatī’’ti vuttattā lokiyapaññāvasena adhipaññāsikkhāyapi idhādhippetabhāvo taṃ samāpannassa methunadhammapaṭisevanañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātanti viññāyati. Idañca sabbaṃ ‘‘tatra yāyaṃ adhisīlasikkhā, ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā’’ti imāya pāḷiyā na sameti. Ayañhi pāḷi adhisīlasikkhāva idha adhippetā, na itarāti dīpeti, tasmā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca evamadhippāyo veditabbo – lokiyaadhicittaadhipaññāsamāpannassa tathārūpapaccayaṃ paṭicca ‘‘methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevissāmī’’ti citte uppanne tato adhicittato ^a^M2.0062^ea^ adhipaññato ca parihāni sambhavatīti taṃ dvayaṃ samāpannena na sakkā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitunti pāḷiyaṃ adhisīlasikkhāva vuttā. Adhisīlasikkhañhi yāva vītikkamaṃ na karoti, tāva samāpannova hoti. Na hi cittuppādamattena pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ bhinnaṃ nāma hotīti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana lokiyaadhicittato adhipaññato ca parihāyitvāpi bhikkhuno methunadhammapaṭisevanaṃ kadāci bhaveyyāti taṃ dvayaṃ appaṭikkhipitvā maggaphaladhammānaṃ akuppasabhāvattā taṃ samāpannassa bhikkhuno tato parihāyitvā methunadhammapaṭisevanaṃ nāma na kadāci sambhavatīti lokuttarādhicittaadhipaññānaṃyeva paṭikkhepo katoti veditabbo.
[03]^b^Atthi dinnaṃ atthi yiṭṭhantiādinayappavatta^eb^nti iminā –

[08]‘‘Tattha katamaṃ kammassakataññāṇaṃ? ‘Atthi dinnaṃ, atthi yiṭṭhaṃ, atthi hutaṃ, atthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, atthi ayaṃ loko, atthi paro loko, atthi mātā, atthi pitā, atthi sattā opapātikā, atthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammā ^a^V2.0055^ea^ paṭipannā, ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti yā evarūpā paññā pajānanā…pe… amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi, idaṃ vuccati kammassakataññāṇaṃ. Ṭhapetvā saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇaṃ sabbāpi sāsavā kusalā paññā kammassakataññāṇa’’nti (vibha. 793) –
[07]Imaṃ vibhaṅgapāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]Tattha (vibha. aṭṭha. 793) ^b^atthi dinna^eb^ntiādīsu dinnapaccayā phalaṃ atthīti iminā upāyena attho veditabbo. ^b^Dinna^eb^nti ca deyyadhammasīsena dānaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Yiṭṭha^eb^nti mahāyāgo, sabbasādhāraṇaṃ mahādānanti attho. ^b^Huta^eb^nti pahonakasakkāro adhippeto. ^b^Atthi mātā, atthi pitā^eb^ti mātāpitūsu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattiādīnaṃ phalasambhavo vutto. ^b^Idaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti yaṃ ñāṇaṃ ‘‘idaṃ kammaṃ sakaṃ, idaṃ no saka’’nti jānāti, idaṃ kammassakataññāṇaṃ nāma vuccatīti attho. Tattha tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ tividhaṃ manoduccaritanti idaṃ ^b^na sakakammaṃ^eb^ nāma, tīsu dvāresu dasavidhampi sucaritaṃ ^b^sakakammaṃ^eb^ nāma. Attano vāpi hotu parassa vā, sabbampi akusalaṃ ^b^na sakakammaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0063^ea^ nāma. Kasmā? Atthabhañjanato anatthajananato ca. Attano vā hotu parassa vā, sabbampi kusalaṃ ^b^sakakammaṃ^eb^ nāma. Kasmā? Anatthabhañjanato atthajananato ca. Evaṃ jānanasamatthe imasmiṃ kammassakataññāṇe ṭhatvā bahuṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ pūretvā uposathaṃ samādiyitvā sukhena sukhaṃ sampattiyā sampattiṃ anubhavitvā nibbānaṃ pattānaṃ sattānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo natthi. ^b^Ṭhapetvā saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇa^eb^nti maggasaccassa paramatthasaccassa ca anulomanato saccānulomikanti laddhanāmaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā sabbāpi sāsavā kusalā paññā kammassakataññāṇamevāti attho.
[03]^b^Tilakkhaṇākāraparicchedaka^eb^nti aniccādilakkhaṇattayassa hutvā abhāvādiākārapaacchindanakaṃ. ^b^Adhipaññāti vuccatī^eb^ti maggapaññāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvato vipassanāñāṇaṃ adhipaññāti vuccati.
[21]‘‘Kalyāṇakārī kalyāṇaṃ, pāpakārī ca pāpakaṃ;
[22]Anubhoti dvayametaṃ, anubandhati kāraka’’nti. (saṃ. ni. 1.256);

[07]Evaṃ ^a^V2.0056^ea^ atīte anāgate ca vaṭṭamūlakadukkhasallakkhaṇavasena saṃvegavatthutāya vimuttiākaṅkhāya paccayabhūtā kammassakatapaññā adhipaññātipi vadanti. Lokiyapaññāya adhipaññābhāvo pariyāyenāti nippariyāyameva taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatopi ca maggaphalapaññāva adhipaññā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Saha ājīvanti etthāti ^b^sājīvo^eb^ti sabbasikkhāpadaṃ vuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘sabbampi…pe… tasmā sājīvanti vuccatī’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^sikkhāpada^eb^nti ‘‘nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo’’ti vuttaṃ bhagavato vacanasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ. ^b^Sabhāgavuttino^eb^ti samānavuttikā, sadisappavattikāti attho. ^b^Tasmiṃ sikkhatī^eb^ti ettha ādheyyāpekkhattā adhikaraṇassa kimādheyyamapekkhitvā ‘‘tasmi’’nti adhikaraṇaṃ niddiṭṭhanti āha – ^b^‘‘taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ cittassa adhikaraṇaṃ katvā’’^eb^ti, taṃ sājīvasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ ‘‘yathāsikkhāpadaṃ nu kho sikkhāmi, na sikkhāmī’’ti evaṃ pavattivasena sikkhāpadavisayattā tadādheyyabhūtassa cittassa adhikaraṇaṃ katvāti attho. Nanu ca ‘‘sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno’’ti imassa padabhājanaṃ karontena ‘‘yaṃ sikkhaṃ sājīvañca samāpanno, tadubhayaṃ dassetvā tesu sikkhati, tena ^a^M2.0064^ea^ vuccati sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno’’ti vattabbaṃ siyā, evamavatvā ‘‘tasmiṃ sikkhati, tena vuccati sājīvasamāpanno’’ti ettakameva kasmā vuttanti antolīnacodanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘na kevalañcāyametasmi’’^eb^ntiādi.
[06]^b^Tassā ca sikkhāyā^eb^ti tassā adhisīlasaṅkhātāya sikkhāya. ^b^Sikkhaṃ paripūrento^eb^ti

[03]Sīlasaṃvaraṃ paripūrento, vārittasīlavasena viratisampayuttaṃ cetanaṃ cārittasīlavasena virativippayuttaṃ cetanañca attani pavattentoti attho. ^b^Tasmiñca sikkhāpade avītikkamanto sikkhatī^eb^ti ‘‘nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo’’ti evaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavato vacanasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ avītikkamanto hutvā tasmiṃ yathāvuttasikkhāpade sikkhatīti attho. Sīlasaṃvarapūraṇaṃ sājīvānatikkamanañcāti idameva ca dvayaṃ idha sikkhanaṃ nāmāti adhippāyo. Tattha sājīvānatikkamo sikkhāpāripūriyā paccayo. Sājīvānatikkamato hi yāva maggā sikkhāpāripūrī hoti. Apicettha ‘‘sikkhaṃ paripūrento sikkhatī’’ti iminā viraticetanāsaṅkhātassa sīlasaṃvarassa visesato santāne pavattanakālova gahito, ‘‘avītikkamanto sikkhatī’’ti iminā pana appavattanakālopi. Sikkhañhi paripūraṇavasena attani pavattentopi niddādivasena appavattentopi vītikkamābhāvā ‘‘avītikkamanto sikkhatī’’ti vuccatīti.
[06]Sikkhāsājīvapadabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]‘‘Appaccakkhāya ^a^V2.0057^ea^ appaccakkhātāyā’’ti ubhayathāpi pāṭho tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vutto. ^b^Dubbalye āvikatepī^eb^ti ‘‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ buddhaṃ paccakkheyya’’ntiādinā dubbalabhāve pakāsitepi. ^b^Sikkhāya pana paccakkhātāyā^eb^ti ‘‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī’’tiādinā sikkhāya paccakkhātāya. Yasmā dirattavacane gahite tena purimapacchimapadāni saṃsiliṭṭhāni honti, na tasmiṃ aggahite, tasmā dirattavacanena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāmattameva payojananti āha ^b^‘‘byañjanasiliṭṭhatāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Mukhāruḷhatāyā^eb^ti yasmā evarūpaṃ vacanaṃ lokassa mukhamāruḷhaṃ, tasmāti attho.

[03]^b^Byañjanaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0065^ea^^b^sampādetī^eb^ti tassa visuṃ atthābhāvato vuttamevatthaṃ aññapadena dīpento byañjanaṃ sampādeti. Vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇena vibhāvento āha ^b^‘‘parivārakapadavirahitañhī’’^eb^tiādi. Atthadīpakaṃ padaṃ ^b^atthapadaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Sikkhāpaccakkhānassā^eb^ti ‘‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī’’tiādisikkhāpaccakkhānavacanassa. ‘‘Buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī’’tiādīsu ‘‘evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dubbalyāvikammañceva hoti sikkhā ca paccakkhātā’’ti vuttattā ubhayampi hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘ekaccaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ attho hotī’’^eb^ti. Kiñcāpi ‘‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī’’tiādisikkhāpaccakkhānavacanassa dubbalyāvikammapadattho na hoti, tathāpi ‘‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī’’ti vutte sikkhāparipūraṇe dubbalyāvibhāvassapi gamyamānattā ‘‘sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ekaccaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ attho hotī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Naṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti naṃ atthabhūtaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ sandhāya.

[03]^b^Visesāvisesa^eb^nti ettha yena dubbalyāvikammameva hoti, na sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ, tattha sikkhāpaccakkhānadubbalyāvikammānaṃ atthi viseso. Yena pana sikkhāpaccakkhānañceva dubbalyāvikammañca hoti, tattha nevatthi visesoti veditabbaṃ. Kaṭhakicchajīvaneti dhātūsu paṭhitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kicchajīvikappatto’’^eb^ti. Ukkaṇṭhanaṃ ukkaṇṭhā, kicchajīvikā, taṃ ito pattoti ^b^ukkaṇṭhito. Ito^eb^ti ito ṭhānato, ito vihārato vā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti gantumicchitaṃ padesaṃ vadati. Anabhiratiyā pīḷito vikkhittacitto hutvā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā uddhaṃmukho ito cito ca olokento āhiṇḍatīti āha ^b^‘‘uddhaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ katvā viharamāno’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Aṭṭīyamāno^eb^ti ettha aṭṭamiva attānamācarati aṭṭīyatīti aṭṭīyasaddassa antogadhaupamānabhūtakammattā ^a^V2.0058^ea^ upameyyabhūtena attanāva sakammakattaṃ, na bhikkhubhāvenāti āha ^b^‘‘bhikkhubhāvanti bhikkhubhāvenā’’^eb^ti. Na hi so bhikkhubhāvaṃ aṭṭamiva ācarati, kiñcarahi attānaṃ tasmā bhikkhubhāvena karaṇabhūtena attānaṃ aṭṭīyamānoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabboti āha ^b^‘‘karaṇatthe upayogavacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kaṇṭhe āsattena aṭṭīyeyyā^eb^ti ettha pana karaṇattheyeva karaṇavacananti āha – ^b^‘‘yathālakkhaṇaṃ karaṇavacaneneva vutta’’^eb^nti. Kattuatthe vā upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha – ^b^‘‘tena vā bhikkhubhāvenā’’^eb^tiādi, tena kattubhūtena bhikkhubhāvenāti attho. Imasmiṃ panatthe aṭṭaṃ karotīti aṭṭīyatīti ^a^M2.0066^ea^ aṭṭīya-saddaṃ nipphādetvā tato kammani māna-sadde kate ‘‘aṭṭīyamāno’’ti padasiddhi veditabbā. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘aṭṭo kariyamāno pīḷiyamāno’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jigucchamāno^eb^ti iminā pana sambandhe kariyamāne bhikkhubhāvanti upayogatthe eva upayogavacananti āha – ^b^‘‘asuciṃ viya taṃ jigucchanto’’^eb^ti, taṃ bhikkhubhāvaṃ jigucchantoti attho. ^b^Sacāha^eb^nti sace ahaṃ.

[03]^b^Paccakkhānākārena vuttānī^eb^ti ‘‘paccakkheyyaṃ paccakkheyya’’nti vuttattā paccakkhānākārasambandhena vuttāni. ^b^Bhāvavikappākārenā^eb^ti ‘‘assaṃ assa’’nti āgatattā yaṃ yaṃ bhavitukāmo, tassa tassa bhāvassa vikappākārena, bhikkhubhāvato aññabhāvavikappākārenāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^50^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na ussahāmī^eb^ti attano tattha tattha ussahābhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Na visahāmī^eb^ti ekabhattādīnaṃ asayhabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Na ramāmī^eb^ti ‘‘pabbajjāmūlakaṃ natthi me sukha’’nti dasseti. ^b^Nābhiramāmī^eb^ti pabbajjāya attano santosābhāvaṃ dasseti.

[03]Idāni sikkhāpaccakkhānavāre ṭhatvā ayaṃ vinicchayo veditabbo – tattha ‘‘sāmaññā cavitukāmo’’tiādīhi padehi cittaniyamaṃ dasseti. ‘‘Buddhaṃ dhamma’’ntiādīhi padehi khettaniyamaṃ dasseti. Yathā hi loke sassānaṃ ruhanaṭṭhānaṃ ‘‘khetta’’nti vuccati, evamidampi sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ruhanaṭṭhānattā ‘‘khetta’’nti vuccati. ‘‘Paccakkhāmi dhārehī’’ti etena kālaniyamaṃ dasseti. ‘‘Vadatī’’ti iminā payoganiyamaṃ dasseti. ‘‘Alaṃ me buddhena, kinnu me buddhena, na mamattho buddhena, sumuttāhaṃ buddhenā’’tiādīhi anāmaṭṭhakālavasenapi paccakkhānaṃ hotīti dasseti. ‘‘Viññāpetī’’ti iminā vijānananiyamaṃ dasseti. ‘‘Ummattako sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti, ummattakassa santike sikkhaṃ paccakkhātī’’tiādīhi puggalaniyamaṃ dasseti. ‘‘Ariyakena milakkhassa santike sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti, so ca nappaṭivijānāti, appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā’’tiādīhi puggalādiniyame satipi vijānananiyamāsambhavaṃ dasseti ^a^V2.0059^ea^. ‘‘Davāya sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti, appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā’’tiādīhi khettādiniyame satipi cittaniyamābhāvena na ruhatīti dasseti. ‘‘Sāvetukāmo na sāveti, apaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā’’ti iminā cittaniyamepi sati payoganiyamābhāvena na ruhatīti ^a^M2.0067^ea^ dasseti. ‘‘Aviññussa sāveti, viññussa na sāvetī’’ti etehi cittakhettakālapayogapuggalavijānananiyamepi sati yaṃ puggalaṃ uddissa sāveti, tasseva savanena ruhati, na aññassāti dasseti. ‘‘Sabbaso vā pana na sāveti, appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā’’ti idaṃ pana cittādiniyameneva sikkhā paccakkhātā hoti, na aññathāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā cittakhettakālapayogapuggalavijānananiyamavasena sikkhāya paccakkhānaṃ ñatvā tadabhāvena appaccakkhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
[03]Kathaṃ? Upasampannabhāvato cavitukāmatācitteneva hi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na davā vā ravā vā bhaṇantassa. Evaṃ ^b^cittavasena^eb^ sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena.

[03]Tathā ‘‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmi, dhammaṃ paccakkhāmi, saṅghaṃ paccakkhāmi, sikkhaṃ, vinayaṃ, pātimokkhaṃ, uddesaṃ, upajjhāyaṃ, ācariyaṃ, saddhivihārikaṃ, antevāsikaṃ, samānupajjhāyakaṃ, samānācariyakaṃ, sabrahmacāriṃ paccakkhāmī’’ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ catuddasannaṃ, ‘‘gihīti maṃ dhārehi, upāsako, ārāmiko, sāmaṇero, titthiyo, titthiyasāvako, assamaṇo, asakyaputtiyoti maṃ dhārehī’’ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ gihiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannañcāti imesaṃ dvāvīsatiyā khettapadānaṃ yassa kassaci savevacanassa vasena tesu ca yaṃkiñci vattukāmassa yaṃkiñci vadatopi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na rukkhādīnaṃ aññatarassa nāmaṃ gahetvā sikkhaṃ paccakkhantassa. Evaṃ ^b^khettavasena^eb^ sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena.

[03]Tattha yadetaṃ ‘‘paccakkhāmī’’ti ca ‘‘maṃ dhārehī’’ti ca vuttaṃ vattamānakālavacanaṃ, yāni ca ‘‘alaṃ me buddhena, kinnu me buddhena, na mamattho buddhena, sumuttāhaṃ buddhenā’’tiādinā nayena ākhyātavasena kālaṃ anāmasitvā purimehi cuddasahi padehi saddhiṃ yojetvā vuttāni ‘‘alaṃ me’’tiādīni cattāri padāni, tesaṃyeva ca savevacanānaṃ vasena paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na ‘‘paccakkhāsi’’nti vā ‘‘paccakkhissa’’nti vā ‘‘maṃ dhāresī’’ti vā ‘‘dhāressasī’’ti vā ‘‘yanūnāhaṃ paccakkheyya’’nti vātiādīni atītānāgataparikappavacanāni bhaṇantassa. Evaṃ ^b^vattamānakālavasena^eb^ ceva ^b^anāmaṭṭhakālavasena^eb^ ca paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena.

[03]Payogo ^a^M2.0068^ea^^a^V2.0060^ea^ pana duvidho kāyiko vācasiko. Tattha ‘‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī’’tiādinā nayena yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vacībhedaṃ katvā vācasikapayogeneva paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na akkharalikhanaṃ vā hatthamuddādidassanaṃ vā kāyapayogaṃ karontassa. Evaṃ ^b^vācasikapayogeneva^eb^ paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena.

[03]Puggalo pana duvidho yo ca paccakkhāti, yassa ca paccakkhāti. Tattha yo paccakkhāti, so sace ummattakakhittacittavedanāṭṭānaṃ aññataro na hoti.
