Yassa pana paccakkhāti, so sace manussajātiko hoti, na ca ummattakādīnaṃ aññataro, sammukhībhūto ca sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti. Na hi asammukhībhūtassa dūtena vā paṇṇena vā ārocanaṃ ruhati. Evaṃ ^b^yathāvuttapuggalavasena^eb^ paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena.

[03]Vijānanampi niyamitāniyamitavasena duvidhaṃ. Tattha yassa yesaṃ vā niyametvā ‘‘imassa imesaṃ vā ārocemī’’ti vadati, sace te yathā pakatiyā loke manussā vacanaṃ sutvā āvajjanasamaye jānanti, evaṃ tassa vacanānantarameva tassa ‘‘ayaṃ ukkaṇṭhito’’ti vā ‘‘gihibhāvaṃ patthayatī’’ti vā yena kenaci ākārena sikkhāpaccakkhānabhāvaṃ jānanti, paccakkhātā hoti sikkhā. Atha aparabhāge ‘‘kiṃ iminā vutta’’nti cintetvā jānanti, aññe vā jānanti, appaccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Aniyametvā ārocentassa pana sace vuttanayena yo koci manussajātiko vacanatthaṃ jānāti, paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Evaṃ ^b^vijānanavasena^eb^ paccakkhānaṃ hoti, na tadabhāvena. Iti imesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ cittādīnaṃ vaseneva sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na aññathāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^51^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Vadatī’’ti vacībhedappayogaṃ dassetvā tadanantaraṃ ‘‘viññāpetī’’ti vuttattā teneva vacībhedena adhippāyaviññāpanaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, na yena kenaci upāyenāti āha ^b^‘‘teneva vacībhedenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Padapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ katvā^eb^ti padaviparāvuttiṃ katvā. Idañca padappayogassa aniyamitattā vuttaṃ. Yathā hi loke ‘‘āhara pattaṃ, pattaṃ āharā’’ti aniyamitena padappayogena tadatthaviññāpanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, evamidhāpi ‘‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmi, paccakkhāmi buddha’’nti aniyamitena padappayogena tadatthaviññāpanaṃ hotiyevāti adhippāyo. Buddhaṃ paccakkhāmīti atthappadhāno ayaṃ ^a^M2.0069^ea^ niddeso, na saddappadhānoti āha ^b^‘‘milakkhabhāsāsu vā aññatarabhāsāya tamatthaṃ vadeyyā’’^eb^ti. Māgadhabhāsato avasiṭṭhā sabbāpi andhadamiḷādibhāsā milakkhabhāsāti veditabbā. Khettapadesu ekaṃ vattukāmo sacepi aññaṃ vadeyya, khettapadantogadhattā paccakkhātāva ^a^V2.0061^ea^ hoti sikkhāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmīti vattukāmo’’^eb^tiādi. Yadipi ‘‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī’’ti vattuṃ anicchanto cittena taṃ paṭikkhipitvā aññaṃ vattukāmo puna virajjhitvā tameva vadeyya, tathāpi sāsanato cavitukāmatācitte sati khettapadasseva vuttattā aṅgapāripūrisambhavato hotveva sikkhāpaccakkhānanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Khettameva otiṇṇa^eb^nti sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ruhanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ khettameva otiṇṇaṃ.

[03]‘‘Paccakkhāmi dhārehī’’ti vattamānakālassa padhānabhāvena vattumicchitattā atītānāgataparikappavacanehi nevatthi sikkhāpaccakkhānanti dassento āha ^b^‘‘sace pana buddhaṃ paccakkhinti vā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vadati viññāpetī^eb^ti ettha ^b^vadatī^eb^ti iminā payogassa niyamitattā ekassa santike attano vacībhedappayogeneva sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na dūtasāsanādippayogenāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘dūtaṃ vā pahiṇātī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ‘‘mama sikkhāpaccakkhānabhāvaṃ kathehī’’ti mukhasāsanavasena ‘‘dūtaṃ vā pahiṇātī’’ti vuttaṃ. Paṇṇe likhitvā pahiṇanavasena ^b^‘‘sāsanaṃ vā pesetī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Rukkhādīsu akkharāni likhitvā dassanavasena ^b^‘‘akkharaṃ vā chindatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Hatthamuddāya vā tamatthaṃ ārocetī^eb^ti hatthena adhippāyaviññāpanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Adhippāyaviññāpako hi hatthavikāro hatthamuddā. Hattha-saddo cettha tadekadesesu aṅgulīsu daṭṭhabbo ‘‘na sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmī’’tiādīsu (pāci. 618) viya. Tasmā adhippāyaviññāpakena aṅgulisaṅkocādinā hatthavikārena tamatthaṃ ārocetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Cittasampayutta^eb^nti paccakkhātukāmatācittasampayuttaṃ. Idāni vijānanavasena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ niyamitāniyamitavasena dvidhā veditabbanti dassento āha – ^b^‘‘yadi ayameva jānātū’’^eb^tiādi. Ayañca vibhāgo ‘‘vadati viññāpetīti ekavisayattā ^a^M2.0070^ea^ yassa vadati, tasseva vijānanaṃ adhippetaṃ, na aññassā’’ti iminā nayena laddhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi yassa vadati, tato aññaṃ viññāpetīti ayamattho sambhavati. ^b^Soyeva jānātī^eb^ti avadhāraṇena tasmiṃ avijānanteyeva aññassa jānanaṃ paṭikkhipati. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘atha so na jānāti, añño samīpe ṭhito jānāti, apaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā’’^eb^ti. Tasmā ‘‘ayameva jānātū’’ti ekaṃ niyametvā ārocite yadipi sopi jānāti aññopi, niyamitassa pana niyamitavasena vijānanasambhavato sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ ‘‘añño mā jānātū’’ti aniyamitattā. ^b^Dvinnampi niyametvā^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘dve vā jānantu eko vā, imesaṃyeva dvinnaṃ ārocemī’’ti evaṃ niyametvā ārocanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘ekasmiṃ^eb^^a^V2.0062^ea^^b^jānantepi dvīsu jānantesupī’’^eb^ti. Tasmā ‘‘dveyeva jānantu, eko mā jānātū’’ti evaṃ dvinnaṃ niyametvā ārocite dvīsuyeva jānantesu sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, na ekasmiṃ jānanteti vadanti.

[03]^b^Sabhāge^eb^ti vissāsike. ^b^Parisaṅkamāno^eb^ti ‘‘sace te jāneyyuṃ, maṃ te vāressantī’’ti āsaṅkamāno. ^b^Samayaññū^eb^ti sāsanācārakusalo, idha pana tadadhippāyajānanamattenapi samayaññū nāma hoti. Teneva āha – ^b^‘‘ukkaṇṭhito ayaṃ…pe… sāsanato cutoti jānātī’’^eb^ti. Tasmā ‘‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī’’ti imassa atthaṃ ñatvāpi sace ‘‘ayaṃ bhikkhubhāvato cavitukāmo, gihī vā hotukāmo’’ti na jānāti, appaccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Sace pana ‘‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī’’ti vacanassa atthaṃ ajānitvāpi ‘‘ukkaṇṭhito gihī hotukāmo’’ti adhippāyaṃ jānāti, paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Aññasmiṃ khaṇe sotaviññāṇavīthiyā saddaggahaṇaṃ, aññasmiṃyeva ca manoviññāṇavīthiyā tadatthavijānananti āha – ^b^‘‘taṅkhaṇaññeva pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ dujjāna’’^eb^nti. Na hi ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe saddasavanaṃ tadatthavijānanañca sambhavati. Tathā hi ‘‘ghaṭo’’ti vā ‘‘paṭo’’ti vā kenaci vutte tattha gha-saddaṃ paccuppannaṃ gahetvā ekā sotaviññāṇavīthi uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tadanantaraṃ ekā manoviññāṇavīthi tameva atītaṃ gahetvā uppajjati. Evaṃ tena vuttavacane yattakāni akkharāni honti, tesu ekamekaṃ akkharaṃ paccuppannamatītañca gahetvā sotaviññāṇavīthiyā manoviññāṇavīthiyā ca uppajjitvā niruddhāya avasāne ^a^M2.0071^ea^ tāni akkharāni sampiṇḍetvā akkharasamūhaṃ gahetvā ekā manoviññāṇavīthi uppajjitvā nirujjhati. Tadanantaraṃ ‘‘ayamakkharasamūho etassa nāma’’nti nāmapaññattiggahaṇavasena aparāya manoviññāṇavīthiyā uppajjitvā niruddhāya tadanantaraṃ uppannāya manoviññāṇavīthiyā ‘‘ayametassa attho’’ti pakatiyā tadatthavijānanaṃ sambhavati.

[03]^b^Āvajjanasamayenā^eb^ti bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, atthābhogasamayeti attho. Idāni tameva āvajjanasamayaṃ vibhāvento āha – ^b^‘‘yathā pakatiyā…pe… jānantī’’^eb^ti. Teneva vacībhedena adhippāyaviññāpanassa idhādhippetattā aparabhāge ‘‘kiṃ iminā vutta’’nti taṃ kaṅkhantassa cirena adhippāyavijānanaṃ aññenapi kenaci upāyantarena sambhavati, na kevalaṃ vacībhedamattenāti āha – ^b^‘‘atha aparabhāge…pe… appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Gihī bhavissāmī’’ti vutte atthabhedo kālabhedo ca hotīti appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā. ‘‘Dhārehī’’ti hi imassa yo attho kālo ca, na so ‘‘bhavissāmī’’ti etassa. ‘‘Gihī ^a^V2.0063^ea^ homī’’ti vutte pana atthabhedoyeva, na kālabhedo ‘‘homī’’ti vattamānakālasseva vuttattā. ‘‘Gihī jātomhi, gihīmhī’’ti etthāpi atthassa ceva kālassa ca bhinnattā appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā. ‘‘Ajja paṭṭhāyā’’ti idaṃ tathā vuttepi dosabhāvato paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. ‘‘Dhārehī’’ti atthappadhānattā niddesassa pariyāyavacanehipi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘jānāhī’’^eb^tiādi. Dhārehi jānāhi sañjānāhi manasi karohīti hi etāni padāni atthato kālato ca abhinnāni.
[03]^b^52^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Purimāneva cuddasā^eb^ti buddhādisabrahmacārīpariyantāni. Hotu bhavatūti idampi paṭikkhepamattamevāti āha ^b^‘‘hotu, pariyattanti attho’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^53^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vaṇṇapaṭṭhāna^eb^nti mahāsaṅghikānaṃ buddhaguṇaparidīpakaṃ ekaṃ suttanti vadanti. ^b^Upāligāthāsū^eb^ti (ma. ni. 2.76) –
[21]‘‘Dhīrassa ^a^M2.0072^ea^ vigatamohassa,
[27]Pabhinnakhīlassa vijitavijayassa;
[26]Anīghassa susamacittassa;
[27]Vuddhasīlassa sādhupaññassa;
[26]Vesamantarassa vimalassa;
[22]Bhagavato tassa sāvakohamasmi.
[21]‘‘Akathaṃkathissa tusitassa;
[27]Vantalokāmisassa muditassa;
[26]Katasamaṇassa manujassa;
[27]Antimasārīrassa narassa;
[26]Anopamassa virajassa;
[22]Bhagavato tassa sāvakohamasmi.
[21]‘‘Asaṃsayassa kusalassa;
[27]Venayikassa sārathivarassa;
[26]Anuttarassa ^a^V2.0064^ea^ ruciradhammassa;
[27]Nikkaṅkhassa pabhāsakassa;
[26]Mānacchidassa vīrassa;
[22]Bhagavato tassa sāvakohamasmi.
[21]‘‘Nisabhassa appameyyassa;
[27]Gambhīrassa monappattassa;
[26]Khemaṅkarassa vedassa;
[27]Dhammaṭṭhassa saṃvutattassa;
[26]Saṅgātigassa muttassa;
[22]Bhagavato tassa sāvakohamasmi.
[21]‘‘Nāgassa pantasenassa;
[27]Khīṇasaṃyojanassa muttassa;
[26]Paṭimantakassa dhonassa;
[27]Pannaddhajassa vītarāgassa;
[26]Dantassa nippapañcassa;
[22]Bhagavato tassa sāvakohamasmi.
[21]‘‘Isisattamassa ^a^M2.0073^ea^ akuhassa;
[27]Tevijjassa brahmappattassa;
[26]Nhātakassa padakassa;
[27]Passaddhassa viditavedassa;
[26]Purindadassa sakkassa;
[22]Bhagavato tassa sāvakohamasmi.
[21]‘‘Ariyassa bhāvitattassa;
[27]Pattippattassa veyyākaraṇassa;
[26]Satimato vipassissa;
[27]Anabhinatassa no apanatassa;
[26]Anejassa ^a^V2.0065^ea^ vasippattassa;
[22]Bhagavato tassa sāvakohamasmi.
[21]‘‘Samuggatassa jhāyissa;
[27]Ananugatantarassa suddhassa;
[26]Asitassa hitassa;
[27]Pavivittassa aggappattassa;
[26]Tiṇṇassa tārayantassa;
[22]Bhagavato tassa sāvakohamasmi.
[21]‘‘Santassa bhūripaññassa;
[27]Mahāpaññassa vītalobhassa;
[26]Tathāgatassa sugatassa;
[27]Appaṭipuggalassa asamassa;
[26]Visāradassa nipuṇassa;
[22]Bhagavato tassa sāvakohamasmi.
[21]‘‘Taṇhacchidassa ^a^M2.0074^ea^ buddhassa;
[27]Vītadhūmassa anupalittassa;
[26]Āhuneyyassa yakkhassa;
[27]Uttamapuggalassa atulassa;
[26]Mahato yasaggappattassa;
[22]Bhagavato tassa sāvakohamasmī’’ti. –
[07]Evaṃ upāligahapatinā vuttāsu upālisutte āgatagāthāsu.

[03]^b^Yathārutamevā^eb^ti yathāvuttameva, pāḷiyaṃ āgatamevāti adhippāyo. Yasmā ‘‘sammāsambuddhaṃ anantabuddhiṃ anomabuddhiṃ bodhipaññāṇa’’nti imāni vaṇṇapaṭṭhāne āgatanāmāni, ‘‘dhīra’’ntiādīni pana upāligāthāsu āgatanāmāni. Tattha bodhi vuccati sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, taṃ sañjānanahetuttā paññāṇaṃ etassāti ^b^bodhipaññāṇo,^eb^ bhagavā. Dhiyā paññāya rāti gaṇhāti ^a^V2.0066^ea^, sevatīti vā ^b^dhīro^eb^. Samucchinnasabbacetokhīlattā ^b^pabhinnakhīlo^eb^. Sabbaputhujjane vijiniṃsu vijayanti vijinissanti cāti vijayā. Ke te? Maccumārakilesamāradevaputtamārā. Te vijitā vijayā etenāti ^b^vijitavijayo,^eb^ bhagavā. Kilesamāramaccumāravijayeneva panettha abhisaṅkhārakkhandhamārāpi vijitāva hontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Svākkhāta^eb^ntiādīsu (visuddhi. 1.147) sātthasabyañjanakevalaparipuṇṇaparisuddhabrahmacariyassa pakāsanato ^b^svākkhāto^eb^ dhammo, atthavipallāsābhāvato vā suṭṭhu akkhātoti ^b^svākkhāto^eb^. Yathā hi aññatitthiyānaṃ dhammassa attho vipallāsaṃ āpajjati ‘‘antarāyikā’’ti vuttadhammānaṃ antarāyikattābhāvato, ‘‘niyyānikā’’ti ca vuttadhammānaṃ niyyānikattābhāvato, tena te aññatitthiyā durakkhātadhammāyeva honti, na tathā bhagavato dhammassa attho vipallāsaṃ āpajjati ‘‘ime dhammā antarāyikā niyyānikā’’ti evaṃ vuttadhammānaṃ tathābhāvānatikkamanatoti. Evaṃ tāva pariyattidhammo svākkhāto dhammo.
[03]Lokuttaradhammo pana nibbānānurūpāya paṭipattiyā paṭipadānurūpassa ca nibbānassa akkhātattā svākkhāto. Yathāha –

[08]‘‘Supaññattā ^a^M2.0075^ea^ kho pana tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā saṃsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā ca. Seyyathāpi nāma gaṅgodakaṃ yamunodakena saṃsandati sameti, evameva supaññattā tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā saṃsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā cā’’ti (dī. ni. 2.296).

[03]Ariyamaggo cettha antadvayaṃ anupagamma majjhimāpaṭipadābhūtova ‘‘majjhimā paṭipadā’’ti akkhātattā svākkhāto. Sāmaññaphalāni paṭippassaddhakilesāneva ‘‘paṭippassaddhakilesānī’’ti akkhātattā svākkhātāni. Nibbānaṃ sassatāmatatāṇaleṇādisabhāvameva sassatādisabhāvavasena akkhātattā svākkhātanti evaṃ lokuttaradhammopi svākkhāto.

[03]Ariyamaggo attano santāne rāgādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ karontena ariyapuggalena sāmaṃ daṭṭhabbo ‘‘ariyamaggena mama rāgādayo pahīnā’’ti sayaṃ attanā anaññaneyyena passitabboti sandiṭṭhi, sandiṭṭhi eva ^b^sandiṭṭhiko^eb^. Apica navavidho lokuttaradhammo yena yena adhigato hoti, tena tena ariyasāvakena parasaddhāya gantabbataṃ hitvā paccakkhañāṇena sayaṃ daṭṭhabboti ^b^sandiṭṭhiko^eb^. Atha vā pasatthā diṭṭhi sandiṭṭhi, sandiṭṭhiyā jayatīti ^b^sandiṭṭhiko^eb^. Tathā hettha ariyamaggo sampayuttāya, ariyaphalaṃ kāraṇabhūtāya, nibbānaṃ visayibhūtāya sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayati, tasmā yathā rathena jayatīti rathiko, evaṃ navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sandiṭṭhiyā jayatīti ^a^V2.0067^ea^ sandiṭṭhiko. Atha vā diṭṭhanti dassanaṃ vuccati, diṭṭhameva sandiṭṭhaṃ, sandassananti attho. Sandiṭṭhaṃ arahatīti ^b^sandiṭṭhiko^eb^. Lokuttaradhammo hi bhāvanābhisamayavasena sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena ca dissamānoyeva vaṭṭabhayaṃ nivatteti, tasmā yathā vatthamarahatīti vatthiko, evaṃ sandiṭṭhaṃ arahatīti sandiṭṭhiko.

[03]Attano phaladānaṃ sandhāya nāssa āgametabbo kālo atthīti akālo. Yathā hi lokiyakusalassa upapajjaaparāpariyāyetiādinā phaladānaṃ pati āgametabbo kālo atthi, na evametassāti attho. Akāloyeva ^b^akāliko,^eb^ na pañcāhasattāhādibhedaṃ kālaṃ khepetvā phalaṃ deti, attano pana pavattisamanantarameva phaladoti ^a^M2.0076^ea^ vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā attano phalappadāne vippakaṭṭho dūro kālo patto upanīto assāti kāliko, kālantaraphaladāyī. Ko so? Lokiyo kusaladhammo. Ayaṃ pana samanantaraphaladāyakattā na kālikoti ^b^akāliko^eb^. Maggameva hi sandhāya ‘‘akāliko’’ti idaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]‘‘Ehi passa imaṃ dhamma’’nti evaṃ pavattaṃ ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ^b^ehipassiko^eb^. Kasmā panesa taṃ vidhiṃ arahatīti? Paramatthato vijjamānattā parisuddhattā ca. Rittamuṭṭhiyañhi hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā atthīti vatvāpi ‘‘ehi passa ima’’nti na sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmā? Avijjamānattā. Vijjamānampi ca gūthaṃ vā muttaṃ vā manuññabhāvappakāsanena cittasampahaṃsanatthaṃ ‘‘ehi passa ima’’nti na sakkā vattuṃ, apica kho naṃ tiṇehi vā paṇṇehi vā paṭicchādetabbameva hoti. Kasmā? Aparisuddhattā. Ayaṃ pana navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sabhāvato ca vijjamāno vigatavalāhake ca ākāse sampuṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ viya paṇḍukambale nikkhittajātimaṇi viya ca parisuddho, tasmā vijjamānattā parisuddhattā ca ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.

[03]Upanetabboti ^b^opaneyyiko^eb^. Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – upanayanaṃ upanayo, ādittaṃ celaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi bhāvanāvasena attano citte upanayanaṃ uppādanaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko. Idaṃ saṅkhate lokuttaradhamme yujjati, asaṅkhato pana attano citte ārammaṇabhāvena upanayanaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko, sacchikiriyāvasena allīyanaṃ arahatīti attho ^a^V2.0068^ea^. Atha vā nibbānaṃ upaneti ariyapuggalanti ariyamaggo upaneyyo, sacchikātabbataṃ upanetabboti phalanibbānadhammo upaneyyo, upaneyyo eva ^b^opaneyyiko^eb^.

[03]Sabbehi ugghaṭitaññūādīhi viññūhi ‘‘bhāvito me maggo, adhigataṃ phalaṃ, sacchikato nirodho’’ti attani attani veditabboti ^b^paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhi^eb^. Na hi upajjhāyena bhāvitena maggena saddhivihārikassa kilesā pahīyanti, na so tassa phalasamāpattiyā phāsu viharati, na tena sacchikataṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti, tasmā na esa parassa sīse ābharaṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo, attano pana citteyeva daṭṭhabbo, anubhavitabbo viññūhīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Asaṅkhata^eb^nti ^a^M2.0077^ea^ saṅgamma samāgamma paccayasamodhānalakkhaṇena saṅgamena sannipatitvā anurūpehi paccayehi akataṃ anibbattitanti asaṅkhataṃ. Natthi ettha matanti ^b^amataṃ,^eb^ etasmiṃ vā adhigate natthi puggalassa mataṃ maraṇanti amataṃ. Kiñcāpi ettha ‘‘svākkhātaṃ dhammaṃ paccakkhāmī’’tiādinā sabbattha dhamma-saddappayogo dassito, tathāpi dhamma-saddena ayojetvā vutte vevacane na paccakkhānaṃ nāma na hotīti ‘‘svākkhātaṃ paccakkhāmī’’tiādinā vuttepi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ‘‘Svākkhātaṃ dhamma’’ntiādinā pana dhamma-saddappayogo svākkhātā-disaddānaṃ dhamma-visesanabhāvadassanatthaṃ katoti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Ekadhammakkhandhassapi nāma^eb^nti ettha ‘‘paṭhamadhammakkhandhaṃ dutiyadhammakkhandhaṃ pucchādhammakkhandhaṃ vissajjanādhammakkhandha’’ntiādinā dhammakkhandhanāmāni veditabbāni.

[03]^b^Suppaṭipanna^eb^nti svākkhāte dhammavinaye yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipannattā suppaṭipannaṃ. Majjhimāya paṭipadāya antadvayaṃ anupagamma paṭipannattā kāyavacīmanovaṅkakuṭilajimhadosappahānāya paṭipannattā ca ^b^ujuppaṭipannaṃ^eb^. Ñāyo vuccati nibbānaṃ ariyamaggādīhi ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati sacchikarīyatīti katvā, tadatthāya paṭipannattā ^b^ñāyappaṭipannaṃ^eb^. Yathā paṭipannā guṇasambhāvanāya parehi kariyamānaṃ paccuṭṭhānādisāmīcikammaṃ arahanti, tathā paṭipannattā ^b^sāmīcippaṭipannaṃ^eb^.

[03]Yugaḷavasena paṭhamamaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷanti evaṃ cattāri purisayugāni honti. Ettha pana ‘‘catupurisayugaṃ saṅgha’’nti vattabbe ‘‘cattārī’’ti vibhattilopaṃ akatvā niddeso katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Cattāri purisayugāni etthāti ^b^catupurisayugo^eb^ti hi saṅgho vuccati. ^b^Aṭṭhapurisapuggala^eb^nti ^a^V2.0069^ea^ purisapuggalavasena eko paṭhamamaggaṭṭho, eko phalaṭṭhoti iminā nayena aṭṭheva purisapuggalā honti. Aṭṭha purisapuggalā etthāti ^b^aṭṭhapurisapuggalo,^eb^ saṅgho. Ettha ca purisoti vā puggaloti vā ekatthānetāni padāni, veneyyavasena panetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Āhuneyya^eb^ntiādīsu (visuddhi. 1.156) ānetvā hunitabbanti āhunaṃ, dūratopi ānetvā sīlavantesu dātabbānaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ āhunaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yutto tassa mahapphalabhāvakaraṇatoti ^b^āhuneyyo,^eb^ saṅgho. Atha vā dūratopi āgantvā sabbasāpateyyampi ettha hunitabbanti ^a^M2.0078^ea^ āhavanīyo, sakkādīnampi vā āhavanaṃ arahatīti āhavanīyo. Yo cāyaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ āhavanīyo aggi, yattha hutaṃ mahapphalanti tesaṃ laddhi. Sace hutassa mahapphalatāya āhavanīyo, saṅghova āhavanīyo. Saṅghe hutañhi mahapphalaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
[21]‘‘Yo ca vassasataṃ jantu, aggiṃ paricare vane;
[27]Ekañca bhāvitattānaṃ, muhuttamapi pūjaye;
[22]Sāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ huta’’nti. (dha. pa. 107);
[03]Tadetaṃ nikāyantare ‘‘āhavanīyo’’ti padaṃ idha ‘‘āhuneyyo’’ti iminā padena atthato ekaṃ, byañjanato panettha kiñcimattameva nānaṃ.

[03]^b^Pāhuneyya^eb^nti ettha pana pāhunaṃ vuccati disāvidisato āgatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ ñātimittānaṃ atthāya sakkārena paṭiyattaṃ āgantukadānaṃ. Tampi ṭhapetvā te tathārūpe piyamittādike pāhunake saṅghasseva dātuṃ yuttaṃ, saṅghova taṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yutto. Saṅghasadiso hi pāhunako natthi. Tathā hesa ekabuddhantare vītivatteyeva dissati, abbokiṇṇañca piyamanāpattakarehi sīlādidhammehi samannāgatoti evaṃ pāhunamassa dātuṃ yuttaṃ, pāhunañca paṭiggahetuṃ yuttoti ^b^pāhuneyyo^eb^.

[03]Dakkhanti etāya sattā yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi vaḍḍhantīti dakkhiṇā, paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbadānaṃ. Taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ arahati, dakkhiṇāya vā hito yasmā naṃ mahapphalakaratāya visodhetīti ^b^dakkhiṇeyyo^eb^. Ubho hatthe sirasi patiṭṭhāpetvā sabbalokena kariyamānaṃ añjalikammaṃ arahatīti ^b^añjalikaraṇīyo. Anuttaraṃ puññakkhetta^eb^nti sabbalokassa asadisaṃ puññaviruhanaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^V2.0070^ea^. Yathā hi rañño vā amaccassa vā sālīnaṃ vā yavānaṃ vā viruhanaṭṭhānaṃ rañño sālikkhettaṃ yavakkhettanti vuccati, evaṃ saṅgho sabbalokassa puññānaṃ viruhanaṭṭhānaṃ. Saṅghaṃ nissāya hi lokassa nānappakārahitasukhasaṃvattanikāni puññāni viruhanti, tasmā saṅgho anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa. Etthāpi ‘‘suppaṭipannaṃ saṅgha’’ntiādinā sabbattha saṅgha-saddappayogo suppaṭipannā-disaddānaṃ saṅghavisesanabhāvadassanatthaṃ kato, tasmā ‘‘suppaṭipannaṃ paccakkhāmī’’tiādinā vuttepi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Sikkhāvevacanesu ^a^M2.0079^ea^ pana sikkhā-saddaṃ vinā kevalaṃ bhikkhu-saddo bhikkhunī-saddo ca sikkhāya adhivacanaṃ na hotīti ^b^‘‘bhikkhusikkhaṃ bhikkhunīsikkha’’^eb^nti vutteyeva sīsaṃ eti, adhisīlādayo pana sikkhā evāti ‘‘adhisīlaṃ paccakkhāmī’’tiādinā vuttepi sīsaṃ eti. ^b^Paṭhamaṃ pārājika^eb^ntiādinā sikkhāpadānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, na āpattīnaṃ.

[03]Upajjhāyavevacanesu upajjhāyo hutvā yo pabbājesi ceva upasampādesi ca, taṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘yo maṃ pabbājesī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Yassa mūlenā^eb^ti yassa padhānabhāvena kāraṇabhāvena vā. Yassa mūlaṃ padhānabhāvo kāraṇabhāvo vā etissāti ^b^yassamūlikā,^eb^ pabbajjā upasampadā ca. Mūla-saddassa sāpekkhabhāvepi niccasāpekkhatāya gamakattā taddhitavutti daṭṭhabbā.

[03]Ācariyavevacanesu pana yo upajjhaṃ adatvā ācariyova hutvā pabbājesi, kammavācācariyo hutvā upasampādesi ca, taṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘yo maṃ pabbājesi, yo maṃ anusāvesī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Imehi dvīhi vacanehi pabbajjācariyo ca upasampadācariyo ca dassito. ^b^Yāhaṃ nissāya vasāmī^eb^ti nissayācariyaṃ dasseti. ^b^Yāhaṃ uddisāpemī^eb^tiādinā pana dhammācariyo vutto. Tattha ^b^uddisāpemī^eb^ti pāṭhaṃ uddisāpemi. ^b^Paripucchāmī^eb^ti uggahitapāṭhassa atthaṃ paripucchāmi. Saddhivihārikavevacanādīsu ca vuttānusāreneva attho veditabbo. ^b^Tassa mūle^eb^ti ettha pana tassa santiketi attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Okallako^eb^ti khuppipāsādidukkhaparetānaṃ khīṇasukhānaṃ nahānādisarīrapaṭijagganarahitānaṃ kapaṇamanussānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^Moḷibaddho^eb^ti sikhābaddho omukkamakuṭo vā. Kiñcāpi dvevāciko upāsako paṭhamabodhiyaṃyeva sambhavati, tathāpi tadā labbhamānanāmaṃ gahetvā vuttepi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘dvevāciko upāsako’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Dvevāciko’’ti idameva ^a^V2.0071^ea^ panettha vevacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tasmā ‘‘dvevācikoti maṃ dhārehī’’ti ettakepi vutte sīsaṃ eti. Evaṃ sesesupi.

[03]^b^Kumārako^eb^ti ^a^M2.0080^ea^ kumārāvattho ativiya daharasāmaṇero. ^b^Cellako^eb^ti tato mahantataro khuddakasāmaṇero. ^b^Ceṭako^eb^ti majjhimo. ^b^Moḷigallo^eb^ti mahāsāmaṇero. ^b^Samaṇuddeso^eb^ti pana avisesato sāmaṇerādhivacanaṃ. ^b^Nigaṇṭhupaṭṭhāko^eb^tiādīnipi titthiyasāvakavevacanānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Dussīlo^eb^ti nissīlo sīlavirahito. ^b^Pāpadhammo^eb^ti dussīlattā eva hīnajjhāsayatāya lāmakasabhāvo. ^b^Asucisaṅkassarasamācāro^eb^ti aparisuddhakāyakammāditāya asuci hutvā saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro. Dussīlo hi kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā ‘‘idaṃ asukena kataṃ bhavissatī’’ti paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyo hoti. Kenacideva karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā ‘‘kacci nu kho ime mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī’’ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro. ^b^Paṭicchannakammanto^eb^ti lajjitabbatāya paṭicchādetabbakammanto. ^b^Assamaṇo^eb^ti na samaṇo. Salākaggahaṇādīsu ‘‘ahampi samaṇo’’ti micchāpaṭiññāya ^b^samaṇapaṭiñño,^eb^ aseṭṭhacāritāya ^b^abrahmacārī,^eb^ uposathādīsu ‘‘ahampi brahmacārī’’ti micchāpaṭiññāya ^b^brahmacāripaṭiñño,^eb^ pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā ^b^antopūti,^eb^ chahi dvārehi rāgādikilesānussavanena tintattā ^b^avassuto,^eb^ sañjātarāgādikacavarattā sīlavantehi chaḍḍetabbattā ca ^b^kasambujāto. Koṇṭho^eb^ti dussīlādhivacanametaṃ.

[03]‘‘Yāni vā panaññānipi atthi buddhavevacanāni vā’’tiādinā yaṃ-saddaparāmaṭṭhānaṃ buddhādivevacanānaṃyeva taṃ-saddena parāmasanaṃ hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘tehi ākārehi…pe… buddhādīnaṃ vevacanehī’’^eb^ti. Kathaṃ pana tāni ākārādisaddehi voharīyantīti āha ^b^‘‘vevacanāni hī’’^eb^tiādi. Saṇṭhānavantānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ saṇṭhānadīpanaṃ tāva hotu, saṇṭhānarahitānaṃ pana dhammasikkhādīnaṃ kathanti āha ^b^‘‘sikkhāpaccakkhānasaṇṭhānattā eva vā’’^eb^ti. Sikkhāpaccakkhānarūpāni hi vevacanāni ^b^‘‘sikkhāpaccakkhānasaṇṭhānānī’’^eb^ti vuccanti. ^b^Evaṃ kho^eb^ti ettha ^b^kho^eb^ti avadhāraṇatthe nipātoti āha ^b^‘‘evamevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^54^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mucchāpareto^eb^ti ^a^M2.0081^ea^ mucchāya abhibhūto. Vacanatthavijānanasamatthaṃ tiracchānagataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘nāgamāṇavakassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tihetukapaṭisandhikā^eb^ti yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ. Na hi sabbāpi devatā ^a^V2.0072^ea^ tihetukapaṭisandhikāva honti dvihetukānampi sambhavato. ^b^Atikhippaṃ jānantī^eb^ti devatānaṃ bhavaṅgaparivāsassa manussānaṃ viya adandhabhāvato vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Sabhāgassā^eb^ti purisassa. ^b^Visabhāgassā^eb^ti mātugāmassa. ^b^Anariyako^eb^ti māgadhavohārato añño. ^b^Davā^eb^ti sahasā. ^b^Ravā^eb^ti virajjhitvā. Aññaṃ bhaṇissāmīti aññaṃ bhaṇanto buddhaṃ paccakkhāmīti bhaṇatīti yojetabbaṃ. Akkharasamayānabhiññatāya vā karaṇasampattiyā abhāvato vā kathetabbaṃ kathetuṃ asakkonto hutvā aññaṃ kathento ravā bhaṇati nāma. Ubhayathāpi aññaṃ bhaṇitukāmassa aññabhaṇanaṃ samānanti āha ^b^‘‘purimena ko viseso’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Vācetī^eb^ti pāḷiṃ kathento aññaṃ uggaṇhāpento vā vāceti. ^b^Paripucchatī^eb^ti pāḷiyā atthaṃ paripucchanto pāḷiṃ paripucchati. ^b^Uggaṇhātī^eb^ti aññassa santike pāḷiṃ uggaṇhāti. ^b^Sajjhāyaṃ karotī^eb^ti uggahitapāḷiṃ sajjhāyati. ^b^Vaṇṇetī^eb^ti pāḷiyā atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇento pāḷiṃ vaṇṇeti. Mahallakassa kiñci ajānanato aviditindriyatāya vā ^b^‘‘potthakarūpasadisassā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, mattikāya katarūpasadisassāti attho. ^b^Garumedhassā^eb^ti ārammaṇesu lahuppavattiyā abhāvato dandhagatikatāya garupaññassa, mandapaññassāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Sabbaso vā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘idaṃ padaṃ sāvessāmi ‘sikkhaṃ paccakkhāmī’’’ti evaṃ pavattacittuppādassa abhāvaṃ dasseti. Yasmā pana asati evarūpe cittuppāde kenaci pariyāyena tathāvidhaṃ vacībhedaṃ katvā sāvanaṃ nāma neva sambhavati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmītiādīsu…pe… vacībhedaṃ katvā na sāvetī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Sikkhāpaccakkhānavibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^55^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Niddisitabbassā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0082^ea^ vivaritabbassa pakāsetabbassa. ^b^Kilesehī^eb^ti ahirikādīhi kilesehi. ^b^Ito paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti duṭṭhulla-padato paṭṭhāya. ^b^Tassa kammassā^eb^ti methunadhammapaṭisevanasaṅkhātassa kammassa. ^b^Dassana^eb^ntiādi vuttanayameva. ^b^Assā^eb^ti methunadhammassa.

[03]Dvīhi dvīhi samāpajjitabbā ^b^dvayaṃdvayasamāpattī^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘dvayena dvayena samāpajjitabbato’’^eb^ti. Rāgapariyuṭṭhānena sadisabhāvappattiyā mithunānaṃ idaṃ methunaṃ, methunameva dhammo ^b^methunadhammo^eb^ti ^a^V2.0073^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘ubhinnaṃ rattāna’’^eb^ntiādi. Tattha ^b^rattāna^eb^nti methunarāgena rattānaṃ. ^b^Sārattāna^eb^nti teneva rāgena ativiya rattānaṃ. ^b^Avassutāna^eb^nti lokassādamittasanthavavasena uppannamethunarāgena tintānaṃ. ^b^Pariyuṭṭhitāna^eb^nti methunarāguppattiyā pariyonaddhacittānaṃ. ^b^Sadisāna^eb^nti rattatādīhi sadisānaṃ.

[03]Yasmā ‘‘paṭisevati nāmā’’ti padaṃ mātikāya natthi, tasmā ‘‘paṭisevati nāmāti kasmā uddhaṭa’’nti yo maññati, tassa kāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘paṭiseveyyāti ettha…pe… mātikāpada’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Itthiyā nimittenā^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘maggena gacchatī’’tiādi viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā hi ‘‘maggena gacchatī’’ti vutte ‘‘maggaṃ gacchati, magge vā gacchatī’’ti ayamattho labbhati, evaṃ ‘‘itthiyā nimittena pavesetī’’ti vutte ‘‘itthiyā nimittaṃ paveseti, nimitte vā pavesetī’’ti ayamattho labbhati. Idañca yebhuyyena purisapayogadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Nimittaṃ aṅgajāta^eb^nti atthato ekaṃ. Pavesanaṃ nāma na bahi chupanamattanti āha ^b^‘‘vātena asamphuṭṭhe allokāse’’^eb^ti. Abbhantarañhi pavesento ‘‘pavesetī’’ti vuccati, na bahi chupanto. ^b^Abbhantara^eb^nti ca pakatiyā sabbaso pihitassa nimittassa vātena asamphuṭṭhokāso vuccatīti.

[03]Idāni sabbathā lesokāsapidahanatthaṃ itthinimitte purisanimitte ca labbhamānaṃ pavesakāle aññamaññaṃ phassārahaṃ padesavisesaṃ vibhajitvā dassento ^b^‘‘itthinimitte cattāri passānī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Vātena hi asamphuṭṭhe allokāse yattha katthaci ekenapi padesena chupitvā pavesento ‘‘pavesetī’’ti vuccati. ^b^Vemajjha^eb^nti yathā cattāri passāni asamphusanto paveseti, evaṃ katavivarassa itthinimittassa heṭṭhimatalaṃ vuccati ^a^M2.0083^ea^, purisanimitte pana ^b^majjha^eb^nti aggakoṭiṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Uparī^eb^ti aggakoṭito uparibhāgappadeso. Idañca majjhena samiñjitvā pavesentassa majjhimapabbasamiñjitaṅguliṃ katthaci pavesentassa aṅguliyā majjhimapabbapiṭṭhisadisaṃ aṅgajātassa uparibhāgavemajjhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Heṭṭhā pavesento^eb^ti itthinimittassa heṭṭhimabhāgena chupantaṃ pavesento. ^b^Majjhena pavesento^eb^ti abbhantaratalaṃ chupitvā majjhena pavesento. Katthaci acchupantaṃ pavesetvā nīharantassa hi natthi pārājikaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ pana hoti chinnasīsavatthusmiṃ vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ pavesetvā nīharantassa viya. ^b^Majjheneva chupantaṃ pavesento^eb^ti aggakoṭiyā chupantaṃ pavesento. Majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā samiñjitaṅgulinti sambandho. Atha vā samiñjitaṅguliṃ majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā pavesento viyāti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Saṅkocetvā^eb^ti nimittamajjhena bhinditvā. ^b^Uparibhāgenā^eb^ti saṅkocitassa uparibhāgakoṭiyā. Idāni purisanimittassa heṭṭhā vuttesu chasu ṭhānesu uparīti vuttaṭṭhānantarassa vasena visuṃ cattāri ^a^V2.0074^ea^ passāni gahetvā purisanimitte dasadhā ṭhānabhedaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Heṭṭhā pana visuṃ tāni aggahetvā ‘‘cattāri passānī’’ti vacanasāmaññatopi visuṃ visuṃ labbhamānāni ekaccaṃ gahetvā cha ṭhānāni vuttāni. ^b^Tulādaṇḍasadisaṃ pavesentassā^eb^ti ujukaṃ pavesentassa.

[03]^b^Nimitte jāta^eb^nti attano nimitte jātaṃ. ^b^Cammakhīla^eb^nti nimitte uṭṭhitaṃ cammameva. ‘‘Uṇṇigaṇḍo’’tipi vadanti. Nimitte jātampi cammakhīlādi nimittamevāti āha ^b^‘‘āpatti pārājikassā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Upahatakāyappasāda’’nti avatvā ^b^‘‘naṭṭhakāyappasāda’’^eb^nti vacanaṃ upādinnabhāvassa natthitādassanatthaṃ. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘matacammaṃ vā sukkhapīḷakaṃ vā’’^eb^ti. Sati hi upādinnabhāve upahatepi kāyappasāde upahatindriyavatthusmiṃ viya pārājikāpattiyeva siyā, matacammaṃ pana sukkhapīḷakañca anupādinnakaṃ upādinnakeyeva ca pārājikāpatti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘āpatti dukkaṭassā’’^eb^ti. Na ca evaṃ karontassa anāpatti sakkā vattunti dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, itthinimittassa pana naṭṭhepi upādinnabhāve pārājikāpattiyeva. Mate akkhāyite yebhuyyena akkhāyite pārājikāpattivacanato ^b^methunassādenā^eb^ti iminā kāyasaṃsaggarāgaṃ nivatteti. Sati hi kāyasaṃsaggarāge saṅghādisesova siyā, bījānipi nimittasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchantīti dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ. ‘‘Nimittena nimittaṃ pavesetī’’ti hi vuttaṃ.

[03]Idāni ^a^M2.0084^ea^ imissā methunakathāya asabbhirūpattā ‘‘īdisaṃ ṭhānaṃ kathentehi suṇantehi ca evaṃ paṭipajjitabba’’nti anusāsanto ^b^‘‘ayañca methunakathā nāmā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Methunakathāya rāgavuddhihetuttā hāsavisayattā ca tadubhayanivattanatthaṃ paṭikūlamanasikārādīsu niyojeti. Paṭikūlamanasikārena hi rāgo nivattati, samaṇasaññādīsu paccupaṭṭhitesu hāso nivattati. ^b^Sattānuddayāyā^eb^ti sattānaṃ apāyadukkhādīhi anurakkhaṇatthaṃ. ^b^Lokānukampāyā^eb^ti sattalokavisayāya anukampāya.

[03]^b^Mukhaṃ apidhāyā^eb^ti mukhaṃ apidahitvā, yena kenaci pamādena kadāci mandahāso bhaveyya, tadā garuttaṃ kuppeyya, tasmā tādise kāle garubhāvassa avikopanatthaṃ bījakena mukhaṃ paṭicchādetvā nisīditabbanti adhippāyo. Atha vā ^b^mukhaṃ apidhāyā^eb^ti mukhaṃ pidahitvāti attho. Bījakena mukhaṃ paṭicchādetvā hasamānena na nisīditabbanti ayamettha adhippāyo. ^b^Dantavidaṃsaka^eb^nti dante dassetvā vivaritvā cāti attho. ^b^Gabbhitenā^eb^ti saṅkocaṃ anāpajjantena, ussāhajātenāti attho. Yadi hi ‘‘īdisaṃ nāma asabbhiṃ kathemī’’ti saṅkocaṃ ^a^V2.0075^ea^ āpajjeyya, atthavibhāvanaṃ na siyā, tasmā ‘‘tādisena sammāsambuddhenapi tāva īdisaṃ kathitaṃ, kimaṅgaṃ panāhaṃ kathemī’’ti evaṃ ussāhajātena kathetabbanti adhippāyo. ^b^Satthupaṭibhāgenā^eb^ti satthukappena, satthusadisenāti attho.
[06]Mūlapaññattivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Tiracchānesu gatāyā^eb^ti tiracchānesu uppannāya. Yasmā tiracchānagatā nāma atikhuddakāpi honti, yesaṃ maggesu tilaphalamattampi pavesanaṃ nappahoti, tasmā na sabbāva tiracchānagatitthiyo pārājikavatthubhūtāti pavesanappahonakavasena labbhamānakatiracchānagatitthiyo paricchinditvā dassento ^b^‘‘pārājikavatthubhūtā eva cetthā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Apadānaṃ ahimacchā^eb^tiādigāthā pārājikavatthūnaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedadassanatthaṃ porāṇehi ṭhapitā. Tattha ^b^ahī^eb^ti jātiniddesena sabbāpi ^a^M2.0085^ea^ sappajāti saṅgahitāti āha – ^b^‘‘ahiggahaṇena…pe… dīghajāti saṅgahitā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^gonasā^eb^ti sappavisesā, yesaṃ piṭṭhīsu mahantāni maṇḍalāni sandissanti. ^b^Maccha^eb^ggahaṇaṃ odakajātiyā upalakkhaṇapadanti āha – ^b^‘‘macchaggahaṇena…pe… odakajāti saṅgahitā’’^eb^ti. Teneva maṇḍūkakacchapānaṃ sapādakattepi odakajātikattā saṅgaho kato.

[03]^b^Mukhasaṇṭhāna^eb^nti oṭṭhacammasaṇṭhānaṃ. ^b^Vaṇasaṅkhepaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti vaṇasaṅgahaṃ gacchati navasu vaṇamukhesu saṅgahitattāti adhippāyo. Vaṇe thullaccayañca ‘‘amaggena amaggaṃ paveseti, āpatti thullaccayassā’’ti imassa vasena veditabbaṃ. Tasmiñhi sutte dvīsu sambhinnavaṇesu ekena vaṇena pavesetvā dutiyena nīharantassa thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ. Vakkhati ca ‘‘imassa suttassa anulomavasena sabbattha vaṇasaṅkhepe thullaccayaṃ veditabba’’nti (pārā. aṭṭha. 1.66). ^b^Kukkuṭi^eb^ggahaṇampi sabbāya pakkhijātiyā upalakkhaṇapadanti āha – ^b^‘‘kukkuṭiggahaṇena…pe… pakkhijāti saṅgahitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Majjāri^eb^ggahaṇampi catuppadajātiyā upalakkhaṇapadanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘majjāriggahaṇena…pe… catuppadajāti saṅgahitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rukkhasunakhā^eb^ nāma kalandakātipi vadanti. ^b^Maṅgusā^eb^ti naṅgulā.

[03]Parājita-saddo upasaggassa vuddhiṃ katvā ta-kārassa ca ka-kāraṃ katvā ^b^pārājiko^eb^ti niddiṭṭhoti āha ^b^‘‘pārājikoti parājito’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Katthaci āpattī^eb^ti ‘pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyyā’tiādīsu ^a^V2.0076^ea^ (pārā. 384, 391), ^b^katthaci sikkhāpada^eb^nti idaṃ pana disvā jānitabba’’nti ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Parājayatīti pārājikaṃ, pārājikāti ca kattusādhanena pārājika-saddena sikkhāpadaṃ āpatti ca vuccatīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘yo taṃ atikkamatī’’^eb^tiādi. Puggalo pana kammasādhanena pārājika-saddena vuccatīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘puggalo yasmā parājito’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Etameva hi atthaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti ‘‘taṃ āpattiṃ āpanno puggalo parājito hoti parājayamāpanno’’ti etamatthaṃ sandhāya. ^b^Cuto paraddho^eb^tiādinā hi taṃ āpattiṃ āpannapuggalo cuto hoti parājito parājayaṃ āpannoti ayamattho viññāyati, na pana puggalo pārājiko nāma hotīti etamatthaṃ sandhāyāti evamattho gahetabbo. Na hi ^b^parivāre^eb^pi gāthā puggalavuttipārājikasaddanibbacanadassanatthaṃ vuttā ^a^M2.0086^ea^ āpattivuttīnaṃ pārājikā-disaddānaṃ nibbacanavibhāgappasaṅge vuttattā. Ayañhi parivāragāthāya attho (pari. aṭṭha. 339) – yadidaṃ puggalāpattisikkhāpadapārājikesu āpattipārājikaṃ nāma vuttaṃ, taṃ āpajjanto puggalo yasmā parājito parājayamāpanno saddhamā cuto paraddho bhaṭṭho niraṅkato ca hoti, anīhaṭe tasmiṃ puggale puna uposathapavāraṇādibhedo saṃvāso natthi, ^b^tenetaṃ iti vuccati^eb^ tena kāraṇena etaṃ āpattipārājikaṃ iti vuccatīti. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – yasmā parājito hoti etena, tasmā etaṃ pārājikanti vuccatīti. ^b^Paribhaṭṭho^eb^ti sāsanato bhaṭṭho, parihīnoti attho. ^b^Chinno^eb^ti antarā khaṇḍito.

[03]^b^Saddhiṃ yojanāyā^eb^ti padayojanāya saddhiṃ. ^b^Catubbidhaṃ saṅghakamma^eb^nti apalokanādivasena catubbidhaṃ kammaṃ. ^b^Sīmāparicchinnehī^eb^ti ekasīmāpariyāpannehi. ^b^Pakatattā^eb^ nāma pārājikaṃ anāpannā anukkhittā ca. ^b^Pañcavidhopī^eb^ti nidānuddesādivasena pañcavidhopi. Nahāpitapubbakānaṃ viya odhisaanuññātaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ sabbampi sikkhāpadaṃ sabbehipi lajjīpuggalehi anatikkamanīyattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sabbehipi lajjīpuggalehi samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sama^eb^nti saddhiṃ, ekappahārena vā. ^b^Sikkhitabbabhāvato^eb^ti anatikkamanavasena uggahaparipucchādinā ca sikkhitabbabhāvato. Sāmaññasikkhāpadesu ‘‘idaṃ tayā na sikkhitabba’’nti evaṃ abahikātabbato ^b^‘‘na ekopi tato bahiddhā sandissatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ taṃ vuttanti sambandho.

[03]^b^56^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na kevalaṃ itthiyā eva nimittaṃ pārājikavatthū^eb^ti iminā kevalaṃ itthiyā eva nimittaṃ ^a^V2.0077^ea^ pārājikavatthu na hoti, atha kho ubhatobyañjanakapaṇḍakapurisānampi nimittaṃ pārājikavatthūti dasseti. ^b^Na ca manussitthiyā evā^eb^ti iminā pana manussitthiyā eva nimittaṃ pārājikavatthu na hoti, amanussitthitiracchānagatitthiamanussubhatobyañjanakādīnampi nimittaṃ pārājikavatthūti dasseti. ^b^‘‘Vatthumeva na hotī^eb^ti amanussitthipasaṅgena āgataṃ suvaṇṇarajatādimayaṃ paṭikkhipatī’’ti ^b^tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ viya na dissati. Na hi ito pubbe amanussitthiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ atthi, yena tappasaṅgo siyā. Idāneva hi ‘‘tisso itthiyo’’tiādinā amanussitthiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, na ca amanussitthiggahaṇena suvaṇṇarajatādimayānaṃ ^a^M2.0087^ea^ pasaṅgo yutto. Manussāmanussatiracchānajātivasena tividhā katvā pārājikavatthubhūtasattānaṃ niddesena suvaṇṇarajatādimayānaṃ pasaṅgassa nivattitattā. Tathā hi itthipurisādīsu manussāmanussādīsu vā kañci anāmasitvā avisesena ‘‘methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā’’ti ettakameva mātikāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tassa padabhājane ca ‘‘paṭisevati nāmā’’ti mātikaṃ padaṃ uddharitvā ‘‘yo nimittena nimittaṃ aṅgajātena aṅgajātaṃ antamaso tilaphalamattampi paveseti, eso paṭisevati nāmā’’ti paṭisevanākārova dassito, na pana pārājikavatthubhūtanimittanissayā manussāmanussatiracchānagatā itthipurisapaṇḍakaubhatobyañjanakā niyametvā dassitā, tasmā ‘‘itthiyā eva nu kho nimittaṃ pārājikavatthu, udāhu aññesampī’’ti evamādi sandeho siyā, nimittavohāro ca suvaṇṇarajatādimayarūpakesu ca labbhatiyeva. Teneva ^b^vinītavatthūsu^eb^ (pārā. 71) ‘‘lepacittassa nimittaṃ aṅgajātena chupi, dārudhītalikāya nimittaṃ aṅgajātena chupī’’ti vuttaṃ, tasmā nimittasāmaññato ‘‘suvaṇṇarajatādimayānampi nimittaṃ pārājikavatthu hoti, na hotī’’ti kassaci āsaṅkā siyā. Teneva ‘‘lepacittādivatthūsu tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosī’’ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ pārājikavatthubhūtasattaniyamanatthañca jātivasena manussāmanussādito tidhā katvā pārājikavatthubhūte satte bhagavā vibhajitvā dasseti, tasmā ‘‘vatthumeva na hotī’’ti nimittasāmaññato pasaṅgāgataṃ suvaṇṇarajatādimayānaṃ nimittaṃ paṭikkhipatīti vattabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Tayo magge^eb^ti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘tīsu maggesūti attho veditabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Evaṃ sabbatthā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘dve magge’’ti etthāpi dvīsu maggesūti attho veditabboti atidissati.
[06]Anupaññattivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^57^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Assā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0078^ea^ ākhyātikapadanti tassa atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘hotī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ pana ‘‘assāti puggalaṃ parāmasitvā hotīti ^a^M2.0088^ea^ vacanaseso dassito’’tipi atthavikappo dassito, na so sundarataro. Yadi hi vacanaseso adhippeto siyā, ‘‘hotī’’ti vattabbaṃ, teneva aññasmiṃ atthavikappe hotīti vacanaseso kato.

[03]^b^58^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sādiyantassevā^eb^ti ettha sādiyanaṃ nāma sevetukāmatācittassa upaṭṭhāpananti āha ^b^‘‘paṭisevanacittasamaṅgissā’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Paṭipakkhaṃ atthayantī^eb^ti sikkhākāmānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ dussīlabhāvaṃ atthayantī’’ti ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Attano veripuggalassa pana paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ kañci amittaṃ atthayanti gavesantīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Paccatthikā hi attano veriṃ nāsetukāmā tassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ kañci amittaṃ attano sahāyabhāvamupagacchantaṃ icchanti. Rājapaccatthikādīnaṃ upari vakkhamānattā tadanurūpavasena atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘bhikkhū eva paccatthikā bhikkhupaccatthikā’’^eb^ti āha. ‘‘Bhikkhussa paccatthikā bhikkhupaccatthikā’’ti evaṃ pana vuccamāne bhikkhussa paccatthikā rājādayopi ettheva saṅgayhantīti rājapaccatthikādayo visuṃ na vattabbā siyuṃ, aññattha pana bhikkhussa paccatthikā bhikkhupaccatthikāti ayamattho labbhateva ‘‘sāsanapaccatthikā’’ti yathā. ^b^Issāpakatā^eb^ti paresaṃ lābhasakkārādiasahanalakkhaṇāya issāya abhibhūtā. ^b^Nipparipphanda^eb^nti paripphandavirahitaṃ, yathā calituṃ parivattituṃ na sakkoti, tathā gahetvāti attho. ^b^Sampayojentī^eb^ti vaccamaggena saddhiṃ yojenti.

[03]^b^Tasmiṃ khaṇe^eb^ti tasmiṃ pavesanakkhaṇe, aggato yāva mūlā pavesanakālo ‘‘pavesanakkhaṇo’’ti vuccati. Sādiyanaṃ nāma sevanacittassa uppādananti āha ^b^‘‘sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhāpetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paviṭṭhakāle^eb^ti aṅgajātassa yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pavesanārahaṃ, tattakaṃ anavasesato paviṭṭhakāle. Evaṃ paviṭṭhassa uddharaṇārambhato antarā ṭhitakālo ^b^ṭhitaṃ^eb^ nāma. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mātugāmassa sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ patvā sabbathā vāyamato oramitvā ṭhitakālaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘sukkavissaṭṭhisamaye’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Uddharaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma yāva aggā nīharaṇakāloti āha – ^b^‘‘nīharaṇakāle paṭisevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhāpetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aṅgārakāsu^eb^nti aṅgārarāsiṃ. Evarūpe kāle asādiyanaṃ nāma na sabbesaṃ visayoti āha ^b^‘‘imañhi evarūpaṃ āraddhavipassaka’’^eb^ntiādi ^a^M2.0089^ea^. ^b^Ekādasahi aggīhī^eb^ti rāgadosamohajātijarāmaraṇasokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsasaṅkhātehi ekādasahi aggīhi. Rāgādayo hi anuḍahanaṭṭhena ‘‘aggī’’ti vuccanti. Te hi yassa santi ^a^V2.0079^ea^, taṃ niḍahanti, mahāpariḷāhā ca honti dunnibbāpayā ca. Bhagavatā ca dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggaho icchitoyevāti āha – ^b^‘‘paccatthikānañcassa manorathavighātaṃ karonto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Assā^eb^ti asādiyantassa yathāvuttaguṇasamaṅgissa.
[06]Paṭhamacatukkakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^59-60^eb^^b^.^eb^ Akkhāyitanimittā akkhāyita-saddena vuttā uttarapadalopenāti āha ^b^‘‘soṇasiṅgālādīhi akkhāyitanimitta’’^eb^nti. Akkhāyitaṃ nimittaṃ yassā sā ^b^akkhāyitanimittā^eb^. ‘‘Jāgaranti’’ntiādi visesanarahitattā ^b^‘‘suddhikacatukkānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Samānācariyakā therā^eb^ti ekācariyassa pāṭhakantevāsikā. ^b^Mahābhaye^eb^ti brāhmaṇatissabhaye. Gaṅgāya aparabhāgo ^b^aparagaṅgaṃ^eb^. ^b^Vata re^eb^ti garahatthe nipāto. Avissajjantena kiṃ kattabbanti āha ^b^‘‘niccakālaṃ sotabba’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Evaṃ vinayagarukāna^eb^nti iminā upari tehi vuccamānavinicchayassa garukaraṇīyatāya kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbaṃ pariyādiyitvā^eb^ti sabbaṃ pārājikakkhettaṃ anavasesato gahetvā. ^b^Sotaṃ chinditvā^eb^ti pārājikakkhette vītikkamasotaṃ chinditvā. Apaññattabhāvato yuttiabhāvato ca ^b^‘‘pārājikacchāyā panettha na dissatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘upaḍḍhakkhāyitabhāvassa dubbinicchayattā tattha pārājikaṃ na paññapesī’’ti vadanti, taṃ akāraṇaṃ, na ca dubbinicchayatā apaññattikāraṇaṃ yebhuyyakkhāyitādīsupi dubbinicchayabhāvassa samānattā. Upaḍḍhakkhāyitato hi kiñcideva adhikaṃ ūnaṃ vā yadi khāyitaṃ siyā, tampi yebhuyyena khāyitaṃ akkhāyitanti saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti upaḍḍhakkhāyitamiva yebhuyyakkhāyitādīnipi dubbinicchayāneva. Apica upaḍḍhakkhāyitaṃ yadi sabhāvato ^a^M2.0090^ea^ pārājikakkhettaṃ siyā, na tattha bhagavā dubbinicchayanti pārājikaṃ na paññapeti.

[03]Idāni therena katavinicchayameva upatthambhetvā aparampi tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Nimitte appamattikāpi maṃsarāji sace avasiṭṭhā hoti, taṃ ^b^yebhuyyakkhāyita^eb^meva hoti, tato paraṃ pana sabbaso khāyite nimitte dukkaṭamevāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘tato paraṃ thullaccayaṃ natthī’’^eb^ti. Atha vā ^b^yebhuyyena khāyitaṃ^eb^ nāma vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhānaṃ catūsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāse atikkamma yāva tatiyakoṭṭhāsassa pariyosānā ^a^V2.0080^ea^ khāditaṃ, tato paraṃ pana tatiyakoṭṭhāsaṃ atikkamma yāva catutthakoṭṭhāsassa pariyosānā khāditaṃ dukkaṭavatthūti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Matasarīrasmiṃyeva veditabba^eb^nti ‘‘mataṃ yebhuyyena akkhāyita’’ntiādivacanato. ^b^‘‘Yadipi nimittaṃ sabbaso khāyita^eb^ntiādi sabbaṃ jīvamānakasarīrameva sandhāya vutta’’nti ^b^mahāgaṇṭhipade^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Kenaci^eb^ pana ‘‘taṃ vīmaṃsitvā gahetabba’’nti likhitaṃ. Kimettha vīmaṃsitabbaṃ jīvamānakasarīrasseva adhikatattā matasarīre labbhamānassa vinicchayassa visuṃ vakkhamānattā ca. Teneva ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanā) –

[08]‘‘Jīvamānakasarīrassa vuttappakāre magge sacepi tacādīni anavasesetvā sabbaso chinne nimittasaṇṭhānamattaṃ paññāyati, tattha antamaso aṅgajāte uṭṭhikaṃ anaṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ pīḷakaṃ vā cammakhīlaṃ vā pavesentassapi sevanacitte sati pārājikaṃ, naṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ sukkhapīḷakaṃ vā matacammaṃ vā lomaṃ vā pavesentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Sace nimittasaṇṭhānamattampi anavasesetvā sabbaso maggo uppāṭito, tattha upakkamato vaṇasaṅkhepavasena thullaccaya’’nti –
[07]Jīvamānakasarīrasmiṃyeva yathāvuttavinicchayo dassito.

[03]^b^Sabbaso khāyita^eb^nti nimittappadese bahiṭṭhitaṃ chavicammaṃ sabbaso chinditvā soṇasiṅgālādīhi khāyitasadisaṃ kataṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘chavicammaṃ natthī’’^eb^ti. Nimittamaṃsassa pana abbhantare chavicammassa ca vijjamānattā ^b^‘‘nimittasaṇṭhānaṃ paññāyatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘pavesanaṃ jāyatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nimittasaṇṭhānaṃ pana^eb^^a^M2.0091^ea^^b^anavasesetvā^eb^ti nimittākārena ṭhitaṃ chavicammamaṃsādiṃ anavasesetvā. Jīvamānakasarīre labbhamānavisesaṃ dassetvā idāni matasarīre labbhamānavisesaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘matasarīre panā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Manussānaṃ jīvamānakasarīre^eb^tiādinā pana akkhiādayopi vaṇasaṅgahaṃ gacchantīti vaṇena ekaparicchedaṃ katvā akkhiādīsupi thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ. Tesañca vaṇasaṅgaho ‘‘navadvāro mahāvaṇo’’ti (mi. pa. 2.6.1) evamādisuttānusārena veditabbo. Tiracchānagatānaṃ akkhikaṇṇavaṇesu dukkaṭaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāppamāṇena gahetabbaṃ. Yathā hi manussāmanussatiracchānagatesu vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhānaṃ pārājikavatthubhāve nānākaraṇaṃ natthi, evaṃ akkhiādīnampi thullaccayādivatthubhāve ninnānākaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ. Vaṇe thullaccayañca ‘‘amaggena ^a^V2.0081^ea^ amaggaṃ paveseti, āpatti thullaccayassā’’ti (pārā. 66) sāmaññato vuttaṃ, na pana ‘‘manussāna’’nti visesanaṃ atthi. Yadi ca tiracchānagatānaṃ vaṇesu thullaccayena na bhavitabbaṃ, pataṅgamukhamaṇḍūkassa mukhasaṇṭhāne vaṇasaṅkhepato thullaccayaṃ na vattabbaṃ, vuttañca, tasmā aṭṭhakathācariyā evettha pamāṇaṃ. Bhagavato adhippāyaññuno hi aṭṭhakathācariyā. Teneva vuttaṃ ‘‘buddhena dhammo vinayo ca vutto, yo tassa puttehi tatheva ñāto’’tiādi (pārā. aṭṭha. 1.). ^b^Manussāna^eb^nti itthipurisapaṇḍakaubhatobyañjanakānaṃ sāmaññato vuttaṃ. ^b^Vatthikosesū^eb^ti vatthipuṭesu purisānaṃ aṅgajātakosesu. Matasarīraṃ yāva uddhumātakādibhāvena kuthitaṃ na hoti, tāva allasarīranti veditabbaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘yadā pana sarīraṃ uddhumātakaṃ hotī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Pārājikavatthuñca thullaccayavatthuñca vijahatī^eb^ti ettha pārājikavatthubhāvaṃ thullaccayavatthubhāvañca vijahatīti attho veditabbo. Matānaṃ tiracchānagatānanti sambandho.

[03]Methunarāgena vatthikosaṃ pavesentassa thullaccayaṃ vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘patthikosaṃ appavesento’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itthiyā appavesento^eb^ti itthiyā nimittaṃ appavesento. ^b^Appavesento^eb^ti ca pavesanādhippāyassa abhāvaṃ dasseti. Pavesanādhippāyena bahi chupantassa pana methunassa pubbapayogattā dukkaṭeneva bhavitabbaṃ. ^b^Nimittena nimittaṃ chupati, thullaccaya^eb^nti idaṃ ‘‘na ca, bhikkhave, rattacittena aṅgajātaṃ chupitabbaṃ, yo chupeyya, āpatti thullaccayassā’’ti ^a^M2.0092^ea^ (mahāva. 252) imassa suttassa vasena vuttaṃ. Tattha ca kesañci aññathāpi atthavikappassa vidhiṃ dassento ^b^‘‘mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha kiñcāpi ‘‘katvā mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ sarīra’’nti (pārā. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā) vuttaṃ, tathāpi sesaaṭṭhakathāsu ‘‘methunarāgena mukhenā’’ti vacanassa abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā’’ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Aṅgajātenā’’ti avuttattā ^b^‘‘avisesenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Idāni mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ pāḷiyā saṃsanditvā dassento ^b^‘‘yaṃ tāva mahāaṭṭhakathāya’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Itarathā hi dukkaṭaṃ siyā^eb^ti pakatimukhena chupantassa visāṇādiggahaṇe viya dukkaṭaṃ siyā. Evaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ pāḷiyā saṃsanditvā idāni tattha kesañci aññathā atthavikappaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘keci panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Saṅghādiseso^eb^ti kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpadena saṅghādiseso. ^b^Vuttanayenevā^eb^ti methunarāgeneva. ‘‘Nimittamukhenā’’ti vuttattā tiracchānagatitthiyā passāvamaggaṃ methunarāgena pakatimukhena chupantassa dukkaṭanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Kāyasaṃsaggarāgena dukkaṭa^eb^nti nimittamukhena vā pakatimukhena vā kāyasaṃsaggarāgena chupantassa dukkaṭameva.
[06]Ekūnasattatidvisatacatukkakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^61-2^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭipannakassā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0082^ea^ āraddhavipassakassa. ^b^Upādinnaka^eb^nti kāyindriyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Upādinnakena phusatī^eb^ti upādinnakena phusīyati ghaṭṭīyatīti evaṃ kammani ya-kāralopena attho veditabbo. Atha vā evaṃ karonto kiñci upādinnakaṃ upādinnakena na phusati na ghaṭṭetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Lesaṃ oḍḍessantī^eb^ti lesaṃ samuṭṭhāpessanti, parikappessantīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Santhatādibhedehi bhinditvā^eb^ti santhatādivisesanehi visesetvā, santhatādīhi catūhi yojetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Santhatāyā^eb^ti ekadese samudāyavohāro ‘‘paṭo daḍḍho’’tiādīsu viya. Tathā hi paṭassa ekadesepi daḍḍhe ‘‘paṭo daḍḍho’’ti voharanti ^a^M2.0093^ea^, evaṃ itthiyā vaccamaggādīsu kismiñci magge santhate itthī ‘‘santhatā’’ti vuccati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘santhatā nāmā’’^eb^tiādi. Vatthādīni anto appavesetvā bahi ṭhapetvā bandhanaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘paliveṭhetvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Ekadese samudāyavohāravaseneva bhikkhupi ‘‘santhato’’ti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘santhato nāmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yattake paviṭṭhe^eb^ti tilaphalamatte paviṭṭhe. Akkhiādimhi santhatepi yathāvatthukamevāti āha ^b^‘‘thullaccayakkhette thullaccayaṃ, dukkaṭakkhette dukkaṭameva hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Khāṇuṃ ghaṭṭentassa dukkaṭa^eb^nti itthinimittassa anto khāṇuṃ pavesetvā samatalaṃ atirittaṃ vā khāṇuṃ ghaṭṭentassa dukkaṭaṃ pavesābhāvato. Sace pana īsakaṃ anto pavisitvā ṭhitaṃ khāṇukameva aṅgajātena chupati, pārājikameva. ^b^Tassa tala^eb^nti veḷunaḷādikassa antotalaṃ. Vinītavatthūsu ‘‘tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sīvathikaṃ gantvā chinnasīsaṃ passitvā vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ pavesesi. Tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosi…pe… anāpatti bhikkhu pārājikassa, āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti vuttattā tassa suttassa anulomato ^b^‘‘ākāsagatameva katvā pavesetvā nīharati, dukkaṭa’’^eb^nti (pārā. 73) vuttaṃ. ^b^Bahiddhā khāṇuke^eb^ti antopavesitaveṇupabbādikassa bahi nikkhantakhāṇuke. Methunarāgena indriyabaddhaānindriyabaddhasantānesu yattha katthaci upakkamantassa na sakkā anāpattiyā bhavitunti ^b^‘‘dukkaṭamevā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Teneva vinītavatthumhi aṭṭhikesu upakkamantassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
[06]Santhatacatukkabhedakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^65^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sāmaññajotanāya ^a^V2.0083^ea^ pakaraṇato visesavinicchayoti āha ^b^‘‘dhuttāti methunupasaṃhitakhiḍḍāpasutā’’^eb^tiādi. Idāni sāmaññatopi atthasambhavaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘itthidhuttasurādhuttādayo vā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Hadaya^eb^nti hadayamaṃsaṃ.
[06]Sabbākārena catukkabhedakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^66^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭiññākaraṇaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0094^ea^^b^natthī^eb^ti pucchitabbābhāvato. Na hi dūsako ‘‘kena cittena vītikkamaṃ akāsi, jānitvā akāsi, udāhu ajānitvā’’ti evaṃ pucchāya arahati. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti vesāliyaṃ mahāvane eva. ^b^Sabbaṅgagata^eb^nti ṭhapetvā kesalomadantanakhānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānañceva thaddhasukkhacammañca udakamiva telabindu avasesasabbasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ. ^b^Sarīrakampādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena akkhīnaṃ pītavaṇṇādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Pittakosake ṭhita^eb^nti hadayapapphāsānaṃ antare yakanamaṃsaṃ nissāya patiṭṭhite mahākosātakīkosasadise pittakose ṭhitaṃ. ^b^Kupite^eb^ti pittakosato calitvā bahi nikkhante.

[03]^b^Vissaṭṭhacitto^eb^ti vissaṭṭhapakaticitto. ^b^Yakkhummattako^eb^ti yakkhā kira yassa cittaṃ khipitukāmā honti, tassa setamukhaṃ nīlodaraṃ surattahatthapādaṃ mahāsīsaṃ pajjalitanettaṃ bheravaṃ vā attabhāvaṃ nimminitvā dassenti, bheravaṃ vā saddaṃ sāventi, kathentasseva vā mukhena hatthaṃ pakkhipitvā hadayamaṃsaṃ maddanti, tena so satto ummattako hoti khittacitto. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘bheravāni vā ārammaṇāni dassetvā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^bheravānī^eb^ti dassanamatteneva sattānaṃ bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetuṃ samatthāni. ^b^Niccameva ummattako hotī^eb^ti yassa pittakosato pittaṃ calitvā bahi nikkhantaṃ hoti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yassa pana pittaṃ calitvā pittakoseyeva ṭhitaṃ hoti bahi anikkhantaṃ, so antarantarā saññaṃ paṭilabhati, na niccameva ummattako hotīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Ñatvā^eb^ti saññāpaṭilābhena jānitvā. ^b^Adhimattāyā^eb^ti adhikappamāṇāya.
[06]Āpattānāpattivāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Padabhājanīyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Pakiṇṇaka^eb^nti ^a^V2.0084^ea^ vomissakanayaṃ. ^b^Samuṭṭhāna^eb^nti uppattikāraṇaṃ. ^b^Kiriyā^eb^tiādi nidassanamattaṃ, akiriyādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Vedanāyā^eb^ti sahayoge karaṇavacanaṃ, vedanāya saha kusalañcāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Sabbasaṅgāhakavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0095^ea^ sabbesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ saṅgāhakavasena. ^b^Cha sikkhāpadasamuṭṭhānānī^eb^ti kāyo vācā kāyavācā kāyacittaṃ vācācittaṃ kāyavācācittanti evaṃ vuttāni cha āpattisamuṭṭhānāni. Āpattiyeva hi sikkhāpadasīsena vuttā. Samuṭṭhānādayo hi āpattiyā honti, na sikkhāpadassa, imesu pana chasu samuṭṭhānesu purimāni tīṇi acittakāni, pacchimāni sacittakāni. Tesu ekena vā dvīhi vā tīhi vā catūhi vā chahi vā samuṭṭhānehi āpattiyo samuṭṭhahanti, pañcasamuṭṭhānā āpatti nāma natthi. Tattha ^b^ekasamuṭṭhānā^eb^ catutthena ca pañcamena ca chaṭṭhena ca samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti, na aññena. ^b^Dvisamuṭṭhānā^eb^ paṭhamacatutthehi ca dutiyapañcamehi ca tatiyachaṭṭhehi ca catutthachaṭṭhehi ca pañcamachaṭṭhehi ca samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, na aññehi. ^b^Tisamuṭṭhānā^eb^ paṭhamehi ca tīhi, pacchimehi ca tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, na aññehi. ^b^Catusamuṭṭhānā^eb^ paṭhamatatiyacatutthachaṭṭhehi ca dutiyatatiyapañcamachaṭṭhehi ca samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, na aññehi. ^b^Chasamuṭṭhānā^eb^ chahipi samuṭṭhāti.

[03]^b^Sikkhāpadaṃ nāma atthi chasamuṭṭhāna^eb^nti etthāpi sikkhāpadasīsena āpatti vuttāti veditabbā. Teneva vakkhati ‘‘sabbañcetaṃ āpattiyaṃ yujjati, sikkhāpadasīsena pana sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu desanā āruḷhā’’ti. Kāyādīhi chahi samuṭṭhānaṃ uppatti, cha vā samuṭṭhānāni etassāti ^b^chasamuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. ^b^Atthi catusamuṭṭhāna^eb^nti kāyo kāyavācā kāyacittaṃ kāyavācācittanti imāni cattāri, vācā kāyavācā vācācittaṃ kāyavācācittanti imāni vā cattāri samuṭṭhānāni etassāti catusamuṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Atthi tisamuṭṭhāna^eb^nti kāyo vācā kāyavācāti imāni tīṇi, kāyacittaṃ vācācittaṃ kāyavācācittanti imāni vā tīṇi samuṭṭhānāni etassāti tisamuṭṭhānaṃ. Dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānañca samuṭṭhānasīsavasena dassento ^b^‘‘atthi kathinasamuṭṭhāna’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Terasa hi samuṭṭhānasīsāni paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ sañcarittasamuṭṭhānaṃ samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānaṃ kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ padasodhammasamuṭṭhānaṃ addhānasamuṭṭhānaṃ theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammadesanāsamuṭṭhānaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānaṃ corivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānaṃ ananuññātasamuṭṭhānanti.

[03]Tattha ^a^M2.0096^ea^^a^V2.0085^ea^ ‘‘atthi chasamuṭṭhāna’’nti iminā sañcarittasamuṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Atthi catusamuṭṭhāna’’nti iminā pana addhānasamuṭṭhānaṃ ananuññātasamuṭṭhānañca saṅgahitaṃ. Yañhi paṭhamatatiyacatutthachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ addhānasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ pana dutiyatatiyapañcamachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ ananuññātasamuṭṭhānaṃ. ‘‘Atthi tisamuṭṭhāna’’nti iminā adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānañca saṅgahitaṃ. Yañhi sacittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ pana acittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānaṃ. ‘‘Atthi kathinasamuṭṭhāna’’ntiādinā pana avasesasamuṭṭhānasīsena dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānañca saṅgaṇhāti. Tathā hi yaṃ tatiyachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ kathinasamuṭṭhānanti vuccati. Yaṃ paṭhamacatutthehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ chaṭṭheneva samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ dhuranikkhepasamuṭṭhānaṃ, samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānantipi tasseva nāmaṃ. Ādi-saddasaṅgahitesu pana paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānapadasodhammatheyyasatthadhammadesanācorivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānesu yaṃ kāyacittato samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ dutiyapañcamehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ padasodhammasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ catutthachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ pañcameneva samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ dhammadesanāsamuṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ pañcamachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, idaṃ corivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānanti veditabbaṃ.

[03]Evaṃ samuṭṭhānasīsena sabbasikkhāpadāni terasadhā dassetvā idāni kiriyāvasena pañcadhā dassento ^b^‘‘tatrāpi kiñci kiriyato samuṭṭhātī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^kiñcī^eb^ti sikkhāpadasīsena āpattiṃ vadati. Tasmā yā kāyena vā vācāya vā pathavīkhaṇanādīsu viya vītikkamaṃ karontassa hoti, ayaṃ ^b^kiriyato samuṭṭhāti^eb^ nāma. Yā kāyavācāya kattabbaṃ akarontassa hoti paṭhamakathināpatti viya, ayaṃ ^b^akiriyato samuṭṭhāti^eb^ nāma. Yā karontassa ca akarontassa ca hoti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvarapaṭiggahaṇāpatti viya, ayaṃ ^b^kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti^eb^ nāma. Yā siyā karontassa ca siyā akarontassa ca hoti rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇāpatti viya, ayaṃ ^b^siyā kiriyato siyā akiriyato samuṭṭhāti^eb^ nāma. Yā siyā karontassa ca siyā karontassa ca akarontassa ca hoti kuṭikārāpatti viya, ayaṃ ^b^siyā kiriyato siyā kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti^eb^ nāma.

[03]Idāni ^a^M2.0097^ea^ sabbasikkhāpadāni saññāvasena dvidhā katvā dassento ^b^‘‘tatrāpi atthi saññāvimokkha’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Saññāya abhāvena vimokkho assāti ^b^saññāvimokkha^eb^nti majjhepadalopasamāso daṭṭhabbo. Yato hi vītikkamasaññāabhāvena muccati, idaṃ saññāvimokkhanti vuccati. ^b^Cittaṅgaṃ labhatiyevā^eb^ti kāyacittādisacittakasamuṭṭhāneheva samuṭṭhahanato ^a^V2.0086^ea^. ‘‘Labhatiyevā’’ti avadhāraṇena no na labhatīti dasseti. Tasmā yaṃ cittaṅgaṃ labhati, na labhati ca, taṃ ^b^‘‘itara’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ itara-saddassa vuttapaṭiyogavisayattā.

[03]Puna sabbasikkhāpadāni cittavasena dvidhā dassento ^b^‘‘puna atthi sacittaka’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Yaṃ saheva cittena āpajjatī^eb^ti yaṃ sacittakeneva samuṭṭhānena āpajjati, no acittakena. ^b^Vināpī^eb^ti ^b^api^eb^-saddena sahāpi cittena āpajjatīti dasseti. Yañhi kadāci acittakena, kadāci sacittakena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti, taṃ acittakanti vuccati. Ettha ca saññādukaṃ anāpattimukhena, sacittakadukaṃ āpattimukhena vuttanti idametesaṃ nānākaraṇanti veditabbaṃ.

[03]Lokavajjadukassa heṭṭhā vuttalakkhaṇattā taṃ avibhajitvā idāni sabbasikkhāpadāni kammavasena duvidhāni, kusalādivasena vedanāvasena ca tividhāni hontīti dassento ^b^‘‘kammakusalavedanāvasenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Ettha pana kiñcāpi aṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayena kāyakammaṃ vacīkammanti kammavasena dukaṃ vuttaṃ, tikameva pana dassetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sabbameva hi sikkhāpadaṃ kāyadvāre āpajjitabbato vacīdvāre āpajjitabbato kāyavacīdvāre āpajjitabbato ca tividhaṃ hoti. Teneva ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanā) vuttaṃ ‘‘sabbāva kāyakammavacīkammatadubhayavasena tividhā honti. Tattha kāyadvāre āpajjitabbā kāyakammanti vuccati, vacīdvāre āpajjitabbā vacīkammanti vuccati, ubhayattha āpajjitabbā kāyakammavacīkamma’’nti. Tatoyeva ca adinnādānasikkhāpadādīsu kāyakammavacīkammanti tadubhayavasena dassitaṃ.

[03]^b^Atthi pana sikkhāpadaṃ kusala^eb^ntiādinā āpattiṃ āpajjanto kusalacittasamaṅgī vā āpajjati akusalacittasamaṅgī vā abyākatacittasamaṅgī vāti ^a^M2.0098^ea^ dasseti, na pana kusalāpi āpatti atthīti. Na hi kusalā āpatti nāma atthi ‘‘āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ, natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kusala’’nti (pari. 303) vacanato. ^b^Dasa kāmāvacarakiriyacittānī^eb^ti hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanehi saddhiṃ aṭṭha mahākiriyacittāni. Dvinnaṃ abhiññācittānaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhāpakattaṃ paññattiṃ ajānantassa iddhivikubbanādīsu daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Yaṃ kusalacittena āpajjatī^eb^ti yaṃ sikkhāpadasīsena gahitaṃ āpattiṃ kusalacittasamaṅgī āpajjati. Iminā pana vacanena taṃ kusalanti āpattiyā vuccamāno kusalabhāvo pariyāyatova, na paramatthatoti dasseti. Kusalacittena hi āpattiṃ āpajjanto saviññattikaṃ aviññattikaṃ ^a^V2.0087^ea^ vā sikkhāpadavītikkamākārappavattaṃ rūpakkhandhasaṅkhātaṃ abyākatāpattiṃ āpajjati. ^b^Itarehi itara^eb^nti itarehi akusalābyākatacittehi yaṃ āpajjati, taṃ itaraṃ, akusalaṃ abyākatañcāti attho. Idañca āpattiṃ āpajjanto akusalacittasamaṅgī vā āpajjati kusalābyākatacittasamaṅgī vāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ santepi sabbasikkhāpadesu kiñci akusalacittameva kiñci kusalābyākatavasena dvicittaṃ, kiñci sabbesaṃ vasena ticittanti ayameva pabhedo labbhati, na aññoti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Tivedanaṃ dvivedanaṃ ekavedana^eb^nti idañca yathāvuttavedanāvaseneva labbhati, nāññathāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nipajjitvā nirodhaṃ samāpannassa sahaseyyavasena tadākārappavattarūpakkhandhasseva āpattibhāvato ‘‘atthi avedana’’ntipi vattabbametaṃ, kadāci karahaci yadicchakaṃ sambhavatīti aggahetvā yebhuyyavasena labbhamānaṃyeva gahetvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.

[03]Idāni yathāvuttasamuṭṭhānādīni imasmiṃ saṃvaṇṇiyamānasikkhāpade vibhajitvā dassento ^b^‘‘imaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ viditvā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^viditvā^eb^ti imassa ‘‘veditabba’’nti iminā aparakālakiriyāvacanena sambandho veditabbo. ^b^Kiriyasamuṭṭhāna^eb^nti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ parūpakkame sati sādiyantassa akiriyasamuṭṭhānabhāvato. ‘‘Manodvāre āpatti nāma natthīti idampi bāhullavaseneva vutta’’nti vadanti. ^b^Cittaṃ panettha aṅgamattaṃ hotī^eb^ti paṭhamapārājikaṃ kāyacittato samuṭṭhātīti cittamettha āpattiyā aṅgameva hoti. ^b^Na tassa vasena kammabhāvo labbhatī^eb^ti viññattijanakavasena ^a^M2.0099^ea^ kāyadvāre pavattattā tassa cittassa vasena imassa sikkhāpadassa manokammabhāvo na labbhatīti attho. Sikkhāpadassa heṭṭhā vuttanayena paññattibhāvato ^b^‘‘sabbañcetaṃ āpattiyaṃ yujjatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Na hi yathāvuttasamuṭṭhānādi paññattiyaṃ yujjati.
[06]Pakiṇṇakakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Idaṃ ki^eb^nti kathetukamyatāya pucchati. Vinītāni vinicchitāni vatthūni ^b^vinītavatthūni^eb^. Tāni hi ‘‘āpattiṃ tvaṃ bhikkhu āpanno pārājikaṃ. Anāpatti bhikkhu pārājikassa, āpatti saṅghādisesassa. Anāpatti bhikkhu asādiyantassā’’tiādinā bhagavatāyeva vinicchitāni ^a^V2.0088^ea^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhagavatā sayaṃ vinicchitāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Uddānagāthā^eb^ti uddesagāthā, saṅgahagāthāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Vatthugāthā^eb^ti ‘‘tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhū’’tiādikā nidānavatthudīpikā vinītavatthupāḷiyeva tesaṃ tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ ganthanato ‘‘vatthugāthā’’ti vuttā, na chandovicitilakkhaṇena. Gāthānaṃ vatthu ^b^vatthugāthā^eb^ti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti vinītavatthūsu. ^b^Dutiyādīna^eb^nti dutiyapārājikādīnaṃ. Dutiyādīni vinicchinitabbānīti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Sippikāna^eb^nti cittakārādisippikānaṃ. Yaṃ passitvā passitvā cittakārādayo cittakammādīni uggaṇhantā karonti, taṃ ^b^‘‘paṭicchannakarūpa’’^eb^nti vuccati.

[03]^b^67^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Purimāni dve vatthūnī^eb^ti makkaṭivatthuṃ vajjiputtakavatthuñca. Tāni pana kiñcāpi anupaññattiyaṃ āgatāneva, tathāpi bhagavatā sayaṃ vinicchitavatthubhāvato adinnādānādīsu anupaññattiyaṃ āgatāni rajakādivatthūni viya puna vinītavatthūsu pakkhittāni. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosī’’ti idaṃ virujjheyya, anupaññattiyañhi aññe bhikkhū disvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ codesunti? Saccametaṃ, tehi pana bhikkhūhi anupaññattiyaṃ vuttanayena codetvā ‘‘nanu, āvuso, tatheva taṃ hotī’’ti vutte tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosīti gahetabbaṃ. ‘‘Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesī’’ti idañca tehi bhikkhūhi anupaññattiyaṃ vuttanayena bhagavato ārocite ‘‘saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu makkaṭiyā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevī’’ti bhagavatā ^a^M2.0100^ea^ puṭṭho samāno ‘‘saccaṃ bhagavā’’ti bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesīti gahetabbaṃ.

[03]Vajjiputtakavatthumhi pana sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā vibbhamitvā ye ānandattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā puna pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca yāciṃsu, te sandhāya ‘‘aṭṭhānametaṃ, ānanda, anavakāso, yaṃ tathāgato vajjīnaṃ vā vajjiputtakānaṃ vā kāraṇā sāvakānaṃ pārājikaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ samūhaneyyā’’tiādi anupaññattiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ye pana avibbhamitvā saliṅge ṭhitāyeva uppannakukkuccā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ, te sandhāya ‘‘āpattiṃ tumhe, bhikkhave, āpannā pārājika’’nti idha vuttaṃ. Keci pana imaṃ adhippāyaṃ ajānantāva ‘‘aññameva makkaṭivatthu vajjiputtakavatthu ca vinītavatthūsu āgata’’nti vadanti.

[03]^b^Kuse ganthetvā^eb^ti kusatiṇāni ganthetvā. ^b^Kesehī^eb^ti manussakesehi. ^b^Taṃ rāga^eb^nti kāyasaṃsaggarāgaṃ. ^b^Ñatvā^eb^ti sayameva jānitvā. Yadi kāyasaṃsaggarāgena kataṃ, kāyasaṃsaggarāgasikkhāpadassa ^a^V2.0089^ea^ vinītavatthūsu avatvā idha kasmā vuttanti? Vuccate – kiñcāpi taṃ kāyasaṃsaggarāgena kataṃ, tassa pana bhikkhuno pārājikakkhette katupakkamattā ‘‘pārājikaṃ nu kho ahaṃ āpanno’’ti pārājikavisayaṃ kukkuccaṃ ahosīti idha vuttaṃ. Tenevāha – ‘‘anāpatti bhikkhu pārājikassa, āpatti saṅghādisesassā’’ti.

[03]^b^68^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atidassanīyā^eb^ti divasampi passantānaṃ atittikaraṇato ativiya dassanayoggā. ^b^Vaṇṇapokkharatāyā^eb^ti ettha pokkharatā vuccati sundarabhāvo, vaṇṇassa pokkharatā vaṇṇapokkharatā, tāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya, vaṇṇasampattiyāti attho. Porāṇā pana pokkharanti sarīraṃ vadanti, vaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇameva. Tesaṃ matena vaṇṇañca pokkharañca vaṇṇapokkharāni, tesaṃ bhāvo vaṇṇapokkharatā, tasmā ^b^vaṇṇapokkharatāyā^eb^ti parisuddhena vaṇṇena ceva sarīrasaṇṭhānasampattiyā cāti attho. Atha vā vaṇṇasampannaṃ pokkharaṃ vaṇṇapokkharanti uttarapadalopo pubbapadassa daṭṭhabbo, tassa bhāvo vaṇṇapokkharatā, tāya ^b^vaṇṇapokkharatāya,^eb^ vaṇṇasampannasarīratāyāti attho. ^b^Padhaṃsesī^eb^ti abhibhavīti attho. Kathaṃ pana asādiyantī nisīdīti āha – ^b^‘‘asaddhammādhippāyena…pe… khāṇukā viyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Na^eb^^a^M2.0101^ea^^b^limpatī^eb^ti na allīyati. ^b^Kāmesū^eb^ti vatthukāmakilesakāmesu. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā paduminipaṇṇe udakabindu na saṇṭhāti, yathā ca sūcimukhe sāsapo na santiṭṭhati, evameva yo abbhantare duvidhenapi kāmena na limpati, tasmiṃ kāmo na saṇṭhāti, tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti.

[03]^b^69^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Purisasaṇṭhānaṃ antarahitaṃ, itthisaṇṭhānaṃ uppanna^eb^nti phalassa vināsuppādadassanena kāraṇassapi vināsuppādā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Purisindriye hi naṭṭhe purisasaṇṭhānaṃ antaradhāyati, itthindriye samuppanne itthisaṇṭhānaṃ pātubhavati. Tathā hi ‘‘yassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa purisindriyaṃ uppajjatīti? No. Yassa vā pana purisindriyaṃ uppajjati, tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatīti? No’’ti ^b^yamakapakaraṇe^eb^ (yama. 3. indriyayamaka.188) vuttattā indriyadvayassa ekasmiṃ santāne sahapavattiyā asambhavato yasmiṃ khaṇe itthindriyaṃ pātubhavati, tato pubbe sattarasamacittato paṭṭhāya purisindriyaṃ nuppajjati. Tato pubbe uppannesu ca purisindriyesu sahajarūpehi saddhiṃ kamena niruddhesu tasmiṃ santāne itthindriyaṃ uppajjati. Tato purisasaṇṭhānākārena pavattesu kammajarūpesu sesarūpesu ca kañci kālaṃ pavattitvā niruddhesu itthisaṇṭhānākārena ^a^V2.0090^ea^ ca catujarūpasantatiyā pavattāya purisasaṇṭhānaṃ antarahitaṃ, itthisaṇṭhānaṃ pātubhūtanti vuccati. Itthiyā purisaliṅgapātubhāvepi ayameva nayo veditabbo.

[03]^b^Purisaliṅgaṃ uttamaṃ, itthiliṅgaṃ hīna^eb^nti iminā ca purisindriyassa uttamabhāvo, itthindriyassa ca hīnabhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi indriyassa hīnukkaṭṭhabhāvaṃ vinā tannissayassa liṅgassa hīnukkaṭṭhatā sambhavati. ^b^Purisaliṅgaṃ balavaakusalena antaradhāyatī^eb^tiādināpi indriyasseva vināsuppādā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Indriye hi vinaṭṭhe uppanne ca tannissayassa liṅgassapi antaradhānaṃ patiṭṭhānañca sambhavati. Kathaṃ panettha purisaliṅgaṃ balavaakausalena antaradhāyati, itthiliṅgaṃ dubbalakusalena patiṭṭhātīti? Vuccate – paṭisandhiyaṃ tāva purisindriyuppādakaṃ anupahatasāmatthiyaṃ balavakusalakammaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ purisindriyameva uppādeti, antarā pana kenaci laddhapaccayena pāradārikattādinā balavaakusalakammena upahatasāmatthiyaṃ tadeva paṭisandhidāyakaṃ kusalakammaṃ dubbalībhūtaṃ purisindriyaṃ anuppādetvā attano sāmatthiyānurūpaṃ ^a^M2.0102^ea^ itthindriyaṃ pavatte uppādeti. Yadā pana paṭisandhidānakāleyeva kenaci laddhapaccayena pāradārikattādinā balavaakusalakammena purisindriyuppādanasāmatthiyaṃ upahataṃ hoti, tadā dubbalībhūtaṃ kusalakammaṃ purisindriyaṃ anuppādetvā paṭisandhiyaṃyeva itthindriyaṃ uppādeti. Tasmā ‘‘purisaliṅgaṃ balavaakusalena antaradhāyati, itthiliṅgaṃ dubbalakusalena patiṭṭhātī’’ti vuccati.

[03]^b^Dubbalaakusalena antaradhāyatī^eb^ti pāradārikattādibalavaakusalakammassa purisindriyuppādanavibandhakassa dubbalabhāve sati antaradhāyantaṃ itthiliṅgaṃ dubbalaakusalena antaradhāyatīti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi pāradārikattādinā balavaakusalakammena bāhitattā purisindriyuppādane asamatthaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ itthiyā itthindriyuppādakaṃ dubbalakusalakammaṃ yadā pavattiyaṃ brahmacariyavāsamicchācārapaṭivirativasena purisattapatthanāvasena vā katupacitabalavakusalakammena āhitasāmatthiyaṃ purisindriyuppādane samatthaṃ itthindriyaṃ anuppādetvā attano sāmatthiyānurūpaṃ purisindriyaṃ uppādeti, tadā purisindriyuppādanavibandhakassa balavaakusalakammassa dubbalabhāve sati taṃ itthindriyaṃ antarahitanti ‘‘itthiliṅgaṃ antaradhāyantaṃ dubbalaakusalena antaradhāyatī’’ti vuccati. Yathāvuttanayeneva balavatā kusalakammena purisindriyassa uppāditattā ‘‘purisaliṅgaṃ balavakusalena patiṭṭhātī’’ti vuccati. Pubbe itthibhūtassa paṭisandhiyaṃ purisindriyuppādepi ayaṃ nayo veditabbo. ^b^Ubhayampi akusalena antaradhāyati, kusalena paṭilabbhatī^eb^ti idaṃ sugatibhavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, duggatiyaṃ pana ubhinnaṃ uppatti vināso ca akusalakammenevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ubhinnampi^eb^^a^V2.0091^ea^^b^sahaseyyāpatti hotī^eb^ti ‘‘yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ. Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiya’’nti vuttattā ubhinnampi sahaseyyavasena pācittiyāpatti hoti. ^b^Dukkhī^eb^ti cetodukkhasamaṅgitāya dukkhī. ^b^Dummano^eb^ti dosena duṭṭhamano, virūpamano vā domanassābhibhūtatāya. ^b^‘‘Samassāsetabbo’’^eb^ti vatvā samassāsetabbavidhiṃ dassento ^b^‘‘hotu mā cintayitthā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Anāvaṭo^eb^ti avārito. ^b^Dhammo^eb^ti pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhasaṅkhāto tividhopi saddhammo. Saggo ca maggo ca saggamaggo, saggassa ^a^M2.0103^ea^ vā maggo saggamaggo, saggūpapattisādhikā paṭipatti. Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya addhānagamane āpatti pariharitabbāti dassento ^b^‘‘saṃvidahanaṃ parimocetvā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^‘‘Mayaṃ asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gacchāmā’’^eb^ti vatvā ‘‘ehi saddhiṃ gamissāmā’’tiādinā asaṃvidahitattā anāpatti.

[03]^b^Bahigāme^eb^ti attano vasanagāmato bahi. ^b^Gāmantaranadīpārarattivippavāsagaṇaohīyanāpattīhi anāpattī^eb^ti ‘‘dutiyikā bhikkhunī pakkantā vā hotī’’tiādinā (pāci. 693) vuttaanāpattilakkhaṇehi saṃsandanato vuttaṃ. ^b^Ārādhikā^eb^ti cittārādhane samatthā. ^b^Tā kopetvā^eb^ti tā pariccajitvā. ^b^Lajjiniyo…pe… labbhatī^eb^ti ‘‘saṅgahe asati ukkaṇṭhitvā vibbhameyyāpī’’ti saṅgahavaseneva vuttaṃ. ^b^Alajjiniyo…pe… labbhatī^eb^ti alajjibhāvato asantapakkhaṃ bhajantīti vuttaṃ. ^b^Aññātikā…pe… vaṭṭatī^eb^ti idaṃ pana imissā āveṇikaṃ katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātanti vadanti. ^b^Bhikkhubhāvepī^eb^ti bhikkhukālepi. ^b^Parisāvacaro^eb^ti upajjhāyo ca ācariyo ca hutvā parisupaṭṭhāko. ^b^Aññassa santike nissayo gahetabbo^eb^ti tassa santike upasampannehi saddhivihārikehi aññassa ācariyassa santike nissayo gahetabbo. ^b^Taṃ nissāya vasantehipī^eb^ti antevāsike sandhāya vadati. ^b^Upajjhā gahetabbā^eb^ti upasampadatthaṃ upajjhā gahetabbā, aññassa santike upasampajjitabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Vinayakamma^eb^nti vikappanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Puna kātabba^eb^nti puna vikappetabbaṃ. ^b^Puna paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṃ sannidhi bhikkhūhi, bhikkhūnaṃ sannidhi bhikkhunīhi paṭiggāhāpetvā paribhuñjitu’’nti (cūḷava. 421) vacanato puna paṭiggahitaṃ tadahu sāmisampi vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Sattame divase^eb^ti idaṃ tañca nissaggiyaṃ anāpajjitvāva punapi sattāhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana bhikkhuniyā nissaggiyaṃ bhikkhussa vaṭṭati, bhikkhussa nissaggiyaṃ bhikkhuniyā vaṭṭati, tasmā aṭṭhamepi divase liṅgaparivatte sati anissajjitvāva antosattāhe paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti ^a^V2.0092^ea^ vadanti. ^b^Taṃ pakatatto rakkhatī^eb^ti aparivattaliṅgo taṃ paṭiggahaṇavijahanato rakkhati, avibhattatāya paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Sāmaṃ gahetvāna nikkhipeyyā^eb^ti paṭiggahetvā sayaṃ nikkhipeyya. ^b^Paribhuñjantassa^eb^^a^M2.0104^ea^^b^āpattī^eb^ti liṅgaparivatte sati paṭiggahaṇavijahanato puna paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa āpatti.

[03]^b^‘‘Hīnāyāvattanenā^eb^ti pārājikaṃ āpannassa gihibhāvūpagamanenā’’ti ^b^tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ, taṃ suvuttaṃ. Na hi pārājikaṃ anāpannassa sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya ‘‘vibbhamissāmī’’ti gihiliṅgaggahaṇamattena bhikkhubhāvo vinassati. Pārājikaṃ āpanno ca bhikkhuliṅge ṭhito yāva na paṭijānāti, tāva attheva tassa bhikkhubhāvo, na so anupasampannasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Tathā hi so saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti, sahaseyyādiāpattiṃ na janeti, omasavāde pācittiyañca janeti. Teneva ‘‘asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno, tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassā’’ti (pārā. 389) omasavāde pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Asati hi bhikkhubhāve dukkaṭaṃ bhaveyya, sati ca bhikkhubhāve paṭiggahitassa paṭiggahaṇavijahanaṃ nāma ayuttaṃ, tasmā sabbaso bhikkhubhāvassa abhāvato pārājikaṃ āpajjitvā gihiliṅgaggahaṇena gihibhāvūpagamanaṃ idha ‘‘hīnāyāvattana’’nti adhippetaṃ, na pana pakatattassa gihiliṅgaggahaṇamattaṃ. Teneva katthaci sikkhāpaccakkhānena samānagatikattā hīnāyāvattanaṃ visuṃ na gaṇhanti. Sikkhāpaccakkhānena paṭiggahaṇavijahane vutte pārājikaṃ āpannassa gihibhāvūpagamanena sabbaso bhikkhubhāvassa abhāvato vattabbameva natthīti. Tathā hi ^b^buddhadattācariyena^eb^ attano vinayavinicchaye –
[21]‘‘Acchedagāhanirapekkhanisaggato ca,
[27]Sikkhāppahānamaraṇehi ca liṅgabhedā;
[26]Dānena tassa ca parassa abhikkhukassa,
[22]Sabbaṃ paṭiggahaṇameti vināsameva’’nti. –
[07]Ettakameva vuttaṃ. Tathā ^b^dhammasirittherena^eb^pi –
[21]‘‘Sikkhāmaraṇaliṅgehi, anapekkhavisaggato;
[22]Acchedānupasampanna-dānā gāhopasammatī’’ti. –

[07]Vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0105^ea^^a^V2.0093^ea^. Yadi ca pakatattassa gihiliṅgaggahaṇamattenapi paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijaheyya, tepi ācariyā visuṃ tampi vadeyyuṃ, na vuttañca, tato viññāyati ‘‘pakatattassa gihiliṅgaggahaṇamattaṃ idha hīnāyāvattananti nādhippeta’’nti. Bhikkhuniyā pana sikkhāpaccakkhānassa abhāvato gihiliṅgaggahaṇamattenapi paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati.

[03]^b^Anapekkhavissajjanenā^eb^ti aññassa adatvāva anatthikatāya ‘‘natthi iminā kammaṃ, na idāni naṃ paribhuñjissāmī’’ti vatthūsu vā ‘‘puna paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjissāmī’’ti paṭiggahaṇe vā anapekkhavissajjanena. ^b^Acchinditvā gāhenā^eb^ti corādīhi acchinditvā gahaṇena.

[03]^b^Etthā^eb^ti bhikkhuvihāre. ^b^Uparopakā^eb^ti tena ropitā rukkhagacchā. ^b^Terasasu sammutīsū^eb^ti bhattuddesakasenāsanapaññāpakabhaṇḍāgārikacīvarapaṭiggāhakacīvarabhājakayāgubhājakaphalabhājakakhajjabhājakaappamattakavissajjakasāṭiyaggāhāpakapattaggāhāpakaārāmikapesakasāmaṇerapesakasammutisaṅkhātāsu terasasu sammutīsu. Kāmaṃ purimikāya pacchimikāya ca senāsanaggāho paṭippassambhatiyeva, purimikāya pana senāsanaggāhe paṭippassaddhe pacchimikāya aññattha upagantuṃ sakkāti purimikāya senāsanaggāhapaṭippassaddhiṃ visuṃ dassetvā pacchimikāya senāsanaggāhe paṭippassaddhe na sakkā aññattha upagantunti tattha bhikkhūhi kattabbasaṅgahaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sace pacchimikāya senāsane gahite’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Pakkhamānattameva dātabba^eb^nti bhikkhunīnaṃ paṭicchannāyapi āpattiyā mānattacārasseva anuññātattā. ^b^Puna pakkhamānattameva dātabba^eb^nti bhikkhukāle ciṇṇamānattābhāvato. ^b^Bhikkhunīhi abbhānakammaṃ kātabba^eb^nti bhikkhukāle ciṇṇamānattatāya bhikkhunīkālepi ciṇṇamānattā icceva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Sace akusalavipāke…pe… chārattaṃ mānattameva dātabba^eb^nti mānattaṃ carantassa liṅgaparivattādhikārattā vuttaṃ. Sace pana bhikkhukāle paṭicchannāya sādhāraṇāpattiyā parivasantassa asamādiṇṇaparivāsassa vā liṅgaṃ parivattati, tassa bhikkhunīkāle pakkhamānattaṃ carantassa akusalavipāke parikkhīṇe puna liṅge parivattite parivāsaṃ datvā parivutthaparivāsassa chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dātabbanti vadanti.

[03]^b^Sañcarittāpattī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0106^ea^ sādhāraṇāpattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Parivāsadānaṃ natthī^eb^ti bhikkhukāle appaṭicchannabhāvato. Bhikkhunīkāle pana ārocitāpi sādhāraṇāpatti sace bhikkhukāle anārocitā, paṭicchannāva hotīti vadanti. ^b^Bhikkhūhi mānatte adinne^eb^ti aciṇṇamānattāya liṅgaparivatte ^a^V2.0094^ea^ sati. Bhikkhunībhāve ṭhitāyapi tā suppaṭippassaddhā evāti sambandho. ^b^Yā āpattiyo pubbe paṭippassaddhā^eb^ti yā asādhāraṇāpattiyo pubbe bhikkhubhāve paṭippassaddhā. ‘‘Pārājikaṃ āpannassa liṅgaparivatte sati santānassa ekattā na puna so upasampadaṃ labhati, tathā vibbhantāpi bhikkhunī liṅgaparivatte sati puna upasampadaṃ na labhatī’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^71^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Anupādinnakesūti adhikārattā upādinnakepi eseva nayoti vutta’’nti ^b^cūḷagaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade^eb^ ca vuttaṃ, taṃ duvuttaṃ. Na hi upādinnakesu nimitte upakkamantassa dukkaṭaṃ dissati. Tathā hi upādinnakesu nimitte appavesetvā bahi upakkamantassa thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘na ca, bhikkhave, rattacittena aṅgajātaṃ chupitabbaṃ, yo chupeyya, āpatti thullaccayassā’’ti (mahāva. 252) vuttattā. Ettha ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pubbe vicāritameva. ^b^Dukkaṭamevā^eb^ti mocanarāgassa abhāvato. ^b^Tathevā^eb^ti muccatu vā mā vāti imamatthaṃ atidissati.

[03]^b^Avisayo^eb^ti asādiyanaṃ nāma evarūpe ṭhāne dukkaranti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Mātugāmassa vacanaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ vāyamissāmi, tvaṃ mā vāyamī’’tiādinā vuttavacanaṃ gahetvā. Ubhayavāyāmeneva āpattīti saññāya ‘‘tvaṃ mā vāyamī’’ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^73^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vaṭṭakate^eb^ti imassa atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘vivaṭe’’^eb^ti āha. ‘‘Pārājikabhayena ākāsagatameva katvā pavesanādīni karontassa sahasā tālukaṃ vā passaṃ vā aṅgajātaṃ phusati ce, dukkaṭameva methunarāgassa abhāvato’’ti vadanti, upaparikkhitvā gahetabbo. ^b^Suphusitā^eb^ti suṭṭhu pihitā. ^b^Antomukhe okāso natthī^eb^ti dantānaṃ supihitabhāvato antomukhe pavesetuṃ okāso natthi. ^b^Uppāṭite pana oṭṭhamaṃse dantesuyeva upakkamantassa thullaccaya^eb^nti pataṅgamukhamaṇḍūkassa mukhasaṇṭhāne ^a^M2.0107^ea^ viya vaṇasaṅkhepavasena thullaccayaṃ. ‘‘Methunarāgena itthiyā appavesento nimittena nimittaṃ chupati, thullaccaya’’nti iminā vā lakkhaṇena samānattā idha thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Bahi nikkhantadantajivhāsu^eb^pi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Amuccante thullaccaya^eb^nti ‘‘ceteti upakkamati na muccati, āpatti thullaccayassā’’ti (pārā. 262) vacanato. ^b^Nijjhāmataṇhikādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena khuppipāsikādipetīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Allīyitumpi na sakkā^eb^ti nijjhāmataṇhikānaṃ lomakūpehi samuṭṭhitaaggijālāhi niccaṃ pajjalitasarīratāya khuppipāsikādīnaṃ ativiya paṭikūlavirūpabībhacchaaṭṭhicammāvasiṭṭhaniccāturasarīratāya ^a^V2.0095^ea^ āmasitumpi na sakkā. ^b^Devatā viya sampattiṃ anubhontī^eb^ti ettha ^b^yāsa^eb^nti sāmivacanaṃ ^b^yā^eb^ti paccattavacanena vipariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ ‘‘yā devatā viya sampattiṃ anubhontī’’ti. ^b^Dassanā^eb^dīsu ^b^dassanaṃ^eb^ nāma bhikkhunā tāsaṃ dassanaṃ, ^b^gahaṇampi^eb^ bhikkhunāva tāsaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgagahaṇaṃ. ^b^Āmasanā^eb^dīni pana tāsaṃ kiccāni. Tattha ^b^āmasanaṃ^eb^ nāma attano sarīrena bhikkhuno sarīrassa upari āmasanamattaṃ, ^b^phusanaṃ^eb^ tato daḷhataraṃ katvā samphusanaṃ, ^b^ghaṭṭanaṃ^eb^ tatopi daḷhataraṃ katvā sarīrena sarīrassa ghaṭṭanaṃ. ^b^Visaññaṃ katvā^eb^ti yathā so katampi upakkamanaṃ na jānāti, evaṃ katvā. Yadipi āmasanādi tassā kiccaṃ, tathāpi teneva anāpattiṃ avatvā ‘‘taṃ puggalaṃ visaññaṃ katvā’’ti vacanato akatavisañño jānitvā sādiyati ce, pārājikameva. Bhikkhuno pana dassanagahaṇesu sati asādiyanaṃ nāma na hotīti dassanagahaṇesu paññāyamānesu anāpatti na vuttā. Yadi pana paṭhamaṃ dassanagahaṇesu sati pacchā taṃ puggalaṃ visaññaṃ katvā āmasanādīni karontī attano manorathaṃ pūretvā gacchati, natthi pārājikaṃ.

[03]^b^Upahatakāyappasādo^eb^ti anaṭṭhepi kāyappasāde kāyaviññāṇuppādane asamatthatāpādanavasena vātapittādīhi upahatakāyappasādo. ^b^Sevanacittavasena āpattī^eb^ti yathā santhatanimittavasena upādinnaphassaṃ avindantassapi sevanacittavasena āpatti, evamidhāpi pittavātādinā upahatakāyappasādattā avediyantassapi sevanacittavasena āpatti.

[03]Nanu ^a^M2.0108^ea^ ca chupitamattavatthusmiṃ ‘‘methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevissāmīti chupitamatte vippaṭisārī ahosī’’ti vuttattā methunassa pubbapayoge dukkaṭena bhavitabbaṃ, atha kasmā ‘‘āpatti saṅghādisesassā’’ti vuttanti imaṃ antolīnacodanaṃ manasikatvā taṃ pariharituṃ ^b^‘‘yo methuna’’^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^sīsa^eb^nti maggena maggapaṭipādanaṃ. Tañhi payogānaṃ matthakasadisattā ‘‘sīsa’’nti vuttaṃ tato paraṃ payogābhāvato. ^b^Dukkaṭe tiṭṭhantī^eb^ti dukkaṭaṃ janenti. Dukkaṭañhi janentā hatthaggāhādayo payogā ‘‘dukkaṭe tiṭṭhantī’’ti vuttā aññissā āpattiyā janakavasena appavattanato.

[03]^b^74^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jātipupphagumbāna^eb^nti jātisumanagumbānaṃ. ^b^Ussannatāyā^eb^ti bāhullatāya. ^b^Upacāre^eb^ti āsannappadese. ^b^Tena vātupatthambhenā^eb^ti ‘‘aṅgamaṅgāni vātupatthaddhāni hontī’’ti evaṃ vuttavātupatthambhena. Iminā niddokkamanassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Ekarasa^eb^nti āvajjanādivīthicittehi abbokiṇṇaṃ.
[03]^b^76^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṅgāmasīsayodho^eb^^a^V2.0096^ea^^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti yasmā kilesārīhi anabhibhūto hutvā te parājesi, tasmā saṅgāmamukhe yodhasadiso bhikkhu.

[03]^b^77^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uppanne vatthusmi^eb^nti methunavatthusmiṃ uppanne. ^b^Parivattakadvāramevā^eb^ti saṃvaraṇavivaraṇavasena ito cito ca parivattanayoggadvārameva. ^b^Rukkhasūcikaṇṭakadvāra^eb^nti rukkhasūcidvāraṃ kaṇṭakadvārañca. ‘‘Rukkhasūcidvāraṃ kaṇṭakadvāra’’micceva vā pāṭho. Yaṃ ubhosu passesu rukkhathambhe nikhaṇitvā tattha vijjhitvā majjhe dve tisso rukkhasūciyo pavesetvā karonti, taṃ ^b^rukkhasūcidvāraṃ^eb^. Yaṃ pavesananikkhamanakāle apanetvā thakanayoggaṃ, ekāya bahūhi vā kaṇṭakasākhāhi kataṃ, taṃ ^b^kaṇṭakadvāraṃ^eb^. ^b^Cakkalakayuttadvāra^eb^nti heṭṭhā etaṃ cakkaṃ yojetvā kataṃ mahādvāraṃ, yaṃ na sakkā ekena saṃvarituṃ vivarituñca. ^b^Gopphetvā^eb^ti rajjūhi ganthetvā. ^b^Ekaṃ dussasāṇidvāramevā^eb^ti ettha kilañjasāṇidvārampi saṅgahaṃ gacchati.

[03]Yattha dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā nipajjituṃ na sakkā hoti, tattha kattabbavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sace bahūnaṃ vaḷañjanaṭṭhānaṃ hotī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Bahūnaṃ avaḷañjanaṭṭhānepi ekaṃ āpucchitvā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. ^b^Atha bhikkhū…pe… nisinnā hontī^eb^ti idaṃ tattha bhikkhūnaṃ sannihitabhāvasandassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Nisinno ^a^M2.0109^ea^ vā pana hotu nipanno vā, yena kenaci iriyāpathena samannāgato sace tattha sannihito hoti, ābhogaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti ^b^tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘nisinnā hontīti vacanato sace nipannā honti, ābhogaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Yadi hi ‘‘nisinnā hontī’’ti vacanato nipanne ābhogaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, ṭhitepi caṅkamantepi ābhogaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Na hi nisinnavacanaṃ nipannaṃyeva nivatteti, tasmā ‘‘nisinnā hontī’’ti idaṃ tattha tesaṃ atthitāmattasandassanatthaṃ, na sesairiyāpathasamaṅgitānivattanatthaṃ.
