Evaṃ santepi nipajjitvā niddāyanto asantapakkhe ṭhitattā ābhogāraho na hotīti amhākaṃ khanti. Asantapakkhe ṭhitattāyeva hi raho nisajjāya nipajjitvā niddāyanto anāpattiṃ na karotīti vuttaṃ. Dvārasaṃvaraṇaṃ nāma bhikkhunīādīnaṃ pavesananivāraṇatthanti āha – ^b^‘‘bhikkhuniṃ vā mātugāmaṃ vā āpucchituṃ na vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Itthiubhatobyañjanakaṃ itthipaṇḍakañca āpucchituṃ na vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti. Mātugāmassa antogabbhe ṭhitabhāvaṃ jānitvāpi dvāre yathāvuttavidhiṃ katvā nipajjantassa anāpatti. ^b^Nisseṇiṃ āropetvā^eb^ti uparitalaṃ āropetvā visaṅkharitvā bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā chinditvā vā nipajjitumpi vaṭṭati. ^b^Dvepi dvārāni jaggitabbānī^eb^ti ettha sace ekasmiṃ dvāre kavāṭaṃ vā natthi, heṭṭhā vuttanayena saṃvarituṃ vā na sakkā, itaraṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvāpi nipajjituṃ vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^Bhikkhācārā^eb^^a^V2.0097^ea^^b^paṭikkammā^eb^ti bhikkhācārato nivattitvā. ^b^Dvārapālassā^eb^ti dvārakoṭṭhake mahādvāre nisseṇimūle vā ṭhatvā dvārarakkhaṇakassa. ^b^Pacchimānaṃ bhāro^eb^ti ekānubandhavasena āgacchante sandhāya vuttaṃ. Asaṃvutadvāre antogabbhe vāti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Bahi vā^eb^ti gabbhato bahi. ^b^Nipajjanakālepi…pe… vaṭṭatiyevā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘dvārajagganakassa tadadhīnattā tadā tassa tattha sannihitāsannihitabhāvaṃ anupadhāretvāpi ābhogaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyevā’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^Yena kenaci parikkhitte^eb^ti pākārena vā vatiyā vā yena kenaci parikkhitte. ‘‘Parikkhepassa uccato pamāṇaṃ sahaseyyappahonake vuttanayena veditabba’’nti vadanti. Yadi pana ekasmiṃ padese parikkhepo vuttappamāṇato nīcataro hoti, vaṭṭati. ^b^Mahāpariveṇaṃ hotī^eb^ti mahantaṃ ^a^M2.0110^ea^ aṅgaṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Mahābodhiyaṅgaṇalohapāsādayaṅgaṇasadisa^eb^nti bahusañcāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na mahāparicchedadassanatthaṃ. ^b^Aruṇe uggate uṭṭhahati, anāpattī^eb^ti suddhacittena nipannassa niddāyantasseva aruṇe uggateyeva niddāvaseneva anāpatti. ^b^Pabujjhitvā puna supati, āpattī^eb^ti aruṇe uggate pabujjhitvā aruṇuggamanaṃ ajānitvāpi anuṭṭhahitvāva sayitasantānena sayantassa āpatti, purāruṇe pabujjhitvāpi ajānitvā sayitasantānena sayantassapi aruṇe uggate āpattiyeva. ^b^Yathāparicchedameva vuṭṭhātī^eb^ti aruṇe uggateyeva uṭṭhahati. ^b^Tassa āpattī^eb^ti asuddhacitteneva nipannattā niddāyantassapi aruṇe uggate divāpaṭisallānamūlikā āpatti. ^b^‘‘Evaṃ nipajjanto anādariyadukkaṭāpi na muccatī’’^eb^ti vuttattā asuddhacittena nipajjanto aruṇuggamanato puretaraṃ uṭṭhahantopi anuṭṭhahantopi nipajjanakāleyeva anādariyadukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, divāpaṭisallānamūlikaṃ pana dukkaṭaṃ aruṇe uggateyeva āpajjati.

[03]Yaṃ panettha ^b^tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ ‘‘rattiṃ dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā nipanno sace aruṇuggamanavelāyaṃ dvāre vivaṭepi nipajjati, tassa āpatti akhette saṃvaritvā nipannattā. Aruṇuggamanavelāyaṃ vivaṭepi dvāre ‘‘nipajjissāmī’’ti rattiṃ dvāraṃ saṃvaritvāpi nipannassa akhette pihitattā nipajjanakāle anādariyadukkaṭaṃ, aruṇe uggate nipajjanamūladukkaṭañca hoti. Rattiṃ pihitepi apihitepi dvāre nipannassa aruṇuggamanakkhaṇeyeva apihitadvāre pihite pihitadvāre ca puna vivaritvā pihite khette pihitattā anāpattī’’ti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti. Rattiṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvā nipannasseva hi aruṇuggamane āpatti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitā, tasmā khette vā pihitaṃ hotu akhette vā, saṃvaraṇamevettha pamāṇanti amhākaṃ khanti.

[03]^b^Niddāvasena nipajjatī^eb^ti niddābhibhūtatāya ekapassena nipajjati, evaṃ pana nipanno nipanno ^a^V2.0098^ea^ nāma na hotīti ^b^anāpatti^eb^ vuttā. ^b^Apassāya supantassā^eb^ti kaṭiyā piṭṭhivemajjhassa ca antare appamattakampi padesaṃ bhūmiṃ aphusāpetvā thambhādiṃ apassāya supantassa. ^b^Sahasāva vuṭṭhātī^eb^ti pakkhalitvā patito viya sahasā vuṭṭhāti. ^b^Tattheva sayati na vuṭṭhātī^eb^ti niddābhibhūtatāya ^a^M2.0111^ea^ supanto na vuṭṭhāti, na mucchāpareto. Teneva ‘‘avisayattā āpatti na dissatī’’ti na vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Ekabhaṅgenā^eb^ti ekassa passassa bhañjanena, heṭṭhā vuttanayena pāde bhūmito amocetvāva ekaṃ passaṃ bhañjitvā nāmetvā nipannoti vuttaṃ hoti. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahāpadumattherena vuttanti sambandho. Mucchitvā patitattā therena ^b^‘‘avisayattā āpatti na dissatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Ācariyā pana yathā yakkhagahitako bandhitvā nipajjāpito ca paravaso hoti, evaṃ aparavasattā mucchitvā patito kañci kālaṃ jānitvāpi nipajjatīti anāpattiṃ na vadanti. ^b^Yo ca yakkhagahitako, yo ca bandhitvā nipajjāpito^eb^ti imassa mahāaṭṭhakathāvādassa pacchimattā soyeva pamāṇato gahetabbo. Tathā ca vakkhati ‘‘sabbattha yo yo aṭṭhakathāvādo vā theravādo vā pacchā vuccati, sova pamāṇato daṭṭhabbo’’ti (pārā. aṭṭha. 1.92). Yakkhagahitaggahaṇeneva cettha visaññībhūtopi saṅgahitoti veditabbaṃ. Ekabhaṅgena nipanno pana atthato anipannattā muccatiyevāti mahāaṭṭhakathāvādena so appaṭikkhittova hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Divā saṃvaritvā nipannassa kenaci vivaṭepi dvāre anāpatti nipajjanakāle saṃvaritvā nipannattā. Sace divā saṃvaritvā dvārasamīpe nipanno pacchā sayameva dvāraṃ vivarati, evampi vaṭṭati. Acittakā cāyaṃ āpatti kiriyā ca akiriyā ca.

[03]^b^78^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Apade padaṃ karonto viyā’’^eb^ti vatvā puna tamevatthaṃ āvikaronto ^b^‘‘ākāse padaṃ dassento viyā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Etadagga^eb^nti eso aggo. ^b^Yadida^eb^nti yo ayaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
[06]Vinītavatthuvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^Tatrida^eb^ntiādi heṭṭhā vuttatthameva.
[06]Iti samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
[06]Paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Adutiyena ^a^M2.0112^ea^^a^V2.0099^ea^ jinena yaṃ dutiyaṃ pārājikaṃ pakāsitaṃ, tassa idāni yasmā saṃvaṇṇanākkamo patto, tasmā yaṃ suviññeyyaṃ, yañca pubbe pakāsitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ vajjayitvā assa dutiyassa ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā hotīti sambandho.

[03]^b^84^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rājagahe^eb^ti ettha duggajanapadaṭṭhānavisesasampadādiyogato padhānabhāvena rājūhi gahitaṃ pariggahitanti ^b^rājagaha^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘mandhātu…pe… vuccatī’’^eb^ti. Tattha mahāgovindena mahāsattena pariggahitaṃ reṇunā pariggahitameva hotīti mahāgovindaggahaṇaṃ. Mahāgovindapaaggahitatākittanañhi tadā reṇunā magadharājena pariggahitabhāvūpalakkhaṇaṃ. Tassa hi so purohito. ^b^‘‘Mahāgovindo^eb^ti mahānubhāvo purātano eko magadharājā’’ti keci. ^b^Pariggahitattā^eb^ti rājadhānībhāvena pariggahitattā. Gayhatīti gaho, rājūnaṃ gahoti ^b^rājagahaṃ,^eb^ nagarasaddāpekkhāya napuṃsakaniddeso. ^b^Aññepettha pakāre^eb^ti ‘‘nagaramāpanena raññā kāritasabbagahattā rājagahaṃ, gijjhakūṭādīhi parikkhittattā pabbatarājehi parikkhittagehasadisantipi rājagahaṃ, sampannabhavanatāya rājamānaṃ gehantipi rājagahaṃ, suvihitārakkhatāya anatthāvahabhāvena upagatānaṃ paṭirājūnaṃ gahaṃ gehabhūtantipi rājagahaṃ, rājūhi disvā sammā patiṭṭhāpitattā tesaṃ gahaṃ gehabhūtantipi rājagahaṃ. Ārāmarāmaṇeyyakādīhi rājate, nivāsasukhatādinā sattehi mamattavasena gayhati pariggayhatīti vā rājagaha’’nti edise pakāre. So padeso ṭhānavisesabhāvena uḷārasattaparibhogoti āha ^b^‘‘taṃ paneta’’^eb^ntiādi. Tattha ^b^buddhakāle cakkavattikāle cā^eb^ti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti yakkhānaṃ. ^b^Vasanavana^eb^nti āpānabhūmibhūtaṃ upavanaṃ. Gijjhā ettha santīti gijjhaṃ, kūṭaṃ. Taṃ etassāti ^b^gijjhakūṭo^eb^. Gijjho viyāti vā gijjhaṃ, kūṭaṃ. Taṃ etassāti ^b^gijjhakūṭo,^eb^ pabbato. Gijjhasadisakūṭoti gijjhakūṭoti ^a^V2.0100^ea^ vā majjhepadalopīsamāso yathā ‘‘sākapatthavo’’ti, tasmiṃ gijjhakūṭe. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gijjhā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Tato^eb^^a^M2.0113^ea^^b^paraṃ saṅgho^eb^ti tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ upari saṅgho catuvaggakaraṇīyādikammappattattā. ^b^Tasmiṃ pabbate sannipatitvā samāpattiyā vītināmentī^eb^ti yathāphāsukaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakiccā āgantvā cetiyagabbhe yamakamahādvāraṃ vivarantā viya taṃ pabbataṃ dvidhā katvā anto pavisitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni māpetvā tattha samāpattiyā vītināmenti.

[03]Kadā panete tattha vasiṃsu? Atīte kira anuppanne tathāgate bārāṇasiṃ upanissāya ekasmiṃ gāmake ekā kuladhītā khettaṃ rakkhati, tassā khettakuṭiyā vīhayo bhajjantiyā tattha mahākarañjapupphappamāṇā mahantamahantā manoharā pañcasatamattā lājā jāyiṃsu. Sā te gahetvā mahati paduminipatte ṭhapesi. Tasmiñca samaye eko paccekasambuddho tassā anuggahatthaṃ avidūre khettapāḷiyā gacchati. Sā taṃ disvā pasannamānasā supupphitaṃ mahantaṃ ekaṃ padumaṃ gahetvā tattha lāje pakkhipitvā paccekabuddhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañcahi lājasatehi saddhiṃ taṃ padumapupphaṃ datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā ‘‘imassa, bhante, puññassa ānubhāvena ānubhāvasampanne pañcasataputte labheyya’’nti pañca puttasatāni patthesi. Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe pañcasatā migaluddakā sambhatasambhārā paripakkapaccekabodhiñāṇā tasseva paccekabuddhassa madhuramaṃsaṃ datvā ‘‘etissā puttā bhaveyyāmā’’ti patthayiṃsu. Atītāsu anekāsu jātīsu tassā puttabhāvena āgatattā tathā tesaṃ ahosi. Sā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devaloke nibbatti, tato cutā jātassare padumagabbhe nibbatti. Tameko tāpaso disvā paṭijaggi. Tassā padasā vicarantiyā paduddhāre paduddhāre bhūmito padumāni uṭṭhahanti. Eko vanacarako disvā bārāṇasirañño ārocesi. Rājā taṃ ānetvā aggamahesiṃ akāsi, tassā gabbho saṇṭhāti. Mahāpadumakumāro mātukucchiyaṃ vasi, sesā bahi nikkhantaṃ gabbhamalaṃ nissāya saṃsedajabhāvena nibbattā. ‘‘Opapātikabhāvenā’’ti keci. Te vayappattā uyyāne padumassare kīḷantā ekekasmiṃ padume nisīditvā khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ nibbattayiṃsu. Ayaṃ tesaṃ byākaraṇagāthā ahosi –
[21]‘‘Saroruhaṃ ^a^M2.0114^ea^ padumapalāsamatrajaṃ, supupphitaṃ bhamaragaṇānuciṇṇaṃ;
[22]Aniccatāyaṃ vayataṃ viditvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo’’ti. –

[07]Tasmiṃ ^a^V2.0101^ea^ kāle te tattha vasiṃsu. Tadā cassa pabbatassa ^b^‘‘isigilī’’^eb^ti samaññā udapādi. ^b^Ime isayo^eb^ti ime paccekabuddhaisī. Samā ñāyati etāyāti ^b^samaññā,^eb^ nāmanti attho.

[03]Tiṇacchadanā kuṭiyo majjhepadalopīsamāsaṃ katvā, ekadese vā samudāyavohāravasena ‘‘tiṇakuṭiyo’’ti vuttā. ‘‘Vassaṃ upagacchiṃsū’’ti vacanato vassūpagamanārahā sadvārabandhā eva veditabbāti āha ^b^‘‘tiṇacchadanā sadvārabandhā kuṭiyo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vassaṃ upagacchantenā^eb^ti vassāvāsaṃ upagacchantena. ^b^Nālakapaṭipada^eb^nti ‘‘moneyyaṃ te upaññissa’’ntiādinā (su. ni. 721) satthārā nālakattherassa desitaṃ puthujjanakālato pabhuti kilesacittaṃ anuppādetvā paṭipajjitabbaṃ moneyyapaṭipadaṃ. Taṃ pana paṭipadaṃ sutvā nālakatthero tīsu ṭhānesu appiccho ahosi dassane savane pucchāyāti. So hi desanāpariyosāne pasannacitto bhagavantaṃ vanditvā vanaṃ paviṭṭho. Puna ‘‘aho vatāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ passeyya’’nti lolabhāvaṃ na janesi, ayamassa ^b^dassane^eb^ appicchatā. Tathā ‘‘aho vatāhaṃ puna dhammadesanaṃ suṇeyya’’nti lolabhāvaṃ na janesi, ayamassa ^b^savane^eb^ appicchatā. Tathā ‘‘aho vatāhaṃ puna moneyyapaṭipadaṃ puccheyya’’nti lolabhāvaṃ na janesi, ayamassa ^b^pucchāya^eb^ appicchatā.

[03]So evaṃ appiccho samāno pabbatapādaṃ pavisitvā ekavanasaṇḍe dve divasāni na vasi, ekarukkhamūle dve divasāni na nisīdi, ekasmiṃ gāme dve divasāni piṇḍāya na pāvisi. Iti vanato vanaṃ, rukkhato rukkhaṃ, gāmato gāmaṃ āhiṇḍanto anurūpapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjitvā aggaphale patiṭṭhāsi. Ekassa bhagavato kāle ekoyeva naṃ pūreti. Imañhi moneyyapaṭipadaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ katvā pūrento bhikkhu satteva māsāni jīvati, majjhimaṃ katvā pūrento satta vassāni, mudukaṃ katvā pūrento soḷasa vassāni. Ayaṃ pana thero ukkaṭṭhaṃ katvā pūresi, tasmā satta māse ṭhatvā attano ^a^M2.0115^ea^ āyusaṅkhārassa parikkhayaṃ ñatvā nahāyitvā nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā dasabalābhimukho pañcapatiṭṭhitena taṃ vanditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā hiṅgulakapabbataṃ nissāya ṭhitakova anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ tattha gantvā sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo gāhāpetvā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā agamāsi. Evarūpaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipannenapi vassaṃ upagacchantena channe sadvārabandheyeva ṭhāne upagantabbaṃ. Appicchataṃ nissāyapi sikkhāpadassa anatikkamanīyattaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘nālakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannenapī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Pañcannaṃ chadanāna^eb^nti tiṇapaṇṇaiṭṭhakasilāsudhāsaṅkhātānaṃ pañcannaṃ chadanānaṃ. ^b^‘‘Na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena vassaṃ ^a^V2.0102^ea^ upagantabba^eb^nti (mahāva. 204) vacībhedaṃ katvā vassūpagamanaṃ sandhāyeva paṭikkhepo, na ālayakaraṇavasena upagamanaṃ sandhāyā’’ti vadanti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana avisesattā aṭṭhakathāyañca ‘‘nālakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannenapī’’tiādinā aviseseneva daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā asenāsanikassa nāvādiṃ vinā aññattha ālayo na vaṭṭatīti amhākaṃ khanti. Nāvāsatthavajesuyeva hi ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, nāvāyaṃ vassaṃ upagantu’’ntiādinā (mahāva. 203) sati asati vā senāsane vassūpagamanassa visuṃ anuññātattā ‘‘na, bhikkhave, asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba’’nti ayaṃ paṭikkhepo tattha na labbhatīti asati senāsane ālayavasenapi nāvādīsu upagamanaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Anudhammatā^eb^ti vattaṃ. ^b^Rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena vaccakuṭipassāvaṭṭhānādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Katikavattāni ca khandhakavattāni ca adhiṭṭhāyā^eb^ti pariyattidhammo nāma tividhampi saddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti, tasmā sakkaccaṃ uddisatha uddisāpetha, sajjhāyaṃ karotha, padhānaghare vasantānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ akatvā antovihāre nisīditvā uddisatha uddisāpetha, sajjhāyaṃ karotha, dhammassavanaṃ samiddhaṃ karotha, pabbājentā sodhetvā pabbājetha, sodhetvā upasampādetha, sodhetvā nissayaṃ detha. Ekopi hi kulaputto pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti. Attano thāmena yattakāni sakkotha, tattakāni dhutaṅgāni samādiyatha, antovassaṃ nāmetaṃ sakaladivasaṃ rattiyā ca paṭhamapacchimayāmesu appamattehi bhavitabbaṃ, vīriyaṃ ārabhitabbaṃ ^a^M2.0116^ea^. Porāṇakamahaātherāpi sabbapalibodhe chinditvā antovasse ekacariyavattaṃ pūrayiṃsu. Bhasse mattaṃ jānitvā dasavatthukakathaṃ dasaasubhadasānussatiaṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇakathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Āgantukānaṃ vattaṃ kātuṃ, sattāhakaraṇīyena gatānaṃ apaloketvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Viggāhikapisuṇapharusavacanāni mā vadatha, divase divase sīlāni āvajjentā caturārakkhaṃ ahāpentā manasikārabahulā viharatha, cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā vandantena gandhamālaṃ vā pūjentena pattaṃ vā thavikāya pakkhipantena na kathetabbaṃ, antogāme manussehi saddhiṃ paccayasaṃyuttakathā vā visabhāgakathā vā na kathetabbā, rakkhitindriyehi bhavitabbaṃ, khandhakavattañca sekhiyavattañca pūretabbanti evamādinā katikavattāni khandhakavattāni ca adhiṭṭhahitvā.

[03]‘‘Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretu’’nti (mahāva. 209) vuṭṭhavassānaṃ pavāraṇāya anuññātattā imassa suttassa vasena pavāraṇādivasassa aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya appavāritāpi ‘‘vuṭṭhavassā’’ti vuccanti. Kiñcāpi ‘‘imaṃ temāsaṃ vassaṃ upemī’’ti (mahāva. aṭṭha. 184) vacanato pavāraṇādivasassa temāsantogadhattā taṃ divasaṃ yāva na pavārenti ^a^V2.0103^ea^, tāva vassaṃ vasantā nāma honti, tathāpi ekadesena avuṭṭhampi taṃ divasaṃ vuṭṭhabhāgāpekkhāya vuṭṭhameva hotīti katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ katākatabhāgāpekkhāya samudāye pavattakatākatavohāro viya. Vippakatañhi yaṃ kiñci ‘‘katākata’’nti vuccati. ‘‘Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ kathinaṃ attharitu’’nti (mahāva. 306) imassa pana suttassa vasena nippariyāyato mahāpavāraṇāya pavāritā pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya ‘‘vuṭṭhavassā’’ti vuccantīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘mahāpavāraṇāya pavāritā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya hi vassānassa pacchime māse kathinatthāro anuññāto ^b^parivāre^eb^ ‘‘kathinassa atthāramāso jānitabboti vassānassa pacchimo māso jānitabbo’’ti (pari. 412) vuttattā. ‘‘Mahāpavāraṇāya pavāritā’’ti idañca purimikāya vassūpagatānaṃ sabhāvadassanamattaṃ, kenaci antarāyena appavāritāpi ‘‘vuṭṭhavassā’’icceva vuccanti.

[03]^b^‘‘Āpucchitabbā’’^eb^ti vatvā idāni āpucchanavidhiṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sace imaṃ kuṭi’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Paṭijagganakaṃ vā na labhatī^eb^ti vihārapaccante kate ^a^M2.0117^ea^ paṭijagganakaṃ na labhati. Te pana bhikkhū janapadacārikaṃ pakkamiṃsūti sambandho. Addhānagamane cārikāvohāro sāsane niruḷho. Kiñcāpi ayaṃ cārikā nāma mahājanasaṅgahatthaṃ buddhānaṃyeva labbhati, buddhe upādāya pana ruḷhīsaddavasena sāvakānampi vuccati kilañjādīhi katabījanīnampi tālavaṇṭavohāro viya. ^b^Saṅgopetvā^eb^ti ekasmiṃ padese rāsiṃ katvā. Idāni tameva saṅgopanavidhiṃ dassento ^b^‘‘yathā ca ṭhapita’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Na ovassīyatīti ^b^anovassakaṃ,^eb^ kammani aka-saddo daṭṭhabbo. Yathā ca ṭhapitaṃ na ovassīyati na temīyatīti attho.

[03]^b^Anavayo^eb^ti ettha ^b^vayo^eb^ti hāni ‘‘āyavayo’’tiādīsu viya. Natthi etassa attano sippe vayo ūnatāti ^b^avayo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘anūno paripuṇṇasippo’’^eb^ti. Ācariyassa kammaṃ ^b^ācariyaka^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘ācariyakamme’’^eb^ti. ^b^Piṭṭhasaṅghāṭo^eb^ dvārabāhā, kaṭṭhakammaṃ ^b^thambhādi^eb^. ^b^Telatambamattikāyā^eb^ti telamissatambamattikāya.

[03]^b^85^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kuṭikāya karaṇabhāva^eb^nti kuṭiyā katabhāvaṃ. Saddasatthavidūhi kiṃ-saddayoge anāgatavacanassa icchitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tassa lakkhaṇaṃ saddasatthato pariyesitabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Mettāpubbabhāga^eb^nti mettājhānassa pubbabhāgabhūtaṃ sabbasattesu hitapharaṇamattaṃ. Kasmā panetaṃ vuttaṃ, nanu anuddayā-saddo karuṇāya pavattatīti? Saccametaṃ, ayaṃ pana anuddayāsaddo anurakkhaṇamatthaṃ antonītaṃ katvā pavattamāno mettāya karuṇāya ca pavattatīti idha mettāya pavattamāno ^a^V2.0104^ea^ vutto, tasmā suvuttametaṃ ‘‘etena mettāpubbabhāgaṃ dassetī’’ti. ^b^Karuṇāpubbabhāga^eb^nti karuṇājhānassa pubbabhāgabhūtaṃ sattesu anukampamattaṃ. ^b^Cikkhallaṃ^eb^ mattikā, tassa ^b^maddanaṃ^eb^ udakaṃ āsiñcitvā hatthādīhi parimaddanaṃ. ^b^Mettākaruṇāna^eb^nti appanāppattamettākaruṇānaṃ. Kiñcāpi therena sañcicca khuddānukhuddakā pāṇā maraṇādhippāyena na byābādhitā, tathāpi karuṇāya abhāvena ‘‘evaṃ kate ime pāṇā vinassissantī’’ti anupaparikkhitvā katattā theraṃ vigarahi. Janānaṃ samūho ^b^janatā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘pacchimo janasamūho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pātabyabhāva^eb^nti vināsetabbataṃ. ^b^Pāṇātipātaṃ karontāna^eb^nti therena akatepi pāṇātipāte parehi sallakkhaṇākāraṃ dasseti. ^b^Imassa diṭṭhānugati^eb^nti imassa diṭṭhiyā anugamanaṃ. ^b^Ghaṃsitabbe^eb^ti ghaṭṭayitabbe, vināsitabbeti attho. ^b^Evaṃ maññī^eb^ti yathā therena kataṃ, evaṃ mā maññi. ‘‘Mā pacchimā ^a^M2.0118^ea^ janatā pāṇesu pātabyataṃ āpajjī’’ti vacanato yo bhikkhu iṭṭhakapacanapattapacanakuṭikaraṇavihārakārāpanavihārasammajjanapaṭaggidānakūpapokkharaṇīkhaṇāpanādīsu yattha ‘‘khuddānukhuddakānaṃ pāṇānaṃ vihiṃsā bhavissatī’’ti jānāti, tena tādise padese kappiyavacanaṃ vatvāpi na taṃ kammaṃ kāretabbanti dasseti.

[03]^b^Tattha tattha vuttameva āpatti^eb^nti pathavīkhaṇanabhūtagāmapātabyatādīsu vuttapācittiyādiāpattiṃ. ^b^Ādikammikattā anāpattī^eb^ti kuṭikaraṇapaccayā anāpatti. ^b^Sikkhāpadaṃ atikkamitvā^eb^ti ‘‘na ca, bhikkhave, sabbamattikāmayā kuṭikā kātabbā, yo kareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti vuttasikkhāpadaṃ atikkamitvā. Yadi aññena kataṃ labhitvā vasantassa anāpatti siyā, na bhagavā taṃ kuṭikaṃ bhindāpeyyāti āha – ^b^‘‘kataṃ labhitvā tattha vasantānampi dukkaṭamevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yathā vā tathā vā missā hotū^eb^ti heṭṭhā mattikā upari dabbasambhārātiādinā yena kenaci ākārena missā hotu. ^b^Giñjakāvasathasaṅkhepenā^eb^ti ettha giñjakā vuccanti iṭṭhakā, giñjakāhi eva kato āvasatho giñjakāvasatho. Iṭṭhakāmayassa āvasathassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ kira āvasathaṃ yathā sudhāparikammena payojanaṃ natthi, evaṃ iṭṭhakāhi eva cinitvā chādetvā karonti, tulādaṇḍakavāṭaphalakāni pana dārumayāneva. ^b^Vikirantā^eb^ti cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karontā.

[03]^b^Kissā^eb^ti kena kāraṇena. ^b^Vayakammampi atthī^eb^ti dvārakavāṭādiabhisaṅkharaṇādīsu katavayakammampi atthi. Bhikkhūnaṃ akappiyattā eva titthiyavatānurūpattā ^b^titthiyadhajo^eb^. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttakāraṇesu attano adhippetakāraṇadvayaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā aparānipi tattha vuttakāraṇāni dassento āha – ^b^‘‘aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aññānipi kāraṇāni vuttānī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^a^V2.0105^ea^^b^sattānuddayāyā^eb^ti tādisāya kuṭikāya karaṇapaccayā vinassamānasattesu anuddayāya. Yasmā sabbamattikāmayā kuṭi sukarā bhindituṃ, tasmā tattha ṭhapitaṃ pattacīvarādi aguttaṃ hoti, corādīhi avaharituṃ sakkā. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pattacīvaraguttatthāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Senāsanabāhullapaṭisedhanatthāyā^eb^ti senāsanānaṃ bahubhāvanisedhanatthāya, tādisassa vā senāsanassa abhisaṅkharaṇe bhikkhūnaṃ uddesaparipucchādīni sesakammāni pariccajitvā niccabyāvaṭatānisedhanatthaṃ. ^b^Anupavajjo^eb^ti dosaṃ āropetvā na vattabbo.

[03]Pāḷimuttakavinicchayesu ^a^M2.0119^ea^^b^tañca kho…pe… na vaṇṇamaṭṭhatthāyā^eb^ti idaṃ chattadaṇḍaggāhakasalākapañjaravinandhanaṃ sandhāyāti vadanti. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti chattadaṇḍe sabbattha. ^b^Āraggenā^eb^ti nikhādanamukhena. ^b^Ghaṭakampi vāḷarūpampi bhinditvā dhāretabba^eb^nti sace tādisaṃ akappiyachattaṃ labhati, ghaṭakampi vāḷarūpampi bhinditvā tacchetvā dhāretabbaṃ. ^b^Suttakena vā daṇḍo veṭhetabbo^eb^ti yathā chattadaṇḍe lekhā na paññāyati, tathā veṭhetabbo. ^b^Daṇḍabunde^eb^ti daṇḍamūle, chattadaṇḍassa heṭṭhimataleti attho. ^b^Chattamaṇḍalika^eb^nti chattassa anto khuddakamaṇḍalaṃ. ^b^Ukkiritvā^eb^ti uṭṭhapetvā. ^b^Sā vaṭṭatī^eb^ti yadipi rajjukehi na bandhanti, bandhituṃ pana yuttaṭṭhānattā vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^Nānāsuttakehī^eb^ti nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi. Idañca tathā karontānaṃ karaṇappakāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, ekavaṇṇasuttakenapi vuttappakārena sibbituṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva. ^b^Paṭṭamukhe^eb^ti paṭṭakoṭiyaṃ. Dvinnaṃ paṭṭānaṃ saṅghaṭṭitaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Pariyante^eb^ti cīvarapariyante. Cīvaraanuvātaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Veṇi^eb^nti varakasīsākārena sibbanaṃ. ^b^Saṅkhalika^eb^nti biḷālabandhanākārena sibbanaṃ. ‘‘Veṇiṃ saṅkhalika’’nti cettha upayogavacanaṃ ‘‘karontī’’ti karaṇakiriyāpekkhaṃ. ^b^Agghiyagayamuggarādīnī^eb^ti ettha ^b^agghiyaṃ^eb^ nāma cetiyasaṇṭhānena sibbanaṃ, mūle tanukaṃ agge mahantaṃ katvā gadākārena sibbanaṃ ^b^gayā,^eb^ mūle ca agge ca ekasadisaṃ katvā muggarākārena sibbanaṃ ^b^muggaro^eb^. ^b^Kakkaṭakkhīni ukkirantī^eb^ti gaṇṭhikapaṭṭapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ ante pāḷibaddhaṃ katvā kakkaṭakānaṃ akkhisaṇṭhānaṃ uṭṭhapenti, karontīti attho. ^b^‘‘Koṇasuttapiḷakā^eb^ti gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇehi nīhaṭasuttānaṃ koṭiyo’’ti ^b^tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ pana tā piḷakā duviññeyyarūpā kātabbāti? Koṇehi nīhaṭasuttānaṃ antesu ekavāraṃ gaṇṭhikakaraṇena vā puna ^a^V2.0106^ea^ nivattetvā sibbanena vā duviññeyyasabhāvaṃ katvā suttakoṭiyo rassaṃ katvā chinditabbā. ^b^Dhammasirittherena^eb^ pana –
[08]‘‘Koṇasuttā ca piḷakā, duviññeyyāva kappare’’ti –
[07]Vuttaṃ. Tathā ^b^ācariyabuddhadattattherena^eb^pi –
[08]‘‘Suttā ca piḷakā tattha, duviññeyyāva dīpitā’’ti –
[07]Vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0120^ea^. Tasmā tesaṃ matena koṇasuttā ca piḷakā ca koṇasuttapiḷakāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Maṇinā^eb^ti masāragallādipāsāṇena. ^b^Na ghaṭṭetabba^eb^nti na ghaṃsitabbaṃ, aṃsabaddhakakāyabandhanāni pana saṅkhādīhi ghaṃsituṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Pāsakaṃ katvā bandhitabba^eb^nti rajanakāle bandhitabbaṃ, sesakāle mocetvā ṭhapetabbaṃ. ^b^Gaṇṭhike^eb^ti dantamayādigaṇṭhike. ^b^Piḷakā^eb^ti binduṃ binduṃ katvā uṭṭhāpetabbapiḷakā.

[03]^b^‘‘Telavaṇṇo^eb^ti samaṇasāruppavaṇṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, maṇivaṇṇaṃ pana pattaṃ aññena kataṃ labhitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Pattamaṇḍale^eb^ti tipusīsādimaye pattamaṇḍale. ‘‘Na, bhikkhave, citrāni pattamaṇḍalāni dhāretabbāni rūpakākiṇṇāni bhittikammakatānī’’ti (cūḷava. 253) vuttattā ^b^‘‘bhittikammaṃ na vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, makaradantakaṃ chinditu’’nti vacanato ^b^‘‘makaradantakaṃ pana vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Makaramukha^eb^nti makaramukhasaṇṭhānaṃ. ^b^Deḍḍhubhasīsa^eb^nti udakasappasīsasaṇṭhānaṃ. ^b^Acchīnī^eb^ti kuñjaracchisaṇṭhānāni. ^b^Rajjukakāyabandhanaṃ ekameva vaṭṭatī^eb^ti rajjukaṃ bandhantena ekaguṇameva katvā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati, majjhe bhinditvā diguṇaṃ katvā bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati, diguṇaṃ pana akatvā ekarajjukameva satavārampi punappunaṃ āvijjitvā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Ekampi na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ekaguṇampi katvā bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati. ^b^Bahurajjuke…pe... vaṭṭatī^eb^ti idaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na dasā sandhāya. Īdisañhi kāyabandhanaṃ bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Teneva ^b^ācariyabuddhadattattherena^eb^ vuttaṃ –
[21]‘‘Ekarajjumayaṃ ^a^V2.0107^ea^ vuttaṃ, muninā kāyabandhanaṃ;
[22]Pañcapāmaṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ, ekampi ca na vaṭṭati.
[21]‘‘Rajjuke ekato katvā, bahū ekāya rajjuyā;
[22]Nirantarañhi veṭhetvā, kataṃ vaṭṭati bandhitu’’nti.

[03]Murajaṃ pana kāyabandhanaṃ na vaṭṭati ‘‘na, bhikkhave, uccāvacāni kāyabandhanāni dhāretabbāni kalābukaṃ deḍḍhubhakaṃ murajaṃ maddavīṇaṃ, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti (cūḷava. 278) vuttattā. Kiṃ pana bahurajjuke ekato katvā ^a^M2.0121^ea^ ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ murajasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatīti? Āma na gacchati. Murajañhi nāma nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ. Keci pana ‘‘murajanti bahurajjuke ekato saṅkaḍḍhitvā ekāya rajjuyā paliveṭhetvā katarajjū’’ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Yadi cetaṃ murajaṃ siyā, ‘‘bahurajjuke ekato katvā ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ bahurajjuka’’nti na vattabbaṃ, ‘‘taṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti idaṃ virujjheyya. Murajaṃ pana pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānañca dasāsu vaṭṭati ‘‘kāyabandhanassa dasā jīranti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, murajaṃ maddavīṇa’’nti (cūḷava. 278) vuttattā. Teneva vakkhati ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, murajaṃ maddavīṇanti idaṃ dasāsuyeva anuññāta’’nti.

[03]^b^Kāyabandhanavidhe^eb^ti ‘‘kāyabandhanassa pavananto jīrati. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vidha’’nti vuttattā kāyabandhanassa pāsante dasāmūle tassa thirabhāvatthaṃ kattabbe dantavisāṇādimaye vidhe. ^b^‘‘Aṭṭha maṅgalāni^eb^ nāma saṅkho cakkaṃ puṇṇakumbho gayā sirīvaccho aṅkuso dhajaṃ sovatthika’’nti vadanti. ^b^Paricchedalekhāmatta^eb^nti ubhosu koṭīsu kātabbaparicchedarājimattaṃ. ‘‘Ujukamevā’’ti vuttattā caturassādivaṅkagatikaṃ na vaṭṭati. ‘‘Chattadaṇḍadhammakaraṇaañjananāḷikā nānāvaṇṇalekhāpaakammakatā na vaṭṭantī’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^Ārakaṇṭake^eb^ti potthakādiabhisaṅkharaṇatthaṃ kate dīghamukhasatthake. ^b^Vaṭṭamaṇika^eb^nti vaṭṭaṃ katvā aggakoṭiyaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbapubbuḷaṃ. ^b^Aññaṃ vā vaṇṇamaṭṭha^eb^nti iminā piḷakādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Maṇika^eb^nti ekāvaṭṭamaṇi. ^b^Piḷaka^eb^nti sāsapamattikā muttarājisadisā bahuvaṭṭalekhā. ‘‘Imasmiṃ adhikāre avuttattā lekhaniyaṃ yaṃ kiñci vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Valitaka^eb^nti majjhe valiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā. ^b^Maṇḍalaṃ hotī^eb^ti uttarāraṇiyā pavesanatthaṃ āhaṭamaṇḍalaṃ hoti.

[03]Kiñcāpi ^a^V2.0108^ea^ ettha dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsiyeva vuttā, mahāvāsiyampi pana na vaṭṭatiyeva. Ujukameva bandhitunti sambandho. ‘‘Ubhosu vā passesu ekapassevā’’ti vacanaseso. Kattarayaṭṭhikoṭiyaṃ kataayovalayānipi vaṭṭanti, yesaṃ aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanena saddo niccharati.

[03]^b^Āmaṇḍasārake^eb^ti ^a^M2.0122^ea^ āmalakehi katabhājane. ^b^Bhūmattharaṇe^eb^ti cittakaṭasārakacittattharaṇādike parikammakatāya bhūmiyā attharitabbaattharaṇe. ^b^Pānīyaghaṭe^eb^ti iminā kuṇḍikasarakepi saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Bījane^eb^ti caturassabījane. ^b^Sabbaṃ…pe… vaṭṭatī^eb^ti yathāvuttesu mañcapīṭhādīsu itthirūpaṃ vinā sabbaṃ mālākammalatākammādi vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuno vaṭṭati. ^b^Senāsane kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthi aññatra viruddhasenāsanā^eb^ti etthāyamadhippāyo – senāsanaparikkhāresu paṭisedhetabbaṃ nāma kiñci natthi, viruddhasenāsanaṃ pana sayameva paṭikkhipitabbanti. ^b^Aññesa^eb^nti sīmasāmino vuttā. ^b^Rājavallabhā^eb^ paranikāyikāpi ekanikāyikāpi uposathapavāraṇānaṃ antarāyakarā alajjino rājakulūpagā vuccanti. ^b^Tesaṃ lajjiparisā^eb^ti tesaṃ sīmasāmikānaṃ pakkhā hutvā anubalaṃ dātuṃ samatthā lajjiparisā. ^b^Sukatamevā^eb^ti aññesaṃ santakepi attano sīmāya antovuttavidhinā kataṃ sukatameva.
[06]Pāḷimuttakavinicchayavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^86^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Devena gahitadārūnī^eb^ti raññā pariggahitadārūni, rañño santakānīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ karonto^eb^ti khuddakaṃ mahantañca khaṇḍaṃ karonto.
[03]^b^87^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kulabhogaissariyādīhi mahatī mattā pamāṇaṃ etassāti ^b^mahāmatto^eb^. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘mahatiyā issariyamattāya samannāgato’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^88^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Avajjhāyantī^eb^ti heṭṭhā katvā olokenti, cintenti vā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘avajānantā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Lāmakato vā cintentī^eb^ti nihīnato cintenti. ^b^Kathentī^eb^ti ‘‘kiṃ nāmetaṃ kiṃ nāmeta’’nti aññamaññaṃ kathenti.

[03]Kathaṃ panettha ‘‘dārūnī’’ti bahuvacanaṃ ‘‘adinna’’nti ekavacanena saddhiṃ sambandhamupagacchatīti āha – ^b^‘‘adinnaṃ ādiyissatīti ayaṃ ujjhāyanattho’’^eb^tiādi. Ujjhāyanassa adinnādānavisayattā adinnādānaṃ ujjhāyanatthoti vuttaṃ. Satipi panettha gopakena dinnadārūnaṃ ^a^V2.0109^ea^ gahaṇe ujukaṃ avatvā lesena gahitattā thero ‘‘adinnaṃ ādiyī’’ti veditabbo. ^b^Vacanabhede^eb^ti ekavacanabahuvacanānaṃ bhede.

[03]^b^Sabbāvantaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0123^ea^^b^parisa^eb^nti bhikkhubhikkhunīādisabbāvayavavantaṃ parisaṃ. Sabbā catuparisasaṅkhaātā pajā ettha atthīti ^b^sabbāvantā,^eb^ parisā. Senā etassa atthīti seniko, seniko eva ^b^seniyo^eb^. ^b^Bimbisāroti tassa nāma^eb^nti ettha ^b^bimbī^eb^ti suvaṇṇaṃ, tasmā sārasuvaṇṇasadisavaṇṇatāya bimbisāroti vuccatīti veditabbo. ^b^Catuttho bhāgo pādoti veditabbo^eb^ti imināva sabbajanapadesu kahāpaṇassa vīsatimo bhāgo māsakoti idañca vuttameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Porāṇasatthānurūpaṃ lakkhaṇasampannā uppāditā ^b^nīlakahāpaṇā^eb^ti veditabbā. Rudradāmena uppādito ^b^rudradāmako^eb^. So kira nīlakahāpaṇassa tibhāgaṃ agghati. Yasmiṃ padese nīlakahāpaṇā na santi, tatthāpi nīlakahāpaṇānaṃ vaḷañjanaṭṭhāne ca avaḷañjanaṭṭhāne ca samānaagghavasena pavattamānaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā nīlakahāpaṇavaseneva paricchedo kātabboti vadanti.
[06]Dhaniyavatthuvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Tassattho…pe… vuttanayeneva veditabbo^eb^ti iminā ‘‘bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ evaṃ paññattaṃ hoti ca, idañca aññaṃ vatthu udapādī’’ti evaṃ ^b^paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (pārā. aṭṭha. 1.39) vuttanayena tassattho veditabbo. ‘‘Idāni yaṃ taṃ aññaṃ vatthu uppannaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ‘tena kho pana samayenā’tiādimāhā’’ti evaṃ anupaññattisambandho ca tattha vuttanayeneva veditabboti dasseti.

[03]^b^90-91^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rajakā attharanti etthāti ^b^rajakattharaṇaṃ,^eb^ rajakattharaṇanti rajakatitthaṃ vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘rajakatitthaṃ gantvā’’^eb^ti. Vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvento āha ^b^‘‘tañhī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^92^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Abhinavaniviṭṭho ekakuṭikādigāmo yāva manussā pavisitvā vāsaṃ na kappenti, tāva gāmasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatī’’ti vadanti, tasmā tattha gāmappavesanāpucchādikiccampi natthi. ^b^Yakkhapariggahabhūto^eb^ti saupaddavavasena vuttaṃ, yakkhanagarādiṃ vā saṅgaṇhāti. Yakkhanagarampi āpaṇādīsu dissamānesu gāmasaṅkhyaṃ ^a^M2.0124^ea^ gacchati, adissamānesu na gacchati, tasmā ^a^V2.0110^ea^ yakkhanagarampi pavisantena āpaṇādīsu dissamānesu sabbaṃ gāmappavesanavattaṃ kātabbaṃ, adissamānesu na kātabbanti vadanti. ^b^Punapi āgantukāmā^eb^ti iminā tesaṃ tattha sāpekkhabhāvaṃ dasseti. Yato pana nirapekkhāva hutvā pakkamanti, so gāmasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati, tasmā tattha gāmappavesanāpucchādikiccampi natthi.

[03]Nanu ca ‘‘gāmā vā araññā vā’’ti ettakameva mātikāyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā gāmalakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā araññameva dassetabbaṃ siyā, gāmūpacāro nāmātiādi pana kasmā vuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘gāmūpacārotiādi araññaparicchedadassanatthaṃ vutta’’^eb^nti. Gāmūpacāre hi dassite ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmāti araññaparicchedo sakkā dassetuṃ, idañca gāmagāmūpacāre asaṅkarato dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Mātikāyaṃ pana gāmaggahaṇeneva gāmūpacāropi saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Gāmūpacāro hi loke gāmasaṅkhyameva gacchati. Evañca katvā mātikāya anavasesaavaharaṇaṭṭhānapariggaho siddho hoti. ^b^Indakhīle^eb^ti ummāre. ^b^Araññasaṅkhepaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti ‘‘nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña’’nti (vibha. 529) abhidhamme vuttattā. ^b^Vemajjhameva indakhīloti vuccatī^eb^ti indakhīlaṭṭhāniyattā asatipi indakhīle vemajjhameva tathā vuccati. Yattha pana dvārabāhāpi natthi, tattha ubhosu passesu vatiyā vā pākārassa vā koṭivemajjhameva indakhīlaṭṭhāniyattā ‘‘indakhīlo’’ti gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Uḍḍāpento^eb^ti palāpento. ^b^Luṭhitvā^eb^ti parivattetvā.

[03]^b^Majjhimassa purisassā^eb^ti thāmamajjhimassa purisassa. Iminā pana vacanena suppamusalapātopi baladassanavaseneva katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ mahāpaccariyañca^eb^ gharūpacāro gāmoti adhippāyena ‘‘gharūpacāre ṭhitassa leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāro’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Dvāre^eb^ti nibbakosassa udakapatanaṭṭhānato abbhantaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Antogehe^eb^ti ca pamukhassa abbhantarameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Kataparikkhepo^eb^ti imināva gharassa samantato tattako paricchedo gharūpacāro nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yassa pana gharassa samantato gorūpānaṃ pavesananivāraṇatthaṃ pākāravatiādīhi parikkhepo kato hoti, tattha sova parikkhepo gharūpacāro, suppapātādiparicchedo pana aparikkhittagharaṃ sandhāya vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ ^a^M2.0125^ea^. ^b^Idamettha pamāṇa^eb^nti vikālagāmappavesanādīsu gāmagāmūpacārānaṃ asaṅkarato vinicchayassa veditabbattā. ^b^Kurundī^eb^ādīsu vuttanayena hi gharūpacārassa gāmoti āpannattā gharagharūpacāragāmagāmūpacārānaṃ saṅkaro siyā. ^b^Evaṃ sabbatthā^eb^ti iminā ito pubbepi pacchimasseva vādassa pamāṇabhāvaṃ dasseti ^a^V2.0111^ea^. Keci pana ‘‘ito paṭṭhāya vakkhamānavādaṃ sandhāya vutta’’nti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sesampī^eb^ti gāmūpacāralakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ gāmūpacāraggahaṇe. ^b^Tassa gāmaparicchedadassanattha^eb^nti tassa aparicchedassa gāmassa gāmaparicchedaṃ dassetunti attho. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘gāmo nāmā’’ti padaṃ uddharitvā ‘‘aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto’’ti kasmā na vuttanti? ‘‘Gāmo nāmāti idha avuttampi adhikāravasena labbhatiyevā’’ti vadanti. Apare pana bhaṇanti ‘‘gāmūpacāro nāmāti imināva gāmassa ca gāmūpacārassa ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Kathaṃ? ‘Gāmassa upacāro gāmūpacāro’ti evaṃ viggahe kariyamāne ‘parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto’ti iminā parikkhittassa gāmassa gāmūpacāralakkhaṇaṃ dassitaṃ hoti, ‘gāmasaṅkhāto upacāro gāmūpacāro’ti evaṃ pana gayhamāne ‘aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto’ti iminā aparikkhittassa gāmassa gāmaparicchedo dassitoti sakkā viññātu’’nti. ‘‘Gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto’’ti iminā parikkhittassapi gāmassa sace leḍḍupātato dūre parikkhepo hoti, leḍḍupātoyeva gāmaparicchedoti gahetabbanti vadanti. ^b^Pubbe vuttanayenevā^eb^ti parikkhittagāme vuttanayeneva.

[03]^b^Saṅkarīyatī^eb^ti missīyati. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti gharagharūpacāragāmagāmūpacāresu. ‘‘Vikāle gāmappavesane parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassa, aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassā’’ti (pāci. 513) vuttattā gāmagāmūpacārānaṃ asaṅkaratā icchitabbāti āha – ^b^‘‘asaṅkarato cettha vinicchayo veditabbo vikāle gāmappavesanādīsū’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca ‘‘parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ, aparikkhittassa ^a^M2.0126^ea^ parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamantassa vikālagāmappavesanāpatti hotī’’ti keci vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ padabhājaniyaṃ pana ‘‘parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassa, aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassā’’ti (pāci. 513) vuttattā. Aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacārato paṭṭhāya dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhātassa gāmūpacārassa okkamane āpatti veditabbā. Teneva ^b^vikālagāmappavesanasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (pāci. aṭṭha. 512) ‘‘aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro adinnādāne vuttanayeneva veditabbo’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. dutiyapārājikavaṇṇanā) vuttaṃ ‘‘yvāyaṃ aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro dassito, tassa vasena ^a^V2.0112^ea^ vikālagāmappavesanādīsu āpatti paricchinditabbā’’ti. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘vikāle gāmaṃ paviseyyā’’ti iminā virujjhatīti? Na virujjhati gāmūpacārassapi gāmaggahaṇena gahitattā. Tasmā parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa, aparikkhittassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa vikālagāmappavesanāpatti hotīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ. ^b^Vikāle gāmappavesanādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena gharagharūpacārādīsu ṭhitānaṃ uppannalābhabhājanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā^eb^ti indakhīlato bahi nikkhamitvāti attho. Ettha ca vinayapariyāyena tāva ‘‘ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ arañña’’nti (pārā. 92) āgataṃ, suttantapariyāyena āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya ‘‘āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima’’nti (pārā. 654) āgataṃ. Vinayasuttantā ubhopi pariyāyadesanā nāma, abhidhammo pana nippariyāyadesanā. Nippariyāyato ca gāmavinimuttaṃ ṭhānaṃ araññameva hotīti abhidhammapariyāyena araññaṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā’’ti (vibha. 529) vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Ācariyadhanu^eb^ nāma pakatihatthena navavidatthippamāṇaṃ, jiyāya pana āropitāya catuhatthappamāṇa’’nti vadanti. ^b^Lesokāsanisedhanattha^eb^nti ‘‘mayā neva gāme, na araññe haṭaṃ, ghare vā gharūpacāresu vā gāmūpacāresu vā aññatarasmi’’nti vattuṃ mā labhatūti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Kappiya^eb^nti anurūpavasena vuttaṃ. Akappiyampi pana appaṭiggahitañce, adinnasaṅkhyameva gacchati. Pariccāgādimhi akate ‘‘idaṃ mayhaṃ santaka’’nti aviditampi parapariggahitameva ^a^M2.0127^ea^ mātāpitūnaṃ accayena mandānaṃ uttānaseyyakānaṃ dārakānaṃ santakamiva.

[03]Yassa vasena puriso thenoti vuccati, taṃ ^b^theyya^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘avaharaṇacittassetaṃ adhivacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Saṅkhā^eb^-saddo ñāṇakoṭṭhāsapaññattigaṇanādīsu dissati. ‘‘Saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevatī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.168) hi ñāṇe dissati. ‘‘Papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācarantī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.204) koṭṭhāse. ‘‘Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhā samaññā’’tiādīsu (dha. sa. 1313) paññattiyaṃ. ‘‘Na sukaraṃ saṅkhātu’’ntiādīsu (dha. pa. 196; apa. thera. 1.10.2) gaṇanāyaṃ. Tattha koṭṭhāsavacanaṃ saṅkhā-saddaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘saṅkhāsaṅkhātanti atthato eka’’^eb^nti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘koṭṭhāsassetaṃ adhivacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Papañcasaṅkhā^eb^ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhisaṅkhātā papañcakoṭṭhāsā. ^b^‘‘Eko cittakoṭṭhāso^eb^ti yañca pubbabhāge avaharissāmīti pavattaṃ cittaṃ, yañca gamanādisādhakaṃ parāmasanādisādhakaṃ vā majjhe pavattaṃ, yañca ^a^V2.0113^ea^ ṭhānācāvanappayogasādhakaṃ, tesu ayameveko pacchimo cittakoṭṭhāso idhādhippeto’’ti keci vadanti. ^b^Cūḷagaṇṭhipade^eb^ pana ‘‘ūnamāsakamāsakaūnapañcamāsakapañcamāsakāvaharaṇacittesu eko cittakoṭṭhāso’’ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Anekappabhedattā cittassa eko cittakoṭṭhāsoti vutta’’nti ^b^mahāgaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade^eb^ ca vuttaṃ. Idamevettha sundarataraṃ ‘‘theyyacittasaṅkhāto eko cittakoṭṭhāso’’ti vuttattā. ^b^Theyyasaṅkhātenā^eb^ti theyyacittakoṭṭhāsena karaṇabhūtena, na vissāsatāvakālikādigāhavasappavattacittakoṭṭhāsenāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Abhiyogavasenā^eb^ti aḍḍakaraṇavasena. ^b^Abhiyuñjatī^eb^ti codeti, aḍḍaṃ karotīti attho. ^b^Parikappitaṭṭhāna^eb^nti okāsaparikappanavasena parikappitappadesaṃ. ^b^Suṅkaghāta^eb^nti ettha rājūnaṃ deyyabhāgassa etaṃ adhivacanaṃ suṅkoti, so ettha haññati adatvā gacchantehīti suṅkaghāto. ‘‘Ettha paviṭṭhehi suṅko dātabbo’’ti rukkhapabbatādisaññāṇena niyamitappadesassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.

[03]^b^Ākulā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0128^ea^ saṅkulā. ^b^Luḷitā^eb^ti viloḷitā. ^b^Katthacī^eb^ti ekissāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. ^b^Ekaṃ pañcakaṃ dassita^eb^nti ‘‘parapariggahitañca hoti, parapariggahitasaññī ca, garuko ca hoti parikkhāro pañcamāsako vā atirekapañcamāsako vā, theyyacittañca paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti, āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Phandāpeti, āpatti thullaccayassa. Ṭhānā cāveti, āpatti pārājikassā’’ti (pārā. 122) evaṃ vuttapañcaavahāraṅgāni ekaṃ pañcakanti dassitaṃ. ^b^Dve pañcakāni dassitānī^eb^ti ‘‘chahākārehi adinnaṃ ādiyantassa āpatti pārājikassa. Na ca sakasaññī, na ca vissāsaggāhī, na ca tāvakālikaṃ, garuko ca hoti parikkhāro pañcamāsako vā atirekapañcamāsako vā, theyyacittañca paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti, āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Phandāpeti, āpatti thullaccayassa. Ṭhānā cāveti, āpatti pārājikassā’’ti evaṃ vuttesu chasu padesu ekaṃ apanetvā avasesāni pañca padāni ekaṃ pañcakanti dassetvā heṭṭhā vuttapañcakañca gahetvā dve pañcakāni dassitāni. ^b^Ettha panā^eb^ti ‘‘pañcahākārehi adinnaṃ ādiyantassā’’tiādīsu. ^b^Sabbehipi padehī^eb^ti ‘‘parapariggahitañca hotī’’tiādīhi padehi. ^b^Labbhamānāniyeva pañcakānī^eb^ti pañcavīsatiyā avahāresu labbhamānapañcakāni.

[03]Pañcannaṃ avahārānaṃ samūho pañcakaṃ, sako hattho sahattho, tena nibbatto, tassa vā sambandhīti ^a^V2.0114^ea^ sāhatthiko, avahāro. Sāhatthikādi pañcakaṃ ^b^sāhatthikapañcaka^eb^nti ādipadavasena nāmalābho daṭṭhabbo kusalādittikassa kusalattikavohāro viya. Imināva nayena pubbapayogādi pañcakaṃ ^b^pubbapayogapañcakaṃ,^eb^ theyyāvahārādi pañcakaṃ ^b^theyyāvahārapañcaka^eb^nti nāmalābho daṭṭhabboti. ^b^Tatiyapañcamesu pañcakesū^eb^ti sāhatthikapañcakatheyyāvahārapañcakesu. ^b^Labbhamānapadavasenā^eb^ti sāhatthikapañcake labbhamānassa nissaggiyāvahārapadassa vasena theyyāvahārapañcake labbhamānassa parikappāvahārapadassa ca vasena yojetabbanti attho.

[03]Āṇattiyā nibbatto avahāro ^b^āṇattiko^eb^. Nissajjanaṃ nissaggo, suṅkaghātaṭṭhāne parikappitokāse vā ṭhatvā bhaṇḍassa bahi pātanaṃ. Nissaggova ^b^nissaggiyo^eb^. Kiriyāsiddhito puretarameva pārājikāpattisaṅkhātaṃ ^a^M2.0129^ea^ atthaṃ sādhetīti ^b^atthasādhako^eb^. ‘‘Asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ yadā sakkosi, tadā avaharā’’ti evarūpo hi āṇāpanapayogo parassa telakumbhiyā pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ avassaṃ pivanakānaṃ upāhanādīnaṃ nikkhepapayogo ca āṇattassa bhaṇḍaggahaṇato upāhanādīnaṃ telapātanato ca puretarameva pārājikāpattisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sādheti. Sāhatthikapayogopi hi evarūpo atthasādhakoti vuccati. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. dutiyapārājikavaṇṇanā) –

[08]‘‘Atthasādhako nāma ‘asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ yadā sakkosi, tadā taṃ avaharā’ti āṇāpeti. Tattha sace paro anantarāyiko hutvā taṃ avaharati, āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva pārājikaṃ. Parassa vā pana telakumbhiyā pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ avassaṃ pivanakāni upāhanādīni pakkhipati, hatthato muttamatteyeva pārājika’’nti.

[03]Dhurassa nikkhipanaṃ ^b^dhuranikkhepo^eb^. Ārāmābhiyuñjanādīsu attano ca parassa ca dānaggahaṇesu nirussāhabhāvāpajjanaṃ. ^b^Sahatthā avaharatī^eb^ti sahatthena gaṇhāti. ^b^‘‘Asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā’’ti aññaṃ āṇāpetī^eb^ti etthāpi āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva āpatti daṭṭhabbā. Yadi evaṃ imassa, atthasādhakassa ca ko visesoti? Taṅkhaṇaññeva gahaṇe niyuñjanaṃ āṇattikapayogo, kālantarena gahaṇatthaṃ niyogo atthasādhakoti ayametesaṃ viseso. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ yadā sakkosi, tadā avaharāti āṇāpetī’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca āṇāpanapayogova atthasādhakoti dassito, sāhatthikavasenapi atthasādhakapayogo pana upari āvi bhavissati. ^b^Dhuranikkhepo pana upanikkhittabhaṇḍavasena veditabbo^eb^ti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ. Ārāmābhiyuñjanādīsupi tāvakālikabhaṇḍadeyyānaṃ adānepi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^‘‘Āṇattivasena^eb^^a^V2.0115^ea^^b^pubbapayogo veditabbo’’^eb^ti vuttattā anantarāyena gaṇhantassa ‘asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā’ti āṇāpanaṃ bhaṇḍaggahaṇato pubbattā ^b^pubbapayogo,^eb^ payogena saha vattamāno avahāro ^b^sahapayogo,^eb^ ‘‘asukaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ harissāmā’’ti saṃvidahitvā ^a^M2.0130^ea^ sammantayitvā avaharaṇaṃ ^b^saṃvidāvahāro^eb^. ^b^Saṅketakammaṃ^eb^ nāma pubbaṇhādikālaparicchedavasena sañjānanakammaṃ, ^b^nimittakammaṃ^eb^ nāma saññuppādanatthaṃ akkhinikhaṇanādinimittakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Ṭhānācāvanavasena sahapayogo^eb^ti idaṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, khilasaṅkamanādīsupi asati ca ṭhānācāvane sahapayogo daṭṭhabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. dutiyapārājikavaṇṇanā) ‘‘ṭhānācāvanavasena khilādīni saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasena ca sahapayogo veditabbo’’ti.

[03]Theno vuccati coro, tassa bhāvo theyyaṃ, tena avaharaṇaṃ ^b^theyyāvahāro^eb^. Yo hi sandhicchedādīni katvā adissamāno avaharati, tulākūṭamānakūṭakūṭakahāpaṇādīhi vā vañcetvā gaṇhāti, tassevaṃ gaṇhato avahāro theyyāvahāro. Pasayha abhibhavitvā avaharaṇaṃ ^b^pasayhāvahāro^eb^. Yo hi pasayha balakkārena paresaṃ santakaṃ gaṇhāti gāmaghātakādayo viya, attano pattabalito vā vuttanayena adhikaṃ gaṇhāti rājabhaṭādayo viya, tassevaṃ gaṇhato avahāro pasayhāvahāro. Bhaṇḍavasena ca okāsavasena ca parikappetvā avaharaṇaṃ ^b^parikappāvahāro^eb^. Tiṇapaṇṇādīhi aṅgulimuddikādiṃ paṭicchādetvā pacchā tassa paṭicchannassa avaharaṇaṃ ^b^paṭicchannāvahāro^eb^. Kusaṃ saṅkāmetvā avaharaṇaṃ ^b^kusāvahāro^eb^.

[03]^b^Tulayitvā^eb^ti upaparikkhitvā. ^b^Sāmīcī^eb^ti vattaṃ, āpatti pana natthīti adhippāyo. ^b^Mahājanasammaddo^eb^ti mahājanasaṅkhobho. ^b^Bhaṭṭhe janakāye^eb^ti apagate janakāye. ^b^‘‘Idañca kāsāvaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā etasseva bhikkhuno dehī’’^eb^ti kiṃkāraṇā evamāha? Cīvarasāmikena yasmā dhuranikkhepo kato, tasmā tassa adinnaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Avahārakopi vippaṭisārassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya cīvarasāmikaṃ pariyesanto vicarati ‘‘dassāmī’’ti, cīvarasāmikena ca ‘‘mameta’’nti vutte etenapi avahārakena ālayo pariccatto, tasmā evamāha. Yadi evaṃ cīvarasāmikoyeva ‘‘attano santakaṃ gaṇhāhī’’ti kasmā na vuttoti? Ubhinnampi kukkuccavinodanatthaṃ. Kathaṃ? Avahārakassa ‘‘mayā sahatthena na dinnaṃ, bhaṇḍadeyyameta’’nti kukkuccaṃ uppajjeyya, itarassa ‘‘mayā paṭhamaṃ dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā pacchā adinnaṃ gahita’’nti kukkuccaṃ uppajjeyyāti.

[03]^b^Samaggha^eb^nti ^a^M2.0131^ea^ appagghaṃ. ^b^Dāruatthaṃ pharatī^eb^ti dārūhi kattabbakiccaṃ sādheti. ^b^Mayi sante^eb^tiādi ^a^V2.0116^ea^ sabbaṃ raññā pasādena vuttaṃ, ‘‘therena pana ananucchavikaṃ kata’’nti na maññitabbaṃ.
[06]Ekadivasaṃ dantakaṭṭhacchedanādinā yā ayaṃ agghahāni vuttā, sā sabbā bhaṇḍasāminā

[03]Kiṇitvā gahitameva sandhāya vuttā, sabbaṃ panetaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena gahetabbaṃ. Pāsāṇañca sakkharañca ^b^pāsāṇasakkharaṃ^eb^. ^b^Dhāreyyatthaṃ vicakkhaṇo^eb^ti imasseva vivaraṇaṃ ^b^‘‘āpattiṃ vā anāpattiṃ vā’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Pañcavīsatiavahārakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Akkhadassā^eb^ti ettha ^b^akkha^eb^-saddena kira vinicchayasālā vuccati. Tattha nisīditvā vajjāvajjaṃ passantīti ^b^akkhadassā^eb^ vuccanti dhammavinicchanakā. ^b^Haneyyu^eb^nti ettha hananaṃ nāma hatthapādādīhi pothanañceva sīsādicchedanañca hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘haneyyunti potheyyuñceva chindeyyuñcā’’^eb^ti. Teneva padabhājaniyañca ‘‘hatthena vā pādena vā kasāya vā vettena vā aḍḍhadaṇḍakena vā chejjāya vā haneyyu’’nti vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^aḍḍhadaṇḍakenā^eb^ti dvihatthappamāṇena rassamuggarena veḷupesikāya vā. ^b^Chejjāyā^eb^ti hatthapādasīsādīnaṃ chedanena. ^b^Nīhareyyu^eb^nti gāmanigamādito nīhareyyuṃ. ^b^Corosi…pe… thenosī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘paribhāseyyu’’nti padaṃ ajjhāharitvā attho veditabboti āha ^b^‘‘corosīti evamādīni ca vatvā paribhāseyyu’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^93^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yaṃ taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ dassitanti sambandho. ^b^Yattha yattha ṭhita^eb^nti bhūmiādīsu yattha yattha ṭhitaṃ. ^b^Yathā yathā ādānaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti bhūmiādīsu ṭhitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sabbaso aggahaṇepi yena yena ākārena gahaṇaṃ upagacchati.

[03]^b^94^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Phandāpeti, sabbattha dukkaṭamevā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘uṭṭhahissāmī’’ti phandāpetvā puna anuṭṭhahitvā tattheva sayantassapi aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ aphandāpetvā ekapayogena uṭṭhahantassapi dukkaṭamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Aññasmiṃ vā gamanassa^eb^^a^M2.0132^ea^^b^anupakāre^eb^ti yathā dvārapidahane kumbhiṭṭhānagamanassa anupakārattā anāpatti, evaṃ aññasmiṃ vā gamanassa anupakāre kāyavacīkamme anāpatti. ^b^Vācāya vācāyā^eb^ti ekekatthadīpikāya vācāya vācāya. ^b^Upaladdho^eb^ti ñāto. ^b^Puññāni ca karissāmā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘musāvādaṃ katvā puññāni karissāmāti vadantassa dukkaṭamevā’’ti ^a^V2.0117^ea^^b^tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ, taṃ imasmiṃyeva padese aṭṭhakathāvacanena virujjhati. Tathā hi ‘‘yaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ musā, tattha tattha pācittiya’’nti ca ‘‘na hi adinnādānassa pubbapayoge pācittiyaṭṭhāne dukkaṭaṃ nāma atthī’’ti ca vakkhati. Evaṃ pana vutte na virujjhati ‘‘musāvādaṃ katvā puññāni ca karissāmāti vadantassa pācittiyena saddhiṃ dukkaṭa’’nti. Tathā hi ‘‘akappiyapathaviṃ khaṇantānaṃ dukkaṭehi saddhiṃ pācittiyānīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vutta’’nti ca ‘‘yathā ca idha, evaṃ sabbattha pācittiyaṭṭhāne dukkaṭā na muccatī’’ti ca vakkhati. Sace pana kusalacitto ‘‘puññāni karissāmā’’ti vadati, anāpatti ‘‘buddhapūjaṃ vā dhammapūjaṃ vā saṅghabhattaṃ vā karissāmāti kusalaṃ uppādeti, kusalacittena gamane anāpattī’’ti ca ‘‘yathā ca idha, evaṃ sabbattha atheyyacittassa anāpattī’’ti ca vakkhamānattā.

[03]^b^Pamādalikhitanti veditabba^eb^nti aparabhāge potthakāruḷhakāle pamajjitvā likhitanti veditabbaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ sesaaṭṭhakathāsu ca ‘‘kudālaṃ vā piṭakaṃ vā’’ti idameva dvayaṃ vatvā vāsipharasūnaṃ avuttattā tesampi saṅkhepaṭṭhakathādīsu āgatabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘saṅkhepaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahāpaccariyañcā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Theyyacittena katattā ‘‘dukkaṭehi saddhiṃ pācittiyānī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tato paraṃ sabbakiriyāsū^eb^ti bījaggahaṇato paraṃ kattabbakiriyāsu. ^b^Sabbaṃ purimanayenevā^eb^ti yāva piṭakapariyosānā hatthavārapadavāresu dukkaṭaṃ.

[03]^b^Therehi dassita^eb^nti pubbapayogasahapayogadukkaṭesu asammohatthaṃ samodhānetvā dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi dassitaṃ. ‘‘Sabbesampi dukkaṭānaṃ imesuyeva aṭṭhasu saṅgahetabbabhāvato itarehi sattahi dukkaṭehi vinimuttaṃ vinayadukkaṭeyeva saṅgahetabba’’nti vadanti. ^b^Dasavidhaṃ ratana^eb^nti ‘‘muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ lohitaṅgo masāragalla’’nti evamāgataṃ dasavidhaṃ ratanaṃ.
[21]‘‘Maṇi ^a^M2.0133^ea^ muttā veḷuriyo ca saṅkho,
[27]Silā pavāḷaṃ rajatañca hemaṃ;
[26]Salohitaṅgañca masāragallaṃ,
[22]Daseti dhīro ratanāni jaññā’’ti. –
[07]Hi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Sattavidhaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0118^ea^^b^dhañña^eb^nti sāli vīhi yavo kaṅgu kudrūso varako godhumoti idaṃ sattavidhaṃ dhaññaṃ. ^b^Āvudhabhaṇḍādi^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tūriyabhaṇḍaitthirūpādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Anāmasitabbe vatthumhi dukkaṭaṃ ^b^anāmāsadukkaṭaṃ^eb^. ^b^Durupaciṇṇadukkaṭa^eb^nti ‘‘na kattabba’’nti vāritassa katattā duṭṭhu āciṇṇaṃ caritanti durupaciṇṇaṃ, tasmiṃ dukkaṭaṃ durupaciṇṇadukkaṭaṃ. Vinaye paññattaṃ dukkaṭaṃ ^b^vinayadukkaṭaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Saṅghabhedāya parakkamatī’’ti sutvā taṃnivāraṇatthāya ñāte atthe avadantassa ^b^ñātadukkaṭaṃ^eb^. Ekādasa samanubhāsanā nāma bhikkhupātimokkhe cattāro yāvatatiyakā saṅghādisesā, ariṭṭhasikkhāpadanti pañca, bhikkhunīpātimokkhe ekaṃ yāvatatiyakaṃ pārājikaṃ, cattāro saṅghādisesā, caṇḍakāḷīsikkhāpadanti cha. Vassāvāsādiṃ paṭissuṇitvā na sampādentassa paṭissavanimittaṃ dukkaṭaṃ ^b^paṭissavadukkaṭaṃ^eb^.
[21]Pubbasahapayoge ca, anāmāsadurupaciṇṇe;
[27]Vinaye ceva ñāte ca, ñattiyā ca paṭissave;
[22]Aṭṭhete dukkaṭā vuttā, vinaye vinayaññunā.

[03]Sahapayogato paṭṭhāya cettha purimā purimā āpattiyo paṭippassambhantīti āha ^b^‘‘atha dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ‘‘dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā’’ti vuttattā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā khaṇantassa purimāpattiyo na paṭippassambhantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Viyūhanadukkaṭaṃ paṭippassambhati, uddharaṇadukkaṭe patiṭṭhātī^eb^ti idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatānukkamena dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Yadi pana paṃsuṃ uddharitvā saussāhova puna khaṇati, uddharaṇadukkaṭaṃ paṭippassambhati, khaṇanadukkaṭe patiṭṭhāti.

[03]Kataṃ karaṇaṃ kiriyāti atthato ekanti āha ^b^‘‘virūpā sā kiriyā’’^eb^ti. Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ ^b^parivārapāḷiyā^eb^ nidassento ^b^‘‘vuttampi ceta’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^aparaddhaṃ viraddhaṃ khalita^eb^nti sabbametaṃ ^b^yañca dukkaṭa^eb^nti ettha vuttassa dukkaṭassa pariyāyavacanaṃ. Yañhi duṭṭhu kataṃ, virūpaṃ vā kataṃ ^a^M2.0134^ea^, taṃ dukkaṭaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ yathā satthārā vuttaṃ, evaṃ akatattā ^b^aparaddhaṃ,^eb^ kusalaṃ virajjhitvā pavattattā ^b^viraddhaṃ,^eb^ ariyavaṃsappaṭipadaṃ anāruḷhattā ^b^khalitaṃ^eb^. ^b^Yaṃ manusso kare^eb^ti idaṃ panettha opammanidassanaṃ. Tassattho – yathā yaṃ loke manusso āvi vā yadi vā raho pāpaṃ karoti, taṃ dukkaṭanti pavedenti, evamidampi buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena lāmakabhāvena pāpaṃ, tasmā dukkaṭanti veditabbanti.

[03]Yathā ^a^V2.0119^ea^ dukkhā, kucchitā vā gati dugatīti vattabbe ‘‘duggatī’’ti vuttaṃ, yathā ca kaṭukaṃ phalametassāti kaṭukaphalanti vattabbe ‘‘kaṭukapphala’’nti vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi thūlattā accayattā ca thūlaccayanti vattabbe ‘‘thullaccaya’’nti vuttanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘samparāye ca duggatī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Saṃyoge pana kate saṃyogaparassa rassattaṃ siddhamevāti manasi katvā ^b^‘‘saṃyogabhāvo veditabbo’’^eb^ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. ^b^Ekassa mūle^eb^ti ekassa santike. ^b^Accayo tena samo natthī^eb^ti desanāgāmīsu accayesu tena samo thūlo accayo natthi. ^b^Tenetaṃ iti vuccatī^eb^ti thūlattā accayassa etaṃ thullaccayanti vuccatīti attho.

[03]‘‘Sabbatthāpi āmasane dukkaṭaṃ phandāpane thullaccayañca visuṃ visuṃ theyyacittena āmasanaphandāpanapayogaṃ karontasseva hoti, ekapayogena gaṇhantassa pana uddhāre pārājikameva, na dukkaṭathullaccayānī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Sahapayogaṃ pana akatvā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘pubbapayoge āpannāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā abhāvato sahapayogaṃ katvāpi lajjidhammaṃ okkantena pubbapayoge āpannāpattiyo desetabbā’’ti ^b^tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ pana kate sahapayoge pubbapayoge āpannāpattīnampi paṭippassaddhiṃ dīpeti, aññathā ‘‘sahapayogaṃ pana akatvā’’ti idaṃ visesanameva niratthakaṃ siyā. Yañca heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ‘‘sace panassa tatthajātake tiṇarukkhalatādimhi chinnepi lajjidhammo okkamati, saṃvaro uppajjati, chedanapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ desetvā muccatī’’ti, tampi sahapayoge kate pubbapayoge āpannāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhimeva dīpeti sahapayoge chedanapaccayā āpannadukkaṭasseva desanāya vuttattā. ^b^Sahapayogato paṭṭhāyevā^eb^ti ca idaṃ sahapayogaṃ pattassa tato pubbe āpannānaṃ pubbapayogāpattīnampi paṭippassaddhiṃ dīpeti. Tena hi ayamattho viññāyati ‘‘yāva sahapayogaṃ na pāpuṇāti, tāva pubbe āpannāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhi na ^a^M2.0135^ea^ hoti, sahapayogaṃ pattakālato pana paṭṭhāya tāsampi paṭippassaddhi hotī’’ti, tasmā suṭṭhu upaparikkhitvā yuttataraṃ gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Bahukāpi āpattiyo hontu, ekameva desetvā muccatī^eb^ti etthāyamadhippāyo – sace khaṇanaviyūhanuddharaṇesu dasa dasa katvā āpattiyo āpannā, tāsu uddharaṇe dasa āpattiyo desetvā muccati visabhāgakiriyaṃ patvā purimāpurimāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhattāti. Jātivasena pana samānakiriyāya āpannāpattiyo ekattena gahetvā ‘‘ekameva desetvā’’ti vuttaṃ, tasmā imināpi kurundaṭṭhakathāvacanena paṭhamaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttapurimāpattipaṭippassaddhimeva samatthayati, na pana ubhinnaṃ aṭṭhakathānaṃ atthato nānākaraṇaṃ atthi. Aparampettha pakāraṃ vaṇṇayanti ‘‘samānakiriyāsupi purimapurimakhaṇanapaccayā āpannāpattiyo pacchimapacchimakhaṇanaṃ patvā paṭippassambhantīti ^a^V2.0120^ea^ iminā adhippāyena ‘paṃsukhaṇanādīsu ca lajjidhamme uppanne bahukāpi āpattiyo hontu, ekameva desetvā muccatīti ^b^kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ vutta’’’nti. ‘‘Evañca sati ‘bahukāpi āpattiyo hontū’ti na vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, vuttañca, tasmā visabhāgakiriyameva patvā purimāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ icchanteneva bahukāsupi āpattīsu ekameva desetvā muccatīti imasmiṃ ṭhāne visuṃyeveko desanākkamo dassito’’tipi vadanti. Ayametesaṃ adhippāyo – yathā idha purimāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhi aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena gahitā, evaṃ bahukāsupi āpattīsu ekameva desetvā muccatīti idampi idha aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇatoyeva veditabbaṃ. Yathā ca pāḷiyaṃ pācittiyaṭṭhānepi dukkaṭameva hotīti idha āveṇikaṃ katvā āpattiviseso dassito, evaṃ purimāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhiviseso ca desanāviseso ca aṭṭhakathācariyehi dassitoti.

[03]^b^Heṭṭhato osīdento^eb^ti ‘‘sāmikesu āgantvā apassitvā gatesu gaṇhissāmī’’ti theyyacittena heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ osīdento. ^b^Bundenā^eb^ti kumbhiyā heṭṭhimatalena. Evaṃ ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitāya kumbhiyā ṭhānācāvanaṃ chahi ākārehi veditabbanti sambandho. ^b^Valayaṃ nīharati, pārājika^eb^nti ākāsagataṃ akatvā ghaṃsitvā nīharantassa chinnakoṭito nīhaṭamatte pārājikaṃ. ^b^Ito cito ca sāretī^eb^ti ghaṃsantoyeva ākāsagataṃ akatvā sāreti.

[03]^b^Chinnamatte^eb^^a^M2.0136^ea^^b^pārājika^eb^nti avassaṃ ce patati, chinnamatte pārājikaṃ. ^b^Paricchedo^eb^ti ‘‘pañcamāsakaṃ vā atirekapañcamāsakaṃ vā’’ti vuttagaṇanaparicchedo. ^b^Apabyūhanto^eb^ti ‘‘heṭṭhā ṭhitaṃ gaṇhissāmī’’ti hatthena dvidhā karonto. ^b^Upaḍḍhakumbhiya^eb^nti upaḍḍhapuṇṇāya kumbhiyā. Nanu ca aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena saṅkhepaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttampi kasmā na gahetabbanti āha – ^b^‘‘vinayavinicchaye hi āgate garuke ṭhātabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vinayadhammatā^eb^ti vinayagarukānaṃ dhammatā. Vinayagarukā hi vinayavinicchaye āgate garuke tiṭṭhanti. Vinayagarukatābyāpanatthañhi vinayagarukoyevettha vinaya-saddena vutto, vinayassa vā esā dhammatā tesaṃ garugāravaṭṭhānassa vinayavisayattā.

[03]Idāni saṅkhepaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttaṃ pāḷiyāpi na sametīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Bhājana^eb^nti pattādibhājanaṃ. Pattādiṃ apūretvā gaṇhantassa anuddhaṭepi mukhavaṭṭiparicchedo hoti, pūretvā gaṇhantassa pana uddharaṇakāle hotīti āha ^b^‘‘mukhavaṭṭiparicchedena vā uddhārena vā’’^eb^ti. Yadā pana telakumbhīādīsu telādīnaṃ abahubhāvato bhājanaṃ ^a^V2.0121^ea^ nimujjāpetvā gaṇhituṃ na sakkā hoti, tadā mukhavaṭṭiparicchedeneva hoti. ^b^Cikkana^eb^nti thaddhaṃ. ^b^Ākaḍḍhanavikaḍḍhanayogga^eb^nti ettha abhimukhaṃ kaḍḍhanaṃ ^b^ākaḍḍhanaṃ,^eb^ parato kaḍḍhanaṃ ^b^vikaḍḍhanaṃ^eb^. ^b^Paṭinīharitu^eb^nti attano bhājanato paṭinīharituṃ. ^b^Hatthato muttamatte pārājika^eb^nti theyyacittena parasantakaggahaṇapayogassa katattā. ^b^Mahāaṭṭhakathāyameva^eb^ ‘‘sacepi mariyādaṃ dubbalaṃ katvā sukkhataḷākassa udakanibbahanaṭṭhānaṃ udakaniddhamanatumbaṃ vā pidahati, aññato ca gamanamagge vā pāḷiṃ bandhati, sukkhamātikaṃ vā ujuṃ karoti, pacchā deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ āgantvā mariyādaṃ bhindati, sabbattha bhaṇḍadeyya’’nti vuttattā ^b^‘‘taṃ pana tattheva sukkhataḷāke sukkhamātikāya ujukaraṇavinicchayena virujjhatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Avahāralakkhaṇa^eb^nti pañcavīsatiyā avahāresu ekampi avahāralakkhaṇaṃ, ṭhānācāvanapayogo eva vā. ^b^Uddhāre^eb^ti kumbhiyā phuṭṭhaṭṭhānato kesaggamattepi uddhaṭe. ^b^Yutta^eb^nti ṭhānācāvanapayogasabbhāvato yuttaṃ. ^b^Saṅgopanatthāyā^eb^ti iminā suddhacittataṃ dasseti. ^b^Palibujjhissatī^eb^ti nivāressati. ^b^Vuttanayeneva pārājika^eb^nti hatthato muttamatteyeva pārājikaṃ. ^b^Suddhacittova^eb^^a^M2.0137^ea^^b^uddharatī^eb^ti kumbhiyaṃ telassa ākiraṇato puretarameva suddhacitto nikkhipitvā pacchā suddhacittova uddharati. ^b^Neva avahāro^eb^ti theyyacittena avaharaṇapayogassa akatattā. Attano bhājanattā pana ^b^‘‘na gīvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, anāpattimattameva vuttaṃ, na pana evaṃ vicāritanti adhippāyo. Atha vā ^b^anāpattimattameva vutta^eb^nti imināpi tattha ‘‘gīvā’’ti vacanābhāvato ‘‘na gīvā’’ti pubbe vuttamahāaṭṭhakathāvādameva patiṭṭhāpeti, pacchā dassitena kurundivādenapi mahāaṭṭhakathāvādova samatthito. ^b^Attano bhaṇḍa^eb^nti telākiraṇato puretarameva attano kumbhiyaṃ suddhacittena ṭhapitaṃ pītatelaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ. ^b^Sammohaṭṭhāna^eb^nti āpattivinicchayavasena sammohaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03]^b^Bahigataṃ nāma hotī^eb^ti tato paṭṭhāya telassa aṭṭhānabhāvato adhomukhabhāvato ca bahigataṃ nāma hoti. Anto paṭṭhāya chidde kariyamāne telassa nikkhamitvā gatagataṭṭhānaṃ bhājanasaṅkhyameva gacchatīti āha – ^b^‘‘bāhirantato pādagghanake gaḷite pārājika’’^eb^nti. ^b^Yathā tathā vā katassā^eb^ti bāhirantato abbhantarato vā paṭṭhāya katassa. ^b^Majjhe ṭhapetvā katachidde^eb^ti majjhe thokaṃ kapālaṃ ṭhapetvā pacchā taṃ chindantena katachidde. ‘‘Mariyādacchedane anto ṭhatvā bahimukho chindanto bahi antena kāretabbo, bahi ṭhatvā antomukho chindanto anto antena kāretabbo, anto ca bahi ca chinditvā majjhe ṭhapetvā taṃ chindanto majjhena kāretabbo’’ti (pārā. aṭṭha. 1.108) vuttattā ^b^‘‘taḷākassa ca mariyādabhedena sametī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Idamettha yutta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0122^ea^ anto ca bahi ca paṭṭhāya katachidde majjhena kāretabbo. ^b^Anto paṭṭhāya kate pana bāhirantena, bahi paṭṭhāya kate abbhantarena kāretabbo^eb^ti ayaṃ tippakāropi ettha vemaṭṭhachidde yutto. Udake katapayogassa abhāvato ^b^‘‘ṭhānācāvanapayogassa abhāvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva vutta^eb^nti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Patthinnassa khādanaṃ itarassa pānañca sappiādīnaṃ paribhogoti āha – ^b^‘‘akhāditabbaṃ vā apātabbaṃ vā karotī’’^eb^ti. Kathaṃ pana tathā karotīti āha ^b^‘‘uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā’’^eb^tiādi. Kasmā panettha dukkaṭaṃ vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘ṭhānācāvanassa natthitāya dukkaṭa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Purimadvaya^eb^nti bhedanaṃ chaḍḍanañca. Kasmā na sametīti ^a^M2.0138^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘tañhī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kumbhijajjarakaraṇenā^eb^ti puṇṇakumbhiyā jajjarakaraṇena. ^b^Mātikāujaukaraṇenā^eb^ti udakapuṇṇāya mātikāya ujukaraṇena. ^b^Ekalakkhaṇa^eb^nti bhedanaṃ kumbhijajjarakaraṇena chaḍḍanaṃ mātikāya ujukaraṇena saddhiṃ ekasabhāvaṃ ṭhānācāvanapayogasabbhāvato. ^b^Pacchimaṃ pana dvaya^eb^nti jhāpanaṃ aparibhogakaraṇañca.

[03]^b^Ettha evaṃ vinicchayaṃ vadantī^eb^ti ettha mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutte eke ācariyā evaṃ vinicchayaṃ vadanti. ^b^Pacchimadvayaṃ sandhāya vutta^eb^nti ettha purimadvaye vinicchayo heṭṭhā vuttānusārena sakkā viññātunti tattha kiñci avatvā pacchimadvayaṃ sandhāya ṭhānācāvanassa natthitāya dukkaṭanti idaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo. ^b^Theyyacittenā^eb^ti attano vā parassa vā kātukāmatāvasena uppannatheyyacittena. ^b^Vināsetukāmatāyā^eb^ti hatthapādādiṃ chindanto viya kevalaṃ vināsetukāmatāya. Purimadvaye kiṃ hoti, kiṃ adhippāyena na kiñci vuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘purimadvaye pana…pe… pārājika’’^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^vuttanayena bhindantassa vā chaḍḍentassa vā^eb^ti muggarena pothetvā bhindantassa udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā ākiritvā uttarāpentassāti attho. ^b^Ayuttanti ce^eb^ti pāḷiyaṃ purimapadadvayepi dukkaṭasseva vuttattā ‘‘purimadvaye…pe… pārājikanti idaṃ ayutta’’nti yadi tumhākaṃ siyāti attho. ^b^Nā^eb^ti ayuttabhāvappasaṅgaṃ nisedhetvā tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘aññathā gahetabbatthato’’^eb^ti. Kathaṃ panettha attho gahetabboti āha ^b^‘‘pāḷiyaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi. Nāsetukāmatāpakkhe heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva atthassa avirujjhanato ^b^‘‘theyyacittapakkhe’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Evaṃ vinicchayaṃ vadantī’’ti ito paṭṭhāya vuttassa sabbassapi ekasseva vacanattā ^b^‘‘evameke vadantī’’^eb^ti nigamanavasena vuttaṃ.

[03]Idāni yathāvuttavasena pāḷiyā atthe gayhamāne mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ catunnampi sāmaññato vuttassa pacchimadvayaṃ sandhāya vuttanti vacane visesābhāvato pāḷiyaṃ vuttesu catūsu padesu ‘‘chaḍḍeti ^a^V2.0123^ea^ vā aparibhogaṃ vā karotī’’ti imesaṃ padānaṃ visesābhāvappasaṅgato ca sayaṃ aññathā pāḷiṃ aṭṭhakathañca saṃsanditvā atthaṃ dassetukāmo ^b^‘‘ayaṃ panettha sāro’’^eb^tiādimāha. Vinītavatthumhi ‘‘saṅghassa puñjakitaṃ tiṇaṃ theyyacitto jhāpesī’’si (pārā. 156) vuttattā ^b^vinītavatthumhi tiṇajjhāpako viyā^eb^ti imināva ^a^M2.0139^ea^^b^ṭhānā acāvetukāmovā^eb^ti etthāpi theyyacittena ṭhānā acāvetukāmoti idaṃ vuttameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Achaḍḍetukāmoyevā^eb^ti etthāpi theyyacittenāti sambandhitabbaṃ. Idañhi theyyacittapakkhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ nāsetukāmatāpakkhassa vakkhamānattā. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘nāsetukāmatāpakkhe panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Itarathāpi yujjatī^eb^ti theyyacittābhāvā ṭhānā cāvetukāmassapi dukkaṭaṃ yujjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
[06]Bhūmaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^96^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ākāsaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^b^mukhatuṇḍakenā^eb^ti mukhaggena. ^b^Kalāpaggenā^eb^ti piñchakalāpassa aggena. ^b^Pasāretī^eb^ti gahaṇatthaṃ pasāreti. ^b^Aggahetvā vā^eb^ti leḍḍuādīhi paharitvā nayanavasena aggahetvā vā. Ākāsaṭṭhavinicchaye vuccamānepi tappasaṅgena ākāsaṭṭhassa vehāsaṭṭhādibhāvamupagatepi asammohatthaṃ ^b^‘‘yasmiṃ aṅge nilīyatī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Antovatthumhī^eb^ti parikkhittavatthussa anto. ^b^Antogāme^eb^ti parikkhittassa gāmassa anto. Aparikkhitte pana vatthumhi, gāme vā ṭhitaṭṭhānameva ṭhānaṃ. ^b^Aṭavimukhaṃ karotī^eb^ti araññābhimukhaṃ karoti. ^b^Rakkhatī^eb^ti tena payogena tassa icchitaṭṭhānaṃ agatattā rakkhati. Bhūmiyā gacchantaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘dutiyapadavāre vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Gāmato nikkhantassā^eb^ti parikkhittagāmato nikkhantassa. ^b^Kapiñjaro^eb^ nāma ekā pakkhijāti.
[06]Ākāsaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^97^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vehāsaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana cīvaravaṃse ṭhapitassa cīvarassa ākaḍḍhane yathāvuttappadesātikkamo ekadvaṅgulamattākaḍḍhanena siyāti adhippāyena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ekadvaṅgulamattākaḍḍhaneneva pārājika’’^eb^nti. Idañca tādisaṃ nātimahantaṃ cīvaravaṃsadaṇḍakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, mahante pana tato adhikamattākaḍḍhaneneva ^a^M2.0140^ea^ siyā. ^b^Rajjukena bandhitvā^eb^ti ekāya rajjukoṭiyā cīvaraṃ bandhitvā ^a^V2.0124^ea^ aparāya koṭiyā cīvaravaṃsaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapitacīvaraṃ. Muttamatte aṭṭhatvā patanakasabhāvattā ^b^‘‘mutte pārājika’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Ekamekassa phuṭṭhokāsamatte atikkante pārājika^eb^nti bhittiṃ aphusāpetvā ṭhapitattā vuttaṃ. ^b^Bhittiṃ nissāya ṭhapita^eb^nti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitesu nāgadantādīsuyeva āropetvā bhittiṃ phusāpetvā ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^Paṇṇantaraṃ āropetvā ṭhapitā^eb^ti aññehi ṭhapitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
[06]Vehāsaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^98^eb^^b^.^eb^ Udakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sandamānaudake nikkhittaṃ na tiṭṭhatīti āha ^b^‘‘asandanake udake’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anāpattī^eb^ti hatthavārapadavāresu dukkaṭāpattiyā abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Kaḍḍhatī^eb^ti heṭṭhato osāreti. ^b^Uppalādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena padumapuṇḍarīkādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Rattaṃ ^b^padumaṃ,^eb^ setaṃ ^b^puṇḍarīkaṃ^eb^. Setaṃ vā ^b^padumaṃ,^eb^ rattaṃ ^b^puṇḍarīkaṃ^eb^. Atha vā rattaṃ vā hotu setaṃ vā satapattaṃ ^b^padumaṃ,^eb^ ūnasatapattaṃ ^b^puṇḍarīkaṃ^eb^. ^b^Vatthu pūratī^eb^ti pārājikavatthu pahoti. ^b^Tasmiṃ chinnamatte pārājika^eb^nti udakato accuggatassa udakavinimuttaṭṭhānato chedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Yaṃ vatthuṃ pūretī^eb^ti yaṃ pupphaṃ pārājikavatthuṃ pūreti. Dasahi pupphehi katakalāpo ^b^hatthako,^eb^ mahantaṃ kalāpaṃ katvā baddhaṃ ^b^bhārabaddhaṃ^eb^. ^b^Rajjukesu tiṇāni santharitvā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘dve rajjukāni udakapiṭṭhe ṭhapetvā tesaṃ upari tiriyato tiṇāni santharitvā tesaṃ upari bandhitvā vā abandhitvā vā tiriyatoyeva pupphāni ṭhapetvā heṭṭhato gatāni dve rajjukāni ukkhipitvā pupphamatthake ṭhapentī’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^Kesaggamattampi yathāṭhitaṭṭhānato cāvetī^eb^ti pārimantena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ, orimantena kesaggamattaṃ cāveti. ^b^Sakalamudaka^eb^nti daṇḍena phuṭṭhokāsagataṃ sakalamudakaṃ. ^b^Na udakaṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti attanā kataṭṭhānassa aṭṭhānattā. ^b^Idaṃ ubhaya^eb^nti ettha ‘‘bandhanaṃ amocetvā…pe… pārājika’’nti idamevekaṃ, ‘‘paṭhamaṃ bandhanaṃ…pe… ṭhānaparicchedo’’ti idaṃ dutiyaṃ. ^b^Paduminiya^eb^nti padumagacche. ^b^Uppāṭitāyā^eb^ti parehi attano atthāya uppāṭitāya.
[06]^b^Bahi^eb^^a^M2.0141^ea^^b^ṭhapite^eb^ti udakato bahi ṭhapite. Hatthakavasena khuddakaṃ katvā

[03]Baddhaṃ ^b^kalāpabaddhaṃ^eb^. ^b^Muḷāla^eb^nti kandaṃ. ^b^Pattaṃ vā pupphaṃ vā^eb^ti idaṃ kaddamassa anto pavisitvā ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Sakalamudaka^eb^nti ^a^V2.0125^ea^ vāpiādīsu pariyāpannaṃ sakalamudakaṃ. ^b^Niddhamanatumba^eb^nti vāpiyā udakassa nikkhamanamaggaṃ. ^b^Udakavāhaka^eb^nti mahāmātikaṃ. ^b^Na avahāro^eb^ti idaṃ pubbasadisaṃ na hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘kasmā…pe… evarūpā hi tattha katikā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Avahāro natthī^eb^ti sabbasādhāraṇe apariggahaṭṭhāne gahitattā. ^b^Mātikaṃ āropetvā^eb^ti khuddakamātikaṃ āropetvā. ^b^Maritvā…pe… tiṭṭhantī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘matamacchānaṃyeva tesaṃ santakattā amate gaṇhantassa natthi avahāro’’ti vadanti.
[06]Udakaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^99^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nāvaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ^b^yā bandhanā muttamatte ṭhānā na cavatī^eb^ti iminā caṇḍasote baddhanāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. ^b^Tāva dukkaṭa^eb^nti ‘‘bandhanaṃ moceti, āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti evaṃ mocentassa paññattaṃ dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Thullaccayampi pārājikampi hotī^eb^ti ettha paṭhamaṃ ṭhānā acāvetvā mutte thullaccayaṃ, paṭhamaṃ ṭhānā cāvetvā mutte pārājikanti veditabbaṃ.

[03]‘‘Pāse baddhasūkaro viyā’’tiādinā vuttaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tattha yutti pubbe vuttā evā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vippanaṭṭhā nāvā^eb^ti visamavātādīhi vināsaṃ patvā udake nimujjitvā heṭṭhā bhūmitalaṃ appatvā majjhe ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vadati. Teneva ^b^‘‘adho vā opilāpentassa…pe… nāvātalena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ mukhavaṭṭiṃ atikkantamatte pārājika’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Opilāpentassā^eb^ti osīdāpentassa. ^b^Atikkantamatte^eb^ti phuṭṭhokāsaṃ atikkantamatte. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti muttamatte pārājikanti dasseti.
[06]Nāvākaḍḍhanayoggamahāyottatāya yottakoṭito paṭṭhāya sakalampi ^b^‘‘ṭhāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]Asatipi vāte yathā vātaṃ gaṇhāti, tathā ṭhapitattā ^b^‘‘vātaṃ gaṇhāpetī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Balavā ca vāto āgammā^eb^ti iminā ^a^M2.0142^ea^ asati vāte ayaṃ payogo katoti dasseti. Teneva ^b^‘‘puggalassa natthi avahāro’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sati pana vāte kato payogo ṭhānācāvanapayogoyevāti mātikāujukaraṇe viya attheva avahāroti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ṭhānācāvanapayogo na hotī^eb^ti sukkhamātikāujukaraṇe viya asati vāte katapayogattā. ^b^Bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hotī^eb^ti nāvāsāmikassa bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ hoti.
[06]Nāvaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^100^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^a^V2.0126^ea^^b^dukayuttassā^eb^ti dvīhi goṇehi yuttassa. ^b^Ayuttaka^eb^nti goṇehi ayuttaṃ. ^b^Kappakatā^eb^ti yathā dvīhi bhāgehi heṭṭhā patiṭṭhāti, evaṃ katā. ^b^Tīṇi vā cattāri vā ṭhānānī^eb^ti akappakatāya upatthambhaniyā vasena tīṇi ṭhānāni, kappakatāya vasena cattāri ṭhānānīti. Tathā pathaviyaṃ ṭhapitassa tīṇi ṭhānānīti sambandho. ^b^Ta^eb^nti phalakassa vā dārukassa vā upari ṭhapitaṃ pathaviyaṃ ṭhapitañca. ^b^Dvīhi akkhasīsehī^eb^ti dvīhi akkhakoṭīhi. ^b^Dārūnaṃ upari ṭhapitassā^eb^ti dvinnaṃ dārūnaṃ upari dvīhi akkhakoṭīhi olambetvā sakaṭasālāyaṃ ṭhapitassa. ^b^Heṭṭhimatalassā^eb^ti sakaṭabāhāya bhūmiṃ phusitvā ṭhitassa heṭṭhimabhāgassa. ^b^Sesaṃ nāvāyaṃ vuttasadisa^eb^nti iminā ‘‘yadi pana taṃ evaṃ gacchantaṃ pakatigamanaṃ upacchinditvā aññaṃ disābhāgaṃ neti, pārājikaṃ. Sayameva yaṃ kañci gāmaṃ sampattaṃ ṭhānā acāventova vikkiṇitvā gacchati, nevatthi avahāro, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hotī’’ti imaṃ nayaṃ atidissati.
[06]Yānaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^101^eb^^b^.^eb^ Bhāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^b^purimagale galavāṭako^eb^ti purimagale uparimagalavāṭako. ^b^Uraparicchedamajjhe^eb^ti urapariyantassa majjhe. ^b^Anāṇattattā^eb^ti ‘‘asukaṭṭhānaṃ nehī’’ti anāṇattattā. ^b^Yo cāyaṃ sīsabhāre^eb^^a^M2.0143^ea^^b^vutto^eb^ti yo cāyaṃ vinicchayo sīsabhāre vutto. Sīsādīhi vā gahito hotūti sambandho. ^b^Tādisa^eb^nti tappaṭicchādanasamatthaṃ.
[06]Bhāraṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^102^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ārāmaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^b^bandhana^eb^nti pupphānaṃ vaṇṭe patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Abhiyuñjatī^eb^ti codeti aḍḍaṃ karoti. ^b^Adinnādānassa payogattā^eb^ti sahapayogamāha vatthumhiyeva katapayogattā. Sahapayogavasena hetaṃ dukkaṭaṃ. ^b^Vinicchayappasuta^eb^nti vinicchaye niyuttaṃ. ^b^Kakkhaḷo^eb^ti dāruṇo. ^b^Dhuraṃ nikkhipatī^eb^ti ussāhaṃ ṭhapeti, attano santakakaraṇe nirussāho hotīti attho. Kūṭaḍḍakārakopi ^a^V2.0127^ea^ sace dhuraṃ na nikkhipati, natthi avahāroti āha ^b^‘‘sace sayampi katadhuranikkhepo hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sayampī^eb^ti abhiyuñjakopi. ^b^Katadhuranikkhepo^eb^ti ‘‘na dāni naṃ imassa dassāmī’’ti evaṃ tassa dāne katadhuranikkhepo. ^b^Kiṅkārappaṭissāvibhāve^eb^ti ‘‘kiṃ karomi kiṃ karomī’’ti evaṃ kiṅkārameva paṭissuṇanto vicaratīti kiṅkārapaṭissāvī, tassa bhāvo kiṅkārapaṭissāvibhāvo, tasmiṃ, attano vasavattibhāveti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Ukkocaṃ datvā^eb^ti lañjaṃ datvā. ^b^Kūṭavinicchayikāna^eb^nti kūṭavinicchaye niyuttānaṃ vinayadharānaṃ. ‘‘Gaṇhā’’ti avatvā ‘‘asāmikassa sāmiko aya’’ntiādinā pariyāyena vuttepi tassa santakabhāvaṃ paricchinditvā pavattavacanattā kūṭavinicchayaṃ karontānaṃ kūṭasakkhīnañca pārājikameva. Asatipi cettha ṭhānācāvane ubhinnaṃ dhuranikkhepoyeva ṭhānācāvanaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Imasmiṃ dhuranikkhepe pārājike sāmikassa vimatuppādanapayoge kate thullaccayaṃ, tasseva dhuranikkhepapayoge nipphādite pārājikaṃ. ^b^Sayaṃ parājayaṃ pāpuṇātī^eb^ti kūṭaḍḍakārako parājayaṃ pāpuṇāti.
[06]Ārāmaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^103^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vihāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^a^M2.0144^ea^ vihāropi pariveṇampi āvāsopi vihārotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti āha ^b^‘‘vihāraṃ vā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^vihāra^eb^nti mahāvihāraṃ. ^b^Pariveṇa^eb^nti mahāvihārassa abbhantare visuṃ visuṃ pākāraparicchinnaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Āvāsa^eb^nti ekaṃ āvasathaṃ. Abhiyoge katepi avahārassa asijjhanato vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘abhiyogo na ruhatī’’^eb^ti. Gaṇasantake pana paricchinnasāmikattā sakkā dhuraṃ nikkhipāpetunti āha ^b^‘‘dīghabhāṇakādibhedassa pana gaṇassā’’^eb^ti. Idhāpi sace ekopi dhuraṃ na nikkhipati, rakkhatiyeva. Sabbesaṃ dhuranikkhepeneva hi pārājikaṃ.
[06]Vihāraṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^104^eb^^b^.^eb^ Khettaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^b^satta dhaññānī^eb^ti sālivīhiyavakaṅgukudrūsavarakagodhumānaṃ vasena satta dhaññāni ^a^V2.0128^ea^. ^b^Nirumbhitvā vā^eb^tiādīsu ‘‘gaṇhantassā’’ti paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tattha nirumbhitvā gahaṇaṃ nāma vīhisīsaṃ acchinditvā yathāṭhitameva hatthena gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bījamattasseva gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Ekameka^eb^nti ekamekaṃ vīhisīsaṃ. ^b^Uppāṭetvā vā^eb^ti muggamāsādīni uddharitvā vā. ^b^Yasmiṃ bīje vā^eb^tiādi nirumbhitvā gahaṇādīsu yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Sālisīsādīni nirumbhitvā gaṇhantassa yasmiṃ bīje vatthu pūrati, ekamekaṃ hattheneva chinditvā gaṇhantassa yasmiṃ sīse vatthu pūrati, asitena lāyitvā gaṇhantassa yassaṃ muṭṭhiyaṃ vatthu pūrati, bahūni ekato uppāṭetvā gaṇhantassa yasmiṃ muggamāsādiphale vatthu pūratīti evamettha yathākkamo veditabbo. ^b^‘‘Tasmiṃ bandhanā mocitamatte’’^eb^ti vacanato tasmiṃ bījādimhi bandhanā mocite sati tato anapanītepi pārājikamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Acchijjamāno^eb^ti acchinno hutvā ṭhito. ^b^Jaṭitānī^eb^ti chinditāni acchinnehi saddhiṃ jaṭitāni hontīti attho. ^b^Sabhusa^eb^nti palālasahitaṃ. ^b^Abhusa^eb^nti palālarahitaṃ.

[03]^b^Khīlenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0145^ea^ khāṇukena. Ettha ca khīlasaṅkamanādīsu ubhayaṃ sambhavati sahapayogo dhuranikkhepo ca. Yadā hi parassa khettādīsu ekadesaṃ khīlasaṅkamanādivasena attano santakaṃ karoti, tadā satipi paṭhamataraṃ sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepe khīlasaṅkamanādisahapayogaṃ vinā na hotīti sahapayogeneva pārājikaṃ. Teneva ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. dutiyapārājikavaṇṇanā) vuttaṃ ‘‘ṭhānācāvanavasena khīlādīni saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasena ca sahapayogo veditabbo’’ti. Yadā pana asati dhuranikkhepe khīlasaṅkamanādimattaṃ kataṃ, tadā vinā dhuranikkhepena na hotīti dhuranikkhepeneva pārājikaṃ. Tenevettha ^b^‘‘tañca kho sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ sabbatthā^eb^ti yathāvuttamatthaṃ rajjusaṅkamanādīsupi atidisati.

[03]^b^Yaṭṭhi^eb^nti mānadaṇḍaṃ. ^b^Ekasmiṃ anāgate thullaccayaṃ, tasmiṃ āgate pārājika^eb^nti ettha sace dārūni nikhaṇitvā tattakeneva gaṇhitukāmo hoti, avasāne dārumhi pārājikaṃ. Sace tattha sākhāyopi katvā gahetukāmo hoti, avasānasākhāya pārājikanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Tattakena asakkonto^eb^ti dārūni nikhaṇitvā vatiṃ kātuṃ asakkonto. ^b^Khettamariyāda^eb^nti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘kedārapāḷi’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Vitthataṃ karotī^eb^ti pubbe vijjamānameva mariyādaṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ karoti. ^b^Akataṃ vā pana patiṭṭhapetī^eb^ti pubbe akataṃ vā mariyādaṃ ṭhapeti.
[06]Khettaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^105^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vatthuṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^a^V2.0129^ea^^b^tiṇṇaṃ pākārāna^eb^nti iṭṭhakasilādārūnaṃ vasena tiṇṇaṃ pākārānaṃ. ^b^Eteneva nayenā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘kevalaṃ bhūmiṃ sodhetvā…pe… aparikkhipitvā vā’’ti vuttamatthaṃ nidasseti.
[03]^b^106^eb^^b^.^eb^ Gāmaṭṭhakathāyaṃ gāmo nāmāti pāḷiyaṃ na vuttaṃ sabbaso gāmalakkhaṇassa pubbe vuttattā.

[03]^b^107^eb^^b^.^eb^ Araññaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^a^M2.0146^ea^^b^araññaṃ nāmā^eb^ti idaṃ pana na kevalaṃ pubbe vuttaaraññalakkhaṇappattimattena araññaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, kintu yaṃ attano araññalakkhaṇena araññaṃ parapariggahitañca hoti, taṃ araññaṃ idhādhippetanti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti puna araññavacanena. ^b^Na pariggahitabhāvo araññassa lakkhaṇa^eb^nti yadi hi pariggahitabhāvo araññalakkhaṇaṃ siyā, ‘‘araññaṃ nāma yaṃ manussānaṃ pariggahita’’nti ettakameva vadeyyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Ya^eb^nti iminā pubbe vuttalakkhaṇameva araññaṃ parāmaṭṭhanti āha ^b^‘‘yaṃ pana attano araññalakkhaṇena arañña’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Vinivijjhitvā^eb^ti ujukameva vinivijjhitvā. ^b^Paṇṇaṃ vā^eb^ti tālapaṇṇādi paṇṇaṃ vā. ^b^Addhagatopī^eb^ti cirakālaṃ tattheva ṭhitopi. ^b^Na gahetabbo^eb^ti ettha pana yo parehi araññasāmikānaṃ hatthato kiṇitvā tacchetvā tattheva ṭhapito, so araññasāmikena anuññātopi na gahetabbo. ^b^Sāmikehi chaḍḍitoti gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti paṃsukūlasaññāya gahaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Lakkhaṇacchinnassāpī^eb^ti araññasāmikānaṃ hatthato kiṇitvā gaṇhantehi katasaññāṇassa. ^b^Challiyā pariyonaddhaṃ hotī^eb^ti iminā sāmikānaṃ nirapekkhataṃ dīpeti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. Yadi sāmikānaṃ sāpekkhatā atthi, na vaṭṭati. ^b^Tāni katāni ajjhāvutthāni ca hontī^eb^ti tāni gehādīni katāni pariniṭṭhitāni manussehi ca ajjhāvutthāni honti. ^b^Dārūnipī^eb^ti gehādīnaṃ katattā tato avasiṭṭhadārūnipi. ^b^Etesa^eb^nti etesaṃ yathāvuttadārūnaṃ.

[03]^b^Tesaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0130^ea^^b^ārakkhaṭṭhāna^eb^nti tesaṃ araññapālānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Dehīti vutte dātabbamevā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘dehī’’ti vutte ‘‘dassāmī’’ti ābhogasabbhāvato ‘‘dehī’’ti avutte adatvāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. ^b^Gantuṃ dethā^eb^ti gamanaṃ detha. ^b^Adisvā gacchati, bhaṇḍadeyya^eb^nti parisuddhacittena gacchati, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Yattha katthaci nītānampi dārūnaṃ araññasāmikānaṃyeva santakattā suddhacittena nikkhantopi puna theyyacittaṃ uppādetvā gacchati, pārājikamevāti vadanti.
[06]Araññaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^108^eb^^b^.^eb^ Udakakathāyaṃ ^a^M2.0147^ea^ mahākucchikā udakacāṭi ^b^udakamaṇiko^eb^. ‘‘Samekhalā cāṭi udakamaṇiko’’tipi vadanti. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tesu bhājanesu. ^b^Nibbahanaudaka^eb^nti ‘‘mahodakaṃ āgantvā taḷākamariyādaṃ mā chindī’’ti taḷākarakkhaṇatthaṃ tassa ekapassena vissajjitaudakaṃ. ^b^Niddhamanatumba^eb^nti sassādīnaṃ atthāya udakanikkhamanamaggaṃ. ^b^Mariyādaṃ dubbalaṃ katvā^eb^ti idaṃ avassaṃ chinnasabhāvadassanatthaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyavisayadassanatthañca vuttaṃ. Mariyādaṃ dubbalaṃ akatvāpi yathāvuttappayoge kate mariyādaṃ chinditvā nikkhantaudakagghānurūpena avahārena kāretabbameva.

[03]^b^Aniggate^eb^ti anikkhamitvā taḷākasmiṃyeva udake ṭhite. ^b^Asampattevā^eb^ti taḷākato nikkhamitvā mahāmātikāya eva ṭhite. ^b^Anikkhante^eb^ti taḷākato anikkhante udake. ^b^Subaddhā^eb^ti bhaṇḍadeyyampi na hotīti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nikkhante baddhā bhaṇḍadeyya’’^eb^nti, taḷākato nikkhamitvā paresaṃ khuddakamātikāmukhaṃ apāpuṇitvā mahāmātikāyaṃyeva ṭhite baddhā ce, bhaṇḍadeyyanti attho. ‘‘Anikkhante baddhā subaddhā, nikkhante baddhā bhaṇḍadeyya’’nti hi idaṃ dvayaṃ heṭṭhā vuttavikappadvayassa yathākkamena vuttaṃ. ^b^Natthi avahāro^eb^ti ettha ‘‘avahāro natthi, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hotī’’ti keci vadanti, taḷākagataudakassa sabbasādhāraṇattā taṃ ayuttaṃ viya dissati, ‘‘anikkhante baddhā subaddhā’’ti iminā ca aṭṭhakathāvacanena na sameti. ^b^Vatthuṃ…pe… na sametī^eb^ti ettha taḷākagataudakassa sabbasādhāraṇattā apariggahitaṃ idha vatthunti adhippāyo.
[06]Udakakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^109^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dantakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^a^V2.0131^ea^^b^tato paṭṭhāya avahāro natthī^eb^ti ‘‘yathāsukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho paribhuñjatū’’ti yathāsukhaṃ paribhogatthāya ṭhapitattā vassaggena abhājetabbattā arakkhitabbattā sabbasādhāraṇattā ca aññaṃ saṅghikaṃ viya na hotīti theyyacittena gaṇhantassapi natthi avahāro ^a^M2.0148^ea^. ^b^Vatta^eb^nti dantakaṭṭhaggahaṇe vattaṃ. Idāni tadeva vattaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘yo hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^‘‘Puna sāmaṇerā āharissantī’’^eb^ti keci therā vadeyyunti yojetabbaṃ.
[06]Dantaponakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^110^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vanappatikathāyaṃ ^b^‘‘ujukameva tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti rukkhabhārena kiñcideva bhassitvā ṭhitattā hotiyeva ṭhānācāvananti adhippāyena vutta’’nti vadanti. ^b^Vātamukhaṃ sodhetī^eb^ti yathā vāto āgantvā rukkhaṃ pāteti, evaṃ vātassa āgamanamaggaṃ rundhitvā ṭhitāni sākhāgumbādīni chinditvā apanento sodheti. ^b^‘‘Maṇḍūkakaṇṭakaṃ vā visa^eb^nti maṇḍūkānaṃ naṅguṭṭhe aggakoṭiyaṃ ṭhitakaṇṭaka’’nti vadanti, ‘‘ekaṃ visamacchakaṇṭaka’’ntipi vadanti.
[06]Vanappatikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^111^eb^^b^.^eb^ Haraṇakakathāyaṃ ^b^haraṇaka^eb^nti hariyamānaṃ. Abhimukhaṃ katvā kaḍḍhanaṃ ^b^ākaḍḍhanaṃ,^eb^ sesadisākaḍḍhanaṃ ^b^vikaḍḍhanaṃ^eb^. ^b^Pādaṃ agghati, pārājikamevā^eb^ti ettha antaṃ na gaṇhāmīti asallakkhitattā antassa ca gaṇhissāmīti sallakkhitasseva paṭassa ekadesattā pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Sahabhaṇḍahāraka^eb^nti bhaṇḍahārakena saddhiṃ. ^b^Santajjetvā^eb^ti dhanuādīhi santajjetvā.
[06]^b^So^eb^ti bhaṇḍahārako. ^b^Anajjhāvutthaka^eb^nti apariggahitakaṃ, asāmikanti attho.

[03]^b^Āharāpente dātabba^eb^nti ettha ‘‘chaḍḍetvā dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā gatānampi nirālayānaṃ puna āharāpanassa vuttattā bhikkhūnampi attano santake parikkhāre acchinditvā parehi gahite tattha ^a^V2.0132^ea^ dhuranikkhepaṃ katvāpi puna taṃ balakkārenapi āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti desavāsino ācariyā vadanti, sīhaḷadīpavāsino pana taṃ keci ācariyā na icchanti. Teneva ^a^M2.0149^ea^^b^mahāgaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade^eb^ ca vuttaṃ ‘‘amhākaṃ pana taṃ na ruccatī’’ti. ^b^Aññesū^eb^ti mahāpaccariādīsu. ^b^Vicāraṇā eva natthī^eb^ti tatthāpi paṭikkhepābhāvato ayamevatthoti vuttaṃ hoti.
[06]Haraṇakakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^112^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upanidhikathāyaṃ ‘‘saṅgopanatthāya attano hatthe nikkhittassa bhaṇḍassa guttaṭṭhāne paṭisāmanapayogaṃ vinā aññasmiṃ payoge akatepi rajjasaṅkhobhādikāle ‘na dāni tassa dassāmi, na mayhaṃ dāni dassatī’ti ubhohipi sakasakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā dhuranikkhepe kate pārājikameva paṭisāmanapayogassa katattā’’ti vadanti. ^b^Attano hatthe nikkhittattā^eb^ti ettha attano hatthe saṅgopanatthāya nikkhittakālato paṭṭhāya tappaṭibaddhattā ārakkhāya bhaṇḍasāmikaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā ṭhānassa ca tadāyattatāya ṭhānācāvanassa alabbhanato natthi avahāroti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Dhammaṃ vācāpetvā^eb^ti dhammaṃ kathāpetvā. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti uddhāreyeva pārājikaṃ. Kasmā? Aññehi asādhāraṇassa abhiññāṇassa vuttattā. ^b^‘‘Aññaṃ tādisameva gaṇhante yujjatī^eb^ti idaṃ saññāṇaṃ kathenteneva ‘asukasmiṃ ṭhāne’ti okāsassa ca niyamitattā tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ pattaṃ apanetvā tasmiṃ okāse aññaṃ tādisameva pacchā ṭhapitaṃ pattaṃ sandhāya kathita’’nti ^b^tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ.
