[03]^b^‘‘Hīnāyāvattanenā^eb^ti sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya gihibhāvūpagamanenā’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttaṃ aññassa dāne viya cīvare nirālayabhāveneva pariccattattā. Keci pana ‘‘hīnāyāvattanenāti bhikkhuniyā gihibhāvūpagamanenā’’ti evamatthaṃ gahetvā ‘‘bhikkhu pana vibbhamantopi yāva sikkhaṃ na paccakkhāti, tāva bhikkhuyevāti adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatī’’ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ ‘‘bhikkhuniyā hīnāyāvattanenā’’ti visesetvā avuttattā. Bhikkhuniyā hi gihibhāvūpagamane adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ visuṃ vattabbaṃ natthi tassā vibbhamaneneva assamaṇībhāvato. ^b^Sikkhāpaccakkhānenā^eb^ti pana idaṃ sace bhikkhuliṅge ṭhitova sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti ^a^V2.0346^ea^, tassa kāyalaggampi cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Kaniṭṭhaṅgulinakhavasenā^eb^ti heṭṭhimaparicchedaṃ dasseti. ^b^Pamāṇacīvarassā^eb^ti pacchimappamāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Dve cīvarāni pārupantassā^eb^ti antaragharappavesanatthāya ^b^suppaṭicchannasikkhāpade^eb^ vuttanayena saṅghāṭiṃ uttarāsaṅgañca ekato katvā pārupantassa. ^b^Saṅgharitaṭṭhāne^eb^ti dvīsupi antesu saṅgharitaṭṭhāne. ^b^Esa nayo^eb^ti iminā pamāṇayuttesu yattha katthaci chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati, mahantesu pana tato parena chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti ayamattho dassito. ^b^Sabbesū^eb^ti ticīvarādibhedesu sabbacīvaresu.

[03]^b^Aññaṃ pacchimappamāṇaṃ nāma natthī^eb^ti sutte āgataṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Idāni tameva vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yañhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ‘‘Taṃ atikkamayato chedanakaṃ pācittiya’’nti vuttattā āha ^b^‘‘tato uttari paṭisiddhattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Taṃ na sametī^eb^ti parikkhāracoḷassa vikappanupagapacchimaṃ pacchimappamāṇanti gahetvā itaresaṃ ticīvarādīnaṃ muṭṭhipañcakādibhedaṃ pacchimappamāṇaṃ sandhāya ‘‘esa ^a^M2.0392^ea^ nayo’’tiādivacanaṃ na sameti tādisassa pacchimappamāṇassa sutte abhāvatoti adhippāyo. ^b^Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ vuttavacanaṃ na sametīti imināva paṭikkhepena vikappanupagapacchimassa anto yattha katthaci chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti ayampi nayo paṭikkhittoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ticīvarañhi ṭhapetvā sesacīvaresu chiddena adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitesu sesacīvaresu vikappanupagapacchimaṃ appahontaṃ katvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chinnesupi adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ natthi. Sace pana adhiṭṭhānato pubbeyeva tādisaṃ hoti, acīvarattā adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi. ^b^Khuddakaṃ cīvara^eb^nti muṭṭhipañcakādibhedappamāṇato anūnameva khuddakacīvaraṃ. ^b^Mahantaṃ vā khuddakaṃ karotī^eb^ti ettha tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ catūsu passesu yasmiṃ padese chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati, tasmiṃ padese samantato chinditvā khuddakaṃ karontassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Sammukhāvikappanā parammukhāvikappanā^eb^ti ettha sammukhena vikappanā parammukhena vikappanāti evamattho gahetabbo. ^b^Sannihitāsannihitabhāva^eb^nti āsannadūrabhāvaṃ. Āsannadūrabhāvo ca adhiṭṭhāne vuttanayeneva veditabbo. ^b^Paribhogādayopi vaṭṭantī^eb^ti ettha adhiṭṭhānassapi antogadhattā sace saṅghāṭiādināmena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitukāmo hoti, adhiṭṭhānaṃ kātabbaṃ. No ce, na kātabbaṃ, vikappanameva pamāṇaṃ, tasmā atirekacīvaraṃ nāma na hoti. ^b^Mitto^eb^ti daḷhamitto. ^b^Sandiṭṭho^eb^ti diṭṭhamitto nātidaḷhamitto. ^b^Vikappitavikappanā nāmesā vaṭṭatī^eb^ti adhiṭṭhitaadhiṭṭhānaṃ viyāti adhippāyo ^b^avisesena vuttavacana^eb^nti ticīvarādiṃ adhiṭṭheti, vassikasāṭikaṃ kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiñca ^a^V2.0347^ea^ vikappetīti avatvā sabbacīvarānaṃ avisesena vikappetīti vuttavacanaṃ. ^b^Ticīvarasaṅkhepenā^eb^ti ticīvaranīhārena, saṅghāṭiādiadhiṭṭhānavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Tuyhaṃ demī^eb^tiādīsu ‘‘tasmiṃ kāle na gaṇhitukāmopi sace na paṭikkhipati, puna gaṇhitukāmatāya sati gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Itthannāmassā^eb^ti parammukhe ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^‘‘Tuyhaṃ gaṇhāhī’’ti vutte ‘‘mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī’’ti vadati, sudinnaṃ suggahitañcā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘yathā parato ‘tava santakaṃ karohī’ti vutte duddinnampi ‘sādhu, bhante, mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī’ti vacanena ‘suggahitaṃ hotī’ti vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi ‘tuyhaṃ gaṇhāhī’ti vutte sudinnattā ^a^M2.0393^ea^ ‘mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī’ti avuttepi ‘sudinnamevā’’’ti vadanti. ^b^‘‘Gaṇhāhī^eb^ti ca āṇattiyā gahaṇassa tappaṭibaddhatākaraṇavasena pavattattā tadā gaṇhāmīti citte anuppādite pacchā gahetuṃ na labhatī’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^Taṃ na yujjatī^eb^ti vinayakammassa karaṇavasena gahetvā dinnattā vuttaṃ. Sace pana paro saccatoyeva vissāsaṃ gaṇhāti, puna kenaci kāraṇena tena dinnaṃ tassa na vaṭṭatīti natthi. Nissaggiyaṃ pana cīvaraṃ jānitvā vā ajānitvā vā gaṇhantaṃ ‘‘mā gaṇhāhī’’ti nivāraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Kāyavācāhi kattabbaadhiṭṭhānavikappanānaṃ akatattā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘kāyavācāto samuṭṭhātī’’^eb^ti. Cīvarassa attano santakatā, jātippamāṇayuttatā, chinnapalibodhabhāvo, atirekacīvaratā, dasāhātikkamoti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
[06]Paṭhamakathinasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^471-473^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye athānandatthero kathaṃ okāsaṃ paṭilabhati, kiṃ karonto ca āhiṇḍatīti āha ^b^‘‘thero kirā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Avippavāse^eb^ti nimittatthe bhummaṃ, avippavāsatthanti attho, vippavāsapaccayā yā āpatti, tadabhāvatthanti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^475-476^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃ chinnapalibodho^eb^ti evaṃ imehi cīvaraniṭṭhānakathinubbhārehi chinnapalibodho. ^b^Adhiṭṭhitesū^eb^ti ticīvarādhiṭṭhānanayena adhiṭṭhitesu. ^b^Ticīvarena vippavuttho hotī^eb^ti ‘‘rukkho chinno, paṭo daḍḍho’’tiādīsu viya avayavepi samudāyavohāro labbhatīti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^477-478^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Parikhāya^eb^^a^V2.0348^ea^^b^vā parikkhitto^eb^ti iminā ca samantā nadītaḷākādiudakena parikkhittopi parikkhittoyevāti dasseti. ^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti ‘‘parikkhitto’’ti iminā vacanena. ^b^Ākāse aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetī^eb^ti gharassa upari ākāse aḍḍhateyyaratanappamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā aruṇaṃ ^a^M2.0394^ea^ uṭṭhāpeti. Gharaṃ nivesanudositādilakkhaṇameva, na pana pāṭiyekkaṃ gharaṃ nāma atthīti āha ^b^‘‘ettha cā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^479^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pāḷiyaṃ vuttanayena ‘‘sabhāye’’ti avatvā ^b^‘‘sabhāya’’^eb^nti paccattavacanaṃ ^b^sabhāya^eb^-saddassa napuṃsakaliṅgatāvibhāvanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabhā^eb^-saddapariyāyopi hi ^b^sabhāya^eb^-saddo napuṃsakaliṅgayutto idha vuttoti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘liṅgabyattayena sabhā vuttā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Cīvarahatthapāse vasitabbaṃ natthī^eb^ti cīvarahatthapāseyeva vasitabbanti natthi. ^b^Yaṃ tassā…pe… na vijahitabba^eb^nti ettha tassā vīthiyā sammukhaṭṭhāne sabhāyadvārānaṃ gahaṇeneva tattha sabbānipi gehāni sā ca antaravīthi gahitāyeva hoti. ^b^Atiharitvā ghare nikkhipatī^eb^ti taṃ vīthiṃ muñcitvā ṭhite aññasmiṃ ghare nikkhipati. ^b^Purato vā pacchato vā hatthapāse^eb^ti gharassa hatthapāsaṃ sandhāya vadati.

[03]Nivesanādīsu parikkhittatāya ekūpacāratā, aparikkhittatāya nānūpacāratā ca veditabbāti dassento ^b^‘‘etenevupāyenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Nivesanādīni gāmato bahi sanniviṭṭhāni gahitānīti veditabbaṃ. Antogāme ṭhitānañhi gāmaggahaṇena gahitattā gāmaparihāroyevāti. ^b^Sabbatthāpī^eb^ti gāmādīsu ajjhokāsapariyantesu pannarasasu. ^b^Parikkhepādivasenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena aparikkhepasseva gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ, na ekakulādīnampi.
[03]^b^480-487^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ovarako^eb^ nāma gabbhassa abbhantare añño gabbhotipi vadanti. ^b^Muṇḍacchadanapāsādo^eb^ti candikaṅgaṇayutto pāsādo.

[03]^b^489^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sattho^eb^ti jaṅghasattho sakaṭasattho vā. ^b^Pariyādiyitvā^eb^ti vinivijjhitvā. Vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti ^b^‘‘antopaviṭṭhena…pe… ṭhito hotī’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^antopaviṭṭhenā^eb^ti gāmassa nadiyā vā antopaviṭṭhena. ^b^Nadīparihāro ca labbhatī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘visuṃ nadīparihārassa avuttattā gāmādīhi aññattha viya cīvarahatthapāsoyeva nadīparihāro’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Vihārasīma^eb^nti avippavāsasīmaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Vihāraṃ gantvā vasitabba^eb^nti antosīmāya yattha katthaci vasitabbaṃ. ^b^Satthasamīpeyevā^eb^ti idaṃ yathāvuttaabbhantaraparicchedavasena ^a^M2.0395^ea^ vuttaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ ^b^nānākulassa^eb^^a^V2.0349^ea^^b^sattho hoti, satthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā hatthapāsā na vijahitabba^eb^nti ettha ^b^hatthapāso^eb^ nāma satthassa hatthapāsoti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^490^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekakulassa khette^eb^ti aparikkhittaṃ sandhāya vadati. Yasmā ‘‘nānākulassa parikkhitte khette cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā khettadvāramūle vā tassa hatthapāse vā vatthabba’’nti vuttaṃ, tasmā dvāramūlato aññattha antokhettepi vasantena cīvaraṃ hatthapāse katvāyeva vasitabbaṃ.

[03]^b^491-494^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Vihāro^eb^ nāma saparikkhitto vā aparikkhitto vā sakalo āvāso’’ti vadanti. ^b^Yasmiṃ vihāre^eb^ti ettha pana ekaṃ gehameva vuttaṃ. ^b^Ekakulanānākulasantakatā^eb^ cettha kārāpakānaṃ vasena veditabbā. ^b^Chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsassa anto evā^eb^ti yadā mahāvīthiyaṃ ujukameva gacchantaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ majjhanhikaṃ pāpuṇāti, tadā yaṃ okāsaṃ chāyā pharati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Agamanapathe^eb^ti yaṃ tadaheva gantvā puna āgantuṃ sakkā na hoti, tādisaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^495^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nadiṃ otaratī^eb^ti hatthapāsaṃ muñcitvā otarati. ^b^Na āpajjatī^eb^ti paribhogapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ nāpajjati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘so hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Aparibhogārahattā^eb^ti imināva nissaggiyacīvaraṃ anissajjetvā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ acittakanti siddhaṃ. ^b^Ekaṃ pārupitvā ekaṃ aṃsakūṭe ṭhapetvā gantabba^eb^nti idaṃ bahūnaṃ sañcāraṭṭhāne evaṃ akatvā gamanaṃ na sāruppanti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Bahigāme ṭhapetvā…pe… vinayakammaṃ kātabba^eb^nti vuttattā adhiṭṭhāne viya parammukhā ṭhitampi nissaggiyaṃ cīvaraṃ nissajjituṃ nissaṭṭhacīvarañca dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.

[03]Gamane saussāhattā ^b^‘‘nissayo pana na paṭippassambhatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Muhuttaṃ sayitvā…pe… nissayo ca paṭippassambhatī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘ussāhe apariccattepi gamanassa upacchinnattā puna uṭṭhāya saussāhaṃ gacchantānampi antarā aruṇe uṭṭhite nissayo paṭippassambhatiyevā’’ti vadanti. Parato ^b^muhuttaṃ ṭhatvā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Aññamaññassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā gatā^eb^ti ettha sace evaṃ gacchantā ‘‘purāruṇā aññamaññaṃ passissāmā’’ti ussāhaṃ vināva gatā honti, aruṇuggamane nissayapaṭippassaddhi na vattabbā paṭhamataraṃyeva paṭippassambhanato. Atha ‘‘purāruṇā passissāmā’’ti saussāhāva ^a^M2.0396^ea^ gacchanti, nissayapaṭippassaddhiyeva na vattabbā. Evañca sati ^b^‘‘saha aruṇuggamanā nissayo paṭippassambhatī’’^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Vuccate – saussahattā paṭhamataraṃ paṭippassaddhi na vuttā. Satipi ^a^V2.0350^ea^ ca ussāhabhāve ekato gamanassa upacchinnattā ‘‘muhuttaṃ ṭhatvā’’ti ettha viya saha aruṇuggamanā paṭippassaddhiyeva vuttā.

[03]^b^Antosīmāyaṃ gāma^eb^nti avippavāsasīmāsammutiyā pacchā patiṭṭhāpitagāmaṃ sandhāya vadati gāmaṃ anto katvā avippavāsasīmāsammutiyā abhāvato. ^b^Neva cīvarāni nissaggiyāni hontī^eb^ti avippavāsasīmābhāvato vuttaṃ, ^b^na nissayo paṭippassambhatī^eb^ti saussāhabhāvato. ^b^Antarāmaggeyeva ca nesaṃ aruṇaṃ uggacchatī^eb^ti dhammaṃ sutvā āgacchantānaṃ aruṇaṃ uggacchati. ^b^Assatiyā gacchatī^eb^ti assatiyā attano cīvaraṃ apaccuddharitvā therassa cīvaraṃ apaccuddharāpetvā gacchati. Evaṃ gate tasmiṃ pacchā therena saritvā paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘attano cīvaraṃ paccuddharitvā daharassa cīvaraṃ vissāsena gahetvā ṭhapetabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Gantvā vattabbo^eb^ti āgatakiccaṃ niṭṭhapetvā vihāraṃ gatena paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dasseti. Anadhiṭṭhitacīvaratā, anatthatakathinatā, aladdhasammutitā, rattivippavāsoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Udositasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^497-499^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ ^b^cīvarapaccāsā nikkhipitu^eb^nti ettha cīvarapaccāsāya satiyā nikkhipitunti evamattho gahetabbo. Bhaṇḍikābaddhāni bhaṇḍikabaddhānītipi paṭhanti, bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā baddhānīti attho. ^b^Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā^eb^ti ettha purimasikkhāpade viya sāmivaseneva karaṇavacanassa attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^500^eb^^b^.^eb^ Anatthate kathine cīvaramāse bhikkhuno uppannacīvaraṃ anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ tasmiṃ māse ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha ^b^‘‘ekaṃ pacchimakattikamāsaṃ ṭhapetvā’’^eb^ti. Keci pana ‘‘kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ, etaṃ akālacīvaranti ^a^M2.0397^ea^ vacanato anatthate kathine pacchimakattikamāsasaṅkhāte cīvaramāse uppannacīvarassapi paccāsācīvare asati dasāhaparihāroyeva, tato paraṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti. Tathā hi ^b^accekacīvarasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (pārā. aṭṭha. 2.646-649 ādayo) ‘‘pavāraṇamāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamiyaṃ uppannassa accekacīvarassa anatthate kathine ekādasadivasādhiko māso, atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañca māsā parihāro’’ti vuttaṃ. Tameva ca parihāraṃ sandhāya ^a^V2.0351^ea^ ‘‘chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi paccuddharitvā ṭhapitacīvarampi etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyevā’’ti (pārā. aṭṭha. 2.646-649) vuttaṃ. Tasmā cīvaramāse dasāhato parampi anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitampi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.

[03]Yadi evaṃ ‘‘kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ, etaṃ akālacīvara’’nti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti ce? Akālacīvarasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ paṭhamāniyate sotassa raho viya. Ekādasamāse sattamāse ca uppannañhi cīvaraṃ vutthavassehi sesehi ca sammukhībhūtehi bhājetuṃ labbhatīti akālacīvaraṃ nāma jātaṃ. Kāle pana ‘‘saṅghassa idaṃ akālacīvaraṃ dammī’’ti anuddisitvā ‘‘saṅghassa dammī’’ti dinnaṃ vutthavassehiyeva bhājetabbaṃ, na aññehīti kālacīvaranti vuccati. Ādissa dinnaṃ pana sammukhībhūtehi sabbehiyeva bhājetabbanti akālacīvaraṃ, tasmā kālepi ādissa dinnassa vutthavassehi sesehi ca sampattehi bhājanīyattā akālacīvarasāmaññato ‘‘kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ, etaṃ akālacīvara’’nti atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘ekapuggalassa vā idaṃ tuyhaṃ dammīti dinna’’nti kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi puggalassa ādissa dinnaṃ kenaci bhājanīyaṃ hotīti? Nāyaṃ virodho ādissa vacanasāmaññato labbhamānamatthaṃ dassetuṃ tathā vuttattā.

[03]^b^Evaṃ pana avatvā^eb^ti ‘‘tato ce uttari’’nti imassa ‘‘māsaparamato uttari’’nti padabhājanaṃ avatvā. ^b^Tāva uppannaṃ paccāsācīvara^eb^nti paccattavacanaṃ ^b^‘‘attano gatikaṃ karotī’’^eb^ti karaṇakiriyāya kattubhāvato. Antarā uppannañhi paccāsācīvaraṃ māsaparamaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ ṭhapetuṃ adatvā attano dasāhaparamatāya eva paricchindatīti attano gatikaṃ karoti. ^b^Tato uddhaṃ mūlacīvara^eb^nti ettha pana ^b^mūlacīvara^eb^nti paccattavacanaṃ. Vīsatimadivasato uddhañhi uppannaṃ ^a^M2.0398^ea^ paccāsācīvaraṃ dasāhaparamaṃ gantuṃ adatvā mūlacīvaraṃ attanā saddhiṃ karaṇasambandhatāmattena sakakālavasena paricchindatīti attano gatikaṃ karoti. Paccāsācīvare pana labhitvā visuṃ ṭhapentassa dasāhaṃ anatikkante natthi tappaccayā āpatti. Pāḷiyaṃ ^b^dasāhā kāretabba^eb^nti ettha ^b^dasāhā^eb^ti karaṇatthe nissakkavacanaṃ, dasāhenāti attho. ^b^Pañcāhuppanne^eb^tiādiṃ rassaṃ katvāpi paṭhanti. ^b^Ekavīse uppanne…pe… navāhā kāretabba^eb^ntiādi paccāsācīvarassa uppannadivasaṃ ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Aññaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ…pe… kāretabba^eb^nti idaṃ satiyā eva paccāsāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Sace pana ‘‘ito paṭṭhāya cīvaraṃ na labhissāmī’’ti paccāsā upacchinnā, mūlacīvarampi ^a^V2.0352^ea^ dasāhaṃ ce sampattaṃ, tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. ^b^Paccāsācīvarampi parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātabba^eb^nti paṭhamataraṃ uppannaṃ visabhāgapaccāsācīvaraṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Aññamañña^eb^nti aññaṃ aññaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Aṅgaṃ panettha paṭhamakathine vuttasadisameva. Kevalañhi tattha dasāhātikkamo, idha māsātikkamoti ayaṃ viseso.
[06]Tatiyakathinasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^503^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^b^bhattavissagga^eb^nti pāḷipadassa bhattakiccanti attho veditabbo, ‘‘bhattasaṃvidhāna’’ntipi keci. ^b^Tattha nāma tva^eb^nti imassapi so nāma tvanti attho veditabbo, ‘‘tāya nāma tva’’nti keci.

[03]^b^505^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pitā ca mātā ca pitaro, pitūnaṃ pitaro pitāmahā, tesaṃyeva yugo pitāmahayugo, tasmā ^b^yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā^eb^ pitāmahadvandāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Evañhi pitāmahaggahaṇeneva mātāmahopi gahitoti. ‘‘Yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā’’ti vacanato heṭṭhā ca uddhañca aṭṭhamayugo ñāti nāma na hoti. ^b^Desanāmukhameva ceta^eb^nti ^b^pitāmahayugā^eb^ti ^b^pitāmaha^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ desanāmukhaṃ pitāmahīmātāmahīādīnampi adhippetattā. Pitu mātā ^b^pitāmahī^eb^. Mātu pitā ^b^mātāmaho^eb^^a^M2.0399^ea^. Mātu mātā ^b^mātāmahī^eb^. Ettha kiñcāpi pañcasatasākiyānīnaṃ vasena bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā parivattaliṅgāya bhikkhuniyā ca vasena ekatoupasampannā bhikkhunī labbhati, tathāpi pakatiniyāmeneva dassetuṃ ‘‘bhikkhunī nāma ubhatosaṅghe upasampannā’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Kappaṃ katvā^eb^ti vacanato dinnakappameva pācittiyaṃ janetī’’ti vadanti. ‘‘Purāṇacīvaraṃ nāma sakiṃ nivatthampi sakiṃ pārutampī’’ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti āha ^b^‘‘antamaso paribhogasīsenā’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Kāyena phusitvā paribhogoyeva paribhogo nāmā’’ti ^b^kurundiyaṃ^eb^ adhippāyo.

[03]^b^506^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāyavikāraṃ katvā^eb^ti idaṃ yāva ‘‘orato ṭhapetī’’ti padaṃ, tāva sabbapadesu sambandhitabbaṃ. Yathā sā ‘‘dhovāpetukāmo aya’’nti jānāti, evaṃ kāyavikāraṃ katvāti attho. ‘‘Kāyavikāraṃ katvā’’ti vacanato kāyavācāhi kañci vikāraṃ akatvā hatthena hatthe dentassapi anāpatti. ^b^Antodvādasahatthe okāse^eb^ti idaṃ visesanaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Tathā ^a^V2.0353^ea^ hi hatthena hatthe dentassa pādamūle ca ṭhapetvā dentassa ‘‘antodvādasahatthe okāse’’ti idaṃ vattabbanti natthi aññathā asambhavato. Sati hi sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ hoti. Upari ‘‘khipatī’’tiādīni pana sandhāya idaṃ visesanaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā antodvādasahatthe okāse ṭhatvā upari khipantassa aññassa hatthe pesentassa ca āpatti. Upacāraṃ pana muñcitvā kāyavācāhi vikāraṃ katvā āṇāpentassapi anāpatti. ^b^Upacāre^eb^ti antodvādasahatthameva okāsaṃ vadati. ^b^Upacāraṃ muñcitvā^eb^ti dvādasahatthūpacāraṃ muñcitvā.

[03]^b^Ekena vatthunā^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ katvā niṭṭhāpitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Rajane anāpattī^eb^ti rajanaṃ paccāsīsantassapi ‘‘dhovitvā ānehī’’ti vuttattā anāpatti anāṇattiyā katattā. ‘‘Avuttā dhovatī’’ti iminā ‘‘avuttā rajati, avuttā ākoṭetī’’ti idampi vuttameva hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘avuttā dhovatīti iminā lakkhaṇena anāpattī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjatī^eb^ti pācittiyena saddhiṃ dve dukkaṭāni āpajjati. ^b^Yathāvatthukamevā^eb^ti nissaggiyamevāti attho. Pañca satāni parimāṇametāsanti ^b^pañcasatā^eb^.

[03]^b^507^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cīvaraṃ^eb^^a^M2.0400^ea^^b^dhovāti…pe… āṇāpentassā^eb^ti ettha tāya dhovanaṃ paccāsīsantassapi anāpatti. Purāṇacīvaratā, upacāre ṭhatvā aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā āṇāpanaṃ, tassā dhovanādīni cāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Purāṇacīvarasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^508^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^apaññatte sikkhāpade^eb^ti gaṇamhā ohīyanasikkhāpade apaññatte. ^b^Vihāravāra^eb^nti vihārapaṭijagganavāraṃ. ^b^Koṭṭhāsasampattī^eb^ti sakalā aṅgapaccaṅgasampatti. ^b^Sabbapariyanta^eb^nti chaṭṭhassa aññacīvarassa abhāvā pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ ekamekaṃ sabbesaṃ pariyantanti ^b^sabbapariyantaṃ^eb^. Antaravāsakādīsu hi pañcasu ekamekaṃ aññassa chaṭṭhassa abhāvā pañcannaṃ antameva hoti. Athavā pañcasu cīvaresu ekamekaṃ attano aññassa dutiyassa abhāvā antameva hotīti sabbameva pariyantanti ^b^sabbapariyantaṃ,^eb^ sabbaso vā pariyantanti ^b^sabbapariyantaṃ^eb^. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘aññaṃ…pe… natthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yathā tassa manoratho na pūratī^eb^ti ‘‘sarīrapāripūriṃ ^a^V2.0354^ea^ passissāmī’’ti tassa uppanno manoratho yathā na pūrati. ^b^Evaṃ hatthataleyeva dassetvā^eb^ti sarīraṃ adassetvāva dātabbacīvaraṃ hatthatale ‘‘handā’’ti dassetvā.

[03]^b^510^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vihatthatāyā^eb^ti vihatahatthatāya, agaṇatāya appaccayatāya appaṭisaraṇatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Samabhitunnattā^eb^ti pīḷitattā. Parivattetabbaṃ parivattaṃ, parivattameva ^b^pārivattakaṃ,^eb^ parivattetvā dīyamānanti attho.

[03]^b^512^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upacāre^eb^ti dvādasahatthūpacāraṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Upacāraṃ vā muñcitvā khipantī^eb^ti dvādasahatthaṃ muñcitvā orato ṭhapenti, na purimasikkhāpade viya dvādasahatthabbhantareyevāti adhippāyo. ^b^Aññatra pārivattakā^eb^ti yaṃ antamaso harītakakhaṇḍampi datvā vā dassāmīti ābhogaṃ katvā vā pārivattakaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ ṭhapetvā. ^b^Acittakabhāvena na sametī^eb^ti yathā aññātikāya ñātikasaññissa vematikassa ca gaṇhato acittakattā āpatti ^a^M2.0401^ea^, evamidhāpi ‘‘bhikkhuniyā santakaṃ ida’’nti ajānitvā gaṇhatopi āpattiyevāti adhippāyo. ^b^Vassāvāsikaṃ detī^eb^ti puggalikaṃ katvā deti. Paṃsukūlaṃ attano atthāya ṭhapitabhāvaṃ jānitvā gaṇhantenapi aññassa santakaṃ gahitaṃ nāma na hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘sace pana saṅkārakūṭādīsū’’^eb^tiādi. Asāmikañhi ^b^paṃsukūla^eb^nti vuccati. ^b^Paṃsukūlaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā^eb^ti ‘‘asāmikaṃ ida’’nti saññaṃ uppādetvā. Evaṃ pana paṃsukūlasaññaṃ anuppādetvā gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^513^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aññātikāya aññātikasaññīti tikapācittiya^eb^nti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho. Tīṇi parimāṇamassāti tikaṃ, tikañca taṃ pācittiyañcāti ^b^tikapācittiyaṃ,^eb^ tīṇi pācittiyānīti attho.

[03]^b^514^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pattatthavikādiṃ yaṃkiñcī^eb^ti anadhiṭṭhānupagaṃ sandhāya vadati. ‘‘Cīvaraṃ nāma channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ vikappanupagaṃ pacchima’’nti hi vuttattā adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ yaṃkiñci na vaṭṭati. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘vikappanupagapacchimacīvarappamāṇa’’^eb^ntiādi. Yasmā bhisicchavi mahantāpi senāsanasaṅgahitattā cīvarasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatīti neva adhiṭṭhānupagā na vikappanupagā ca, tasmā anadhiṭṭhānupagasāmaññato vuttaṃ. Sacepi mañcappamāṇā bhisicchavi hoti, vaṭṭatiyevāti. ^b^Ko pana vādo pattatthavikādīsū^eb^ti mahatiyāpi tāva bhisicchaviyā anadhiṭṭhānupagattā anāpatti, tato khuddakataresu anadhiṭṭhānupagesu pattatthavikādīsu kimeva vattabbanti adhippāyo. Paṭiggahaṇaṃ ^b^kiriyā,^eb^^a^V2.0355^ea^ aparivattanaṃ ^b^akiriyā^eb^. Vikappanupagacīvaratā, pārivattakābhāvo, aññātikāya hatthato gahaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Cīvarapaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^515^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^b^patikiṭṭho^eb^ti nihīno, lāmakoti attho. ^b^Lolajātiko^eb^ti lolasabhāvo. Paṭuyeva ^b^paṭṭo^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cheko’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kismiṃ viyā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘kismiṃ viyā’’ti nipātavasena samānatthaṃ ‘‘kiṃsu viyā’’ti nipātapadanti āha ^b^‘‘kiṃsu viyā’’^eb^ti, kiṃ viyāti ^a^M2.0402^ea^ attho, dukkhaṃ viyāti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kileso viyā’’^eb^tiādi. Dhammavasena upacāravasena nimantanā ^b^dhammanimantanā^eb^ti pāḷipadassa attho veditabbo. Sace pana ‘‘vadeyyātha, bhante, yenattho’’ti idaṃ saccameva vuttaṃ siyā, pavāritoyeva hoti. Yasmā pana pavāretvāpi adātukāmo appavāritaṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhati, tasmā bhagavā pavāritāpavāritabhāvaṃ avicāretvā ‘‘ñātako te, upananda, aññātako’’ti ñātakaaññātakabhāvaṃyeva vicāresi. ^b^Musiṃsū^eb^ti vilumpiṃsu.

[03]^b^517^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anupubbakathā^eb^ti anupubbena vinicchayakathā. Sesaparikkhārānaṃ saddhivihārikehi gahitattā nivāsanapārupanamattameva avasiṭṭhanti āha ^b^‘‘nivāsanapārupanamattaṃyeva haritvā’’^eb^ti. Saddhivihārikānaṃ tāva āgamanassa vā anāgamanassa vā ajānanatāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘therehi neva tāva…pe… bhañjitabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Paresampi atthāya labhantī^eb^ti attano cīvaraṃ dadamānā sayaṃ sākhābhaṅgena paṭicchādentīti tesaṃ atthāyapi bhañjituṃ labhanti. ‘‘Tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabba’’nti vacanato īdisesu bhūtagāmapātabyatāpi anuññātāyeva hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘neva bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na tesaṃ dhāraṇe dukkaṭa^eb^nti tesaṃ titthiyaddhajānaṃ dhāraṇepi dukkaṭaṃ natthi.

[03]Yāni ca nesaṃ vatthāni dentīti sambandho. Therānaṃ sayameva dinnattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘acchinnacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitattā’’^eb^ti. Yadi laddhiṃ gaṇhāti, titthiyapakkantako nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘laddhiṃ aggahetvā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘No ce hoti saṅghassa vihāracīvaraṃ vā…pe… āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti iminā antarāmagge paviṭṭhavihārato nikkhamitvā aññattha attano abhirucitaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^V2.0356^ea^ gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Iminā ca ‘‘yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ upagacchatī’’ti vuttaṃ antarāmagge ṭhitavihārampi sace naggo hutvā gacchati, dukkaṭamevāti veditabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ tattha kasmā na vuttanti ce? Anokāsattā. Tattha hi ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, acchinnacīvarassa vā…pe… cīvaraṃ viññāpetu’’nti iminā sambandhena saṅghikampi cīvaraṃ nivāsetuṃ pārupituñca anujānanto ‘‘yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ…pe… gahetvā pārupitu’’nti āha, tasmā tattha anokāsattā dukkaṭaṃ na vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Vihāracīvara^eb^nti ^a^M2.0403^ea^ senāsanacīvaraṃ. ^b^Cimilikāhī^eb^ti paṭapilotikāhi. ^b^Tassa uparī^eb^ti bhūmattharaṇassa upari. ^b^Videsagatenā^eb^ti aññaṃ cīvaraṃ alabhitvā videsagatena. ^b^Ekasmiṃ…pe… ṭhapetabba^eb^nti ettha ‘‘lesena gahetvā agatattā ṭhapentena ca saṅghikaparibhogeneva ṭhapitattā aññasmiṃ senāsane niyamitampi aññattha ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Paribhogenevā^eb^ti aññaṃ cīvaraṃ alabhitvā paribhuñjanena.

[03]^b^519-521^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paribhogajiṇṇa^eb^nti yathā tena cīvarena sarīraṃ paṭicchādetuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ jiṇṇaṃ. ^b^Kappiyavohārenā^eb^ti kayavikkayāpattito mocanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Viññāpentassā’’ti imasseva atthaṃ vibhāveti ^b^‘‘cetāpentassa parivattāpentassā’’^eb^ti. Attano dhanena hi viññāpanaṃ nāma parivattanamevāti adhippāyo. Saṅghavasena pavāritānaṃ viññāpane vattaṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. Saṅghavasena hi pavārite sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇattā adhikaṃ viññāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati. ^b^Yaṃ yaṃ pavāretī^eb^ti yaṃ yaṃ cīvarādiṃ dassāmīti pavāreti. ^b^Viññāpanakiccaṃ natthī^eb^ti vinā viññattiyā dīyamānattā viññāpetvā kiṃ karissatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Aññassatthāyā^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna’’nti idaṃ anuvattatiyevāti āha ^b^‘‘attano ñātakapavārite’’^eb^tiādi. Vikappanupagacīvaratā, samayābhāvo, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^522^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame pāḷiyaṃ ^b^paggāhikasāla^eb^nti dussavāṇijakānaṃ āpaṇaṃ. ‘‘Paggāhitasāla’’ntipi paṭhanti.

[03]^b^523-524^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhīti^eb^^a^V2.0357^ea^^b^upasaggo^eb^ti tassa visesatthābhāvaṃ dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘haritunti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vara^eb^-saddassa icchāyaṃ vattamānattā āha ^b^‘‘icchāpeyyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Daṭṭhu khemato^eb^ti ettha gāthābandhavasena anunāsikalopo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Saantara^eb^nti antaravāsakasahitaṃ. ^b^Uttara^eb^nti uttarāsaṅgaṃ. ^b^Assa cīvarassā^eb^ti sāditabbacīvarassa. ^b^Acchinnasabbacīvarenā^eb^ti acchinnāni ^a^M2.0404^ea^ sabbāni tīṇi cīvarāni assāti acchinnasabbacīvaro, tenāti attho. Yassa hi acchindanasamaye tīṇi cīvarāni sannihitāni honti, tāni sabbāni acchinnānīti so ‘‘acchinnasabbacīvaro’’ti vuccati. Teneva ^b^‘‘acchinnasabbacīvarena ticīvarakenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ticīvarakenā^eb^ti hi acchindanasamaye ticīvarassa sannihitabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana vinayatecīvarikabhāvaṃ dhutaṅgatecīvarikabhāvaṃ vā sandhāya. ^b^Evaṃ paṭipajjitabba^eb^nti ‘‘santaruttaraparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabba’’nti vuttavidhinā paṭipajjitabbaṃ. ^b^Aññenā^eb^ti acchinnaasabbacīvarena. Yassa tīsu cīvaresu ekaṃ vā dve vā cīvarāni acchinnāni honti, tenāti attho. ^b^Aññathāpī^eb^ti ‘‘santaruttaraparama’’nti vuttavidhānato aññathāpi. Yassa hi tīsu dve cīvarāni acchinnāni honti, ekaṃ sāditabbaṃ. Ekasmiṃ acchinne na sāditabbanti na tassa santaruttaraparamasādiyanaṃ sambhavati, ayameva ca attho padabhājanena vibhāvito. Tenāha ^b^‘‘taṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetu’’^eb^nti.

[03]Keci pana ‘‘ticīvarakenāti vuttattā ticīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷavasena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjato tasmiṃ naṭṭhe bahūnipi gahetuṃ labhatī’’ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Padabhājanassa hi adhippāyaṃ dassentena yasmā pana ‘‘acchinnasabbacīvarena…pe… taṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetu’’nti vuttaṃ, padabhājane ca na tādiso attho upalabbhati, tasmā taṃ na gahetabbameva. Yampi ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. tatuttarisikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) vuttaṃ ‘‘yassa adhiṭṭhitacīvarassa tīṇi naṭṭhānī’’ti, tatthāpi adhiṭṭhitaggahaṇaṃ sarūpakathanamattanti gahetabbaṃ, na pana ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitacīvarassevāti evamattho gahetabbo pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca tathā atthassa asambhavato. Na hi ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitacīvarasseva idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti sakkā viññātuṃ. Purimasikkhāpadena hi acchinnacīvarassa aññātakaviññattiyā anuññātattā pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā viññāpanavatthusmiṃ pamāṇato sādiyanaṃ anujānantena bhagavatā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, tasmā ‘‘parikkhāracoḷikassa bahumpi sādituṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti ayamattho neva pāḷiyā sameti, na ca bhagavato adhippāyaṃ anulometi.

[03]^b^Yassa tīṇi naṭṭhāni, tena dve sāditabbānī^eb^ti ettha yassa ticīvarato adhikampi cīvaraṃ aññattha ^a^V2.0358^ea^ ṭhitaṃ atthi, tadātassa cīvarassa alabbhanīyabhāvato tenapi ^a^M2.0405^ea^ sādituṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Pakatiyāva santaruttarena caratī^eb^ti sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavasena vā avippavāsasammutivasena vā tatiyassa alābhena vā carati. ‘‘Dve naṭṭhānī’’ti adhikārattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dve sāditabbānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ekaṃ sādiyanteneva samo bhavissatī^eb^ti tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ dvīsu naṭṭhesu ekaṃ sādiyantena samo bhavissati ubhinnampi santaruttaraparamatāya avaṭṭhānato. ^b^Yassa ekaṃyeva hotī^eb^ti aññena kenaci kāraṇena vinaṭṭhasesacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^526^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Sesakaṃ tuyheva hotūti dentī’’ti vuttattā ‘‘pamāṇayuttaṃ gaṇhissāma, sesakaṃ āharissāmā’’ti vatvā gahetvā gamanasamayepi ‘‘sesakampi tumhākaññeva hotū’’ti vadanti, laddhakappiyameva. ^b^Pavāritāna^eb^nti acchinnakālato pubbeyeva pavāritānaṃ. ^b^Pāḷiyā na sametī^eb^ti santaruttaraparamato uttari sādiyane anāpattidassanatthaṃ ‘‘anāpatti ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna’’nti vuttattā na sameti. Santaruttaraparamaṃ sādiyantassa hi āpattippasaṅgoyeva natthi, sati ca sikkhāpadena āpattippasaṅge anāpatti yuttā dassetunti adhippāyo. Keci pana ^b^‘‘pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī^eb^ti idaṃ sallekhadassanatthaṃ vutta’’nti vadanti.

[03]^b^Yasmā panidaṃ…pe… na vutta^eb^nti etthāyamadhippāyo – ‘‘aññassatthāyā’’ti vuccamāne aññesaṃ atthāya pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvāpi gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti āpajjati, tañca aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattattā vatthunā saṃsandiyamānaṃ na sameti. Na hi yaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, tasmiṃyeva anāpattivacanaṃ yuttanti. ^b^Gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ pana tīsupi ‘‘imassa sikkhāpadassa attano sādiyanapaṭibaddhatāvasena pavattattā ‘aññassatthāyā’ti vattuṃ okāsoyeva natthi, tasmā na vutta’’nti kathitaṃ. Idha ‘‘aññassatthāyā’’ti avuttattā aññesaṃ atthāya ñātakapavāritesu adhikaṃ viññāpentassa āpattīti ce? Na, tattha purimasikkhāpadeneva anāpattisiddhito. Tatuttaritā, acchinnādikāraṇatā, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Tatuttarisikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^527^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^a^M2.0406^ea^^a^V2.0359^ea^^b^api mayyā^eb^ti pāṭhepi soyevattho. Ayyāti pana bahuvacanena āmantanaṃ kataṃ.

[03]^b^528-529^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Apadissā^eb^ti ‘‘itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dassāmī’’ti evaṃ apadisitvā. ^b^Paccayaṃ katvā^eb^ti kāraṇaṃ katvā. ^b^Uddissāti ettha yo kattā^eb^ti ‘‘uddissā’’ti iminā vuttauddisanakiriyāya yo kattā. Cīvaraṃ cetāpenti parivattenti etenāti ^b^cīvaracetāpannaṃ^eb^. Na-kārāgamaṃ katvā cīvaracetāpannanti vuttaṃ, ‘‘cīvaracetāpana’’ntipi paṭhanti. ^b^Pacuravohāravasenā^eb^ti yebhuyyavohāravasena. Yebhuyyavasena hi gharasāmikaṃ daṭṭhukāmā tassa gharaṃ gacchantīti tatheva bahulaṃ vohāro. ^b^Byañjanamattamevā^eb^ti attho netabbo natthīti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^531^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samakepi pana anāpattī^eb^ti yadagghanakaṃ so dātukāmo hoti, tadagghanake anāpatti mūlaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adhikavidhānaṃ anāpannattā. Ettha ca ‘‘dātukāmomhī’’ti attano santike avuttepi dātukāmataṃ sutvā yadagghanakaṃ so dātukāmo hoti, tadagghanakaṃ āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Agghavaḍḍhanakañhi idaṃ sikkhāpada^eb^nti ettha agghavaḍḍhanaṃ etassa atthīti ^b^agghavaḍḍhanakaṃ,^eb^ agghavaḍḍhanaṃ sandhāya idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti adhippāyo. ^b^Cīvaraṃ dehī^eb^ti saṅghāṭiādīsu yaṃkiñci cīvaraṃ sandhāya vadati. Cīvare bhiyyokamyatā, aññātakaviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Paṭhamaupakkhaṭasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^532^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyaupakkhaṭe vattabbaṃ natthi.

[03]^b^537-539^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rājasikkhāpade pana ‘‘ajjaṇho’’ti pāṭhe ‘‘ajjuṇho’’tipi paṭhanti. ^b^Bhogo^eb^ti bhuñjitabbo. Yaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘iminā ^a^M2.0407^ea^ cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehīti idaṃ āgamanasuddhiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Sace hi ‘idaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehī’ti peseyya, āgamanassa asuddhattā akappiyavatthuṃ ārabbha bhikkhunā ^a^V2.0360^ea^ kappiyakārakopi niddisitabbo na bhaveyyā’’ti, tattha āgamanassa suddhiyā vā asuddhiyā vā visesappayojanaṃ na dissati. Satipi hi āgamanassa asuddhabhāve dūto attano kusalatāya kappiyavohārena vadati, ‘‘kappiyakārako na niddisitabbo’’ti idaṃ natthi, na ca dūtena kappiyavohāravasena vutte dāyakena idaṃ kathaṃ pesitanti īdisī vicāraṇā upalabbhati, avicāretvā ca taṃ na sakkā jānituṃ, yadi pana āgamanassa asuddhattā kappiyakārako niddisitabbo na bhaveyya, cīvarānaṃ atthāya dūtassa hatthe akappiyavatthusmiṃ pesite sabbattha dāyakena kathaṃ pesitanti pucchitvāva kappiyakārako niddisitabbo bhaveyya. Tasmā asatipi āgamanasuddhiyaṃ sace so dūto attano kusalatāya kappiyavohāravasena vadati, dūtasseva vacanaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Yadi hi āgamanasuddhiyevettha pamāṇaṃ, mūlasāmikena kappiyavohāravasena pesitassa dūtassa akappiyavohāravasena vadatopi kappiyakārako niddisitabbo bhaveyya, tasmā sabbattha dūtavacanameva pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Iminā cīvaracetāpannenā^eb^tiādinā pana imamatthaṃ dasseti – kappiya vasena āgatampi cīvaramūlaṃ īdisena dūtavacanena akappiyaṃ hoti, tasmā taṃ paṭikkhipitabbanti. Tenevāha – ‘‘tena bhikkhunā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo’’tiādi. Suvaṇṇaṃ, rajataṃ, kahāpaṇo, māsakoti imāni hi cattāri nissaggiyavatthūni, muttā, maṇi, veḷuriyo, saṅkho, silā, pavāḷaṃ, lohitaṅko, masāragallaṃ, satta dhaññāni, dāsidāsaṃ, khettaṃ, vatthu, pupphārāmaphalārāmādayoti imāni dukkaṭavatthūni ca attano vā cetiyasaṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭanti, tasmā taṃ sādituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ ‘‘na kho mayaṃ, āvuso, cīvaracetāpannaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā’’ti vuttaṃ, ‘‘cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā’’ti idaṃ pana attānaṃ uddissa ābhatattā vattuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā vuttaṃ. ‘‘Veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo’’ti idaṃ ‘‘atthi panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro’’ti kappiyavacanena vuttattā anuññātaṃ. Sace pana dūto ‘‘ko imaṃ gaṇhātī’’ti vā ^a^M2.0408^ea^ ‘‘kassa demī’’ti vā vadati, na niddisitabbo. ‘‘Ārāmiko vā upāsako vā’’ti idaṃ sāruppatāya vuttaṃ, ṭhapetvā pana pañca sahadhammike yo koci kappiyakārako vaṭṭati. ‘‘Eso kho, āvuso, bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro’’ti idaṃ bhikkhussa kappiyavacanadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Evameva hi vattabbaṃ, ‘‘etassa dehī’’tiādi na vattabbaṃ. ^b^So vā cetāpessati vā^eb^ti ettha eko ^b^vā^eb^-saddo padapūraṇo, ‘‘saññatto so mayā’’tiādi pana dūtena evaṃ ārociteyeva taṃ codetuṃ vaṭṭati, nevāssa hatthe datvā gatamattakāraṇenāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Etāni^eb^^a^V2.0361^ea^^b^hi vacanāni…pe… na vattabbo^eb^ti ettha ‘‘evaṃ vadanto paṭikkhittassa katattā vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, codanā pana hotiyevā’’ti ^b^mahāgaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade^eb^ ca vuttaṃ. ^b^Uddiṭṭhacodanāparicchedaṃ dassetvā^eb^ti ‘‘dutiyampi vattabbo’’tiādinā dassetvā. ^b^Pucchiyamāno^eb^ti ettha pucchiyamānenāti attho gahetabboti āha ^b^‘‘karaṇatthe paccattavacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Āgatakāraṇaṃ bhañjatī^eb^ti āgatakāraṇaṃ vināseti.

[03]Ettha keci vadanti ‘‘āgatakāraṇaṃ nāma cīvaraggahaṇaṃ, taṃ bhañjatīti vuttattā puna taṃ cīvaraṃ yena kenaci ākārena gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatī’’ti. Keci pana ‘‘āgatakāraṇaṃ nāma kāyavācāhi codanā, taṃ bhañjatīti vuttattā puna taṃ yena kenaci ākārena codetuṃ na labhati. Sace sayameva deti, mūlasāmiko vā dāpeti, gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti. Apare pana ‘‘āgatakāraṇaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ, taṃ bhañjatīti vuttattā yathā ‘attho me, āvuso, cīvarenā’ti ekāya codanāya dve ṭhānāni bhañjati, evamidhāpi sace āsane nisīdati, ekāya nisajjāya dve ṭhānāni bhañjati. Āmisaṃ ce paṭiggaṇhāti, ekena paṭiggahaṇena dve ṭhānāni bhañjati. Dhammaṃ ce bhāsati, dhammadesanāsikkhāpade vuttaparicchedāya ekāya vācāya dve ṭhānāni bhañjatī’’ti vadanti. Imesaṃ pana sabbesampi vādaṃ ‘‘ayutta’’nti paṭikkhipitvā tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ idaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘āgatakāraṇaṃ nāma ṭhānameva, tasmā ‘na kattabba’nti vāritassa katattā nisajjādīsu katesu chasu ṭhānesu ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ bhañjatī’’ti.

[03]^b^Tatra^eb^^a^M2.0409^ea^^b^tatra ṭhāne tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti idaṃ codakassa ṭhitaṭṭhānato apakkamma tatra tatra uddissa ṭhānaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. ‘‘Sāmaṃ vā gantabbaṃ, dūto vā pāhetabbo’’ti idaṃ sabhāvato codetuṃ anicchantenapi kātabbamevāti vadanti. Mukhaṃ vivaritvā sayameva kappiyakārakattaṃ upagatoti ^b^mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako^eb^. ^b^Avicāretukāmatāyā^eb^ti imasmiṃ pakkhe ‘‘natthamhākaṃ kappiyakārako’’ti idaṃ ‘‘tādisaṃ karonto kappiyakārako natthī’’ti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^‘‘Meṇḍakasikkhāpade vuttanayena paṭipajjitabba’’^eb^nti vatvā idāni taṃ meṇḍakasikkhāpadaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘vuttañheta’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Idameva hi ‘‘santi, bhikkhave, saddhā pasannā’’tiādivacanaṃ bhesajjakkhandhake meṇḍakavatthusmiṃ (mahāva. 299) vuttattā ‘‘meṇḍakasikkhāpada’’nti vuttaṃ. Tattha hi meṇḍakena nāma seṭṭhinā –
[08]‘‘Santi ^a^V2.0362^ea^, bhante, maggā kantārā appodakā appabhakkhā, na sukarā apātheyyena gantuṃ, sādhu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātheyyaṃ anujānātū’’ti –
[07]Yācitena bhagavatā –

[08]‘‘Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pātheyyaṃ pariyesituṃ. Taṇḍulo taṇḍulatthikena, muggo muggatthikena, māso māsatthikena, loṇaṃ loṇatthikena, guḷo guḷatthikena, telaṃ telatthikena, sappi sappitthikenā’’ti –
[07]Vatvā idaṃ vuttaṃ –

[08]‘‘Santi, bhikkhave, manussā saddhā pasannā, te kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe hiraññaṃ upanikkhipanti ‘iminā ayyassa yaṃ kappiyaṃ, taṃ dethā’ti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ tato kappiyaṃ, taṃ sādituṃ, na tvevāhaṃ bhikkhave kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ pariyesitabbanti vadāmī’’ti.

[03]^b^Hiraññaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0410^ea^^b^upanikkhipantī^eb^ti etthāpi bhikkhussa ārocanaṃ atthiyevāti gahetabbaṃ. Aññathā aniddiṭṭhakappiyakārakattaṃ bhajatīti na codetabbo siyā. Yadi mūlaṃ sandhāya codeti, taṃ sāditameva siyāti āha ^b^‘‘mūlaṃ asādiyantenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^‘‘Aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabba^eb^nti idaṃ attanā codanāṭhānañca na kātabbanti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññaṃ pana kappiyakārakaṃ pesetvā lokacārittavasena anuyuñjitvāpi kappiyavatthuṃ āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati attānaṃ uddissa nikkhittassa attano santakattā’’ti keci vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Sace sayameva cīvaraṃ ānetvā denti, gahetabbaṃ. No ce, kiñci na vattabbā’’ti daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā na gahetabbanti amhākaṃ khanti. Na hi aññātakaappavāritaṃ sayaṃ aviññāpetvā aññena viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, na ca yattha aññaṃ pesetvā āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, tattha sayaṃ gantvā na āharāpetabbanti sakkā vatthuṃ. Yadi cettha aññena āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, ‘‘aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabba’’ntiādivacanameva niratthakaṃ siyā. ‘‘Dūtenā’’ti imassa byabhicāraṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘sayaṃ āharitvāpī’’^eb^ti. Dadantesūti iminā sambandho ^a^V2.0363^ea^. ^b^Piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāyā^eb^ti iminā pana ‘‘cīvaracetāpanna’’nti imassa byabhicāraṃ dasseti. ‘‘Eseva nayo’’ti vuttattā piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya dinnepi ṭhānacodanādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva kātabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpattī^eb^ti paṭiggahaṇe pācittiyaṃ, paribhoge dukkaṭaṃ. ^b^Sveva sāpattiko^eb^ti dukkaṭāpattiṃ sandhāya vadati. Idañca aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva gahetabbaṃ. ‘‘Parassa niddosabhāvadassanatthaṃ sveva sāpattiko sadosoti vuttaṃ hotī’’tipi vadanti. ^b^‘‘Codetī^eb^ti vuttattā pana āpattiyā codetīti katvā sveva sāpattikoti idaṃ dukkaṭaṃyeva sandhāya vattuṃ yutta’’nti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpattiyevā^eb^ti dukkaṭameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Taḷākassapi khettasaṅgahitattā tassa paṭiggahaṇepi āpatti vuttā. ^b^Cattāro paccaye saṅgho paribhuñjatūti detī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘bhikkhusaṅgho cattāro paccaye paribhuñcatu, taḷākaṃ dammī’’ti vā ‘‘catupaccayaparibhogatthaṃ taḷākaṃ ^a^M2.0411^ea^ dammī’’ti vā vadati, vaṭṭatiyeva. ‘‘Ito taḷākato uppanne cattāro paccaye dammī’’ti vutte pana vattabbameva natthi.

[03]^b^Amhākaṃ ekaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapethāti vutte^eb^ti idaṃ īdisaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kappiyakkamena sampaṭicchitesu khettataḷākādīsu pana avuttepi kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetuṃ labbhatiyeva. Yasmā parasantakaṃ nāsetuṃ bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmā ^b^‘‘na sassakāle’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Janapadassa sāmiko^eb^ti imināva yo taṃ janapadaṃ vicāreti, tenapi acchinditvā dinnaṃ vaṭṭatiyevā’’ti vadanti. ^b^Udakavāhaka^eb^nti udakamātikaṃ. ^b^Kappiyavohārepī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘vidhānaṃ vakkhāmā’’ti pāṭhaseso. ^b^Udakavasenā^eb^ti udakaparibhogatthaṃ. ^b^Suddhacittāna^eb^nti kevalaṃ udakaparibhogatthamevāti adhippāyo. Alajjinā kārāpite vattabbameva natthīti āha ^b^‘‘lajjībhikkhunā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pakatibhāgo^eb^ nāma imasmiṃ raṭṭhe catuambaṇamattaṃ. Akaṭṭhapubbaṃ ^b^navasassaṃ^eb^ nāma. ^b^Aparicchinnabhāge^eb^ti ‘‘ettake bhūmibhāge ettako bhāgo dātabbo’’ti evaṃ aparicchinnabhāge.

[03]^b^Rajjuyā vā daṇḍena vā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘pādehipi minituṃ na vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Khale vā ṭhatvā rakkhatī^eb^ti ettha pana thenetvā gaṇhante disvā ‘‘mā gaṇhathā’’ti nivārento rakkhati nāma. Sace pana avicāretvā kevalaṃ tuṇhībhūtova rakkhaṇatthāya olokento tiṭṭhati, vaṭṭati. Sacepi tasmiṃ tuṇhībhūte corikāya haranti, ‘‘mayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocessāmā’’ti evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. ^b^Nīharāpeti paṭisāmetī^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘sace pariyāyena vadati, vaṭṭatī’’ti ^a^V2.0364^ea^ vadanti. Apubbassa anuppāditattā aññesaṃ vaṭṭatīti āha ^b^‘‘tasseva taṃ akappiya’’^eb^nti.

[03]Nanu ca dubbicāritamattena tasseva taṃ akappiyaṃ, na sabbesaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāre catutthapatto viya. Vuttañhi tattha (pārā. aṭṭha. 2.589) ‘‘yo pana rūpiyaṃ asampaṭicchitvā ‘therassa pattaṃ kiṇitvā dehī’ti pahitakappiyakārakena saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ gantvā pattaṃ disvā ‘ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā imaṃ dehī’ti kahāpaṇe dāpetvā gahito, ayaṃ patto etasseva bhikkhuno na vaṭṭati dubbicāritattā, aññesaṃ pana vaṭṭati mūlassa asampaṭicchitattā’’ti. Tasmā ^a^M2.0412^ea^^b^yaṃ te āharanti, sabbesaṃ akappiyaṃ^eb^. ^b^Kasmā? Kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattā^eb^ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti? Ettha keci vadanti ‘‘kahāpaṇe sādiyitvā vicāritaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vutta’’nti. Saṅghikattā ca nissajjituṃ na sakkā, tasmā sabbesaṃ na kappatīti tesaṃ adhippāyo. Keci pana ‘‘asādiyitvāpi kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattā rūpiyasaṃvohāro kato hoti, saṅghikattā ca nissajjituṃ na sakkā, tasmā sabbesaṃ na kappatī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ pana tīsupi idaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘catutthapatto gihisantakānaṃyeva kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattā aññesaṃ kappati, idha pana saṅghikānaṃ vicāritattā sabbesaṃ na kappatī’’ti. Sabbesampi vādo tena tena pariyāyena yujjatiyeva.

[03]^b^Catusāladvāre^eb^ti bhojanasālaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Pariyāyena kathitattā^eb^ti ‘‘gaṇhā’’ti avatvā ‘‘sīmā gatā’’ti pariyāyena kathitattā. Pakatibhūmikaraṇatthaṃ ^b^‘‘heṭṭhā gahitaṃ paṃsu’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Dāsaṃ dammī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘manussaṃ dammīti vutte vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Kukkuṭasūkarā…pe… vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ettha kukkuṭasūkaresu dīyamānesu ‘‘imehi amhākaṃ attho natthi, sukhaṃ jīvantu, araññe vissajjethā’’ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. ‘‘Khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī’’tiādivacanato (dī. ni. 1.10, 194) khettādīnaṃ paṭiggahaṇe ayaṃ sabbo vinicchayo vutto. Kappiyakārakassa bhikkhunā niddiṭṭhabhāvo, dūtena appitatā, tatuttari vāyāmo, tena vāyāmena paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Rājasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Niṭṭhito cīvaravaggo paṭhamo.

[03]^b^542^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pāḷiyaṃ ^a^V2.0365^ea^^b^‘‘kosiyakārake’’^eb^ti ettha kosaṃ karontīti kosakārakāti laddhavohārānaṃ pāṇakānaṃ kosato nibbattaṃ kosiyaṃ, taṃ karontīti kosiyakārakā, tantavāyā. Saṃhananaṃ ^b^saṅghāto^eb^^a^M2.0413^ea^, vināsoti attho. ^b^Kosiyamissaka^eb^nti kosiyatantunā missaṃ. ‘‘Avāyima’’nti vuttattā vāyitvā ce karonti, anāpatti. ^b^Anāpatti vitānaṃ vā^eb^tiādinā vitānādīnaṃ atthāya karaṇepi tenākārena paribhogepi anāpatti vuttā.

[03]^b^Evampi missetvā katameva hotī^eb^ti iminā vātena āharitvā pātitepi acittakattā āpattiyevāti dasseti. Kosiyamissakatā, attano atthāya santhatassa karaṇaṃ kārāpanaṃ, paṭilābho cāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Kosiyasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^547^eb^^b^.^eb^ Suddhakāḷakasikkhāpadaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03]^b^552^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dvebhāgasikkhāpade pana ^b^dve bhāgā^eb^ti ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo kāḷakānaṃ adhikaggahaṇassa paṭikkhepavasena sikkhāpadassa paññattattā. ^b^Tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ catutthaṃ gocariyāna^eb^nti ayaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedo tesaṃ adhikaggahaṇe paṭikkhepābhāvato, tasmā kāḷakānaṃ bhāgadvayato adhikaṃ na vaṭṭati, sesānaṃ pana vuttappamāṇato adhikampi vaṭṭati. ‘‘Kāḷakānaṃyeva ca adhikaggahaṇassa paṭikkhittattā kāḷakānaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ odātānaṃ vā gocariyānaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṃ gahetvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti, ‘‘anāpatti bahutaraṃ odātānaṃ bahutaraṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karoti, suddhaṃ odātānaṃ suddhaṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karotī’’ti iminā taṃ sameti. ‘‘Kāḷake odāte ca ṭhapetvā sesā gocariyesuyeva saṅgahaṃ gacchantī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Dve^eb^^a^V2.0366^ea^^b^koṭṭhāsā kāḷakāna^eb^nti ettha pana ‘‘ekassapi kāḷakalomassa atirekabhāve nissaggiyaṃ hotī’’ti ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. dvebhāgasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) ttaṃ, taṃ ‘‘dhārayitvā dve tulā ādātabbā’’ti vacanato tulādhāraṇāya na sameti ^a^M2.0414^ea^. Na hi lome gaṇetvā tulādhāraṇā karīyati, atha gaṇetvāva dhārayitabbaṃ siyā, kiṃ tulādhāraṇāya, tasmā evamettha adhippāyo yutto siyā – acittakattā sikkhāpadassa pubbe tulāya dhārayitvā ṭhapitesu ekampi lomaṃ tattha pateyya, nissaggiyanti. Aññathā dubbiññeyyabhāvato dve tulā nādātabbā, ūnakatarāva ādātabbā siyuṃ.
[06]Dvebhāgasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^557^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chabbassasikkhāpade pana ‘‘yesaṃ no santhate dārakā uhadantipi ummihantipi, yesaṃ no santhatā undūrehipi khajjantī’’ti evaṃ pāḷipadānaṃ sambandho veditabbo. ^b^Hada^eb^ karīsossagge, ^b^miha^eb^ secaneti panimassatthaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘vaccampi passāvampi karontī’’^eb^ti. Pavāraṇāuposathapāṭipadadivasesu santhataṃ karitvā puna chaṭṭhe vasse paripuṇṇe pavāraṇāuposathapāṭipadadivasesu karonto ^b^‘‘chabbassāni karotī’’^eb^ti vuccati. Dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya karonto pana ^b^atirekachabbassāni karoti^eb^ nāma.
[06]Chabbassasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^565-6^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nisīdanasanthatasikkhāpade pana ^b^paññāyissatī^eb^ti sace sā katikā manāpā bhavissati, manāpatāya bhikkhusaṅgho sandississati. Sace amanāpā, amanāpatāya sandississatīti adhippāyo, āraññakaṅgādīni tīṇi pāḷiyaṃ padhānaṅgavasena vuttāni, sesānipi te samādiyiṃsuyevāti veditabbaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘santhate catutthacīvarasaññitāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ujjhitvā^eb^ti vissajjetvā.

[03]^b^567^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nisīdanasanthatattā ^a^M2.0415^ea^ nivāsanapārupanakiccaṃ natthīti āha ^b^‘‘sakiṃ nisinnañceva nipannañcā’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0367^ea^. ^b^Vidatthimatta^eb^nti sugatavidatthiṃ sandhāya vadati. Idañca heṭṭhimaparicchedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Vitānādīnaṃyeva atthāya karaṇe anāpattivacanato sace nipajjanatthāya karonti, āpattiyevā’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Akappiyattā pana ^b^‘‘paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Idañca nisīdanasanthataṃ nāma nisīdanacīvarameva, nāññanti vadanti. Nisīdanasikkhāpadepi nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatīti ca aṭṭhakathāyañcassa ‘‘santhatasadisaṃ santharitvā ekasmiṃ ante sugatavidatthiyā vidatthimatte padese dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā tisso dasā karīyanti, tāhi dasāhi sadasaṃ nāma vuccatī’’ti (pāci. aṭṭha. 531) vacanato idhāpi ‘‘nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī’’ti ca ‘‘santhate catutthacīvarasaññitāyā’’ti ca vacanato taṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati. Keci pana ‘‘nisīdanasanthataṃ eḷakalomāni santharitvā santhataṃ viya karonti, taṃ avāyimaṃ anadhiṭṭhānupagaṃ, nisīdanacīvaraṃ pana channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññatarena karoti adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ, taṃ karontā ca nantakāni santharitvā santhatasadisaṃ karontī’’ti vadanti, vīmaṃsitvā yuttataraṃ gahetabbaṃ.
[06]Nisīdanasanthatasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^571^eb^^b^.^eb^ Eḷalomasikkhāpade pana ^b^āsumbhī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘asumbhī’’ti paṭhanti. ^b^Kilantā^eb^ti iminā kilantatāya te onamitvā pātetuṃ na sakkontīti dasseti. ^b^Addhānamaggappaṭipannassā^eb^ti idaṃ vatthumattadīpanavasena pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yattha katthaci pana dhammena labhitvā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. ^b^Tiyojanaparama^eb^nti ca gahitaṭṭhānato tiyojanappamāṇaṃ desanti evamattho gahetabbo.

[03]^b^572^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sahatthā^eb^ti karaṇatthe nissakkavacananti āha ^b^‘‘sahatthenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Asante hārake^eb^ti ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ bhikkhuno anurūpatādassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana hārake vijjamāne tiyojanabbhantare sahatthā harantassa āpattidassanatthaṃ. Tiyojanato bahi ^b^bahitiyojana^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘tiyojanato bahi pātetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tena haritepi āpattiyevā^eb^ti saussāhattā anāṇattiyā haṭattā ca. Satipi hi saussāhabhāve āṇattiyā ^a^M2.0416^ea^ ce harati, anāpatti ‘‘aññaṃ harāpetī’’ti vacanato. Añño harissatīti adhippāyābhāvato ^b^‘‘suddhacittena ṭhapita’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Saussāhattā^eb^ti tiyojanātikkamane saussāhattā. Idañca ‘‘añño harissatī’’ti asuddhacittena ṭhapitaṃ sandhāya ^a^V2.0368^ea^ vuttaṃ, ^b^acittakattā^eb^ti idaṃ pana suddhacittena ṭhapitaṃ sandhāya. ^b^Anāpatti pāḷiyā na sametī^eb^ti ‘‘tiyojanaṃ haratī’’tiādipāḷiyā, visesato ‘‘aññaṃ harāpetī’’ti pāḷiyā ca na sameti.

[03]Sace sāmikaṃ jānāpetvā ṭhapeti, āṇattiyā harāpeti nāmāti āha ^b^‘‘sāmikassa ajānantassevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Agacchantepī^eb^ti gamanaṃ upacchinditvā ṭhitayānepi. ^b^Heṭṭhā vā gacchanto^eb^ti bhūmiyaṃ gacchanto. ^b^Aññaṃ harāpetī^eb^ti ettha ^b^añña^eb^-ggahaṇena sāmaññato tiracchānagatāpi saṅgahitāti āha – ^b^‘‘aññaṃ harāpetīti vacanato anāpattī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Suṅkaghāte āpatti hotī^eb^ti aññaṃ harāpentassa āpatti. ^b^Tattha anāpattī^eb^ti aññavihitassa theyyacittābhāvato anāpatti.

[03]^b^575^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Taṃ harantassā^eb^ti puna tiyojanaṃ harantassā’’ti ^b^mahāgaṇṭhipade^eb^ vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ aṅgesu ‘‘paṭhamappaṭilābho sati iminā vacanena na sameti. ‘‘Paṭhamappaṭilābho’’ti hi idaṃ dutiyappaṭilābho āpattiyā aṅgaṃ na hotīti dīpeti, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca visesābhāvato acchinnaṃ paṭilabhitvā harantassa puna tiyojanātikkamepi anāpatti vuttāti amhākaṃ khanti. Aññathā acchinnaṃ paṭilabhitvā puna tiyojanaṃ haratīti vadeyya. Vīmaṃsitvā yuttataraṃ gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Anāpatti katabhaṇḍa^eb^nti ettha ‘‘kambalakojavādikatabhaṇḍampi. Pakaticīvare laggalomāni āpattiṃ janentiyevā’’ti vadanti. Tanukapattatthavikantare aghaṭṭanatthaṃ pakkhipanti. ^b^Pakkhitta^eb^nti kaṇṇacchidde pakkhittaṃ. ^b^Nidhānamukhaṃ nāmā^eb^ti iminā katabhaṇḍasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatīti dasseti. Eḷakalomānaṃ akatabhaṇḍatā, paṭhamappaṭilābho, attanā ādāya vā aññassa ajānantassa yāne pakkhipitvā vā tiyojanātikkamanaṃ, āharaṇapaccāharaṇaṃ, avāsādhippāyatāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
[06]Eḷakalomasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^576^eb^^b^.^eb^ Eḷakalomadhovāpanasikkhāpadaṃ ^a^M2.0417^ea^ uttānatthameva.

[03]^b^583-584^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rūpiyasikkhāpade pana ^b^satthuvaṇṇo^eb^ti satthunā samānavaṇṇo. Satthuno vaṇṇo satthuvaṇṇo, satthuvaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo assāti satthuvaṇṇoti majjhapadalopīsamāso daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Pākatiko^eb^^a^V2.0369^ea^ nāma etarahi pakatikahāpaṇo. ^b^Rukkhaphalabījamayo^eb^ti tintiṇikādirukkhānaṃ phalabījena kato. ^b^Iccetaṃ sabbampī^eb^ti yathāvuttabhedaṃ sabbampi catubbidhaṃ nissaggiyavatthu hotīti sambandho. ^b^Jātarūpamāsako^eb^ti suvaṇṇakahāpaṇo.

[03]^b^Gaṇheyyā^eb^ti attano atthāya dīyamānaṃ vā katthaci ṭhitaṃ vā nippariggahaṃ disvā sayaṃ gaṇheyya. ‘‘Idaṃ ayyassa hotū’’ti evaṃ sammukhā vā ‘‘asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne mama hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ atthi, taṃ tuyhaṃ hotū’’ti evaṃ parammukhā ṭhitaṃ vā kevalaṃ vācāya vā hatthamuddāya vā ‘‘tuyha’’nti vatvā pariccattassa kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā cittena sādiyanaṃ ^b^upanikkhittasādiyanaṃ^eb^ nāma. ‘‘Sādiyatī’’ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti ^b^‘‘gaṇhitukāmo hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Idaṃ guttaṭṭhāna’’nti ācikkhitabba^eb^nti paccayaparibhogaṃyeva sandhāya ācikkhitabbaṃ. ‘‘Idha nikkhipāhī’’ti vutte ‘‘uggaṇhāpeyya vā’’ti vuttalakkhaṇena nissaggiyaṃ hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘idha nikkhipāhīti na vattabba’’^eb^nti. Parato ^b^‘‘imaṃ gaṇhā’’ti na vattabba^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitameva hotī^eb^ti yasmā tato uppannapaccayaparibhogo kappati, tasmā kappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. Yasmā pana dubbicāraṇāya tato uppannapaccayaparibhogopi na kappati, tasmā akappiyaṃ nissāya ṭhitanti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpita^eb^nti ettha cetāpitaṃ ce, natthi paribhogupāyo, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Akappiyañhi nissaggiyaṃ vatthuṃ uggaṇhitvā taṃ anissajjitvāva cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhampi sabbesaṃ na kappati. Keci pana ‘‘yasmā nissaggiyaṃ vatthuṃ paṭiggahetvā cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmīti nissaṭṭhaṃ vināva upāyaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā ^a^M2.0418^ea^ ‘na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpita’nti vutta’’nti vadanti. ^b^‘‘Ārāmikānaṃ vā pattabhāga^eb^nti idaṃ gihīnaṃ hatthagatopi soyeva bhāgoti katvā vuttaṃ. Sace pana tena aññaṃ parivattetvā ārāmikā denti, paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti ^b^majjhimagaṇṭhipade cūḷagaṇṭhipade^eb^ ca vuttaṃ. ^b^Tato haritvā^eb^ti aññesaṃ pattabhāgato haritvā. ^b^Kasiṇaparikamma^eb^nti ālokakasiṇaparikammaṃ. ^b^Mañcapīṭhādīni vā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘tato gahitamañcapīṭhādīni parivattetvā aññaṃ ce gahitaṃ, vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Chāyāpī^eb^ti bhojanasālādīnaṃ chāyāpi. ^b^Paricchedātikkantā^eb^ti gehaparicchedaṃ atikkantā, chāyāya gatagataṭṭhānaṃ gehaṃ nāma na hotīti adhippāyo. ^b^Maggenapī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘sace añño maggo natthi, maggaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Kītāyā^eb^ti tena vatthunā kītāya. ^b^Upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjatī^eb^ti sace upāsako ‘‘atibahu etaṃ hiraññaṃ, idaṃ, bhante, ajjeva na vināsetabba’’nti vatvā sayaṃ ^a^V2.0370^ea^ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapeti, aññena vā ṭhapāpeti, etaṃ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā tato udayaṃ paribhuñjanto saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjati, tena vatthunā gahitattā ^b^‘‘akappiya’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^585^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Patitokāsaṃ asamannāharantena pātetabba^eb^nti idaṃ nirapekkhabhāvadassanaparanti veditabbaṃ, tasmā patitaṭṭhāne ñātepissa gūthaṃ chaḍḍentassa viya nirapekkhabhāvoyevettha pamāṇanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Asantasambhāvanāyā^eb^ti attani avijjamānauttarimanussadhammārocanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Theyyaparibhogo^eb^ nāma anarahassa paribhogo. Bhagavatā hi attano sāsane sīlavato paccayā anuññātā, na dussīlassa. Dāyakānampi sīlavato eva pariccāgo, na dussīlassa attano kārānaṃ mahapphalabhāvassa paccāsīsanato. Iti satthārā ananuññātattā dāyakehi ca apariccattattā dussīlassa paribhogo theyyaparibhogo. Iṇavasena paribhogo ^b^iṇaparibhogo,^eb^ paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā abhāvato iṇaṃ gahetvā paribhogo viyāti attho. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti ‘‘sīlavato’’tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati. ^b^Cīvaraṃ paribhoge paribhoge^eb^ti kāyato mocetvā mocetvā paribhoge. Purebhatta…pe… pacchimayāmesu paccavekkhitabbanti sambandho. Tathā asakkontena yathāvuttakālavisesavasena ekasmiṃ divase catukkhattuṃ tikkhattuṃ dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃyeva vā paccavekkhitabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sacassa^eb^^a^M2.0419^ea^^b^apaccavekkhatova aruṇo uggacchati, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘hiyyo yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhuttaṃ, taṃ yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya…pe… hirikopīnappaṭicchādanatthaṃ, hiyyo yo mayā piṇḍapāto paribhutto, so neva davāyātiādinā sace atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇaṃ na kareyya, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatī’’ti vadanti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. ^b^Senāsanampi paribhoge paribhoge^eb^ti pavese pavese. Evaṃ pana asakkontena purebhattādīsu paccavekkhitabbaṃ. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sakkā viññātunti idha visuṃ na vuttaṃ. ^b^Satipaccayatā^eb^ti satiyā paccayabhāvo, paṭiggahaṇassa paribhogassa ca paccavekkhaṇasatiyā paccayabhāvo yujjati, paccavekkhitvāva paṭiggahetabbaṃ paribhuñjitabbañcāti attho. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘satiṃ katvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Evaṃ santepī^eb^ti yadipi dvīsupi ṭhānesu paccavekkhaṇā yuttā, evaṃ santepi. Apare panāhu ‘‘satipaccayatāti satibhesajjaparibhogassa paccayabhāve paccayeti attho. Evaṃ santepīti paccaye satipī’’ti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. Tathā hi paccayasannissitasīlaṃ paccavekkhaṇāya visujjhati, na paccayasabbhāvamattena.

[03]Nanu ca ‘‘paribhoge karontassa anāpattī’’ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā ^a^V2.0371^ea^ paccayasannissitasīlassa pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassa ca ko visesoti? Vuccate – purimesu tāva tīsu paccayesu viseso pākaṭoyeva, gilānapaccaye pana yathā vatiṃ katvā rukkhamūle gopite tassa phalānipi rakkhitāniyeva honti, evameva paccavekkhaṇāya paccayasannissitasīle rakkhite tappaṭibaddhaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlampi nipphannaṃ nāma hoti. Gilānapaccayaṃ apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantassa sīlaṃ bhijjamānaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlameva bhijjati, paccayasannissitasīlaṃ pana pacchābhattapurimayāmādīsu yāva aruṇuggamanā apaccavekkhantasseva bhijjati. Purebhattañhi apaccavekkhitvāpi gilānapaccayaṃ paribhuñjantassa anāpatti, idametesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ.

[03]Evaṃ paccayasannissitasīlassa visuddhiṃ dassetvā teneva pasaṅgena sabbāpi suddhiyo dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘catubbidhā hi suddhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha sujjhati etāyāti suddhi, yathādhammaṃ desanāva suddhi ^b^desanāsuddhi^eb^. Vuṭṭhānassapi cettha desanāya eva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Chinnamūlāpattīnaṃ pana abhikkhutāpaṭiññāva desanā. Adhiṭṭhānavisiṭṭho saṃvarova suddhi ^b^saṃvarasuddhi^eb^. Dhammena samena ^a^M2.0420^ea^ paccayānaṃ pariyeṭṭhi eva suddhi ^b^pariyeṭṭhisuddhi^eb^. Catūsu paccayesu vuttavidhinā paccavekkhaṇāva suddhi ^b^paccavekkhaṇasuddhi^eb^. Esa tāva suddhīsu samāsanayo. Suddhimantesu sīlesu desanā suddhi etassāti ^b^desanāsuddhi^eb^. Sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Na puna evaṃ karissāmī^eb^ti ettha ^b^eva^eb^nti saṃvarabhedaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Pahāyā^eb^ti vajjetvā, akatvāti attho. Dātabbaṭṭhena dāyaṃ, taṃ ādiyantīti ^b^dāyādā,^eb^ ananuññātesu sabbena sabbaṃ paribhogābhāvato anuññātesuyeva ca paribhogasabbhāvabhāvato bhikkhūhi paribhuñjitabbapaccayā bhagavato santakā. ^b^Dhammadāyādasuttañcettha sādhaka^eb^nti –
[08]‘‘Dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu anukampā, ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā’’’ti (ma. ni. 1.29) –
[07]Evaṃ pavattaṃ dhammadāyādasuttañca ettha etasmiṃ atthe sādhakaṃ.

[03]Avītarāgānaṃ taṇhāparavasatāya paccayaparibhoge sāmibhāvo natthi, tadabhāvena vītarāgānaṃ tattha sāmibhāvo yathāruci paribhogasabbhāvato. Tathā hi te paṭikūlampi appaṭikūlākārena appaṭikūlampi paṭikūlākārena tadubhayampi vajjetvā ajjhupekkhanākārena paccaye ^a^V2.0372^ea^ paribhuñjanti, dāyakānañca manorathaṃ paripūrenti. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjantī’’^eb^ti. Yo panāyaṃ sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo, so iṇaparibhogassa paccanīkattā āṇaṇyaparibhogo nāma hoti. Yathā hi iṇāyiko attano ruciyā icchitadesaṃ gantuṃ na labhati, evaṃ iṇaparibhogayutto lokato nissarituṃ na labhatīti tappaṭipakkhattā sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo āṇaṇyaparibhogoti vuccati, tasmā nippariyāyato catuparibhogavinimutto visuṃyevāyaṃ paribhogoti veditabbo. So idha visuṃ na vutto, dāyajjaparibhogeyeva vā saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti. Sīlavāpi hi imāya sikkhāya samannāgatattā sekkhotveva vuccati. ^b^Sabbesa^eb^nti ariyānaṃ puthujjanānañca.

[03]Kathaṃ ^a^M2.0421^ea^ puthujjanānaṃ ime paribhogā sambhavantīti? Upacāravasena. Yo hi puthujjanassapi sallekhappaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa paccayagedhaṃ pahāya tattha anupalittena cittena paribhogo, so sāmiparibhogo viya hoti. Sīlavato pana paccavekkhitaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo viya hoti dāyakānaṃ manorathassa avirādhanato. Teneva vuttaṃ ‘‘dāyajjaparibhogeyeva vā saṅgahaṃ gacchatī’’ti. Kalyāṇaputhujjanassa paribhoge vattabbameva natthi tassa sekkhasaṅgahato. Sekkhasuttañhetassa atthassa sādhakaṃ.

[03]^b^Lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo^eb^ nāma lajjissa santakaṃ gahetvā paribhogo. ^b^Alajjinā saddhi^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthī^eb^ti iminā diṭṭhadiṭṭhesuyeva āsaṅkā na kātabbāti dasseti. ^b^Attano bhārabhūtā^eb^ saddhivihārikādayo. ^b^Sopi nivāretabbo^eb^ti yo passati, tena nivāretabbo. Yasmā alajjīparibhogo nāma lajjino vuccati, tasmā āpatti nāma natthi ubhinnampi alajjībhāvato, ‘‘alajjīparibhogo’’ti idaṃ nāmamattameva na labbhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. ‘‘Āpatti pana atthiyevāti vadantī’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Adhammiyo^eb^ti anesanādīhi uppanno. ^b^Dhammiyo^eb^ti bhikkhācariyādīhi uppanno. ^b^Saṅghasseva detī^eb^ti bhattaṃ aggahetvā attanā laddhasalākaṃyeva deti. ^b^Sace pana lajjī alajjiṃ paggaṇhāti…pe… antaradhāpetī^eb^ti ettha kevalaṃ paggaṇhitukāmatāya evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, dhammassa pana sāsanassa sotūnañca anuggahatthāya vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Purimanayena ‘‘so āpattiyā kāretabbo’’ti vuttattā imassa āpattiyevāti vadanti. Uddesaggahaṇādinā dhammassa paribhogo ^b^dhammaparibhogo^eb^. Dhammānuggahena gaṇhantassa āpattiyā abhāvepi thero tassa alajjibhāvaṃyeva ^a^V2.0373^ea^ sandhāya ^b^‘‘pāpo kirāya’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Tassa pana santike^eb^ti mahārakkhitattherassa santike.

[03]^b^586^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rājorodhādayo^eb^tiādi ‘‘idaṃ gaṇhissāmī’’ti cetanāmattasambhavato vuttaṃ. ^b^Assatiyā dinna^eb^nti ettha assatiyā dinnaṃ nāma apariccattaṃ hoti, tasmā dasante baddhakahāpaṇādi assatiyā dinnaṃ bhikkhunā ^a^M2.0422^ea^ vatthasaññāya paṭiggahitañca, tato neva rūpiyaṃ dinnaṃ, nāpi paṭiggahitañca hotīti ettha āpattidesanākiccaṃ natthi, taṃ pana dāyakānameva paṭidātabbaṃ. Tena akappiyavatthunā te ce dāyakā sappiādīni kiṇitvāna saṅghassa tassa ca bhikkhuno denti, sabbesaṃ kappati dāyakānaṃyeva santakattā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana puññakāmehi pariccajitvā dinnameva sandhāya ‘‘puññakāmā…pe… rūpiye arūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhātīti veditabbo’’ti vuttaṃ, tasmā pariccajitvā dinnaṃ vatthasaññāya gaṇhatopi nissaggiyameva. Tena yadi te dāyakā no āgantvā gaṇhanti, dāyake pucchitvā attano atthāya ce pariccattaṃ, saṅghe nissajjitvā āpatti desetabbā. ^b^Tava coḷakaṃ passāhī^eb^hi iminā gihisantakepi ‘‘idaṃ gaṇhathā’’tiādiakappiyavohārena vidhānaṃ bhikkhuno na kappatīti dīpeti. ^b^Ekaparicchedānī^eb^ti kiriyākiriyabhāvato ekaparicchedāni. Jātarūparajatabhāvo, attuddesikatā, kahāpaṇādīsu aññatarabhāvoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Rūpiyasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^587^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpade jātarūpādicatubbidhampi nissaggiyavatthu idha rūpiyaggahaṇeneva gahitanti āha ^b^‘‘jātarūparajataparivattana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Paṭiggahitaparivattane^eb^ti sāditarūpiyassa parivattane, asādiyitvā vā kappiyena gāhena paṭiggahitarūpiyaparivattane.

[03]^b^589^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ga^eb^-kārassa ^b^ka^eb^-kāraṃ katvā ‘‘sīsūpaka’’nti likhitaṃ, padabhājane ^b^ghanakata^eb^nti piṇḍaṃ kataṃ. ^b^Satthuvaṇṇo^eb^tiādīsu ‘‘satthuvaṇṇo ca kahāpaṇo ca…pe… ye ca vohāraṃ gacchantī’’ti evaṃ sabbattha samuccayo veditabbo. ^b^Rūpiye rūpiyasaññī^eb^ti sakasantakaṃ vadati. ^b^Rūpiyaṃ cetāpetī^eb^ti parasantakaṃ vadati. ^b^‘‘Nissaggiyavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuṃ vā kappiyavatthuṃ vā cetāpentassapi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ. Na ^a^M2.0423^ea^ hi ‘‘rūpiye rūpiyasaññī arūpiyaṃ cetāpeti ^a^V2.0374^ea^, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya’’ntiādittiko pāḷiyaṃ vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘yo hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tassānulomattā^eb^ti etthāyamadhippāyo – rūpiyasaṃvohāro nāma na kevalaṃ rūpiyena rūpiyaparivattanameva, atha kho ‘‘arūpiye rūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ cetāpetī’’ti vuttattā arūpiyena rūpiyacetāpanampi rūpiyasaṃvohāro nāma hotīti etasmiṃ pakkhepi rūpiye sati rūpiyasaṃvohāroyeva hotīti ayamattho avuttopi viññāyatīti. ^b^Arūpiyaṃ^eb^ nāma dukkaṭavatthukappiyavatthūni. ^b^Ekantena rūpiyapakkhe^eb^ti ekena antena rūpiyapakkheti ayaṃ attho gahetabbo. ‘‘Ekato rūpiyapakkhe’’ti vā pāṭho veditabbo. ‘‘Ekarūpiyapakkhe’’tipi paṭhanti, tatthāpi ekato rūpiyapakkheti ayamevattho gahetabbo.

[03]Kappiyavatthunā kappiyavatthuno kayavikkayepi tāva nissaggiyaṃ hoti, dukkaṭavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuno kayavikkaye kasmā na hotīti ^b^andhakaṭṭhakathāya^eb^ adhippāyo. Idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ…pe… arūpiyena ca rūpiyacetāpanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti sambandho. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpade. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti kayavikkayasikkhāpade. ^b^Tenevā^eb^ti kappiyavatthunāyeva.

[03]Puna kappiyabhāvaṃ netuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā ^b^‘‘mahāakappiyo nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātu^eb^nti idaṃ pañcannaṃyeva sahadhammikānaṃ antare parivattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, gihīhi pana gahetvā attano santakaṃ katvā dinnaṃ sabbesaṃ kappatī’’ti vadanti. ‘‘Na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātu’’nti pana imināva paṭiggahitarūpiyaṃ anissajjitvāva tena cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍampi saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.

[03]Ye pana ‘‘paṭiggahitarūpiyaṃ anissajjitvāpi tena parivattitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti, tesaṃ ‘‘na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātu’’nti idaṃ na yujjati. Te panettha evaṃ vadanti ‘‘yasmā nissajjitabbavatthuṃ anissajjitvāva uparūpari aññaṃ aññaṃyeva kataṃ, tasmā paricchedābhāvato idha nissajjituṃ avatvā ‘na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātu’nti vuttaṃ, paricchedābhāvatoyeva ‘mūle mūlasāmikānaṃ ^a^M2.0424^ea^, patte ca pattasāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hotī’ti ca na vutta’’nti. Yadi paṭiggahitarūpiyaṃ anissajjitvā cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍampi saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, evaṃ sante idhāpi avasānavatthuṃ gahetvā saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ kasmā na vaṭṭati, ‘‘yo pana rūpiyaṃ uggaṇhitvā…pe… patte ca pattasāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hotī’’ti imināpi paṭiggahitarūpiyaṃ ^a^V2.0375^ea^ anissajjitvā cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍampi saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Yadi taṃ nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭeyya, ‘‘mūle mūlasāmikānaṃ, patte ca pattasāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hotī’’ti na vadeyya. Apare panettha evaṃ vadanti ‘‘yadi saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ hoti, rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa na vaṭṭati, tasmā tassapi yathā vaṭṭati, tathā dassanatthaṃ ‘mūle mūlasāmikāna’ntiādi vutta’’nti.

[03]^b^Dutiyapattasadisoyevā^eb^ti iminā pañcannampi sahadhammikānaṃ na kappatīti dasseti. Tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘mūlassa sampaṭicchitattā’’^eb^ti. Atha mūlassa sampaṭicchitattā rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa tāva akappiyo hotu, sesānaṃ pana kasmā na kappatīti maññamāno pucchati ^b^‘‘kasmā sesānaṃ na kappatī’’^eb^ti. Kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘mūlassa anissaṭṭhattā’’^eb^ti. Pattassa kappiyabhāvepi sampaṭicchitamūlassa nissajjitabbassa anissaṭṭhattā tena gahitapatto sesānampi na kappati. Yadi hi tena sampaṭicchitamūlaṃ saṅghamajjhe nissaṭṭhaṃ siyā, tena kappiyena kammena ārāmikādīhi gahetvā dinnapatto rūpiyapaṭiggāhakaṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ vaṭṭati. Apare pana ‘‘mūlaṃ sampaṭicchitvā gahitapattopi yadi saṅghassa nissaṭṭho, sesānaṃ kappatī’’ti vadanti. Evaṃ sante ‘‘mūlassa anissaṭṭhattā’’ti na vattabbaṃ, ‘‘saṅghassa anissaṭṭhattā’’ti evameva vattabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Dubbicāritattā^eb^ti iminā rūpiyasaṃvohāro anena katoti dasseti. ^b^Aññesaṃ pana vaṭṭatī^eb^ti yasmānena rūpiyasaṃvohāramattameva kataṃ, na mūlaṃ sampaṭicchitaṃ, tasmā vinayakammavasena saṅghassa nissaṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya aññesaṃ vaṭṭati. Imasmiṃyeva ca atthe pamāṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘mahāsumattherassa kirā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Apare pana ‘‘dubbicāritattāti iminā kevalaṃ gihisantakabhāvena ṭhite dubbicāritamattaṃ vuttaṃ, na rūpiyasaṃvohārāpajjanaṃ, tasmā rūpiyasaṃvohārābhāvato so patto nissajjituṃ na sakkāti tassa na kappati, anissaṭṭhopi aññesaṃ ^a^M2.0425^ea^ kappati. Anissaṭṭhasseva ca aññesaṃ kappiyabhāvadassanatthaṃ ‘mahāsumattherassa kirā’tiādivatthūni udāhaṭāni. ^b^Saṅghassa nissajjī^eb^ti idañca aññesaṃ kappiyattā kevalaṃ saṅghassa pariccattabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana vinayakammavasena saṅghassa nissaṭṭhabhāvaṃ. Imassa ca atthassa ^b^sappissa pūretvā^eb^ti idaṃ vacanaṃ sādhaka’’nti vadanti.

[03]^b^591^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇarūpiyasaṃvohāresu yena ekekameva kataṃ, tena tattha tattha vuttanayeneva nissajjitabbaṃ. Yena pana paṭiggahitarūpiyeneva saṃvohāro kato, tena kathaṃ nissajjitabbanti? Nayidaṃ dukkaraṃ, ‘‘ahaṃ, bhante, nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajji’’nti evameva ^a^V2.0376^ea^ nissajjitabbaṃ. ‘‘Imasmiṃ sikkhāpadepi ‘arūpiye rūpiyasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassā’tiādittikassa avasānapade anāpattiyā vuttattā kappiyavatthuvaseneva idaṃ tikaṃ vutta’’nti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘arūpiyaggahaṇena kappiyavatthudukkaṭavatthūnaṃ saṅgahoti purimapadadvayaṃ kappiyavatthudukkaṭavatthūnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, avasānapadameva kappiyavatthuvasena vutta’’nti vadanti, taṃ na yujjati anāpattimissite avasānattike saññānānattaṃ ṭhapetvā vatthunānattassa abhāvato. Dukkaṭavatthunā pana dukkaṭavatthuno cetāpanaṃ neva idha, na tattha pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti vacanamettha sādhakaṃ. Yaṃ attano dhanena parivattati, tassa vā dhanassa vā rūpiyabhāvo ceva, parivattanañcāti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
[06]Rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^593^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kayavikkayasikkhāpade pāḷiyaṃ ^b^jānāhī^eb^ti ettha upadhārehīti attho, suṭṭhu upadhāretvā gaṇha, idaṃ na manāpanti puna dātuṃ na sakkhissasīti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^594-595^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kaya^eb^nti parabhaṇḍassa gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Vikkaya^eb^nti attano bhaṇḍassa dānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘iminā imaṃ dehī’’^eb^tiādi. Yasmā kayitaṃ nāma parassa ^a^M2.0426^ea^ hatthato gahitaṃ vuccati, vikkītañca parassa hatthe dinnaṃ, tasmā ^b^‘‘kayitañca hoti parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ karontena, vikkītañca attano bhaṇḍaṃ parahatthagataṃ karontenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ parato ‘‘kayitañca hoti vikkayitañcā’’ti vatvā ‘‘attano bhaṇḍaṃ parahatthagataṃ parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagata’’nti kasmā vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘iminā imantiādivacanānurūpato panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti hi sakasantakaṃ vuttaṃ. Tadanurūpato pāḷiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ attano bhaṇḍaṃ dassitaṃ, na kayavikkayapadānurūpato. Tañhi viparītato parasantakaggahaṇaṃ purakkhatvā ṭhitaṃ.

[03]Kāmaṃ sesañātakepi ‘‘imaṃ dehī’’ti vadato viññatti na hoti, saddhādeyyavinipātanassapi pana abhāvaṃ dassetukāmo ^b^‘‘mātaraṃ pana pitaraṃ vā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Viññatti na hotī^eb^ti idaṃ visuṃ viññāpanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aññaṃ kiñci avatvā evaṃ vadanto aññātakaṃ viññāpeti nāmāti āha – ^b^‘‘aññātakaṃ ‘imaṃ dehī’ti vadato viññattī’’^eb^ti. ^a^V2.0377^ea^ Aññaṃ kiñci avatvā ‘‘imaṃ gaṇhāhī’’ti dinnaṃ aññātakassa dinnaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘saddhādeyyavinipātana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tisso āpattiyo^eb^ti aññātakaviññattisaddhādeyyavinipātanakayavikkayāpattisaṅkhātā tisso āpattiyo.

[03]^b^Imaṃ nāma karohīti vadati, vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ettha bhuttosi, idāni kasmā na karosīti vatthumpi vaṭṭati. ‘‘Nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya’’nti kiñcāpi satiyeva nissaggiyavatthumhi pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, asatipi pana tasmiṃ pācittiyanti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāpamāṇena gahetabbanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kiñcāpī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Paribhutte^eb^ti sappiādiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yaṃ attano dhanena parivatteti, yena ca parivatteti, tesaṃ kappiyavatthutā, asahadhammikatā, kayavikkayāpajjanañcāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Kayavikkayasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Niṭṭhito kosiyavaggo dutiyo.

[03]^b^598-602^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pattavaggassa ^a^M2.0427^ea^ paṭhame ^b^bhaṇḍa^eb^nti vikketabbabhaṇḍaṃ. Yasmā ^b^vaṇṇa^eb^saddo saṇṭhānajātirūpāyatanakāraṇapamāṇaguṇapasaṃsādīsu dissati. ‘‘Mahantaṃ sapparājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 1.142) hi saṇṭhānaṃ vuccati. ‘‘Brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇo, hīno añño vaṇṇo’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.402) jāti. ‘‘Paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.303) rūpāyatanaṃ.
[21]‘‘Na harāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ;
[22]Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhatthenoti vuccatī’’ti. (saṃ. ni. 1.234; jā. 1.6.116) –

[07]Ādīsu ^a^V2.0378^ea^ kāraṇaṃ. ‘‘Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā’’tiādīsu (pārā. 602) pamāṇaṃ. ‘‘Kadā saññuḷhā pana te gahapati ime samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.77) guṇo. ‘‘Vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 4.3) pasaṃsā. Tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tayo pattassa vaṇṇāti tīṇi pattassa pamāṇānī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Aḍḍhaterasapalā hotī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘māsānaṃ aḍḍhaterasapalāni gaṇhātī’’ti vadanti. ‘‘Magadhanāḷi nāma chapasatā nāḷī’’ti keci. ‘‘Aṭṭhapasatā’’ti apare. Tattha purimānaṃ matena tipasatāya nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo ekā magadhanāḷi hoti, pacchimānaṃ catupasatāya nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo ekā magadhanāḷi. ^b^Ācariyadhammapālattherena^eb^ pana ‘‘pakatiyā catumuṭṭhikaṃ kuḍuvaṃ, catukuḍuvaṃ nāḷikaṃ, tāya nāḷiyā soḷasa nāḷiyo doṇaṃ, taṃ pana magadhanāḷiyā dvādasa nāḷiyo hontī’’ti vuttaṃ, tasmā tena nayena ‘‘magadhanāḷi nāma pañca kuḍuvāni ekañca muṭṭhiṃ ekāya muṭṭhiyā tatiyañca bhāgaṃ gaṇhātī’’ti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sabbasambhārasaṅkhato^eb^ti jīrakādisabbasambhārehi saṅkhato. ^b^Ālopassa ālopassa anurūpa^eb^nti ettha ‘‘byañjanassa mattā nāma odanacatuttho bhāgo’’ti ^b^brahmāyusuttassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 2.387) vuttattā ālopassa catutthabhāgappamāṇaṃ byañjanaṃ ālopassa anurūpanti gahetabbaṃ. Idha pana sūpasseva odanacatutthabhāgappamāṇataṃ ^a^M2.0428^ea^ dassetvā etassa lakkhaṇe dassite itarassapi dassitameva hotīti byañjanassa tathā visesetvā pamāṇaṃ na dassitaṃ.

[03]Magadhanāḷiyā upaḍḍhappamāṇo idha patthoti āha ^b^‘‘patthodananti magadhanāḷiyā upaḍḍhanāḷikodana’’^eb^nti. Iminā ca ‘‘patthadvayaṃ magadhanāḷī’’ti dassitaṃ hoti. Pattho ca ‘‘catupalo kuḍuvo, catukuḍuvo pattho’’ti iminā lokiyavohārena veditabbo. ^b^Bhājanaparibhogenā^eb^ti udakāharaṇādinā bhājanaparibhogena.
[03]^b^607^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dhote^eb^ti paribhogāvasānadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana dhoteyeva dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati tato puretaraṃ paribhogakāleyeva āpajjanato.

[03]^b^608^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pañcahi dvīhī^eb^ti idaṃ ‘‘ettāvatā kāḷavaṇṇatā sampajjatī’’ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Yadi pana ekenapi pākena kāḷavaṇṇo hoti, adhiṭṭhānupagoyevā’’ti vadanti. Hatthānāgatassapi adhiṭṭhātabbabhāvadassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘yadihī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Iminā ca dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātuṃ ^a^V2.0379^ea^ vikappetuñca labhati, ṭhapitaṭṭhānasallakkhaṇañca na pamāṇanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Sutvā vā^eb^ti pattakārakena pesitabhikkhunā anāṇatto kevalaṃ tassa kathentassa vacanamattaṃ sutvā. ^b^Na pamāṇa^eb^nti tena apesitattā. ^b^Sāmantavihāre^eb^ti idaṃ upacāramattaṃ, tato dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. ^b^Ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā^eb^ti idampi upacāramattaṃ, pattasallakkhaṇamevettha pamāṇaṃ. ^b^Patte vā chiddaṃ hotī^eb^ti mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā dvaṅgulamattokāsato paṭṭhāya yattha katthaci chiddaṃ hoti. Sesamettha paṭhamakathine vuttanayameva.
[06]Pattasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^610^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyasikkhāpade ^b^hatthesu piṇḍāya caratī^eb^ti pāḷipadassa hatthesu labhitabbapiṇḍatthāya caratīti attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^612-613^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Tassa^eb^^a^M2.0429^ea^^b^so apatto^eb^ti vacanato so patto adhiṭṭhānampi vijahati apattattā. Apattabhāvatoyeva hi ‘pañcabandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpetī’ti pāḷiyaṃ na vutta’’nti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘apattoti idaṃ ‘aññaṃ pattaṃ viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, so pana patto adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatī’’ti vadanti, taṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati ‘‘yassa pañca ekāyeva vā dasaṅgulā, so baddhopi abaddhopi apattoyevā’’ti vakkhamānattā. Na hi mukhavaṭṭiyā pañcasu ṭhānesu dvaṅgulamattāhi rājīhi adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti sakkā vattuṃ, ekāya pana rājiyā dasaṅgulāya sace tattha vuttappamāṇo chiddo paññāyati, chiddeneva adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ siyāti yuttaṃ vattuṃ. Bandhanokāse sati asati vā bandhanavirahito patto ^b^abandhano^eb^ti vutto, bandhanokāsavirahitoyeva pana ^b^abandhanokāso^eb^ti vutto.

[03]^b^Tipusuttakena vā bandhitvā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘bandhitabbo’’ti pāṭho gahetabbo. Purāṇapotthakepi hi ayameva pāṭho dissati. ^b^Suddhehi…pe… na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti idaṃ uṇhabhojane pakkhitte vilīyamānattā vuttaṃ. ^b^Phāṇitaṃ jhāpetvā pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhituṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti pāsāṇacuṇṇena saddhiṃ phāṇitaṃ pacitvā tathāpakkena pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^615^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anukampāya na gaṇhantassa dukkaṭa^eb^nti vuttattā yassa so patto na ruccati, tassapi ^a^V2.0380^ea^ agaṇhantassa anāpatti. Teneva ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. ūnapañcabandhanasīkkhāpadavaṇṇanā) vuttaṃ ‘‘sace therassa patto na ruccati, appicchatāya vā na gaṇhāti, vaṭṭatī’’ti. ^b^Pattapariyanto^eb^ti pariyantapatto, avasānapattoti attho. ‘‘Saṅghamajjhe pattaṃ gāhāpentena alajjiṃ agāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti. ‘‘Anujānāmi bhikkhave ādhārakanti vuttattā pīṭhādīsu yattha katthaci ādhāraṃ ṭhapetvā tattha pattaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati ādhāraṭhapanokāsassa aniyamitattā’’ti vadanti. ^b^Aparibhogenā^eb^ti ayuttaparibhogena.

[03]^b^616^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘abandhanena pattena abandhanaṃ pattaṃ. Ekabandhanaṃ pattaṃ… dvibandhanaṃ pattaṃ… tibandhanaṃ… catubandhanaṃ… abandhanokāsaṃ… eka… dvi… ti… catubandhanokāsaṃ pattaṃ cetāpetī’’ti evaṃ ekekena pattena dasadhā dasavidhaṃ pattaṃ cetāpanavasena ^a^M2.0430^ea^ ekanissaggiyapācittiyasataṃ vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade pamāṇayuttaṃ aggahitakāḷavaṇṇampi pattaṃ viññāpentassa āpattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānupagapattassa ūnapañcabandhanatā, attuddesikatā, akataviññatti, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Ūnapañcabandhanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^622^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyasikkhāpade ^b^yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatī^eb^ti idaṃ nissaggiyavatthudassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana yesaṃ maṃsaṃ na kappati, tesaṃ sappiādīni na kappantīti dassanatthaṃ. Manussakhīrādīnipi hi no na kappanti, kuto sasassa sappīti āha ^b^‘‘yesañhi khīraṃ atthi, sappipi tesaṃ atthiyevā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Idañca yebhuyyena vutta’’nti vadanti. ^b^Uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhitta^eb^nti appaṭiggahitaṃ sayameva gahetvā nikkhittaṃ. ^b^Sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭatī^eb^ti tadahupurebhattameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Atha sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisaṃ bhuñjantassa kasmā sāmaṃpāko na hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘navanītaṃ tāpentassa hi sāmaṃpāko na hotī’’^eb^ti. Savatthukapaṭiggahitassa vatthugatikattā āha – ^b^‘‘savatthukassa paṭiggahitattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitehī^eb^ti pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitakhīradadhīhi. Purebhattampi ca uggahitakehi kataṃ abbhañjanādīsu upanetabbanti sambandho. ^b^Ubhayesampī^eb^ti pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitakhīradadhīhi ca purebhattaṃ uggahitakehi ca katānaṃ. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti nissaggiyaṃ hotīti attho. ^b^Akappiyamaṃsasappimhī^eb^ti akappiyamaṃsasattānaṃ ^a^V2.0381^ea^ sappimhi. ^b^Kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvā^eb^ti sajātiyānaṃ sappibhāvatoti kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvā.

[03]^b^Sappinayeneva veditabba^eb^nti nirāmisameva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti attho. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti navanīte. ^b^Dhotaṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti adhotaṃ ce, savatthukapaṭiggahitaṃ hoti, tasmā dhotaṃ paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti therānaṃ adhippāyo. ^b^Takkato uddhaṭamattameva khādiṃsū^eb^ti ettha takkato uddhaṭamattaṃ adhotampi paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantā dhovitvā pacitvā ^a^M2.0431^ea^ vā paribhuñjiṃsūti evamattho gahetabbo. Therassa hi dadhiguḷikādisahitampi paṭiggahitaṃ pacchā dhovitvā pacitvā vā paribhuñjantassa savatthukapaṭiggahaṇe doso natthīti adhippāyo, teneva therassa adhippāyaṃ dassentena ^b^‘‘tasmā navanītaṃ paribhuñjantena…pe… ayamettha adhippāyo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘takkato uddhaṭamattameva khādiṃsū’’ti vacanassa adhippāyaṃ ajānantā ‘‘takkato uddhaṭamattaṃ adhotampi dadhiguḷikādisahitaṃ vikālepi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi dadhiguḷikādiāmisena saṃsaṭṭharasaṃ navanītaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti sakkā vattuṃ. ^b^Navanītaṃ paribhuñjantenā^eb^ti adhovitvā paṭiggahitanavanītaṃ paribhuñjantena. Dadhi eva ^b^dadhigataṃ^eb^ yathā ‘‘gūthagataṃ muttagata’’nti (ma. ni. 2.119). ^b^Khayaṃ gamissatī^eb^ti vacanato khīraṃ pakkhipitvā pakkasappiādipi vikāle kappatīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Kukkuccāyanti kukkuccakā^eb^ti iminā attanāpi tattha kukkuccasabbhāvaṃ dīpeti. Teneva ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. bhesajjasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) ‘‘nibbaṭṭitasappi vā navanītaṃ vā pacituṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tāni paṭiggahetvā^eb^ti tāni khīradadhīni paṭiggahetvā.

[03]^b^Paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitabhesajjehī^eb^ti paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitayāvajīvikabhesajjehi. Vuttanayena yathā taṇḍulādīni na paccanti, tathā lajjīyeva sampādetvā detīti lajjīsāmaṇeraggahaṇaṃ, apica alajjinā ajjhoharitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci abhisaṅkharāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmāpi evamāha. ^b^Tile paṭiggahetvā katatela^eb^nti attanā bhajjanādīni akatvā gahitatelaṃ. Teneva ^b^‘‘sāmisampi vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Nibbaṭṭitattā^eb^ti yāvakālikavatthuto vivecitattā. ^b^Ubhayampī^eb^ti attanā ca parena ca kataṃ. ^b^Yāva aruṇassa uggamanā tiṭṭhati, nissaggiya^eb^nti sattamadivase katatelaṃ sace yāva aruṇuggamanā tiṭṭhati, nissaggiyaṃ.

[03]^b^623^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Acchavasa^eb^nti dukkaṭavatthuno vasāya anuññātattā taṃsadisānaṃ dukkaṭavatthūnaṃyeva akappiyamaṃsasattānaṃ vasā anuññātā, na thullaccayavatthūnaṃ manussānaṃ vasāti āha ^b^‘‘ṭhapetvā manussavasa’’^eb^nti ^a^V2.0382^ea^. ^b^Saṃsaṭṭha^eb^nti parissāvitaṃ. ‘‘Kāle paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle anupasampannenapi nippakkaṃ saṃsaṭṭhañca paribhuñjantassa dvepi dukkaṭāni hontiyevā’’ti vadanti. Yasmā khīradadhiādīni pakkhipitvā telaṃ pacanti, tasmā kasaṭaṃ na vaṭṭati, telameva ^a^M2.0432^ea^ vaṭṭati. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pakkatelakasaṭe viya kukkuccāyatī’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Sace vasāya saddhiṃ pakkattā na vaṭṭati, idaṃ kasmā vaṭṭatī’’ti pucchantā ^b^‘‘bhante’’^eb^tiādimāhaṃsu. ^b^Etaṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti nanu etaṃ dadhiguḷikādīhi pakkaṃ navanītaṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.

[03]^b^‘‘Madhukarīhi nāma madhumakkhikāhī^eb^ti ayaṃ khuddakamakkhikānaṃ bhamaramakkhikānañca sāmaññaniddeso’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘daṇḍakesu madhukarā madhukarī makkhikā nāmā’’ti vatvā ‘‘tāhi madhukarīādīhi tīhi makkhikāhi kataṃ madhu nāmā’’ti vadanti. ^b^Bhamaramakkhikāhī^eb^ti mahābhamaramakkhikāhi. ^b^Silesasadisa^eb^nti ghanapakkaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Itara^eb^nti tanukamadhu. ^b^Madhupaṭala^eb^nti madhurahitaṃ kevalaṃ madhupaṭalaṃ. ‘‘Sace madhusahitaṃ paṭalaṃ paṭiggahetvā nikkhipanti, paṭalassa bhājanaṭṭhāniyattā madhuno vasena sattāhātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hotī’’ti vadanti, ‘‘madhumakkhitaṃ pana madhugatikamevā’’ti iminā taṃ na sameti.
