[03]‘‘Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbatta’’nti pāḷiyaṃ avisesena vuttattā aṭṭhakathāyañca ‘‘ucchurasaṃ upādāya…pe… avatthukā ucchuvikati ‘phāṇita’nti veditabbā’’ti vacanato ucchurasopi nikkasaṭo sattāhakālikoti veditabbo. ^b^Kenaci^eb^ pana ‘‘madhumhi cattāro kālikā yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbā, ucchumhi cā’’ti vatvā ‘‘samakkhikaṇḍaseḷakaṃ yāvakālikaṃ, aneḷakaṃ udakasambhinnaṃ yāmakālikaṃ, asambhinnaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ, madhusitthaṃ parisuddhaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ, tathā ucchu vā raso vā sakasaṭo yāvakāliko, nikkasaṭo udakasambhinno yāmakāliko, asambhinno sattāhakāliko, suddhakasaṭaṃ yāvajīvika’’nti ca vatvā uttaripi bahudhā papañcitaṃ. Tattha ‘‘udakasambhinnaṃ madhu vā ucchuraso vā udakasambhinno yāmakāliko’’ti idaṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dissati. ‘‘Yāvakālikaṃ samānaṃ garutarampi muddikājātirasaṃ attanā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ lahukaṃ yāmakālikabhāvaṃ upanentaṃ udakaṃ lahutaraṃ sattāhakālikaṃ attanā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ garutaraṃ yāmakālikabhāvaṃ upanetī’’ti ettha kāraṇaṃ soyeva pucchitabbo, sabbattha pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca udakasambhedena garutarassapi lahubhāvopagamanaṃyeva dassitaṃ. Pāḷiyampi hi ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānassa guḷaṃ, agilānassa guḷodaka’’nti (mahāva. 284) vadantena ^a^M2.0433^ea^ agilānena paribhuñjituṃ ayuttopi guḷo udakasambhinno agilānassapi vaṭṭatīti anuññāto.

[03]Yampi ^a^V2.0383^ea^ ca ‘‘ucchu ce yāvakāliko, ucchuraso ce yāmakāliko, phāṇitaṃ ce sattāhakālikaṃ, taco ce yāvajīviko’’ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā ‘‘ucchuraso udakasambhinno yāmakāliko’’ti aññena ^b^kenaci^eb^ vuttaṃ, tampi tathāvidhassa aṭṭhakathāvacanassa imissā samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya abhāvato na sārato paccetabbaṃ. Tatoyeva ca ‘‘ucchuraso udakena sambhinnopi asambhinnopi sattāhakālikoyevā’’ti keci ācariyā vadanti. ^b^Bhesajjakkhandhake^eb^ ca ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ucchurasa’’nti (mahāva. 300) ettha tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ avisesena vuttaṃ ‘‘ucchuraso sattāhakāliko’’ti.

[03]^b^Sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ettha aparissāvitaṃ paṭiggahitampi karaṇasamaye parissāvetvā kasaṭaṃ apanetvāva attanā katanti gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Jhāmaucchuphāṇita^eb^nti agginā daḍḍhe ucchukhette jhāmaucchunā kataphāṇitaṃ. ^b^Koṭṭitaucchuphāṇita^eb^nti khuddānukhuddakaṃ chinditvā koṭṭetvā nippīḷetvā pakkaṃ yebhuyyena ca sakasaṭaṃ phāṇitaṃ. Tādisassa ca kasaṭassa abbohārikattā ^b^‘‘taṃ yutta’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sītudakena kata^eb^nti madhukapupphāni sītodake pakkhipitvā madditvā puppharase udakagate sati taṃ udakaṃ gahetvā pacitvā kataphāṇitaṃ. ^b^Khīraṃ pakkhipitvā kataṃ madhukaphāṇitaṃ yāvakālika^eb^nti ettha khīraṃ pakkhipitvā pakkatelaṃ kasmā vikāle vaṭṭatīti ce? Tele pakkhittakhīraṃ telameva hoti, aññaṃ pana khīraṃ pakkhipitvā kataṃ khīrabhāvaṃ gaṇhātīti idamettha kāraṇaṃ. Yadi evaṃ khaṇḍasakkharampi khīraṃ pakkhipitvā karonti, taṃ kasmā vaṭṭatīti āha ^b^‘‘khaṇḍasakkharaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^khīrajallika^eb^nti khīrapheṇaṃ.

[03]Bhesajjodissaṃ dassentena ^b^‘‘sattavidhañhi odissaṃ nāmā’’^eb^tiādinā itarānipi atthuddhāravasena vuttāni. ^b^Vikaṭānī^eb^ti apakatibhesajjattā vikaṭāni, virūpānīti attho. Dukkaṭavatthūnampi akappiyamaṃsānaṃ vasāya anuññātattā ^b^‘‘vasodissa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Oḷārikānampi āhāratthaṃ pharituṃ samatthānaṃ sappiādīnaṃ bhesajjanāmena anuññātattā ^b^‘‘bhesajjodissa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0434^ea^. ^b^‘‘Pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sati paccaye^eb^ti vuttattā paṭiggahitabhesajjāni dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya purebhattampi sati paccaye paribhuñjitabbāni, na āhāratthaṃ bhesajjatthāya paṭiggahitattā’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^624^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dvāravātapānakavāṭesū^eb^ti mahādvārassa vātapānānañca kavāṭaphalakesu. Kasāve pakkhittāni tāni attano sabhāvaṃ pariccajanti, tasmā ^b^‘‘makkhetabbānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, ghuṇapāṇakādiparihāratthaṃ makkhetabbānīti attho. ^b^Adhiṭṭhetī^eb^ti ‘‘idāni mayhaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ na bhavissati ^a^V2.0384^ea^, bāhiraparibhogatthāya gamissatī’’ti cittaṃ uppādetīti attho. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘sappiñca telañca vasañca muddhani telaṃ vā abbhañjanaṃ vā’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Evaṃ adhiṭṭhitañca paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahatī’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^625^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sace dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ avibhattaṃ hoti, paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ettha majjhe pāṭho parihīno, evaṃ panettha pāṭho veditabbo ‘‘sace dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ avibhattaṃ hoti, sattāhātikkame dvinnampi anāpatti, paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatī’’ti. Aññathā pana saddappayogopi na saṅgacchati. ^b^Gaṇṭhipadepi^eb^ ca ayameva pāṭho dassito. Tattha ^b^dvinnampi anāpattī^eb^ti yathā aññassa santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhātikkamena nissaggiyaṃ na hoti parasantakabhāvato, evamidampi avibhattattā ubhayasādhāraṇampi avinibbhogabhāvato nissaggiyaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo. ^b^Paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti bhikkhunā paṭiggahitattā sattāhātikkame yassa kassaci bhikkhuno paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati paṭiggahitasappiādīnaṃ paribhogassa sattāheneva paricchinnattā. ‘‘Tāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbānī’’ti hi vuttaṃ. ^b^Gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ pana tīsupi idha pāṭhassa parihīnabhāvaṃ asallakkhetvā ‘‘paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ antosattāhe paribhogaṃ sandhāya vuttanti saññāya vissāsaggāhābhāvato paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī’’ti evamattho vutto, so na gahetabbo.

[03]^b^Āvuso, imaṃ telaṃ sattāhamattaṃ paribhuñja tva^eb^nti iminā yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tena antosattāheyeva parassa vissajjitabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Kassa āpattī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ tāva ubhinnaṃ sādhāraṇattā anāpatti vuttā. Idāni ^a^M2.0435^ea^ pana ekena itarassa vissaṭṭhabhāvato ubhayasādhāraṇatā natthīti vibhattasadisaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ, tasmā ettha paṭiggahitassa sattāhātikkame ekassa āpattiyā bhavitabbanti maññamāno ‘‘kiṃ paṭiggahaṇapaccayā paṭiggāhakassa āpatti, udāhu yassa santakaṃ jātaṃ, tassā’’ti pucchati. Nissaṭṭhabhāvatoyeva ca idha ‘‘avibhattabhāvato’’ti kāraṇaṃ avatvā ^b^‘‘yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tena vissajjitattā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Idañca vissaṭṭhabhāvato ubhayasādhāraṇataṃ pahāya ekassa santakaṃ hontampi yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tato aññassa santakaṃ jātaṃ, tasmā parasantakapaṭiggahaṇe viya paṭiggāhakassa paṭiggahaṇapaccayā natthi āpattīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana ‘‘yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tena vissajjitattā’’ti vacanato avissajjite sati avibhattepi sattāhātikkame āpattīti dassanatthaṃ avissajjite avibhattabhāvatoyeva anāpattiyā siddhattā. Sace pana itaro yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tasseva antosattāhe attano bhāgampi ^a^V2.0385^ea^ vissajjeti, sattāhātikkame siyā āpatti yena paṭiggahitaṃ, tasseva santakabhāvamāpannattā itarassa appaṭiggahitattā. Iminā tassa santakabhāvepi aññena paṭiggahitasakasantake viya tena appaṭiggahitabhāvato anāpattīti dīpeti. Idaṃ pana adhippāyaṃ ajānitvā ito aññathā ^b^gaṇṭhipadakārādīhi^eb^ papañcitaṃ, na taṃ sārato paccetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Aparibhogaṃ hotī^eb^ti kassaci amanuññassa patitattā paribhogārahaṃ na hoti. ^b^Yena cittenā^eb^ti yena pariccajitukāmatācittena. ‘‘Antosattāhe’’ti adhikārattā ‘‘antosattāhe anapekkho datvā paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjatī’’ti imaṃ sambandhaṃ sandhāya mahāsumattherena ^b^‘‘evaṃ antosattāhe datvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Mahāpadumatthero^eb^ pana yadi evaṃ ‘‘vissajjetī’’ti imināva taṃ siddhaṃ, sattāhātikkantaṃ pana nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmā tassa paribhogamukhadassanamidanti āha – ^b^‘‘nayidaṃ yācitabba’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Aññena bhikkhunā^eb^ti ettha suddhacittena dinnattā sayampi āharāpetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Sappiādīnaṃ paṭiggahitabhāvo, attano santakatā, sattāhātikkamoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Bhesajjasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^627^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^a^M2.0436^ea^^b^sibbanarajanakappapariyosānena niṭṭhāpetvā^eb^ti sūcikammaniṭṭhānena sakimpi vaṇṇabhedamattarajanena kappabindukaraṇena ca niṭṭhāpetvā. ^b^Samaye^eb^ti vassānasamaye.

[03]^b^628^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kucchisamayo^eb^ti antosamayo. ‘‘Ayameko aḍḍhamāso pariyesanakkhettañceva karaṇakkhettañca. Etasmiñhi antare vassikasāṭikaṃ aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ laddhaṃ kātuñca vaṭṭati, nivāsetuṃ adhiṭṭhātuñca na vaṭṭatī’’ti potthakesu pāṭho dissati, so apāṭho. Evaṃ panettha pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ ‘‘ayameko aḍḍhamāso pariyesanakkhettaṃ. Etasmiñhi antare vassikasāṭikaṃ aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭati, laddhaṃ kātuṃ nivāsetuṃ adhiṭṭhātuñca na vaṭṭatī’’ti. Na hi gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsassa paṭhamo aḍḍhamāso karaṇakkhettaṃ hoti. ‘‘Aḍḍhamāso seso gimhānanti katvā nivāsetabba’’nti vacanato pana gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsassa pacchimo aḍḍhamāso karaṇakkhettañceva nivāsanakkhettañca hoti. Teneva ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. vahisakasāṭikasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) ‘‘gimhānaṃ pacchimo māso pariyesanakkhettaṃ, pacchimo aḍḍhamāso ^a^V2.0386^ea^ karaṇanivāsanakkhettampī’’ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā pāḷiyā mātikāṭṭhakathāya ca avirodhaṃ icchantena vuttanayeneva pāṭho gahetabbo.

[03]^b^‘‘Viññattiṃ katvā nipphādentassa aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena anāpattī’’^eb^ti vadantena ‘‘piṭṭhisamayattā iminā sikkhāpadena āpattī’’ti dīpitā hoti. Na hi ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato piṭṭhisamaye satuppādakaraṇamattenapi sambhavantī āpatti tato garukatarāya viññattiyā na hotīti sakkā vattuṃ. Teneva ^b^bhadantabuddhadattācariyena^eb^ vuttaṃ –
[21]‘‘Katvā pana satuppādaṃ, vassikasāṭicīvaraṃ;
[22]Nipphādentassa bhikkhussa, samaye piṭṭhisammate.
[21]‘‘Hoti nissaggiyāpatti, ñātakāñātakādino;
[22]Tesuyeva ca viññattiṃ, katvā nipphādane tathā’’ti.

[03]^b^Kenassa^eb^^a^M2.0437^ea^^b^hoti āpattī^eb^ti assa mātaraṃ cīvaraṃ yācantassa kena sikkhāpadena āpattīti pucchati. ‘‘Pariṇataṃ viññāpentassa pariṇāmanasikkhāpadena āpattī’’ti codanābhāvaṃ dasseti ^b^no ca saṅghe pariṇata^eb^nti. Atha aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadenāti ce, etampi natthīti āha ^b^‘‘anāpatti ca ñātake’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Ñātake viññāpentassā’’ti pāṭhaseso. ^b^Imamatthaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti piṭṭhisamaye vassikasāṭikatthaṃ ñātakapavāritaṭṭhāne satuppādakaraṇena āpattiṃ, aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena anāpattiñca sandhāya.

[03]^b^Aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhānato…pe… dukkaṭa^eb^nti idaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ adinnapubbe sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenevettha vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, dinnapubbesu pana vattabhedo natthi. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘ye manussā…pe… vattabhedo natthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ida^eb^nti yathāvuttanissaggiyapācittiyaṃ. ^b^Viññattiṃ katvā nipphādentassā^eb^ti aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhānato viññattiṃ katvā nipphādentassa. ^b^Pakatiyā vassikasāṭikadāyakā^eb^ nāma saṅghavasena vā puggalavasena vā apavāretvā anusaṃvaccharaṃ vassikasāṭikānaṃ dāyakā. ^b^Aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena anāpattī^eb^ti ettha imināpi sikkhāpadena anāpattīti veditabbaṃ. Kucchisamaye hi attano ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato ‘‘detha me vassikasāṭika’’ntiādinā viññāpentassapi anāpatti. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘na vattabbā detha meti idañhi pariyesanakāle aññātakaappavārite eva sandhāya vutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Mātikāṭṭhakathāyañhi^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. vassikasāṭikasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) vuttaṃ ^a^V2.0387^ea^ ‘‘attano ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato pana ‘detha me vassikasāṭikacīvara’ntiādikāya viññattiyāpi pariyesitabba’’nti.
[03]^b^629^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Ākāsato patitaudakenevā^eb^ti vacanato chadanakoṭiyā patitaudakena nahāyantassa anāpattī’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^630^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cha māse parihāraṃ labhatī^eb^ti etena antovassepi yāva vassānassa pacchimadivasā akatā parihāraṃ labhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti. Yasmā mūlacīvaraṃ karontena hemantassa pacchimuposathadivaseyeva kātabbaṃ, tasmā gimhānato ekūnatiṃsadivase parihāraṃ labhati, evaṃ santepi ^a^M2.0438^ea^ appakaṃ ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti katvā ^b^‘‘tato parampi…pe… ekamāsa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ekāhadvīhādivasena…pe… laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā^eb^ti iminā ekāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca, dvīhānāgatāya…pe… dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca, antovasse vā laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cāti ayamattho dassito. Tattha āsāḷhimāsassa juṇhapakkhapuṇṇamiyaṃ laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca vassikasāṭikā ‘‘ekāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā’’ti vuccati. Eteneva nayena juṇhapakkhassa chaṭṭhiyaṃ laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca ‘‘dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā’’ti vuccati. Yāva paṭhamakattikatemāsapuṇṇamī, tāva antotemāse laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca ‘‘antovasse laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā’’ti vuccati. Paṭhamakattikatemāsapuṇṇamito parañhi laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca yāva cīvarakālo nātikkamati, tāva anadhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti na tatrāyaṃ vicāraṇā sambhavati.

[03]^b^Tasmiṃyeva antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabbā^eb^ti avisesena vuttepi vassānato pubbe ekāhadvīhādivasena anāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā tehi divasehi saddhiṃ dasāhaṃ anatikkamantena vassūpanāyikadivasato paṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhānakkhettaṃ sampattāyeva adhiṭṭhātabbā, na tato pubbe adhiṭṭhānassa akhettattā. Antovasse pana laddhā tasmiṃyeva antovasse laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ anatikkāmetvā adhiṭṭhātabbā.

[03]Nanu ca vassānato pubbe anadhiṭṭhahitvā dasāhaṃ atikkāmetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva, tasmā adhiṭṭhānassa akhettabhūtepi divase gahetvā ‘‘antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabba’’nti kasmā vuttaṃ? Yathā ‘‘antovasse laddhāpi yāva na niṭṭhāti, tāva anadhiṭṭhahitvā dasāhaṃ atikkāmetuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti akatāya ^a^V2.0388^ea^ anadhiṭṭhānakkhettasadisāpi atikkantadivasā dasāhaṃ atikkāmetvā niṭṭhitāya gaṇanūpagā hontīti niṭṭhitadivaseyeva adhiṭṭhātabbā, evamidhāpi vassānato pubbe anadhiṭṭhānakkhettabhūtāpi divasā laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya gaṇanūpagā hontīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘tasmiṃyeva antodasāhe’’ti avisesena vuttattā dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya ^a^M2.0439^ea^ chaṭṭhiyaṃ laddhā puṇṇamiyaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbāti āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati ‘‘cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātu’’nti vacaneneva paṭikkhittattā. Evaṃ sante ‘‘dasāhānāgatāyā’’ti iminā kiṃ payojananti ce? Vassānato pubbeyeva dasāhe atikkante vassūpanāyikadivase niṭṭhitā tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabbāti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti idamettha payojanaṃ. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘dasāhātikkame niṭṭhitā tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabbā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Dasāhe appahonte cīvarakālaṃ nātikkametabbā^eb^ti temāsabbhantare dasāhe appahonte laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca cīvarakālaṃ nātikkametabbāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ‘‘paṭhamakattikatemāsapuṇṇamito pubbe sattamito paṭṭhāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca vassikasāṭikā dasāhe anatikkanteyeva cīvarakālaṃ otiṇṇattā tattha anadhiṭṭhahitvāpi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti. Iminā ca imaṃ dīpeti – akatā ce vassikasāṭikā, vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ akatattāyeva parihāraṃ labhati, katāya pana dasāhaparamasikkhāpadaṃ avikopetvā parihāro vattabboti.

[03]^b^Yadā vā tadā vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti cātumāsabbhantare dasāhe atikkantepi natthi dosoti adhippāyo. ‘‘Kadā adhiṭṭhātabbā…pe… yadi nappahoti, yāva kattikapuṇṇamā parihāraṃ labhatī’’ti imināpi ^b^kurundivacanena^eb^ akatāya vassikasāṭikāya cātumāsaṃ parihāro, katāya dasāhameva parihāroti ayamattho dīpitoyevāti āha ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Pāḷiyaṃ ^b^acchinnacīvarassa naṭṭhacīvarassā^eb^tiādinā nissaggiyena anāpatti vuttā, udāhu naggassa nahāyato dukkaṭena anāpatti vuttāti? Kimettha pucchitabbaṃ. Sabbasikkhāpadesu hi yattha yattha mūlasikkhāpadena āpattippasaṅgo, tattha tattha anāpattidassanatthaṃ anāpattivāro ārabhīyatīti idhāpi nissaggiyena anāpattidassanatthanti yuttaṃ vattuṃ. Na hi mūlāpattiyā anāpattiṃ adassetvā antarā vuttāya eva āpattiyā anāpattidassanatthaṃ anāpattivāro ārabhīyatīti. Teneva tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ idaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘acchinnacīvarassa naṭṭhacīvarassa cāti ettha acchinnasesacīvarassa naṭṭhasesacīvarassa ca asamaye nivāsentassa pariyesantassa ca anāpatti ^a^V2.0389^ea^. Āpadāsūti ettha anivatthaṃ corā ^a^M2.0440^ea^ harantīti asamaye nivāsentassa anāpattī’’ti. ^b^Mātikāṭṭhakathāya^eb^mpi (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. vassikasāṭikasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) vuttaṃ ‘‘acchinnacīvarassa vā naṭṭhacīvarassa vā anivatthaṃ corā harantīti evaṃ āpadāsu vā nivāsayato ummattakādīnañca anāpattī’’ti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana naggassa nahāyato dukkaṭeneva anāpattiṃ sandhāya ‘‘acchinnacīvarassāti etaṃ vassikasāṭikameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tesañhi naggānaṃ kāyovassāpane anāpatti. Ettha ca mahagghavassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsetvā nahāyantassa corupaddavo āpadā nāmā’’ti yaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha kāraṇaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ.

[03]Atha ubhayenapi anāpattidassanatthaṃ ‘‘acchinnacīvarassā’’tiādi āraddhanti evamadhippāyo siyā, evampi ‘‘acchinnacīvarassāti etaṃ vassikasāṭikameva sandhāya vutta’’ntiādinā visesetvā na vattabbaṃ. Evañhi vattabbaṃ siyā ‘‘acchinnasesacīvarassa naṭṭhasesacīvarassa vā asamaye nivāsentassa pariyesantassa ca nissaggiyena anāpatti, acchinnavassikasāṭikassa naṭṭhavassikasāṭikassa vā naggassa nahāyato dukkaṭena anāpatti, āpadāsu anivatthaṃ corā harantīti asamaye nivāsayato nissaggiyena anāpatti, mahagghavassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsetvā nahāyantassa corā haranti, naggassa nahāyato dukkaṭena anāpattī’’ti. Sesamettha uttānameva.

[03]Aṅgesu pana vassikasāṭikāya attuddesikatā, asamaye pariyesanatā, tāya ca paṭilābhoti imāni tāva pariyesanāpattiyā tīṇi aṅgāni. Sacīvaratā, āpadābhāvo, vassikasāṭikāya sakabhāvo, asamaye nivāsananti imāni nivāsanāpattiyā cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Vassikasāṭikasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^631^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^yampi tyāha^eb^nti ettha ^b^ya^eb^nti kāraṇavacanaṃ, tasmā evamettha sambandho veditabbo – mayā saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ pakkamissatīti yaṃ kāraṇaṃ nissāya ahaṃ te, āvuso, cīvaraṃ adāsiṃ, taṃ na karosīti kupito ^a^M2.0441^ea^ anattamano acchindīti. ^b^Ya^eb^nti vā cīvaraṃ ^a^V2.0390^ea^ parāmasati, tattha ‘‘mayā saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ pakkamissatīti yampi te ahaṃ cīvaraṃ adāsiṃ, taṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhissāmīti kupito anattamano acchindī’’ti sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03]^b^633^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āṇatto bahūni gaṇhāti, ekaṃ pācittiya^eb^nti ‘‘cīvaraṃ gaṇhā’’ti āṇattiyā ekacīvaravisayattā ekameva pācittiyaṃ. ^b^Vācāya vācāya dukkaṭa^eb^nti ettha acchinnesu vatthugaṇanāya pācittiyāni. ^b^Ekavācāya sambahulā āpattiyo^eb^ti idaṃ acchinnesu vatthugaṇanāya āpajjitabbaṃ pācittiyāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Āṇattiyā āpajjitabbaṃ pana dukkaṭaṃ ekameva.
[03]^b^634^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Eva^eb^nti iminā ‘‘vatthugaṇanāya dukkaṭānī’’ti idaṃ parāmasati. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti sithilaṃ gāḷhañca pakkhittāsu āpattiyā bahuttaṃ ekattañca atidissati.

[03]^b^635^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āvuso, maya^eb^ntiādīsu gaṇhitukāmatāya evaṃ vuttepi teneva dinnattā anāpatti. ^b^Amhākaṃ santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhissatī^eb^ti idaṃ sāmaṇerassapi dānaṃ dīpeti. Tasmā kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā’’ti vuttaṃ, tathāpi anupasampannakāle datvāpi upasampannakāle acchindantassa pācittiyamevāti veditabbaṃ. Acchindanasamaye upasampannabhāvoyeva hettha pamāṇaṃ. ^b^Detī^eb^ti tuṭṭho vā kupito vā deti. ^b^Rundhathā^eb^ti nivāretha. ^b^Evaṃ pana dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ettha evaṃ dinnaṃ na tāva tassa santakanti anadhiṭṭhahitvāva paribhuñjitabbanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭatī^eb^ti evaṃ dinnaṃ bhatisadisattā āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Cajitvā dinna^eb^nti vuttanayena adatvā anapekkhena hutvā tasseva dinnaṃ. ^b^Bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo^eb^ti sakasaññāya vinā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā āpattiyā kāretabbo. Vikappanupagapacchimacīvaratā, sāmaṃ dinnatā, sakasaññitā, upasampannatā, kodhavasena acchindanaṃ acchindāpanaṃ vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
[06]Cīvaraacchindanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^636^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^M2.0442^ea^ pāḷiyaṃ ^b^cīvarakārasamaye^eb^ti iminā vassaṃvutthabhikkhūnaṃ cīvarakammasamayattā cīvaramāso vutto, athaññopi pana cīvarakammakālo cīvarakārasamayoti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^638^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pañcahipi^eb^^a^V2.0391^ea^^b^missetvā^eb^ti khomādīhi pañcahi missetvā. Vītavītaṭṭhānaṃ yattha saṃharitvā ṭhapenti, tassa ^b^turī^eb^ti adhivacanaṃ. Suttaṃ pavesetvā yena ākoṭentā ghanabhāvaṃ sampādenti, taṃ ^b^vema^eb^nti vuccati. ^b^Yaṃ ya^eb^nti yaṃ yaṃ payogaṃ. Tantūnaṃ attano santakattā vītavītaṭṭhānaṃ paṭiladdhameva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘dīghato…pe… vīte nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya’’^eb^nti. Pāḷiyampi hi imināva adhippāyena ‘‘paṭilābhena nissaggiya’’nti vuttaṃ, tasmā yāva cīvaraṃ vaḍḍhati, tāva iminā pamāṇena āpattiyo vaḍḍhanti.

[03]^b^Seso kappiyo^eb^ti ettha hatthakammayācanavasena. ^b^Pubbe vuttanayena nissaggiya^eb^nti dīghaso vidatthimatte tiriyaṃ hatthamatte ca vīte nissaggiyaṃ. ^b^Tenevā^eb^ti akappiyatantavāyena. ^b^Tatheva dukkaṭa^eb^nti paricchede paricchede dukkaṭaṃ. ^b^Kedārabaddhādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena acchimaṇḍalabaddhādi gahitaṃ. ^b^Tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabba^eb^nti ettha ‘‘pacchā vītaṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhitagatikameva hoti, puna adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi. Sace pana paricchedaṃ dassetvā antarantarā avītaṃ hoti, puna adhiṭṭhātabba’’nti vadanti. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti vikappanupagappamāṇamatte vīte tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbanti attho. Cīvaratthāya viññāpitasuttaṃ, attuddesikatā, akappiyatantavāyena vāyāpananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.

[03]^b^Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. suttaviññattisikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) pana vāyāpeyyāti ettha ‘‘cīvaraṃ me, āvuso, vāyathāti akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpeyyā’’ti atthaṃ vatvā aṅgesupi ‘‘akappiyatantavāyena akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpana’’nti visesetvā vuttaṃ, tathāvidhaṃ pana visesavacanaṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ upalabbhati. Pāḷiyampi ‘‘ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna’’nti ettakameva anāpattivāre vuttaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyañca suttatantavāyānameva kappiyākappiyabhāvena bahudhā nayo dassito ^a^M2.0443^ea^, na kappiyākappiyaviññattivasenāti. ‘‘Akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpeyyā’’ti ca visesetvā vadantena ayaṃ nāma kappiyaviññattīti visuṃ na dassitaṃ, tasmā vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
[06]Suttaviññattisikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^642^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyyā^eb^ti idaṃ tassa kattabbākāramattadassanaṃ, dānaṃ panettha ^a^V2.0392^ea^ aṅgaṃ na hoti suttavaḍḍhanavaseneva āpajjitabbattā. Teneva padabhājanepi ‘‘tassa vacanena āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā appitaṃ vā karoti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiya’’nti suttavaḍḍhanākārameva dassetvā āpatti vuttā. ^b^Mātikāṭṭhakathāya^eb^mpi (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. mahāpesakārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) vuttaṃ ‘‘na bhikkhuno piṇḍapātadānamattena taṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Sace pana te tassa vacanena cīvarasāmikānaṃ hatthato suttaṃ gahetvā īsakampi āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā appitaṃ vā karonti, atha tesaṃ payoge bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ hotī’’ti. Āyatādīsu sattasu ākāresu ādimhi tayo ākāre suttavaḍḍhanena vinā na sakkā kātunti āha ^b^‘‘suttavaḍḍhanaākārameva dassetī’’^eb^ti. Suvītādayo hi ākāre vināpi suttavaḍḍhanena sakkā kātuṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Aññātakaappavāritānaṃ tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā vikappamāpajjanatā, cīvarassa attuddesikatā, tassa vacanena suttavaḍḍhanaṃ, cīvarassa paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Mahāpesakārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^646^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^b^asammohattha^eb^nti dasāhānāgatapade asammohatthaṃ. ^b^Paṭhamapadassā^eb^ti dasāhānāgatapadassa. ^b^Tāni divasānī^eb^ti tesu divasesu. ^b^Uppajjeyyā^eb^ti saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ujukaṃ attanoyeva vā uppajjeyya. ^b^Pañcamito^eb^ti ettha vassaṃ vasantassa saṅghassa pañcamito pubbe uppannaṃ ^a^M2.0444^ea^ accekacīvaraṃ pañcamiyaṃ vibhajitvā gahitaṃ accekacīvaraparihārameva labhati. Ujukaṃ attanoyeva uppannaṃ ce, pañcamiyaṃ uppannameva accekacīvaraparihāraṃ labhati, na tato pubbeti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Saddhāmattaka^eb^nti dhammassavanādīhi taṅkhaṇuppannaṃ saddhāmattakaṃ. ^b^Ārocitaṃ cīvara^eb^nti ārocetvā dinnacīvaraṃ. Chaṭṭhiyaṃ uppannacīvarassa ekādasamo aruṇo cīvarakāle uṭṭhātīti āha ^b^‘‘chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ṭhapitacīvarampī^eb^ti padhānacīvaradassanamukhena sabbampi atirekacīvaraṃ vuttaṃ. Atha ‘‘cīvaramāsepi atirekacīvaraṃ nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti idaṃ kuto laddhanti ce? ‘‘Visuṃ ananuññātepi imasmiṃ sikkhāpade ‘cīvarakālasamayo nāma anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine pañca māsā’ti vadantena tatiyakathinasikkhāpade ‘akālacīvaraṃ nāma anatthate kathine ekādasamāse uppannaṃ, atthate kathine sattamāse uppanna’nti ^a^V2.0393^ea^ vadantena ca anuññātameva hotī’’ti vadanti. ‘‘Aṭṭhakathāvacanappamāṇena gahetabba’’nti ca keci.

[03]^b^650^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni paṭhamakathinādisikkhāpadehi tassa tassa cīvarassa labbhamānaṃ parihāraṃ idheva upasaṃharitvā dassento ^b^‘‘iti atirekacīvarassa dasāhaṃ parihāro’’^eb^tiādimāha. ‘‘Anatthate kathine ekādasadivasādhiko māso, atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañca māsā’’ti ayameva pāṭho gahetabbo. Keci panettha ‘‘kāmañcesa ‘dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba’nti imināva siddho, aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapita’’nti pāṭhaṃ vatvā ‘‘dasadivasādhiko māso, dasadivasādhikā pañca māsāti pāṭhena bhavitabba’’nti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ tassa pamādapāṭhattā. Na hi dasāhena asampattāya kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamāya cīvarakālato pubbe dasa divasā adhikā honti. Evañhi sati ‘‘navāhānāgataṃ kattikatemāsikapuṇṇama’’nti vattabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. accekacīvarasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) ‘‘pavāraṇamāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāya uppannassa cīvarassa nidhānakālo dassito hotī’’ti vatvā ‘‘kāmañcesa ‘dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba’nti imināva siddho, aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapita’’nti pāṭho ^a^M2.0445^ea^ dassito, sopi pamādapāṭhoyeva. ‘‘Juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāyā’’ti ca vuttattā tattheva pubbāparavirodhopi siyā, chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāyāti vattabbaṃ. Evañhi sati ‘‘dasāhaparamasikkhāpadeneva siddha’’nti sakkā vattuṃ. Imameva ca pamādapāṭhaṃ gahetvā ^b^bhadantabuddhadattācariyena^eb^ ca –
[21]‘‘Tassāccāyikavatthassa, kathine tu anatthate;
[22]Parihārekamāsova, dasāhaparamo mato.
[21]‘‘Atthate kathine tassa, pañca māsā pakāsitā;
[22]Parihāro munindena, dasāhaparamā panā’’ti. –
[07]Vuttaṃ.

[03]Accekacīvarakāle uppannattā ^b^‘‘accekacīvarasadise’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Pañcamiyaṃ uppannaṃ anaccekacīvaraṃ ^a^V2.0394^ea^ dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato cīvarakālato pubbeyeva āpatti hoti, na cīvarakālātikkame, tasmā cīvarakālātikkame puna āpajjitabbāya āpattiyā abhāvaṃ sandhāya ‘anaccekacīvare anaccekacīvarasaññī anāpattī’ti vutta’’nti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Vikappanupagapacchimappamāṇassa accekacīvarassa attano santakatā, dasāhānāgatāya kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamāya uppannabhāvo, anadhiṭṭhitaavikappitatā, cīvarakālātikkamoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Accekacīvarasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^652^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^antaraghare^eb^ti antare gharāni ettha, etassāti vā antaragharanti laddhavohāre gocaragāme. Tenāha ^b^‘‘antogāme’’^eb^ti. Pāḷiyaṃ ^b^vippavasantī^eb^ti idaṃ yasmiṃ vihāre vasantā antaraghare cīvaraṃ nikkhipiṃsu, tato aññattha vasante sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tasmiñhi vihāre antaraghare cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā vasituṃ anuññātattā tattha vāso vippavāso nāma na hoti. Dubbalacoḷā ^b^duccoḷā^eb^ virūpacoḷā vā, duccoḷattā eva ^b^lūkhacīvarā^eb^.

[03]^b^653^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī’’ti imassa ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ ‘‘upasampajjā’’ti uddharitabbe ‘‘upasampajja’’nti uddharitvā ‘‘yo paṭhamassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho’’tiādi ^a^M2.0446^ea^ vuttaṃ, taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘upasampajjantiādīsu viyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘anāpucchaṃ vā pakkameyyā’’tiādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Upagantvā^eb^ti ^b^upa^eb^-saddassa atthamāha. ^b^Vasitvā^eb^ti akhaṇḍaṃ vasitvā. ‘‘Yena yassa hi sambandho, dūraṭṭhampi ca tassa ta’’nti vacanato ^b^‘‘imassa…pe… iminā sambandho’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^imassā^eb^ti ‘‘upavassa’’nti padassa. ^b^Nikkhipeyyā^eb^ti ṭhapeyya.

[03]Ettāvatā ca purimikāya upagantvā akhaṇḍaṃ katvā vutthavassena āraññakesu senāsanesu viharantena sakalaṃ kattikamāsaṃ ticīvarena vippavasituṃ anuññātaṃ hoti. Anatthatakathinassa hi cīvaramāse vippavāso na vaṭṭati atthatakathinānaṃyeva asamādānacārassa anuññātattā. Keci pana ‘‘anatthatakathinānaṃ cīvaramāsepi asamādānacāro labbhatī’’ti vatvā bahudhā papañcenti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Byañjanavicāraṇa^eb^nti ‘‘upavassa upavassitvā’’tiādivicāraṇaṃ ^a^V2.0395^ea^. ^b^Tassapī^eb^ti ‘‘vutthavassāna’’nti vibhaṅgapadassa. ^b^Vutthavassāna^eb^nti ca niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘evarūpānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abbhantare’’^eb^ti. ^b^Senāsanesū^eb^ti ettha tathārūpesūti sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato^eb^ti ettha ‘‘parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dve leḍḍupātā’’ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Aparikkhittassa pana gāmassa pariyante ṭhitagharūpacārato paṭṭhāya eko leḍḍupāto parikkhepārahaṭṭhānanti idamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Teneva ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^pi (visuddhi. 1.31) vuttaṃ ‘‘aparikkhittassa paṭhamaleḍḍupātato paṭṭhāyā’’ti. ^b^Sabbapaṭhama^eb^nti gāmābhimukhadisābhāgato sabbapaṭhamaṃ. ^b^Taṃ paricchedaṃ katvā^eb^ti taṃ paṭhamasenāsanādiṃ paricchedaṃ katvā. Idañca ^b^vinayadharānaṃ^eb^ matena vuttaṃ, ^b^majjhimabhāṇakānaṃ^eb^ matena pana ‘‘senāsanādīnaṃ upacāre ṭhitassa ekaleḍḍupātaṃ muñcitvā minitabba’’nti ^b^majjhimabhāṇakā^eb^ vadanti. Teneva ^b^majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘vihārassapi gāmasseva upacāraṃ nīharitvā ubhinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antarā minitabba’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pañcadhanusatika^eb^nti āropitena ācariyadhanunā pañcadhanusatappamāṇaṃ. ^b^Tato tato maggaṃ pidahatī^eb^ti tattha tattha khuddakamaggaṃ pidahati. ^b^Dhutaṅgacoro^eb^ti iminā imassapi sikkhāpadassa aṅgasampattiyā abhāvaṃ dīpeti.

[03]^b^‘‘Sāsaṅkānī’’ti sammatānī^eb^ti corānaṃ niviṭṭhokāsādidassanena ‘‘sāsaṅkānī’’ti sammatāni. ^b^Sannihitabalavabhayānī^eb^ti corehi manussānaṃ hataviluttākoṭitabhāvadassanato ^a^M2.0447^ea^ sannihitabalavabhayānīti attho. ^b^Sace pacchimikāyā^eb^tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ byatirekamukhena vibhāveti. ^b^Yatra hi piṇḍāyā^eb^tiādinā vuttappamāṇameva visesetvā dasseti. ^b^Sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayamevā^eb^ti ettha sāsaṅkaṃ vā sappaṭibhayaṃ vā hotu, vaṭṭatiyeva.

[03]Pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo tena cīvarena vippavāsāya, chārattaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabba’’nti iminā antaraghare cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā tasmiṃ vihāre vasantassa aññattha gamanakicce sati vihārato bahi chārattaṃ vippavāso anuññāto. Vasanaṭṭhānato hi aññattha chārattaṃ vippavāso vutto, na tasmiṃ vihāre vasantassa. Tena ca ^b^‘‘puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvāti ettha sace gocaragāmato puratthimāya disāya senāsanaṃ, ayañca pacchimadisaṃ gato hotī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatoyeva ca ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāya^eb^mpi (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) ‘‘tato ce uttari vippavaseyyā’’ti ^a^V2.0396^ea^ ettha ‘‘chārattato uttari tasmiṃ senāsane sattamaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeyyā’’ti attho vutto. ^b^Bhadantabuddhadattācariyena^eb^ pana pākaṭataraṃ katvā ayamevattho vutto. Vuttañhi tena –
[21]‘‘Yaṃ gāmaṃ gocaraṃ katvā, bhikkhu āraññake vase;
[22]Tasmiṃ gāme ṭhapetuṃ taṃ, māsamekantu vaṭṭati.
[21]‘‘Aññattheva vasantassa, chārattaparamaṃ mataṃ;
[22]Ayamassa adhippāyo, paṭicchanno pakāsito’’ti.

[03]‘‘Kosambiyaṃ aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hotī’’ti āgatattā ^b^‘‘kosambakasammuti anuññātā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Kosambakassa bhikkhuno sammuti ^b^kosambakasammuti^eb^. ^b^Senāsanaṃ āgantvā^eb^ti vusitavihārasseva sandhāya vuttattā tasmiṃ gāmūpacārepi aññasmiṃ vihāre aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati. ^b^Vasitvā^eb^ti aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā. Gataṭṭhānassa atidūrattā ^b^‘‘evaṃ asakkontenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tatthevā^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva gataṭṭhāne.
[06]Sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^657-659^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^a^M2.0448^ea^^b^uddissa ṭhapitabhāge^eb^ti attano gharepi uddisitvā visuṃ ṭhapitakoṭṭhāse. ‘‘Ekaṃ mayhaṃ, ekaṃ imassa dehī’’ti evaṃ ekavācāya āpajjitabbattā ^b^‘‘āpajjeyya ekato’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tumhākaṃ sappiādīni ābhatānī^eb^ti tumhākaṃ atthāya ābhatāni sappiādīni. Pariṇatabhāvaṃ jānitvāpi vuttavidhinā viññāpentena tesaṃ santakameva viññāpitaṃ nāma hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘mayhampi dethāti vadati, vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^660^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pupphampi āropetuṃ na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti idaṃ pariṇataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sace pana ekasmiṃ cetiye pūjitaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā aññasmiṃ cetiye pūjeti, vaṭṭati. ^b^Ṭhitaṃ disvā^eb^ti sesakaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā. ^b^Imassa sunakhassa mā dehi, etassa dehī^eb^ti idaṃ pariṇateyeva. Tiracchānagatassa pariccajitvā dinne pana taṃ palāpetvā aññaṃ bhuñjāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^‘‘Kattha demā^eb^tiādinā ekenākārena pāḷiyaṃ anāpatti dassitā, evaṃ pana apucchitepi apariṇataṃ idanti ^a^V2.0397^ea^ jānantena attano ruciyā yattha icchati, tattha dāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Yattha icchatha, tattha dethā^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘tumhākaṃ ruciyā’’ti vuttattā yattha icchati, tattha dāpetuṃ labhati. ^b^Pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayenevā^eb^ti ‘‘yattha tumhākaṃ deyyadhammo’’tiādinā nayena. Saṅghapariṇatabhāvo, taṃ ñatvā attano pariṇāmanaṃ, paṭilābhoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Pariṇatasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Niṭṭhito pattavaggo tatiyo.
[06]Iti samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
[06]Nissaggiyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dutiyo bhāgo niṭṭhito.
